userCmt: Phòng và cả biệt thự rất rất là đẹp
Một kỳ nghỉ nhớ đời

Phòng sạch sẽ, giá tốt, phòng mình ở có ban công thoáng tuy nhiên chắc gần bên cạnh là hàng ăn nên phòng có 1-2 con ruồi bay vào, vị trí cách phố cổ tầm 1,4 km. Nhà mình nhận phòng mới biết phòng ko có tủ lạnh và tối đi chơi về muộn tắm không có nước nóng, chắc bị lỗi j đó hoặc đúng hôm hết nước nóng. Nói chung gia đình nào có ý định dừng nghỉ tại hội an chủ yếu đi chơi ko phải kiểu nghỉ dưỡng thì đây cũng là một lựa chọn phù hợp và giá cả phải chăng.
Phòng đẹp, rộng, thoáng, sạch sẽ. Có chỗ để xe ô tô, đi bộ 10p tới phố cổ. Xung quanh nhiều hàng quán ăn uống.

Cô chủ dễ thương, luôn nhiệt tình, giúp đỡ khách hết mình, luôn ân cần với khách. Phòng rộng rãi, tiện nghi, vô cùng sạch sẽ thơm mát. Phương tiện đi lại dễ dàng, gọi xe là có ngay. Giá phòng thích hợp với thị trường. Thích nhất cô chủ dễ chịu, nhà mình con nít, hơi bề bộn, nhưng cô chủ luôn vui vẻ giúp đỡ khi mình cần. Vote 5 sao cho mọi hình thức.
Phòng ốc rộng rãi sạch sẽ. Giá ok là điểm nên chọn

Phòng ốc sạch sẽ thoáng mát, villa gần phố cổ, gần biển nên di chuyển rất thuận lợi. Chủ ở đây khá dễ thương, support gia đình mình rất nhiệt tình về địa điểm ăn uống địa phương. Nếu có dịp quay lại hội an sẽ book tiếp phòng ở đây

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Best hotel we stayed in vietnam! i fall in love with ahoy hoi an resort spa!! the design decor, the professionalism and promptness of staff and the cleanliness and presentation of the overall hotel is amazing. Breakfast was excellent. It also has a nice spa. Thanh for making our stay a memorable one that we would definitely recommend of ahoy hoi an for anyone visiting hoi an!

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent staff, buffet, and spa. The hotel is a opened hotel and the mosquitoes were a problem.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Utrolig trivelig hotell og personale. Bassengområdene er helt topp. Hotellet er trukket tilbake i fra hoved veien så det er veldig fredelig område. Når en tar prisen på overnatting her mot selve opplevelsen så gir dette veldig mye overnatting for pengene. Personalet er også fantastiske og gjør det hele til en veldig god opplevelse. Kan absolutt anbefale å bo her. Frokosten er helt ok, men restauranten ut over det var ikke noe bra. Vær obs på at hotellet krever ekstra betaling for ekstraseng og frokost til barn her, ut over det som er betalt via hotells.com

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Heel mooi hotel en superlieve en behulpzame staff.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is absolutely wonderful. The staff (particularly trinh and dung) were so helpful and professional. The pool area is gorgeous, we found it hard to want to leave! rooms are spacious and breakfast is good. Would definitely stay again!

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: The staff is excellent. The food is good. Only the location was not that great.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful and serene hotel with friendly and helpful staff. The two swimming pools are ideal for relaxing and cooling off. Rooms have excellent facilities. It is a 30 minute walk from the bustling centre of hoi an, but you can use the free shuttle or bikes if you don t want to walk it. Lots of convenient shops and small eateries in the area too. Would highly recommend if you want somewhere peaceful, yet convenient.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: A nice resort with relaxing feel. Staff are also friendly. The downside of this location is not near to old town hence when u want to make a visit u will have to book a transport out.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Quiet place conveniently located. Breakfast was very good.overall service was superb. Long at the front desk had the broadest smile that made your day. Will go back again.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very nice staff made us feel welcome. Well maintained property. Great boutique hotel.

hotelName: Ahoy Hoi An Boutique Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent accueil, bienveillance , aux petits soins! bons repas et excellent petit déjeuner accès libre aux vélos , belles piscines , chambres spacieuses , spa accueillant , très beau cadre

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Great breakfast and some lovely places to eat around and the beach was great for kids

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fabulous location, nice pool areas, amazing staff, super massages, great breakfast and lovely big comfortable clean room. Would definitely return.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Chambre confortable et bien décorée mais au 3e étage beaucoup trop chaude comparativement aux étages inférieurs odeur nauséabonde par endroits le jardin est petit et pas très bien entretenu l accès à la plage est pas terrible l espace petit déjeuner est insuffisant par rapport au nombre de personnes

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 벌써 아이라부티크가 그리워요. 직원들은 내게 룸넘버를 물어보지 않아도 날 기억합니다. 매일 아침 조식먹을 때 마다 친근하게 말 걸어주고 밤새 안녕했는지 물어봐줘요. 그때 불편사항을 말하면 다 반영되어 있습니다. 묵는 동안 한국인은 한팀 봤어요. 대부분 서양 가족이나 커플입니다. 해변 코앞이고 한 블럭 뒤에 맛집과 마사지사파도 많아요. 위치가 이렇게 좋은데 숙소는 조용하고 한적하고 평화로워요. 객실은 조금 올드하지만 집기류와 수건, 침구 깨끗합니다. 아이라부티크 리셉션 바로 앞에 미니마트 바가지 없고 친절합니다. 매일 여기서 생수와 맥주를 사마셨어요. 마지막날 체크아웃할 때 작은 랜턴을 선물로 줬어요. 넘나 감동쓰 ㅠㅠㅠㅠ 소중한 아이라부티크 또 만나요!!!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Schönes hotel ausserhalb von hoi an 2 gehminuten vom strand entfernt. Das personal ist super freundlich und die hotelanlage sehr sauber und gepflegt. Die zimmer sind schön eingerichtet und das frühstücksbuffet bietet eine grosse auswahl an speisen. Wir würden sofort wieder das hotel aira buchen.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fabulous experiences. Beautiful hotel, very comfortable bed, blackout curtains, slept very well indeed. The staff are all amazing and make you feel like family. Amazing breakfast. Very close to beach. Small shop 5 seconds away. Very reasonable mini bar prices. Would definitely recommend.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Terrific boutique hotel, convenient to beach and lovely vietnamese restaurants. Excellent customer service, terrific included breakfasts, comfy king size beds with nice linens. Would definitely stay again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff were great ,the position and breakfast was great but photos need to be upgraded as they we old a

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: For how much you are paying compared to other places close by, the communication from the front desk regarding a tour i booked through them could have been better. The laundry service i was told would be ready by 5pm then it changed to 8pm after i had already given them my laundry. It was a good stay and it was great having a pool and access to the beach. The rooms and showers were large and comfortable. Overall a great stay with a few disappointing parts of the service.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The property is in a fantastic location. We walked to an bang beach each day and loved all the restaurants nearby. Our room was a great size, beds and pillows were very comfortable. Loved the loaner beach baskets. Onsite buffet is delicious. We didn t love the pools and pool surroundings. The main pool with swim up bar was fine, but definitely not something to write home about. The secondary pool area felt rundown and needed a fresh coat of paint and some clean up. The hotel is split into two separate buildings with a few homes dividing it, which was a bit strange and there is construction you walk past to get from the 2nd building to the main building. Overall, it is a nice resort and the staff is excellent. The location is perfect and while i was disappointed in the pool, the beach proximity was fantastic and that was where we spent the majority of our days. I recommend staying here and if i go back to hoi an, i would stay here again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Great place,, clean,,, staff super,, they are the best,,,, i must mention they don t charge for fridge stuff, this included two beers every day ( no charge at all), they re eager to clean your room every day,, and at check out,, one of the staff(lady) sat with me to thanks me for staying with them,, she even waited with me for the taxi to say goodbye,,, ohhh boy so sad,, felt like family saying goodbye, just incredible

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Love this hotel. Great location and a fantastic staff. Great for families. The spa is also wonderful.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Tolles kleines boutique hotel. Das personal ist sehr freundlich und erfüllt alle wünsche. Gute lage für ausflüge!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Not good

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We absolutely loved our stay here! beautifully appointed room, great breakfast, amazing hospitality by the hotel staff. The hotel is a minute walk to an bang beach, and about a 10 min ride to the old district of hoi an. It is much quieter by the beach (city centre could get a bit touristy) and staying here was the right decision. Staying at this hotel has been the highlight of our vietnam trip!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Super kleine süßes hotel direkt am strand die zimmer sind sehr sauber und gemütlich eingerichtet. Die betten und kissen sind super und die minibar wird täglich gratis aufgefüllt. Der service ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend und das frühstücksangebot ist überschaubar aber wechselt äglich und ist immer lecker

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: L hôtel à taille humaine qui est juste à côté de la plage, les chambres sont très joliment décorées. Le personnel est adorable. La piscine est sympa. Le seul bémol la nourriture que nous n avons pas trouvé super.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Very friendly and helpful staff. Block b is a 1 minute walk down the road from reception, but has a staff member on site, its own pool and direct beach access. If you want cocktails by the pool you need to go to the block a pool though - which is also where the breakfast area is. Nice strong coffee and great buffet breakfast. We would come back again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Estupendo hotel cercano a la playa con un staff espléndido. Cuenta con dos piscinas con un agua increíble y con ambiente muy relajado

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Everything was perfect! as always

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 직원분이 매우 친철합니다. 안방 비치와 2분 내 거리에 있고 내부에 2개의 작은 수영장이 있습니다. 프라이빗하게 사용하엿습니다. 뒤쪽으로 음식점이 있습니다.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 친절하고 동네분위기 좋아요. 대신 샤워기 필터는 꼭 가져와야해요.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We stayed for a week in a bang and loved our stay at aira boutique hotel! the location is fantastic only a short walk to the beach. Property has 2 pools, a spa and the staff are so so friendly and helpful! our room was perfect, super spacious, clean and beautifully decorated. Highly recommend and would happily stay here again!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff at the aria could not be more pleasant. They really went out of their way to be friendly and helpful and engaging. The biggest issue was with the beds - they were really hard. Shower was nice, ac worked, and we had connecting rooms which was a nice benefit. Loved the easy beach access and the pool was lovely too. Lots of nearby restaurants too!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: ビーチが目の前で ゆっくりとした時間を過ごすことができました お部屋も可愛くてテンションがあがりました 朝食も種類豊富で美味しかったです ナイトマーケットあたりの繁華街までは少し距離がありますが タクシーを使えばすぐです

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Die unterkunft rundherum könnte mehr gepflegt werden

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Boutique staff very friendly and helpful. The only place my family and i stay when vacationing in hoian.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: I have an amazing stay at aira boutique hotel. The room was big and very confortable. The pool was just perfect and i had a great service from the staff. Special thank you to lily who makes my journey even better than expected. I will come back for sure )

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: アンバンビーチまで徒歩3分 ビーチフロントではありませんが ビーチにはホテル滞在者用のビーチベッドとパラソルが準備されています ホテルスタッフはとてもフレンドリーで好印象でした 近くには安くて美味しいレストランがたくさんあって食には困りません また 毎日の洗濯物も安く出すことができるので助かりました 是非リピートしたいと思ってます

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Top lage in 5 minuten zum sauberen strand, moderne und schön eingerichtete zimmer, zuvorkommendes personal (danke lily team), opulentes frühstücksbuffet im garten, in direkter umgebung befinden sich unzählige gute kleine restaurants. In 30 minuten ist man per fahrrad in der altstadt von hoi an. Ruhige umgebung, perfekt für einen erholungsurlaub.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Lage

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: This hotel is superb. The staff are so friendly helpful. The rooms are immaculately cleaned every day. The breakfast choices are perfect of high quality. The location is ideal to explore the local town hoi an, as well as being almost beach front.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 잠자기엔 침구가 불편했어요ㅜ 개미들도 너무 많더라구요.. 그래도 수영장에서 실컨놀구 푹쉬다가요

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The hotel is amazing. Staff was ever so friendly to us and our toddler. Breakfast was also very good. The area is generally beautiful with a nice and the beach is close by. It is possible to take bicycles for free and one of them has a child seat with a harness. We got massages which were great. We had lunch and dinner at restaurant and found better quality elsewhere. So would only go there for breakfast. One negative mention when we were there jan/feb 2024 there was construction next door. Looked like another plot was being prepared for additional building. Did not bother us, but construction was typically 6.30 in the morning to 7.00 in the evening.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 너무 만족스러운 휴가였어요. 직원분들 모두 친절하고, 바닷가도 가까워서 편했어요. 그리고 스파도 매우만족!!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 앤틱스위트룸 2박하고 추가로 디럭스룸 1박 했습니다. 앤틱스위트룸은 제일 윗층에 있어서 조용하고 1층보다 습하지 않았고 벌레도 없었어요. 화장실도 크고 욕조도 있고 에어컨도 2대가 있었어요. 전반전으로 매우 만족했어요. 디럭스룸은 1층을 배정받았는데 길가 바로 옆 방이라 너무 시끄러웠고 복도에서 나는 소리도 너무 크게 들렸어요. 소리도 소리지만 침대 이불이 너무 까끌거렸고 베개는 세탁을 안했는지 냄새가 심하게 나서 사용하질 못했습니다. 저녁에 프런트에 전화를 걸었는데 아무도 받질 않았구요.. 또 저녁에 나갔다 들어왔는데 바퀴벌레가 나왔고 변기뚜껑을 열었더니 6cm정도되는 검은거미가 변기에 붙어있어서 진짜 기절할뻔했어요 디럭스룸을 호이안도착하고나서 이틀 묵고나서 예약한거라 괜찮겠지하고 간건데 마지막날이 너무 최악이었어요.. 다음에 또 가게된다면 앤틱 스위트로 다시 묵고싶네요 직원들은 모두 친절했고 조식또한 과일도 많고 먹을게 많았습니다

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Super dejligt hotel og god service! lækker morgenmad med mulighed for at bestille forskellige æg-retter samt iskaffe -)

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 안방비치 바로앞. 더이상 좋을수 없다. 친절한 직원분들께 감사한다.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Great experience. The hotel was super nice, great location near the beach and restaurants. Exceptional staff. Would absolutely stay again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Beautiful spot. Great friendly staff.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Hyggeligt lille hotel med super service. 2 min til strand og hyggelige restauranter - 10 min i taxi til hoi an. Dejligt sted

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 안방비치와 근접해있으며 라플라주등 맛집과도 걸어서 이동하는 가까운 거리에 있어 매우 좋았습니다. 부티크호텔답게 아기자기 소품하나하나 신경을 많이 쓰신것 같습니다. 휴양을 여유롭게 할 수 있는 조용한 분위기여서 너무 좋았고 침대도 깨끗하였습니다. 무엇보다 직원분들께서 너무 친절하였습니다. 그리구 조식도 굉장히 맛있었습니다. 한국인이 많이 없고 조식당도 휴양 특유의 분위기를 느낄수 있어 좋았습니다. 다시 방문하게 된다면 재방문 의사 있습니다

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Really enjoy our stay and the staff were very friendly and helpful.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Staff was very attentive, available when needed, and answered all concerns or questions, whether referring to the best places to eat or obtaining transportation.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: A great stay at aira - staff are very welcoming and helpful, breakfast is tasty and in a lovely venue at the outdoor restaurant. I did not try the pool bar the pools themselves felt a bit too cozy for me and i opted to spend more time at the beach. I must have misunderstood that they had a beach space, but in fact the only beach chairs and umbrellas are owned by beachside restaurants. You can use them with any purchase, though honestly i did not see that enforced at all. I had an attic room that stayed a bit warm, but was a really nice space complete with a balcony. They did offer a to-go breakfast when i left because it was so early, but it really wasn t appetizing. Overall, very good experience.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We had a fantastic stay at aira boutique. Jack, the pool barman, made great cocktails and was very friendly, as were all the staff. Nothing we would change apart from perhaps the breakfast choice being more varied. Overall, a great stay and we d definitely stay again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Nice quiet location away from the main hustle and bustle, but very close to the beach and a huge choice of restaurants.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: A little tropical paradise next to an bang beach! wonderful staff. Great breakfast. Highly recommend!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Beautiful location. Very clean and well maintained. Delicious food at restaurant and at very reasonable prices. The best thing about this hotel however is its staff - such kind and accommodating people. Everyone is so very friendly and do their very best to help you enjoy your time here. This is one of the best hotels i have ever stayed in and i am sad we weren t here for longer!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 위치가 비치 바로 앞인건 최대장점.룸 청결상태나 침구등도 양호. 스탭들도 친절(레스토랑 직원들 제외). 시설 관리가 안되고 있는 느낌. 릴렉스하러간 리조트인데 포겟볼 다이도 관리가 안되는 듯하고 이용객도 없음. 가장 큰 문제는 수영장인데 레스토랑 옆 수영장을 썰배드가 몇개 없어서 아침부터 자리없음. 이용할 엄두 못냄. 신관에 있는 수영장은 물이 너 무 더러움. 바닥에는 모래가 쌓여있고 육안으로 봐도 뿌연 색깔. 수영하면서 음료나 스낵을 주문하고 싶었는데 신관의 바인지 매점인지는 아예 운영을 안함. 수영장 옆 화장실도 지저분해서 사용하고 싶지 않음. 호캉스하러 갔는데 첫날 수영장 10분 이용하고 근처도 안갔음. 다음번에는 옆에 있는 다른 리조트나 빌라로 갈것임

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Really nice hotel, lovely staff, great experience.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Everyone was happy to help us, the room was lovely, great location. Nothing was too much trouble.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Close to the beach and fantastic staff at the hotel! very serviceminded and easy to communicate with

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Excellent experience and all the staff are so helpful.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Well located hotel close to beach, restaurants and bars. Staff are wonderful and breakfast is very good with numerous food options. Definitely would stay again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: My 3rd time here and not the last! 4 days went too quickly in this charming boutique hotel. This is one of the best place to relax one week in south east asia.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Aira hoi an is a heaven.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The hotel was very comfortable with great beds and pillows- breakfast was great with multiple choices including eggs anyway you wish. (butter was terrible taste which impacted toast/ croissants). Staff was amazing especially maya who went beyond great service every time.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Aira was the nicest place we stayed in vietnam in this price bracket( and some higher!) perfect chilled beach atmosphere, meters from the beach. The best breakfast by far. Quick drive into hoi an via grab. For us being able to go back to aira after the busyness of hoi an was perfect. Staff were all exceptionally friendly and helpful, rooms were clean and spacious(we had the balcony room). The pictures are accurate. Can t wait to go back!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fantastic and service minded staff. The hotel has a lot of charm and pontetial but feels a little bit outdated. Superb breakfast with more than everything. Many really nice restaurants and bars on the beach with views and great food and drinks. And a short taxi ride to the old quarter in hoi an. Improve the cleanliness just a little bit and it will be the outstanding best resort at the hoi a beach.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Très bon séjour, bon accueil et un personnel attentif bien situe sur la plage petits bémols , les tarifs du spa et des boissons sont élevés.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We are here on a four day visit to hoi an. The staff at the hotel are very friendly and accommodating. Breakfast buffet is incredible. The rooms are lovely and big and tidy. It s in a great location with a lovely pool. We ll be back.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Nice hotel and great staff. Room was clean and modern. The pool was nice and clean although a little small. Access to the beach was easy. An bang was nice and quiet with enough restaurants to keep you happy

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Wonderful service, nice location and amazing breakfast!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fantastic location right near beach. Beautiful friendly staff. Loved it. We will be back

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: An absolutely outstanding hotel. Should be 5 stars! the staff welcomed us, and they were all incredibly helpful. Our room was spotless, cleaned every day and the mini bar restocked daily too. We enjoyed breakfast and room service - lots of choice and so fresh! we felt looked after from the moment we arrived to the moment we left. We also enjoyed a body scrub and massage in the hotel spa - very professional and brilliant treatments. We wish we could have stayed for longer. It was our favourite part of our trip to vietnam so far. Thank you so much, aira boutique!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 빌라에 묵었습니다.(3베드룸) 직원들 친절했고, 숙소도 딱 생각한 자연친화적인 분위기였고, 수영장도 딱 좋았구 근처에 새벽시장도 재미있었어요. 숙소에 작은개미들이 많아서 집에와서 짐 다 뒤집어 엎은거빼고는ㅋㅋ 만족합니다!ㅋㅋ

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We had a family room with mezzanine bed and shower/wc upstairs. It was perfect for a family of the hotel is peaceful and stylish. It s made up of 2 buildings (minute away from one another). We used the pool in the other building, which was on the way to the beach (private section for guests with beds/umbrellas). The location is great, easy access on foot to beach, bars and restaurants. Staff were kind and helpful ) thank you so much

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: ２泊お世話になりました 求めていた全ての事が揃ったホテルでした スタッフは親切でとてもフレンドリー 近くの街並みも素敵でビーチまでも直ぐです 朝ご飯もとても美味しかったです スパも最高でした ホイアン滞在にして大正解でした また近い日に訪れたいと思います スタッフの皆さん ありがとう

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Just had a four night stay at aria. Was in a great central location close to restaurants and the beach! the resort has sunbeds and umbrellas on the beach solely for the use of guests which were great. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Cooler and less hectic than hoi an. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay! we will return!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We were in heaven

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: A fantastic stay in an bang beach. The location is excellent you can walk to many cafes, restaurants, bars and the beach. The room was very comfortable with tasteful decorations. The staff were excellent! they were extremely welcoming, friendly and nothing seemed too difficult. I would highly recommend the breakfast too. I can t wait to return!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fantastic hotel with friendly staff. We truly loved our stay. Nothing was too much of an ask at this hotel. We will be back.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Excellent location close to the beach and short distance to hoian. Walking distance to restaurants and convenience store. Staff was amazing helpful with tours restaurant suggestions. Breakfast choices were great. Would definitely stay again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The hotel itself was lovely great breakfast choices pool great. The staff are outstanding can t do enough for you very warm kind friendly. Highly recommend. Defo stay again

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Exceptional staff comfortable rooms however aircon could of been cooler it struggled. Fantastic breakfast huge range caters for all.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Stayed here for 3 weeks this holiday after a 2 week stay last year. Again excellent, team is super helpful, breakfast best of our trip, lots of close by restaurants bars and beach a 5min walk.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Spontan entschied ich mich nach hoi an zu reisen und fand zufällig dieses wunderschöne hotel. Es hat meine erwartungen komplett übertroffen. Alles in allem absolut stimmig, die liebe zum detail auf jedem zentimeter, unglaublich sauber, unfassbar frisch gut riechend, toller rundum-service, klasse personal, cozy zimmer mit einer wahnsinns aussicht. Das frühstücksbuffet war sehr reichhaltig und hatte eine tolle auswahl. Als wir ankamen, fiel mir der flyer von tiger dive in die hände und ich konnte über die rezeption direkt für den nächsten morgen eine tages-tour buchen. Unvergesslich. Tolles team. Tolle erfahrung. Der privatstrand ist sauber. Es gibt ausreichend sonnenliegen. Die polster könnten mal erneuert und ausgetauscht werden. -) das essen entspricht auch 100 einem ausgewogenen preisleistungsverhältnis. Ich würde immer wieder hierher zurückkommen und kann es 100 weiter empfehlen.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Jonathan and i really enjoyed the stay at the hotel. Staffs are nice and helpful. Our room was clean and the bed was comfortable. I really liked the fishcake noodle soup at their restaurant for breakfast. We will come back if we visit hoi an again.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 無し

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Hôtel charmant. Au bord d une superbe plage. À 10min de taxi de hoi an. Je regrette de ne pas y être resté plus longtemps. Environnement assez naturel tout en ayant de nombreuses commodités autour. Très bon accueil. Personnel très prévenant.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Staff are amazing great breakfast. Everything needed for a good stay. Would defo return

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Had a lovely stay with friends. Room was a great size. Excellent staff and hospitality. The spa was wonderful! great location at the beach and easy trip to downtown hoi an. Would absolutely stay again!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 딱 그값정도만 하는거 같아요

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff are warm, accommodating, helpful and friendly. The hotel is decent enough, but it is a very busy place and that high traffic has led to wear and tear visible around the building and rooms. Nothing a makeover wouldn t fix. Our family was comfortable there nonetheless and we re grateful to the lovely people working there for going above and beyond for us during our stay

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Har boet på dette hotel flere gange. Fantastisk personale, fantastisk morgenmad og fantastisk beliggenhed meget tæt på dejlig strand.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Hotel was lovely,right near the beach and restaurants,we booked the attic suite

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Very nice

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff here was so sweet and helpful! we felt very well cared for.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Hôtel sympathique, personnel attentif. Prestation de qualité. Merci

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 아주 만족스러움 직원들 매우 친절하고 위치 안방비치 바로앞이라 최상급 재방문의사 있음

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: We had booked the aira for our group of 8 that were celebrating my husbands 60th, we had a variety of different rooms all in the main block overlooking the pool. The staff here are amazing, always a smile and a hello and will help you with anything, anytime. A special mention to train and maya who spoke with us daily and asked about our day. The breakfast buffet was great with such a large choice including pho, eggs, salads, a large variety of fruit, traditional meals, and pastries. The pool was good after being out exploring or swimming at the beach which is a very short walk away.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff went over and beyond to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. They provided easy and reasonably priced airport transfers, a free room upgrade, great breakfast service and very good recommendations for restaurants and cafes. We will be back!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Absolutely amazing.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Tres bel hotel et tres bien situe, le personnel fera toujours de son mieux pour répondre a vos demandes, je vous conseille cet établissement pour faire de la plage et visiter hoi an et les environs

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Hôtel à taille humaine, très bien placé à quelques mètres de la plage (10min en voiture de hoi an). Très jolie chambre. Excellent petit déjeuner, belles prestations au spa. Un personnel adorable, attentionné et irréprochable pour l organisation de différents services (taxi, guide, massages ). Petit cadeau le jour du départ. Beaucoup d hôtels dits à haut standing devraient s inspirer d un tel fonctionnement!

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The staff are very friendly and go out of their way to be helpful. Breakfast was great with a lot of great options and different offerings each day. I was disappointed that there were no umbrellas or shade options on the beach. The pool table also closed at 9pm which seemed quite early. Otherwise, we had a great time here.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 3泊5日の4人家族旅行で利用させていただきました ダナン国際空港からタクシーで40分 ホイアンであれば10分 どこに観光するにも不自由はありません こちら側の拙い英語にも関わらず 一生懸命理解しようと努力してくれてましたし どんな些細なことにも全て丁寧に対応してくれたスタッフには感謝しかありません 私たちはヴィラタイプに宿泊しました 十分すぎるくらい広く ベッドルームが3つもあるため 快適に眠ることができました 海はすぐ目の前ですし ランドリーや食事も近くにたくさんあるので 不自由は全くありませんでした 特に朝食は全て絶品で 中でもパンは別格でした 日本人も少ない地域のため 海外旅行を満喫するのであれば 間違いなくベストの選択だと思います 欧米人が多く雰囲気抜群で ダナンと違って静かに過ごせますよ

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Very friendly and professional staff. The location is fantastic for the beach strip of bars and restaurants and they have a private beach with free loungers for guests. They also have 2 pools which are quiet and clean. Rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. Airport transfer is also available for a fee.

hotelName: Aira Boutique Hoi An Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The property was beautiful and peaceful. Staff were kind, courteous eager to help out. Very close to the beach. Nice pool. Great breakfast options included. Spa insight was fantastic.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Ally beach hotel is located right across the road from the beach. We were there in early november, off season, so not much swimming was done in the ocean. There s also an erosion problem, on the beach, so there s a wall of huge sandbags. The hotel staff was very accommodating to our needs and even provided me with a birthday cake, on my special day. The hotel led a free two hour bike tour. The bikes were in great shape and could be checked out at any time for a ride. The hotel did provide a free shuttle to ancient town, hoi an. I would consider staying at this hotel again, especially if i was there during peak season.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Ett mycket familjärt hotell med en fantastisk serviceinriktad personal.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Very pleasant stay at the ally beach , the hotel was beyond clean and the staff excellent. There are a few decent restaurants nearby, notably the old man which is next door and family run serving superb food and 200 metres in the opposite direction, chine in our view, the downsides were the location, it was quite a way from town, subsequently very little to do in the evenings, and the beach was very narrow due to sand-bags which looked like giant sausages which ran along the entire stretch of beach to stop the sea washing it away. The pool area at the hotel is very restricted and the place cries out for a decent bar where guests can socialise.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Bra hotell i lugnt läge utanför centrum, nära stranden och bra restauranger runt knuten. Generös gratis utlåning av cyklar, shuttle service gratis, till både stranden och centrala hoi an. Hjälpte oss att boka tågbiljetter. Rabatt på spa-behandling som var mycket bra.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Nice hotel and very friendly staff. Had an excellent massage

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Dejligt hotel, god morgenmad, rar seng, dog ærgerligt at man skulle krydse vejen for at komme på stranden, som desværre ikke var som forventet. (billederne snyder)

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Ally beach resort is located on cua dai beach. The hotel is clean with good rooms, a restaurant and poolside bar. The pool is small but refreshing. This hotel is not large so you get good personal service. A short walk across the road they also have a beach side restaurant and a private beach. They offer free shuttle service to hoian or borrow a bicycle to ride into town or see the local area. Staff are friendly and very helpful.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Very nice hotel close to the beach, execelent, llike to come again

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Super rapport qualité prix personnel très accueillant chambre spacieuse petit déjeuner de qualité restaurant et transat sur une plage privée navette gratuité vers le centre ville

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Ally beach boutique was a perfect stay for me and my boyfriend. The bed is super comfortable and we booked the room with a balcony. There is a shuttle that runs to old town, but not very frequently. We rented a motorbike for the weekend and rode down to the big beach (which was awesome) and then in to town. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 시설은 낡았으나 깔끔하게 관리되어있음. 동양인보단 서양인들이 많아 직원들 영어는 능숙함. 한국어x. 수영장이 작음. 그러나 다른곳 무료 이용할 수 있는데 있음. 호텔내 마사지샵있고, 자전거 무료대여, 구시가지 무료셔틀있음.(1시간에 1대) 사람도 너무 많지 않아 여유있게 잘 지냈음.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Perfect. From the hotel through to the staff we were treated like royalty. Location was great and having access to the private beach we were able to relax and recoup. Thank you

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Hôtel formidable la plage est très proche avec un service remarquable tout est paradisiaque je le recommande

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: We enjoyed our stay at the ally beach resort. The hotel is located across the road from the beach, and their beach side restaurant is across the road and a little way down. The staff were friendly, professional and helpful and the hotel offered complimentary tours, shuttle bus to town, and bicycles. Our room was spacious, modern and clean, with a lovely view of the ocean from the balcony. Although the bed had two single mattresses pushed together under a mattress protector, we didn t find this to be a major problem. Wifi in the room and around the resort was good. The private beach wasn t particularly large or clean, however there are some lovely stretches of beach just a short walk away. We found that the food served at the breakfasts and at the restaurant was nothing particularly special, although still up to standard. Overall, our experience at the hotel was very good and we would consider returning.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Nice hotel and staff are great. The hotel services provided are excellent with access to bikes and shuttle buses into and out of town on regular basis.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful hotel on the beach. We had a massage every day in vietnam and the spa at ally beach was the cleanest and the massages were the best. Restaurant was excellent.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Tolles hotel mit sehr guter lage am strand. Beim frühstücksbuffet gibt es sowohl westliches als auchh vietnamesisches essen. Genial war dass man sich frisch omelettes und pancakes machen lassen konnte. Mit den gratis bikes war man innerhalb 15-20mins in hoi an selber oder konnte durch die felder nebenan fahren.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 한적하고 조용한 곳에 있어서 첫날은 조용히 쉴 수 있고 좋았는데 다음날 단체 손님이 온듯... 시끄럽고 밤새 떠들고 새벽부터 발소리 요란하게 돌아다니고... 단체도 좋지만 다른 손님들이 편히 쉴 수 있도록 배려가 되었다면 좋았을것 같다.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: This hotel is amazing the staff are so friendly and helpful what ever the request. Location is perfect beach across the road with own private area and hoi an town easy to get to with shuttle provide by hotel or taxi. We stayed in this hotel prior to covid and would return if we ever go back to hoi an.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Nice little beach hotel. Not a lot to do in the area but it s relaxing. Had a good stay for the most part and extended our stay for an additional 4 nights but had a few issues during our stay 1- air conditioning was weak , it got cool but never cold even on the lowest setting and having them come check on it 2 times they never fixed it. 2- walls are thin and hallways echo with noisy staff or guests. For the most part, we had a pretty quiet trip minus housekeeping, being loud in the mornings, talking to each other at a higher volume than necessary and our last night a large chinese group checking in and waking up at 5 am and being extremely loud yelling at each other from 5 am to 9 am so could not sleep. 3- be careful as they have glass bottles for shower gel and shampoo with a very small shelf in the shower area i got charged 200,000 dong because of their poor design. The bottles fell off the small shelf and broke in the shower and almost cut my girlfriend s feet. Management should re-look at the design of shower and shampoo dispensers in the shower to protect their guest. Otherwise they could have a lawsuit from an injury. 4- the maintenance crew on one morning decided to start hammer drilling into the foundation right outside our door at 8 30 am. I was not happy by any means to be woken up that way after sternly talking to them that we were sleeping they stopped. Besides those issues, it was a comfortable stay and relaxing time the front desk staff were very friendly.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: All good

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Close to the beach and friendly staff. Some of the gym equipment needs to be updated

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Fantastisk service og meget hyggelig personale, god frokost og nært stranden i et rolig område. Kommer til å booke akkurat samme hotell, hvis det blir en tur til hoi-an igjen.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The hotel was okay, not bad but not great - just okay.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Very nice staff, good breakfast, quiet, close to beach with own beach area.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Chambre petite. Literie qui creuse. Drap usé. Petit déjeuner moyen et la musique trop forte des le matin.. Belle plage mais chemin d accès à la plage pas du tout aménagé.. Les transats sur la plage étaient à disposition de l hôtel mais rien et aucune indications de la soit disant plage privée..

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Good staff! rooms are clean. Shuttle service is good to get to the market.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Very nice hotel friendly staff who were very attentive. Only criticism was the slippery shower floor. Pool good and short walk to the beach.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Good location and restaurant and waiters were good. Also, kevin at front desk was really nice and professional. But other front desk services were pretty lacking given the price of room. Sent several emails and facebook messenger questions but these were never responded to. Asked for help on several items but was not given any help. Even asking for something sent to the room was refused. Understand covid has caused some difficult circumstances, but they were busy that weekend but front desk staff seemed to be missing. For price we paid, service was not worth it.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Good location to the beach... Room is ok...breakfast is subpar.. Staffs are nice. Good for budget stay only! far from hoi an old town..

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Greit og rolig hotell med hyggelig personale. Egen restaurant med strandsone 100m unna hotellet. Sykkelavstand til gamlebyen.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The hotel itself was fine but with the swimming pool so close to the building all the noise travelled straight up and into the accommodation areas. Too noisy. The beach access was below average. Had to step through a construction site to access the beach. Not good.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Loved the beach! ac at the property was fantastic. Short drive into town. The breakfast was amazing as were the staff

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Staff were excellent! jimmy was very helpful with our luggage. Everyone provided service with a smile on their face. Hotel is not every big and rooms were quite plain jane. One recommendation is to upgrade the tv s and to have hd channels. Beach is actually not connected to the hotel so you ll have to take a 2-3 minute walk to get to the beach. Unfortunately we arrived while there was a storm so did not even get to enjoy the beach at all. Breakfast was decent and staff would help get what you need if not already available. Hotel is about 5km away from old town. Bikes are available from the hotel free of charge and we rode in one day. Trip was fairly easy as it s pretty much flat road. Would definitely recommend doing this to explore the town. Overall a good trip and great stay at this hotel. Would definitely come back!

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Stayed att the hotel for two nights and wished i had booked more. The hotel offers shuttles and bike so you can easily travel to the ancient city or the beach. The hotel had a private beach with their own chairs which was great. Barly no salesmen at the beach. Great service at the hotel making us feel welcome. Love to go to ally beach again in the future.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The people working there were so friendly, nice, and helpful! the hotel was away from all the noise so it was much more peaceful

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Hôtel très bien, navette gratuite à disposition, le seul petit hic c est qu il n est pas sur la plage, comme les photos le montre, mais la plage n est pas loin à pied. Je pense qu il faudrait revoir certaines photos. Cordialement

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Am strand gelegen aber nicht direkt zum schwimmen geeignet, shuttle in die stadt wird angeboten

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Good location away from the hustle and bustle of downtown hoi an. The beach front at the hotel has been eroded away but it is and easy bike ride to an bang beach.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Et service innstilt hotel med god frokost. Lite svømmebasseng område og et stykke å gå til brukbar strand. Stranden ca.100m fra hotellet foreløbig ødelagt av en lokal sunami for tre år siden. Positivt at hotellet holder basseng og håndkle til stranden. Rolig, lite og koseligt nærområde. Skyttelbusser som kjører en gratis inn til byen hoi an.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The hotel itself was ok, with a very small balcony and pool. Almost no sun to the pool and just a few beds. The most disappointing thing was that the beach that was advertised to be close to the hotel, was taken away in a storm in 3 months ago. I ordered the hotel in 6 weeks before i went there. That was the major reason for choosing this hotel.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Really nice hotel.hotel have own nice beach.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 4인가족이라 커넥팅룸 이용했습니다. 룸컨디션 좋았고 한적하고 호젓해서 더 좋았네요. 다만 타운뷰는 주변 상가나 주택과 초인접인지라 소음이 많이 들려요. 그래도 9시 이후엔 조용합니다. 전용비치는 물놀이가 사실상 불가능해보였고, 비치카페에 앉아 여유를 즐기긴 좋았습니다. 끄어다이 메인비치로 가서 놀았는데 멀지않아 걸어가기 좋네요. 단점이라면 영업인듯 영업아닌 영업같은걸 하세요... 코코넛배나 쿠킹클래스 이용하라고... 저흰 이미 체크인할때 안한다 의사전달 했는데 다음날 조식때 돌면서 다시 물으시더라구요... 그다음날도 또 물어보셨구요. 리셉션 직원들이 친절한지는 전혀 모르겠어요.. 체크인이나 체크아웃할때 웃는모습 전혀 못봤네요. 심지에 많이 피곤해 보이셨어요... 그래도 재방문 의사는 70 정도 있네요

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The staff were excellent. They were very helpful and friendly. In particular, i would like to mention lynn and yuri at the front desk and daisy and lotus at the spa services. These 4 ladies were very kind and took the time to give us the extra special attention and hospitality. I was disappointed that the shuttles to the beach ended at 1 45, leaving guests to fend for themselves on the way back. Some mention of this on the hotel website would be very beneficial.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Kostenloses shuttle in die city von hoi an hotel bietet eine kostenlose fahrradtour an gepflegte hotelanlage frühstücksbüffet vielfältig und lecker

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Super godt hotel og sødt personale. De skal dog opdatere deres billeder, da der ingen strand er ved hotellet. De har dog en rigtig god transportservice til en anden god strand og til byen. Vi tog også med på deres cykeltur.god svimmingpool. Lækker morgenmad til både voksne og børn.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Hotel cerca de la zona de playa de hoi an. Se complementa muy bien con la posibilidad de alquiler gratis de bicis para huéspedes que permiten recorrer la zona (que es tranquila para lo que suele ser vietnam). Además ofrecen un servicio gratuito de traslado al centro de hoi an con muy buenas frecuencias. La habitación era grande y cuidada y la cama muy cómoda. El desayuno abundante y variado.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Really nice stay. The hotel looked very new. No issues with anything. The room was clean and tidy with lots of toiletries. Staff very friendly food good and a very quiet neighbourhood. The beach bar looked nice too but it was too cold and wet to sit outside. Would stay again

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Great hotel near beach at a reasonable price. Had free shuttle to old town, across the road to the beach and restaurants. Free bikes to cruise around town with and even had a free 3 hour bike ride tour through the countryside. Staff couldn t do enough for you and the pool was great. Room was large and bed very comfortable. Truely awesome place to stay.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Really friendly staff, rooms are comfortable and big. Location is a tad out and it s not right on the beach but easy enough to get around.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: A little ways from the center hoi an, the ally made experiencing everything the area has to offer as easy as possible! free, frequent shuttles to a central location, an amazing free guided bike tour, and accommodating staff helped us really enjoy our time. Would be an even better stay during the summer to enjoy the beach a short walk away! an easy to schedule shuttle to/from the airport in da nang was also very helpful.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Nice hotel, quite clean and newer, and most of the staff were excellent. Ruby at the front desk was a great help, spoke very good english, and an and wing in the restaurant were very friendly and helpful. There was some issues with food consistency though (often bland or too salty, overcooked bacon, then new batch came out awhile later undercooked). A little more attention to detail and consistency would go a long long way, and make a big difference. Water temp consistency in our shower kept going up and down, sometimes worse than others, and you would have to keep adjusting it back and forth. Hotel photos show and talk about a beautiful private beach, but unfortunately it was destroyed in a bad storm a year or more ago, but they never updated it online, and don t say anything when you check in. The beach restaurant we never tried, and is unfortunately nowhere near newer like the hotel, and not somewhere we wanted to try after viewing it. One good thing they do offer is a free shuttle to another beautiful beach 2.5 km away (an bang beach) which i would recommend checking out. Free shuttle also goes downtown nightly which was nice as we wanted to go check out the lantern festival. There is also tons and tons of shops to get custom clothing made in town, and different restaurants and little bars, and venders to check out. We spent three days here.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Booked hotel to relax by the beach, the beach had been washed away in the storm. Not in their control but should have told us. Staff booked a train ticket for us, failed to mention the train didnt actually go there and we ended up kicked off the train at 9pm at night in a random town between hoi an and nha trang

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Be far from the dirty, roomy view photographs are false

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The free shuttle into the old town about 4km away was a real bonus to our stay. The free breakfast included a good selection of food and the staff made us feel at home on christmas day.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 비트남 다낭에서 숙박하고, 호이안은 바닷가 근처 숙소를 알아보던 중 후기 넘 좋아서 선택했구요. 실제 방문하니, 정말 깨끗하고 가족과 지내는데 문제 없었네요. 호이안도 호텔 셔틀로 이동 가능하고요. 단지 프라이빗 비치 앞이 최근 우기에 모래가 유실 되었는지 해변이라 하기에는 좀... 안방비치에서 해변은 놀았습니다.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: We ended up not staying here after viewing the grounds and room. We had booked a room with balcony, but the view was really more of trash across the road and only glimpses of the sea. We were under the mistaken impression (our fault) that this place was on the beach. The bathroom and room were a bit old for us. The service was lovely, though! they were so kind even though we told them we would find elsewhere to stay (now in la siesta and in heaven!), so no fault there.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 숙박시설은 전반적으로 만족스러우나 프라이빗 비치와 거리가 좀 먼게 아쉬웠음.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 직원들이 엄청 친절했습니다 무료셔틀버스도 있어서 호이안 야시장까지 택시비 아낄 수 있었습니다 바로앞에 해변도 있지만 비가와서 못가본게 아쉬워요

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 위치가 좋았고 셔틀버스 이용이 편했슴. 상당히 조용하여 휴식에 장애가 없었슴.아울러 직원의 서비스가 상당히 좋았슴.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: We were very disappointed with the location of this hotel. When traveling to hoi an it would be best to stay near the ancient town as the beach that alley is/was on was hit by a storm years ago apparently leaving there not much to been seen in their beach area. There are huge sandbags laying out on the coast. The view is still decent however the alley restaurant/ club along the water is not set up for patrons. They have chairs and a few beds to lay on but the beds are all dirty, the condition of the furniture does not allow for you to relax. They serve food and drink there but we went twice and both times only one other couple was there and again, due to the messy conditions it was not relaxing to stay. They have a shuttle to a private beach which we did not do because of the few shuttle times offered daily and it was not convenient for us. Although they had a nice breakfast spread i wasn t confident that everything was very clean and sanitary so i wouldn t rate it well. The vegetables looked a little dirty and in general mugs slightly dirty. The fried rice was like mush. Omelet was made okay one day and raw in the middle another day. Lastly, my husband woke up with some bites around his ankle. Not sure what kind of bites but it left a bad feeling. We ended up checking out a day early and going to another hotel. If you don t care about the location it would be a decent place to stay for the price but we would choose a different place next time.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The hotel is very well appointed, but with the beach being destroyed last january by the storm. You have to take the shuttle bus to go to the private beach . Just three or four shuttles a day to go to the beach or you have to take a cab. (about 10 mn drive). I thought i could use the beach as much as i wanted but to drive there make this hotel location pointless. I don t like the fact to organize my stay around the shuttle to the beach or to the city. Also my sea view was over many trees, gabages and 20 see view...

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Great hotel, very well located, not far from the beach to enjoy a coconut in the shade, the neighbourhood offering small shops and small restaurants offering nice food (even gluten free) for a reasonable price, hotel service very professional, with the check-in you get a brief walk introduction about the things to know, special thanks to greenie and lisa!, spa on the 5th floor very nice and convenient, pool clean and very refreshing! with the bicycles from the hotel easy to access old town

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Nice but inexperienced staff, room was small but okay for two nights stay, not directly on beach but free shuttle available to beach and town, nice outdoor pool but full of loud kids. Breakfast food was disappointing, appears to have large selection but quality was very low, ie. Limp sauté napa cabbage, yellow fried rice with specs of vegetables, dark brown tasteless coffee. Would recommend hotel to consider upgrading food, maybe fewer but higher quality.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Så fint et sted med god betjening, venlige og imødekommende.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Hôtel et chambre propres rien à dire tout est parfait

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: スタッフのサービスが良く 気持ち良く過ごせました プライベートビーチやホイアン市街へのシャトルバスがあり タクシーを利用しなくても楽しめます

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Very happy with our stay . Only thing we didnt like is fact u havevto get shuttle bus to the beach. It was free but didnt notice till we got there. If had known probably would have booked a different hotel

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The staff were great and very helpful and spoke good english. Nice beachside restaurant across the road had cheap good food and drinks and run bu a local family. The scooter hire is definately worth while, with so much to explore

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 悪くはないが公式サイトの情報が古いのは問題

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The bus shuttle service to beach and town was a great help. We didn t use the free available bikes but that s also a great service. The hotel surrounding area is dirty and dusty. The private beach of the hotel is destroyed and closed. So had to shuttle to a nearby beach. I didn t see any mention of this anywhere about the hotel. The ally beach resturant is also closed, but when i asked about it from one of the receptionist, he was trying to hide the fact that it s closed, and he was insisting that it closed for the day, only 10 min earlier than when i asked. I found that very rude and humiliating! because it was obvious that no one was there for a long time! there were no lights and none of fridges were working.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: スタッフがとてもいい人ばかり プライベートビーチが移動しいているのは 本当に悔やまれる 元々の場所にあれば最高だけど ビーチが侵食されているから仕方ない

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: The staff was super friendly and accommodating. The shuttle time the beach and to town was very convenient. It was not, however, beachfront as the beach was destroyed and non-existent. My children wanted to play at the beach everyday and although the shuttle could take us to a nearby beach, it s not the same as beachfront.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 졍뫌 조은 쟝소우에 프라이븻 안방븨츼와 영결됀 셔어틀버어스가 있어서 좋았으며 올드타은 쪼그로 가는 셔어툴버쓰가 저녁 9시까지였나 있어서 다녀오기 조오았슴니다. 굳이 갈혀면 가지만 싼 맛에 가씀니딍

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Our stay was very enjoyable and the staff were very accomodating to our needs. The free shuttle bus to the main beach and hoi an town was a real bonus as was the free bike hire.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 차량 서비스(비치, 야시장) 지원이 마음에 들었습니다. 친절한 설명과 아침식사 만족합니다. 그러나 운동시설은 작동이 안되어서 아쉬웠습니다.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Staff were friendly, helpful and engaging. Great location

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Très bel hôtel avec piscine, un peu fraîche pour la saison. Le petit déjeuner est varié et copieux, de bonne qualité. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent 77 pour 2 nuits à un transport gratuit est organisé pour se rendre à la ville et à la plage. Mise a disposition de transat et parasols à la plage. Les chambres sont assez spacieuse

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: Rigtig hyggelig hotel. God service. God morgenmad. Sød og hjælpsom personale. Rart at der var gratis shuttlebus til byen og til stranden.

hotelName: Ally Beach Boutique Hotel Hoi An
userCmt: 13살 11살 두아이데리고 방문했어요 아침조식은 아이들이좋아하는 요플레 과일 빵 잘나와서 ㅋ너무 많이 먹었어요 조식먹고는 자전거타고 온동네 다리고 끄어다이 비치 안방비치 올드타운까지 자전거 다녔어요 체크인할때부터 친절하고 linda jimmy 가장 많이 도와주셔서 감사했어요 아이들이 있어서 하루종일 자전거만 3번4번씩 대여 했는데 인상한번 안쓰고 자전거빌려주셨어요 방청소도 깔끔했고 에어컨은 빵빵했는데 다만 문제는 조식먹는곳 식당이 유럽사람들에게 더 친절한거 같아서 6일동안 조금불편했어요 그미소는 유럽사람들에게 보인다고 할까요 저만 느낌는 감정일수 있지만 앨리호텔 두번째방문인인데 두번다 느끼는거라서요 조식식당만 조금불편할뿐 다른데 문제 없어요

God lokation i gåafstand fra den gamle by. Rigtig fin pool og god morgenmadsbuffet. Vores eneste klage var at der nogle af dagene lugtede af bål/cigaretter inde på værelserne. Udover dette var vi meget tilfredse og glade for opholdet. Receptionen var hjælpsom til at arrangere ture for os og talte fint engelsk.

The staff were quite lovely ans tried to fix issues. You can t do full scale hotel renovations and maintenance and ask customers to deal with this! 7.20am noise... 6pm noise.... No no no. Close the area and do your renos but dont ask customers to deal with it.
All good great place great staff
Nice property with excellent facilities, close to old town, but without the noise. Excellent value for the price.
Pool is nice
Fantastic stay. Staff very helpful and spa treatment was amazing. Loves the pool and accessibility to old town. Would definitely recommend
Je vous le conseille les yeux fermés une petite pépite

I stayed at the almanity for three nights as part of a two-week tour of vietnam and i would say it was my favourite hotel of the whole trip. The hotel layout is beautiful with the gorgeous swimming pool surrounded by loungers and palm trees - even though it was busy at times, it was a great place to relax and have a swim after a day exploring hoi an (only 5-10 minutes walk away) in the heat. The staff were all incredibly helpful and hospitable too - special mentions must go to the classy zippy at reception who checked me in (and was very helpful in helping me access some money when stranded without either a card or cash), and my in the bar / restaurant for being so friendly and fun. I will definitely return!
Incroyable !!!!

객실 시설과 크기. 청소 상태등 전반적으로 좋음. 수영장 크기와 조경 분위기, 관리 상태 만족 조식 가짓수와 맛 등 만족 문제점 - 세가족 여행으로 룸세개 예약했는데 각방마다 작은 문제들이 계속 발생 객실 잠금키 고장, 전 투숙객 변기 막힘으로 입실하자마자 화장실 사용 못함, 전기포트 고장, 에어컨 고장(모두 바로 수리해주긴 했으나 반복되는 불편함이 아쉬움 ) 하우스키퍼와 수리 직원들 외 로비와 조식당 직원들이 전체적으로 웃음이 없고 친절한 모습이 부족 총평 리조트 분위기나 시설면에서 좋은 숙소이고 주변 식당 마사지샵이 많아 위치도 좋아 추천할 만함. 다만 사소한 부분에서 미소와 친절 등 서비스 부분이 아쉬움.

The staff were generally friendly and welcoming at this hotel. There was a weird moment where we felt like we betrayed one of the receptionists for not going to the suit tailor the hotel recommends but apart from that they were nice. We stayed in one of the the loft rooms which was fine for us. Not recommended if you can t do stairs though. The loft design was cool but the room decor is a little outdated. The couch down stairs is possibly the most uncomfortable one i ve ever sat on and is not suitable for 2 people. The bathroom small but good enough. I like that they didn t give us plastic bottles. Instead there were 2 refillable bottles which were replaced at room service each day. The fridge and safe both worked well and the aircon was great. Pool was beautiful, with lots of seating and pool side service. We were told off for sipping drinks (kombucha) by the pool which was not purchased at the hotel. I thought that was annoying and poor form. Restaurant is luxury prices for not really luxurious food. Lastly, the walls are paper thin and we could hear neighbours from all angles, at all times of the day. I even woke up to the sounds of our next door neighbours getting down and dirty at 7am one morning. Don t stay here if you value your sleep, privacy or dignity. Overall it was a decent hotel but would probably try somewhere else next time.
Very nice place. Large room , good bedding friendly staff ,.good breakfast
Nice ambience, super friendly and helpful staff. Spa is excellent and a good selection at breakfast.
Bel hôtel avec belle grande piscine.

Staff was very nice and the breakfast buffet was outstanding. The pool was also very nice. We didn t want housekeeping daily but the one time we did ask for it they simply gave us new towels but didn t clean nor clear away dishes.
Was good pick...walking distances from night market (20 min). Good for family...breakfast buffet was great!!
スタッフ皆さんの対応が とてもフレンドリーですが ホスピタリティの高いサポートをしてくれました また 来年ホイアンを訪れた際には このホテルにします
リラックス出来るホテルです 旧市街の喧騒に疲れたらホテルに戻りプールでゆっくり出来る 宿泊費もこのレベルであればコスパは良い方です 朝食もまあ満足の行くレベルです

外で買った食料品を部屋に持ち込めません エアコンの効いてない店が多くバインミーを持ち帰って食べようとしたらホテル入り口でとめられました ホテルの部屋を出る時に差し込み式のカードキーを取り忘れその間に清掃が入ったのでカードを回収されてしまいフロントで作って貰うはめになりました ホテルにあるスパもサウナも有料です 部屋のアメニティーはフロント横から貰って使い部屋には置いてありません フロントの方並びに従業員はフレンドリーで良かったですが少し不自由さを感じました 朝食は色々揃っていてとても良かったです
Wonderful hotel with amazing customer service. Pool was beautiful. Room was comfortable. Breakfast buffet delicious.
Loved the location as easily accessible to the old town of hoi ann. Lovely pool environment with excellent breakfast options.
リゾート感があってよかったです
Loved the helpfulness of all the staff. The pool area is great for relaxing and the rooms are nice and comfortable. Really nice place to go and unwind and would definitely come back.
Exceptional experience. I highly recommend this hotel.
大変快適に宿泊できました 朝食の種類の豊富さとクオリティは素晴らしかったです 宿泊施設自体には不満はありませんが 観光の中心になる旧市街までは歩くと15分以上かかり 慣れないと交通量の多い道を歩かなくてはならなかったり 道がわかりにくかったりで 少し大変でした

Beautiful hotel with a nice location in the centre of hoi an. The hotel as a whole is very pleasing, with almost everything you could wish to have. Beautiful and clean pools in the centre, a lot of greenery, their own herb garden and a nice outside area makes it very scenic. No complaints about the staff as the service was splendid. The breakfast was delicious, with an impressive selection of food and drinks. Eggs and phò was made to order, which is always appreciated. Good selection of fresh fruits and baked goods as well. Did not try the restaurant, but the pool-side serving was good. The room was spaceous, with good amenities. We appreciated the daily bottles of water, fruits and nuts. The interior had some wear and tear, with some malfunctioning lights, but nothing critical. Nice bathroom, but the shower and hot water was difficult to control and the water pressure was poor. Very good air conditioning, with almost no noise. The bed was firm, but nice. We had the rooftop balcony with jaquzzi, but did not use the latter (although it looked nice). The room is properly sound insulated to the city, but there is some noise from the inside hallway.
The facilities are 5 stars but not the rooms in my view. I would put maximum 4 stars for the rooms.
너무 친절하고 조식도 맛있었어요 해피아워 시간이 짧아서 좀 아쉬웠어요 수영장도 놀기 좋고 이동하기에도 편해요 호텔 내 마사지도 추천합니다

I stayed at the almanity hoi an resort and spa for 6 days. I love this hotel. The loft room i had was something i ve never see before and it was perfect. Everything is of a good standard, they obviously keep on top of the maintenance of the hotel. The pool is beautiful and relaxing. The breakfast is superb, with so much choice. The best thing about the hotel are the staff. They re all so professional and go out of their way to meet your needs. I wanted to make special mention of dinh and mymy. Dinh was always making sure i had everything i needed and i was happy. Mymy was amazing, she arranged a lot of things for me and was super helpful.
Great staff excellent breakfast free bikes
We stayed for a couple of nights at the almanity. It was incredibly clean and the hosts were lovely. Our room was spacious and comfortable, and the facilities were good including a lovely breakfast
Quality of the hotel was fantastic. Pool, gym, breakfast was all first class, and was only surpassed by the restaurant and overall staff and service.

Really friendly staff and customer service was 5 , always willing to help with organising activies and navigating the arwa. In particular we enjoyed the spa where we had a foot massage. Besides the stunning pool, the hotel itself felt quite dated and grubby. The shower was a little temperamental running scolding hot and cold and the tv didn t work properly. Overall it was decent but i would rate it as more of a 3 standard hotel not 5 as advertised.

とにかく施設が綺麗で落ち着きがありました 前日に同値段クラスのホテルにハノイで宿泊しましたが 写真と異なるがっかりホテルだったので期待はしてませんでした しかしこちらは本当にリゾートのような豪華なホテルで とてもリフレッシュできました 日本語は通じませんが スタッフの方が親切に英語で対応してくださります ホイアンの旧市街までは少し離れておりますが 自転車を貸していただければ気軽に観光することができました 朝食も種類豊富で美味しかったです またホイアンに行ったら泊まりたいです

Disappointing, honesty. Especially if you see the hyped pool pictures of this place and think the rest of the resort is as good. The room we stayed in (standard, one level) was poorly designed door to hallway lets in noise, a/c is constantly on and blows directly onto bed, weird creaky bed platform, and a glass enclosed toilet area with a door that does not provide privacy. Also, in addition to the instagram snap-happy people in the pool, you ll get some noisy tour group hordes. We stayed here 4 nights and expected better. That said, as we walked around town, i didn t see any obvious better choices.
Lovely hotel. Staff were excellent. Location ideal to walk into hoi an old town.
Very good location, excellent staff but unfortunately the isolation of the room is bad.
Such a wonderful property with excellent staff

The facility was good, but house keeping claimed i ruined the sheets and requested payment for new sheets. I asked them to show me the sheets all they would produce of pictures claiming that they were my sheets. At checkout i asked again about producing the sheets they claim i damage for which they again did not produce. Another customer was at the front desk claimed they did the same to them. It leads me to believe that this ruined sheet thing is a scam by the house keeping manager. I have nothing but good to say about the remaining staff. If you stay there take a picture of your sheets every morning before you leave the room so you get taken by the same scam. One word for everyone beware and document via photos every morning.
The staff and services are definitely amazing, it s tailor-made service to fit for every unique customer. Feel like to back home, they are so friendly.
Great option to stay in hoi an. Location is perfect to walk to the old quarter.

Overall great hotel. Breakfast is good. Amenities are good. Only complaint i have is lack of elevator. If you have bad knees this is a minus. I booked a loft without knowing the meaning of a loft, apparently it means the bedroom is on another level. You have to climb stairs to get to the bed. Another minus, is the noise from the hallway as people walk back to their rooms. The insulation for sound could be better. Other than that the staffs are very helpful and friendly. We borrowed the bike and biked around which is nice
We loved staying at the almanity hotel. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. The pool area was beautiful, breakfast was fabulous and the bed was so comfortable. We ll definitely be back.
Loved our time at almanity, the staff were exceptional in every way. Would absolutely recommend it and stay again given the opportunity.
くつろげました ありがとうございました
Everything was great
Nice no complain.
Very close to the old city. We were very pleased with our accommodation and the food was very nice.
Great friendly staff. Awesome service poolside. Very close to all kinds of restaurants. Great breakfast buffet.
Lækkert hotel med en oase af et pool område med en lille pool bar. Meget venlige og service minded. Vejleder om spise steder og ting man kan lave
フロントにエアコンがあると最高でした 立地やホテルの設備 食事含めてとてもよかったです エレベーターがない階もありますが 荷物も運んでいただけます
プールがとても良い 朝ご飯もなかなか 部屋はやはり古いので都市型のタワーホテルとは比較できない 風情を楽しむもの
Excellent rapport qualité prix pour cet hôtel à cinq minutes à pied du centre ville. Avec les standards européens au prix vietnamien. Nickel !
Lovely hotel with overall great service and i would give 5 in all categories! the nachos served by the pool need looking at as nothing more than a pack of doritos
Friendly

Fantastisk ophold. Personalet var utrolig hjælpsomt og imødekommende. Værelset var rent og hotellet havde lækre faciliteter. Ligger 5 min. I gåafstand fra den gamle by, så man også undgår den værste gadestøj. Kæmpe morgenmadsbuffet med både vestlige og vietnamesiske retter. Det eneste minus er, at væggene er en smule tynde, så hvis der er nogen, der larmer på gangen, kan man høre det ret tydeligt på værelserne. Vi oplevede det kun en enkelt aften.
I would not recommend, no concern for guests
Attentive and friendly staff. We were treated very well from the time we arrived. They were responsive, helpful and very hospitable.
Excellent and efficient check in. Great suggestions on places to eat and see. Welcoming and friendly staff.
The staff were so amazing and helpful. The property is beautiful and the breakfast had many options for any dietary need.
The staff welcomed us very well and took care of us by surprising us with delicate attentions. Very well located
Well maintained and convenient to old town

We ve been in vietnam for 2 weeks and still agree that the breakfast included at this property was the best yet! they had so many options and everything was delicious. The staff was delightful, the room was very warm and cozy (we visited in winter) and our only upset was that none of the pools were heated so we couldn t enjoy them. I can t recommend this property enough for hoi an.
Fijn verblijf, zeer vriendelijke staff. Altijd vrolijk en aan het kijken hoe het met ons ging.
全て良い
Great property, amazing breakfast and friendly staff. Just need the mgmt to change the towels to better quality and a bit bigger.
Hotel is lovely. Location is great and staff are very helpful. They also offer some activities such as the local cooking class which was great.
This property is nothing short of wonderful! from the restaurants to the spa services to luxury bedding, i enjoyed every moment of my stay. I highly recommend spending at least a week here.

Perfect choice in hoi an. A resort style hotel a 10 min walk to the centre of hoi an. Not too big with a lovely pool area and a great spa. Friendly staff, clean and a great atmosphere lace to stay. Wish we stayed longer.

Room facing pool was very nice. Roomy and quiet. A nice space to return to after a day out. Excellent breakfast and restaurant. Good prices! nice grounds and landscaping to walk. Spa and fitness center were top notch. We enjoyed the big pool too. All staff were great! not far walking to oldtown.

The staff was amazing! property is a bit dated, though it almost added charm and went with the ancient town feel. The wooden lattice decor in the room is nice but very dusty. I understand it s not easy to clean inside lattice cells, but one can not install decor unless there is a method to clean it. We had a loft room, which was cool. Breakfast was great. Once again, kindness of everyone who worked there was the greatest highlight! thank you.
Great hospitality and great reception staff. They were very helpful and went out of their way. Great location and nothing is too hard for them to cater for your needs.
Excellent all around
The bar was not up to standards, the water was hard to regulate in the shower and the property was old and dated.
Staff were lovely, room was spacious and quiet and the pool and amenities were excellent. We enjoyed our stay!
They allow early check in. The buffet breakfast selection is excellent

Superb hotel, beautiful and super friendly staff. Chau, hien and mymy in four plates and lien and binh at the front of the house were all so friendly and accompdating. They even arranged for a birthday cake for my husband. We would go back to almanity in a heartbeat.

From the moment we got here, we were promptly welcomed with tea and friendly smiles. Binh greeted warmly and was extremely accommodating and informative. We enjoyed all the amenities this place had to offer, from the large, luxurious pool, to the bikes, and the complimentary shuttle to the beach. The bed was comfortable and the room was very clean. We enjoyed the variation the breakfast buffet had to offer every day and everything was impressively delicious. This is quite possibly the nicest, most accommodating place i have ever been stayed at. Not to mention, it is very centrally located, close to the beach, rice paddies, and the famous river walk area. The beach was very nice, we got a spot right by the water and it was clean and a great way to escape the heat. Binh also did a great job checking in on us every day and making sure we felt cared for during our stay. And the entire staff was so incredibly kind. We look forward to coming back again soon!
3번째 방문이에요 항상 친절하시고 조식훌륭하구요. 작지만 알차고 한국인 많이없구 강추

Hyggelig opplevelse på hotel almanity! vennlig personale og flotte fasiliteter. Rommet var relativt lytt til gangen. Noe vanskeligheter med varmtvannsdusjing, oppleves ikke som et stort problem. Stort utvalg på frokostbuffet, men siden vi ble matforgiftet i vietnam, fikk vi ikke smakt på alt.
Breakfast should be longer staff was great and helpful , even used the pick up service which worked very well
Absolutely wonderful facilities and excellent service. The staff were amazing as was the food and spa services,
Kjempe fint anlegg. Anbefaler å ta med ørepropper, da rommene er ekstremt lytt. Ellers ingenting å klage på!
People very helpfull and freindly
Outdated building, terrible internet, some chairs at the pool were reserved and unavaliable despite were empty for several hours

I had a wonderful time at this resort. The location is excellent, especially for visiting hoi an s ancient town. What i particularly loved was the convenience of the free bicycles they provided, making it easy to explore the charming old town at my own pace. The resort s peaceful swimming pool, nestled amidst lush green trees, created a tranquil and serene atmosphere. It was the perfect spot to unwind after a day of exploration. While the resort might be older, it impressed me with its cleanliness and convenience. The staff was attentive, and the rooms were well-maintained. Despite its age, the resort offered all the amenities i needed for a comfortable stay. Overall, i found the resort s combination of location, facilities, and service to be a winning formula for a relaxing and enjoyable vacation.
일단 직원이 불친절해서 기분이 안좋고 날도 더워서 호이안 올드타운까지 걸어서 관광하기에 머네요. 직원이 불친절하니 다른 모든게 맘에 안드네요.
対応が良かった

The staff were very friendly and helpful, especially binh at reception and danh at the pool. Also the ladies at breakfast were welcoming and remembered our room number, and the staff in the spa were excellent at communicating and we really enjoyed our two massages. All the room staff were also friendly and the rooms were kept spotlessly clean. It s a great area if you want to explore hoi an ancient town on foot, lots of great coffee shops and restaurants nearby. The pool area is very relaxing, the food at the resort was also delicious. The tai chi twice daily was unique and relaxing. The view from the rooftop suite was nice too. Very comfortable beds too.

旧市街も徒歩圏内でホテルに一歩入るとリゾート感たっぷりというどちらも楽しめるホテルでした ホテルの方もみなさん親切で安心して滞在することができました the hotel exceeded my expectations. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. It was so much fun that i want to go again.

一人旅で利用しました 一泊1万3千円位の値段で こんな素敵なホテルに泊まれるなんて夢のようです フロントを抜けると ホテル中心部にお洒落なプールがあります ロフト形式の部屋に泊まりましたが とても清潔で素敵な作りでした 立地も良く ホイアンの旧市街まで 徒歩15分程度で行く事ができます ホテルの近くに小さなコンビニ風のお店があり そこで水やビールなどを買うことができます 朝食の種類もかなり豊富で 何を食べても美味しかったです またホイアンに行く機会があれば 必ずここに泊まりたいです

I stayed at the almanity for four days. I can t think of any negatives with the hotel, except that the spa services are relatively expensive, which i m sure is the case with most resorts vs independent spas. The location was very good, about a 12 minute walk to old town. The room was very spacious, with a comfortable bed and very good ac. Breakfast was great, with a lot of variety of asian and western options, as well as variety from day to day in the asian options. The pool area is fantastic, with lots of lounge chairs. I will definitely stay at the almanity again when i return to hoi an.

I recently stayed at wonderful almanity hotel that exceeded my expectations in every aspect. The staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring a comfortable and pleasant stay. The room was beautifully furnished offering comfort, with a nice view that added to the overall experience. The hotel s amenities, including gym and spa, were top-notch. Dining at the hotel was a delightful experience, with a wide variety of exquisite dishes prepared to perfection. The location was ideal, conveniently situated near major attractions and easily accessible. Overall, this hotel provided an unforgettable experience, combining exceptional service, luxurious accommodations, and a warm, inviting atmosphere. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a top-tier hotel experience
Lovely hotel and staff were great but corridors noisy, you can hear people moving furniture. Also quite a bit of construction work going on right at the side of the hotel.
