Binh was very helpful giving us plenty of great recommendations and ensuring our stay was great! he did a fantastic job ensuring we got to immerse in the culture and remain safe while having a blast!
Wonderful place, amazing unique staff really make you feel like home.

A brilliant 3-night stay. Don t be put off by the fact it s on a main road, as it s set back enough to not hear any traffic, remaining peaceful and resort-like. It s just a 10-minute stroll into the old town which has so much to offer. Service was great throughout. We ate out every night as there are so many great restaurants in hoi an, so can t comment on the evening meals at the hotel, but the breakfasts were really good. We took advantage of some novel activities, like the short daily tai chi classes around the pool and a one-on-one vietnamese language session from the lovely no . The very helpful binh provided lots of local knowledge and secured us a 10 discount at the best local tailors tuong tailor . And we d really recommend the massages at the spa, they were very professional and left us feeling great. Highly recommend.

My stay at almanity hoi an resort spa was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment my husband and i arrived, we were greeted with warmth and hospitality that truly exceeded our expectations. Unfortunately, during our stay, we faced an unexpected challenge as both of us fell ill and were hospitalized for two days. However, it was during this time of need that the true character of the hotel staff shone brightly. They not only provided us with excellent medical support but also went above and beyond by personally delivering food and checking in on us multiple times throughout our hospitalization. Their genuine care and concern made a difficult situation much more manageable, and we are forever grateful for their kindness. Beyond the outstanding service, the hotel itself was a haven of comfort and tranquility. The facilities were immaculate, the location central and convenient, and every aspect of our stay was flawlessly executed. In summary, our experience at almanity hoi an resort spa was nothing short of extraordinary. The combination of exceptional staff, impeccable service, and a beautiful property made for a truly unforgettable stay. We cannot recommend this hotel highly enough and look forward to returning in the future.
깨끗하고 음식도 맛있음 수영장 최고

This isn t a five star hotel. We had the room with the loft and the beds were comfortable and the bathroom clean. However the rest of the room wasn t thoroughly cleaned neither when we arrived nor during our stay. There were dust on the floor and they hadn t cleaned the surfaces. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was okay but very crowded. Don t eat at the restaurant. It s both expensive compared to the wonderful food you eat in the city and not as tasty.
Tôi yêu tất cả mọi thứ về biệt thự này. Rất khuyến khích.
Bàn chải đánh răng để trong phòng cho khách mà vẩn bị tính tiền khi sử dụng, quá lạ! không có đẹp như hình!
The room spacious, smarttv provided. The only problem is just the water heater. I think its ran out with other guest when i m taking bath.
Mọi thứ phải gọi là perfect, ngoài cái view xịn xò độc lạ ra thì nhân viên còn rất chi dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Recommend mọi người nếu đến hội an, hãy thử trải nghiệm nơi này nhé!
Nội thất còn mới, decor đẹp, các bạn quản gia cũng nhiệt tình. Home còn có xe đạp cho mượn để đi loanh quanh khu phố cổ, đồ ăn sáng cũng ngon và đầy đủ. Tuy nhiên hồ bơi hơi nhỏ
Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời vô cùng, homestay ấm cúng, tuyệt vời để sống ảo và nhân viên rất nhiệt tình thân thiện
ท พ กสวย ตกแต งสวยงาม ม มถ ายร ปเยอะ เหมาะก บกล มเพ อนหร อครอบคร ว แชมพ คร มอาบน ำหอม เจ าของและพน กงานน าร กให ความช วยเหล อด มากๆ

Phòng ở to, đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Phòng siêu thoáng do nhiều cửa sổ. Buổi chiều gió thổi mát không cần bật điều hoà. Chị chủ (hoặc nhân viên) cực kì nhiệt tình. Xét về giá thành thì đây là 1 trải nghiệm cực kì tuyệt vời với mức giá chỉ hơn 300k cho 1 người. Highly recommend
Se quay lai lan nua. Tuyet voi

Được check in phòng sớm hơn giờ, hội an hơi mưa nên chắc chị chủ cũng hiểu và cho check in sớm. Không gian ấm cúng, tự do dùng chén bát nếu cần, đồ ăn vặt ở alsahar cũng rẻ hợp giá, nên thử tắm bồn bằng bomb tắm thú vị thơm nhiều bọt... Phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi, có bàn là, máy sấy và smart tv có sẵn netflix, tha hồ thư giãn. Chị chủ tận tâm chào đón vui vẻ nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại nhiều lần hơn...
Gần phố cổ, sạch sẽ, tự phục vụ

Khách sạn sạch sẽ xinh đẹp, nhân viên lịch sự dễ mến, đồ ăn sáng giới hạn nhưng khá ok và các bạn còn đem lên tận phòng, dầu gội rất thơm luôn khách sạn đọc được cho t xin info à . Tuy nhiên điểm trừ là nằm ở trong hẻm nên taxi khó vào, nhân viên lễ tân không trực quầy thường xuyên lắm thì phải
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, phòng ốc ngăn nắp, đầy đủ tiện nghi, anh chị chủ rất nhiệt tình. Mình đã có chuyến đi tuyệt vời khi lưu trú tại đây, có dịp sẽ quay trở lại.
Quá bình thường, và cái gì cũng quy ra tiền, đắt hơn đặt dịch vụ ngoài
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, phòng thoáng. Chị chủ rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại lần sau.
Đầy đủ tiện nghi, giá cả hợp lí, nhân viên nhiệt tình!
Khach san đẹp như hình nha mn, rất đáng để ở, nhân viên dễ thương, cũng không xa phố cổ lắm, di taxi tầm 30k-40k thôi ... 10 điểm
Trời đấc ơi siêuuuuu mê, tuyệt zời, 1000 điểm ko có nhưng. Chị nhân viên lễ tân dễ thương, nhiệt tìnhhhh

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The breakfast buffet was ok a bit limited in terms of options (eg only white bread) but fine if you just want something to get the day started. We ordered food at the pool and in room dining which was all super delicious. My kids loved the pool. The rooms were big, beds were comfortable my only issue was there are no doors to the general bathroom area so my sister was staying with my husband and i and it made getting dressed and showered very awkward for her as there was no door. This hotel also states it has a private beach which is why we booked it but it does not - it is like 3kms away from the beach.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Such a nice hotel with great staff, cool and beautiful rooms, nice and silent area.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 二日間の滞在でしたがホテルの全ての対応がパーフェクトでした とても素晴らしい時間をありがとうございました

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: So glad i chose this place! the room was very clean, cozy and neat with a good pool view. The bathroom was nicely done with a big bathtub to relax. The hotel staffs were extremely helpful, friendly and gave us suggestions on tours which were great too! sharon was very helpful, even upon checkout, she was of big help! will 10/10 recommend this place as a great place to stay, breakfast was good too!

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 친구들과 묶었는데, 다들 좋아해서 다행이었습니다

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: My two sisters and i like our spacious suite with one queen bed and one single bed. Hotel espendor staff are very helpful in assisting us with the tours and places to eat. We would like to especially thank lena for her unwavering dedication and attentiveness to our needs.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 接待人員很熱情 很努力的用中文跟我介紹 寄放行李的人員會關心我下午的行程 司機幾點來接 幾點回來領取 早餐簡單但該有的都有

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: スタッフのホスピタリティがとても良かったです 常に先を読んでアドバイスをしてくれました 朝ごはんも良かったしタクシーの手配やバイクの手配等スムーズに行ってくれました また泊まりたいと感じたホテルです

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Enjoyed our stay , friendly staff and beautiful location and facilities.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great stay. Good facilities for spa. Very quiet but in walking distance from town. Staff very helpfull

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 5 star hotel. Luxurious and elegant. The absolute most beautiful hotel i have ever stayed in. Staff were very welcoming and friendly and courteous. Mrs mile was especially kind and helpful. Very comfortable and very clean and new. Excellent 5 star luxury hotel.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff are very friendly (especially sharon at reception), the food was tasty and the facilities were great! definitely recommend

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent reception staff, joy.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Would defs stay here again, staff were super friendly and helpful. Always someone to assist, very close to local markets and a short shuttle to the main centre

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice and neat room. Great staff very hospitable. Location is not the best and the hotel is clean and neat.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent value for money. Staff provided fantastic service.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The amina lantana hoi an hotel and spa is a fantastic place to say. Very convenient located to local attractions. The staff are very friendly and offer exceptional service.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Clean safe and friendly staff

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staffs are very kind, and friendly. Breakfast was great, specially pho. You can get your own omelet by chef, and eggs by your own way. Overall satisfied.

hotelName: Amina Lantana Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nos gustó mucho este hotel, a mi familia y a mi. Cuartos cómodos con todo lo necesario, el desayuno muy rico y variado, te preparan el huevo al gusto y varias opciones occidentales. Muy bien ubicado, tiene bicis que te prestan y puedes ir a ver los campos de arroz a unos cuantos minutos, lo difícil es cruzar un pedacito de pueblo lleno de motos y gente pero con precaución llegas bien. La atención excelente. Muy recomendado!
Staying here is like staying with family. Zui and her team have a fantastic homestay. Large comfortable room, great breakfast, lovely pool and close to the beach and many restaurants.
Clean, central, balcony and 10 minutes from the beach. Friendly staff. Really good value homestay and recommended.
Location and staff good and friendly. Disappointed with shower as mostly cold. Breakfast only average.
This property was nothing short of fantastic, free bikes, lovely service, amazing breakfast the list goes on!

Wir waren im mai zu besuch. Das hotel entspricht im großen und ganzen der beschreibung. Allerdings lässt die sauberkeit zu wünschen übrig. Die bettwäsche wurde einmal gewechselt. Auch habe ich einige annehmlichkeiten, welche man sonst aus dem asiatischen raum kennt, vermisst. Wasser auf dem zimmer, kaffee oder tee, pflegeprodukte. Das frühstück sehr ordentlich, große auswahl, vietnamesische spezialitäten werden frisch vom gegenüberliegenden frühmarkt besorgt. Die inhaberrinnen sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Erwähnenswert, der schwimmingpool ist sehr klein. Eine optische täuschung auf dem foto.

hotelName: An Bang Beach Hai An Villa
userCmt: Cheep and cheerful, definitely need a balcony room!

hotelName: An Bang Beach Hai An Villa
userCmt: Bra rum och bra läge för bad

hotelName: An Bang Beach Hai An Villa
userCmt: スタッフが親切ですばらしい 施設が新しくてきれい 朝食が美味しい

hotelName: An Bang Beach Hai An Villa
userCmt: Fantastiskt litet hotell som gjorde det lilla extra varje gång vi hade ett önskemål. Mysigt läge i den lilla byn 5 min från stranden. Varje morgon är den lokala marknaden igång från kl 0600 bara 100 meter från hotellet. När vi kommer tillbaka kommer vi bo på samma hotell

hotelName: An Bang Beach Hai An Villa
userCmt: The property ras exactly as described and very clean the staff were extremely friendly. Sadly we left early it was our mistake. It was not what we were expecting we had planned to stay at resorts. Now knowing what the place is like we would definitely consider staying on out next trip
Sehr nette bungalows am strand. Super service. Ruhig, da außerhalb von hoi an, aber mit dem fahrrad in 20 min. Nach hoi an.
De ontvangst door het personeel was hartverwarmend en de dienstverlening tijdens het verblijf was zeer goed. Fantastisch ontbijt. Goede tips voor activiteiten en winkels.

Great location away from the main town but easy to get around if you want a bit more noise and people trying to sell you stuff. Staff are wonderful and could not have done any more to make our stay so good. Duong was especially helpful and tried so hard to make stay that extra bit special. Please don t go and stay here, we want this all for ourselves )

2 mois auparavant je réserve et paye dans cet hôtel, le jour de mon arrivé sur an bang beach par liaison téléphonique, je préviens de mon arrivée, on me signale que l hôtel est complet, après quelques discussions, on me propose un autre hôtel à standing équivalent, certes il été très correct mais c est pas celui que j ai réservé. Donc il prenne la réservation et l argent même complet et après dispatche les clients en prenant une commission bien entendu. Je suis pas satisfait et surtout c est vraiment pas sérieux

First of all, i can highly recommend this place for kind, helpful and very sweet staff. People were so willing to give a hand, offer advice...and from a very genuine place. Questions and issues were swiftly addressed both by email and in person. The house itself was fantastic- very cozy with a kitchen where we could easily cook (or have cooking done for us). It was so nice for a family and very reasonably priced. The heart-breaker was the construction going on everywhere in an bang, including right next door. The whole village is being bought up by wealthier outsiders and being built up (although supposedly no mega hotels). The beach may have been a stunner at one time and still does have its charms, but the garbage was horrendous. However, we did take this opportunity to teach our child to pick up trash. We would certainly go again because the village people are sweet, the food is excellent, and it is not as bad as near-by areas, like hoi an and danang. Overall, the rapid development of this area and lack of environmental protection is ruining it.

It s really hard to find this homestay,and the host didn t give any helpful support. They don t even give you a bottle of water,everything will be charge. No service at all,and they don t speak in english
Utroligt lækkert lokalt område alle meget venlige smilende ,samt meget hjælpsomme

The location was perfect, just a minute walk to the beach and close to lots of nice restaurants. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The staff were very nice and helpful. I definitely recommend this place but it can be a little difficult to get a taxi from this location so make sure you have a taxi number or use a taxi app for convenience.

This home stay is very difficult to find. There is a black sign with white writing pointing to it on the main road, but on the sign it is called an bang retreat. That is your only clue. There are two rooms on the second floor that have wonderful balconies overlooking green papaya trees and palms, etc. The ground floor rooms are not very private to my standards. But everyone staying there is friendly so it may not matter. The staff, especially hang the manager, are quite wonderful. The bed was great. There are sections of anbang beach that are dirty and eroded, but here the beach is lovely. We enjoyed our stay here quite a lot.
Super friendly and helpful staff. Place is on a fairly quiet street with small restaurants, markets, etc. Room was spacious and clean and breakfast was good. Hoi an is amazing!

Very close to beach, rooms are spacious, elegant if fairly simple in terms of facilities. It s a 15 minute bike ride into town (hoi an), which is good for clothes shopping and a variety of good restaurants. Centre of hoi an is interesting but a bit overfull of tourists. Beach at an bang is nice, fairly quiet, but this was winter season so not really swimming weather. It rains a fair amount this time of year. Staff (in particular my who speaks good english) are keen to help you out with whatever you need. A good spot if you re looking for quiet and relaxation by the sea.
Lovely house, self contained accommodation just off the main street of an bang. About a five minute walk to the beach. Hard to find if you don t get an airport pick-up, get directions before you go!

We stayed at an bang hideaway in mid dec-knowing it was rainy season-so i want to make sure this review is read with that in mind.the place it self is very cute and has a lot of potential,nice facility and a good short walk to the beach,big room ok bed.if the weather was better i think this would be a great beach destination.with that said,i also want to say that i hope the staff and service was also on off season.in our 4 days there,we arrived to a pitch black property (we got there at 5 30 pm)with only a note,and the security guard to help us- who spoke no english.that was all fine, as we read the note the staff is off duty at 5pm,but after only an hour there the whole place lost power.we would have believed it was due to the weather,but it was a clear day and every other place on the street still had lights.the power was off and on all 4 days, never really consistent,and the only excuse being rain(even though it didn t actually rain a lot of the time).whatever, we made due but it was disappointing.i ll go further to say that although the girl working there was very sweet,i hope they have more help during the high season as we felt pretty abandoned there after 5 pm when she left.my biggest issue was that even though short staffed, they could have at least cleaned the room daily-which they did not.not even giving new towels or toilet paper or emptying the trash.this place had great potential- just come in high season, they should just shut it down in winter.

We enjoyed the stay a lot. Although there was a misunderstanding of plans initially, the lady in charge was very prompt to compensate the situation, and got us upgraded to a better villa (coco villa), right next door. It happened that our daughter had her birthday that day, and they were kind enough to surprise us with a birthday cake. They need to add signs from the main road though, since it is difficult to orient yourself in the small village without public lighting.

Despite some hiccups regarding power cuts and thus the lack of air conditioning the construction work going on around the homestay we enjoyed our stay and greatly appreciated the service - lovely accommodating people!
Just remember bring enough mosquito repellents ) and, the pillows are a bit too high for me... My neck suffered a bit p but still, the bed is very comfy.

Hidden away in the middle of village and only 50meters to safe swimming beach. This is as good as it gets if you want to meet travellers and locals alike . Very intimate setting with nothing to want for. A place you can really help the village economy and in return get treated with genuine warmth,nothings a problem, and amazing food where even the girls looking after you on the beach deliver outstanding dishes to your deckchair.

Book now! seriously, diem and her family were absolutely spectacular. The way we travel, we normally grab ideas through online research and see where the day takes us and the amount of recommendations that diem clearly curated over long months of research truly showed we were not disappointed in any of the spots she led us to. Everyone within the family was responsive to our needs and requests via whataspp. Somehow we found ourselves feeling both like royalty and family during our stay and i couldn t recommend this homestay more. Also note that it is clear the an bang area has seen an increase in tourism as many of the streets have in-progress infrastructure upgrades. I d be very excited and curious to know how the town looks in just a few years. We hope to come back very soon!

It is like a paradise! i had the most amazing time. Love the rustic nomadic style of the room. This space is large and you have a lot of patio place. Gorgeous environment with many plants, you feel like in the jungle. They make your breakfast by order and serving at your patio. Such a relaxing place and only 40 steps away from the beach. Diễm is absolutely wonderful and professional. She reached out before checking and gave me all the information and direction. I highly recommend to spend time here. Hoi an is 10 minutes away.

We had a lovely time at this homestay. Our host kiem made everything easy, called taxis for us and scheduled massages. The room and time patio are very comfortable, wish we had scheduled more time here. Place is very charming.

Fantastisk sted, roligt, tæt på stranden, hjertevarmt hjælpsomt personale, stilfuldt og hyggeligt, rent, overdådig morgenmad. De kan engelsk på forskelligt niveau og det er charmerende! håber ikke de laver noget om
Staff and infrastructure very good.

Loved the staff! sophie was a superb host! very quiet location near the beach and several restaurants. Room was big and very clean. Bathroom is good size with very nice shower. Would highly recommend if you re wanting a relaxing, quiet stay. We also explored the ancient city which is a short cab ride from the villa. We stayed 3 nights and sophie arranged transport to and from airport. She was awesome!

The villa location is almost next by the beach which takes you 2 mins to walk to the beach. The room we had on 2nd floor has a big bathroom which has 1 indoor shower and 1 outdoor shower. I like that the place has pretty comfy bed and almost every room got it own balcony. Just a highlight that the villa is almost in the end of crowded an bang beach, so either morning and afternoon, the beach is perfect location for anyone who likes a quiet beach to chill, not so crowded nor dirty. Bikes are free for guest but we rarely used it since it s nicer to walk around a small little village.

Visited da nang 2 days ago. A very nice, beautiful and cozy villa . 2-3 min walking distance from the beach. Sophie who is the manager of the property was genuinely friendly and warm and helped a lot with all queries. A must visit for few days. Just one suggestion is to have some light breakfast made available with tea and coffee. Plenty of dining options within 500 mts. Will surely visit again.
An excellent stay with very happy smiling staff and so friendly. We would definitely recommend coco villa we even extended our stay here. 100 paces to the beach

Lovely poolside villa . It rained a bit, but this didn t detract from the loveliness. Clean and cool, not a negative to mention. Kim was very attentive and organised anything we needed great breakfast and coffee! the moon restaurant just around the corner was fabulous too

The staff and the room were great. Spacious room, comfortable bed and lovely balcony with a huge day bed. There was no kettle in the room but i could use the kettle in the kitchen. There was also no hair dryer but one was provided when i asked.

It s a classic, simple and airy vietnamese bungalow type villa. The huge balcony with day bed was the best part about the room. I feel like it was missing a comfy chair inside as the room was huge and had a big empty corner. Tv only had one english speaking channel. When i arrived the staff seemed like they weren t expecting me. I didn t ever see breakfast options or the staff that much. But the room was comfy, quiet and clean and very close to the north side of an bang. Although i did see a cockroach in the bathroom on the first night .
기대이상으로 모든면이 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 친절하고 시설좋고 조식도 잘 나와요 위치도 올드타운과 꽤 가까워요
Such a lovely place .... Came for a fews days but stayed a bit longer! the staff were really lovely and freindly nothing was too much bother. Situated just a few minutes from the beach too.

Great hotel just a couple of minutes walk from the beach. Good to have a pool for when its too hot/late for the beach. Close to all the restaurants but one of the best breakfasts we ve had on the whole trip. Highly recommended.
I can,t speak english. But it was don t ploblem because host was kind. Breakfast is very good.

The location is less than a 5-min walk from the beach and there are a lot of restaurants nearby. The beach is not as crowded compare to other beaches in da nang/hoi an. The staff members are helpful and polite. One thing to be improved is the management. Upon arrival, we were told that there were only 2 rooms available and we have booked 3 rooms. Another thing is the cleanliness. We were given extra bed and duvet but the duvet provided smelt a bit funny and the towel provided were sometimes not as hygienic as one would expect. Having said the above, it definitely worth the price, the swimming pool within the villa is nice and clean, the complimentary breakfast is good, you can borrow the bikes for free and it was only a 30 min bike ride to the ancient town.

Lovely place to stay, only relatively new but the staff were very helpful and friendly. Great breakfast with smoothies, eggs etc. We only stayed one night but used the pool which was a welcome relief from the heat.

First of all a big thank you to lana and the team at gold coast villa. Nothing was too much trouble and everyone was very helpful and friendly. The rooms are a good size, nice and light and this place has a great location close to the beach. Lana was great and helped me with my day trip to hue. Lloyd ( sorry if i got your name wrong, you know who you are buddy) helped me with and amazing day riding the hai van pass. The girls in the kitchen who no matter how late i woke up due to my ongoing jet lag ( or too many beers ) would always offer me breakfast. As a solo traveller i often feel overlooked or ever ignored at times in some of the bigger places i stay. At gold coast they were so nice, always asking how i was, what i was up too and genuinely interested in looking after their guests. I hope i will be back soon and if i do this is where i want to stay, you are doing a great job guys so please don t lose your personal touch. Thank you, david.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at an bang gold coast villa. The manager and staff were very friendly and looked after you with an inteligent outlook, checking everything is ok, light background music, cool atmosphere, and even suggesting local things to do like the hoi an scuba day out, which was excellent. Felt like i made new friends here at the villa. Location near to the beach. Laneway access to villas not a problem. Friendly local neighbours. You feel a little part of the local community tucked away just behind the beach. Easy walk along the beach to an bangs main beachside cafes. Would recommend the villa to friends. Free bicycles to use to ride to hoi an.

We had an amazing stay at this guesthouse. Our room was spacious, comfortable and spotless! just steps away from the quiet end of an bang beach. Nice pool and garden. Breakfast was delicious. Hien, our hostess, speaks great english and gave us good advice about restaurants and things to do. Highly recommended!

Hien makes the stay a great experience - happy to sort laundry, transfers, restaurant suggestions etc clean, neat and basic rooms lovely little pool close to pretty average beach and restaurants decent breakfast and tasty pho bo a welcome relax from the hordes in the old town
鄰近an bang beach 房間大而舒適 住宿會提供美味即煮的早餐 而且職員友善熱情

Hotel in a quiet alleyway that continues on to the quiet end of an bang beach. It s the only hotel in the alley at the moment, so lots of locals all around. It s in the cam an ward which is the area between the road and the beach, it is divided up into little alleys for pedestrians and motorbikes only. The hotel is small, so even when fully occupied there are not many guests around. I would definitely go back and recommend to all.
Úžasná atmosféra, zvláště oceňujeme péči manažerky hotelu paní hien.

日本人の口コミを見つけることができませんでしたが評価が高めだったので滞在することにしました バルコニー付きの2階に4泊しましたが 評価通り快適でした ホテル並のサービスや設備を求める人には向かないと思いますが 田舎の素朴なビーチでのんびりしたい人にはとてもよい宿です 朝食は数種類のメニューから選ぶ方式で どれも美味しいです シャワーの水量 水圧も良く お湯も普通に出ます 似たような宿は周りにたくさんありましたが こちらにはプールがあったので滞在を決めました
Great little hotel. The room we had upstairs was amazing with breakfast delivered to your room. Highly recommended

hotelName: An Bang White Sand Sea Homestay
userCmt: Homestay của chúng tôi đã diễn ra tốt đẹp. Chúng tôi đã được cung cấp chỗ ở rất tốt. Nó gần bãi biển và chúng ta có thể đi xe đạp miễn phí!
Tương đô i thoa i ma i co cho mươ n xe đa p miê n phi . Tuy nhiên, pho ng kha nhiê u bu i, chăn đê trong tu không giă t nên bâ n.
Đẹp, dễ nhìn, gần pho co

Phòng ở không sạch sẽ, nhưng khá rộng. Thực đơn không phong phú. Bọn mình ăn sáng bằng mì tôm trứng. Vị trí cách khoảng 3km phố cổ. Xe đạp được mượn free. Nói chung là không ưng ý lắm với giá tiền thuê ở đây.
Sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, cô chủ nhiệt tình vui vẻ
Phòng nhiều muỗi. Không gian nhỏ không có vườn.
Điện nước yêu, khônh có nước để tắm mình phải sang phòng khác. Xe đạp thuê để đi chất lượng không tốt, nổ thủng săm, mình phải bỏ tiền ra để sửa xe
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, có sân ngồi chơi tán ngẫu, chơi đàn

Mặc dù phòng rộng thoáng có cửa sổ lớn view vườn nhưng bệ cửa sổ có bụi, chắc mấy ngày quên lau. Và lần đầu tiên đến hotel hostel hay homestay bla bla mà không có bàn ủi. Làm 2 đứa mình phải vác váy áo đi tiệm ủi )
Phòng sạch sẽ, đạp xe qua phố cổ thuận tiện. Chị chủ nhiệt tình. Tuyệt vời

Chủ sở hữu rubi có thể nói tiếng anh tốt. Căn phòng khá lớn. Chúng tôi không lấy nước trong phòng nhưng chúng tôi có thể lấy nó miễn phí trong bếp. Cái chăn quá mỏng, tôi ngủ với cảm giác khó chịu. Tôi đọc các nhận xét trong ứng dụng rằng chúng ta có thể mượn xe đạp miễn phí. Nhưng nó không phải, chúng tôi phải trả tiền. Vì vậy, cẩn thận hỏi đầu tiên những gì chúng ta có thể nhận được miễn phí hoặc những gì chúng ta phải mua. Theo thứ tự của tôi, tôi nhận được bữa sáng miễn phí nhưng trong khách sạn tôi đã không nhận được nó. Vì vậy, tôi đã cho rubi thấy những gì tôi phải nhận. Cuối cùng cô ấy cho chúng tôi ăn sáng. Nhìn chung, tôi nghĩ tốt hơn là dành nhiều tiền hơn để ngủ trong khách sạn tốt hơn.
Avệ sinh kém phòng có mùi, nước uống thì hoàn toàn phải mua nói chung mọi ng đặt nên cân nhắc so với giá thì nhiwwuf chỗ ok hơn

Cách phố cổ một đoạn nhưng dễ di chuyển kể cả bằng xe đạp cũng chỉ tầm 10ph (home có cho thuê xe). Yên tĩnh và thoáng mát, chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Nội thất không quá mới nhưng sạch sẽ, phòng có cửa sổ lớn, phù hợp trong tầm giá.
Phòng giá cả rất hợp lý ạ sẽ quay lại thêm lần nữa
Cách âm phòng không tốt, rất ồn
Phòng rẻ,gần phố cổ, chủ home rất nhiệt tình
Cô chủ homestay thân thiện , nên có thêm quạt ở trong phòng
Homestay sạch sẽ, thơm tho. Cô chủ thân thiện. Phòng mới, rộng rãi, nội thất mới, đẹp và tiện nghi giống với ảnh đăng. Có ban công sạch sẽ. Tuy nhiên cổng và bảng hiệu nhỏ nên hơi khó nhìn thấy.
Phòng giống hình. Phòng được xông mùi sả rất thơm. Anh chị chủ thân thiện nhiệt tình. Khách sạn có cho khách mượn xe đạp.

Phòng bình thường, có ban công đẹp, tương đối sạch sẽ, lúc mới vào phòng có mùi chua chua, mình nghĩ home nên đầu tư về mùi thơm cho phòng nữa. Chăn ga gối có thể có rận do mình và bạn đều bị ngứa tay chân khi đắp chăn ở trong tủ.

It was a short 2-night family trip at hoi an. We truly enjoyed the experience at the resort. The food was authentic and home-made. My son enjoyed swimming and feeding the fish at the pond, located on the backside of the resort. And most of all, the staff were very friendly and welcoming. We look forward to returning on our next visit to hoi an!
Super clean, comfortable, and convenient. Loved the spotless studio unit, bathroom, and the food was great. I d go back in a heartbeat.

The surrounding scenery is so beautiful and there is a well-organized garden. The staff was so kind and the breakfast was delicious. It took a while to get to hoian city, but all of them were excellent lodgings. The next time i visit vietnam, i will use this accommodation again.
設備 スタッフの対応ともに良かったです ホイアンは観光都市で 周辺に大きなvillaも建ち始める中 普通の家の造りのステイは珍しく コンセプトが魅力的 アットホームで 韓国や日本から家族連れのお客さんが来てました 小さい宿で 4組のみ受け入れ 世界遺産の町がちょっと遠いのが 惜しい所かな
It s was a great stay and their service was great too. Without the television was a great idea so there will be more communication and rest early. Will come come again.

Completely happy with the experience in this oasis of tranquility, great service , amazing food and especially the kind of treatment they give you! you feel as if you are part of the family! beautifully decorated with unique touches surrounded by nature! close to town and the beaches! loved this place and the staff!!!

最終日に一泊だけしたのですが 素敵なヴィラで もっと長く泊まりたかったです お庭も手入れされていて 窓からの景色に癒されました 朝食はオーダー形式で お腹がいっぱいになるまで注文して良いとのことで できたての温かい朝ご飯を頂けました ヴィラは広くて 雰囲気がよく 子供達も大喜びで 家族連れにもおすすめです 一泊しかしていないにもかかわらず チェックアウト後も 夜便の出発時間まで荷物を預かって頂き シャワーも貸して下さって 本当に有り難かったです またホイアンに行きたいというより アンヴィラに行きたい気持ちです

It s an amazing place with the friendliest staff and most accommodating staff they were able to arrange all our transfers, tours, meals, and motorbike rentals to our specific needs the room and bed was comfortable and all the bathroom toiletries were made in-house using only the best natural, sustainable materials and scents

I write for people who s interested in this villa. Here is designed to provide a peaceful, wondrous and natural setting where people could rest and relax. Also great food and friendly staff. If you re looking for good place where you feel like you re in the forest, it s gonna be the place. Lastly, i appreciate you helping to find my son s watch.

올드타운과 해변 사이에 있어 자전거나 바이크 이용시 위치가 아주 좋습니다. 객실 내부 청소도 깨끗했고 정원이 잘 가꿔져있어 숙소에 있는 동안 눈이 즐거웠고 간결한 조식도 좋았습니다. 호텔 직원분들도 친철하고 설명도 호이안에 대해 간략한 설명도 잘해주셔서 좋았습니다. 자전거와 전동자전거 두가지가 구비되어 있어 저렴한 가격에 대여할 수 있습니다. 호이안의 현지인들의 거주하는 작은 마을에 위치해 있어 자연친화적인 환경으로 주변에 가축(오리,소,닭) 울음소리 혹은 개들이 짖는소리 등 이러한 소음에 민감하신분들에겐 추천하지않습니다.
오성급호텔만큼의 청결. 편리는 부족하지만 집처럼 편안한 분위기 숙소로 향하는 길의 펼쳐진 논뷰는 호이안 어느곳보다 아름다웠다 이곳의 분짜는 최고!! 다시 호이안을 온다면 다시 꼭 올곳입니다

Our stay at an villa was wonderful. The hotel was pristine, the staff was extremely nice and professional, and the food was delicious. An villa is a gem in hoi an. The rooms were comfortable and clean, the pool was welcoming, and the tropical garden was beautiful. There was a good mix of guests. It is a 10 minutes taxi ride to the historic town, a 10 minutes bike ride to the beach, and next to the rice fields. They have rental bikes and motorbikes which is convenient. Phuong was amazing she gave us tips about how to navigate the city, arrange taxi pick ups from the hotel, and ask the kitchen to make a bun cha for diner one night. The owners were extremely nice and caring. As i was sick, they gave me medications and one of the owner even made me a local remedy - which helped a lot. We highly recommend an villa!
The straff at an villa are great, they are very helpful and welcoming and gives you a feeling of wanting to come back. The hotel is a bit of from the city center but very beautiful and quiet.

An villa was truly one of the most wonderful places we ve ever stayed at. From the very beginning the hotel staff go out of your way to make you feel at home, the rooms were gorgeous with such nice touches and the food was incredible there. Also the quiet location was perfect - away from the hustle bustle of the town - but the (electric) bikes they rent made everything so accessible.
This place is exactly what i want. Cozy and peace
힐링하기에는 최고의 장소 이쁜정원과 친절한 직원과 맛있는 음식은 모든 걱정을 잊게했다 다음에 호이안을 오게 된다면 주저없이 안빌라를 다시 선택할것입니다
チェックイン時間前に着いたにも関わらず 部屋に通していただき スタッフの方が皆親切でした 6部屋しかないので プライベート感があり とてものんびりと贅沢な時間を過ごせました また機会があれば是非泊まりたいです
スタッフさんが皆様いい方でした アットホームで家庭的でとても良かったです 朝食は家庭的な料理が無料で食べれて更に無料です とても良かったです ただ水圧が弱いのとドライヤーの風量が 弱かったです ベトナムなのでしょうがないのかな

We chose this place because it was a quiet boutique hotel by a river in the countryside. And everything exceeded our expectations as it was a homestay but it gave us a feeling of staying at a resort. The staff was friendly and very helpful. One of them even let us borrow her bike for a couple of hours. It was really good value for money. We rate everything 5 stars except the local area because of the super loud karaoke in the neighborhood but this had nothing to do with the hotel.

We had a great stay in an villa calm, peaceful, comfortable rural area within just 10 minutes from old city we rent a bike and ride to small local market and we bought some fruit and ban-mi which was very nice. The food is so good so everyday we enjoy different menu in the restaurant. All the staffs are soooo kindly help us many things. We miss the brilliant dog an and cute moon. Thanks for all an villa !
Amazing place!
Beautiful hotel, very friendly and attentive staff. Made our stay in hoi an wonderful!
スタッフの対応は最高でした
What a great experience . Best choice stay in anantara , best location and impecable service. My special thanks to spa therapist perfect facial treatment.
Great hotel with wonderful staff. Definitely recommend this hotel with great views of the river.
Excellent location on the edge of the old town. The staff were all extremely helpful and friendly. I was very impressed by the service.
Superb hospitality and location. The staff are friendly, was proactive about our needs but not intrusive

This property is unique in that it has beautiful grounds and large rooms, a superb location, and exceptional dining including great vegan options. The staff and management are very helpful. You will not regret staying here.

This property was just spectacular. The rooms were beautiful and had everything you could possibly need. We loved the little daybeds on the front balcony, a perfect nook to read a book. The pool area was also perfect for relaxing after a long day in the sun. We also ate at both of the restaurants, and found the food to be excellent. And the location is just ideal, far enough out of town to be away from all the noise, yet a quick bike ride into the heart of all the action.
Ideal location, extremely kind staff, very pleasant stay.
Great location
Wonderful room facility and staff. Big shout out to hong and chau
スタッフの皆さんがとても親切でした
침구,조식,깨끗함,친절함,호텔 분위기 모두 만족했습니다.다만 호텔측에 요청해서 이용한 택시,스파 절대로 이용하지 마세요.그랩이용하시고 마사지는 외부에서 이용하세요.반드시. 나머지는 완벽합니다.
Parfait hôtel pour des vacances. Situation idéale près de la vielle ville de hôi an. Service impeccable et attentionné. La configuration des chambres est très agréable.
Wonderful colonial era building with atmosphere. Good location and excellent staff.
The hotel was located perfectly so you could walk everywhere. The staff were very attentive. Breakfast options were fantastic too!
Clean and quite environment . Warm and friendly service .aaa
Great location. Lovely hotel. Lovely staff.
The staff was amazing. We would stay again at this location.

2일간 지내면서 모든면에서 만족스러운 숙박이었어요. 룸컨디션은 기본이고, 컨시어지 담당자의 친절함부터 하루두번 룸정리까지 최고였어요. 조식도 퀄리티면에서 매우만족스러웠구요. 보트트립도 시중비용보다는 비싸지만, 프라이빗한 서비스와 식음료 제공까지 ᆢ 아주 만족스러운 여행 이었어요. 아난타라 호이안 적극 추천합니다 한국인 별로없고, 매우조용하고 평화로운 분위기, 올드타운과도 가까운게 저와 제아내 기준에서 최고 장점 이었어요.

This is an old and atmospheric hotel just a 6 minute walk to the old town of hoi an. Very comfortable but you are really paying for the convenience. Rather better to stay here than in one of the new, huge hotels that dominate the coast from da nang south to hoi an with shuttle buses etc etc. The road into town has undergone a facelift recently with some nice restaurants, bars and massage shops. My wife and i particularly liked the massage place directly opposite the hotel - cheap and friendly.
An excellent hotel in every way.
観光客減少にも関わらず満足いくサービスを提供してくれた チャイルドシート装備の自転車も施設保有されておりサイクリングで子供が大喜びしてくれた 旧市街が非常に近い為 気軽にぶらぶらできた 立地が非常に良いので次回も利用したい
コロナの中でお客さんが少なくても精一杯もてなしてくれました
ナイトマーケットまでは歩いて行ける距離だったし 清潔感がありとても素敵なホテルだった
Excellent location. Great staff
Great experience
We stayed 3rd floor but no elevator other things is good! they prepare some fluits in the room thank you!! the riverside restaurant is good also i recommend
Perfect location on the river and very close to the old town center

こちらのホテルに2泊しましたが お庭や建物がおしゃれでとても素敵でした 朝食会場は川がきれい見えて開放感があり 食事も美味しかったです また従業員のみなさまホスピタリティが高くて居心地もよく とても楽しく過ごせました 立地としてはホイアンの旧市街から近く 自転車の無料貸出もあるので片道20分ほどで海まで行くこともできます 他にも宿泊者向けアクティビティなどもあるので 今回は参加しませんでしたがとても楽しめるホテルだなと思いましたよ
Our stay was amazing and the location of this hotel is perfect for seeing the old town of hoi an. The service was great! would highly recommend!
部屋のアップグレードもあり 静かでいいホテルだった
A great old style property just outside the old town but within 5 minutes walking. The grounds are lovely and the staff are very friendly and helpful. My favourite place to stay in hoi an
部屋のアロマであったり お水の補充であったりと 充分なサービスで痒い所に手が届く感じが好きです

Room was big and i like the split level, good tv programs, thoughtful accessories. Has everything you might need. Love the big bathroom and the small patio area to lounge. Sweet! colonial architecture was a treat for the eyes. Location was fantastic right next the river and old town. The restaurant was nice, though they could definitely include many more vegetarian options, which were lacking and minimal. But loved the little, free vietnamese pizza stand and the wait staff is super sweet and excellent without being in your face. A perfect experience!

외국인 숙박객의 비율이 높고 조용하며 전체적인 분위기가 자연친화적입니다 직원들은 모두 다 매우 친절하고 서비스가 섬세하여 만족스럽습니다 호이안올드타운까지 자전거를 무료로 대여해 주어 특별한 추억을 만들 수 있고 올드 타운으로 가는 길에 여러가지 역사적인 장소, 카페, 전통 시장도 있어서 흥미롭습니다 아름답고 아늑한 아난트라 호이안은 진정한 휴식을 위한 최고의 호텔입니다 조식의 종류가 다양하지 않은 것은 다소 아쉽지만 그래도 다음에도 또 이용할 것 같습니다

Staff was friendly, food was good, spa service excellent. Don t like the structure of the complex or rooms. The resort is right in the middle of a busy street - not very resort feel. The pool is small and of v-shape - can t really swim there. The rooms have no windows except on the door side - that means when the door is closed, you are trapped indoor. And we did look at three types of rooms. They were all the same.
Very polite helpful staff. Beautiful, peaceful settings

룸, 조경, 인테리어 등 전체적인 디자인이 세련되고 직원들이 친절합니다. 수영장은 작지만 나무그늘이 있어 더울때 놀기 좋고, 룸 앞의 작은 테라스는 정원을 마주보고 있어 앉아만 있어도 좋습니다. 올드타운도 걸어서 7 8분 정도로 생각보다 가깝고, 조식 메뉴 또한 다양하진 않아도 고급스러운 건강식입니다. (수제잼, 건강쥬스 등) 요가 클래스도 꽤 전문적으로 진행되는 것 같습니다. 다만, 전반적으로 관광보다는 휴양을 목적으로 방문하기에 좋은 호텔 같습니다. 수영장에서조차 책을 읽는 분위기이며, 룸이 외부 복도와 바로 연결되고 바닥이 대리석이라 방음이 안됩니다. 시설 단점으로는 욕실 샤워실이 좁아서 물이 바닥으로 튀고, 2층 건물이지만 엘리베이터가 없으며, 오래된 리조트 건물이라 비올땐 지린내 같은 냄새가 살짝 납니다. 쓰는 김에, 호텔 정문 맞은편 골목의 로컬 식당을 강력 추천합니다. 세탁소와 옷 판매를 겸한 테이블 2개 정도의 작은 가게인데 모든 메뉴가 너무너무 맛나요! 특히 쌀국수ㅠ (구글에선 가게명이 the heart 라고 나오는데 확실치 않음)
Beautiful hotel. Friendly and inviting staff always keen to help and make our stay enjoyable and easy

ホイアン旧市街には ゆったりと過ごせるリゾートホテルはほとんどありませんが アナンタラホイアンリゾートは 旧市街のホイアン市場から徒歩でも10分とかからず とても便利な立地 しかも川沿いに面していて 旧市街の雑踏から解放され 静かで落ち着いたラグジュアリー感溢れるホテルステイを楽しむ事ができました スタッフの方々も皆にこやかにテキパキと対応してくださり 気持ちよく過ごす事ができました 川沿いの風が気持ちの良いレストランでの朝食ブュッフェも種類が豊富でみな美味しく大満足 部屋も隅々まで掃除が行き届いていました 一つだけ困った事は ドアが閉まるとオートロックがかかってしまう為 屋外にあるソファに座る時でもキーを持ち出さないとならず うっかり忘れてしまった時には部屋に入れなくなってしまいました たまたま近くにスタッフがいたので すぐにスペアキーを持って来てもらえましたが もしいなかったら裸足でレセプションまで行かなければならなかったかも この点だけは改善していただけたらて思います
Excellent hotel close to the old town and some wonderful restaurants.

With the room rate i have paid, i found it lack of maintenance, very poor facilities... The mini swimming pool really stop me from stepping into it, gym room is like a bird cage, three pieces of equipment, worst i have ever experienced...yet breakfast is good, staff are very friendly and helpful though very difficult to understand their english...i paid less in da nang but i have executive lounge accessible suite with huge separated bad room and sitting room overlook the beach in international 5 stars hotel, regret that i didn t spend that 2 nights in da nang instead...
우기만 아니었다면 정말 더 좋았읁 것같아요. 침대가 많이 습했어요. 그럴수밖에 없는 것같아요. 벌레 거의 못봤구요. 그래도 청결하게 리셉션 직원이 마사지하는동안 아가도 봐주셨어요. 다들 친절하고 의사소통도 잘됩니다.
良く清掃された清潔で かつ大変静かな部屋だったので 大変快適に過ごせました 今まで宿泊したホテルで 1番長くホテル内でくつろいだと思います
Best place in hoi an.
전반적으로 매우 만족하였습니다. 다만 방이 조금 작은 편이었습니다.
Great location, lovely staff - let down by breakfast.
清潔でアジア系の人は少ないようです 旧市内からも近くて便利ですが施設はこじんまり してます フロントの人が少なくて用事を お願いしずらかったのと 少しでも日本語ができる 人がいればと思います

Skønt hotel i udkanten af hoi an, helt ideelt for familien. 10 min. Gang til det historiske centrum, og blot 15-20 mins. Cykkelafstand til den lækreste sandstrand. Hotellet stiller gratis cykler til rådighed, hvis man har mod på at vove sig ud i trafikken i vietnam. Ellers er det enkelt at få en taxa fra hotellet, hvilket koster ca. Kr. 20-30. Hotellet er i generel fin stand, og service fra det meget venlige personale er høj. Værelserne er store og rumlige, indrettet i hyggelig lokal stil. Rengøringen var ligeledes helt i top. Både på værelse, samt de øvrige omgivelser. Wifi dækning var god på hele hotellets område. Vi bookede inklusive morgenmadsbuffet, som absolut levede op til forventning, med et varieret udvalg fra både det internationale og lokale køkken. Herunder frisktlavede æg, omeletter, etc. Poolområdet var en smule skuffende. Poolen er meget lavvandet (vel 1 m.), og området med liggestole fyldes hurtigt op. Servering og service omkring poolen, var ej heller på helt samme niveau som det øvrige hotelområde. Priserne på anantara s bar og restaurant, samt udflugter arrangeret af hotellet er skyhøj, i sammenligning med udbudet i området (2-3 gange så høj). Spiller dog en mindre rolle, da udbuddet af restauranter i gå-afstand er særdeles omfattende, og meget varierende.

Die anlage lag sehr schön am fluss gelegen und war sehr sehr gepflegt und sauber. Das personal, speziell duc am empfang und die kollegen beim bike und car service waren liebenswert und freundlich und stets hilfsbereit. Nur zu empfehlen wenn man eine schöne zeit in hoi an in einem sehr schönen und modernen hotel verbringen möchte.
We stayed in the deluxe river view and had the best time. Great hotel. We loved it.

We had a lovely few days here. The staff are wonderfully kind and patient. The rooms are pleasingly designed with a calm, tranquil feel. We switched rooms to an upper level river view after one night as there was a lot of footfall outside our original ground level room as it was by the pool area. The upper level room was calm and peaceful. Each riverview room has a little sitting area/patio with a ceiling fan that makes for a really relaxing nook. On our last night we arrived home late and tired after a busy day exploring hoi an and when we got into bed we were surprised to find rather a lot of sand inside the sheets! it made for a very uncomfortable night of sleep and when we spoke to the management about this the next day they refunded us the payment for the night. It was very well-handled by the management team, as this isn t the level of comfort that they aspire to provide, or that one would expect from an anantara property. The breakfast buffet is worth calling out especially, as it s small but perfectly formed and utterly delicious. After we left the property we realised we had forgotten an errand at a shop just across the street, and the hotel staff were extremely kind in helping us complete the errand, even though we had already checked out. We were blown away by their kindness and helpfulness - true vietnamese hospitality. All in all a wonderful stay, and probably the best place to stay in hoi an.

ホスピタリティはとてもよく スタッフはみんな笑顔で親切です ロケーションは 繁華な場所と程よい距離で落ち着いてステイできました 朝食も美味しくて楽しめました ウエルカムのベッドメイクが嬉しく 担当スタッフや支配人からの洒落たメッセージも 演出 の気が利いていました ただ バスタブがイメージと違い 実質的にシャワーしかできなかったのと それに関連してシャワーの水を遮れなくて洗面スペースまで水が飛び散るのが残念でした リバーサイドに面し 部屋の入り口のソファに横になり自然の風と木の葉の揺れる音に癒されました また ホイアンに来たらリピートしたいと思います
직원분들의 서비스가 좋았고 조용했습니다 올드타운과도 가까웠습니다 자전거를 빌려서 가면 얼마걸리지않습니다
Beautiful heritage style, beautifully maintained grounds, right on the river, great staff
It was amazing!! strongly recommend this hotel!!
Perfect ..

조용한 휴식을 원한다면 적극 추천.아이들 한국인들 거의 없어요. 조용히 책 읽으며 힐링을 원하신다면 더 없이 좋은 숙소입니다. 근처 야시장과 올드타운은 도보로 가능하여 접근이 쉽습니다. 고립되지 않은 숙소여서 힐링과 함께 쇼핑 마사지 모두 가능한 숙소입니다. 단, 테라스는 프라이빗 하지 않아요. 오픈형 테라스이고, 테라스쪽 뷰는 리버뷰가 제일 좋습니다. 수영장은 작아요. 그래서 아이들 동반 가족이 별로 없는듯요.
편안하고 따뜻한 분위기였습니다. 직원분들도 친절했고 밖이엄청 더웠는데 에어컨을 조절할 수 있어서 다행이었습니다. 조식이 엄청 맛있었어요. 근데 야외여서 더울때는 아침 일찍 드시는게 좋을 것 같습니다.

This hotel thought and catered for everything. The attention to detail and all the little extras throughout the hotel combined with the beautiful staff makes this place very special. There s a real sense of calm and relaxation throughout. The rooms are beautiful, great size and decorated beautifully with everything you need.

結婚記念日 誕生日で利用しました 宿泊当日はバラの花束やケーキ フルーツ 菓子 部屋のアップグレードにベッドデコレーションまで素晴らしいサプライズでした 朝食会場はエアコンがないため 暑い時期だと朝から少し汗ばんでしまいますが メニューはどれも美味しいです 満月のランタン祭りの日だったので アナンタラ主催でホテル前のトゥボン川で灯籠流しのイベントもありました ホイアン中心からほんの僅かに離れているので静かでとても過ごしやすいリゾートでおすすめです

This is a great hotel, perfect location within walking distance to the old town and all the great places to eat and relax. The breakfast provided was wonderful with an excellent selection. Staff were friendly and very attentive. The room was lovely and spacious. The pool was beautiful and clean. The only criticism i have is the price of drinks at the hotel restaurant. A glass of wine was 18(aus) for a 40 bottle of nz wine and the beer was also expensive compared to other hotels we have stayed at. The restaurant and bars were very quiet at the hotel. The night we ate there we were the only guests. I assume that other guests would have also found they were much better off eating outside the hotel. The laundry fees were also very expensive at 5 times the cost of the local laundry s just outside the hotel gates who washed and pressed our laundry professionally and returned within 24 hours.
ホイアンの中心地に近く街歩きに最適なホテル
Sehr schönes hotel, großzügige zimmer, sehr freundliches personal und geniales frühstücksbuffet.
최고의 휴가를 즐겼어요 영어를 잘 못해서 손짓발짓하며 소통했는데 친절하게 알려주셔서 감사했습니다

The location of the hotel is superb. The staff are all very welcoming and accommodating, they were happy to help and to chat and were very informative about hoi an and vietnam. The room was lovely, very comfortable and a good size and serviced well. The little balcony outside the room was lovely, overlooking the river. A few disappointments, we asked for a late check out and it was extended until 2pm, but we would be charged usd100 if we wanted it until 5pm. This was a monday and we could clearly see, in the pool, in unused rooms and in the dining areas, that the hotel was practically empty, it would have cost the hotel nothing, but it would have been a simple and easy way to excel in customer service and consideration. I felt that the staff were following a rule and would not alter. We were offered a late check out until 5pm if we arranged for a car to da nang airport through the hotel, but again, this was over usd100! we caught a taxi, large and air conditioned for usd25. The prices are not comparable. Also, we ate in the riverside cafe, it is a superb location and the staff were very good. But the cost of the meal for two people was extortionate, especially the wine. The food was okay, but it didn t justify a bill of usd150!!! we didn t spend a third of that in the great restaurants in hoi an, where the food was actually better. We didn t try the spa, as again, it was very expensive. I appreciate that the hotel may need to charge higher rates, but when you h
スタッフの皆さんの対応 部屋 食事共に大変満足しています ひとつ気になった点は枕が臭ったことだけです
직원들이 아주 친절하고 곳곳에 리조트 쪽에서 신경을 많이 쓴 느낌을 받았습니다 숙소도 좋고 리조트 환경도 아주 예쁘고 좋네요
호이안 야시장과 관광 중심가 올드타운과 굉장히 가까이 붙어있습니다. 수영장도 예쁘고 적당한 사이즈로 휴양하기에 부족함 없었습니다. 객실 또한 청결하고 문을 열고 들어갈때부터 레몬그라스 냄새로 동남아에 온 기분을 느낄 수 있었습니다 조식도 강이 보이는 시원한 식당에서 기분좋게 먹었습니다 조식 꼭 추가하세요!!ㅎㅎㅎ

Aldrig har vi prøvet noget lignende. Et super smukt og roligt hotel. Vi var på bryllupsrejse og personalet havde lavet en overraskelse til os. Morgenmaden er het i top - med sund mad og smoothie. Hver aften lå der en godnathilsen på puden - håndskrevet på et blad. Vi skal tilbage hertil.
施設 サービス ホスピタリティ ホテル手配の交通や観光の素晴らしさなどどれも素晴らしい体験でした ただ一つ シャワースペースに扉や遮るものが全くなくバスルームの床がびしょ濡れになるのはどうしてこういう設計にしたのか不思議です またそれなら足拭きマットを何枚も欲しいのに毎回1枚しか用意されてなかったのが不満でした
Great hotel...an oasis near the busy old town.

Very well located, comfortable hotel which combined modern comfort with traditional charm. Helpful, friendly staff. Only bad point was the buffet dinner in the riverside restaurant - very poor selection, poor quality food and greatly overpriced (very poor value for money).breakfast and a la carte lunch was fine.

The staff are mostly lovely, the property beautiful. The rooms have great porches for sitting outside. Hoi an is utterly charming. But three things marred our visit. There is no soundproofing between rooms. You hear every chair moved in the room above you, even light switches being flipped in the room next to you. At the front desk we tried to exchange a hundred-dollar bill, as we were out of cash. The staff refused because the bill had a tiny blue mark on it, and they said the bank would not accept it. (fortunately, when we marched over to the bank, this turned out to be untrue.) third, an overly zealous cleaner threw out my invisiline retainers. True, they are clear, but they are not really hard to miss. Now i am stuck without them for two months of travel.

The best hotel experience i have had in years, the staff could not have possibly been more accomdating to ensure our stay was as memorable as possible. We arrived early, checked out late and enjoyed every minute in between. We travel frequently and always like to try new places but we shall return here without question.

It s located in a good location, within walking distance to ancient town. However, the pillows were a let-down, far too flat. The service is excellent, and the breakfast buffet spread is quite varied and tasty.
居心地が凄く良かったです wi-fi環境がもう少し良ければ 良かったです シャワールームに扉が無いので 洗面所の床が濡れてしまうのが 残念でした
고즈넉한 분위기 좋았습니다.
Friendly staff and beautiful rooms. Pool very shallow and hard to get in/out of for older guests.

Lovely hotel overall. Pool was peaceful and great to cool down, not huge but perfect for what we needed. They are doing some refurbishments and some where located near our room so could hear that throughout they say. We also took a trip to my son ancient city with the hotel, thoroughly enjoyed it however it was quite pricey. The hotel transfers as well were very expensive. Good location you can walk into the old quarter easily.
Two nights in hoi an. Bed is really good, and we had the best nights sleep while in vietnam. Loved the pool and the breakfast too. Free bikes came very handy for exploring the old city
Absolutely delighted with our stay at anantara! great hotel. Book it, you won t be sorry.

Perfect place. Great service. Situated just off all the busy and noisy streets. Walking distance to most restaurants and other sights. Overlooking the river. Really felt welcome by staff and room were large and huge bathroom. Recommend to stay there.
Very pleasant hotel in the centre of the town, within easy walking distance of the historic old town, shopping and restaurants. Would stay there again.
川沿いの部屋だとさらによかったと思いますが リラックスして滞在ができました 基本的には良かったと思います
수영장은 좀 작지만 책 읽고 쉬기엔 나쁘지 않다. 주변지역은 좀 깨끗하진 않다. 올드타운까지 걷는 거리는 찻길이 다소 위험한편.
에어컨도 빵빵하고 와이파이도 잘 터져서 좋았어요 수건에서 냄새도 안나구요 전반적으로 서비스가 너무너무 좋았습니다 다만 조식 메뉴가 다양하지않고 방음이 잘 안되서 옆방에서 큰소리로 이야기하면 들리곤했어요

호이안 올드 타운을 도보로 걸어서 5분정도면 충분한 좋은 위치의 아난타라! 조용하구 산책하기 좋은 산책로가 심신을 편안하게 해주는 만족했던 리조트 였습니다 저녁 무렵 알록달록 등에 불이 들어오면 투본강가를 따라 쭉 걸어서 산책하다보면 저절로 힐링이 되는듯 했습니다 조식은 조금 단조롭구 소박한 느낌이라 기대에 못 미쳤지만 아침마다 카페쓰어다 한잔으로 위로 받았습니다 날씨탓인지는 모르겠으나 침구류가 뽀송하지 않아서 조금 아쉬웠으나 청결상태는 좋았습니다 다시 호이안을 방문한다면 재방문 의사가 있습니다
Beautiful oasis in busy hoi an. Enjoyed the pool and the beautifully appointed rooms.
Friendliest staff we ever come across. We had a wonderful 4 night stay at anantara and didn t want to leave! - would highly recommend
Amazing hotel and great service beautiful room with great amenities

Wir haben 3 herrliche tage im anantara in hoi an verbracht bei ankunft haben wir uns gegen einen entsprechenden aufpreis upgraden lassen und die grösste suite des établissements mit riverview erhalten - top ! das personal ist adorable - super nett und zuvorkommend - das restaurant war sehr gut, wir haben 3 tage dort gegessen inkl. Street food buffet. Falls es uns mal wieder nach hoi an verschlagen sollte wreden wir auf jeden fall wieder in s anantara gehen !!!!!

Wonderful relaxing experience. Fab hotel and facilities right next to the river and only a few steps from the old town if hoi an. And they produced a birthday cake too, thank you highly recommend. Would definitely return here.
部屋が広く清潔でした 中庭なども整備されていてそこを部屋の前のソファから眺めながら寛げて居心地がよかったです ホテルのスタッフもフレンドリーで更によかったです 次のホイアン滞在があればまた利用したいと思います

The staff was professional and welcoming. The food was fantastic, and we were impressed by the variety on display at the breakfast buffet. Great location, both by the river and walkable to everyone one could want in hoi an.

Hopeless front desk. Queue forming with 2 front desk staff. One spent 15 min to sell tour package. Shouldnt there be another tour desk table. When checking into room, they take time to explain things that you dont need. I will not stay again. I am a discovery member. No such issue in thailand.
재방의사 있을만큼 좋았습니다. 조용하고 편안한 리조트였습니다
Sehr schönes resort. In der nähe von allem. Personal sehr hilfsbereit und immer sehr freundlich! würden sofort wiederkommen.

hotelName: Ancient Beach Boutique & Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nhân viên thân thiện. View phòng ở chill, ra biển gần. Menu ăn sáng ok

hotelName: Ancient Beach Boutique & Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ thú vị nhất ở đây, khách sạn rất sạch sẽ, thức ăn ngon và nhân viên tốt. Tôi thực sự giới thiệu cho tất cả các bạn. Cảm giác như ở nhà .

hotelName: Ancient Beach Boutique & Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Phòng tại đây rất đẹp, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Gia đình mình đi có con nhỏ 1 tuổi nên muốn hạn chế ra ngoài vì dịch, tại khách sạn có bữa sáng miễn phí. Mình thưởng thức món cao lầu hội an do khách sạn chuẩn bị rất ngon, có cả cà phê nữa. Nhân viên khách sạn rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Có dịp mình sẽ quay lại đây.
Gia đình mình đã có những giây phút rất vui tại đây. Bạn nào đi theo nhóm thích hợp book bên này vì có nhiều phòng nè.

Khách sạn phù hợp với những người vừa muốn tới hội an chơi, vừa muốn qua biển an bàng ngắm hoàng hôn tại the deckhouse. Khách sạn không lớn, nhưng đem lại cảm giác dễ chịu với không gian xanh mướt của cây và hoa. Khách sạn có cho thuê xe đạp miễn phí để đi hội an. Phòng sạch sẽ, buồng tắm có thiết kế đẹp.
Phòng rộng rãi, thoáng đãng, rất phù hợp cho nghỉ dưỡng. Khuôn viên nhiều cây xanh, có ao cá. Nhân viên thân thiện. Thức ăn sáng cần cải thiện thêm.
Khách sạn rất đẹp, khuôn viên xinh xắn, bể bơi đẹp và sạch, không gian thoáng, phòng vintage đẹp. Sẽ quay trở lại. Trong tầm giá thì thấy ở đây đẹp nhất lại còn có bồn tắm view ra vườn.
Nhân viên ở đây thấy kh đặt qua app nên bị hời hợt hơn khách tới thẳng thì phải. Có cảm nhận là như vậy, hơi buồn )))))
Sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, lịch sự và rất xanh.

Phòng thoáng, yên tĩnh. Nhân viên cũng nhiệt tình, dễ thương. Đồ ăn sáng nên thay đổi cho phong phú hơn. Khu vực hơi xa trung tâm chút, đạp xe khoảng 10p đến phố cổ. Tóm lại nếu bạn muốn tìm một nơi nghĩ dưỡng thì nơi này không tồi.
Resort đẹp, sạch sẽ, phòng thoáng mát, trẻ con tha hồ chạy nhảy, bể bơi đẹp, ấm, trẻ còn tắm được đến 9h tối. Hơi xa phố cổ tí nhưng mọi thứ tuyệt vời
Nơi này khá yên tĩnh và đẹp, không gian phòng khá thoải mái. Nhân viên bảo vệ rất thân thiện. Họ cũng có những chiếc xe đạp, bạn có thể chọn một chiếc và cưỡi đến hội chợ ký ức hội an ...
Cách trung tâm phố cổ 10p đạp xe. Nhân viên vô cùng nhiệt tình và thân thiện. View sân vườn xanh mát

Giá vòng view vườn 615k/1đêm/phòng 2 người nhe. Do mình lấy mã giảm giá 35 nên chỉ còn 400k/1 phòng /2 người tính ra 200k/1 người thôi. Đ/c 85 lê hồng phong, tân an, hội an,quảng nam ưu điểm điểm 9/10 (theo mình nhe) di chuyển khách sạn cho mướn free xe đạp nhe. Từ khách sạn đạp xe mất 10 phút tới phố cổ, mất 10 phút ra biển an bàng thôi. Không gian phòng đẹp rộng rãi sạch sẽ, view vườn đẹp lắm các bạn, không gian sân vườn thoáng mát, có 3 tầng, căn phòng được trang trí không gian cổ kính như ở hội an chứ không có hiện đại nhân viên lễ tân với mấy chú xách hành lý thân thiện, hiếu khách lắm (do đôi lúc mình không quen nghe tiếng miền trung cho lắm) nhược điểm phòng không có bàn trang điểm nhe dịch vụ ủi đồ với giặt đồ các bạn phải nói trước vì khách sạn nhời dịch vụ giặt là ở ngoài á.
Nice. Nhân viên và các cô chú rất nhiệt tình
Tôi đã có kì nghỉ rất vui. Nhân viên dễ thương
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, dễ thương từ lễ tân tới cô chú phục vụ. Buffet sáng ngon, view ở thoải mái, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Gần biển gần phố cổ

Chúng tôi đã đặt một phòng sang trọng nhìn ra hồ bơi nhưng họ đã chuyển chúng tôi đến một phòng xem lăng mộ. Chúng tôi phàn nàn và nhân viên tiếp tân thậm chí không nói xin lỗi, chỉ cần đặt một chiếc chìa khóa khác lên bàn và bảo chúng tôi vào phòng. Có một gia đình lớn ở đó và họ ồn ào, tiếp tục đi đến phòng của chúng tôi và mở cửa mà không cần gõ cửa. Nhà hàng cực kỳ nhỏ, chúng tôi chờ đợi để thiết lập một bàn mới, và thức ăn không được nạp thêm, không có gì để ăn nên chúng tôi rời đi. Nhân viên cần được đào tạo, rất thất vọng
Phòng đẹp,dịch vụ oke. Tiện nghi đầy đủ và nhân viên rất nhiệt tình. Sẽ ghé lại vào lần kế tiếp.
Khách sạn dễ thương, thoáng mát. Nhân viên thân thiện. Buffet sáng tuy ít món nhưng chất lượng ổn. Tôi sẽ ghé lại cùng gia đình

The cliff boutique viilage hoi an chỗ ở rất ok, không gian tuyệt vời, tuy nhiên có 1 số điểm trừ - trong phòng không có gạt tàn thuốc - không có đồ dặm chân - đồ ăn sáng món nước 2 ngày không có sự thay đổi. Tất cả giữ nguyên, nếu ở từ 2 ngày trở lên như nhà mình thì rất ngán

Nhân viên khách sạn siêu dễ thương. Tuy nhiên, tên và địa chỉ của khách sạn không giống so với hiển thị trên traveloka. Phòng cách âm không tốt, quá ồn.. Traveloka nên check và cập nhật lại thông tin chính xác để khách hàng đỡ nhầm lẫn..
Cũng tạm thôi, ảnh 10 điểm còn lại 3 điểm, hồ bơi ít khách quá k vệ sinh, view phòng nhìn bãi đất trống có mấy hàng xóm yên tĩnh kkk

Đây là villa mà vợ chồng tôi thích nhất khi đi du lịch ở hội an, chỗ ở yên bình và thoáng mát. Phòng ở rất sạch sẽ và đặc biệt gần biển an bàng. Chủ nhà đón khách rất nhiệt tình vui vẻ gần gũi như người trong nhà giá cả rẻ thuê phòng hợp lý bình dân. Nếu có lần sau du lịch tại hội an vợ chồng tôi sẽ chọn villa này để nghỉ ngơi du lịch.
Hồ bơi rộng, không gian yên tĩnh. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Dịch vụ quá tệ, đến cái quạt cũng ko có. Sẽ ko có lần sau.

Phòng có ban công rộng, thoáng, tầm nhìn ra sông và cánh đồng lúa thơ mộng! cho cảm giác yên bình, tĩnh lặng! tránh xa ồn ào của khu trung tâm đông đúc, thích hợp cho nghỉ dưỡng! chắc chắn gia đình mình sẽ quay trở lại ancient river villa cho chuyến du lịch lần sau! cảm ơn chị chủ nhà rất dễ thương và luôn nhiệt tình giúp đỡ!
Great place to stay very friendly staff
Very friendly owner. She helped us a lot.

Room was very damp - despite massive daily ventilation, moist walls, everything clammy. Our towels very more clammy and moist when we left than when we arrived. Room was ok clean - but moldy. Breakfast incl is one small dish/pers (ie 1 egg w/bread or 1 youghurt w/fruit or 1 pancake) only and 1 small drink. Everything else is extra. We didn t get the homestay/family feel here at all - conversation was at a minimum. The least interested/welcoming stay we have had in 5 weeks. Owner was helpful w trip to hué but expect 3-4 hrs drive each way as speedlimit is 60km/hr so not possible to combine ba na hills and hué in one day as we planned w owner. Travelling w/ kids we were disappointed pool was not cleaned/ready for use. Also no barrier around pool so be careful if u stay with children. Laundry service was excellent!

Such a nice place, the staff were really nice and the homestay is very cosy. The location is also good, not in the centre so very silence and is less than 10 minutes walking. Es un lugar precioso, el personal fue muy agradable y es muy pintoresco. Esta bien ubicado, no en eñ centro así que es silencioso y a menos de 10 pie del centro

Our time at the ahn family homestay was one of the best during our month-long stay in vietnam. The home is both beautiful and in a convenient location - a quiet, quaint, and friendly neighborhood but not far from the old town and famous tourist sites. Anh and the family took exceptional care of us! they made delicious breakfast to order each morning, gave us many tips for our itinerary and had both bicycles and motorbikes on site for us to rent. Our family of 4 loved our stay. Beds were exceptionally comfortable, rooms clean, and the pool was refreshing to enjoy after a day of exploring. They also arranged a driver to take us to da nang to our next hotel that was cheaper than a grab car or any other options we could find.
Nice hotel with cool pool. Good breakfast but no self-serve coffee and difficult to get served when it s busy.
Hotel a bit of a drive to get to all the places we wanted to go. Lovely decor. We enjoyed our 2 bedroom spacious suite. Great for families.

We loved the hotel and staff were amazing. Pool is wonderful but the boards around the pool are all cracked and damaged and very hot to walk bare feet on. They definitely need to upgrade same. Otherwise a fabulous hotel and absolutely beautiful staff.

The staff were extremely helpful and accommodating. They went over and beyond to help us. Unfortunately the room was just a bit tired and outdated. There was mould around the shower. I notified housekeeping and they tried to clean it but couldn t get it all off.

Safe area, staff very helpful, knowledgeable and friendly. Communal areas of hotel in good condition. The room, in particular the bathroom in need of refurbishment. Corridor outside room very noisy with other guests.
Great hotel, very helpful staff, good location - close to shopping and the beach via shuttle.
Breakfast food quality was poor...white tiles around the pool were slippery and dangerous..decking around pool was scorching hot..limited sun loungers..rooms were a good size with comfy beds
Comfy beds..poor food quality
Vriendelijk personeel die goede tips gaven. Gratis shuttlebus naar het oude centrum. Lekker ontbijt en een mooie zwembad
離老城區有點距離 早餐很美味 飯店附近有按摩店 超市 飯店櫃檯人員很用心 知道我們隔天要前往順化 還推薦我們可以去海雲關欣賞美景

A truly memorable stay at anio hoi an our stay at anio was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel is spotless, the beds incredibly comfortable, and the pool perfectly chilled, offered the ideal escape from the heat of vietnam. Breakfast was a daily highlight fresh, delicious, and with a wide variety to suit every taste. The location strikes a great balance peacefully tucked away from the hustle of hoi an s centre, yet still within easy walking distance to the heart of town. But what truly sets anio apart is the people. The staff were warm, welcoming, and genuinely attentive, going above and beyond to make our stay seamless and memorable. From the moment we arrived to the moment they waved us off in our taxi, we felt completely cared for. Special thanks to flora, ms hue, ms van, mr dolphin, and mr ken you turned a great stay into a special memory. I wouldn t hesitate to return to anio, and next time, i ll be staying even longer.
Tông màu đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, dịch vụ tốt, gần trung tâm
Kiến trúc khách sạn và nhân viên thực sự làm mình hài lòng

I would absolutely stay at anio again. The hotel is clean and new. The pool and breakfast are amazing. They have a free shuttle into the old town or to the beach. When we decided to take a grab to the old town instead it was under 2. Because it s not right in the old town it was nice and quiet. The employees at anio are all so helpful and kind. Snow, dolphin, phoebe were all especially welcoming. They also offer private transport to and from the airport for a very reasonable cost. Would absolutely recommend.
The hotel was fabulous and the staff so friendly and helpful. Can t recommend enough. Shuttle to and from old quarter very handy and always on time

Hotel was great! staff were even better. The room has some wear and tear but so minor it didn t impact our stay. The staff really try to create a memorable stay for you. Thank you to all of them for being so great and making our last few days in vietnam unforgettable!
Not clean and run down

Der herskede en fantastisk service og imødekommenhed fra alle ansatte på hotellet. God service vi satte pris på var venlige og smilende personaler mulighed for at låne cykler gratis selvom de godt kunne trænge til lidt bedre gear. -) en gratis behandling (massage), som var meget god. Fint udbud af morgenmad. Gode store værelser. Mulighed for shuttle bus til byen. Der var meget lydt, og det var generende at der sent om aftenen/natten var meget gøende hunde. Rengøringen vækkede os et par morgener lidt over kl.08 for at ville gøre rent. Det kunne godt være efter kl.10 der var alt for få liggestole og vi kunne desværre ikke ligge og sole os, da alt var optaget. Men alt i alt. Et skønt ophold.

Staff were amazing at this property. Very helpful, friendly and eager to ensure you were taken care of. From check in we had a thorough introduction to the local area and recommendations for places to visit. Very useful was a transfer service to the main town area which is otherwise a 20 minute walk or a roughly 50k vnd taxi. Sadly a few things about the property we didn t like. Firstly it didn t appear well sound insulated. You could hear the maid trolleys in the corridor. And secondly, the shower setup was not ideal. The shower was a rain head above the bath in its own cubicle. However with steps up to the bath and nothings to stop the water from splashing onto the steps you had to be very careful getting in and out. If you re slightly infirm i would take a look at the room pictures and make an informed choice. However the rest of the amenities in the room were very good. Particularly the air conditioning which was excellent and when used with the ceiling fan it kept the room nicely cool. Overall i would recommend this hotel and consider staying again.
Excellent room and service
Great food

This is a beautiful hotel with a large pool. A little out of the super busy old town area which makes it quiet and pleasant. The staff provides exceptional customer service. I highly recommend this hotel.
Good location between old town and beaches. Staff very helpful and use of bikes a great option to get around and see the local rice fields and beaches
Very very friendly staff great atmosphere with pool private and secure

A cosy hotel with nice staff. The service was non intrusive but they were always there when you needed them. The room was clean and spacious. There were a couple of pools, a spa and a small restaurant which was separate from the breakfast room. The breakfast was varied and the fresh pastries are a must. Easy access into the main area by a 10 minute cab ride.
Beautiful, quiet and relaxed.
Amazing staff and facilities to match.
立地が良かった
It is quite nice location a bit far from centre of city, good to stay with silent. Breakfast was amazing, all the staff supported and kindness, recommend to stay there.
It is quite nice location a bit far from centre of city, good to stay with silent. Breakfast was amazing, all the staff were greatly supported and kindness. Strongly recommend to stay there!

Veldig bra opphold på anio. God service med mange gode tips om hva vi kunne gjøre og hvor vi kunne spise i hoi an. Gratis sykkelutleie som anbefales å bruke! god frokost, og fine rom. Lytt ut til gangen. Totalt sett veldig fornøyd.

Anio boutique is a very nice hotel with excellent staff, very nice rooms, a great breakfast, very nice pool and spa facilities. It is a 15 minute walk from there to old town so that is a bit inconvenient, that and the bicycles could use some servicing. Otherwise, a fantastic place and i am glad i stayed there.

We chose anio because we were sold on the stock pictures online however we were disappointed at arrival to find the property and room darker and more rundown in reality. The room was comfortable and furnished with all essential amenities. The service was good overall with friendly and attentive staff. The pool was nice and adequate while the included breakfast buffet was tasty had a good variety. Considering this was a more expensive option in comparison to other similar accommodations in hoi an, we would likely opt for a cheaper alternative that s closer to ancient town on our next visit.
직원들이 진짜 친절하고 기분을 좋게합니다. 주변이 조용하고 깨끗해서 쉬면서 천천히 여행하기에 최적합된것 같아요.

What a beautiful hotel in hoi an! our family loved staying here and would recommend staying again. The staff were so friendly and polite, and nothing was ever too much trouble. A special mention to mr. Dolphin who made sure to greet us each day, remembering our names and making us feel like special guests. Thank you for a memorable stay.

Absolutely amazing stay, the staff and service was beyond fantastic and helpful. They helped organize private tours to ba na hills and marble mountain/lady buddha for such a great price. Beautiful scenery and the pool was so relaxing. A must stay in hoi an!!! will absolutely be back

Great convenient location, especially with the free shuttles available to guests. The staff were so responsive via whatsapp when it came to assisting with scheduling activities or private transportation.
Hotel bien situé dans hoian. Le parfait compromis entre proximité du centre ville et calme. Le buffet petit déjeuner inclus est extraordinaire !!!
We stayed at this hotel for six days and enjoyed to facilities and the good friendly nature of the staff. Every aspect of the experience was good and we have no negative comments to add.
Everything was great from our end

Fabulous hotel - stayed here 3 nights with grown up family. Great service throughout. Provided us with rooms very early after overnight train journey. Lovely spacious rooms. Breakfast probably the best we have had in a month of travelling. They provide a bus service ( every couple of hours which you need to book) to get into old town. However we walked or took taxi ( very cheap - grab bikes available but v few cars). Went out on hotel bikes - fine for a tip into town or out to paddy fields but no gears so not for serious cyclists overall great place - all family loved the hotel and hoi an - yes a bit too touristy but definitely worth a visit
Great hotel in a great location. Highly recommend

첫 호이안 여행인데 아니오 호텔은 너무 좋은 선택이었어요. 호텔 직원분들 대부분 친절했고, 프론트에 계셨던 분들 너무 감사했습니다. 저희 아이중 한 아이가 새벽에 갑자기 아파서 응급실에 가야했는데 프론트 직원 분들 빠른 대처 해주시고 다음날 새로 바뀐 직원 분들께서도 계속 아이의 안부를 물어주셔서 감동 받았네요. 방에서 에어컨 문제 등 말씀 드릴때마다 빠르고 친절하게 응대를 해주셔서 숙박 하는 동안 편안했습니다. 전용 셔틀이 있어서 올드타운까지 편안하게 다녀오고, 다낭의 다음 호텔로 이동할 때 까지 드랍 요청드려서 갔습니다. 항상 상냥했던 hiigh, flora, 개구쟁이 우리 아이들 너무 예뻐해준 ken. 너무 감사드립니다.

The staff were excellent, especially the lady who checked us in and out. We were given lots of great recommendations from where to eat to tailors shoemakers and sights to visit. The pool is clean with plenty of towels. The whole facility is very well cared for and staff very helpful.
좋아요친절하고가성비숙소에요

Hotel with nice design, beautiful rooms and pool area. Could use some smaller maintance work to be in a better condition. Wasn t too happy with the breakfast the first 2 days when the buffet was closed (i guess because of low occupancy) but for the last day they when they were serving buffet aggain it was fine. We got upgraded and they did a honeymoon set up for us, which was highly appreciated. Overall a good stay and i would definitely consider staying there again if visiting hoi an.

We booked pre covid expecting a relaxing holiday at a nice spa hotel but when we finally made it we were so disappointed. It was extremely noisy! children running up and down the hallway day and night people shouting at each other even though they are in the same room constant knocking on doors and shouting at family members and doors being left open setting off the alarms which were ignored! this would start any time between 5-6am and continued all day until 11-12pm. Pool areas were full of children running around screaming and shouting. Spa only provided massages (which were very good) but none of the other services were available (manicures, pedicures, facials etc) which we didn t find out until after we had booked in. We know of several people who booked out early and went elsewhere because of the noise. We would have done the same but we would have lost our credits and couldn t afford to go to another hotel. Also, we didn t know if the next hotel would have the same noise problem. The staff were lovely and tried their hardest to make things better but it was a lost cause.
룸 시설, 식사 , 직원들의 친절함은 매우 좋아요. 하지만 아침마다 들리는 주변 마을에서 하는 안내방송이 시끄러워요 . 닭소리까지 들려요. 방음도 잘 안되고, 아이들 복도에서 뛰는 소리 등 ㅜㅜ 층간 소음도 너무 심합니다.
Very friendly staff with useful recommendations. Nicely decorated. Pool and spa were great. Fantastic breakfast buffet plus chefs provided a made-to-order vegan entrees.
Great hotel, really nice pool and amazing staff. The breakfast is amazing !!
Very nice and kindly people.

One of the best hotel we stayed in vn. Breakfast was delicious many choices to pick from and fresh. The staffs were extremely friendly and helpful. I don t know how we would get around hoi an without their helped.
Staffs are very professional and helpful especially receptionist and concierge. They were always smile at us and other customers and try to give excellence customer service. Very impressive!

Beautiful hotel perfectly located a bit away from the noisy old quarter and 3 km away from the private beach (free access for hotel guests) that you can easily reach with the free bikes (or free shuttle) that the hotel provides. Rooms are spacious and very clean. Staff is very friendly and helpful. And breakfast is amazing - with both western and asian offerings.
Nice rooms, delicious breakfast, very friendly staff.
Beautiful hotel and wonderful staff the bathroom tiles could be freshened up with new grout
Good location and great staff.

Cute boutique hotel that was great value for the money. Conveniently located between the old town and the beach for us to go running on the rice fields early in the morning. And then we used the hotel shuttle or a grab to get where we wanted during the day.

We had an amazing stay at anio - the staff weee so friendly and helpful, the room was beautiful, and we absolutely loved our time by the pool. We were able to walk most places and on occasion utilised the shuttle or a taxi. We are a family of four from australia and i have no hesitation in recommending anio for your stay in hoi an.
The staff were wonderfully friendly and helpful.
The staff are phenomenal! everyone so friendly and helpful. They make you feel at home. Buffet breakfast is good. Room quite large and clean.
Everything was amazing
Definitely would recommend. Amazing staff and clean rooms
Loved the hotel, very welcoming and helpful. Rooms very clean and breakfast was amazing .
Great service! lovely room. Very clean throughout the hotel. Great breakfast

The staff are very friendly and helpful the food was great and well priced great location very quiet but still close to everything only complaint would be the shower is in a bath tub, very unsafe once the area was wet.
Friendly staff here and great service. The hotel staffs silvia,flora and lucky really help a lot when we stay here. They also got a free shuttle to beach and old town area.
조용하고 편안합니다. 무엇보다도 전 직원들이 매우매우 친절합니다.
호이안에 갈일이 있으면 꼭 추천하고 싶습니다. 직원들이 친절하고 편안함을 줍니다. 주변이 종요해서 쉬기도 좋고 호이난이나 안방비치까지 이동도 쉬워요

A family of 4, we enjoyed a superb stay in hoi an at the anio boutique hotel. From the moment of arrival, the staff could not have been more helpful. They are so genuine in their desire to ensure your stay goes as well as possible and everyone who worked there was a real credit to the hotel. The family room with 2 doubles was nice and spacious and the bathroom was big too. Breakfast was a real delight with 5 banks of food from pastries, fruit, asian cusine, western cuisine and an egg chef too.
