We ate at the restaurant too and can recommend the good quality and wide selection on the menu. Pool was also good, never too busy. Theres also a free bus service to and from hoi an and an bang beach. We used this a couple of times but it s a 40 dong taxi ride back so no issue if you dont want to stick to the timetable. All in all, we could not have been happier and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a base from which to discover hoi an and nearby areas.

The staff here was so polite and informative! they made sure we knew what amenities were available to us and helped connect us to any tours or transportation we needed. The hotel offers free breakfast and free shuttle which was so convenient. Hana and mr. Dolphin made our stay feel fun and safe!
Beautiful hotel. Close to everything. Loved how the staff all remembered our names.
The service and people were amazing. The food was excellent. Out weather as rainy but we found the old town to be really nice and amazing restaurants. I would definitely come back.

This hotel is aan 11 out of the staff couldnt be nicer a d more accomodating. The room was beautiful overlooking the pool with a balcony.we had dinner at restaurant and great selection and service. They gave us a late checkout since our flight wasn t till the evening. Amazing breakfast which was included in the price. Overall, great value for this hotel

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: A wonderful stay at anmira hotel in hoi an i recently had the pleasure of staying at anmira hotel in hoi an for three nights, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! from the moment i arrived, the warm hospitality of the staff made me feel welcome. They were always attentive, friendly, and eager to assist with any request. The hotel itself is beautifully designed, blending modern comfort with hoi an s charming aesthetic. My room was spacious, spotlessly clean, and well-equipped with everything i needed for a comfortable stay. The bed was incredibly cozy, and i loved waking up to a peaceful atmosphere each morning. The location close enough to explore the ancient town and nearby attractions, yet tucked away enough to provide a tranquil retreat. I also enjoyed the hotel s amenities, including the refreshing pool and delicious breakfast selection that featured both local and international options. Overall, my stay at anmira hotel exceeded my expectations. It s a perfect choice for anyone looking for a relaxing and enjoyable stay in hoi an. I highly recommend it and would definitely return on my next visit!

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: Meget godt ophold, virkelig flinkt personale. Der er en hane der galer sindssygt meget, men ellers 10/10.

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: Very nice, quiet and spacious room

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: Nice room, nice staffs

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: 여기는 저만 알고싶은, 가까운 사람들에게 추천하고 싶은 호텔입니다. 뭐 하나 빠지는것 없이 만족스러운 스테이는 오랫만이었네요. 침구도 바스락거리는 촉감에 푹 잘 수 있었고 무엇보다 조용해서 마음에 듭니다. 헤어스파도 추천합니다. 자전거 타고 올드타운으로 가는 길도 꽤 매력적입니다. 수영장에서 책 읽다 낮잠자는 시간도 기억에 남을것 같네요. 호텔 곳곳에서 느껴지는 편안함과 쾌적함이 가장 큰 메리트인것 같습니다. 스텝들도 늘 반갑게 맞아주시고 베트남의 친절함을 여기서도 경험하고 갑니다. 근처 칠랙스 카페의 논뷰도 좋았어요 걸어서 5분거리의 moonmilk에서 식료품 쇼핑도 추천합니다. 호이안에서의 처음과 마지막날을 이곳에서 머물러서 너무 좋았습니다. 가족들과 다시 꼭 방문하고 싶네요.

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection
userCmt: 低層で小規模なため こじんまりと居心地の良いホテルでした

hotelName: Anmira Resort & Spa Hoi An by The Unlimited Collection

Chị chủ nhiệt tình, cho khách mượn xe máy đi chơi.
Khách sạn thoải mái. Chị chủ rất thân thiện luôn
Được trải nghiệm hội an với areca homestay là 1 điều tuyệt vời và đúng đắn! lần sau sẽ vẫn chọn nơi này nếu ghé hội an
Thoải mái, nhân viên nhiệt tình
Lúc book cũng lo không biết phòng ốc thế nào, nhưng tới ở thấy sạch sẽ, thoải mái lắm. Nhân viên nhiệt tình dễ thương. Có dịp sẽ quay lại
Chủ thân thiện, nhân viên nhiệt tình

Nhìn trên hình thì không mong đợi gì, nhưng phòng ốc vượt ngoài sức mong đợi sạch sẽ và rất thoải mái. Tông màu xanh pastel giữa hội an khiến mình có cảm giác mát và thoải mái hơn hẳn. Nhân viên tiếp tân sáng cực kỳ dễ thương (chắc sẽ quay lại đây vì bạn nữ tiếp tân này), mình không được nhận phòng ngay, nên bạn lấy bản đồ chỉ cho mình những chỗ mình có thể đi vào buổi sáng trong lúc chờ đợi, hoàn toàn chủ động và nhiệt tình. Tụi mình có vấn đề gì đều hỏi thăm và rất vui vẻ vị trí cũng khá gần phố cổ, không xa mấy
Khách sạn rất chu đáo, nhiệt tình
Tốt chủ sở hữu là thân thiện. Phòng rộng rãi và sạch sẽ

Lần đầu sử dụng homestay ở đây nhưng rất ko hài lòng về dịch vụ phòng. Nhà vệ sinh thì hỏng hóc, nước nóng lạnh ko điều chỉnh được. Nói có ăn sáng nhưng lại là mì gói. Mất tiền thuê phòng nhưng lại có cảm giác như ở nhờ, cảm giác rất tệ!
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thân thiện.
Nhà sạch thoáng mát nhiều ánh sáng rất thích, sẽ còn quay lại

Mình book 1 phòng cho 3 người và chỉ ở lại 1 đêm thôi nhưng thật sự bất ngờ với chất lượng luôn í. Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, tone màu xanh mát mắt, thêm cả anh chị chủ lại cực dễ thương và nhiệt tình nữa. Một trải nghiệm thật sự rất tuyệtt. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình lắm. Ăn sáng alacarte nhưng cực ổn, các anh chị phục vụ rất chu đáo. Cảm ơn mọi người rất nhiều.

My daughter had recommended azalea to us after staying here last year and we were not disappointed. We were made to feel very welcome as soon as we arrived. Our room was spotlessly clean and modern, comfortable bed, good wifi and air conditioning. We were on the ground floor but we were not disturbed by any noise. Breakfast was served on the balcony upstairs and this was good quality and freshly made to order. The homestay is about a half hour walk to the old town and a half hour bike ride to the beach. You can hire bikes for a small fee. We arranged a trip through the homestay and this was added to our bill at the end as was our driver to hue. We stayed for 3 nights but wished we could have stayed longer. I wouldn t hesitate in recommending azalea homestay.
Great place for a hoi an base. Lovely hosts who were available for help all the time. Great breakfast. We had laundry done too.

I stayed several places during my almost three weeks in hoi an and azalea homestay was the one that was in the nicest condition. No signs of age to the rooms or guest areas. The rooms are quite spacious, completely clean, well-kept, comfortable and with welcomed amenities. The bathroom is also spacious and set up nicely. A nice ventilation system is in place. Didn t use a/c because it was cold enough already with the weather. There was a small fridge in the room along with hairdryer and hand soap in the bathroom - all things we appreciated. Breakfast (if included) is served on the upper veranda overlooking the river. Breakfast was appreciated. Coffee with milk didn t seem to have milk. Ordered omelets both days, first day it was good, second day it was great. Water filter on property was appreciated. Bike rental is inexpensive and condition of the bikes were quite good. Location is great as it is only a 5-10 minute bike ride into the old city. It s also located right along the river. Nearby there are restaurants. Luan, the madame of the guesthouse was helpful, friendly and professional. We felt quite welcome. There were a few miscommunications regarding prices charged and extending our stay luan was very accomodating and strived to make us very pleased guests, as she did. Overall, very nice value for what we paid.
Nice homestay, the owner is able to communicate well in english, rental of motorbike and bicycle are available. Overall enjoyed my stay.

This homestay was superb and we were sad to leave. The rooms are spacious and had lots of natural light. The air-con unit is silent. There is a mini bar with prices that match any local shop you visit (10,000 for water). Daily room cleaning if you want it. Tv with good movie channels. Breakfast is eggs, baguette and a plate of various fruit with a tea or coffee and this sets you up for the day. The family also cook local breakfast which are delicious. The staff are really friendly. We cooked and eat with the family on christmas day which was an amazing experience and made christmas really fun. We loved our stay here and would highly recommend to anyone.

2 nuits à hoi an dans un hôtel calme et quartier agréable.très disponible pour leurs clients,ils ont appelé pour nous régler un problème de futur réservation et réservé tous nos transports et visites.petit déjeuner correct et grandes chambres très propres.je vous recommande cet hôtel.

Ich kann diese unterkunft nur jedem wärmsten empfehlen. Wir wurden super herzlich empfangen und man sieht, dass die ganze gamilie tatkräftig mitarbeitet. Das hotel ist klein aber sehr schön. Wir bekamen das schönste und grösste zimmer. Das frühstück war aussreichend, man konnte am abend vorher a la cart auswählen. Zur altstadt hat man nur ca 15 minuten zu fuss. Gratis fahrradverlei im hotel. Div ausflugsmöglichkeitrn und tipps werden vom hotel organisiert. Wir haben die cookingclass gemacht und diese war super. Ein grosses dankeschön!
This is very nice family run hotel. They are very kind and helpful. It was about a 15 minute walk to the old town and market. I would definitely stay here again.

A bit of a walk from the main area of hoi an. No onsite restaurant, the place they suggested nearby was an obvious tourist trap and not very good. People running the place were very friendly. Hotel seemed clean. Breakfast was quite limited, but made-to-order. Absolutely delicious coffee!
Lovely hotel, with charming and helpful staff. The free bicycles made travelling around hoi an convenient and fun

This was a neat, small, modern property cool, clean and lovely staff. My only criticism is that you had to pre select your breakfast the night before and the choice was from a menu of about eight items.
Great size room and big balcony perfect location for beach and the old town

We arrived at the property one late evening, a day after a massive typhoon swept through. We had travelled long and had 2 very tired and hungry kids ... There was a massive power outage at the property and in all the immediate surrounding areas. In all, it was pitch black ..... We could not stay at the property for obvious reasons but the owner, tan, was extremely generous and compassionate. He took us in, made us comfortable with what little he had and took me around patiently on his motorbike to find other hotels in the nearby town where there was power, while my family waited in his home. After helping to secure a room, he transported us and our luggage to the hotel in his car. He refused anything we would offer as a gesture of thanks, wished us well and went on his way. He also promptly refunded all monies paid to secure his property. Our biggest regret was not being able to return his generosity. It was an absolutely amazing start to what could have been a tough stay given the typhoon devastation - i am sure his property would have been exactly as how it is depicted in expedia. I hope we can return the kindness with a long stay in the future. Hoi an is a absolute must see place (typhoon or not) - rich tapestry of history, culture and cuisine.
Hotel owner couple is very friendly, willing to assist on our requests. Location is not far from the ancient town, quiet and safe to walk around.
Die chefin ist hilfsbereit und beratet einen sehr gut. Habe meinen urlaub um eine woche verlängert im babylon .

The owners were very hospitable, friendly, and helpful. They had motorbikes and bicycles on site to rent from which was very convenient. Spacious room, good breakfast, and loved their iced coffee. They even picked up some banh mi for us upon our request for departure. Overall great service!
The villa is located in quite area and room condition is very nice. And the owner of the villais very friendly and kind. It takes about 15minutes to main tourist attractions on foot.

A fantastic small family hotel, where the host couple were extremely friendly and helpful. They do everything to ensure that the guests have a good stay. For example, we were picked up in their private car from somewhere in the city and driven to the hotel. We were driven to the beach, to tailors in the old town, help to book a private driver who drove us to our next stop. On the trip to hue, we stopped at the marble mountains. A place worth visiting. We also stopped at a beautiful lake. All this was arranged by our host couple. We give them our very best recommendations. Definitely a good place to live.

I love to stay here. My family love this villa. Family friendly. The room is clean and very spacious. Good for a big family. I like the connecting room. I like the place so quiet at night. The person in the lobby give you a free ride. Hot meal at breakfast. Swimming pool is good. People are very hospitable. Affordable prices!!!
Tan hosted us during our stay and service was 10/10! he would drop us off at old town if his car was free as well. Amazing place.

Nicht buchen!!! bett war nicht frisch bezogen!!! beim betreten des zimmers viel uns sogleich auf, dass das duvet (bettbezug), welches eigentlich weiss war, teilweise gelblich war und entsprechend nicht frisch gewaschen aussah und roch. Leider bestätigte sich unser verdacht! wir hatten um 12 00 uhr ausgeckeckt und weil es mir gesundheitlich nicht gut ging, waren wir bereits um 12 10 wieder im hotel und fragten, ob wir nochmal in das selbe zimmer gehen dürfen. Die frau an der reception sagte, dass das zimmer schon geputzt worden sei, wir aber trotzdem wieder rein gehen können (haben nochmals 1 nacht bezahlt). Nicht ganz unerwartet stellten wir fest, dass der bettbezug nicht gewechselt wurde, da der eine fleck auf dem bettbezug immer noch am selben ort war. Nur die duschtücher wurden gewechselt. Sehr, sehr schade, denn das personal war sonst sehr zuvorkommend. Aber das mit der bettwäsche geht gar nicht!!!

Phòng tắm rất rộng với cả bồn tắm và vòi hoa sen. Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng và thoải mái. Họ nên đặt gói dầu gội trong phòng tắm mặc dù. Chỉ có những thanh xà phòng. Chúng tôi đã đến một cửa hàng tạp hóa gần đó để mua một số thứ nên không có vấn đề gì nhưng nếu họ có chúng ngay thì thật tuyệt vời.

Căn phòng khá nhỏ không có tv. Nó hơi cũ và ẩm mốc, có mùi khó chịu mà tôi không biết từ đâu đến. Wc không có rèm, cửa sổ không cản sáng nên rất sáng và nóng (mình phải trùm khăn vào cửa sổ để giảm bớt ánh sáng). Nhìn chung, tình trạng phòng không tốt lắm (đặc biệt là có mùi khó chịu trong phòng nhỏ), dịch vụ tạm ổn. Chỉ với 330k/đêm thì kỳ vọng không cao lắm. Nhưng nếu có cơ hội đến hội an lần nữa, tôi sẽ không chọn khách sạn này nữa, trừ khi họ khắc phục tình trạng phòng.

Mình khá ấn tượng vì có 2 gương lớn để soi, tủ áo quần rộng, bàn trang điểm nhiều ngăn toilet sạch, khá rộng. Điểm trừ là không có quạt thông gió trong toilet, nước hơi yếu, điều hoà hơi yếu, phải chờ lâu mới mát, phòng cách âm chưa quá tốt. Anyway, mình đã có trải nghiệm tốt, rất đáng để mình quay trở lại.
