Chị chủ thân thiệt nhiệt tình, có các dịch vụ đi kèm như thuê xe, đưa đón sân bay luôn. Nhưng phòng không cách âm lắm, sáng đang ngủ nhưng phòng kế bên ra ngoài hát cái là tỉnh giấc )) nhưng nếu có dịp sẽ quay lại homestay ạ
Phòng mới và sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, gần phố cổ.
Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, thơm tho, chủ homestay nhiệt tình
Phòng giống hình sạch sẽ thoáng mát nên thuê nhé mọi người
Phòng sạch sẽ chị chủ dễ thương
Nhân viên lễ tân quá kém, thái độ phục vụ tệ. Nơi để xe và quầy lễ tân dơ. Mình rất bực về thái độ của nhân viên và quyết định không nhận phòng mặc dù đã thanh toán.

Thực sự là quá ổn so với tầm giá 200k/đêm. Chị chủ tốt bụng , hiền làm mình thấy rất thoải mái. Phòng gọn gàng, sạch sẽ và thơm tho như đang ở chính nhà mình vậy. Nếu có cơ hội quay lại hội an thì địa điểm này sẽ được mình note lại
Tuy chỉ được rate ở 2 sao nhưng phòng rất là đầy đủ tiện nghi và dễ chịu, không gian thoáng mát và ánh sáng đầy đủ.
Chỉ nghỉ tại đây 1 đêm ngắn thôi nhưng rất thích . Nhất định sẽ quay lại đây 1 lần nữa
Phòng sạch sẻ, gọn gàng, đầy đủ tiện nghi.. Tụi mình rất hài lòng. Vị trí dễ tìm. Đặt grab đồ ăn cũng dễ
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ và khá tiện nghi lễ tân thân thiện homestay có các loại xe máy cho khách thuê, không có xe đạp gần phố cổ và các điểm tham quan, ăn uống
Nhân viên nói rằng chúng tôi là người thái đầu tiên ở đây. 55 nhìn chung, chỗ nghỉ được đánh giá 8/10, được coi là rất tốt.
Nơi đây có bạn chủ nhiệt tình và thân thiện, địa điểm thuận tiện cho việc tham quan phố cổ. Phòng dễ thương, sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh. Cảm ơn ạ!
Chị chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình và support nha, hỗ trợ mình check-in sớm, có mỗi 1 điều là nước nóng yếu quá hic
Phòng sạch sẽ, đi đến chợ đêm rất gần, nhân viên thân thiện, đáng để trải nghiệm lắm nha
Nhân viên thân thiện. Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời 10 điểm. Mọi người nên thử nha.
Homestay này không có điểm nào để chê. View quán hơi bị mờ mờ ê mê cả chị chủ quán nữa cũng bị mờ..haizz mờ lem á
Dịch vụ tốt , nhân viên thân thiện , phòng sạch sẽ , phòng đẹp , nên ở nha
Tuyệt vời lắm nha, giá rẻ nữa ạ. Phòng như khách sạn í, nhưng mà mỗi cái là đi thang bộ không có thang máy nha. Nên mẹ bầu cân nhắc, còn lại đều 10 điểm
Homestay dễ thương sạch sẽ, chị chủ nhiệt tình thân thiện, gần phố cổ và rất tiện. Rất đáng trải nghiệm nha mọi người
Bữa sáng ngon miệng và hữu ích còn gì nữa. Cảm ơn đội ngũ trong mơ của các cô gái
Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Villa yên bình, cây xanh bao quanh, hồ nước sach sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện
Nice rooms , able to use resort across road with beach and pool. Nice breakfast and clean through out. Helpful at reception

Brand new hotel near to the beach with friendly and helpful staff. Lovely rooms and great beds. We had two connecting rooms which was perfect for us and two teenagers. The buffet breakfast was excellent.

The staff is very nice and helpful. The owner is present and she is extremely nice. The property is located on cua dai and is about a 7 minute drive from an bang beach. It s also about a 15 minute drive from the central part of the old town in hanoi. The room was very clean and comfortable, but the seaside view that was listed in the reservation wasn t visible. Instead my view was of some trees, with the beach behind those. But it was ok )

Wij hebben daar een fantastische tijd gehad. Zeer vriendelijk personeel die er alles aan doet om je vakantie zo mooi mogelijk te maken. Wij zijn daar geweest vanwege ons 50 jarig huwelijk. Mijn man had dat doorgegeven en onze kamer was versierd met rode rozen en harten van rozen blaadjes op ons bed. En een heerlijk taartje stond klaar. Een complete verrassing. Mooie kamer, schoon, elke dag schone handdoeken. Voor het strand badlakens.. Een prima ontbijtbuffet. Dus voor herhaling vatbaar.
客がすくなかったせいか ちょうしょくの内容 たいおうに 問題点 フロントの若い女性は 携帯ばかりいじって 対応が悪い

Vi hadde et veldig fint opphold i viet long hotel. Eieren var veldig opptatt av at vi hadde det bra og ga god service. Det er et lite hotel som ligger bare kort vei fra stranden. Bassenget var lite, men siden vi fikk bruke annlegget til hoi an silk beach club som hadde stort basseng og strand stoler var dette noe av det beste man kan få for pengene. Gratis badehåndkle var også tilgjengelig. Vi hadde connecting room, store og fine rom og godt rengjort frokosten kan forbedes, tips er å sette fram kjøleskap til pålegg (kjøtt, ost og syltetøy) slik at de holdt seg friske, og legge til mulighet til suppe (pho).vil anbefale dette stedet til de som ønsker et avslappende opphold nær stranden.

Hotel ligt in een rustig gedeelte net iets buiten het centrum. Het strand recht voor de deur is inderdaad mapot maar als men 10 meter naar links of rechts loopt is er een redelijk breed strand met ook genoeg schaduw van de palmbomen.
Wonderful staff, nice breakfast, convenient beach access. Fridge never chilled, limited outdoor space. But, very kind and accommodating staff. 4.5 stars
Easy to get to old town and beach
A lovely hotel, well located near the beach, restaurants and the shops. The staff were friendly and the rooms were well presented and maintained. It had a lovely, relaxing atmosphere

Hotel is across the road from the silk resort which they have a deal with so you can use the facilities. Silk is on the beach. The view from their photos is not at all what you actually get. It s clean and the staff are nice but i would rather stay at an bang beach. If you do go make sure you have coffee and cake and the bakery behind the hotel.
Great hotel with very friendly yet professional staff. I stayed for 4 nights but hotels.com has not given my rewards (sad face) theres no straight forward way to inquire.
Nice hotel which very comfortable. But a bit far away from the ancient city hoi an so i have to take a taxi to there every time.
Loved this little gem! new, clean, central to ancient town, cu dai beach and an bang. Lovely staff! food in the restaurant was really good too. Would stay here again in the future for sure!!
The picture of the beach across the road is a bit far fetched. The bed is a bit firm but a nice place
The staff was very helpful. Great service. My only complaint is that the beds were very harder, seemed to be more than the average vietnam bed.

Nous avons séjourné 2 nuits dans ce joli petit hotel de bord de mer - les chambres si tres grandes, agréables, tres propres. Parapluies à dispositions qui nous ont été d une grande aide lors des averses !! - le buffet du petit déjeuner est très bon et varie (continental et local) - la piscine est agréable, meme si en bord de route. - accès à la plage en 1 minute. Par contre pas la plus jolie plage du vietnam ... En somme hotel tres bien, mais si nous devions retourner à hoi an nous choisirions d être dans la vieille ville tellement elle est belle et il est agréable y flâner.
Great!

The hotel is located literally across the road from the beach, and we could access the amazing pool in the resort across the road by staying here too. The pool at the actual viet long hotel is okay, but just much (much) smaller. Is an okay hotel, but for the price in other parts of vietnam we got a lot more than we did here. Very friendly staff and top breakfast option also.
Top experience at this hotel.

The bel marina is a beautiful hotel, tranquil yet still just 5 mins walk to the main part of the old town. Staff are lovely, the hotel is spotlessly clean and breakfast really good. I d recommend anyone to stay here.

A wonderful hotel. The staff was extremely courteous and kind. We opted for the honeymoon package, which was worth every penny. The vice manager was very hospitable and even brought a singer and her escort to our romantic dinner. We also had a fantastic massage as part of the package. Truly the best we ve had in vietnam. Far better than the street parlors and way more professional. The personal touch, great facilities and overall level of the hotel make it an easy yes . Will definitely stay there again.

Bel hotel bien situé, proche du centre toute en etant au calme. Nous avions une trés belle chambre en angle avec vue sur la riviére et jolie terrasse. Le petit dejeuner est varié dans une belle salle de restauration interieure et exterieure. Deux belles piscines. Le personnel très accueillant et disponible. Très bon choix
ホイアンランタン祭りの前日と当日に2連泊した 旧市街に手軽に歩いて行ける距離で 周辺にリーズナブルなレストランもたくさんあった ホテルスタッフもフレンドリーで 機会があればまた宿泊したい

The staff at this hotel were outstanding. Every member of staff including the cleaning staff upwards were extremely friendly and polite. They were magnificent - everyone. There was a lot of noise from the pool area all day and evenings every day, which slightly marred our stay. Many guests stayed for just a few nights only, and were noisy banging doors and talking loudly at all hours. But overall a very good hotel. Will definitely return

We stayed at bel marina for a family wedding and the staff in every area couldn t have been warmer and more helpful, check in, dining, pool/gardens etc. Our room was spacious and well equipped, with great air con. The pools and gardens were beautifully maintained and help was given when requesting taxi bookings and recommendations. Food options a breakfast were wide and variable, and evening meals that we had were exceptional. This hotel is riverside with beautiful views, and walkable in to the old town and vibrant market areas, and wonderfully peaceful to return to.

아침 조식과 숙소 청결상태는 정말 좋았습니다. 매일 아침 직접 만들어주는 계란 요리가 최고였어요 다만, 잠 잘때 소음을 잘 막아주는 방은 아니에요. 저의 경우 새벽마다 옆 방에서 엄청 큰 티비소리와 통화소리 때문에 잠을 잘 못자기도 했습니다. 윗층의 의자소리나 옆방 소음에 예민하시다면 피하시는걸 추천드리고, 금요일에만 이루어지는 저녁 바베큐의 경우 이용하지 않으셔도 될 것 같아요. 라이브 공연은 멋졌지만, 음식은 조식때 나온 음식 고기, 새우가 추가된 구성이며, 그마저도 계속 구워주지 않아 차갑고, 먹을게 없었습니다
スタッフが親切 街中なので歩きで行動できる 無料レンタル自転車でも行動できる
Lovely position but rooms probably need a little update. Staff friendly and helpful

Bel marina is definitely a 5-star resort in hoi an. The property was amazing, the rooms were spotless, the customer service was excellent, and their pools were amazing to relax in! i would recommend this property to people who are looking to relax a bit outside of the hustle and bustle of the old town as it is about a 10-minute walk to the old town.
Very kind
Great hotel with a very nice location with view to the river. Really nice room with nice view from the balcony. Clean and great. Great pools. Very nice breakfast. Friendly and helpful staff.
Staff were very friendly and helpful. 10/10

We loved this hotel! the breakfast was amazing! the pool area and staff were amazing and the room was beautiful! i will definitely be booking here again if i come back to hoi an and will recommend this hotel to anyone who asks.

Beautiful property in the center of hoi an. The outdoors are absolutely stunning. They have free bicycles. The staff is really helpful. My recommendation is to take a room with a pool view or lake view as the town view can be noisy.

Just a kilometre from the old town, bel marina was a fabulous oasis from the hustle bustle of hoi an. We loved the big pool outdoor area, and the breakfast room and the food offerings were outstanding. My only complaint would be the password free wifi, which, according to my online security service, wasn t very secure.

Great hotel. I would give it 5 stars however we couldn t have a proper shower. The shower bath combined set up is very bad. Get a room without the bath if it is possible. You can not stand under the shower like normal. There is a big gap between the wall and the bath. Water gets all over the bathroom floor everywhere.
Good location, amenities, but loud and can be very restrictive.
Location was great
또 가고싶은 리조트예요 올드타운 접근성이 매우좋고 저는 빌라형이였는데 너무나 편안하고 좋았습니다. 호이안에 가는 여행객에게 유명한 이유가 있었습니다.

Great location, a short walk away from the old town and night market. Lots of restaurants and coffee shops neaby. Scarlet on reception was really friendly and efficient at check in. Great pool, lots of sun loungers and a swim up bar. Fab pina colada

객실 상태와 프론트 데스크 서비스는 좋습니다. 6층 객실을 묵었는데, 7층에 수영장이 있어서 아침 7시부터 밤 10시까지 물장구 소리, 7층 데크 걷는 소리로 인해 방 전체가 완전 울려요(스피커로 쿵쿵 울리는 듯이). 티비 소리가 묻힐 정도 입니다. 임산부여서 태교여행으로 갔는데 아침부터 너무 시끄러워서 매우 불쾌했습니다. 7시 전에 일어나실 분이 아니면 비추.
周辺観光地へのアクセスが良 部屋も広くてきれい プールも一番深い場所で1.7mあり 快適に泳げました
Great location in the old town!
직원 분들이 너무 친절하십니다. 지나가다 마주치면 모두들 인사해 주셔서 3일 내내 기분 좋았습니다.
Det var et fantastisk sted, super venlig personale, rent, meget udbred og lækkert morgenmad, alt hvad men forventer til af et 5stjerne hotel
灯篭流しの川迄徒歩5分観光に便利でした 朝食も美味しかったです 一番はホテルのスタッフさんがみんな明るく親切で気持ちが良かったです ホイアン観光にお勧めです
Fab hotel, very clean and good location for a stay in hoi an
올드타운 도보거리 장점. 직원들의 서비스 개선 의지는 있지만 추천하기는 어려움. 조식도 별로임.

We loved the intimacy of the resort and the incredible attentiveness of the staff. The location was also fantastic, being right on the river and walking distance into the old town. The spa was wonderful and the staff were very knowledgeable. We felt very safe and taken care of. We would definitely come back.
Veldig bra resort, topp service
Excellent service
The staff were gorgeous, the location amazing and the hotel was lovely. We traved as a family of 13 and booked 5 rooms and we will definitely go back.

Our rooms are very clean. The grounds are beautiful and well kept. The staff is so nice and helpful. The breakfast offers so many choices of delicious foods from vietnamese, korean and american cuisines. I highly recommend staying at this resort.
Could do better with the fruit. Very clean only noise from across the road and side of hotel they are building new hotels
The staff were fabulous the food was great and the location amazing

Nice and quiet hotel next to the old town. Rooms were good though the shower with bath -combination is highly unpractical - as you shower the entire bathroom floor will be wet easily. Breakfast was good, only coffee machines should be replaced as they are extremely slow. They have 2 swimming pools and a small gym with no air conditioning. Generally friendly service and staff.

What a fantastic stay perfect location the service and helpfulness from staff was great very impressed a special thanks to ly we really appreciate all your help especially before we arrived. Many thanks to all staff which made our stay thoroughly enjoyable
Very central to the main location with walking distance, lots of coffee, places, and dining areas. Very friendly staff with great service. Highly recommend this place.

Our 5th time back at bel marina (was silk marina). Love the staff (particularly tu, loan and hien), great location, good food and very clean. The only negative was the sunset cocktail boat rip, i would not recommend at all. Apart from that a fantastic stay again
5월15일부터 3박 디럭스커넥팅룸 숙박했어요 방크기 넉넉해요 침대편안하고 수영장 직원서비스 모두 만족했어요,다만 인피니티풀이 공사중이라 아쉬윘어요
Absolutt et sted og bo. Vi hadde en villa med to soverom og alt var utmerket. Fantastisk service, god frokost og super beliggenhet. Anbefales!
Amazing hotel with a stunning pool. River view rooms are beautiful with a huge comfortable bed. Two minutes walk in town.
Fabulous location, close to the night markets and old town. Nice room and facilities. Staff were friendly and helpful.

The room was clean, spacious and extremely comfy. Came very well equipped with lovely decor. The pool areas are gorgeous, both the main one and on the rooftop. Staff were excellent and the food/drink was good. The only dissapointment is that there was nowhere to refill drinking water which is a surprise for a 5 hotel, and to buy bottled water was expensive.

Enjoyed the views of the river and the pool from our balcony. Very tranquil and the rooms were decent sized. Staff were very attentive and went the extra mile to make sure we were comfortable even after a delayed check in. Highlight of the trip was using the bicycles to visit the city centre free of charge. Would come back!
My friends and i loved our stay here. Choice of nice pools, great staff, amazing massages, good buffet breakfast too
The staff are exceptionally friendly.
접근성이 좋고 직원분들 친절합니다 두번째 이용했어요

Excellent location in the old town. All facilities were excellent. The room was huge and the buffet breaky was great. Spa was reasonably priced for relaxing treatment. You can use a bicycle for free which we found to be super cool. Would highly recommend staying here for friendly and convenient service.
スタッフのuyenさんのホスピタリティが大変良かったです
Excellent hotel
Was fabulous overall. Anyone visiting hoi an should consider this hotel. You will not be disappointed!
Staff are viery friendly and helpful. Breakfast a bit disappointing, not too much fruits to choose from.
Great service

English below スタッフの方は親切な方が多く快適に過ごすことができました 朝ごはんは会場の雰囲気がよくとても美味しかったです メニューが毎日ほぼ同じだった点は残念でした ただ 息子分も含めて3名分で追加料金も払って予約しているのに タオルは2セット分しかなく お願いしても次の日にはまた2セット分しか置いておらず...毎日電話でお願いする必要があり面倒でした 他のホテルでは2日目以降は3セットの準備に変更になっている経験があったので残念でした ホテルの送迎サービスを予約したのですが 車内がタバコ臭くとても残念でした タバコの臭いが気になる方は事前にお願いした方が良さそうです プールの水は濁っていて清潔そうではなかったので子連れの方は要注意です english --- the staff were generally kind, and we had a pleasant stay. The breakfast was delicious, but it was a bit disappointing that the menu was almost the same every day. However, there were a few issues - even though we paid extra for a reservation for three people, including our son, only two sets of towels were provided. Even when we requested more, only two sets were left again the next day, and we had to call every day to request an extra set, which was inconvenient. At other hotels, the number of towels was adjusted to match the number of guests after the first day, so this was disappointing. - we reserved the hotel s shuttle service, but the car smelled of tobacco, which was very unpleasant. If you are sensitive to cigarette smells, it s probably best to make a request in advance. - the pool water was cloudy and didn t seem very clean, so families with children should be cautious! ---
Came here for 40th birthday. Great stay and close to everything
친절한 직원들, 괜찮았던 조식, 올드타운과의 근접성 어느것 하나 불만스러운 것이 없었어요.
The staff were very attentive and went out of their way to help with any needs.
The management and staff are superb! the property is so comfortable--wonderful beddings--great breakfast-excellent location and wonderful homebase for our 3 week stay in vietnam.
The bel marina is a great place to stay for families. The service was wonderful, staff extremely friendly and helpful. Enjoy great food, beautiful pool and gardens. Highly recommended
기분좋은 여행 이었습니다 추천
This hotel was perfect, the staff were helpful and friendly, perfect location, food was excellent. Our stay here was amazing we will be back.
Rooms were nice, beds were comfy, view looks out over torn down buildings, bathroom and shower was a little small. Food also could be much better.
Comfortable stay friendly staff
처음으로 호이안 와서 첫 숙소 조식빼고 모두 만족합니다 특히 옥상 수영장 굿 메인 수영장도 굿 모든것 최고 입니다
Wonderful property. Location is only a few minutes from the markets and ancient town. The hotel has absolutely everything you need. It is a very special hotel

Stayed here w/ my family of we got 2 rooms that were connecting on the 1st floor. It was perfect. The pool was great for adults and kids. All the staff were friendly and helpful. It was nice and quiet area in hoi an. The only con was the walls are thin and you can hear everything. But we would stay there again.

Bel marina was an absolute pleasure to stay at. The staff were friendly and personable. The room was spacious and well appointed. Everything you need was within arms reach. Some real food gems are all within walking distance. Fantastic place to stay we will return
너무 친절한 직원들의 호의와 깨끗한 객실 자주 해주는 하우스 키핑 등 너무 좋앗습니다
Big room

Deluxe town view 체크인후 방에 짐을 풀고 에어컨을 켰을때 오래된 꿉꿉한 냄새가 심하게 나서 약 30분간 환기를 했지만 냄새가 계속 났다. 프론트로가서 방 업그래드 요청을 했고 마침 저렴한 추가 비용을 지불하고 marina room으로 옮길수 있었다. 방은 쾌적했고, 편안하게 쉴수 있었다. 건물 앞 풀장도 수영하고 즐기기 좋았으며, 안전요원이 항상 수영하는 사람을의 안전을 관리하고 있었다. 조식은 보통이었다. 안방비치로 무료 왕복하는 셔틀도 한번쯤 이용해 볼만하다. 리셉션직원들도 친절해서 좋은 인상을 받았던 숙소 였다.
Vennlig og setvice minded personal. Bra frukost, deilig pool!
Fantastic stay. Can t wait to go back. Resort style hotel close to everything.
Great resort
We had a great stay and were very impressed with all aspects of this property.
청결하고 자연과 함께 하지만 닭 울음소리, 개 짖는 소리 가 새벽에 들릴 때가 많아요 방음은 안됩니다.

Located on the river. 5 min walk to old town and night market. Many dining options along the river. Try my grandma cooking right on the river. Guides will push mango mango. Definitely overpriced compared to other places
Check in staff was very courteous and helpful.

Best stay at the hotel! we stayed in the marina villa and were treated like royalty. The staff are incredible and the property pristine. A stone throw to old town. Great massage in the spa. Highly recommend

ハノイからホイアン観光のためにダナン空港経由で行きましたが 迎えの車のドライバーさんが大変親切で更に運転も上手で安心してホテルに向かうことができました チェックイン前に到着しましたが フロントスタッフも親切に対応して頂きました 静かで 便利な場所のホテルで 更にスカイプールからの眺めも良く気持ちよく泳ぐ事ができました 部屋にはウェルカムサインや果物が用意されており 最高の気分で過ごす事ができました
호이안 올드타운 도보 5분거리라 접근성이 좋고 리조트가 이국적이고 수영장 뷰가 좋았습니다. 아이들이 더 좋아하네요
위치도 좋고 서비스도 만족스러웠음
수영장, 객실상태, 관광지까지 거리 등 모든게 최고입니다. 다음에 또 방문 생각이 있는 호텔입니다.

Hotellet er flot og poolen dejlig. Men der manglede hele tiden den ekstra gode service. Morgenmaden var ikke noget specielt og modtagelsen ved morgenmaden var nærmest kommanderende. Vores værelse blev først gjort rent sent eftermiddag, det virkede som om man ikke rigtig gad gøre det rent, og det lugtede fugtigt. Vi blev opgraderet da vi henvendte os om dette. Der var højtskrigende børn og lige så højlydte forældre.

This was our third time at this resort and the previous stay was just prior to covid. This resort has expanded and we stayed in the new wing which was gorgeous and as we were on the 7th floor we were right near the rooftop pool, which i used every morning. Some of the staff remembered us from our previous stay which was nice. We received a very warm welcome on our arrival and outstanding service for the entire stay. All staff were exceptionally friendly and the guys manning the pool went over and beyond. It was my sister s birthday during our stay and reception organised a cup cake and candle and we all sang happy birthday during breakfast which was so nice. Adding to this, the cleaning staff put a happy birthday message made from flowers and towels in the shape of a cake on the bed. Location is superb, massage and laundry across the road at very good prices. Old town just down the road and we used the bicycles a couple of times during our stay which was fun. We caught the shuttle bus to the beach most days and stayed there for a couple of hours. Thanks for such a nice experience and look forward to returning in 2025!
올드 타운 접근성 최고입니다.
Beautiful hotel and staff close to everything
Brilliant service amazing stay

This resort is perfect. The staff are more than wonderful. They re so hospitable, friendly and just lovely humans. Breakfast was amazing. My room with a river view was immaculate and was a luxury to come back to after great days touring hoi an and danang. The location is fantastic and in walking distance to everything. I would stay here again in a heartbeat highly recommend booking here. You will not be disappointed!

非常によいリゾートでした ホイアン中心地まで徒歩すぐの立地でありながら 敷地内は非日常のロケーションです 敷地内のプールは プールサイドのチェアで過ごす欧米人が多く 静かに過ごすことができます 周りに高い建物がなく 屋上からはホイアンを一望できます 屋上プールは 暖かい日であれば入りながらのんびりしたい素晴らしいロケーションでした スタッフの方の対応もよかったです 滞在の説明が丁寧で すれ違うたびに気さくな挨拶をしてくれて 安心して滞在できました お部屋は清潔で お風呂のお湯も問題なく出ました ホイアン滞在の際には ぜひオススメのリゾートです
친절한 매니저와 청결한 객실에 숙박내내 기분이 좋았어요

Lovely hotel and great location! we stayed here a few nights and enjoyed walking about to the main old centre. Staff are lovely and helpful, enjoyed the hotel rooms and breakfast which had everything we needed.

It took me by surprise how charming and welcoming this resort is. It is located in the heart of hoi an, walking distance to night market and hoi an old town. Attention to details is awesome. They even had my bed decorating with a welcoming message and added an extra twin bed for my 11 years old without my request. I ll definitely be back.
Great room, quite large with a balcony over looking the pool. Great breakfast each morning and the staff were very helpful and so friendly.

We stayed for 3 nights in adjoining apartments because we had our 2 teenage daughters with us. Absolutely loved our stay, brilliant from check in to check out. Everything was wonderful and would definitely stay again. Great location, facilities and staff were so helpful and friendly.
Amazing resort! very premium rooms and the breakfast pho was great. Little bit of a walk to get into the main part of town but they also have bikes.
Lovely hotel and location. Staff were attentive. I will definitely stay again.

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Tuyệt vời 10/10 nhân viên rất rất dễ thương luôn phục vụ tận tình phòng sạch đẹp mừi điểm nhen

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn rộng rãi, thoải mái, hồ bơi rộng, nhân viên phục vụ vui vẻ, nhiệt tình

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Ok hài lòng tuy nhiên ở hồ bơi nên có áo phao và phao bơi cho em bé thì hợp lý hơn

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Một kỳ nghỉ hết sức tuyệt vời nhân dịp sinh nhật con gái nhỏ của gia đình mình. Sự tinh tế khi chuẩn bị thiệp chào mừng, rồi đến phần bánh chúc mừng sinh nhật từ dịch vụ của khách sạn mặc dù mình không hề báo trước. Nếu báo trước khách sạn sẽ chuẩn bị chu đáo hơn nữa. Điều mình thích là mặc dù chỉ ở 1 hôm, nhưng lúc đi ăn tối thì phòng lại được dọn dẹp sạch sẽ trở lại như ban đầu, khác với những nơi khác mình từng đi. Phòng mình chọn cũng rất đẹp và mát, 2 view và có ban công, nếu được nên có 1 bộ bàn trà ở ban công thì tuyệt! nếu có dịp gia đình mình sẽ quay lại lần sau. Đánh giá 5 sao

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: App không đưa những yêu cầu của tôi sang cho bộ phận lễ tân, xếp phòng cho tôi là 2 giường, và tôi phải đợi để ghép giường

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Mọi thứ đều rất ok. Nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, đồ ăn ngon. Hồ bơi sạch sẽ. Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ. Cảm ơn bạn quân duy và thảo đã đón tiếp gia đình mình chu đáo

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Wifi kém,hồ bơi mùi clo,tối có ca nhạc ồn,đã trả tiền còn bị gọi báo thanh toán.

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Bàn bida quá cùi. Cơ thì cong, mọi thứ còn lại tốt. Nhân viên lịch sự

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Rất tuyệt vời,chỉ có đồ ăn ko phong phú lắm

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Nhân viên nhiệt tình và thân thiện.

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình. View rừng dừa cực chill, nhà mình đi đợt này được tặng set trà chiều cực ngon và chỉn chu. Giá quá hợp lý cho trải nghiệm tuyệt vời

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Đầu tiên cảm ơn các bạn lễ tân hỗ trợ tôi nhận phòng sớm. Nhưng thật tồi tệ khi tôi nhận phòng khi vừa vệ sinh xong của khách cũ. Ga giường và mền bẩn. Tôi đã bị ngứa và dị ứng sau khi nghỉ ngơi tại đây.. 11 40 tôi chưa check out có bộ phận buồng phòng đã tự ý mở cửa phòng khi tôi thay đồ. ( không hề có tiếng gõ cửa đã tự ý dùng thẻ mater mở cửa ) . Nhưng cũng có những điểm khiến tôi rất thích, không gian cây xanh và chim hót líu lo khi ra ban công. Một trải nghiệm thú vị nhưng mong khách sạn điều chỉnh bộ phận buồng phòng để cơ sở hoàn thiện hơn.

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Gia đình mình rất thích không gian ở đây, nhẹ nhàng và tươi mát, mang lại một cảm giác rất dễ chịu nhân viên cực kì thân thiện và dễ thương đặc biệt là bạn guest service agent, mình k nhớ tên nhưng rất ấn tượng với bạn, nhiệt tình và niềm nở. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ gia đình mình sẽ quay lại. Thank you

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn mới và đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện. Bể bơi và các hoạt động vui chơi là điểm nhấn. Rất thích hợp để nghỉ dưỡng

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Mình có 1 đêm ngủ tại bellerive, resort rất đẹp, trong lành, phòng thơm sạch sẽ, hồ bơi rộng, nhân viên thân thiện. Di chuyển đến trung tâm hội an tầm 6km nhưng có xe đưa đón miễn phí nên rất tiện hoặc mọi người đi grab. Xung quanh resort đi ra có quán hải sản a rôì rất gần mà siêu ngon rẻ. Hẹn bellerive vào lần gần nhất mình sẽ quay lại

hotelName: Bellerive Hoi An Resort and Spa
userCmt: Rất tốt. Việc đánh giá chỗ nghỉ bạn đã từng ở có thể giúp những du khách khác quyết định nơi lưu trú lý tưởng của họ. Hãy đảm bảo đánh giá của bạn tuân thủ các nguyên tắc sau
Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình, thân thiện
Phòng tầng 3 không có thang máy, khá bất tiện nhưng lại có chỗ đỗ xe ô tô khá ổn. Đường đi hội an thuận tiện

Mình nhận phòng hôm qua đã ở 1 đêm, nói chung gần trung tâm, giá không rẻ không mắc nhưng tầm giá này mà phòng thì chẳng sạch chút nào, mình ở phòng 304 nha, quên chụp hình lại, nhà tắm nền gạch đóng rêu xanh, nền tường nhà tắm đen đen ố vàng, nói chung nhìn thấy rất mất vệ sinh. Phòng mình nhận thì toàn tóc là tóc, mình cảm giác như là nhân viên chỉ quét dọn sơ sơ đoàn trước xong xếp phòng cho mình thuê vậy. Ly nước thì cáu bẩn vàng khè nhìn không dám uống. Chỗ kệ để đồ thì toàn bụi là bụi, quơ tay lên là 1 lớp bụi. Được cái phòng rộng, nhiều giường, đi gia đình thì thấy thoải mái. Cầu thang trơn, mặc dù có lót chống trượt nhưng miếng lót không được gia cố nên khi đi xe sộc xệch, sáng sớm nay hội an mưa nên sáng nay tầm 7h hơn mình trả phòng nền cầu thang còn ướt đọng nước, đi muốn trượt.

Trải nghiệm khá tốt, mình rất ưng view phòng tầng không gian xanh nhiều, mát mẻ thoáng đãng. Ở đây có cả dịch vụ thuê xe máy và vé đi thuyền thúng ở rừng dừa 7 mẫu. Vị trí cũng tiện di chuyển đến các nơi tham quan vui chơi. Giá cả thì rẻ bất ngờ. Rất đáng trải nghiệm
Villa ok nha mn, chị lễ tân dễ thương, phòng thoáng, sáng sủa
Nơi nghỉ ngơi yên tĩnh, phù hợp đội nhóm, gia đình. Có nơi đậu xe
Khách sạn giá cả khá ok nhất là đối với cuối tuần thì được coi là rẻ , sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh , chủ thân thiện niềm nở , có chỗ đỗ xe ô tô
Nhân viên nhiệt tình hộ trỡ cách trung tâm tầm 10p đi xe máy đường đẹp tiện lắm ạ. Lần sau quay lại mình sẽ book tiếp ở đây
Phòng ổn áp, sạch sẽ, có cho thuê xe máy, home nhiều cây xanh, rất mát mẻ. Vị trí cũng gần phố cổ nữa. Tuyệt

Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, thoáng và đẹp. View nhìn ra cây xanh khá tươi mát nên mình đã chọn book phòng này ngay. Chị lễ tân dễ thương nha. Vị trí thì vừa phải, tính ra là gần, và đủ yên tĩnh với mình. Nói chung trải nghiệm ở phòng okela. Lần sau sẽ cân nhắc quay lại.

Ấn tượng tốt đầu tiên của tớ là vì sự chu đáo, thân thiện của nhân viên lễ tân. Tớ cảm thấy phòng ốc sạch sẽ và cực thích không gian xung quanh. Tớ cảm thấy yên bình thật sự và chỉ cần ngồi trong phòng ngắm không gian xung quanh cũng đủ. Khu vực này cũng tiện khi nằm giữa biển và phố cổ, tớ không cần di chuyển quá xa. Chắc chắn tớ sẽ quay lại

Rèm cửa mốc meo cực tệ, wifi thì quá tệ và chập chờn, không thể sử dụng trừ khi tôi ngồi ở khu vực quần áo. Vì bộ định tuyến nằm ngay bên ngoài phòng. Ngay cả khi ngồi ở đó cũng sẽ gây ra kết nối chập chờn. Không cung cấp khăn tắm lớn, cần phải trả thêm tiền cho nó. Nhưng ngay cả khi có khăn tắm thì nó cũng quá nhỏ, không thể che phủ toàn bộ cơ thể. Nếu tôi muốn che mông thì phần trên của tôi sẽ bị lộ ra, nếu tôi muốn che phần trên của mình thì phần dưới của tôi sẽ bị lộ ra. Bàn được cung cấp quá cao so với ghế của họ. Tôi hơi cao hơn mức trung bình nhưng tôi phải giơ tay lên để gõ máy tính. Giường quá đàn hồi đến nỗi tôi không thể ngủ ngon. Xung quanh khá ồn ào, gà sẽ bắt đầu lúc 3 giờ sáng và dừng vào khoảng 6-7 giờ sáng. Những con chó xung quanh sẽ đánh nhau vào ban đêm. Và có rất nhiều muỗi, chúng cắn ngón tay và môi của tôi. Có thể nghe thấy tiếng chúng bay quanh tai tôi vào ban đêm, cực kỳ đáng sợ. Hệ thống nước nóng thật kinh khủng. Phải bật shopee ít nhất 5-10 phút trước khi nóng lên. Sau đó, nhiệt độ sẽ dao động rất nhiều nên bạn chắc chắn sẽ bị cảm lạnh vào mùa đông. Nhân viên thân thiện, lễ tân buổi sáng và an ninh ban đêm tuyệt vời. Ngoài điều đó ra thì thật kinh khủng, đừng đến đây. Đây là một trong những nơi lưu trú có chi phí cao nhất trong khu vực. Tôi có thể tìm được những nơi tốt hơn xung quanh

Villa gần trung tâm phố cổ hội an, chị chủ 100 điểm, quá dễ thương, hướng dẫn rất tận tình, support nhận phòng sớm, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, không có mùi ẩm mốc, sẽ ghé lại nếu có dịp đến hội an, đây là tự viết đánh giá )) mọi người có thể tin tưởng để book

Mình có thuê 2 phòng gia đình tại đây. Không gian rất thoáng đãng, có vườn cỏ khá sạch sẽ. Phòng xinh hơn mình nghĩ. Anh nhân viên cũng rất nhiệt tình. Đi bộ đến phố cổ tầm 1 cây rưỡi không quá xa. Nói chung mọi thứ để ở mức ổn/tốt trở lên. Duy chỉ thiếu không có ăn sáng thôi, nhưng xung quanh cũng có khá nhiều quán bán đồ ăn sáng khá ngon.
Chị lễ tân rất tốt và nhiệt tình ạ

Khi đặt phòng trên app thì ảnh là phòng có view trên tầng nhưng khi nhận phòng thì là phòng khác, phòng ở dưới ko có view và được nv phản hồi là ảnh chung để mẫu trên app, còn hạng giường giống nhau. Mặc dù nhân viên phản hồi và phân tích cũng nhiệt tình nhưng trải nghiệm nhận phòng cũng khá hụt hẫng. Trải nghiệm tệ là phòng có mùi mốc và rèm cửa mốc, kéo rèm ra mốc dính, hơi bay bụi mốc luôn. Phòng không có nóng lạnh, chỗ để sữa tắm, dầu gội không có. Để trên bệ cửa thông gió nhà vệ sinh khá bất tiện và phải nhón lên lấy, chỗ bệ cũng bụi. Phòng không có tab đầu giường thì sẽ hơi bất tiện một chút. Còn lại mọi thứ ok, nhân viên nhiệt tình, vị trí thuận tiện, khu vực yên tĩnh, có cây xanh mát mẻ.
Phòng rộng ngoài sức tưởng tượng, chị quản lý cực kỳ thân thiện, sẽ quay lại nhiều lần sau
Cô chủ rất thân thiện, gần phố cổ

Phòng sạch sẽ, anh chủ với lễ tân nhiệt tình, thuê xe máy xe đạp có thể nhờ bên villa thuê giúp. Villa khá mát, kiến trúc hiện đại, đi bộ từ villa tới phố cổ tầm 20p. Điểm trừ là phần thoát nước ở toilet không được nhanh, với lại tủ lạnh ở phòng mình cũng không lạnh ( cho dù vẫn cắm điện )
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Chủ villa nhiệt tình, thân thiện
Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Tuyệt vời, vị trí thuận lợi, chỗ để xe rộng rãi, giá cả hợp lý, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, không gian thoáng mát, có dịp sẽ quay lại
Lỡ đặt nhầm ngày nhưng mà home rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ đổi ngày anh chị nhân viên tiếp đón thân thiện phòng thoáng tiện nghi đầy đủ
Không gian rộng rãi thoáng mát
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng thoáng mát
Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà và lễ tân thân thiện, hài hước, và nhiệt tình. Cách phố cổ khoảng 30p đi bộ, đường tới rất dễ tìm.
Chỉ quản lý nhiệt tình. Nơi ở sạch sẽ rộng rãi, đủ tiện nghi.
Phòng rộng rãi sạch sẽ thoải mái, nhân viên nhiệt tình.
Phòng rộng rãi, thoáng mát, chăm sóc khách hàng tốt. Gần kháchsạn còn có quán ốc, đồ ăn sáng ngon.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, villa đẹp
Villa mới, sạch sẽ, view đẹp, ánh năng tràn vào phòng cũng đẹp luôn ạ. Đường đi ra phố cổ rất gần và tiện. Bác trông nhà thân thiện
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ rất thoáng. Anh chị chủ cũng cực kỳ dễ thương. Highly recommend!
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, tuy nhiên hồ bơi chưa được xây dựng hoàn chỉnh, phòng và phòng tắm sạch sẽ.
Villa còn rất mới, cây cối xanh đẹp lắm ạ. Góc nào chụp hình cũng 10
Sạch sẽ thân thiện tuyet vời 10
Phòng sạch sẽ tiện nghi, cô chủ cũng dễ huôngg nữa. View sân vườn xinh xắn. Đáng để trải nghiệm !
Phòng siêu đẹp, sạch sẽ mới lắm mn gần phố cổ đi lại cũng dễ, chị chủ dễ thương nhiệt tình, có dọn dẹp phòng mỗi ngày. Sẽ quay lại vì trải nghiệm quá tuyệt vời
Phòng ok lắm mn ơi, rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, sạch sẽ gọn gàng lần tới ghé hội an chơi sẽ ghé tiếp

We really enjoyed our stay. Very pretty and trim garden. Nice staff. Nice swimming pool and cozy room. We had also transfer from/to airport and private trip to my son. Walking distance to old city. The beach is a little bit far away but we order a taxi. Around there are few nice and cheap restaurants with good food. We want to come back.

Everything is just so wonderful at betel. You are not just a room number like some hotels, they actually remember you and treat you like family. This was our 3rd stay there which says everything! far enough away from the madness in the old town but not too far that you cant have a stroll by the river to go and explore and taxis are cheap enough if you dont want to walk. Would recommend betel to anyone wanting a relaxing time in lovely surroundings

Un très beau petit hôtel verdoyant avec une piscine très agréable. L hôtel est très bien situé à 15 minutes de marche du centre. Des vélos sont à disposition pour découvrir les environs. Le personnel est très sympathique et d une grande aide. Le petit déjeuner est fabuleux.

숙소안에 나무가 많아서 엄마가 좋아하셨어요. 엄마 모시고 가는 가족여행인데 한국분들 후기가 없어서 조금 걱정이였는데, 유럽 사람들이 많아서 휴양지 기분 들어서 좋았고, 패밀리 방갈로 묵었는데 숙소도 천장이 높고 넓어서 방2개 빌려 3명, 2명 나눠지냈는데 부족함이 없었습니다. 방2개는 서로 연결되어 있진 않지만 붙어 있고 독립적으로 되어 있어 가족끼리 지내시기 좋습니다. 방안에는 없었는데 식당등에 모기가 많은 편이며 수영장은 작은 편입니다. 새벽도착이라 공항 픽업 서비스 요청드렸고 체크아웃할 때 같이 정산했습니다. 숙소는 호이안에서 차로 10분 정도 떨어져 있습니다. 숙소에서 빌려주는 자전거로 새벽시장다녀와서 좋았습니다. 조식은 조금 실망할 수도 있지만 저희 가족은 괜찮았습니다. 주변에 니한 키친 평이 좋던데 저흰 저녁 늦게 가서 이용해보진 못했습니다. 구글 지도에서 보시면 숙소에서 도보 5분 거리에 유카페호이안 이라고 있습니다. 콩카페는 가본 적이 없지만 이곳 2층에서 강 바라보며 마신 코코넛커피가 너무 맛있어서 기억이 많이 남습니다. 시간되시면 꼭 마셔보세요.

Beautiful and charming family hotel, very calm and the staff is very kind and helpful! everything is spotlessly clean, minibar bottles are cheaper than in minimarts, free bikes for a pleasant 5-10 min ride to the old town along the river. Breakfast is very good.

Rummen lite gammaldags - omorderna. Men rena och fräscha. Fin veranda. Fantastisk service av personalen, vi fick hjälp att boka tågbiljetter och utflykt. Vällagad och god frukost där du kunde beställa från ett bra sortiment. Färsk frukt på rummet varje dag samt vattenkokare och te och kaffe. Vi bodde här 3 nätter och blev bjudna på en fin middag vår sista kväll. Hotellet bjuder på middag var 3 dje natt du bor här ) läget bra, när till gamla stan och du får låna cyklar gratis av hotellet. Fantastiskt vacker trädgård.överträffade vårs förväntningar, du får mycket för pengarna.
The place is embedded in a beautiful garden with lovely and caring people. The best place for families you can think of!

This was our favourite hotel on our recent vietnam holiday. Not so much a hotel as a collection of small villas set in the well kept, peaceful grounds of a family home. There is a swimmming pool which is in very good condition and never busy due to the small guest numbers. The restaurant had good food and was reasonably priced. One evening all the guests were invited to dinner (free!) which was amazingly generous. Free bikes available if you wanted to cycle to the old town centre (about 10 mins) or to the beach (about 20). Hoian itself is very touristy but still well worth a couple of trips (especially in the evening when the lanterns are lit). The beach is also good. Clean and not busy despite going on a saturday. Thanks to all the staff, especially to the very friendly kim!

Quiet location. Rooms all in garden setting. Staff all very friendly and helpful. On evening we left we were treated to a delicious meal on the house along with all other guests. Excellent food and informative conversation with the staff.
Loved the pool and our patio. Liked our room and bed. Loved hoi an and use of the bikes for transport.
Had the most amazing stay at betel as always. Everyone is so wonderful and welcoming and the homestay and pool is fantastic. Would definately recommend to anyone wanting to go to hoi an

Betel garden villas exceeded all of our expectations. Ms. Vang and her wonderful staff were friendly and very helpful in every way. Arranging taxis or transportation to the danang airport was done with ease. Breakfasts were amazing. The gardens of the villa are the most beautiful we have ever encountered in a travel accommodation. Our room was fantastic and quiet . . . For the most part. The spotted dove and black-collared starling were at their vocal best. We hope to return to hoi an soon and will only stay at betel garden villa.

We stayed 5 nights at betel garden villas and loved our stay. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel property is beautiful. Our 2 year old loved swimming in the pool and looking at the birds and fish on the property. The breakfast was delicious. We stayed in a bungalow which gave us a lot of space and the front patio was nice to relax on at the end of the day. I would say that our bathroom could use some upkeep. The shower was a little dated and we had difficulty controlling the water temperature. The water would also pool around the shower borders. We would still stay here again and recommend it to anyone who asked! they have bikes available and 1 with a child seat attached. It is about a 25-30 minute walk to old town (with a 2 year old). Multiple great restaurants within a 10 minute walk. Definitely recommend!

Betel garden villas in hoi an is a very nice , well presented guesthouse. It is about a 20 minute walk to the main part of town , but if the weather is too hot , then a taxi will be a cheap alternative. The main attraction of hoi an for this traveller was the inexpensive tailoring at the central market . I am happy to recommend both ladies and gents tailors in addition to a handmade shoe vendor.
The room was spacious. Clean. Large bathroom with separated toilet, shower

This is the 2nd time i ve stayed at betel gardens and would again. It is a little out of town, about 30 min walk to centre of old town. Bikes provided, which we did to the beach a couple of times and that was fun.

Absolutely wonderful place to stay. Huge rooms, very peaceful. Beautiful garden surrounding the rooms, which is immaculate and tended to lovingly by the gardener every day. Staff are all friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!
Great value for the money beautiful garden setting

Beautiful gardens, a real oasis. Friendly, helpful, efficient staff. Great free bikes, 10 min ride to centre of old town mostly along riverbank. Really nice, secure room. A la carte breakfast options (2 per sitting plus a beverage) covered a good range of dishes fresh fruit and yoghurt, french toast, omelettes, pho, fresh baguettes with jam and more. Would not hesitate to recommend.
Great pool!

We chose this property for its clean aesthetic and proximity to ancient town. While those two factors were indeed excellent upon our arrival, we were more so impressed by the kindness of the staff at banana garden. Each staff member was friendly and attentive to our needs. The concierge provided excellent recommendations for tailors and spas, and the included cooked-to-order breakfasts were lovely. We d highly recommend staying here if you re looking for a hotel away from the busy ancient town, but within a 10 minute bike ride from it. The hotel also offers free bike rentals, which we d recommend using to ride to an bang beach and ancient town. Thank you to the staff!
Great location just a block off the river. Property and rooms were clean and breakfast was good.
Magnifique endroit à hoi an. Très propre et tranquille. Les chambres sont bien emmenagées et comfortables. Très bel accueil de tout le personnel. Mention spéciale à la réceptionniste tinh!
Clean incredibly friendly and accommodating
The service was great and very accomodating. The free breakfast in the morning is great. The staff really went above and beyond. We like the fact it is not in busy old town but still walking distance

Great place, nice clean rooms and pool area. The staff was very nice and helpful. The breakfast was great. The place is a 15 minute walk from hoi an old town, and there are plenty of restaurants nearby.

We loved our stay at banana garden hotel. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly, the breakfast was great and the room (received an upgrade) was large with both a shower and a bath tube. The hotel has 2 swimming pools and a small gym with some weights, a bike and treadmills. They also offer pish-bikes free of charge for you to explore the city or in our case we have walked everywhere. It s only a 15 minutes or less walk to the centre of hoi an old town, so you can easily explore hoi an by foot. Overall, a great stay and i would recommend people visiting hoi an to consider / stay at banana garden.
A bit far from old town hôian
Wonderful little hotel very near old town. Very convenient to night market, memories, riverfront, and kids of restaurants.
What a lovely place and hosts.

We had a great stay. There was some maintenance happening at the time of the stay, but it didn t bother us much. The room was beautiful and spacious and the breakfast every morning was great. Staff were very helpful and kind. I would stay here again if i had the chance to. So affordable too!

Like resort environment. Stay in family connecting rooms and both rooms are big. Breakfast is good. Front counter staffs are very helpful and able to arrange transport, day tour and airport transport too. Our family enjoy our stay in banana garden villa. Walking distance around 15-20min to tailor street and night market
Service very good, beautiful property, bikes to use and nothing was to much trouble. Really enjoyed our time here . Would recommend to all.
My stay here felt like staying with family. Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable. Great location!
Great property great staff
This experience was amazing. The staff was very helpful and friendly. We will come back when visiting hoi an again
The staff are amazing l would not hestiate to say there again
The personal is very kind and available. The hotel is clean and clansing. We enjoy a lot there, specialy because the give you the bike for free.
The rooms were very clean, the staff was extremely nice, always there to help us. The breakfast was good, pool is refreshing. Would definitely recommend )

All i have are wonderful things to say about this hotel especially the staff. They were welcoming and very helpful throughout our stay. They went above and beyond by making my daughter a special concoction ready for her morning and night everyday to help her cough. They made us feel part of the family right from the start. Rooms were big, clean, and comfortable. Location is a short distance to the main attractions. Breakfast was delicious. Thank you for a wonderful stay. We will definitely be staying here next time we visit.
Excellent service and location. Property is immaculate.

Personalen var väldigt trevliga från första stund och hjälpte oss med tips på skräddare, smyckes butik och aktiviteter. Man kunde också boka flera aktiviteter genom hotellet men det gjorde inte vi. Rummet var rekt och fräscht och motsvarar bilderna. Väldigt bra värde för pengarna!

We stayed here for a week and had a great experience! the staff were absolutely incredible! soo friendly and helpful with everything. The pools were clean and very nice. Breakfast was delicious. Highly recommend!

Very nice hotel, friendly staff, nice breakfast. We used the laundry service and it was good. We had a scooter for one day, it was a great way to know small villages around. Great hotel, highly recommend.

We had a nice stay at the banana garden villa and the staff were all really lovely. Our room was clean and spacious but it did have a musty smell to it, probably from how humid it gets outside. The breakfast was good, a decent amount of options with made to order eggs your way. The location is really great, it s near the river and just a few minutes walk down the path to the old town! overall we had a great stay!
部屋の清潔感があり過ごしやすかったです バスタブもあり疲れがとれました 朝食は品数が多いわけではありませんが野菜たっぷりでおいしかったです

Vi hadde en fin uke på banana garden. Personalet var ektremt serviceinnstilt og vaskeritjenesten fungerte fantastisk. God frokost. Treningsrommet var lite med kun sykkel og mølle. Gode senger, fint bad. Kan være veldig lytt mellom rommene

I spent 4 night at banana garden villa and i wish i could have spent more! the room was very spacious, bright and with a lovely balcony. The hotel is beautiful, with two outdoor pools, a tiny gym and very friendly staff. Breakfast was great, good buffet and possibility to have freshly cooked eggs. Complimentary bikes - the ancient area is about 2 km distance - and possibility to rent motorbikes straight at the hotel for very convenient rates. 5 stars!
Está en un lugar tranquilo pero cerca del centro se puede ir caminandotodo estuvo estupendo lo recomendaría

We really enjoyed our stay at banana garden villa. The staff was really friendly and helpful, the rooms was lovely and really clean. The pools was nice after a long bicycle trip through the rice fields. The breakfast had a good variety of local and european style breakfast.

Excellent helpful and friendly reception staff - helped us book trips, were very knowledgeable about anything we asked and always checked up on how our tours or day went giving a very personal touch. They sourced taxis, looked after items we got delivered and sorted laundry for us. Excellent english too. Breakfast was great - the freshly made banana pancakes were our favourite. The location was great - very close to hoi an memories show and about a 20 minute walk to the main market area, but on a quiet road so very peaceful. There are also free bikes which made cycling a bit further out very convenient. The room and facilities were pretty standard, always clean and in good condition. Only criticism was the shower did take a long time to warm up! thanks for a wonderful stay, i d definitely recommend staying for your hoi an trip.

Excellent staff. Flexible check-in time. Greeting, welcome with a drink. Comfortable bed. Good free breakfast. After checkout i did more sightseeing and they kept my luggage safe. When i returned, i badly needed to go to the toilet and they let me use one. Great value.

Stop. Don t book anywhere else. This will be the best 30 you will spend. An amazing room, breakfast, pools and fantastic staff. A lovely 10-15 minute stroll into the old town and a short cycle/grab/electric buggy to the beach which you must visit. Just an amazing hotel in a fabulous city

The ladies at the front desk, the restaurant staff, housekeeping and the terrific gentleman handling bicycles etc were all fantastic! this was my second time staying at banana garden and i ll definitely be going back again

Our stay at the banana garden was fantastic the staff were great and helpful in booking tours and providing local info. The free bikes were great we used them a lot to get out to local attractions great breakfast buffet with an egg and pancake station. We would definitely recommend this hotel
Very friendly and courteous staff. Walkable distance by the river path and hotel offers free bikes as well. Room is very roomy overall great stay at this property.
The property is nice, the staff is helpful
Very friendly and helpful staff with good restaurants and a spa within close walking distance
I was there for 2 days and it was great. The hotel room was really nice and clean and the pool area was really nice. I also liked the location. All in all i enjoyed my stay.
Hyggelig hotell, med veldig behjelpelig og vennlig personell som hjalp oss med alt vi trengte. Perfekt med gratis sykkelleie med barnesete! god frokost.

This small hotel is within walking distance to hoi an old town.the property is clean, quiet and relaxing. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was great with plenty of choices including western and vietnamese food. We truly enjoyed our stay at this property and would love to stay here again if we are back to this area.
Staff is very kind

The staff were very nice and helpful in getting tours arranged. Breakfast was nice, i loved the banana pancakes. Room was spacious. Free bikes for getting around town. A quick walk to the riverside path where you can stroll by restaurants and watch the lantern boats go by. The two gals at reception were very friendly and helpful. I stayed for 20 days

Eine sehr schöne unterkunft in hoi an. Zwar ca. 20 fußminuten zum zentrum entfernt, aber die geh strecke ist an einem schönen fluss entllang. Außerdem kann man sich kostenlos fahrräder ausleihen. Das hotel hat ebenfalls schöne zimmer und das personal ist sehr nett.

Such a great stay. Linh from the reception was there for us literally from our arrival until departure. Such a great level of service. We traveled with our two kids 12 14. The pool is nice and clean, the rooms are spacious and clean. We enjoyed much the extra service of the free bikes, even the day of check out after check out. Distance to city is also walkable, location is quite with several food options around.
If you want something close to the markets then this is at the opposite end of that. But it s a nice walk. Staff were great. Pools were nice and clean. Breakfast included in our deal was excellent.
Lovely and helpful staff! room was clean and quiet, too. We extended our stay by two nights also - very happy would come again.
Great location and price

My family of 6 booked the family interconnecting rooms and they were lovely and spacious for the 5 nights we stayed. The pools were nice and refreshing after a ride around town on their bicycles . Breakfast in the morning had plenty of fresh fruit, western food as well as vietnamese. The location was perfect for watching boats on the river with plenty of restaurants to choose from also a nice walk to old town. Staff were very friendly and welcoming.

Trevlig personal och gångavstånd från gamla stan. Hoi an är fantastiskt och väldigt charmigt. Hotellet är enkelt och billigt men räkna inte med att sola vid poolen för det är sällan solen når dit. Fina och bra restauranger vid vattnet nära. Vi fick rum som hade väldigt mycket fukt i sig och i det ena rummet var det så fuktigt att täckena var blöta, luktade fukt och kemikalier. Det andra rummet gick inte att mörklägga helt för det var glas ut mot korridoren. De uppgraderade oss och det blev bättre. Men be att få kolla rummen innan ni accepterar. Mycket bra frukost och som sagt väldigt trevlig och hjälpsam personal.
Amazing little hotel right outside the main area. Close enough to grab one of their free bikes and take a 3 minute ride, but far enough to avoid noise and tourist fees
Awesome location, staff, and breakfast. Cold ac. Spacious room. This is my third time in hoi an and i will stay here in the future!

Hôtel calme et confortable un peu à l écart de l agitation touristique de la vieille ville d hoi an. Le personnel de l hôtel est au petit soin avec la clientèle. Le petit déjeuner est varié et excellent et il est agréable de le prendre sur la terrasse. Je recommande cet hôtel pour ceux qui veulent visiter cette belle vill qu est hoi an.

We had a lovely stay at the very charming banana villa. This place has everything you need to relax and unwind - friendly staff who go out of their way to make sure you have a good time, a quiet location a bit outside of the main streets of the centre but still with plenty of spas, cafés and restaurants and spaceous rooms with super comfortable beds. In the morning you re met with amazing home cooked breakfast to prepare you for a day in beautiful hoi an. Thank you to the staff for hosting us and giving us the warmest welcome to the lovely city.
The staff were so very lovely and helpful

I can t wait to stay here again, i think it will be my consistent hotel stay in hoi an. Friendly staff, clean and tidy rooms, quiet hotel and close to the market which is within walking distance but i also liked to go by push bike which is available to hire for free at the hotel. All my tour and taxi needs were arranged by the helpful concierge staff. Buffet breakfast was amazing with an omlette/egg stand. Really good selection of snacks in room and mini fridge is stocked with great selection of drinks. Thank you sincerely for everything, i hope to be back staying here real soon.

I loved my stay at banana garden villa. It was so lovely. The staff were all so amazing and very accommodating. They advised us on the best places to eat, get tailored clothes and helped us book tickets for boat rides and the hoi an history culture play. Anything i needed they did provided - all with a warm smile that made you feel at home. I definitely recommend. It s a few minute bike ride (which they provide) and an easy walk to the old town area. I went for a swim and breakfast was amazing! you need to come here!! thank you so much
Ide love the customer service, they were ao friendly and helpful, plus the place is so nice. I had a great time.

Struttura eccezionale, accolto con drink di benvenuto e ci hanno fatto sentire subito a nostro agio. Tutto il personale è stato disponibile ed accogliente, sempre pronto a supportarci. Piscina pulita e disponibilità dei teli. Colazione super, soprattutto i pancake.
Super clean,wonderful helpful staff.very impressed
朝食がもうちょっと
Great place to stay, walkable to lots of dining options and night market. Staff were fantastic, rooms were spacious and clean and extremely reasonable price. Would stay again.
Amazing!
Bij banana garden villa voel je echt thuis, je er hartelijk ontvangen. Als je wat vraagt wordt voor je gedaan. De kamers zijn groot en mooi. Dicht bij het centrum.

Cute, quaint property. The staff was very accommodating and helpful. They made sure our stay was very comfortable. The rooms were very spacious for my party of they arranged all of our transportation and before heading to the airport, they opened breakfast 30 minutes earlier to make sure that we had a meal before our departure. I would highly recommend if you are looking for more boutique accommodations.
Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice boutique hotel walking distance to old town. Nice made to order eggs for breakfast. Very large clean rooms. Enjoyed my stay and will come again.
Excellent stay close to the old town! breakfast was delicious and the room was very spacious and comfortable. Highly recommended stay in hoi an.

The team at banana garden villas, lead by the fantastic ling, are the best! absolutely nothing was a problem and all seemed happy and welcoming everyday. The room was basic but comfortable with the biggest bed we have experienced in our extensive travels over the years. Breakfast was good, with all tastes catered for. We will be back!

As a solo older traveller i was very much at home here, for 4 nights reasonably priced with lovely staff, who communicated very well at all times. The breakfast covered most preferences. The pool was lovely to be in after a hot days sightseeing...away from the hustle of the old town but close enough to walk along the riverside to and eating places.
Great spot. Highly recommend. Very friendly and helpful staff
Lovely welcoming staff, great service. Clean, comfortable and quiet. Great selection of asian and western food. Great vslue for money. Would recommend.
Great location, friendly staff and nice w the free bikes
Need to walk about 20 minutes to the old town. A pool is clean, great for children.
Chambre mal insonorisée !
Receptionists and the staff are outstanding - ill come back any time solely for their welcoming and assistance.
The staff at banana grove were amazingly friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good with a lot of choice. My shower was broken and the bed was hard but that didn t take away from the great experience.

The staff were just lovely and very helpful . Two pools so never over crowded. Freshly personally made breakfast with no limit. The most comfortable bed and pillows i have ever experienced in a hotel anywhere.

We loved staying at the banana garden villa! our room and bed was very comfortable, quiet at night. Breakfast was delicious every morning and the staff were so friendly and made us feel welcome. Cannot wait to return!
Fantastic trip to banana garden villa. Close to every thing. The free bikes are fantastic. All staff were amazing can not fault this beautiful hotel

Sehr freundlich, sehr herzlich. Die beschriebene barrierefreiheit war nicht ganz zutreffend, aber die einzelnen stufen zum frühstücksraum und zum zimmer wurden schnell mit großer kreativität mit improvisierten rampen überbrückt. Die lage ist sehr ruhig und dennoch recht zentral, 15 min fußweg zur altstadt.
2 pools sauber, schöne zimmer, freundliches personal, lage nicht in der old town und trotzdem mittendrin, fahrradverleih umsonst, frühstücksbuffet große auswahl. Kann nur eine empfehlung aussprechen
The staffs were very friendly and welcoming. Every worker i see upon always say hello with a smile . I would highly recommend this place.
Amazing room super clean and the best staff!
Could not fault this property at all. Lovely service and the best breakfast we ve had whilst in vietnam

Very nice 2 br family suite. To be clear, our family suite was two large adjoining rooms with a queen plus full bed in each room. In retrospect, we could have easily had our family of 2 adults, 2 kids in one of these rooms, so take this in consideration when booking. Like-new rooms/beds here, and large balconies. The staff is great, very friendly and accommodating, we were greeted with fresh juice while we checked in and all requests were quickly granted. Two pools, and the included breakfast buffet was really quite good with made to order eggs, pho, and a variety of local and western-style options. The location was fine, a bit out of the center of hoi an. Definitely walkable but expect about 20 minutes to get to the main area. Transport via grab very easy and affordable though.

Hotel was in a good location, we enjoyed the breakfast, especially the banana pancakes. The rooms air-conditioning could be better. However we had a fantastic stay, pool was great and lynn at reception was fabulous. Unfortunately hotels.com did let me down as i had booked the room with my child who was eight years old, and when i arrived at reception i had to pay extra as she was over 5y this was not clear on my booking.
Every staff members were friendly efficient. My room was big, clean, had a very comfortable bed.

Die unterkunft war gut ausgestattet und hat einen super service. Speisen/ getränke sind gut und günstig. Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich man fühlt sich wirklich wie ein urlauber. Die unterkunft selbst ist sauber und gepflegt. Definitiv ein guter anlaufpunkt wenn man in hoi an unterwegs ist!

Really close to old town and bike usage was great! staff was very friendly and breakfast was good. We didn t have any hot water during our trip in our room and workout area is a treadmill and bike on fake grass in a small room. Really liked how close it is to the action.

This hotel was above our expectations considering the price per night at aus 35 per night. The room was huge with a balcony. It had a king bed and a king single. The room was very clean. The property had two pools. The included breakfast was nice. It was in easy walkinng distance to town and had complimentary bicycles for exploring. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Would definateky stay again. L
Staff are wonderful pool is clean and nice located close enough to everything

The room we had was not at all like the pictures, the balcony door was covered with some type of blue sticking paper, so basically, no window. The door handle was loose, and the wardrobe handle was off its hook, with a screw sticking out. No reading light whatsoever (again, contrarily to the pictures), only very bright ceiling lighting. They definitely need to update the rooms, and/or adjust the pictures to show the true look of the rooms. There are lots of better options in that neighborhood in the same price range.

We loved everything about this property. The staff were amazing. Nothing was too much for them. The lovely gentleman who helped with bags etc was amazing also. The rooms were spacious and suited our short stay. My granddaughter loved the pool and the breakfast was delicious. We would definitely stay again and would highly recommend to our friends. Hoian is our favourite destination in vietnam. Thanks again to the wonderful workers at the banana garden villa.
Great people, and a great place a little away from the busy hoi an, with free rental of bikes. Unfortunately the hotel is a little loud, and we stayed during renovation.
Good rooms nice pool to cool off. Great friendly staff

We are two families of 8 total, had to book one night at banana garden villa before moving to another hotel previously booked in hoi an. Agreeably, we stay in 2 two bed-room family pool view with balcony. They are clean, largely spacious for all of us. Breakfast is good. Staff is excellent. Nothing more to say since we checked in late at night and checked out the next morning. Highly recommend tho.
Bin in diesem urlaub jetzt schon zum 3x da. Und es fühlt sich an wie zu hause. Das personal gibt einen dieses gefühl. Es sind die kleinen gesten die etwas großes daraus machen. Danke
The hotel was sold during our stay. The handover was not smooth. The staff were scared. The breakfast buffet sucked. Pool was not clean anymore.
The staff are very friendly and happy in their jobs.
This is a beautiful hotel that is just far enough from old town to be peaceful, although within walking distance. The staff make the stay particularly wonderful! highly recommend!
Nhận phòng không giống với lúc mình đặt
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Bác chủ dễ thương. Bé mình lỡ làm bể cái ly báo với bác, bác nói không sao
Villa tuyệt vời, anh chủ thân thiện, chỗ nghỉ cho thuê xe đạp miễn phí, gần phố cổ, mình thích lắm
Thái độ chủ villa không happy, xin check phòng trước khi nhận rất khó chịu.
Chú chủ dui dẻ, phòng nghỉ okela lắm
Chủ thân thiện, nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ
Trong khi book phòng được tới nơi kêu hết phòng thái độ nói chuyện 21h phải đi chạy vòng vòng kiếm phòng trải nghiệm quá tệ
Thực tế không khớp với hình ảnh. Khách sạn không sạch sẽ và tầm nhìn cũng tệ. Có vẻ như chủ nhà không chăm sóc tốt cho bất động sản
Phòng giống hình, rộng rãi, thoải mái. Giá ok nữa, mng nên book nha
Cô chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình lần sau có dịp nhất định mình sẽ ghé lại. 1000d cho chất lượng dịch vụ đối với giá
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, bể bơi xinh xắn, phục vụ tận tình.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: A great place to chill

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Very satisfying stay with good foods, beach and pool. Good restaurant and good pool bar. Spa is very relaxing. Free transportation to hoi an old city. Nothing special found surroundings of this hotel so that everything is completed in this hotel. Nice hospitality of the staffs. Beach view room is spacious enough and satisfying. We has hot water problem in the room but was fixed just in 1 hour. Would like to come back again for relaxing vacation.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Beautiful and clean private pool for 2-bedroom villa. Spacious room and modern facility. Open mini bar in the 2-bedroom villa is a very nice touch. Absolutely love the spa area. Complimentary steam room and sauna is a very nice touch. Great breakfast food selection as well as themed dinner option. Public pool and lounge area is clean and very relaxing, truly a calm oasis in hoi an. The resort is about 27-30 mins ride away from the old quarter. I do wish the morning yoga/stretch is located in the smooth lawn facing the pool maybe they chose the other location because there are tree shades to block out the morning sun. Overall a fantastic stay.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Impeccable service, comfortable rooms with lots of space and a great pool area. The shuttle bus to hoi an is also very convenient but a taxi between does not cost the earth. Really good breakfast. Already planning the return trip!

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Beautiful resort in a quiet area with a lovely pool, spacious rooms and well kept gardens. The resort offers a regular shuttle bus into hoi an for guests. The staff are friendly and helpful. They assisted us with restaurant bookings and transport, and we were able to communicate quickly and easily with them through whatsapp when we were out of the resort and our plans changed. We enjoyed the variety of the buffet breakfast and the quality of the evening meals. We had a very relaxing stay.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: This was a superb resort, much better than any of the resorts we ve stayed at in the caribbean. Lovely people, great breakfasts wonderful setting in palm trees. The unspoilt beach really does go on for miles. Also it has a really large pool, without all the kiddies toys and flumes you get elsewhere. We also recommend taking the free shuttle into hoi an where you ll experience a really interesting old town with lots of restaurants. Plus the famous lit lanterns on the river.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: This is a beautiful place to stay. Beautiful beach and lovely pool. Short trip on courtesy bus into town. The team are wonderful, i took ill and ended up in hospital for a few days and they were marvellous looking out for my wife and i

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Awesome location, amazing beach, great pool, excellent service. Very clean, very well taken care of, beautiful territory and very friendly staff. Oh, the food was delicious too! absolute pleasure to stay at this hotel, i will definitely come back. Thank you all very much for making my stay so nice!

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Amazing service and lovely hotel, food could be improved

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Fantastiskt vacker resort och ett alldeles enastående hotell med otroligt trevlig och hjälpsam personal. Phuong did that little extra for us all week during our stay and tim was amazing with our kids. Everyone was just so friendly and welcoming from the breakfast to the pool service. Would love to come back soon.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Quiet, spacious, beautiful surroundings

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: For one week stay we had so nice people taking care of us in an excellent environment highly appreciated.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Bel hôtel au bord d une longue plage de sable fin. Les chambres vue mer sont très confortables mais celles avec portes communicantes ne sont pas bien isolées. Certes personnes a la réception ne sont pas à la hauteur d un 5 étoiles. En revanche le resort est très propre et les infrastructures sont de bonnes qualités

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Bit further away from the old town but beautiful and quiet hotel. The bus into old town is perfect

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Beautiful resort, lots of palm and coconut trees. Very green. Not over crowded, peaceful and relaxing. Clean. Staff were very polite and friendly. Private beach. Has nice pool. Place to play soccer. Has nice free bike rental to ride around the resort.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Excellent service by all staff members. The room, ammenities, and bed were very comfortable. The property and view was very nice- we particularly appreciated how relaxed and quiet it was. And the spa and treatments were delightful. It s an easy trip into hoi an, and provides a nice resort respite away from the busier areas.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: How beautiful the place was

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: Bliss hoi an beach wellness resort truly lives up to its name, as our stay there was a blissful experience from every aspect. The food options were great, including 24-hr room service the staff was amazing (lam (restaurant manager), buu, thu, y (pronounced eee), and sue (guest services) were incredibly attentive to our every need and made sure that each moment of our stay was nothing short of exceptional. The spa offers a wide variety of incredible services at unbelievably low prices, and its facility is top-notch for creating a magical, serene environment. I could say more about the resort, but i would highly recommend people just checking it out for themselves - you ll be quite pleased.

hotelName: Bliss Hoi An Beach Resort & Wellness
userCmt: The staff were incredible and the rooms and grounds were lovely. Very clean! food was good, especially the breakfast buffet. The only draw back is the cost of the personal laundry service - it is astronomically expensive at the resort. Highly recommend the bliss hoi an!
Bạn nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và nhanh nhẹn. Phòng rộng rãi, sạch đẹp và đầy đủ tiện nghi.
Phòng rộng đẹp sạch sẽ rất hài lòng
Homestay rất dễ thương, phòng ở gọn gàng chỉnh chu tất cả mọi thứ, ông chủ cũng nhiệt tình nữa. Lần đầu đặt phòng nhưng mình ưng ý tất cả mọi thứ ở home, hy vọng là sẽ có nhiều người ghé home ở
Chủ nhà thân thiện, em cún xinh
Cô chủ rất thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ các tiện nghi. Tuy nhiên vị trí hơi xa phố cổ
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Cô chủ rất nhiệt tình, còn cho nhà mình quả mít cây nhà lá vườn. Sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè, người thân.

Đó là một homestay tuyệt vời. Nó nằm gần phố cổ hội an khoảng 10 phút bằng xe đạp. Nó cũng có thể đi đến bãi biển bằng xe đạp (15 phút). Tôi thực sự yêu thích homestay này không chỉ phòng và thức ăn, mà còn cả dịch vụ. Họ đã cho chúng tôi sự chào đón nồng nhiệt và chăm sóc như một gia đình. Họ rất tốt bụng và duyên dáng. Tôi thực sự cảm ơn họ thực sự. Đó sẽ là một phần trong những kỷ niệm tuyệt vời của tôi ở việt nam. Nếu bạn đang tìm homestay ở hội an, tôi chắc chắn rằng nơi này sẽ mang đến cho bạn những khoảnh khắc đẹp như tôi.
Cô chú cực kì dễ thương, phòng ốc ngày nào cũng được giặt rất thơm, ngủ cứ như cảm giác ở nhà vậy. Phòng có nhà vệ sinh thiết kế đẹp, thơm, thoáng và cưc kì sạch.
Rất tuyệt vời. Cô chú chủ nhà nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Phòng sạch đẹp

Homestay đẹp, phòng ốc dễ thương, sạch sẽ. Cô chủ nhà rất thân thiện, cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí, hướng dẫn tận tình cách di chuyển và địa điểm ăn uống trong hội an. Có điều homestay hơi xa trung tâm 1 chút.
Cách khu phố cổ không xa, chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình và dễ thương, cơ sở sạch sẽ. Tốt
Chủ rất đáng yêu, thân thiện, phòng rất sạch sẽ, nói chung là rất tuyệt
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình - phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi. Có dịp sẽ quay lại
Chủ của homestay không hiếu khách lắm.
Tất cả các dịch vụ đều rất tuyệt vời và đáng yêu.

Blue lake homestay rất tuyêt. Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ và thoáng. Cô chú chủ rất nhiệt tình chỉ mình đường đi và cả các quán ăn đặc sản hội an. Còn cho mượn xe đạp chạy vòng phố cổ luôn nhá. Nếu có dịp đến hội an mình sẽ vẫn lựa chọn blue lake homestay.
Chủ homestay nhiệt tình, thân thiện

Phòng cực kì sạch và đẹp. Mình ở phòng 2 giường khá rộng, cô chủ gấp khăn hình thiên nga rất chuyên nghiệp, toilet rất đẹp. Cô chủ dễ thương và nhiệt tình chỉ cho chỗ ăn chơi ngon bổ rẻ và còn cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí. Tuy không sát bên phố cổ nhưng các bạn vẫn có thể đạp xe mất tầm 5-10ph vừa ngắm nhìn bình yên của hội an vừa tốt cho sức khỏe nè. Nếu quay lại hội an chắc chắn mình vẫn sẽ chọn blue lake homestay làm nơi lưu trú
Chủ nhà rất tốt và thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ và thoải mái, không khí trong lành. Tôi nghĩ rằng tôi sẽ trở lại đó vào những ngày lễ tiếp theo.
Khách sạn đẹp, duy chỉ có cánh cửa ngoài thông ra chỗ cầu thang, hơi không riêng tư lắm.
Phòng sạch sẽ , thoải mái , cô chủ nhà siêu dễ thương

Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ , cô chú home vui vẻ hơi xa phố cổ tí nhưng đáng ở nhé
Cô chú chủ homestay siêu dễ thương. Mượn xe đạp miễn phí, cô chú cũng chỉ cho nhiều chỗ ăn chơi nữa. Siêu đề cử cho mọi người
Phòng y hình, sạch sẽ, cô chú chủ nhiệt tình chu đáo, giá cả quá rẻ cho phòng như thế nào
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thiết bị tốt
Phòng sạch sẽ, cô chú chủ nhà nhiệt tình, yên tĩnh để nghỉ ngơi

Nhiều muỗi lắm, cắn đỏ cả chân. Chăn ga gối siêu cũ và bẩn.bực nhất là khi đến thuê giặt đồ thì mình bảo hôm sau tầm 8h30- 9h mình đi, nhưng không mấy hôm sau trời mưa to nên mình ở tới 10h hơn, mà cô chủ cứ nói đi nói lại là sao con bảo 9h con đi , rồi nhớ trả tiền giặt đồ cho chú, ơ chẳng lẽ quỵt của cô chú 100k giặt đồ.

Hoan nghênh các bạn đến với khách sạn sóng xanh, ở đây các bạn sẽ được hoà mình vào thiên nhiên hoa lan đua nhau khoe sắc, bà chủ thì kể chuyện với bạn từ sáng đến tối khiến bạn không thể cảm thấy nhạt nhẽo mà luôn bừng bừng sức sống
Cô chủ nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ giá cả phải chăng
Rất tuyệt vời khách sạn sạch sẽ cô chủ dễ thương lần sau sẽ tới nữa
Phòng sạch sẽ ,thoáng mát chủ homestay chu đáo

Cô chú chủ nhà tại homestay rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Khi biết mình quên cmnd tại homestay thì cô chú đã ship giúp mình thẳng ra ga đà nẵng cho kịp lên tàu nếu cơ hội quay lại hội an thì mình vẫn sẽ chọn homestay này
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, chỉ chỗ ăn chơi ngon nhiệt tình. Địa chỉ hơi xa khu phố cổ xíu nhưng rất yên tĩnh

Không gian sạch sẽ. Cô nhiệt tình hướng dẫn địa điểm tham quan, cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí để đi tham quan phố cổ. Tuy nhiên nhà cô hơi xa trung tâm phố cổ nên phù hợp với những ai ở từ 2 ngày trở lên. Do mình chỉ ở 1 ngày nên dùng xe máy di chuyển sẽ nhanh và tiện hơn.

Blue lake là nhà, không phải homestay. Không trầm lắng, hoài niệm như khu phố cổ, blue lake nép mình trong một khu dân cư rất yên tĩnh, hiền hoà như cái cách của những người dân nơi đây sinh sống và khoản đãi mọi người, những vị khách phương xa mong tìm về chốn bình yên nói blue lake là nhà cũng không ngoa, khi những vị khách bất kể quê quán, quốc tịch đều được mọi thành viên trong gia đình nơi đây đón tiếp, chiêu đãi mà theo tôi nghĩ là có phần hơi quá mức thân thiết và dễ thương chẳng hề tìm thấy một khoảng cách nào giữa khách và chủ nhà, khi họ, những con người nơi đây, luôn tìm mọi cách để giúp những người lữ khách có cảm một giác gần gũi, thân thuộc như đang ở nhà dù cho có thể là khác xa nhau về văn hoá. Một nơi, mà khi bất kì ai có lỡ chân ghé lại và tận hưởng cái không khí đầm ấm nơi đây, nếu có đến thăm (hay quay lại) hội an, và nếu đó là cái cảm giác bình yên mà bạn đang tìm kiếm cho chính bản thân, thì blue lake vẫn sẽ luôn ở đó, đợi và chờ những vị lữ khách lỡ chân
Vị trí hơi xa khu trung tâm nhưng gần 2 ngôi chùa cổ. Nhà đẹp, chủ nhân nhiệt tình đặc biệt chăn mền sạch thơm, tinh tươm. Chị chủ còn khéo tay xếp khăn thành 2 con thiên nga tuyệt đẹp. Thích!

Phòng ở đây sạch sẽ và rất đẹp, đẹp hơn cả homestay mình ở trên đà nẵng. Cô chú chủ nhà thân thiện lắm, các bạn có chìa khoá cổng riêng, đi chơi 24/24 thoải mái mà không lo làm phiền cô chú, về tự mở cửa. Ban ngày có thể mượn chú xe đạp lượn quanh hội an (miễn phí), chú còn tự tay bơm lốp cho nhé. Tuy đi hơi xa trung tâm 1 tí nhưng ở cực kì thoải mái và an ninh. Có dịp xuống hội an lần nữa chắc chắn sẽ đặt phòng ở đây.
Tuyet voi ong mat troi!

Cô chủ rất tận tình giới thiệu về các món ăn, đường đi lại. Đặc biệt khi mình về cô đi vắng, cô còn nhắn tin hỏi mình sao về sớm vậy, chúc mình chuyến đi vui vẻ nữa. Nói chung sau này có cơ hội quay lại hội an, nhất định sẽ ghé cô.
Chu râ t nhiê t ti nh, dê thương

Hai cô chu râ t nhiê t ti nh, tiê p đo n mi nh niê m nơ như ngươ i trong gia đi nh. Pho ng rô ng ra i, sa ch se , thoa ng ma t va do mi nh hên đi giư a tuâ n nên đươ c mô t mi nh mô t căn pho ng to tâ n 7 giươ ng. Nha cô nhung chi ca ch phô cô chư ng 1.5km, đă c biê t cô cho mươ n xe đa p free. Thâ t không co điê m gi đê chê ca , lâ n tơ i nê u co thăm hô i an ma đi theo nho m/1 mi nh thi chă c chă n se ghe thăm cô chu
Cô chủ dễ thương hết nấc. Sẽ quay lại hội an vì homestay ở đây.
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, dễ thương, ông bà chủ cực kì cực kì thân thiện đi hội an mà không biết ăn gì cứ hỏi cô bảo đảm vừa ngon vừa rẻ. Giá cả hợp lí
Phòng tốt, tuy nhiên, hơi xa khu phố cổ, phải tốn thêm chi phí di chuyển.
Tuyệt vời. Nói chung cả mình và bạn đều rất sốc vì độ đẹp của nơi ở. Mình sẽ quay lại vào năm sau
Homestay khá tuyệt. Cô chủ rất vui tính và dễ thương. Phòng ở sạch, thoáng. Toilet sạch sẽ, tiện lợi.
Phòng đẹp, rất sạch sẽ và trong lành. Nhân viên rất thân thiện và hữu ích. Xe đạp miễn phí. Mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo
