Tôi sẽ trở lại blue lake homestay, khi tôi trở lại hội an. Mọi thứ hơn cả một kì nghỉ thông thường.
Sạch sẽ, đẹp, gia đình cô chú thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Homestay khá gần các khu tham quan.
Cô chú chủ nhà thân thiện nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ rộng rãi. Nhưng hơi xa phố cổ một chút
Lễ tân thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ thoãi mái. Nếu có dịp sẽ ghé lại khách sạn này
2 bác chủ nhà rất là dễ gần, tốt bụng. Phòng ở sạch sẽ, thoáng mát ngoài mong đợi. Sân vườn thoáng mát, buổi tối thì thơ mộng. Cho mượn xe đạp chạy đi bất cứ đâu. Tuyệt vời! mình rất thích nơi đây.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, phòng đẹp. Chủ nhà thân thiện, lịch sự, hướng dẫn khách tận tình, lúc trả phòng vào buô i trưa, cô chủ còn đãi dưa hấu ăn mát, sẽ quay lại vào lần sau
Ở đây có kỉ luật, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng.
Chủ nhà rất tốt bụng và niềm nở. Tôi được nhận phòng sớm và gửi hành lý sau khi trả phòng. Chú chó của họ rất dễ thương. Lần sau đến hội an, tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.
Vị trí thuận lợi, phòng sach sẽ, khu vực yên tĩnh
Tuyệt vời 10 điểm luôn, phòng thơm tho sạch sẽ 5 điểm, chị chủ dễ thương 4 điểm, ghế mát xa miễn phí sau 1 ngày đi bộ mệt lừ 1 điểm, tổng 10/10 rất hài lòng
Cô chủ với chị kế toán . Nói chung là 10 điểm tuyệt vời , thân thiện , nhiệt tình
Giá rất rẻ trong phố cổ mà phòng rất sạch sẽ, wc cũng sạch, em sẽ quay lại lần sau ạ
Thích hợp là một nơi để ngủ khi du lịch hội an chủ nhà rất hiền, vui tính
Phòng rộng rãi và sạch sẽ. Chủ sở hữu là tốt đẹp, thân thiện và cẩn thận. Không có gì để than phiền.
Điều hoà không sử dụng được, phòng bình thường
Phòng sạch sẽ, khá gần phố cổ, đi bộ tầm 10p, nhân viên niềm nở.

Havre de paix proche de la vieille ville de hoi an. Les gérants sont vraiment très attentionnés et font en sorte qu on ne manque de rien. J émets un seul bémol pour moi qui aime les petits déjeuners continentaux, ça n était pas à mon goût mais d autres qui préfèrent le salé et le local seront ravis je pense. C est calme et c est très appréciable, les chambres sont faites tous les jours, la piscine est propre, l hôtel est à 10mn à pieds de la vieille ville.
Clean and well located, good breakfast helpful staff
Every thing is very accessible from this place
飯店在巷弄內 晚上很安靜 可以睡的很好 走路到大街約10分鐘 不會太遠 位置很好 房間剛進入有點潮濕的味道 打開通風後會好很多 浴室熱水器要先打開開關才有熱水 水壓正常 但廁紙太潮濕都皺皺的 也可能我們去的期間一直下雨的關係...晚上可以先挑選隔日早餐 飯 麵 越南麵包都有 附飲料和水果 口味較清淡 分量適當 兩隻店狗可愛親人 老闆也很親切都會主動打招呼 家庭出遊選擇連通房很便利
Hôtel superbe. A l écart de la vieille ville pour un coin tranquille tout en restant accessible à pied

Absolutely superb stay at this lovely quaint location. Autumn and her family , including her beautiful 3 year old daughter and 3 adorable chiwawawas , made us feel so so welcome. Couldn t fault anything at all and so central to old town. We left early as hadn t realised it was winter and still rainy season but nothing to do with hotel or staff. Thru were faultless. We will definitely be returning . The bonsai trees outside were out of this world as were the other small additions and i couldn t recommend highly enough. As for any trips etc autumn organised all this for us and couldn t have helped more. Thank you so much for a great stay xxxx

Et dejligt lille hotel i gåafstand til det huserende gadeliv med boder, marked, gadekøkkener og dejlige restauranter. Hotellet drives af en familie som er utrolig hjælpsomme og imødekommende. Værelserne er rene og pæne og har det nødvendige man har brug for. Morgenmaden vælges om aftenen der er flere valgmuligheder, fra æg i flere variationer til frugt og juice, vi supplerede selv med lidt ost da dette ikke var med på mad kortet. Der er cykler som kan lejes og der er dejlige cykel områder i omegnen. Vi vil helt sikkert komme igen til dette lille stille hotel hvor alt ånder af hygge

We lived at bonsai villa for 3 nights. Small and very cosy hotel. The owner is really nice and made sure we had a great stay. The room is clean and the yard with the pool is quiet. The location of the hotel is great. Quiet atmosphere and only a 10 minute walk to the centre of old town. The hotel has bicycles so you can get around easily. We didn t use them, but probably would have if we were staying longer. The breakfast was delicious! we were lucky and got an extra hour before check out to just chill by the pool. Thanks for a lovely stay! we recommend this place to anyone traveling to hoi an.

Top!!! struttura accogliente e molto pulita. Menzione particolare per la proprietaria sempre disponibile, risolve ogni vostra richiesta, partendo dai tour agli spostamenti minimi ed a quelli più articolati, di una gentilezza disarmante. Posizione perfetta, ubicato in una zona tranquilla ma comoda per raggiungere il centro in pochi minuti di cammino. Assolutamente consigliato!!!
Ein lauschiger, ruhiger ort. Das homestay heisst nicht nur bonsai. Im schönen, sehr gepflegten garten stehen viele prächtige bonsais. Ein herrliches ambiente!
Excellent location, excellent service....everything is excellent!!!!
Le couple qui possède cet hôtel est au devant de nos besoins.
Excellent friendly clean informative to surrounding area

This hotel is gorgeous. Owners take great pride in keeping the hotel clean and comfortable for their guests. I appreciated the bonsai trees and the work that goes into them. Beautiful! the rooms are big and comfortable. The breakfast was also very delicious and fresh.

Bonsai villa was amazing. The hosts were so accommodating and friendly and the rooms comfortable and clean. Set within a beautiful bonsai courtyard, the villa was a lovely place to stay away from the bustle of the old town.
Fantastisk sted og mennesker! hagen er nydelig, rommene rene og servicen upåklagelig! virkelig et fint opphold

The bonsai villa was fantastic. The staff were very welcoming and accommodating. The hotel is close to the shopping district and the breakfasts were amazing. Autumn was very helpful with booking tours, etc. The area this hotel is in, is far away enough from the hustle bustle, but close enough to walk to the markets, tailors, etc.

Bonsai villa is about a 10min walk to the old town and we felt safe walking home late in the evening from the old town. It s a family run villa and is a lovely quiet place. The owner is very nice and helpful with all our queries. Lots of large, beautiful bonsai in the garden. Sadly, we have been too busy to utilise the pool, which was very inviting during the hot day.

The front desk staff was so lovely and helpful. We were a short walk from the market, so away from the business and noise but close enough to walk. The rooms were great and clean. Breakfast was fantastic.
Eine sehr schöne unterkunft mit einem herrlichen außenbereich. Für entspannung sorgt der pool und die leise umgebung. Die altstadt und hoi an memories sind fußläufig leicht zu erreichen.

Utrolig hyggeligt sted. Smuk gårdhave med bonsai træer og flotte karper samt pool. Desværre havde vores ene værelse en vandskade, man kunne se væggen boblede og der var en fugtig lugt som var meget anderledes end i det andet værelse. Håber det bliver fikset, for det var ellers et rigtig godt ophold og meget søde værter.
Fantastique
Excellent service, very good breakfast, very good location
Muy lindo hotel, habitación muy amplia, gran jardín para desayunar con tranquilidad, excelente atención, muy buena ubicación, muy tranquila la zona y a 5 minutos de la ciudad antigua

I stayed here for twelve nights. It is absolutely delightful and situated in a residential area within easy walking or cycling distance from the old town. The family made be feel thoroughly at home. My room was large and clean with excellent security. There is good wardrobe space and air conditioning. It was really like being a guest within the small community and provides a wonderful insight into the day to day lives of the local people. People are friendly and there are local small cafes and restaurants some of which are excellent and cheap. One restaurant is opposite the town market and has seating by the river. Autumn speaks good english and the family, including lulu the little dog will make you feel at home. The included breakfasts are amazing. There are free bicycles and can nam island is well worth exploring. The bonsai garden is relaxing and private. There is a small pool.

This homestay probably has the most tranquil courtyard of any on cam nam island outside of hoi an. The room and bath were the largest of any i stayed at in vietnam in the same price range. And it is only a 10-15 minute walk outside of the main area of hoi an.
Dejligt sted med have. God valgfri morgenmad og rummelige værelser. Hyggeligt værtspar.
Nice and cozy place, with good service and follow up from autumn, the manager.
Hotel was very good couldn t fault it helped us book trip and flight staff were excellent great location will visit again in near future

This very nice homestay a few minutes away from the heart of old town hoi an is a perfect spot for a quiet stay in this amazing city. On too of the very nice owners , the more than 70 bonsaïs garden and the pool makes this place a good place to rest after a day at the beach or in hoi an old district. The lend bikes for free , perfect to visit the city and even head to the beach . Definitely a good choice

The staff was extremely welcoming and attentive. Check in was fast and cordial. The hotel was clean and beautifully decorated. As soon as you walk in, you see the beautiful swimming pool in the courtyard and many bonsai trees. The architecture and furnishings are beautiful. We stayed in the double family suite, which was huge for the three of us. The hotel is in a great location just down the street from the main road of shops and restaurants. Overall we just loved the bonsai villa and regretted leaving! we will stay again on our next trip, 5 stars are absolutely deserved!

Beautiful hotel in a great location. You can walk to ancient town in 10 minutes. Breakfast was great and the husband and wife owners are very helpful and accomodating (they assisted me when my cell phone broke) i would stay there again in the future

This villa had everything that we needed for our stay, it was across the bridge which we loved for some peace and quiet. The owner had a great attitude and helped us with everything we needed. The breakfast was ok, but it was good taking everything in consideration! would definitely stay here again!

Nous sommes restés 2 jours sur les 6 réservés et payés. Notre chambre était pleine de moisissures, insupportable pour mon épouse asthmatique. Nous nous sommes rabattus sur un homestay a proximité, impeccable lui.

Bonsai villa was a wonderful to stay and easy walking access to hoi an ancient town. Autumn, who checked us in, explained everything in great detail and made sure that we chose our breakfast items for the next morning. She was very kind and helpful. Our family of four shared one room and we were very comfortable. The room and bathroom were very clean. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting hoi an.

Very friendly and helpful staff. Very nice property and garden, lot of bonsai tree and dedicated work to maintain the garden. Location is good, about 10 minutes to where the action is in hoi an but yet very quiet to rest. I would recommend this place without hesitation.
We stayed here for 17 nights and couldn t fault it. Great position, fabulous hosts, comfortable room, delicious breakfasts and a nice pool to cool off in on hot afternoons. Don t stay anywhere else.

This homestay is a great place to stay if you visit hoi an. Located just a 10 minute walk from town (5 minutes by bike provided free by the homestay). It is very relaxing and quiet after a hot day in town or at the beach. Large rooms, all opening out to the bonsai garden. The garden is also a place to sit an talk with other guests, read, talk to the hosts about trips you want to take, or just for a dip in the small pool to cool down. Good breakfast, and good sleep quality. Both ac, fan and mosquito net in room. They also provide airport transport (both ways), and a driver if you want to go off by yourself to see places. Very good wi-if connection. Hoi an is a must-visit in vietnam, people are friendly and helpful. Go for the recommended spas if you want quality massage, and remember to bargain with the the tailors and shops

Bonsai homestay is an oasis calm in the hustle and bustle of vietnam. I visited there towards the end of a whistle-stop tour of vietnam, laos and cambodia and it was one of the best places i stayed by far. The family who run it are really chilled out and helpful. Attentive, friendly, but not in your face. The room was well equipped with aircon, a great shower and really strong wifi. If you re going to hoi an, the bonsai s worth a visit.
早餐現做 簡單但吃的飽 家犬很親人很可愛 園藝設計很漂亮
Nice homestay
Great value for money great location lovely breakfast great service

You will not find a more aestheically pleasing place to stay in hoi an. It s filled with gorgeous bonsais, a koi pond, and wonderful singing birds (caged). The decor is tastefil, modern and comfortable. Everything is in excellent repair and kept spotless. Autumn, the owner, is welcoming and kind and speaks great english. Great breakfasts too as well as bicycles for free use. I found it calm and restful and much needed after walking around in the bustle if old town all day. Bonsai is on the very non-touristy island of cam nam, yet only a 7 minute walk from the central market and the old city. You won t regret staying here!

Surtout, séjournez à bonsai homestay, un vêritable hôtel trois étoiles. Autumn la proprietaire de ce lieu ravissant, calme et à coté du centre ville du vieux hoï an recoit ses guests avec grande gentillesse et attention. Le petit dejeuner est à la hauteur de nos demande. Lieu extremement propre, grandes chambres avec salle de bain desing et la possibilite de se detendre dans une maglfique piscine entourée des plus beaux bonsaïs.. Un vrai havre de paix.

The staff are so incredibly friendly and helpful. Pool is nice and the outside area is lovely. Room is nice and spacious and generally quite clean although towels have been grubby. Breakfast is good, you choose the night before what you want. Location is good and just a short walk to the market. It s also great that they let you use the bikes.

This family run hotel is the perfect place to stay in hoi an. It was quiet and had a great clean swimmimg pool for cooling down in the heat. The beds were great, breakfast was superb. Autumn was very helpful in arranging train trips and tours and local points of interest. Bottom line, this would be my hotel of choise if i ever returned.
Struttura tenuta con cura in ogni suo aspetto. Personale gentile. Posizione ottima e biciclette gratuite

Wonderful stay at beautiful bonsai villa. Very clean rooms with very comfortable bed and good breakfast. In a lovely quiet area so you get a good sleep. Only a short walk to the market and old town. Plenty of transport options if you don t want the short walk. We appreciate all their help with recommendations for eating, laundry etc.

We were two friends staying at bonsai villa for 3 nights, and we can only give our best recommendations. The room was big, clean, nice bathroom/shower and the staff was so friendly and welcoming. Breakfast was good and made to order (we ordered the night before, and then they had it ready when we came down in the morning, so no waste of food not being eaten!). The entire place has a very cozy feel, with the garden filled with the beautiful bonsai trees, and in easy walking distance to the central old quarter of hoi an (but away from the mass tourist circus!). The staff was also helpful in providing us information about sights and helping to organize transfer. We also borrowed bicycles for free, however i need to say that they were in very poor condition, so would not count on using them for a longer bike trip around town.
Flot og meget velholdt sted. Meget smukt poolområde og morgenmandsrestaurant. Absolut intet at klage over.

Bad noisy room. Lighting in bathroom was terrible. It 5 min to light fully and even then you could not see anything. Furniture and fixtures was old. We conplained but since they were fully booked we could not change the room. However no comensation in any form was presented to us.

Все было просто отлично ( сервис, территория, бассейн ) , но был маленький не очень приятный момент. У меня было 3 мая день рождение и отель ( впервые в моих посещениях вьетнама с 1996 года ) меня не поздравил . Это меня очень удивило .

After staying 4 days in hoi an town i wanted to spend my last 4 days right on the beach. I really enjoyed the nice clean beach and the pool area. But all in all it was the least friendly hotel i experienced in my 2 weeks vietnam tour. It might have been different for someone else. I had one dinner at the hotel and that was the bbq night which i did not find very good. But most of all i was extremely annoyed by the fact that it was a total non smoking hotel. You only were allowed to smoke on the far right side of the beach. Not even on your balcony! i did not follow that rule and always went to my terrace to have my cigarette. That s is also the reason i did not dine at the hotel except that first evening because i need my smoke during meals especially if it is outside. The free shuttle gave me the opportunity to go into town for dinner.
Lovley beach side location, and attractive spacious layout. Not close to town centre, but the regular free shuttle service meant this was not an issue.

Bien atmosphère sereine et la beauté des jardins et le confort. Moins bien les fruits du petit déjeuner il n y a pas de mangue et de pomelos ! et seulement, ananas que nous aimons. Nous n aimons pas les autres fruits ! et, la femme de chambre ne remet pas les coussins et les autres deco sur le lit c est dommage. ..!
Lovely hotel amazing pool and close to the beach with a shuttle into town
가격대비 좋음. 도마뱀 조금 있음.
부대시설 굿. 위치 굿. 정말 휴양이 목적이라면 여기 핵꿀
Everything was very good ,, except the reception did not tell us where to rent bicycles. We walked around for two hours until we realized that we could rent just outside the hotel
수영장이 깊어서 맘에 들었고 모든 직원이 친절해서 좋았어요 룸상태도 좋았어요
모두 매우만족 임니다. 특히 수영장이 너무 좋았어요 비 가 조금 내렸지만 물 이 따뜻해서 전혀 문제가 없었습니다 조식도 나름 좋았습니다

The check in was excellent, the room was great and the position of the hotel was ideal. The shuttle bus is perfect because it means that you get the benefit of staying on a beach but seeing as much as you like of the town. With the exception of one barman, the staff were excellent but he did bring our rating down because he was rude to my husband and also because i found it off putting that he picked his nose and ate its contents in front of me and then delivered my cutlery. Personal habits are different in vietnam but anyone in any country should be aware that something like that is unacceptable.

Et helt fantastisk sted med en beliggenhet mot eget område på stranden hvor det var god plass. Flotte uteområder i forhold til bassengområde, parkanlegg og beliggenhet i forhold til boenhetene som var sentralt, men samtidig nok tilbaketrukket for å kunne være for en selv. Hygglig og svært serviceinnstilt personale som var med på å gjøre oppholdet supert.
엄마랑 둘이 다녀왔습니다! 한국인이 별로 없어서 더욱 해외에 온 느낌을 받았어요 정말 좋았고 프라이빗 비치까지 매일 이용하였습니다!! 조식은 한국인이 먹기에 조금 별로일수있으나 빵은 정말 맛있었어요 ! 그리고 과일과 요거트를 먹었습니다 ㅎㅎㅎㅎㅎㅎ 엄마도 아주아주 만족했던 리조트였어요 올드타운 무료셔틀버스 매일 이용했구요 ! 다음에 또 오고싶어요

8월에 다녀왔는데 지금 후기 남깁니다. 여러 호텔을 찾다가 지인이 추천해서 다녀왔습니다. 서양인과 차별한다, 서비스가 좋지 않다는 후기들이 있어 걱정하는 마음을 갖고 방문했습니다. 걱정은 기우인듯 헬로우 음료부터 방 안내까지 서비스 좋았으며, 차별은 없었습니다. 또한, 다른 리조트는 모르겠지만 이 리조트 문 여닫는 방식이 조금 특이해 매번 애를 먹었습니다. 하우스키핑해주는 직원분들이 친절히 알려주셨지만 마지막까지 어려움을 겪고 왔습니다. 문 여닫는 어려움 빼고는 만족스러운 숙소였으며, 1월 재방문 하려합니다
This was one of the most satisfying stay in viet nam.the staff was kind enough to prepare vegan option and the facility was decent and adorable.
Situated next to the beach. They have a good shuttle service to the center of hoi an.

This hotel is good value for what you get, right on the beach, great pool, nice spa, small gym. However although there is a lift it does not cater for all floors. If your room is on the ground then you can get to the restaurant ok but have to climb stairs to the lobby, if you are on the lobby upwards you have to climb stairs to get to the restaurant, this wasn t much good for my mother, whom having had foot surgery recently found it very difficult, given a lot of older people stay here consideration should be given to ensure that there is a lift that reaches all floors. I also wasn t very impressed that due to the noise of a family group i was required to move rooms to a lesser quality block which had no view and was not as good as the room i was moved from.

Our trip to hoi an was awesome. The boutique hoi an resort was fantastic. The staff were wonderful, the food was amazing and the service was unquestionable. Everyone made us very welcomed and it was lovely to see there beautiful ,smiling faces everyday. Eagerly looking forward to going back to this resort.
Great hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Amazing beach. Not a lot of restaurants around the hotel however. Shuttle bus to hoian does not run frequently enough.

쉐라톤 그랜드 2박, 호이안 히스토릭 1박, 부티크 1박, 총 4박 중 제일 맘에 들었던 숙소입니다. 적당한 사이즈의 풀에 쉐라톤과는 다르게 수심이 차츰 깊어지는 풀이라 성인 커플들이 즐기기 좋았고, 프라이빗 비치 역시 적당히 붐벼 풀과 비치 모두 이용하기 좋았습니다. 객실은 부티크라는 이름에 걸맞게 매우 이쁜 편이였고, 가격또한 쉐라톤같은 메인 리조트들에 비해 저렴해 가성비에서 좋게 평가하고 싶습니다. 자연과 잘 어울러져 쉬는 느낌을 받기 좋고, 가장 좋았던건 한국인 손님들이 적었어서 외국에서 휴양을 즐긴다는 느낌이 가장 강했습니다. 안방비치와 가깝고 프라이빗비치 또한 매우 훌륭하면서 호이안 구시가지 셔틀도 있고 택시비도 얼마 나오지 않아, 휴양과 관광을 병행하기도 좋았습니다. 쉐라톤과는 다르게 풀빌라 역시 완공되어 손님들이 이용중이라 적당한 가성비에 휴양을 즐기기 좋을듯합니다
4인가족 이용하기 침대가 조금 작았지만 서비스 짱! 쉬다오기 정말 좋아요. 친절도 짱입니다.
Excellent
This a great resort, lovely big pool, close access to the beach, friendly staff and very good service. Great breakfast included in price.

It was so good. It was nature-friendly, swimming pool, the hospitality of the female manager, hotel breakfast service was so perfect. But the sound of the air conditioner outdoor unit, which was ringing so loudly at bedtime, disturbed my good sleep. I want to recommend it to my parents, but i m afraid they ll lose sleep because they re sensitive to the sound.
We enjoyed our stay at boutique hoi an resort a lot. Very big swimming pool, nice beach, big and super comfortable room. Staff were friendly and helpful.

Gute lage, mit eigenem strandabschnitt, i.d.r. Ausreichend liegen vorhanden. Liegen die über längere zeit nur mit dem handtuch geblockt waren, wurden während unseres aufenthaltes vom personal geräumt, so das sie wieder für jedermann zur verfügung standen. Nette lokale in unmittelbarer nähe. Frühstück sehr abwechslungsreich und ansprechend, das bbq-diner können wir empfehlen. Kostenloser shuttlebus nach hoi an.
Hôtel de plage extrêmement mal entretenu, sale avec un niveau de service quasi nul.
Staff were so friendly food was good and very reasonably priced
Es war absolut wundervoll! das personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit, das essen ist lecker, die anlage ein traum- immer wieder gerne
호이안부티크 전용비치 잘되어있어 참 좋아요, 룸이 가성비 비해 좋아요,가족여행하기 좋았어요, 앞 발코니도넓고, 직원들 엄청 친절합니다 다만 불편한건, 주위에 한국 물건이나 음식 찾기가 매우불편하니 아이동반이나 필요한 물품음식 꼭 잘 챙겨가세요 (매점이 맥주물거기나라과자그런것밖에없음)
객실에 들어가자 곰팡이 냄새가 심하게 나고 침구가 눅눅했음. 습기때문에 계속 문을 열어 환기했으며 자고 일어나자 목이 아프고 몸이 가려움. 하지만 턴다운 서비스나 직원들은 친절했으며 프라이빗 비치나 수영장등의 시설과 조경은 휼륭함.
Friendly staff, location, great swimming pool, clean beach. The rooms are clean and comfortable. We booked in for a week and ended up staying for 3 weeks.

Everything about the boutique hoi an resort was fantastic. While it is a resort, it s smaller and more intimate, and therefore doesn t feel massive and cold like many resorts do. The private beach was absolutely beautiful, with very comfortable lounge chairs and umbrellas set up for guests to use. The pool area was also beautiful, although i have to admit i spent most of my time at the beach. The beach bar was one of my favorite spots to relax and have a drink in a stunning beachfront setting and the breakfast buffet was great. The room we had was also fantastic - large, lots of light, very clean, and just super comfortable and calming to be in. The staff was so friendly and accommodating, and we felt totally taken care of the entire time, and the free shuttle into old town was a great perk that the hotel offers. I can t recommend this property enough, it was one of my favorite hotels that i ve stayed in and will 100 stay again when i m back in hoi an.
그냥 그냥 조용한 리조트.
Resort is on a beautiful part of the beach. All the staff are wonderful and the resort is immaculately maintained.

I accidentally came across this hotel over a year ago and was pleasantly surprised. During my third visit to vietnam i looked forward to staying here more than any other hotel. Friendly staff. Nice room. Lovely pool, quiet beech, nice cocktails, affordable and good massage (recommend vietnamese) and the breakfast is very good.

그 전 숙소가 서비스나 청결도가 넘 별로였어요 그에 비하면 호이안은 전반적으로 괜찮았어요 일단 조식때 입구에 들어서면 남자직원들이 헬로우라며 꼭 먼저 인사를 해주시고 의자까지 먼저 빼주는 서비스에 넘 좋았어요 수영장 물도 깨끗하고 해변이랑 가까워서 물놀이하기 좋았네요 저녁에 밖에 도마뱀들이 보여서 아이들이 좋아했어요 마지막날 체크아웃때 저희가 전날과 전전날 야외바에서 먹은 음료가 계산이 잘 못 되서 확인부탁드렸더니 5-10분정도 다시 확인후 죄송하다고 하더니 금액 정정해서 계산했네요 외국에서는 한번 더 확인해주는게 꼭 필요하다는걸 다시한번 느꼈어요 하지만 전반적으로 아이들도 잘 놀고 조식도 먹을만해서 좋았어요
프론트 직원이 너무너무 불친절해요. 유독 여자직원 한명 ㅠ 실명을 공개하고 사과받고 싶을만큼 불쾌감을 느꼈네요.

This place is stunning. You are right next to the beach and have access to a large pool and gym. I recommend getting one of the suits then you get view of the grounds when you wake up which is beautiful. The rooms are spacious with everything you could need. The resort it s self is a 20 min drive from hoi an town. But with the free shuttle bus or grab (uber for asia) you can get into town when ever for about 4, 2 if you dare to take a bike. We found it nice to be out of the town it s self as it can be incredibly busy and noisy, great for a few hours but not 24/7.
Had a great time , the staff was excellent and helpful. The really do a great job of maintaining the property. The pool and the ocean is there for you to enjoy all day .

Das resort ist sehr schön angelegt mit einem tollen pool und nicht zu groß. Leider ist der strand nicht mehr so gut erhalten wie auf manchen bildern, da ein sturm vor einiger zeit den strand zum großteil abgetragen hat. Die betten sind bequem allerdings bei mehreren nächten etwas hart. Unser zimmer war in einem der gartenbungalows und nachts absolut ruhig.

지극히 개인적 주관 입니다. 가기전 한국인 별로 없는 곳 찾았습니다. 리조트 많이 보이기에 며칠 고민하다 부킹. 그냥 조용히 푹 쉬다 오려는게 주 목적. 때문에 한국 아이들 별로 없는곳 찾았네요. 정말 조용 합니다. 단 숙소 제외이고, 풀장은 한국 아이들과 그 엄마들 없을때만 입니다. 여기서 한국을 지칭한 이유는 한국 아이들만 있었기 때문입니다. 여기에 엄마들까지 합체하여 오전 부터 점심 식사 하러 가기전까지 그 조용한 풀장 워팍 되었고, 주변 웨스턴들 한시간 정도 참다가 다들 지들끼리 욕하기 시작 합니다. 이럴땐 영어를 몰랐으면.. 숙소는 일단 오전 9 30넘면 클리닝시작인지 엄청 시끄럽습니다. 늦잠 포기 해야합니다. 물론 제 방만 그런지는 확인 불가 합니다만, 제 방은 말 그대로 입니다. 9시이후 저녁엔 층간소음 대박 입니다. 아팟 살지만 소음 더 큽니다. 서비스(접객태도) 최악 까진 아니지만 거기에 준합니다. 이곳 후기중 차별 얘기가 자주 나와 조금 의아 했습니다. 제 생각엔 영어 소통등의 문제 아닐까 했는데, 아니더군요. 참고로 영어로 뭐 왠만한대 가도 죽지 않을정도 합니다. 차별합니다. 외국애들 엄청 많습니다. 8 2 정도.. 외국애들 현관 로비 들어오기 전부터 버선 마중 갑니다. 온 얼굴엔 미소와 함께. 동양인? 스텝 얼굴에 스마일 아주 가끔 보이고 귀찮아 하는게 눈에 보입니다. 영얼 잘하든 못하든 돈내고 지들 리조트 놀러 가주는데 미소는 기본 아닐까 합니다. 그게 싫음 전부 무뚝 하던가. 리셉셔니스트 부터 이러니 셔틀 드라이버까지 별롭니다. 일단 웨스턴 웃음, 한국인(채류시 한국인만 보였음) 무뚝뚝에 지들이 이해 못함 인상... 기가찹니다. 리셉셔니스트 제외 하면 카페테리어나, 바 등에 근무하는 수텝 상냥합니다. 4성 주제에 프라이드 하늘 찌르게 보입니다.(리셉션) 풀장 및 주변 시설 풀 좋습니다. 쾌적, 조용, 크고, 깨끗. 주변 바 가깝고 가격 비교적 쌉니다? 파이애플 볶음밥1, 500 맥주2, 이만원 조금 넘게 나왔네요. 프라이빗 비치 풀에서 걸어서 1분 입니다. 바다 수영 좋아하는데 안들어가게 되더군요.. 냄새 나거나 물이 더럽지 않습니다. 셔틀 좋습니다. 보통 택시로 올타운 까지 원화 오천원 정돈데 아낄수 있습니다. 샌딩, 픽업 모두 시간대 적절합니다. 단 10인승이라 피크시엔 사람 많아 다 탈수 있을지 어쩔지는 모르겠습니다 여기까지 후기 이고, 여기 고려 하시는 분들계심 도움 되시길 바랍니다. 참고로 이것 외에 더 실망 스러운 부분도 있지만 그 부분은 리조트 스텝 또는 메니저쪽 메일 확인되는데로 항의 하려합니다.
다낭에서 가본 시설중 가장 예쁜 리조트였어요 휴양과 관광모두를 즐기고 싶었는데 휴양지느낌으론 너무 좋았어요 단 올드타운에선 거리가 있어 셔틀을 이용했답니다
조용한곳 원하시는 분께 강추에요 외관도 무지이쁘구요 프라이빗 비치도 있어서 미케비치 안부러워요ㅋㅋㅋ 조식은 빵이 맛있어요 직원들도 괜찮았어요

Loved staying at the boutique hoi an resort.this was our second time to stay and it didn t disappoint.its building has a lovely colonial apperance and it has a beautiful pool and garden.it is also straight on the beach.breakfast is good too and rooms were great.real comfy bed.the hotel is about 5k from the town and the hotel operates a shuttle bus service which is real handy there are a few resturants within walking distance also from the hotel.
Comfortable bed, nice staff, located on a gorgeous beach. The shuttle to the city they offered was an awesome perk! i would absolutely love to stay here again.
I had a wonderful stay, the staff was so helpful and friendly. The resort is gorgeous, right on the beach and the breakfast was excellent.

The weather was warm but it rained on and off the entire trip which was disappointing- no fault of the hotel obviously. The hotel was clean, well maintained however the toilet had a continuous flush unless you flicked the leaver a certain way. All facilities at the hotel were well kept and the staff were just so friendly and caring. Would def stay again if we returned.

We stayed here with family and loved it so much that, when other travel plans fell through, we booked it again last minute just me and my partner. Amazing beach and pool and lovely cosy rooms. Will always recommend when staying in hoi an!
Linh at reception was great. Reception and housekeeping lovely. Restaurant and bar staff average. Basic room
Beautiful setting, calming and relaxing- a truly memorable place to stay.

Excellent hotel with helpful staff.located on a nice beach with lounges and shade umbrellas available for guests. Hotel operates a free shuttle which takes 15 minutes to the old town. Highly recommended.
Beautiful hotel. Lovely clean room

Amazing hotel, fantastic location on beach, all staff so friendly helpful professional, nothing a problem for them, rooms spacious, breakfast one of the best we have had in the past 6 wks, free shuttle into hoi an centre a plus,
Our room was spacious and opened up onto the large swimming pool. The staff were fantastic nothing was too much trouble. We used the hotel s shuttle to go into and out of hoi an. Very convenient.
A lovely stay at this great hotel. Friendly staff and beautiful hotel made for a perfect stay

Virkelig smukt beach resort i ægte koloni-stil få km uden for hoi an. Store og meget rene værelser med balkon/terrasse og mange med udsigt til pool/have eller hav (vi boede i et premier room). Flotte bygninger, flot have og lige ud til en meget fin privat strand. Lækker morgenmad, lille men godt gym, gratis shuttlebus til byen flere gange dagligt (og retur). Virkelig effektiv laundry service og housekeeping. Der er spa på stedet, men vi var der kun en enkelt gang (og har prøvet bedre i vietnam). Vi var super glade for vores ophold i hoi an og kommer meget gerne igen. Jeg vil dog ikke kalde det for et boutique hotel med så mange værelser. Det er mere et resort for mange europæere og australiere, så vær forberedt på at liggestolene er godt booket allerede ved morgenmaden. Derimod er der masser af plads på stranden og der serveres virkelig gode juicer og iskaffe ved både pool-/og strandbar. Når hotellet ikke får topkarakter skyldes det alene, at personalet er meget lidt proaktivt og meget lidt smilende. Det var en meget stor kontrast til det, vi ellers oplevede på vores rundrejse i vietnam. Hotellet ligger ud til en stor vej, hvilket også fremgår af flere anmeldelser. Det er dog ikke noget du bemærker, når du er på resortet, da alle værelser vender ud mod haven (så vidt vi kunne se). Der er meget roligt på området (når de offentlige højtalere fra vejen ikke lige kommer med beskeder/musik).
A wonderful haven by the beach. Beautiful gardens, attentive and friendly staff

Loved the huge pool and gardens, but could do with a few more trees for shade. Very nice, large clean bedeoom with nice sheets. Breakfast buffet is decent. Staff are nice and helpful. The area around the hotel has very limited dining options, so most people us one of the shuttle buses to go into hoi an old town, which only takes about ten minutes and is also a very cheap taxi back. Would recommend as long as you aren t expecting to be in the busy area

1 week stay, very nice resort, quiet, great pool, spa and small gym. Buffet breakfast had huge range, and well stocked. Staff were amazing, and always there to help only disappointment for us was the beach was not what we expected. There is work being done so noisy machinery, but will be good when finished.
Beautiful property, staff are nice the rooms are clean
This property is exceptional. The service is amazing and the staff is so friendly. I would definitely come back here. It is a quiet location with a beautiful pool and private access to the beach.

This is our 3rd time staying at the boutique hoi an resort and will return again next year. All the staff are truly amazing and will do anything to make your holiday more enjoyable. Make sure you visit the restaurant across the road (co hong) for some home cooked food as well.
Sehr schönes hotel mit großer, sehr gepflegter und grüner gartenanlage, sehr freundliches personal, frühstück sehr gut, toller kostenloser shuttlebus nach hoi an
Security locks not working, safe not fixed to wall. Unimpressed by my experience
Very nice property and on beach. Breakfast was great and staff friendly. Didn t have modern charging device facilities but an adapter was ok.
Lin and all the staff were very welcoming and great! loved the property. Highly recommend.

Lovely hotel with superb pool and easy access to the beach. Just make sure that if you use the on-site dress-making service you go in there with a clear idea of what you want, what type of fabric and the colour(s). We found that the on-site dress-making service was not proactive in recommending designs and styles and that it was all very much down to you. They appeared to offer limited feedback of what they thought would be nice, complimentary and what would work best in terms of colour(s) and fabrics.
Nice hotel close to the beach. Free shuttle to hoi an.
Great hotel, right on the beach with easy access to hoi an old town just a free shuttle ride away. We will be back.

This was tranquil, luxurious, in an utterly beautiful location by the sea. Spa was wonderful. The resort was quiet in december and we felt we had visited a unique retreat. Bus service to hoi an gave us access to the hustle and bustle of a busy, tourist little town, which was exciting but it was great to get back to the peace of the resort waking up to the sound of the sea. Staff were lovely and the food was amazing. I would love to return sometime.
양코베이들이(특히노인분들) 많이가는 호텔이구요 직원들 서비스가 대부분 별로임. 서비스마인드가 없는듯?? 조식은 걍 그렇고 밥은 되도록 나가서 드셈요. 호텔 내 수영장,정원,해변 뷰는 최고임. 인정. 어 인정. ㅋㅋ 가성비 좋은지는 잘 모르겠슈

Great hotel right on the beach. Very quiet location, but they offer a free shuttle bus into hoi an old town........for the markets and to see it by night........well worth seeing. We didn t find the food and drink too expensive, but thye dinner menu could perhaps be a bit more varied. Breakfast was plentiful and sufficient choice of dishes. The pool was fantastic and very relaxing, with plenty of tables and loungers around it. The pool bar and beach bar were both excellent for snacks and drinks. We would return to this hotel again if travelling to hoi an.
한적하고 조용하고 깔끔했어요 너무 이쁜 리조트 또가고싶은곳
Lovely staff, however i think the pool staff should walk around offering food and drink for people sitting around the pool.
Loved all of it, thanks

리뷰가 별로 없었지만 호텔의 위치와 분위기만 믿고 방문했습니다. 늦은 체크인에 대한 사전 응대는 빨랐고 좋았습니다. 조용한 풀과 해변 정원도 좋았습니다. 네,, 거기까지만 좋았습니다. 투숙객이 별로 없으면 아침메뉴를 주문형으로 바꾸든지 그도 아니면 적은 가짓수에 맞게 질을 높여주세오. 숙박 체크 아웃하는 날 큰 케리어를 들고 계단으로 내려와서 택시를 탈 때 도와주지는 않더라도 다음에 또 보자는 인사 정도는 해주세요. 가방 낑낑 들고 내려와서 택시에 싣고 인사하려고 보니 우릴 보는 직원 하나 없어서 섭섭했습니다. 깨끗하고 조용한 풀에서 넓운 정원에서의 힐링은 너무 좋았는데 말이죠

프라이빗비치, 수영장 모두 다 좋았어요. 숙소 상태도 깨끗했고, 수압도 괜찮았습니다. 다만 샤워부스쪽 물빠짐은 조금 더뎠구요. 직원들 친절도는 케바케입니다. 친절한 직원도 좋게말하면 시크한거고 나쁘게 말하면 무뚝뚝하다고 할까요. 자기 할일만 꼭 필요한 응대만 합니다. 미소도 그 순간만 인종차별에 관한 코멘트가 가끔 보이던데 비슷한 경험을 하긴 했습니다. 한데 그 부분은 언어소통문제가 아닐까 합니다. 아무래도 동양인은 영어소통이(베트남인 영어발음이 우리가 알아듣기 조금 어렵습니다. 하긴 베트남인과 한국인이 영어로 소통을 하려는 것이니까 난망하죠 ) 원할하지 못한 경우가 많으니 애초에 접근 자체를 하지 않는 듯 합니다. 그부분만 신경쓰지 않으신다면 추천합니다. 리조트 수영장 또는 해변 비치체어에 앉아 느긋하게 즐기는 시간은 정말... 아 다시가고 싶습니다 리조트 앞 로컬 식당들 정말 좋았습니다. 이용 적극 추천합니다. 횡단보도 건너 바로 앞 카페, 저녁에 샘플러 시켜서 맥주한잔 했는데... ㅎㅎ 대박입니다 새장컨셉으로 나오는데 맛은 쏘쏘 한데 구성 알차고 좋습니다 6,000원에 이정도면 뭐 엄지척이죠 다른 co hong 인가 잘 기억안나는데 거기서 먹은 반쎄오도 맛있었습니다. 솔직히 제 입맛엔 그집이 호이안에서 먹은 반쎄오중 제일 맛있었습니다
뷰가 좋고... 조용하고 쉬기 딱좋았다

We had a great time at brother villa! it was about a 10 mins walk to the old city which was amazing. We did encounter a little problem in our room but the staff was very attentive and did the best they could.
Nhi and every staff we interacted with were all very welcoming, polite, and attentive.
Sweetest young woman at reception. Bed comfortable and room clean. Close to everything.
スタッフは親切で地図を示しておすすめのお店を教えてくれました また レンタサイクルが無料で使えたのも良かったです
직원들이 매우 친절했으며 조식 또한 맛있었습니다. 올드타운과 5분이내로 도보로 이동가능했고 다음에 방문해도 저렴한 가격으로 재방문 의사가 있습니다.
A lovely comfortable room! great location. Short walk to town. Nhi was super helpful with regards to tours, onward travel and free bike hire. Nice little pool to cool off in in the evening!

Vi boede på familie værelset, hvilket var fint til vores familie. Hotellet ligger lidt i kanten af byen, men med gåafstand til alt man har brug for. Pigen i receptionen var virkelig hjælpsom i forhold til hvad vi end havde af spørgsmål til oplevelser eller steder at spise. Hotellet havde cykler til gratis afbenyttelse - de kunne dog godt trænge til en fornyelse. Ellers alt i alt et virkelig fint ophold til pengene.

Very friendly and helpful staff and the room layout is clever. The location is great and within walking distance to all the main sights in hoi an but you re in a quieter part. I loved our stay here, the only downside was that the rooms were very humid during the days we were there. It had rained a lot so it s understandable but the beds felt a bit wet. The hotel was great though and i m happy we stayed there

This family-run hotel was perfect. Everything is clean, the rooms and beds are very comfortable, breakfast was cooked to order every morning and always delicious (especially the cau lao!), and the staff were incredibly welcoming, helpful, and happy to offer recommendations. It s on a quiet street just a short walk from the ancient town and night market, and they even have bicycles you can borrow for free. I would absolutely recommend this place 100 .
Hotel is walking distance from old quarter. Staff is amazing, very friendly and helpful! hotel is new, 2 months old, and extremely clean. Breakfasts are amazing. Highly recommended!!!
가족이 구성원이 되어 관리를 하며 사장님 부부와 아들 쿠옹..딘, 리.. 모두 친절하게 해주셔서 펺게 2박하고 왔어요.. 아침식사도 맛있고 가성비 최고, 다시가도 꼭 가고 싶은 곳 입니다.
직원분이 영어가 불가능 하시고 무뚝뚝하신데 츤데레라서 재미있었네요

Our stay at brother villa was fantastic! it s a little bit outside of the main old town area, which was nice as there is much less noise and traffic around. To get to the main old town, it s about a 10-15 minute walk, but the walk is great going through the vibrant streets of hoi an and the old town. The hotel itself is great and cozy. Rooms are very clean and spacious with a pool. The best part of the stay though was the all-in-one receptionist nhi. She was extremely helpful with planning our stay and giving recommendations. She was on top of everything and went above and beyond with helping us with anything we needed including setting up local tours and transportation. Take all of her advice in mind!

사진으로 보는 것과는 달리 아주 작은 펜션같은 곳입니다. 대중교통, 그랩 등을 이용하기가 불편합니다. 엘리베이터가 없어 계단으로 캐리어를 들고 올라가는 데 힘이 들었습니다. 룸컨디션은 괜찮았지만, 그 외에는 마음에 드는 것이 그닥 없었습니다. 수영장도 목욕탕 수준으로 작고, 물도 더러워서 수영하지 못합니다. 위치상 올드타운가 가까워 걸어갈 수는 있으나, 대신 차를 이용하지도 못하는 곳입니다.

Great hotel and lovely staff. Very clean rooms and we had stayed in the family rooms. The pick your own brekkie and drink was a nice inclusion for our stay. There is a pool but it s closed during the middle of the day which i found a little weird being the hottest part of the day. Open hotel with no entry doors so there were quite a lot of mosquitoes going into our room. Staff are extremely friendly

This place is good for visiting hoi an if you want to stay around old town. Not in middle of it so you will have a quiet nights but it is a very walkable distance. About 7 to 10min walking to old town. Hotel itself is clean, new, pool is great eventhough it s small and out of sun (so no sunbathing area if that s what you after). No elevator but staff can help with your suitcases. A lot of spas around the hotel but we do not try them so no recommendation on that part. A lot of local restaurants. Breakfast in the hotel is good.
시설은 매우 깨끗하고, 직원도 친절해요. 다만 화장실 공간이 침대 옆이라 조금 불편했어요.
Breakfast was a bit limited but if you are on a budget the hotel has what you need.
Clean, friendly, have breakfast and location nice!!
Family owned facility. Friendly staff. Cute and cozy. Felt safe. Would stay here again!
Close to amenities, staff are friendly and helpful, provides bicycles for rental but no lift

This was such a fantastic experience! the staff are super friendly and gave us food recommendations and we used the bikes to get around town for free every day. I wouldn t hesitate to stay here again if i m in hoi an. They even offer laundry services for a very fair price and you pay per kilogram. The only complaint i could have about this place is that the hot water for the shower wouldn t get super hot. It s more warm. But we were here in the summer so we were not trying to take super hot showers anyways
部屋に無料と有料の水が置いてあるが どちらが無料か明確ではなかったため 間違えて有料の水を飲んでしまいました どこかに明示してほしいです

It was a really clean hotel. Rooms were of a decent size, although we saw some bigger rooms that we would have preferred. In a quieter part of town, but only about 10 mins walk from the old town. Staff were extremely friendly, and the big umbrella loans came in handy when it was raining.
Reallly good service , super clen n also the staff is really friendly
첫베트남여행에서 첫날 간 브라더빌라 친절하고 사용해보진못햇지만 수영장도아름답고 올드타운에서 약 10분거리에위치한접근성 18년도에 지어져 건물도 깨끗하고 4층까지온수도잘나오고 직원분들너무친절한데 조식까지맛있어요 조식은 누들추천합니다 또 다낭으로갈때 교통편도 예약해주시고 기념품도챙겨주시고 친절한첫인상이 너무 기억에남네요 원픽입니다 항상 좋은일가득하세요
Fantastic value for money hotel. Lovely large clean rooms, friendly staff and great location.

Room was nice and the bed was super comfy. Breakfast was really nice also - the best i ve had so far in vietnam. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Location was good - quieter area and only a short stroll from the hub of activity. Only issue was there were a lot of bugs in my room. Upon arrival the door to my room was open (as were others that were not yet occupied) hence the bugs. Door should be kept close to keep the bugs out.
It was great stay and a lovely time!

Great very new little place, good location, friendly people. Good breakfast that you order and gets freshly made for you. Close enough to walk to town but far enough to be away from it. Free bikes to ride on and nice pool for a refreshing dip.
ロイヤルホテルの近くにある個人まりとしたヴィラです 改装してとてもきれいでした 経営者のおじさんとおばさんはとても親切でした 従業員も同様に親切です 日本人だからかもしれません 朝食は前日にメニューから選んで 朝 手作りのできたてをいただけます エレベーターはないので ４階に泊まると階段は大変ですが 値段からすれば大したことはないです ホイアンの主要なところはここから徒歩で十分まわれます
친절함. 아담한 빌라, 넓은 침대. 온수 잘 나옴. 조식은 전날 저녁에 주문. 모두 맛있음. 전망 좋고 올드타운 도보 거리 있어 조용함. 주변 관광 안내 잘해주고 자전거 대여해서 호이안 구석구석 볼수 있어서 너무 좋았음. 그랩보다 저렴하게 다낭까지 센딩 해줌. . 엘리베이터는 없어요.

I don t usually write reviews but as this is a new premises and the team were so friendly, i thought i would say a few words. The location was great for me. It is a few hundred metres from the city and the start of the old city. It took about 5-10 minutes to get to the city centre but was quiet at night as there is no real passing traffic. The building itself is finished to a high quality. The bathrooms were well presented with above average fixtures. The rooms were quite and well appointed with good mattress, pillows, linens and black-out curtains. Tv is a modern unit with the usual entertainment channels a westerner looks for. There are also the asian cable channels, too. The pool and the atrium opening roof above was a nice touch that will keep with the water cool in the warmer months and heat it up a little in the cooler ones. The staff were very friendly and were happy for a chat as we got a feel for what we wanted to do in hoi an. Breakfast was a great omelette and baguette with salad. Other options are available. The team are still finding their feet but i had no complaints. I ll stay here again without doubt next time we visit hoi an for a long weekend.
Very good. A small family run hotel with excellent breakfast. Close to old town(15min walk) and staffs are extraordinarily kind. Would definitely come again.
신축빌라인지 깨끗하고 직원들 친절해요.조식양이 약간 부족했지만 음식 또한 깔끔함.직접 요리하는게 보임.수영장 필요없는 분들이면서 3명인 가족에게 적극추천함.3명 사용하는 가격치고 저렴함.이전 숙소인 마리나 리조트와 비교해보면 여기가 훨씬 깨끗하고 좋음.
We loved staying here, it was nice and quiet but easy reach to the town centre. The staff were really kind, the rooms clean and airy, and great value for money!

The accommodation is very affordable and correct content price. What makes the stay pleasant is especially the warm welcome of helena, who has very great skills in customer service and she is very professional better forget the pool which is very pretty but not for swimming which would have been a plus given the outdoor temperature. Thank you again for this remarkable welcome!

This place was wonderful. The location is close to everything but not in it. The staff were extremely friendly and it was very clean. You get a free bike to ride and you can go anywhere from the villa. Excellent choice.

We stayed in brother villa for four nights, the hotel was brand new, only three months old when we stayed. The room and bathroom were very nice. The staff was very welcoming and cordial. The bikes they had for guests to use were a game changer, we used them every day, and wouldn t have been able to cover as much ground with out them. The location is very good, close to the old town. The staff was able to give recommendations for places and good quality shops. We were very happy with out stay. The decor is very modern, clean, and fun. We got a very personal experience, the family is very nice.
ホイアン中心には歩いて行けて便利ですが 静かな場所でとても良かったです
It s a cute little hotel. However there is no air circulation. The room smells like mold and the ceiling also had mold. The towels were all damp and doesn t smell very clean either.

By far the best hotel we stayed at during our vacation in vietnam. The staff went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and enjoyed our stay. The hotel room was spacious, clean, and very modern. Loved the shower! the hotel is on a quieter street (great for sleeping at night), but very quick walk to the old town. The hotel also had free bikes if you wanted to visit the beaches or explore other areas of hoi an.

The owners were very accomatating and personable. The first day we arived they treated use with a scooter ride to their resturant where their specialy of rose dumpling and drinks the took us down town to let us browse the shops it was the most fantastic first day we ever had, also the front desk person (i m sorry not good at remembering names) she was fantastic help with getting us settle in the room and suggesting and arranging excursions, getting our every needs performed expertly as far as getting our walking sneakers washed ( due to our walking in the rain) the sneakers were done beatifilly. We can t exprese our pleasure for their great kindness and detail to making our stay with fond memories. We recommend this establishment for a wanderful expeirence and if we ever get back this way will definettly stay again. The hotel is in walking distance of the center of old city with all it wanderful history, resturants, great foot massages etc i can t list all the things wev e seen and done thank you all so much for a wonderfull time

Bel hôtel, bien situé, à 10 min à pied du centre ville. Chambre spacieuse, literie confortable. Service de lingerie. Attention, les grandes bouteilles d eau dans votre chambre seront chargés à votre départ. Pas les petites. Je recommande
조식은 체크인하는 날 먼저 식사 고르는거고 그냥그럼 방음안돼서 힘들었음 정말정말 방음안됨
พน กงานน าร ก คอยช วยเหล อตลอดแนะนำสถานท เท ยวและแนะนำการเด นทาง
施設は清潔で清掃も行き届き アメニティや周辺案内もしっかりしている 観光名所も徒歩圏内 空室があったので部屋もグレードアップしてくれました
A little small but very clean and in walking distance to everything
The hosts were very friendly and accommodating. They give good priced services and lots of suggestions for activities.
Staying here was like staying with a friend or relative. The staff were so nice we felt like family

Mình rất thích nơi này yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ, phòng rất rất sạch. Đặc biệt là đội ngũ nhân viên cực kỳ hiếu khách và nhiệt tình. Nếu quay lại hội an, mình sẽ lại chọn cgp cảm ơn cgp đã góp phần mình 1 trãi nghiệm tuyêt vời ở hội an

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: It was first time in hoian. But we had best staying in chiem hoian hotel. Beat clearance, best kind staff, best food. I wish revisit.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: This hotel is perfect breakfast was excellent, the service and staff are very friendly and helpful , the arrangement of the overall property (rooms, garden etc) is lovely. The architect has an excellent taste. The surrounding is very nice (lots of spas, cafes, bars and restaurants) and the beach is just next to it. We usually spent the end of the day/ evening in the old town. I highly recommend this hotel and i am sure you won t be disappointed

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Loved the property. Will definitely go back again.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Beautiful hotel, the most friendly helpful staff. Beautiful breakfast, would recommend highly.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Excellent service at the hotel. Hotel itself very pleasant and comfortable, has got everything you need. Beautifully located in quite area, close to beach. The most delicious, big breakfast. We really loved our experience at chiem hotel.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 清潔で良いブティックホテル レセプションやホテルの方は皆フレンドリー 朝の食事も美味しいです アンバンビーチに来ることがあればまた利用したいです

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Love this hotel, staff are amazing, hotel is fairly new, has excellent breakfast and amenities, short walk to the beach. We stayed 6 nights. Highly recommend.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Oh my, we loved the chiem! our room was so spacious! with two bedrooms it felt like an apartment. The chiem is located on a quiet beach lane, a relief after the craziness of hoi an. The young women at the front desk were fun, professional and kind. My friend had a birthday during our stay - they presented her with beautiful flowers, chocolates and a hand-written note. Our breakfast, which we ordered each evening for the morning ahead, was always a feast. We couldn t have expected anything more from the chiem, it was just perfect.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The hotel is located in a quiet area, just some meters from the beach and some meters from a road where we can find many restaurants and shops. Big rooms well arranged. Staff of hotel adorable! they lend you bikes for free or a motorbike for a very reasonable price ideal to go to hoi an old town, just a few km away.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: What wonderful hotel!! if we could have we would have stayed for longer. We booked for 3 nights, but if we would have known what the hotel and staff were like we would have booked for a week. The girls on the front desk were so attentive and got to know who you were straight away. My parter left her phone in a grab taxi and they helped us contact the driver and get it back to us. The rooms were amazing with great air conditioning. Mini bar prices were the same as restaurants around us for soft drinks and water. We did our laundry there with they charged for by the kilo, can t remember the price, but it was really cheap. They arranged a car for us to get to the airport and it was the same price as grab. We took advantage of the free bikes and rode into the old town. I can t speak highly enough about this hotel, one of the best we ve stayed. Really close to the beach and loads of little restaurants to choose from close by. A grab taxi to the old town cost just over a 1 stirling and a moped about 80 pence. Just an amazing hotel with even better staff

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 이곳을 선택한것을 절대 후회 하지 않습니다, 다만 풀빌라 체크인이 1시간30분 지연된것은 매우 아쉽습니다만 조식코스도 좋았고 전반적으로 만족합니다.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: The location is perfect for the beach holiday,just 2mins walk to thier quiet private beach which is wonderful, there are many restaurants, cafe and spa along the main street. All staff are happy and friendly. They have good daily breakfast option. It is super hot so be careful about de hydration and sun burn! overall, we are happy about our experience.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Staff were brilliant. Fun to stay. Thanks.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Mycket bra hotell nära strand o bra utbud av restauranger i närheten. Personalen jättetrevlig o hjälpsam. Hotellet har inga solstolar på stranden, dessa måste hyras.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Great boutique hotel right near the beach. Lovely staff, pool and breakfasts, loved the coconut coffee. Aircon was great and beds very comfortable. Lots of dining options at a walkable distance. Grab drivers and grab food very convenient

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: This place is great, i could not fault one thing, would definitely recommend and would stay again, has a nice vibe and feel to the place

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Fabbo! great room, great service and a fantastic breakfast.

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: とても素晴らしい滞在でした 海まではすぐ プライベートプールは充分な大きさで 素敵なプルメリアの木が適度な日陰を作ってくれます 毎朝の朝食はボリュームがあり 色々なベトナムの料理をチョイスすることができ 楽しむことができました また滞在したいと思える素敵なホテルです

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: 海が近くて ホテルは清潔 朝食も美味しくて スタッフも親切 また来たいです

hotelName: CHiEM HoiAn - The Beachside Boutique Hotel & Villa
userCmt: Amazing staff. Very helpful for our needs. Breakfast was amazing
Tôi yêu ở đây. Đội ngũ nhân viên thân thiện và tốt đẹp
Dịch vụ tốt, thiết kế đẹp
Sàn nhà ướt và có rất nhiều muỗi.

Chúng tôi đã đặt 2 đêm ở đây nhưng không may, khi chúng tôi đến phòng đã không có sẵn bởi vì đường ống nước của nó đã bị hỏng. Họ sắp xếp một phòng khác cho chúng tôi ở nhà bên cạnh mà nó khá okay nhưng không loại nhà gỗ và hoàn lại cho chúng tôi 10 usd. Ngày sau chúng tôi có phòng của chúng tôi ở cashew và nó đã đáp ứng sự hài lòng của chúng tôi. Các giường được thoải mái, đồ nội thất mới, phòng đã được sạch sẽ và bao gồm đầy đủ các tiện nghi trong phòng như một phòng khách sạn. Nhân viên rất tốt và thân thiện. Điểm trừ duy nhất là sân hiên riêng khá hẹp và phòng rất ướt.
Chủ nhiệt tình, nhà trần cao nên thoáng mát. Nhưng có góp ý nhỏ là phòng nên cách âm một chút.
Chúng tôi đã nhận được sự chào đón và hỗ trợ tuyệt vời từ khách sạn. Thật sự cảm kích!
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Dịch vụ tốt!
Homestay hơi khó tìm xíu. Phòng ốc thoải mái, nhiều tiện nghi. Có nước chanh và cà phê miễn phí cho khách nếu có nhu cầu. Gần biển và các quán ăn, pub, bar thuận tiện cho việc đi chơi.
Cô chủ nhiệt tình chu đáo giúp đỡ khách,nhân viên tốt,phòng quá xứng đáng với giá tiền!

Vị trí hơi xa phố cổ nhưng rất gần biển an bàng. Phòng sạch sẽ và được tổ chức tốt. Chủ nhà siêu thân thiện và hỗ trợ, đừng ngần ngại nhờ cô ấy giúp đỡ rất khuyến khích cho những ai muốn tận hưởng cảm giác thư thái gần bãi biển .
Gia đình tôi có một thời gian tốt tại homestay của bạn. Phòng sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp, lễ tân hoa hậu siêu thân thiện và hữu ích. Vị trí là đủ tốt so với giá cả hợp lý.
Phòng xinh, chị chủ nhiệt tình
Nhân viên dễ thương. Chỗ ở sạch sẽ dễ tìm, thức ăn ngon.
Phòng đủ tiện ích. Thích nhất là có sân vườn, ngồi chill cực yên tĩnh.
This place just good, our host is very personal, helping, we just love this cat tien, village it s so nice they are a family which dream is to make your stay perfect.

Charm champion phòng rất đẹp và sạch, mới. Lễ tân nhiệt tình. Giá phòng hợp lý. Địa điểm đi xe máy ra phố cổ hội an rất thuận tiện. Cảm ơn việt và mai, anh chị đã có một thời gian nghỉ rất vui và thư giãn tại charm champion. Hy vọng lần sau anh chị có dịp về vn đến hội an sẽ đến charm champion lần nữa.
Sạch sẽ, đẹp. Mình ra gặp đúng 2 ngày mưa nên cũng không đi đâu được nhiều (

Nhân viên dễ thương, thân thiện và hỗ trợ mình tốt lắm, check in sớm 4 tiếng mà không tính thêm phí. Phòng mình book là dạng apartment room - có bếp riêng, nhà vệ sinh riêng, bàn làm việc,,... Không gian phòng rộng rãi thoải mái, nhận phòng sạch sẽ. Vị trí thì cách phố cổ tầm 3km, cách bãi biển an bàng tầm 3,5km nên mình thấy cũng okie la. Các dịch vụ phòng khác thì mình không sử dụng gì nên không biết thế nào, nhưng đánh giá cá nhân thì giá quá hợp lý so với chất lượng phòng.

Saya booking kamar tipe penthouse. Kamarnya sangat bagus, bersih dan fasilitas lengkap. Saya suka interiornya yang membuat kita nyaman stay di kamar. Ini adalah homestay yang melebihi hotel dari sisi kenyamanannya.
Phòng rất sạch sẽ thoáng mát nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình

Bên khách sạn nói phòng bị trục trặc đột xuất nên offer khách qua một bên cơ sở khác. Chất lượng nơi này thật sự tệ. Dra gối khi nhận phòng bị ẩm, có mùi hôi ẩm, không rõ có thay trước khi cho khách mới vào không. Gối còn lốm đốm vết dơ. Khăn để khách dùng nhưng bị rách. Người tiếp đón thái độ không thân thiện.
Dịch vụ khách hàng của họ rất tốt, họ rất hữu ích và thân thiện.
Lễ tân nhiệt tình dễ thương, phòng sạch sẽ , giá cả hợp lí nên thử
Phòng đẩy đủ tiện nghi, sạch đẹp lại còn mới nữa. Bạn lễ tân cute thân thiện. Nên ghé mọi người nhé. Mình quên chụp hình mất tiêu
Dịch vụ tuyệt vời, bạn nhân viên dễ thương lắm, phòng rộng sạch sẽ, có đầy đủ tiện nghi. Recommend nên chọn nơi đây là trạm dừng chân nghỉ ngơi
Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Nhà thì dễ thương khỏi chê
Tốt trong tầm giá, nhân viên thân thiện. Bể bơi sạch đẹp, nên có thêm bảng ghi độ sâu mức nước đề nghị nên có thêm bãi giữ xe phòng nên có thêm quạt cho những người không ngủ được điều hoà

Phòng đơn giản mà đẹp, bể bơi vừa xinh, mình book được giá tốt của app. Không gian villa tuy nhỏ nhưng khá xinh, có bếp nướng bên ngoài trời, nhân viên thân thiện, nhà mình thuê xe máy nên tiện, vì vào phố cổ thì nhanh có 3km, ra biển an bàng hơi xa 5km.
Sạch sẽ, phục vụ nhiệt tình. Rất đáng để ở

Had to walk to get a grab as it is zoned in an area that does not allow grabs into can be noisy due to the pool being downstairs and the upper levels are not blocked off. The sound travels otherwise the rooms are good
Hotel aconchegante, quarto espaçoso e bom atendimento

Es una propiedad nueva por lo que sus instalaciones están todas a estrenar. Deseamos destacar la atención de la recepcionista que nos atendió súper bien y nos brindó información de los paseos y atracciones y sus recomendaciones fueron muy acertadas. Muchas gracias!!

I ve only not given a top score on condition, as there was a ceiling water leak at ground floor between the lift and the swimming pool, which here would have a sign warning you - not that anyone slipped that i saw, but not 10/10. Perfectly located away form the bustle and the centre, but crawling distance to, it was very peaceful and the road itself quite pleasant. I particularly liked staying on the island as it felt like retreating from hoi an for a bit.
Tam the host is amazing

Veldig hyggelig personale, og fine rom. Veødig gode senger. Flott basseng, men skulle gjerne hatt noen flere solsenger og møbler ved bassenget. Bestiller gjerne her igjen perfekt beliggenhet, i en rolig gate, men veldig nært nattmarkedet og gamlebyen.
호이안 야시장 접근성이 좋았고 베트남 현지인들의 생활 문화를 느낄수 있어서 좋았습니다.

Perfect location, perfect neighborhood and i would thank particularly to the young lady that seemed to be the daughter of the manager or owner. She was just the most supportive and kind person that attended our requests with care and kindness! i would extremely recommend this place for its location and confort

Wasn t any tea, coffee in rooms just jug, cup and saucers. Suppose to include breakfast when i booked, for 7 days. None supplied or offered. And i did ask that that was included. No room service cleaned at all during my stay.
Great place to stay, easy walk to old town
It was lovely.

We had a disappointing stay. The staff were nice and the bed was comfy but beyond that unfortunately it did not live up to expectations. There is no spa, no restaurant, no coffee bar, no free beach shuttle, despite all being listed as amenities. We were able to borrow bikes but it took 45 minutes despite us asking the night before as they all needed maintenance work doing to them. We also had a negative experience with some neighbouring guests who had loud music blaring until 1 30am, as well as running around shouting and banging on other doors. When we raised this as midnight over text we did not get a reply from anyone, and the next morning we did not receive apology of any sorts and the owner tried to justify by informing us that they were college students. We didn t feel this was appropriate given there were other guests staying. The place has potential to be a good stay, but it needs to alter the listing to be accurate to what is available, and the staff need to take guest satisfaction a little more seriously.
Loan is very helpful and goes above and beyond! such a nice compound and huge pool with plenty of room for sun bathing. What a great deal for such a nice place!!
Bể bơi đẹp, thời tiết dễ chịu, gần sông thu bồn yên tĩnh
The staff and the owner very friendly and helpful.
Tuyệt vời chị quản lý hay lễ tân gì đó dễ thương
Mọi người thân thiện lắm rất đáng đồng tiền nếu có dịp lần sau sẽ quay lại
Rất tuyệt vời, mọi người nên đến nhé
Ở nơi rất vắng vẻ, phòng ốc đồ dùng không sạch sẽ.
Phòng xinh lắm sạch sẽ thoáng mát giá rẻ
Phục vụ nhiệt tình, mình thích cái hỗ trợ đổi phòng khi phòng có thiết bị lỗi!
Phòng đẹp , sạch sẽ gọn gàng, nhân viên và chủ rất nhiệt tình đón tiếp nchung là 10 điểm
Phòng sạch đẹp, yên tĩnh, nhân viên nhiệt tình
Phòng sạch sẽ, in tỉnh, nhận viên nhiệt tình chu đáo. Chỉ là cách hơi xa phố cổ.
Địa điểm hơi trong ngõ nhưng anh chủ khá thân thiện và nhiệt tình giúp đỡ, phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, to, vào trung tâm thành phố mình phải kiếm 15 phút đi lấy.
Phòng xinh. Nhiều cây cối nên rất mát mẻ. Hơi xa trung tâm phố cổ. Nhưng vẫn ổn nếu bạn thích đạp xe (có cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí)

Cảm giác rất yên bình, không khí mát mẻ, thoải mái khi ở coco island villa. Chủ nhà và nhân viên vui vẻ thân thiện hiếu khách. Món trứng chiên ngon nhất từ trước giờ được ăn du mình từng ở nhiều khách sạn resort 4,5 sao khác nhau. Năm sau quay lại hoi an, sẽ ở đây lâu hơn.
Tuyệt vời. Khách sạn quá tuyệt, nhân viên rất thân thiện và hữu ích .

A fabulous place for a group of 11 to stay. Lovely rooms, amazing staff and service, great pool, close to old town but out of nighttime noise. Fab spring rolls at the locals restaurant next door. Loved our stay and cant wait to come back!

The cozy an boutique hotel hoian was a wonderful boutique hotel. The river view room was awesome and had a great view of the river both during the day at night to see the boat and lanterns. The best part of my stay was the wonderful and helpful staff. The staff was incredible at every point of my stay. The spa was also super inexpensive and wonderful. Anr only a 10 minute walk to town and the night market. A experience.

I absolutely enjoyed my stay. From the moment i of check in, i wished i had booked a longer stay. The hotel was beautiful, food was good, stay also amazing. I was very happy here and it was walking distance from a lot of shops and activities.
Hotel agréable bon emplacement au calme mais proche des commerces et restaurants petit déjeuner fantastique.

Great hotel with great service from the office personnel. They were ahead of needs. Room very comfortable and clean. We had the bridge view. Food was excellent. We didn t have time to try the pool. Strong point are location (10 minutes from everything and confort). Breakfast is great with enough variety.
The room is spacious, very clean beautiful decorations staffs are very nice, friendly and polite.

It s a nice hotel. The only negative thing was the rooster next door made noise very early in the morning it was quite annoying. Also when the neighboring room (side or up) took their shower, it was very loud.
Friendly helpful staff
Incrível

Tudo perfeito!!! quarto e banheiro enormes, com banheira separada do chuveiro. Atendimento e café da manhã impecáveis! vale a pena fazer a massagem! fiz 2 vezes ! melhor massagem da vida e com um preço bem barato para o padrão!
３泊しました また次ホイアンに来てもこのホテルに泊まります 英語は問題なく通じますが 日本語は通じません
Apres avoir passé 3 nuits nous avons rajouté 1 nuit supplémentaire. Nous avions été surclassé les premiers jours et ils nous ont laissé la même chambre. Merci nous sommes tres satisfait.
位於住宅區內.周邊環境不適很妥善.隔音情況不佳.

An amazing hotel where the staff go above and beyond to make your stay clean , comfortable. They are so friendly and truly care for each individual guest . The food at breakfast is fresh and has choices for lots of different tastes . I have been here for a week and i am still finding different fruits and pastries to choose from. They offer hot food from vietnam or even an english breakfast if you so wish. I can not fault this hotel in anyway . Thank you

Staff are so wonderful and friendly. Our room was lovely and clean with a view of the river. Breakfast was excellent every day. The hotel is very close to the ancient area. No negatives..would stay again 100

This place is really a hidden gem! it s walking distance from old town hoi-an and some great restaurants. The hospitality of the staff is unmatched and i facilities is impeccably clean. I could not ask for mor and wouldnt think twice about returning!

The staff are very nice and helpful! breakfast is delicious. The family room is spacious and big enough for my family of the room is clean and looks new. They also provide free airport transfer which is a bonus. Walkable distance to hoi an old town. Will stay here again if i visit hoi an again.
Staff was very friendly as well as helpful. Definitely will return as they made us feel like family.
3일간 머물럿는데.. 조식.룸컨디션.직원 서비스등 기대이상 좋아요. 다음에 방문시에도 재방문의사 필수.

年配の父を連れての旅で少し心配していましたがホテルのスタッフのホスピタリティと温かい対応でとても好きなホテルになりました 空港のお迎えがありスムーズにチェックインしお部屋が誕生日のお祝いデコレーションされていて感激しました お部屋の設備は素晴らしくアメニティ 風呂のお湯 シャワーの圧力も申し分なく 朝ごはんも種類が豊富で美味しく スタッフもニコニコしてくれて心が休まりました 歩いて旧市街には年配の足では難しいのですがタクシーを利用すれば近いので便利です 困ったことや改善点をスタッフは必ず聞いてくれてとても安心して過ごせましたしホテルをよくしようと言う気持ちが伝わりました ホイアンに言う時は迷わず泊まりたいしおすすめします 絶対に忘れられない良い旅となるでしょう ありがとうございました
Amazing staff and very clean rooms. We had a lovely view of the river

This is a delightful hotel, modern and well designed with a great pool. Breakfast is of a high quality with lots of options. It is well located a few minutes from the river and a very short walk to old town. Lots of eating options nearby. The staff are very attentive and helpful. They provide free bikes. The room was well appointed with english shows and movies on the tv. I would highly recommend cozy an.
旧市街中心には少し離れていますが 歩ける距離です 快く自転車も貸してくれます スタッフもフレンドリーで気持ちよいサービスが受けられました
The design and ambience are excellent complete to the smallest charming vietnamese detail. The staff echo this excellence, they are charming and professional. I will recommend to anyone.

ホイアンの街まで近く 周りには美味しいお店があり 川も近くてとても良い場所にあります お部屋はきれいで お風呂のお湯もずっと熱く 安心してバスタブに入れます 日本のテレビが2チャンネルも見れるのは 初めてでした レセプションやその周りにも 素敵なスタッフがいます 朝食のテラス席が少ないこと ベトナムの美味しい野菜がもっとあれば良いなと思いました 規模が小さいので 仕方がないかもしれません ありがとうございました
Great breakfast, nice staff
Excellent staff, wonderful location, fantastic breakfast, and unique spa. This hotel is an amazing choice.

A great boutique hotel, not too far from the old town. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Breakfast is very good. Staff are very friendly, helpful and welcoming. I d also recommend the on-site spa. Excellent value.
スタッフの皆さんがとても親切でした いつでもにこやかに親身になってくれました 朝食のオムレツとフォーが特に美味しかったです プールは清潔で水温もちょうどよく二日間楽しみました こじんまりと落ち着いたホテルでとても居心地良く過ごせました
Very nice place with friendly and helpful staff
Great breakfast
Very nice and pretty hotel. Very good value for the price. Would visit again.
スタッフが親切 朝食がおいしい
Flot og lækkert hotel - ikke noget at klage over.

We have now been to hoi an 4 times. Each time we have stayed at a different hotel due to these venues not meeting our expectations and needs. This latest trip we were advised to try the cozy an boutique hotel. What great advise that was. We struck gold. This venue is modern and well maintained. It is situated within easy walking distance to old town where the action is. The staff are magnificent. They are professional, friendly and helpful plus they have a detailed knowledge of the local environment. As a bonus most have an excellent working knowledge of english. The rooms are spotlessly clean and spacious. They are efficiently serviced each day. It has a secluded pool available to cool off on those hot days. The buffet breakfast is a food lovers delight with the menu aimed at the local market as well as those with a western palate. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner. This hotel is exceptional in terms of venue and price. Without hesitation i give it my highest recommendation. We will return here on our next visit.
Great service, staff friendly and professional! we totally stay there again!
We felt very at home in this boutique hotel. Staff made us feel like family. Nothing was too much trouble. Lovely to come back around the pool after the crowds of hoi an

This is a fabulous property. Clean and stylish, the common areas are welcoming and provide comfortable furnishings to relax and enjoy your visit. The pool is a wonderful amenity and the restaurant provides excellent dining options. The room is comfortably decorated and has everything you need for your stay.
Amazing stay at the beautiful cozy an! we got the connecting rooms for our family of everything was clean, comfortable and great!

Uno dei migliori hotel del vietnam. Colazione ottima, sia dolce che salata e preparano anche caffè e cappuccino a pagamento. Arredamento nuovo e moderno. Servizio ottimo e bici gratuite. Consigliato anche per la zona silenziosa e a pochi passi dal centro facendo anche il vicino lungo fiume.
The staff were so friendly and made us feel so welcome! they made great recommendations on where to go and what to see! great happy hour deals at the bar! gorgeous pool and very clean rooms

호텔의 무료 픽업 서비스가 좋아서 첫날 이 호텔을 선택한 이유가 가장 컸습니다. 가는길에 미니마트 두 곳정도 있습니다. 객실 컨디션은 나쁘지 않았지만 에어컨에서 냄새가 났고, 욕실은 물때가 좀 보였습니다. 샤워필터는 그래도 양호한 편입니다. 조식은 가지수가 많지는 않지만 깔끔하게 있을건 다 있는 편입니다. 강가쪽으로 걷다보면 식당이 나오는데 분위기도 좋고 맛있습니다.
Truly the best and coziest hotel, really recommend, had every facility you can ask for! spa was great, staff was great, very nice breakfast, very clean and big rooms!

Really nice fun clean property that s right by the water and a short walk away from the heart of the old town. The whole experience was absolutely spot on, from the check in, to the rooms, to the breakfast that we enjoyed every morning and the amenities including the pool and the free bikes. Just loved this place, check it out and if it s available just book it.
The staff is friendly helpful. Borrowing a bicycle (free of charge), you can enjoy cycling through rice fields or visiting the old city center.
God oplevelse og god service, meget høflige. Ligger centralt, men ikke i et larmende område.
It s a lovely hotel. The interior is elaborate. Above all, it was kept clean, which i liked. The hotel was located just a short walk from the old town. Thank you
Ein schönes, sehr gepflegte hotel. Personal sehr zuvorkommend, freundlich und hilfsbereit. Alles sehr sauber. 15 minuten fußweg bis zur altstadt am fluss entlang. Sehr empfehlenswert.

Property was clean, quiet, and the meals were fantastic if you chose to stay in. Staff were friendly, and very helpful when it came to booking activities to do. Located about 5 minutes outside the hustle, with many food options along the way. Would definitely stay at this property again as it suited our needs perfectly!
市街地からは 少し離れていますが 徒歩10分くらいで すぐに日本橋や ナイトマーケットにいけ便利です スタッフがフォーなどのオススメのお店を教えてくれたりしてとてもフレンドリーでいいです

旧市街の喧騒から少し離れた路地を入ったところにあります スタッフはみな笑顔で親切 お部屋もかわいくセッティングされています エレベーターがないので足のお悪い方向きではないでしょう 荷物は運んでもらえます ただ一点 ホテルには問題はないのですが 近所で鶏を飼っておられるので一晩中鳴き声が聞こえます 眠りの深い人は気が付かないかもしれませんが 私は3泊しましたが ほとんど寝た感じはありませんでした ホテルに落ち度がないだけに何ともしようがありませんね
スタッフの方が明るく親切でとても好印象でした
Amazing staff and cozy beautiful rooms. The food was delicious. Quiet.
This is the second time we have stayed at cozy. Great location quiet peaceful yet still close to all the shopping, markets restaurants. Staff are brilliant, very helpful knowledgeable.

Loved my stay at this boutique hotel. The staff at the hotel are lovely, they are very helpful and friendly and have good english. For us the location was perfect, it offers a very quiet stay whilst still being close to the ancient town, which is approx a 10minute walk. We opted for morning glory room to have abit more space and these are located on the ground floor which suited us. The rooms are nice, clean and very quiet, the bed is comfortable and the air con and wifi work very well. The pool was lovely, it is on the small side but rarely is there more than a few people at the pool at any one time and mostly we had it to ourselves. The breakfast was delicious especially the freshly cooked egg station items and bakery items. We did use the free to use bikes to explore the surrounding areas which was fun and convenient. The airport transfer worked very well, was on time, quick and comfortable. Would highly recommend this hotel.

旧市街まで徒歩圏内の心地良く コスパ良しなコンパクトなホテルです スタッフはとてもフレンドリーで 現地ツアーやスパの予約などスムーズに行ってくれました お部屋は広くて清潔 ６泊しましたが 汚れが気になったということは一切なかったです このクラスのホテルにありがちな 少し枕カバーやシーツが生乾き臭いなんてことも全くなくとても快適でした シャワーはタイミングによって 熱いお湯が出てこないことがありました ただ その時もぬるいお湯は出たので バスタブにつからず シャワーだけで済ますのであれば問題ありません 朝食は少しずつ内容が変わるので 数泊の滞在であれば飽きることはないと思います プールは小さいながらも掃除が行き届いており 過ごしやすかったです ロケーションは旧市街やナイトマーケットまで歩いて１０分ほどでした 当初 川沿いのホテルと迷いましたが 自分にとってはこのホテルが正解だったなという感じです 川沿いのホテルも素敵でしたが 夜になると大きな観光バスが何台も路駐するのでネット上の写真のようにはいきません
Good service upon arrival. Spacious and clean room. Amenities work fine. Away from ho an old town which suits us fine.
작지만 있을 건 다 있는 호텔! 세심한 서비스가 특히 마음에 드는 호텔이에요. 올드시티에서 걸을만한 거리고요. 한적한 동네에 있어서 조용해요. 자전거 대여도 무료. 객실 상태 좋네요!
Es un hotel al que volvería a ir. El personal es super amable, no nos faltó de nada durante nuestra estancia. Unos días de vacaciones inolvidables.
The location is good, just 10 mins walking to hoi an old town. The staffs are very helpful. Quality is good with reasonable price.

Unser aufenthalt im cozy hoian war sehr angenehm. Das personal (rezeption, restaurant, reinigung, ...) war durchweg freundlich, herzlich und hilfsbereit! wir wurden immer freundlichst begrüßt/verabschiedet und bekamen schnelle und gute hilfe bei all unseren anliegen. Unser zimmer war sauber bei ankunft und wurde täglich gereinigt. Weiterhin bot es viel platz im schlaf-zimmer und im bad. Das frühstück war immer sehr lecker und bot eine große bandbreite an speisen und getränken. Da es etwas am rand der altstadt liegt, war es sehr ruhig und gemütlich (tagsüber und nachts). Der weg zu fuß in die altstadt ist kurze 10 minuten. Wir würden auf jeden fall wieder hier übernachten!
中心地から若干距離があるが 自転車の無料貸し出しがあるので気にならない ホテルの部屋は清潔かつ快適で クーラーも完備 朝食のビュッフェはおいしく 種類も豊富 何よりもよかったのは従業員 最高に親切かつ丁寧な接客で楽しかった 次回もまた利用したい

It was a warm welcome from the beginning. They were helpful, and at least they tried their best. The villa was nice. Especially impressed by hoi an unique interior. Good location. Walking distance to the ancient town. Internet and breakfast was okay. Note hotel has free motorbikes, but check it carefully before you take one. Better walk than drag a broken bike on the way back. (as i did)
Brilliant 3n stay. No negative comments . Friendly attentive and polite staff. Clean and comfortable room.
Very helpful staff. Close to old town. Quiet. Enjoyed our balcony.
多蚊 房間有點舊 隔音差 所以比較嘈雜 距離古城要行15分鐘路程 但員工真的非常非常友善 服務亦很好會介紹一些 品質好又實惠的餐廳給我們去吃 所以整體感覺非常良好 而且房間非常之便宜 性價比高
酒店新開業不到一年 裝修溫馨雅緻 我們第一天非常不好運 airport pick-up no show 而且在我們預訂了雙床的情況下 安排了大床 roll-away加床給我們 早上7點便可從房間露台看到有人在折樓 睡得很差 第二天我們換回正常的twin room 那晚睡得不錯 前台職員很有禮貌 但希望他們能安排好房間和雙方已confirmed的機場接送
Hotel situe dans quartier très animé le soir nombreux restaurants et commerce.. Et bien placé pour les sites à visiter

We had a lovely stay in this hotel. We travelled with our 18 month old daughter and the staff were particularly attentive and helpful. The rooms are light, airy and stylish with beautiful hoi an lanterns above the bed. Our balcony was small but perfectly fine for the two of us to avoid waking a sleeping baby (staff brought us room service with a very gentle knock). We used the little pool every day which had a shallow section perfect for a toddler to splash in. Would highly recommend this hotel and it s fantastic staff.
Great location close to old town. Easy access to restaurants and helpful staff.

Pretty hotel. Very clean. Welcoming reception by decor and staff. Staff were extremely helpful and always asked if everything was okay in your room etc. Bicycles were provided for free which we used a couple of times. Telephone bookings were made willingly. Breakfast was provided with plenty of choice. Pool area was really nice -not so sure about fixed beds immersed in pool water but it looked very nice andclean. Shiort walk away from the old town. Very quiet area. Small balcony but pleasant to sit on.
Ótimo hotel! funcionários muito atenciosos. Quarto muito confortável. Recomendo a todos!

It was an amazing stay - we would definitely book a room here again on our next visit! upon check in, we were given detailed explanations and tips of things we could do around the area. The staff were extremely courteous and helpful. Getting to know them was wonderful, and we really appreciate how they always took the extra initiative to make sure we were comfortable and well taken care of ) love the traditional setup of the hotel as it feels like home, and the friendly staff who make conversation with you make you feel immediately welcome. Since it was also tet (vietnamese new year) during our visit, the hotel also gave us lucky money (red packets) and tangerines which was a nice touch. The breakfast fare included traditional vietnamese foods alongside the standard toast and cereal. Definitely enjoyed that! location-wise, the hotel is tucked away from the bustling traffic on the main road, but still close enough to all the nearby attractions. The only downside was that patrons of the cafe next door can get quite loud and noisy. But overall, this was an amazing and certainly memorable stay!

The staff at cozy are what make the stay amazing. They make an effort to remember your name and remember your likes and dislikes. They are all so friendly and helpful. Great place to stay a short 10 minute walk away for. The busy old town. Lovely breakfast with local and western options. Will definitely stay here again.
Hemos estado dos noches y no hemos tenido ningún problema. El trato inmejorable, el servicio muy bien.

Absolutely loved our stay at cozy hoian boutique villas. From the moment we walked in to our departure all the staff made us feel so welcome.
