Anh chị chủ homestay rất dễ thương. Nhiệt tình hỗ trợ tụi mình. Chỗ ở cũng khá gần phố cổ nữa. Nhà vệ sinh đầy đủ vậy dụng cần thiết luôn
Rất nên đặt phòng ở đây vì sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, gần trung tâm phố cổ.

Clean bedroom bathroom with affordable price, super nice owner who has warm welcome and supportive. Far from ancient city around 1 km, you can walk. There re a lot of shop, local restaurants and cafe along the road to ancient city.
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, giá cả hợp lý, chủ homestay chú rất nhiệt tình, đáng để ở
Homestay giá rẻ nhưng rất mát mẻ, sạch sẽ và cô chú chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Từ home có thể đi bộ ra phố cổ luôn.
Chỗ ở tuyệt vời, chú chủ mến khách quá ạ. Siêu đáng yêu
Thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Có thể quay lại!
Địa điểm đẹp, giá tốt, chủ nhà tốt. Nó gần khu phố cổ lịch sử.

Ở đây không bán đồ ăn, tuy giới thiệu là có chỗ đậu xe nhưng ko phải vậy mà là để xe trên lối đi vào, lúc lấy xe ra khá bất tiện nên phải thuê thêm xe máy. Vòi hoa sen ở phòng tắm đã bị bung, 4 30 sáng bị mất điện. Nói chung là tạm
Giống như ảnh giới thiệu trên app, nhân viên hiền. Có xe đạp miễn phí, vị trí thuận lợi đạp ra phố cổ chừng 5p thôi. Khách sạn mới nên đồ dùng mới và sạch sẽ.
Phục vụ tốt, xử lý tốt khi gặp sự cố
Very friendldy and helpful staff, good services, free bikes included.

Fantastiskt hotell till väldigt bra pris! vi var förvånande över att till en början vara dom enda gästerna då hotellet ligger bra till och är otroligt fint! ) vi fick ett lyxrum på tredje våningen i huvudbyggnaden. Lugnt och skönt, två balkonger med sol under hela dagen! jätteskönt! en fin och fräsch pool i trädgården.
사진빨이겠지 생각하며 갔는데... 사진 그대로였습니다. 올드타운에서 살짝 먼 것이 흠이지만 택시 부르면 바로와서 불편함은 못 느꼈어요. 주인 분이 영어도 잘 하시고 객실도 깨끗하고 넓고 좋았어요. 엘리베이터 없어서 3층 아닌 2층인 것에 감사했습니다. ㅋㅋ

Absolutely amazing villa! we stayed here for four nights and actually had the whole place to ourselves. This family run villa has the most amazing friendly staff that are eager to make your experience in hoi an as perfect as possible. The rooms are spacious, clean and bright. The rooms have a super cold minibar fridge with cold drinks that are very fairly priced. The pool is incredible, especially on a hot day. Our favourite staff member was lap she works in the afternoons. She s so sweet and makes sure you have everything you need including if the weather is bad she wants to make sure you don t get wet and gives out rain ponchos. You can rent motorcycles for fairly cheap (110,000 dong for a newer honda automatic with lots of power). The complementary breakfast is amazing with an option of 13 different choices with vietnamese and traditional western foods as options. They also have amazing fresh fruit juices and authentic vietnamese coffee. I would absolutely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone.
Wonderful place,wonderful people. The only downside is that it s a bit out of town. The taxi is cheap,but it s still a bit of hassle.

주인 가족분들이 직접 운영해서 친절하고 깨끗합니다. 픽업서비스로 공항에서 편하게 이동했고, 도착하자마자 웰컴 드링크와 친절한 지역 가이드도 좋았고, 조금 일찍 도착했지만 체크인 할수 있었습니다. 무료 자전거와 오토바이(아마 무료..) 도 대여할수 있어서 작은 호이안을 한바퀴 돌기에도 좋을것같아요. 조식은 단품과 음료를 선택하면 과일과 샐러으와 함께 풀 코스로 잘 나오고 맛도 왠만한 식당보다 맛있어요. 수영장은 이용 못했지만 이용하는 사람들이 적어 한적하게 즐기기 좋을것같습니다. 호텔 위치도 한적해서 조용하구요. 저렴한 가격이 믿기지 않네요. 다음에 또 방문할거예요. 덥지않다면 올드타운을 강변쪽으로 걷거나 자전거로 가면 병아리,닭, 오리,소,개 들을 만나면서 가서 시골 정취를 느껴 좋았습니다.

Place was really friendly and cozy. I spent three nights here with my family. The people that runs the place are extremely friendly and helpful, everything we needed, we were provided with. We came to the place a bit early but were allowed to gain access to a room anyway, plus a free upgrade. The room was clean but it smelled a bit, might be the old building. We were moved to another room with a balcony and it was amazing. Rented mopeds for a very fair price. The staff and owners invite us to a new years feast with the rest of the guess living there. Free of charge with how much drinks we wanted and good and a lot of food. This place is amazing and i highly recomend it for everyone, it is a bit from the shops so you gain some quiet during the nights
The host was extremely kind and helpful. The place was very clean and it has great facilities. We would definitely stay there again.

Wow! great place, family run and always helpful. Breakfast every day, everything worked, had a great sitting and work area. One thing about the area in general is that it s residential slowly becoming more commercial (small hotels) do, you will experience real life around you. This is not a complaint but an observation. Oh, they also have bikes to use (free) and scooters available at a very reasonable daily rate. I stayed for 2 weeks and looking forward to my next visit.
フロントスタッフが いない

Very good value for the money. We liked the service, breakfast was good, as well as pool and free bikes. Smaller things we did not like was shower in the bathroom was awkward (tub with no curtain), hard to get right temperature. The location is perhaps inconvenient, with few restaurants around, though it is cheap and easy to get places, including free bikes. You can also now walk across the bridge under construction close by.
One of the best villas i have stayed in rooms were beautiful and clean staff were amazing great breakfast pool amazing close enough to the town but far enough away for a peaceful stay xxxxx

Superb. A gorgeous little gem on the island. Relaxed, beautiful and very clean. The staff were above and beyond. The breakfast drinks were a treat and the pool was the perfect respite on the afternoon heat. Winn also recommended great places for food, massage and tailors. All fabulous. Free bikes to pedal about to the beach thrown in. ) we loved it for our family. )

Green hill villa is a fantastic place...wonderful people take care of all your wishes. Probably the best place to stay at , when visiting hoi an. Short bicycleride to the old town. Maybe the best nightmarket in asia. Like a fairytale...
모든 부분에 있어 만족스러웠어요. 조식도 나쁘지 않아요. 특히 서비스가 너무 만족스러웠어요!! 정말 처음부터 끝까지 친절하십니다ㅜㅜ 다음에 또 뵙길 바라요
市の中心から離れているので タクシー利用が必要ですが 静かに過ごせる 新しく清潔なホテル タオルが柔らかく気持ち良い 朝食は洋食数種類とフォー等のベトナム料理から選べる アットホームでスタッフはとても親切
Nice location, lovely staff, attractive pool and away from the madness of the over touristified old town!

Wir waren 4 nächte in dem wundervollen hotel. Frühstück war inklusive und super lecker. Haben ein kostenloses upgrade auf ein großes zimmer mit balkon erhalten. Die zimmer sind sehr sauber und groß. Wäscheservice und einige touren kann man im hotel buchen sowie günstig einen sehr neuen roller, um mal zu den stränden zu fahren. Zu fuß ist man in ca 20 minuten im haupten geschehen, was uns nichts ausgemacht hat zu laufen. Kostenlose fahrräder bieten sie aber auch an. Der pool ist herrlich und ebenfalls sauber. Die anlage ist super gepflegt und das personal überaus freundlich und zuvorkommend. Selbst wenn man nicht das hotel verlassen möchte kann man sich auch im hotel was zu essen bestellen. Entweder per zimmer service oder einfach im restaurant oder am pool essen. Preise sind auch mehr als in ordnung. Das hotel ist schön ruhig und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
Phòng ở thoáng mát , sạch sẽ . Gia đình cô , chú thân thiện nhiệt tình với khách hàng .
Vị trí ngay trung tâm tiện đi lại. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng. Có xe đạp free cho khách đi chơi. Phòng thoáng, sạch sẽ. Giá hợp lý.
Cô chú chủ nhà thân thiện, vui vẻ. Phòng sạch sẽ

Cho đến nay, đây là kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời nhất của tôi ở việt nam (ba tuần trên đường)! tôi chỉ ở đây một đêm, nhưng nơi này thật đẹp và sạch sẽ. Hiện tại tôi đang thưởng thức bữa sáng đầu tiên, ngon lành. Cặp đôi (nim và hoa) cùng con trai (?) của họ vô cùng ngọt ngào và chu đáo (họ thậm chí còn giúp tôi tìm ví). Jennie làm việc tại quầy lễ tân và có thể liên hệ qua whatsapp nếu có bất kỳ câu hỏi nào. Vị trí cũng rất tuyệt, nằm ngoài phố cổ nhưng gần đó, và có rất nhiều hoạt động gần đó. Xe đạp là một điểm cộng tuyệt vời. Tôi đã đặt thêm đêm ngay lập tức. Đây là một kỳ nghỉ và một buổi đoàn tụ gia đình, tất cả hòa quyện trong một!

Nơi tuyệt vời để ở! phòng lớn, mới và rất sạch sẽ, mọi thứ đều hoạt động tốt, giường và gối đều tuyệt vời, có tv và tủ lạnh mini trong phòng và tầm nhìn từ ban công rất đẹp! một gia đình rất thân thiện điều hành nơi này, họ cho chúng tôi nhận phòng 4 giờ trước giờ nhận phòng, điều này thật tuyệt vì chúng tôi vừa lái xe đạp từ huế. 5 sao toàn diện
Khách sạn rất nhiệt tình. Nếu có dịp sẽ quay lại đây
Vị trí gần trung tâm, giá rất rẻ lại có bể bơi, phòng sạch sẽ
Vị trí tuyệt vời để khám phá khu phố cổ với giá cả hợp lý. Nhân viên tiếp tân hữu ích.
Khách sạn hết phòng nhưng quên đóng booking. Nên gọi hỏi mình chuyển qua khách sạn gần đó với dịch vụ tương đương. Nhưng phòng rất hôi, đặc biệt là toilet không đóng cửa được.

Phòng rất sạch đẹp rộng rãi, còn hơn cả tưởng tượng mà giá lại rất phải chăng. Mình đến check-in sớm hơn tận hơn 1 tiếng do trời nắng và không biết đi đâu nên tính vào sảnh ngồi mà không ngờ được cho nhận phòng luôn.
Phòng oke, tạm được, giường rộng thoải mái. Nhà vệ sinh không có hút mùi, chỉ có vòi tắm đứng, không vòi hoa sen.
Chị chủ nhiệt tình, phòng ở thoải mái , giá cả hợp lí

Petit hôtel à 5mn de la plage. Très bien pour un séjour en famille.chambre spacieuse et confortable. Accès quasiment permanent à la piscine en respectant la tranquillité. Personnel très agréable et aux petits soins merci tout particulier à quang et ses sœurs.
スタッフの対応が素晴らしかった 朝食は食べたいベトナム料理を携帯で調べてオーダーすると作ってもらえます メニューはないので面白いです しかも美味しかった プールも最高でした _
部屋数は多くないがその分とてもアットホームな雰囲気
Letztens hat es nicht stattgefunden, da kein zimmer frei war und das geld ist bei denjenigen nicht angekommen. Das wird noch geklärt. Habe auch vor ein paar tage darüber berichtet.

Hôtel familial, calme avec piscine accessible en permanence et plage à 5 mn de marche. Ville de hoi an facilement accessible en taxi. Mention speciale à quang et ses soeurs qui sont très sympathiques et serviables.
Great location. Amazing staff. Fantastic restaurant. Could not fault. Highly recommend.

My stay was pleasant, i really enjoyed the breakfast, they offered many options. It was located near the center of town. I showed up early and i was asked if i wanted to upgrade my hotel in order to check in early and i agreed for an additional 500k dong, which was fine.
Really friendly and helpful staff. It was a pleasure staying at hadana.

I had a great stay at hadana. The rooms were clean, spacious, and well-maintained. The staff was friendly and accommodating, always willing to help with any requests. The location was convenient, close to major attractions and restaurants. One highlight was the breakfast, which had a variety of fresh options. I would definitely recommend it and would stay here again!
Perfect for everything.
Amazing managment ) near tailors ) will definitely come again

Muy buen lugar para quedarte en hoi an, muy cuidado y limpio, lo más destacado es el equipo de trabajo que soy muy correctos y buscan ayudarte en todo momento. La habitación bien decorada y muy confortable para dormir , recomiendo comer un pho en el desayuno buffet

Our stay at was absolutely amazing! the staff were fabulous, so friendly and welcoming, and truly went above and beyond to make our visit special. The service exceeded all expectations and made our time in phuket unforgettable. Highly recommend!
よかった
The room was great and the staff were fantastic, so friendly and focused on the clients. Very attentive staff and extremely helpful with any questions we had. Would recommend staying here.
Very nice hotel, walking distance to the old town, staff was very friendly, we enjoyed our 3 nights stay.

Our stay at hadana was fantastic! the hotel was clean, modern, and spacious. The breakfast was the best we had on our entire trip throughout vietnam and thailand. The pool was nice, the location was very convenient, and the free rental bikes were great! the staff were very friendly and helpful but they were a bit too pushy with their recommendations. Its understandable to give a few recommendations upon arrival but let me eat my breakfast in peace ) the recommendations they gave were also not the best. Thank you for a great stay!
とても ゆっくり過ごせました ありがとうございました
There was nothing special about this hotel other than it as clean and all the staff were very nice. It s in a quiet location but close enough to walk to the shopping district.
Great hotel with character and easy walk into the centre. Lovely staff and great facilities- breakfast particularly good!

Nice hotel, 20 minutes walking from ancient town. Friendly staff. That said, we had room equipment break during the stay causing an injury. The manager handled the hospital trip nicely but it is still not appropriate for a vacation.
Great hotel for families. Mei and her team were very helpful.

This was anamazing stay. In a town where so many businesses are competing for our business, i think this hotel stands above the rest. The team here genuinely cares about our experience. In fact, some of the staff we have become lifelong friends with. Big thanks to mei and ny for taking good care of us and helping us arrange our trips, making wonderful recommendations, and checking on us afterwards to ensure that we were happy. They were both very special to us and we re an enriching part of our experience here the entire team is friendly just like them. The spa massage was the best massage i have had during my entire time in vietnam. This is a really chill atmosphere. It truly deserves five stars!
Service and staff were fantastic!
The resort serves all your needs.
部屋は清潔で設備も整ってます 雰囲気も良くて何日か宿泊したくなりました 自転車も使えるので できれば今度は長く滞在して周辺を探索してみたいです

They have an amazing staff team who truly care about the guests. Love different egg dishes in the breakfasts and for making them unique and different every time. Love the count down dinner as well, a wonderful stay.
Super friendly and helpful staff. Great breakfast selection. Close and walkable to shopping, market etc.
Friendly and very helpful staff. Rooms and facilities are as advertised and very convenient location.
Very relaxing hotel with friendly and attentive staff. Room was clean, comfortable and had a nice view of the pool. Breakfast was delicious with lots of variety.
ホイアン観光のメインな場所から少し離れているが 逆に静かでとても清潔な部屋だった 朝食も美味しく大満足 レンタルサイクルも有りとても便利です 何よりスタッフの心配りは素晴らしかった コストパフォーマンスがとても高い何度でも泊まりたいホテルだった
Vrey good
Fantastisk hotel med sødt og altid hjælpsomt personale.
Loistava palvelu, pyynnöstä kaikki järjestyi. Suosittelen lämpimästi

Context of our review, we are full-time travellers, with 4 children under 6 years that stay in low budget hotels, airbnb s, all the way to 5 star. Overall, we were really happy with us stay at hadana. It started off being contacted by thuan sending a whatsapp message even prior to our stay getting us all set up with a pick up car to the hotel. Then greeted at the hotel upon arrival was great, cute character boutique hotel experience explained everything by thuan whilst the other staff collected our bags - a great check-in experience. The hotel itself seem to be conveniently located being only five minutes drive outside from ho an ancient town, a convenience store as well as restaurants and barbershops all around and a couple cafes the hotel itself seem to be targeted at a more elderly demographic which made a little bit more challenging for us to use the pool facilities as we are a little worried about making too much noise particularly with having kids under six years old. The pool is in the centre of the whole hotel with all the balconies overlooking so you do feel a little exposed by making too much noise with the kids. The room sizes are great. We had to purchase two rooms inter connecting and the staff were always very efficient with getting our rooms cleaned daily and also an evening turned down service which was really nice to have. The gym admittedly was pathetic, so don t even bother thinking about that everything else was just nice, we would definitely reco

Sehr schöner pool, sehr großes zimmer, schön eingerichtet. Das frühstück war gut, aber nicht hervorragend. 15 min zu fuß zur altstadt, 400k pro fahrt für den airport shuttle (völlig fair). Ich würde wiederkommen!!
Good living conditions!

Great hotel on the edge of the bustle of hoi an. Advantages being that it s quiet and away from the very touristy areas which can get very busy. The walk to the night market, river is about 12-15 minutes. The hotel is otherwise great. Pleasant staff, some who are trained well to sell excursions. We had a couple of misunderstandings which would have been avoided if they provided written information to know what is included and not. Otherwise they were very informative and knowledgable. The rooms are great. We got interconnecting rooms which the kids loved as they felt they were independent. We stayed at a relatively quiet time but can imagine the pool getting very busy when it s peak time. Note that the hotel will charge you for everything - which other places don t. So be mindful of this. Otherwise a nice hotel which we enjoyed staying at.

Un peu excentré à 15 à pied du centre ville, avec 37 degré en moyenne au mois d août nous n avons pas hésité à faire appel à un grab équivalent chez nous à uber, le trajet coûte moins d 1 un euro. Le spa et la piscine sont très appréciables. Je vous le recommande
Lack of room service

The photos on the website are definitely using a bit of poetic license, it s not as big as it looks. It s fine for the money but the quality isn t super great. Breakfast isn t great (flies all over the food), the rooms are ok for a couple of nights apart from the wardrobe which has about 5 hangers there is no other storage space, not one drawer which is a bit annoying. The gym consists of 2 pieces of equipment but has no a/c so is pretty much unusable in the warm weather. The pool area is fairly small and the quality of sunbeds / towels isn t great. Staff are friendly, however, the hotel has a bbq once a week and there is a pretty hard sell on it from the staff..it became a bit annoying after a while so much so we ended up avoiding the staff. One positive is the location, you can walk into the old town in 10 mins, they also have free bikes to use.

I love returning back to this hotel, we got 3 rooms this time with the family, the rooms are so clean and so well designed plus the aircons are split types and so cool especially during the summer. Pool is so nice. Best of all are the staff, thanks again to thuan, mei, hieu, thuang and the bellman who help us yue. Will be back soon again!
ホイアンを楽しむにはとてもいい場所でした
Excellent stay. Well appointed rooms. Friendly staff. They arranged transferred to and from da nang airport seamlessly for my family.
매니저분의 친절하고 자상한 안내와 배려, 모던하지는 않지만 앞서간 사람들의 좋은 추억들이 느껴질 듯한 아름답고 잘 관리된 시설들, 항상 일부 그늘 일부 햇살이 있는 깨끗한 수영장, 주변의 숨겨진 맛집들.. 모든 것이 만족스러웠던 숙박이었습니다. 다시 한번 매니저분과 직원분들의 친절과 따뜻함에 감사드립니다.
We enjoyed the pool the most.

We were greeted with smiles and warmth. The place was spacious and comfortable. Staff was very accommodating and works so hard. I have been to around ten hotels this year and this place is the best for far.
酒店環境十分好 但餐廳太少 不方便

One of the loveliest hotels i have stayed at! wonderful, kind and welcoming staff who take the time to make your stay memorable. The manager of the hotel takes time out of her schedule every day to chat to guests and ensure they are enjoying themselves. They gave excellent recommendations for local restaurants and activities and their amenities were unmatched. Beautiful location and beautiful people. Definitely recommend.
Great hotel excellent, friendly helpful staff. Due to typhoon our flights were cancelled and changed the staff were so helpful extended our stay at sale price for the 2extra nights.,

Friendly staff, clean communal areas. Hotel room was nice but bathroom wasn t the cleanest and a bit dated. The shower floods part of the room which is frustrating and there s no shelf to put anything on. Breakfast is included and is ok, can get freshly cooked eggs and nice bread but some other items weren t great. It s a 15 minute walk to the old town.

Come here for a vip treatment! thuan was the most helpful, she was in contact before my stay to make sure i had transportation to the hotel upon my arrival at the airport. All staff were very hospitable, helping me book day tours and setting up transportation to my next destination. The room was clean and bed comfortable, shower has good pressure, elevators to room were quick and smooth. 10/10 recommend. No complaints here.
Muy bueno
Super lækkert resort. Puderne var ikke gode og aircon var ikke super god, men overordnet set rigtig fint. God morgenmad!
The hadana hotel was wonderful. I highly recommend.

Very nice and helpful staff, all of them. Cozy and homey hotel. Great breakfast. And excellent vifi. The lady in does a great job!!! i think her name was thu?! sorry, something like that, she is exellent! i had a bamboo treatment and facial, 5 star for her! you ll fi d everything you need in your room and washroom.just a very small issue the air-conditioning made a noise all the time (first i thought it was the washroom fan running!). Everything else was good.
5 customer service and the hotel is great

Comfortable hotel close to old town, easily walkable to the main sights, japanese bridge, etc. Excellent breakfast in the hotel, and efficient and quiet aircon. Bikes available to borrow, and you can cycle to the beach via the rice fields.
Great value for the price
日本人橋には徒歩圏20 30分くらいかかる ホテルの無料の自転車があるのでそれを使えば10分ほどで行ける プチホテル風でプール ジムもあるが小さめ 朝食がデフォルト付いていて 内容もまあまあ 部屋は正直狭いが観光メインなら許容範囲 スタッフも色々対応してくれて チェックアウト後も部屋の確認をしてくれて忘れ物がフロントで届いた
旧市外まで徒歩20分ほど
It was the best! the staff was always kind and made sure i m comfortable and have everything i need at all time. The place is great, looking like heaven in the middle of a hoi an street
Wonderful staff, lovely hotel, good food. Can t wait to return

Had an amazing experience, would definitely recommend to anyone. Hotel staff were so friendly and helpful. Room was very clean and had a variety to choose from at breakfast. Free bikes were great to use, walking distance from the old town. Felt very safe and was quiet.
The staff are very friendly and extremely helpful with any issues. Upgraded us to a bigger room on check in which was a lovely suprise.
部屋も広くて 料理も美味しく最高だった 観光エリアからは少し離れているが 無料のレンタサイクルがあり問題はない

We have had a bug in the room, the hotel staff cleaned and sprayed against insects right away... They also offered 50 off the lunch menu which was very appropriated. Overall good experience good walkable location and great pool
Walkable distance to the old town. Staff are very helpful to guests. We love the spa and our breakfast every day. It was my second time stay and i enjoyed every minute there!

Great place to stay staff were awsome always there to help breakfast has good selection love the vietnamese omelette so fresh. Would definitely recommend staying here could not fault them would stay again loved it.
The room was very clean. The breakfast buffet was excellent as well as the pool. The employees are all very nice

The staff were amazing. The welcome drink was delicious( my favorite), i actually ordered it with my dinner and the made it for me. My first room had a leaking from the ceiling but they placed me in another room right away and checked several times that i was happy with my new room. The pool is nice. The free breakfast was good i enjoyed the bun here. It rained so we did not get to do the coconut tour but caught a taxi from da nang and they booked the tour for us. The customer service here is a 10/10, room itself was 6/10 bathroom grout curtains, shower curtain and lamp shades need a good cleaning. Decor of hotel and room 10/10.
Elsket dette hotellet! en klassisk stil som føles luksuriøs og eksklusiv. God service, god frokost, hyggelig betjening. Vi valgte å bo på dette stedet under våre to opphold i hoi an!

This was our first time in vietnam and hoi an loved our stay here, staff were very lovely and helpful, booked a pool view room, which really wasn t till you looked over the balcony, would have preferred the lower floors but in saying that loved our room. Breakfast was okay, could do with changing it up from time to time, different fruits or pastries, or adding option of poached eggs. Need to look at where the linen is washed particularly towels as they smell strongly of fuel. Overall was a lovely hotel and would stay again if we ever return to vietnam.
I really loved this hotel. The pool, staff, breakfast, and massage therapists were excellent.

Great hotel to stay at. Rooms very clean and spacious. Pool is perfect to cool down in, wasn t busy and always a lounger free. Isn t as close to old town as we thought about a 10-15min walk but still very walkable. Would come back and stay again.
The property could use better upkeep. I would not stay again.

Great value for money. The room was a little small but clean and aircon working well. Pool was amazing but the gym is quite minimal. Staff were super friendly and location was away from the noise but also close enough to walk to the main areas. Maybe a 10-15min stroll
A great place to stay in hoi an. I loved it here. Even though is a 4 it deserves 5 receptionist and staff were always friendly and helpful. I recomand it.
The hotel was very clean and comfortable - a short walk from the historic centre of hoi an. The staff couldn t do enough to help and make arrangements for our stay. Would definitely recommend
Beautiful hotel inside out with pleasant staffs. Good location as pretty near to the unesco old town.
Great hotel, wonderful staff. Each day out the front of the hotel was a free electric open air bus. Usually 50.000 dong to get to the markets. Great bed and fluffy pillows. We enjoyed our stay .
Excellent stay. Marvelous 4 star hotel. Recommendable.
Angenehmes ambiente üppiges fruehstueck sehr freundliches personal

Couldn t recommend this hotel enough! best place we stayed in the whole of vietnam! the staff couldn t be more friendly and helpful, rooms stunning and everything you need, great location, and wonderful food and drinks. Thank you for a lovely stay.
We love this hotel, everything was perfect, great location.
ホイアンの旧市街までは歩いて15分程度でしたので十分に歩ける距離で良かったです 朝食もとても種類が多く 特にパン好きの私はとても満足できました

It was a nice stay reception staff very helpful. Only downside was noise from other guests talking loudly in the corridors in the middle of the night. Location for me was perfect. About 1 hour walk to beach and about 35 minutes to the old town.
Staff couldn t have been lovelier. So helpful and really nice. The breakfast was the best we ve had in vietnam. So many delicious and fresh options. Great location.
Just outside all the honking scooters of hoi an. Lots of shops nearby.
Good staff and service

I really enjoyed this hotel. The rooms were very nice. Clean, quiet and we had a nice view of the pool. Breakfast was pretty good too. Staff were very nice and helped us arrange show bookings transportation as needed. Only negative would be it s a bit further away from the old town, so lots of walking.
Wonderful hotel. Staff is very helpful. Food delicious. Quiet but still close to old town.
Beautiful hotel. Everything was immaculate and breakfast was delicious. Staff couldn t of done enough to help with anything you need. Was like staying with family. Highly recommend
The staff at hadana are authentically kind and helpful!
What an amazing place. Great hotel to base yourself. Hoi an has so much to offer.
Close to old town and many restaurants

Our stay got off with a couple of glitches though the guest relations staffer who took care of us from arrival to departure, eased the kinks and made our three nights there good. We were also told the hotel was upgrading its rooms, so that s positive news - our room was clean, spacious and had a decent farm view, though it had seen better days. Bathroom setup also needed attention, like longer spouts for taps to minimise splashing outside of sink and tub. We had to mop up the wetness with towels to keep the counter and floor dry. Breakfast was generous and varied. Staff overall were friendly and responsive.
The property was clean, well maintained, well staffed and in easy walkable distance to the old town (10 minutes). The staff were lovely also

I have stayed at this hotel previously and it is very nice with friendly, helpful staff. The breakfast is very nice and the internet has a good connection. The hotel is located about a mile or so from the old town but it is easily accessed by taxi. It takes about 15 to 20 minutes to walk if you feel inclined to do so. The only fault i would give it is that the bed and pillows are quite hard but overall it is a nice place to stay.

Lovely hotel situated within 15 minutes of the old town and about 20 minutes cycle to the an bang beach. We stayed in a room with rice fields view, but our view was blocked by three large coconut trees. The staff are really friendly and helpful. Overall a lovely hotel.
Good breakfast also goo packaged breakfast staff very helpful
The location is very convenient. It is walkable to the old town and the memory show. All staffs are very nice. And the free breakfast was amazing.
Charming hotel and ideally located. Highly recommend this place for your visit to lovely hoi an.
Wonderful hotel! would rate 11/10 if possible. A must stay when visiting hoi an, we extended our stay twice it was that good!
Friendly and very helpful staff. Good price, great facilities
Phòng sạch. Nhân viên nice. Có bể bơi. Có xe đạp. Gần phố cổ.
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, giá rẻ, cải thiện thêm menu đồ ăn, toàn pizza cũng hơi kén người ăn
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng rộng, bể bơi to, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Tuy nhiên, cần cải thiện vấn đề vệ sinh phòng ốc và bể bơi hơn.

Tôi đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây. Villa xinh xắn, chủ nhà vui tính, nhiệt tình, phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Villa chỉ cách phố cổ 5p đạp xe, xe đạp được cho mượn free. Cảm giác thân thiện như ở nhà. Sẽ quay lại đây nếu có dịp trở lại hội an 3

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng nhỏ nhưng đẹp. Nhân viên phục vụ chu đáo. Tuy nhiên khi check in thì khách sạn đòi thêm mỗi cháu trên 5t 200.000đ phụ thu. Lẽ ra điều này nên báo cụ thể số tiền trước.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Thiết kế nội thất tuyệt vời và kiến trúc tuyệt vời. Nhân viên thân thiện. Vị trí tốt, 5 phút đi xe đạp từ khách sạn.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn nên điều chỉnh menu ăn sáng, ít sự lựa chọn quá.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
username: AZNEEZAL A. R. B. M. R.
userCmt: Chọn khách sạn mới, sang trọng này và bạn sẽ không bao giờ hối tiếc, tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay trở lại khách sạn dịch vụ cao cấp ngoạn mục này ở hội an. Căn phòng siêu sạch với phong cách hiện đại và các bữa ăn sáng buffet đã quá lớn! bạn sẽ thích nó

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn dịch vụ rất tốt. Đặc biệt, nhân viên có thái độ thân thiện, niềm nở.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn nhỏ hơn so với trên hình. Hồ bơi nhỏ, phòng cũng nhỏ bí, lúc mới vào bật điều hoà một lúc lâu mới mát,nóng dễ sợ luôn, ở trong phòng nghe tiếng bên ngoài rất to. Phòng 724k cộng phụ thu trẻ 6t 150k, tính ra gần 900k. So với giá đó ở khách sạn khác sướng hơn.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn view đẹp, hồ bơi đẹp, phòng sạch, không gian thoáng mát. Buffet sáng ngon, đậm đà. Nói chung service ok hơn mong đợi.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Tuyệt, bufer sáng cũng rất đầy đủ món

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn thiết kế rất xinh xắn, sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, nhân viên nhiệt tình, sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Vị trí khách sạn rất thuận tiện thăm quan các điểm du lịch, bể bơi sạch, thay nước thường xuyên. Các bạn nhân viên vô cùng thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Ai thích lãng mạn chill chill thì đây là điểm đến tuyệt vời. Đồ ăn sáng ngon, menu thay đổi theo ngày. Duy chỉ có 1 điều nhỏ xíu là điều hoà ở khách sạn mát chậm, nhưng vì tất cả ưu điểm trên nên tôi vẫn chọn ở đây 2 lần và nếu đến hội an tôi vẫn sẽ ở đây

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Mọi thứ đều 5 sao nhưng có máy lạnh thì 1 sao nói ra để cải thiện tốt hơn thấy ai hôm đó cũng than phiền máy lạnh đi du lịch thì họ thích máy lạnh tốt hơn

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng ok nhưng buffet sáng hơi it món hồ bơi nhỏ

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng thì nhỏ, trước cửa phòng là chổ tập kết chăn ga gối bẩn của tầng, bước ra khỏi cửa phòng tưởng mình đang ở tiệm giặt là. Đặt 2 giường thì phòng nhận 1 giường đơn, cái này gia đình mình vẫn ngủ được nên thôi chấp nhận. Buffet bữa sáng đúng là thảm hại, món mặn ăn được mỗi trứng

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Mọi thứ ở đây đều tốt, sẽ quay lại sớm nhất

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nhân viên rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Thiết kế xinh, nhân viên thân thiện, phòng cách âm kém

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Tuyệt vời , không có gì để chê

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn và apps quảng cáo trên app 01 đường, đến lúc nhận phòng thì một nẻo, thang máy có mùi khó chịu, phòng cách âm kém. Lễ tân xử lý khiếu nại thiếu kỹ năng khách phản ánh thì bảo bữa sao cứ đến thẳng khách sạn thuê phòng đừng đặt qua app. Vậy thì đăng ký trên app làm gì. Apps giải quyết khiếu nại bằng cách đổ thừa hết cho khách sạn mình là app trực tiếp thì phải có trách nhiệm trước những gì mình đăng. Sau cùng apps giải quyết bằng mã giảm giá 100k nhưng khách hàng không cần tiền đó. Tuy nhiên có cái cũng ghi nhận là ăn sáng mặc dù ít món nhưng nấu đậm đà. Duy có cà phê dở.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Rất ok và phù hợp với giá cả,chắc chắn lần sau không thể quên.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Dịch vụ ok, nhân viên nhiệt tình, giá cả hợp lí

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great staff great accommodation. Loved the ambiance.

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice clean room, friendly staff, we got upgraded to a bigger room with spacious living room. Really enjoying my time at the hotel, will definitely come back

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng ở sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, không gian đẹp, gần các vị trí vui chơi. Nhân viên phục vụ thân thiện, dễ thương. Giá thành rẻ nên đến trải nghiệm

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Mình đặt phòng cho chuyến du lịch trăng mật và tất cả mọi thứ đều hơn mong đợi. - phòng rộng rãi, nhiều cửa sổ lấy ánh sáng tự nhiên. Trang trí đem lại cảm giác ấm cúng, dễ chịu. Mình đi trăng mật nên khách sạn còn hỗ trợ trang trí phòng miễn phí - cách phố cổ hơn 3km nhưng khách sạn cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí. Đi bộ ra biển cửa đại cũng rất gần. Chiều ra hóng mát ngắm biển rất chill - buffet sáng ngon, đồ ăn được thêm liên tục - bể bơi sạch - đặc biệt là service siêu tốt, không có từ gì để chê . Từ lúc nhận phòng đến trả phòng đều được hỗ trợ tận tình. Sau trả phòng mình có để quên đồ. Liên hệ nhờ khách sạn tìm giúp được hỗ trợ rất nhanh và chu đáo tóm lại rất rất recommend mọi người lựa chọn elites khi tới hội an nhé

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng sạch và thoáng, hồ bơi sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện

hotelName: Happy Life Memories Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Phòng thoả mái, nhân viên thân thiện, đáng để lưu trú

Thật tệ khi sử dụng dịch vụ ở đây. Khuyên mọi người tránh xa chỗ này ra. Mình đi nghỉ dưỡng nhưng không có điện, đợi mấy tiếng k có, trời thì nóng. Mình yêu cầu hoàn tiền nhưng k/s k hợp tác. Thái độ từ sếp đến nhân viên quá tệ

Mình có 1 trải nghiệm ko tốt nơi đây, mình đi du lịch khá nhiều nhưng đây là cái villa tệ nhất, mọi người ai có ý định chọn chỗ nghĩ ngơi thì nên cân nhắc nhé - nhân viên không nhiệt tình, và thân thiện. Mình bỏ tiền ra dùng dịch vụ của nó mà giống như kiểu mình đi xin gì nó ấy, thái độ lồi lõm - vệ sinh phòng không sạch sẽ, phòng toilet bốc mùi thúi kinh khủng, khăn giấy ko có cho khách sử dụng, may mắn mình có đem theo, góc nào cũng có kiến hôi bò quanh. - điều hoà hoạt động không ổn - bảng giá dịch vụ có bán bia, các loại nước đóng chai khác, nhưng cấm khách uống bia. Đi du lịch mà như bị quản ấy - ghi là đc phép sử dụng bếp để nấu nướng nhưng lại khó chịu với khách khi khách sử dụng, có pv ăn sáng nhưng tối khuya xuống mượn cái muỗng và cái tô thì tỏ khó chịu - vị trí thì xa phố cổ nơi chung mình cho 1 sao , tẩy chay cái villa này .. Quá khủng khiếp
Nhân viên ok, phòng ốc cũ kỹ, vòi nước có vấn đề. Giá phòng hơi cao so với dịch vụ nhận được
Khách sạn ở khu vực khá trung tâm nên dịch vụ xung quanh khá sẵn. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ nhg khá nhỏ

Just book this homestay as you will not find a more better place to stay. The rooms are beautiful and very clean with excellent air-conditioning. Your hosts are some of the nicest people you will ever meet anywhere in the world. They great you every time you return from an outing with cold drinks and beautiful tea and snacks. A really enjoyable place to stay and i didn t want to leave.

Está situado a 35 min andando, pero aún así lo recomiendo. Te ofrecem bicicletas de manera gratuita, el personal y la atención son espectaculares, nunca en ningún sitio nos han tratado tan bien. La familia es muy atenta, te sirven zumos, fruta, infusiones y te ayudan con todo. Las habitaciones están geniales, todo muy limpio y nuevo. Repetiría sin dudarlo.
Absolutely wonderful staff. Great location in a truly memorable city. We loved our stay and would go back in a heartbeat!

This is the best homestay in my life. I met lots of nice staff when i stayed. They deserve free tea or coffee in the morning and evening. Uprade my room. Then i can stay in big and comfortable room. Also recommend somw good place to visit. Help me book the hoian tour. Thank you so much for the all kindness. It is like dream. I highly recommend herbal homestay.

I cant speak highly enough of these lovely people ,they made our stay so special in every way.the on site roasted coffee in the morning along with the wonderfull breakfast made by nguyen.the rooms not only comfortable but kept clean and fresh by yen every day....we say thankyou again to binh,hoa,nguyen,yen .a special thankyou to nguyen for making our stay so memorable.we will be back ...graeme and katrina

Das homestay war die beste unterkunft unserer reise durch malaysia und vietnam. Das lag zum einen am wirklich komfortablen zimmer mit schönem gartenblick, dem modernen badezimmer mit tropendusche, als auch am wunderbaren service der mitarbeiter. Das frühstück war sehr vielseitig, es gab dazu immer einen leckeren obstteller und den typischen vietnamesischen kaffee. Außerdem wurden kostenlos fahrräder zur verfügung gestellt und gegen eine geringe gebühr konnten wir uns motorroller ausleihen. Die mitarbeiter kümmerten sich wirklich vorzüglich um uns und wir hätten gerne noch ein paar nächte länger in hoi an verbracht!
部屋は新しく綺麗で 掃除も行き届いています いつもコーヒーのサービスを尋ねてくださり 毎日美味しくいただいていました 宿泊を延長したいほど快適でした また訪れたい宿のひとつです

Nettes kleines hotel, das derzeit durch einen bau im hinteren teil des grundstücks erweitert wird. Das geschwisterpaar, das das hotel betreibt ist reizend. Die lage ist zwischen altstadt und strand und man kann mit den hauseigenen fahrrädern, die kostelnos verliehen werden alles gut erreichen.

We had a wonderful time staying in this amazing homestay. The family who runs this place and the staff are so extraordinary kind and helpful. They served us a big fruitplatter and drinks when we checked in and gave us a lot of informations about things to do in and around hoi an. Guests can use their bicycles for free, so it s an easy ride to the citycenter and the beaches. We decided to stay two nights more and got an upgrade to the bigger room (the most beautiful room on our travel through vietnam). The food we had for lunch on our check out day was very good and freshly prepared by the family itself. We highly recommend this homestay to everybody visiting hoi an.

Hotellet ligger 10min sykkelvei fra gamlebyen og stranden, perfekt sted da man får låne sykler på hotellet. Familien som eier og driver stedet gjorde hele vårt opphold! de stiller opp og ordner og fikser, holdt matkurs lunsj for alle som bodde der pga nyttårsaften. Absolutt beste verten vi har hatt på reisen rundt i vietnam!
올드타운 근처이고 자전거를 무료로 빌려주어서 날마다 올드타운에 놀러갔어요. 조식도 훌륭하고 아침마다 과일을 충분히 주셔서 따로 과일을 사먹을 필요가 없어요. 그리고 오토바이도 빌려주셔서 안방비치도 가고 정말 즐거웠어요. 픽업과 드랍서비스도 있어 그랩보다 가격도 싸고 편리해서 참 좋았습니다. 또 가고 싶어요.

Tôi đến đây với gia đình của tôi. Phòng sạch sẽ và lớn. Có quạt và máy lạnh trong phòng, rất thích. Tôi rất yêu nơi này. Chủ nhà trọ khá tốt và thân thiện, khu vực tốt, gần chợ đêm và gần địa điểm nổi tiếng. Tôi đến từ thái lan. Khi quay lại lần nữa tôi sẽ chọn nơi này.
Phòng rộng rãi. Mà sạch sẽ thoáng lắm, cô chú chủ nhà cũng dễ tính và nhẹ nhàng. Gần phố đi bộ thuận tiện, gia đình mình di chuyển các điểm toàn đi bộ.

Vì chủ yếu ra ngoài nên mình không cần view, cô chủ rất thân thiện dễ mến, mình yêu con người đà nẵng, về chỗ ở rất sạch sẽ, tuy nhiên lầu 3 phải leo thang bộ xíu, đặc biệt đi vài ba bước là có thể ra chợ đêm và phố cổ, rất gần.
Tuyệt vời. Nếu quay lại hội an mình sẽ tiếp tục lựa chọn homestay này
Cô chú chủ nhà rất thân thiện và chu đáo. Mình ở phòng 2 giường đơn. Phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ.
Chị chủ de thuong và nhiệt tình. Giá cả okela nha cả nhà
Lokasi sangat dekat dengan kota tua dan pasar malam, pemiliknya ramah. Bersih dan nyaman.
Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ. Cô chủ siêu siêu dịu dàng tốt bụng.
Cô chủ dễ thương cực, thân thiện, giỏi tiếng anh. Phòng sạch sẽ, gần trung tâm luôn, tối đi bộ ra chợ đêm hội an có 10 bước chân thôi. Mình sẽ book homestay này vào lần tới khi vào hội an
Chị chủ dễ gần, phòng cũng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Gần phố cổ nên đi lại rất thoải mái. Cảm ơn chị chủ nhiều ạ.
Khách sạn phòng sạch v mới. Đi 2 bước ra chợ đêm phố cổ, rất tiện. Chị chủ khách sạn rất vui vẻ, nhiệt tình. Đây sẽ là nơi mình lưu trú thường xuyên khi ra hội an du lịch.
Mình đặt phòng có ban công nên rất thoáng và rộng. Lại ngay gần phố đi bộ và chùa cầu nên chỉ cần đi bộ. Xung quanh có nhiều quán ăn khá tiện. Recommend cho ai đặt phòng nhé

Cô chủ siêu nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, có cả ban công ngoài để cho những ai thích nhâm nhi trà cà phê mỗi sáng. Homestay ở ngay chợ đêm, ngay phố cổ hội an, đi bộ quanh phố cổ thoải mái mà không sợ mệt. Ở đây cực kỳ thoải mái, có phòng lớn dành cho gia đình, con nhỏ. Tôi cam kết đảm bảo ở đây thì các bạn không phải phàn nàn gì đâu. Cám ơn vì một trải nghiệm tốt. Hẹn gặp lại một ngày gần nhất.
Phòng sạch sẽ, gần phố đi bộ hội an. Cô chủ dễ thương, tốt bụng
Cô chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình dễ chịu và thoải mái, phòng sạch sẽ, có ban công rất thoáng
Phòng đẹp sạch sẽ, cô chủ thân thiện, nhiệt tình, mến khách. Có dịp sẽ quay lại nơi đây
Cô chủ rất thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ yên tĩnh, sẽ chọn lưu trú tiếp khi đến hội an
Chị chủ dễ thương, nói hay, chỗ ở rất dễ tìm. Vào buổi tối, chỗ ở có phố đi bộ và có thể đi thẳng đến phố cổ hội an.
Sạch sẽ, rộng rãi và chủ rất nhiệt tình. Vị trí tốt là tốt.

Chúng tôi ở trong một loại phòng gia đình có ban công. Các phòng đều rộng rãi và sạch sẽ với cảm giác đặc trưng của người việt nam. Có quạt và máy điều hòa. Vị trí rất chiến lược, ngay tại vị trí chợ đêm. Các nhân viên khách sạn rất thân thiện, luôn chào đón chúng tôi và rất hữu ích. Thật là một niềm vui khi nghỉ tại hoa thu homes.
Cô chủ quá dễ thương! mọi người ai cũng dễ thương, gần địa điểm vui chơi hội an, mọi người nên ở đây nha
Cô chủ nhà rất thân thiện, ở ngay gần chợ đêm nên tiện đi lại
Chủ nhiệt tình.phòng ngay phố chợ đêm . Gần sông . Thuận tiện đi lại
Mỗi khi tôi cảm thấy như ở nhà, chủ nhà đều rất tốt với tôi.
Giống như ở nhà, chủ nhà rất hữu ích và tốt bụng
Khách sạn nằm rất gần chợ đêm nhưng tiếc là không có thang máy vì giống như ở homestay
Gia đình cô chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, thoải mái, vị trí gần trung tâm, đi bộ ra chợ đêm và phố cổ hội an. Sẽ quay lại nơi đây lần tới.
Anh chị chủ rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Phòng rộng sạch sẽ. Sẽ ủng hộ lần sau.
Cô chú chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Cô chủ nhà rất thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình lắm. Gọi taxi nhanh và hướng dẫn các địa điểm ăn uống vui chơi giá cả hợp lí tại hội an.
Phòng rộng sạch sẽ, cô chủ rất nhiệt mình delay máy bay 1 ngày mà cô vẫn cho rời ngày nhận phòng, lần sau vào hội an chắc chắn vẫn lưu trú ở nhà cô
Nên book phòng nha mọi người. Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình dễ thương. Nếu có dịp đi hội an nữa mình sẽ quay lại

Gia đình mình 4 người, mình book phòng family tầng 2, căn phòng rộng rãi, thoáng. Homestay sát chợ đêm và cách phố cổ ở bên kia cầu, di chuyển tiện. Điểm thích nhất ở homestay là cô chủ hiền lành, dễ gần, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, chăn ga gối sạch và thơm. Mình có sử dụng dịch vụ giặt đồ, cô giặt sạch sẽ, cẩn thận. Rất ưng
Một homestay nhỏ gia đình nhưng mà cô chú thân thiện lắm mà, gần sát phố cổ hội an đi vài bước chân là tới. Lần sau vẫn ghé chỗ này nữa.
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, mát mẻ, view đẹp, phù hợp cho gia đình khi lưu trú. Cô chủ nhiệt tình và dễ thương, hỗ trợ giờ trả và nhận phòng tốt, hài lòng.
Home rất sạch sẽ, nhiệt tình! mình bay đến sớm có thể gửi đồ rồi đi ăn xung quanh đó, được hỗ trợ nâng cấp phòng để nhận phòng sớm có dịp sẽ quay lại đây nữa
Không gian rộng rãi, mát mẻ, sạch sẽ. Ngay chợ đêm hội an và chùa cầu luôn. Rất tiện đi lại.

Cô chủ rất hiền lành, thân thiện, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thoáng đãng, ngày nào cô cũng lên dọn rất cẩn thận ạ. Từ homestay đi ra trung tâm phố cổ siêu gần, chỉ mất vài phút, xung quanh cũng sẵn nhiều dịch vụ ăn uống, massage,...
Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, thoáng, rộng 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời
Cô chủ rất dễ thương, vị trí tiện đi lại
Cô chủ dễ thương và rất nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ lắm, ở gay khu chợ đêm nên tối rất tiện đi chơi, gần phố cổ
Rộng rãi, thoải mái, sạch sẽ, cô chủ rất nhiệt tình và dễ thương, highly recommended nha!
Wifi yếu. Cần cải thiện!
Máy lạnh không lạnh, cửa phòng tắm không thể khóa.
Rất gần chợ đêm. Kháchsạn phòng rộng, mọi thứ thoải mái
Cô chủ rất dễ mến, phòng sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, gần phố cổ. Đồ ăn sáng ngon
Homestay sạch sẽ, chị chủ thân thiện, dễ thương. Phòng khá rộng, tiện nghi đầy đủ.
Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ đồ dùng cơ bản. Vị trí thuận lợi. Cô chủ rất nhiệt tình.
Phòng rộng, đẹp, thoải mái, vừa có quạt vừa có máy lạnh, bác chủ rất dễ thương. Nếu có cơ hội nhất định sẽ quay lại!
Cô chú chủ nhà hết sức dễ thươnggggg!!! cảm giác như ở nhà của mình. Phòng rất sạch, giường rất êmmm. Sẽ quay lại vào lần tới!!
Phong gon gang sach se, vi tri dep ngay cong cho dem, co chu nhiet tinh
Khách sạn sạch sẽ ngay gần phố cổ hội an, đi lại rất tiện
Phòng sạch đẹp.. Chủ dễ thương.. Rất sạch sẽ
Vị trí thuận lợi, mình đi 3 người được cô cho vào phòng rộng 3 giường có 2 giường đôi em và thoải mái. Cô nhiệt tình, có dịch vụ xe đi đà nẵng hoặc bà nà hills, xe đi đà nẵng và đi bà nà
Phòng sạch sẽ. Chủ khách sạn dễ mến.
Phòng sạch, rộng rãi, cô chủ nhiệt tình
Phòng rộng ấm cúng, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Phòng tắm cũng rất sạch sẽ. Ngủ ngon như ở nhà. Gần phố cổ hội an có thể đi bộ được
Homestay sạch sẽ, ngay cạnh phố cổ, giá cả khá hợp lý mặc dù book phòng ngày cuối tuần.
Lần đầu mình đi ha. Chuyến đi vô cùng tuyệt vời. Homestay khá rộng rãi và vô cùng sạch sẽ nha, mà lại còn gần phố cổ đi bộ có tẹo là đến rùi. Cô chủ duyên dáng, quan tâm khách lắm nha.
Homestay nằm sát bên chợ đêm và phố cổ, anh chị chủ nhà rất hiếu khách và vui tính, phòng sạch sẽ.
Homestay rất sạch sẽ, thuận tiện cho việc đi lại, giá cả rất hợp lý, cô chủ nhà rất dễ thương và tốt bụng. Highly recommended !
Phòng sạch sẽ gọn gàng. Gần trung tâm phố cổ. Chủ nhà thân thiện giúp đỡ rất nhiều. Mọi người nên trải nghiệm nhé.
Chủ thân thiện, dễ chịu lắm nha
Thích hợp đi gia đình và phương.
Home stay ngay bên cạnh phố cổ, rất thuận tiện cho việc ở cũng như dạo phố. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Cô chú chủ nhà dễ mến, giá cả hợp lý. Nếu quay lại mình vẫn ưu tiên chọn chỗ này d

Cô chủ thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ ok gần phố đi bộ
親子３人で利用しました 部屋は若干狭かったものの ２つのトランクを広げるには厳しい という意味で スタッフの方々のサービスや旧市街に近い立地条件を考えるとかなりコストパフォーマンスは高いものと思います
Personale molto garbato e molto attento, ottima la posizione a due passi dalla città vecchia ed ottima la colazione. Se possibile scegliere camera superior.
Lovely staff and very helpful. Nice clean rooms and decent buffet breakfast. Good location. Nothing to complain about!
Staff were fantastic. Room was comfy with lots of homely touches
Wonderfully friendly and helpful staff. Very nice breakfast location and selection.
Central location. Everything was well maintained. The room was very clean and comfortable. The staff hospitality was outstanding.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is in a superb location and the rooms are a generous size. What makes his hotel special though are the staff. They are the most welcoming, hospitable people i ve ever come across in a hotel. They made sure our stay comfortable, allowed us to check in early and even gave us a gift when we checked out. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one. We will be back. Chris and family.

The best hotel i ve ever stayed in. The staff were so friendly and attentive always greeting us, and seeing us out, making conversation. The facilities including spa/bicycles were fantastic. We requested the round bed and they provided this for us- it was amazing! it was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was huge, and had so much variety. Upon arrival they provided us with cake and tea which was delicious. They even gave us a leaving gift! thank you so much ) we recommend hoang trinh hotel to everyone!
Very clean and super friendly staff. Breakfast was amazing.
직원분들이 밝고 친절합니다. 도보이동이 용이하며 시설은 시간을 피하지 못했지만 잘 관리되어 있습니다.

일단 호텔이라고 하기에도 좀 뭐하고.. 게스트하우스 느낌이랄까? 호이안이라는 동네의 색깔과는 잘 어울리는 오래된 숙소였다 원래 봐둔 숙소가 방이 없어서 여기서 그냥 3박 했는데 아침 조식 먹는곳도 너무 좁고 테이블도 몇개 없는데 청소 상태는 정말 실망 접시와 곳곳에 먼지와 벌레시체들이 있어서 밥 먹기도 좀 찝찝했던.... 참 친철하고 볼때마다 웃어주는 직원들 딱 그게 전부인...
Staff and breakfast super
Its a walking distance to hoi an ancient town, the room didnt have noise proof and could hear very clear the noise outside.

Ett otroligt mysigt hotell med framförallt helt fantastisk personal! servicen är utmärkt. Vi blev väldigt bra bemötta när vi kom med te och kaka medan vi checkade in. Fick också väldigt bra tips från personalen som dessutom hjälpte oss att hyra cyklar och annat. Tvättservicen fungerade också oklanderligt. Rummet i sig var rent och mysigt, med en stängd balkong som vätte mot trappuppgången. Dock var trappuppgången halvt utomhus så det kom in mycket ljus. Även frukosten var riktigt bra. De bjöd på en god phô som personalen gjorde iordning medan man tog sig. Det fanns även massor med frukt, bröd, äggröra och allt annat man skulle kunna ha. Extra pluspoäng för gott kaffe med kondenserad mjölk. Nästa gång vi åker tillbaka till hoi an så väljer vi utan tvekan samma boende. Kan inte rekommendera det nog!
직원들이 너무 친절하고 조식도 맛있었어요. 다만 드라이기를 사용할때 3번정도 전기차단기가 떨어져서 갑자기 깜깜해져서 무서웠어요. 혼자 가시는 분은 핸드폰 후레쉬 켜놓고 머리 말리는거 추천할께요. 체크아웃할때 작은 선물도 주시고 저는 너무 만족스러웠습니다.

A 10-15min walk to the anicent town, but the streets are very quite and dark at night so it may be quite scare to walk alone. We arrived hoi an late at night and left early in the next morning so we just found something cheap to stay for a night. The room is old, cleanliness can be improved. However, they served very good breakfast and they will also give you a souvenir ( a bag or a purse) when you check out.

This little gem is located very near the old town and shopping districts. The staff go out of their way to make sure your visit is wonderful. The amazing breakfast includes an assortment of fresh pastries,, fruit as well as hot dishes. While there is no elevator the shòrt rise on the stairs made them easy to walk. Definitely a good choice.

The staff makes us feel very homely and took great effort to ensure we had a comfortable stay, especially hien, front office staff. Hote is located only a short walk to ancient city. The morning glory restaurant serves good food at reasonable prices.for advice, you can book taxi to danang or airport through the spa centre in front of the little hoian central hotel, cheapest in town, only 200k to danang town. However, beware there is a pho stall near the little hoian hotel, operated by a man who charges tourist prices.

Our room had a bath that was unsealed around the edges, which meant you had to sit down for a shower if you stood up, the bathroom would flood. I think the bath was part of the romantic theme of the room but s shower would most likely be preferred by guests.
The staff of the hotel is very passionate about making your stay ideal and helped us with all our wishes.

A really great hotel in the delightful town of hoi an. The staff are absolutely fantastic and go out of there way to ensure you have a great stay. Rooms are very comfortable and decorated in a traditional vietnamese style adding to the charm of the place. Location is a just a few minutes walk to the centre of town and breakfast options are extensive and tasty. I couldn t recommend this hotel strongly enough
Lovely people - they really took care of us
這裡的工作人員都很nice!一進門的熱茶招呼 讓人旅行中有溫暖的感覺!飯店乾淨整潔 我們2個人住的房間應該是自動升級成2個大床 寬敞舒適 提供的早餐讓人不禁懷疑我們到底付了多少錢一晚 怎麼這麼多水果 麵包 任你吃 很推薦!

A deux pas du quartier touristique donc très pratique pour visiter la ville. L hôtel est un peu vieillot mais l accueil toujours souriant et la gentillesse du personnel et de la patronne compensent (jus de fruits au retour des balades, thé, petit cadeau au départ...) excellent petit déjeuner varié et bien fourni. Loueur de vélos juste à côté pratique pour visiter les rizières.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Allt utmärkt, fantastisk frukost, shuttle till stranden, servicen perfekt!

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Ótima localização, quarto bom, banheiro incrível, atendimento diferenciado, prestativo e amável! equipe do café maravilhosa, recepcionistas simpáticas, enfim amamos!

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Absolutely loved this hotel. I stayed as part of a trip travelling from north to south vietnam and i think this was my favourite hotel. Beautifully decorated, very clean, staff were amazing, great location and as a solo traveller i felt totally safe. I really couldn t find fault with anything. Nothing was too much trouble. Absolutely beautiful place.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Easy accessability to markets, restaurants, etc. Locals are respectful, helpful and ready to answer any inquiries even though the language is a barrier. We would like to revisit hoi an in the near future.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice place and near the from old town. You can easily get bicycles and just in few minut.hotel has everything you want and need,breakfast, spa are all great. The staff are the key here. So friendly helpful great pool,there are many sunshine and shade for you to choose.. Love to come again

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This is a really nice hotel which is modern with a local twist. It is located in a quiet area but still close to hoi an old town, basket boat area, hoi a memories show and beach. Very nice breakfast that have all from eggs as you like it, vietnamese food and european food. Nice roof pool with nice views but small. Excellent service in all areas.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent staff -extremely helpful. Great location, newly refurbished. Value for money. Highly recommend this hotel

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: New hotel with location very good. Lovely stay can walking old town about 900m. Excellent buffet breakfast

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Impeccable service! staff is so welcoming and kind. We were greeted warmly each time we came back to the hotel. Excellent, well-maintained bikes to borrow for enjoying the area. Wonderful breakfast with many local options, and choices vary each day. Beautiful hotel.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice hotel15 minutes walk from the old town. Very comfortable with two pools for a dip. The staff were excellent and very helpful. The breakfast included was very good and bikes were provided at no cost for some good trips.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great place to stay in hoi an. Rooms and service were fantastic. Dinner and breakfast in the hotel restaurant were extremely tasty. Perfect location to stay as it is walking distance to all the central things in hoi an.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice property, but a little far from old town and restaurants. About a 15-20 min walk from the old town area

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic small hotel, very friendly staff especially ms chi who went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. Great location just outside the old town easy walking distance. Has a shuttle bus to the beach, 2 pools, great breakfast. Could not have asked for anything more.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The building was quaint and a good location. However, the bed linen smelled sweaty and definitely was not changed. The over powering scent of essential oils in the room gave me a headache. Everyone and everything else was wonderful, although i want to give this place a high score. Cleanliness, is priority.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: An absolutely beautiful hotel, friendly, helpful staff and great facilities, food was good, service was excellent. I would highly recommend and will be back next year.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice and central place to stay. Friendly staff

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great hotel. Friendly staff. Excellent daily breakfast. It s about a 10 min walk to city centre. It has property at an bang beach, but you still have to get there. A bike ride or taxi to the beach. ( we took a taxi-15 min) the main floor, outside pool was closed, due to construction next door.

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Everything was ok! thank you the receptionist because she was very kind!

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 房間的冷氣太熱了 調到最低晚上睡覺起來還是流汗 浴室的浴缸不太方便要很小心地進出 飯店早餐種類偏少 最好吃的是水果 check in時櫃台未先說明什麼東西是需要付費的 等我們check out了踏出大門的時候 才把我們叫回去說瓶裝水是要付費的 雖然價錢不高但就是感覺不太好

hotelName: Hoi An Babylon Riverside Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The property was well decorated, authentic and the staff so welcoming and lovely and made it a wonderful stay. They are extending the property so there is construction noise during the day, but you mostly can t hear it, and we were out during the day most of the time anyway. The rooftop pool is nice and cool, and a great way to unwind after a hot day in the sun. Wifi works well, the noodles are great for the free breakfast otherwise they have basic other bits for a snack before heading out - transport or taxis were easy to get, but it was only a 10 min walk into town (if that) anyhow, i do recommend this hotel as it s close to everything but not in the busiest parts of hoi an.
Good

Nice and quiet. Very comfortable place to stay at, all staff members are very friendly and their service very good. The restaurant s place is very nice and tidy but the river has an odd odor but overall very nice place!

The staff were fantastic and location is great! rooms were spacious and bed was enormous! didn t like the bath shower and area also noisy with music nearby often in early hours. I think we went at wrong month as was extremely hot and no shade over pool although they had umbrellas around pool lounges! overall very good value and location, was probably the noise at night that detracted from overall experience. Also got double charged on mini bar as paideia it might before but had early check out and staff made me pay again as we were waiting to go! wasn t much but was just a bit annoying as i tried to do right thing night before when settling account
Great stay! rooms excellent, same for the breakfast, staff, facilities. Recommended.
Amazing stay highly recommend. Will stay here everytime we come to ha noi

We were upgraded to deluxe river view room with balcony. Huge room and bed which was very comfy. 2 swimming pools one with swim up bar. The beach was just over the road with sun beds and shade which was needed with temperature of 37. Lots of breakfast choices available shuttle ran into town each day a few times a day was useful although grab taxis are so cheap to use too.
Gia đình tôi đã có khoảng thời gian lưu trú thoải mái, tiện nghi cám ơn khách sạn và hotels đã hỗ trợ gia đình tôi.
Khách sạn có cả hướng sông và biển. Không gian đẹp. Phòng rộng. Dịch vụ tốt. Để tắm biển phải ra bãi cách xa 5km, có ô tô đưa đón theo giờ trong ngày.
Smiley, friendly staff. Grounds clean and beautifully kept. Good local shops and restaurants in easy walking distance.

Flott hotell, beliggenhet ca 15 min med bil fra hoi an sentrum. Hotellet tilbyr gratis transport (minibuss) til og fra sentrum 3 ganger daglig. Gratis håndkleservice. Meget god frokost. Godt utvalg, samt kokk som lager bl.a omelett, speilegg etc og phô. Vi spiste også middag på hotellet en kveld, og fikk god service og veldig god mat. Rent og ryddig uteområde. Treningsrom med 3 tredemøller, 2 sykler, styrkeapparat og manualer. Vi hadde også en 60 min massasje ved hotellets spa. Massasjen var meget bra, men de kunne godt gjort litt mer ut av spa et, f.eks kunne det gjerne vært litt musikk i behandlingsrommet, og gjerne noe vann eller te når vi var ferdig. Hyggelig betjening i resepsjonen. Behjelpelige med booking av utflukter etc. Vi var uheldige med været da vi var der, men dersom vi hadde hatt sol og dermed bedre utbytte av basseng/strand ville oppholdet vært 10/10.
We loved the resort, and the staff were friendly and helpful, however we needed a hand rail in the bathroom and the private beach was not as expected, usable or accessible .

Fantastisk ophold. Hurtig roomservice levering. Hyggelig privat strand med toilet, brusebad og omklædning på modsatte side af vejen. Værelset var stort, rent og velholdt. Restauranten serverede god morgenmad
Staff were vey friendly. Great location with the river on one side and the ocean on the other. Amazing selection of food for breakfast.
호텔 자체는 너무 좋았어요 직원들도 너무 친절하였고 방도 좋았어요 다만 호텔 주변에 할 게 많이 없어요 ㅎㅎ 그래도 바다도 바로 앞이라 좋았어요

Nice hotel , charged extra for upgrade although was our anniversary weather was hot so pool was way too warm to use staff were very helpful walk to beach bars and restaurants across street def stay again
Thank you so much for a lovely stay, so relaxing and only a short drive to old town.
Definitely recommend, staff are friendly and helpful. Beautiful report

The food was a bit disappointing, nice selection but some lacked flavour. The room had a smart tv but no apps such as netflix or internet explorer. Minor points but would make a difference, especially on a rainy day. Staff were fantastic and so genuinelyfriendly!
Khu du lịch yên tĩnh. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Khu vực quanh khách sạn có nhiều địa điểm ăn uống ngon, giá rẽ. Cảnh đẹp.
Nice and clean resort, friendly staff
The staff were attentive and friendly. Breakfast was excellent. Rooms were clean. Location across from the beach was lovely
The staff were pleasant and helpful, room was always clean, facilities were great. Location across from private beach was very convenient.
A lovely stay. The property itself could do with some small amounts of tlc. But this didn t stop us having a great time. The staff are fantastic.
전반적으로 시설이 깔끔했고 평화로운 분위기라서 휴식하기에 최적인것같다 호이안에 위치해 호이안야시장과는 가까우나 다낭시내를 자주다닐 것 같으면 다른곳을 추천함

Vi hadde et fantadtisk opphold på hoi an beach resort. Det lå nydelig til med en elv som passerte restauranten i hotellet. Havet lå like ved og tilgangen var enkel, siden det var rett over veien. Stranda hadde angivelig blitt ødelagt av uvær i fjor, men det var uansett ikke vær til å ligge på stranda. Vi koste oss heller ved bassenget på hotellet.
Great place for a holiday retreat that is close to the city centre
Amazing place. So clean. Service excellent. Location lovely. Price was great. Highly recommend it.
This is a beautiful resort that is perfectly situated just outside busy hoi an on the river. The staff

Hoi an beach resort is phenomenal! we arrived at 8am after a long overnight train ride and the staff let us check in to our room early at 10am. They were life savers for us weary travellers! the included breakfast buffet is top notch. The mini bar is stocked with sodas, beers, red and white wine and snacks all for reasonable prices. The restaurants and room service are open until 11pm and offer delicious local and western food. The location is across the street from a beautiful beach and within a short taxi ride (5 usd) to the bustling ancient town. Myly restaurant across the street also has insanely good food for cheap too.
뷰 멋있어요. 시설도 괜찮습니다. 다만 모기가 너무 많아요. 모기 퇴치제 가져가세요
今のビーチの状態の写真を載せて欲しかったです 部屋や朝食やプールなどホイアン旧市街までのシャトルバスがあるなど大変よかったです

The service is the best we have received since being in vietnam. It was so quiet, private and so clean. The food was lovely as we sat in open air dinning right next to the river watching the locals fish. The rooms are probably one of the nicest we have stayed in in all of our travels around the world . We arrived late around 10 30pm and the smell of jasmine and gardenias was thick in the air. We rode bikes into town (about 2 miles away) and had shoes , dresses, suit pants and shirts made- amazing! the market was great, the walk along the river at night with lit laterns were beautiful and the street food and restaurants were good. The town of hoian has been our favorite!!
静かで ビーチも荒れていたと聞いていましたが 良くなってきて 素晴らしい立地にありました ホイアンの中心地までのシャトルバスの本数がもう少しあれば 完璧だったと思います
Lovely resort - beautiful grounds and pool area - resort had loungers on the beach across the road. Surrounding area a bit rough 100vnd taxi to old town - so not a big deal

We enjoyed our stay at hoi an beach resort. The room was spacious and clean, and the staff were helpful and polite. Breakfast had plenty of options. However, we felt that certain areas of the resort, particularly where we stayed, could benefit from some updates. The design was quite dated, with a lot of concrete, making it feel less visually appealing.
Ett jätte trevligt hotell med jätte trevlig personal . Ska man kritisera något så är det att det va väldigt dyrt med mat på hotellet . Dom har en avgift som läggs på efteråt

Property was great! the 2 swimming pools were great the one was right across from our room. Breakfast buffet was awesome.. All the foods we re all fresh delicious had a great selection of fruits! bathroom design could have been a little better as it was huge there was not enough shelving or counter spaces for the size. Shower had plenty of hot water ... Our room was on a second floor which i didn t expect but it had a slightly nice view of the beach. It was only about a 10 minute shuttle to ancient town which was convenient... All the staff were kind, helpful super accommodating !!
All in all very good.

Absolutely excellent hotel, brilliantly helpful friendly staff, restaurant very good, certain breakfast items could be served warmer such as sausages, bacon beans, this was mentioned however it seems that my suggestion was sidelined. Other than this minor issue all else in the dining area was great. Some mould obvious in shower cubicle which we endeavoured to ignore. Again worth mentioning however would certainly not discourage visiting again and for sure recommend to friends and family. Other than these two minor moans we absolutely enjoyed each and every day .. Well less enjoyed the few dull / colder days. Hope all staff maintain the same high standards and attitude it s a winning combination for continued success. Thank you all. Terry marilyn room 217 - 10/03/25 to 01/04/25

Pleasant stay here but after staying previously at the sister hotel in hoi ann unfortunately this one is a little behind in service and breakfast offerings. Good location although the beach is in a state of erosion this is happening all along not just the hotel. Nice pool areas. Large pool towels and bath towels. Attention to detail cleaning required in rooms especially dust.

We had a very pleasant stay. I was there with my wife and 3 sons for 4 days. The breakfast was very good and everything was super. It is a quiet place, so if that s what you are looking for, it is perfect. It was great that they have a gym there, even if it could need a little upgrade.
A great resort opposite the beach and good restaurants. Lovely staff and a convenient shuttle bus into old town. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Highly recommended.

Uitstekend resort direct aan het strand met twee mooie zwembaden. Service en bediening zijn het vermelden waard! restaurant is prima met uitgebreid ontbijt met veel keuze. Op loopafstand vele kleine restaurants aanwezig.
Very pleasant mid range hotel. Large rooms, 2x nice pools, some great restaurants in walking distance and 3 free shuttles to town a day. Shame the beach opposite is not that nice however.

Schöne, gepflegte anlage mit schönen blumen, freundliches personal, gutes frühstücksbuffet, die lage zwischen meer und lagune ist sehr schön. Kostenloser transport in die altstadt mehrfach täglich. Einzig der strassenlärm schmälert das strandfeeling etwas.
Amazing hotel, no complains at all

Property is across the cua dai beach. Beautiful riverview and diverse international cuisine. On site restaurant is 4 star. We did not mind being far from the downtown center. Easy accessible to grab car if someone would like to do shopping at the hoi an central market.
Amazing stay. Karaoke across the road is excessively loud and horrible
Excellent value for the money. The premises are impeccable and the service personnel are very attentive and kind.

初めてこちらのホテルに泊まりました チェックインした後 日本のゴルフカートで荷物を部屋まで運んでくれました プールが2つあり 深い所は両方とも180cm), 川に近い所にある為 インフィニティープールみたいなります 白人の方が多く のんびりとした空気が流れてました また ホテル正面の反対側にはビーチがあり ホテルのデッキチェアーとタオルの貸し出しは無料です バーもありました 朝食は川沿いのテーブルでいただきます 野菜 フルーツ などなど色々豊富でした 卵料理 フォーは作ってもらえます 美味しかったです 灯篭流しをしに 中心部まで行きましたが 無料の送迎バスがホテルからでているので大変便利でした 時間の制約はありますが 18 00発 21時戻りを利用しました 2時間前までに予約が必要です またホイアンに来る機会があれば ぜひ泊まりたいと思います ありがとうございました

The resort is a nicely situated and has well appointed facilities. The restuarant is clean and offers nice views over the river. The 2 pools are of reasonable size and the area surrounding them are clean. The gardens are well kept and overall the resort presents well. However it is showing its age. Opened in 2003, the rooms (particularly ours) badly needed an upgrade or refresh. I guess it disappointed in this regard, but overall we enjoyed our stay and would go there again
The staff were lovely, very helpful. Rooms were good. Choice of 2 pools and the private beach just over the road. Lots of local restaurants nearby.
Very friendly and helpful staff will all our family of 4s needs
Loved our time at the resort. Very friendly and relaxing. Food was amazing.
We really enjoyed our stay here for four nights. The only downside was the toilet kept blocking for some reason. However, staff would always fix fairly quickly when advised.
Good hotel spoilt by incessant rain causing dampness inside rooms. Air conditioning not working
I really enjoy staying at hoi a beach resort. Thank you for your hospitality during our stay. I hope the quality of the hair dryer will improve in near future -)

Great place for a holiday, away from australia. Flanked by the river and the ocean, the resort is great for both views and activities. The food is excellent, and the staff very helpful, and always courteous. When you want a little more activity the beautiful town of hoi an is just a short 4km ride away. It sports many bars, markets and restaurants. My wife and i enjoyed our week here very much. Thanks to all for a very relaxing and pleasant stay. We will recommend this resort to our friends.
Väldigt fint, fräscht hotell med bra läge . Enda minuset va att maten på hotellets restaurang va lite tråkigt. Fanns dock gott om bra
Very good! amazing hotel with very good breakfast.

This hotel is in a very quiet tranquil setting. The gardens are superb the staff were all lovely and bent over backwards to help. The breakfast was ok but not fabulous. The only real complaint is that the shower and bath tiles and screens needed some attention as mouldy and smelly.
Very quiet, and staff were lovely. Very friendly, and helpful. Two pool options, and the air conditioning was fantastic.

Staff are fantastic. We stayed in a superior room which was dated and in desperate need of an upgrade, but the rest of the facilities were in good condition. The room condition was the only negative, however it was clean and tidy, large, and housekeeping were great. Two pools, great restaurant. Beach on one side, river on the other. A number of restaurants and shops around the immediate area, but they have a free shuttle into the ancient town if you want something more lively. Perfect location for relaxing and as a sightseeing base, 4 mins drive from the hustle and bustle of the old town. Would definitely stay again.
Et stort sted tæt på vandet i hoi an. Det værelse vi havde var som sådan ok, bortset fra vi skulle stå i et badekar for at komme i brusebad.

Sehr schöne gepflegte anlage mit gutem service. Leider sind die zimmer bisschen in die jahre gekommen, aber es gibt auch renovierte zimmer. Es gibt mehrmals täglich einen shuttle service in die stadt und fahrräder können ausgeliehen werden. Über eine straße ist der strand erreichbar. In der nähe des hotels gibt es restaurants und kleine einkaufsläden.
The staffs are fluently english, helpful, the food is clean and great! we will be back next time!
Very friendly staff. Amazing beach.

My stay at the hoi an beach resort was absolutely fantastic and relaxing. The swimming pool was beautiful not to mention the spectacular beach just across the room. The free transport to from old town is a bonus... Definitely recommend if you are wanting a relaxing stay.
Third time staying at the hoi an beach resort. Great staff and relaxing environment. Will keep coming back when i visit hoi an.

Underbart hotell där du kan välja pool eller hav nära till ett par trevliga resturanger..bor hellre nära havet och tar taxi in till centrum någon dag bodde här 12 nätter..lite besviken att jag var tvungen att betala extra för att behålla rummet 4 timmar innan flyg hem

The hotel was very big, had a lot of restaurants, 2 swimming pools and a private beach. The room was comfortable, however, there was a weird and bad smell in the bathroom. Except this, it was perfect towels provided for the swimming pool or beach, very good breakfast and free shuttle at different slots to go to the old town. Thank you!

The beach is located across the street from the hotel property. The two pools were nice for the kids but it is not shaded so lots of sunscreen. The breakfast buffet was nice but dinner didn t have many options. However, they are just 10 minutes car ride to downtown where there are lots of restaurants and shops.
Great location on the beach and short drive to old town. We have stayed multiple times but far too noisey these days from surrounding hotels. Sadly not a peaceful stay i was looking for
Relaxing beachside location. Attentive wonderful staff. Can be very noisy due to large work/convention bookings. Upgrade to a riverview room so you get a quieter location.

Property was clean and friendly staff, rooms a little outdated but still nice enough , beach across the road was nice but was not what was advertised as beach front. Pools good except the main pool was closed for functions occasionally. Taxi cabs readily available when needed, i did not like - they dye their pool towels which after wearing a brand new 200 swimsuit the dye completely ruined it
Friendly staff
Great resort, the pools are a great way to spend your day and relax. The rooms are fine and suited our needs perfectly.

Fabulous staff, large clean rooms and linens with great view of river! ac worked beautifully in room. Down side the pool water was too warm for swimming ( need some shade over pools maybe) however the private beach was right across the street and ocean was perfect for swimming.
This is an excellent facility with beautifully crafted gardens and overall landscape. Hotel personnel was very attentive and kind. Incredible value for the money.

Hyvää hotellin auto haki ilmaiseksi kentältä, 30min hieronta päivittäin, polkupyörät sisältyivät hintaan, bussikuljetus hoi an keskustaan, snookkerpöytä, siistit hotellin alueet ja palvelu toimi. Parin pienen korjauksen, oven kahvan ja allas putken kiristyskorjauksen jälkeen, mikä tapahtui heti aamulla, tuli kysely onko kaikki nyt ok. Parannettavaa hotellin ranta ei vastanut kuvia, oli rakennettu aaltovalli ja uimaan pääseminen ei onnistunut eikä ranta baari toiminut. Hotelli kompensoi toisella viikolla asiaa hotellin bussi kuljetuksella 3km päähän yleiselle rannalle. Hotellin 4kpl tietokoneista yksi toimi jotenkin. Hotellin tie hieman meluisa (parveke oli tien puolella), mopoja meni tiuhaa heti aamusella vaikka tie johti niemenpäähän. Televisio pätki välillä mutta pääosin toimi.

Der strand war vorübergehend nicht benutzbar, da er von den gezeiten bedroht ist und befestigt wurde. Ansonsten hat uns das hotel begeistert! die mitarbeiter waren alle immer freundlich, das frühstück war hervorragend, auf individuelle wünsche wurde eingegangen, wir hätten gerne mehr zeit hier verbracht.
Rolig og avslappende atmosfere. Blid og hjelpsom betjening. Godt utvalg av lokale spisesteder.

Jag hade en mycket fin vistelse men som avslutades på ett sätt som inte var planerat. Lördagen den 14 mars vid 19 på kvällen fick jag ett a-4 papper där jag och alla övriga boende på hotellet meddelades att söndagen den 15 mars skulle alla boende flyttas till ett annat hotell pga att lokala myndigheter bestämt att hoi an beach resort skulle stängas tillsvidare från och med 15 mars jag valde då att korta ner min vistelse med en dag och istället boka flyg hem till sverige fortast möjligt. Jag var inte intresserad av flyttas till ett annat hotell utan få tydligt och klart förklarat för mig varför och vad som var den egentliga meningen. Jag bad om att få en refund på den sista natten som därmed inte skulle bli utnyttjad pga detta. Det lovades att jag skulle bli kontaktad via mejl under dagen 15 mars av ansvarig chef,för att få en refund, men det har ännu inte skett. Jag tror att hoi an beach resort är ett underbart ställe att besöka under tider då vi inte har ett corona virus som ställer till det i världen. Flera av dom boende från andra länder hade samma dag blivit uppringda av deras ud och beordrade att ta sig hem snabbast möjligt för att inte fastna i vietnam eller på vägen hem pga att regler och direktiv ändrades timma för timma särskilt i vietnam. Vilket säkert räddat mig från att fastna i vietnamn instängd och utelämnad till själv. Med en regering och ud som inte skyddar sina medborgare är det bättre att ta sig hem fort som bara den.
