Short of staff due to covid, service is not good at the reception desk. I don t feel welcome at all. The room is not clean to be claim resort. The only good thing about this place is the location. Would not come back. It is covid i understand but if you are open it should be properly open.
Spa and sauna not working, rooms 100 year old,the pool is dirty,second day did have buffet breakfast, overall the hotel was run down.

The staff were all great, so helpful and friendly. A couple of areas are still closed after covid lockdowns but will reopen once business picks up again. My balcony opened onto the river and rooms opposite had gardens. Make sure to catch at least one sunrise from the beach directly across the road - it s well worth it. The old town is about a 10min taxi ride (about 100000vdn) and there s lots of shops, restaurants/cafes and street food 200m up the road. I will stay here again for sure when i return to hoi an.

Prijs/kwaliteit best oke. Er zijn nog heel wat verbeter puntjes maar iedereen doet zijn best. We hadden een kamer met uitzicht op de rivier - heel leuk. De koelkast op de kamer bij de kinderen koelde niet maar gelukkig konden ze het water bij ons in de koelkast kwijt. Zwembad is leuk (enige is dat het water veeeel te warm was, je kon echt niet afkoelen maar ook in de zee was het warm trouwens). Het onderhoud kon iets beter maar niet om te zeggen dat het vuil was. Jammer dat er geen bar is om een drankje te bestellen. Wij waren amper in het hotel (steeds op uitstap dus we hebben maar heel kort aan het zwembad gezeten). Er is een gratis shuttle service naar de oude stad dus dat is heel handig. Het ontbijt mocht gerust wel iets uitgebreider. Het is echt afgestemd op de vietnamezen. Voor ons was er mogelijkheid tot een ei, een toaster en een worstje. En daar eindigt de westerse keuze helaas. Er was wel yoghurt in een potje maar die was niet gekoeld jammer genoeg. Het personeel is wel vriendelijk en behulpzaam

Great location hotel set on riverside with private beach across the road fantastic large infinity swimming pool located just at river s edge excellent buffet breakfast offering both vietnamese and western food friendly helpful staff great welcome also organise free transport to and from old town wonderful place to stay

The property has seen better days - but is bouncing back post covid. Every day you could see more people working on the gardens and facades. The rooms are spacious and well maintained. The staff are friendly and helpful. Wi fi is dreadful.

Lovely resort in a great location.the river one side and beach the other.staff were excellent and added bonus of free bicycles and free shuttle bus into hoi an town.only downfalls were that some fixtures and fitting need replacing.our safe did not lock and we had issues with the door lock too.enjoyed our stay though
Gorgeous spot. Staff were very friendly. A great couple day getaway .

This is a great place to enjoy the pools and beach. Breakfast buffet had something for everyone. 15 min drive to hoi an-old town/night market or 4- 5 usd taxi ride. We downloaded grab and saved a little money. I would gladly stay here again.

This was an exceptional place to stay. The staff were outstanding, the property was beautiful. The evening meal was complete with a nightly lantern show and accompanying musicians. Both fantastic singers. We also attended a cooking class with le, what a fantastic experience. Le was knowledgeable, patient and helpful. Overall a fantastic experience.
Loved my stay at hoi an beach resort. The staff were so friendly, the location was beautiful. Highly recommend!

The sandy beach was opposite the property. The setting was very nice. The hotel had a shuttle bus into town. Staff members were helpful at the front desk especially ha. Some of the rooms are dated with old tiles in the bathroom. We did request to change rooms which the hotel accommodated. We were then given a sea view room which was better.
Beautiful location sandwiched between the river and a lovely beach. Very nice room overlooking the river. Enjoyed the private beach and two great pools.
That it s run down. Friendly staff.
리조트형 호텔인데 외경도 너무좋고 조식 맛있고 조식먹을때보이는 뷰가 넘넘 이뻐서 빨리조식먹으러 가고싶어요 수영장도좋고 직원들도 착하고 화장실 물도 잘빠지고 잘내려가용 8만원대 값 하는것같네용 정말 잘 묶었다갑니다!!
The breakfast was good, the beach was nice, the swimming pool was also nice. Will stay again
Nydelig plass for deg som vil slappe av og nyte stillheten

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Propert was average not sound proof rooms very noisy as bar was above our room banging a lot 7n warly morning and evenings area was very inconveinient there was no beach nearby as advertised private beach and hotel was down a shabby alley road hotel shuttel was advertised but when u use it its only one way obe myst fibd ypur own way back to hotel pictures on internet are not anything like the real deal however staff were friendly and helpful breakfast was fair but water and fruit drinks etc were always hot not well presented in such a hot place butter was alwats melted also i was given a price which included a service fee and gave card details then when you pay they want to add 3 because u are paying by card . That is wrong.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A wonderful place to stay for a nice vacation, and really close to the old town. Staff are super helpful and friendly, and the amenities are superb.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Goooood! 친절해요. 셔틀도 운영하고. 방컨디션도 기대이상이었습니다. 침대 세개가 특히 좋았음

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: All the staff were beyond friendly and helpful. The greeted us daily, gave recommendations, got memory land tickets for us and made sure we had to go breakfast when we had early tours. Easy grab ride to all places.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Friendly staff. Room was nice. Good breakfast!

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We loved it here!

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely, warm nd so helpful and entertaining staff. Always smiling and chatty. Lisa, que and dinh so engaging. Dinh should also offer guests vietnamese lessons!

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is very clean and beautiful and the staff is lovely and super accommodating! the only con is that the area is a little bit away from food and such, but it is probably easier when it s not lunar new year. Would really recommend staying here- the only con is that the pool is in the shade and so are the sun beds! there are 2 or 3 beds in the corner that get some sun before 2 pm ish!

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We had an awesome stay a big bright room on the last floor, with a huge bed, very comfortable mattress and great pillows. The bathroom was also big with everything needed. The staff was very caring with us they helped us with a laundry while we were away on a tour and had the nicest attention for my girlfriends birthday. As in pretty much all hotels in sea, the soundproofing could be better, so just bring earplugs. The location is also good, a few minutes away from the city center of hoian, in a quiet alley. But overall, i could only recommend our stay and would definitely stay here again if possible.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Wonderful stay. Lisa (at front desk) approached me in the breakfast lounge and offered us an upgrade to a room with a balcony, which we really appreciated. Very kind staff. Comfortable rooms, great breakfast!

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice, staff were always ready to help with anything

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful hotel, quiet environment, wonderful staff. Highly recommended

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lucie, van and the rest of the staff are very nice. We love the experience here.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Receptionist was very friendly and helpful. Made my stay feel at home. I believe her name was danh and had the best energy. Thank you danh for your warm greetings.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Personal muy atento

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Quiet hotel with location between beach and old two. Nice pool big room with balcony, bathtub. Staff are very helpful, always to smile and friendly. Best hotel with services 5 star. High recommend and we will comeback soon.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Good value. Nice breakfast and staff so friendly. We will comeback. High recommend.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Easily the best hotel we have stayed at during our south east asia trip. We were treated like royalty! it all started with the greeting once we arrived and did not stop. The morning buffet breakfast was fantastic along with the other food we ordered from the restaurant while poolside. The staff was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable about the local area and attractions. We would stay at this hotel again in a second and wished all our stays were this memorable.

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: All staff were amazing and so helpful, nothing was too much! the food was great and the pool was fantastic. Highly recommend

hotelName: Hoi An Blue Sky Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Small luxury hotel with a lot of character and charm. Ambiance, decoration, old style tyles on the floor even in the room. Old style bathroom with big and beautifully shaped bathtub. Staff is welcoming, helping and nice. (a special thank you to mrs tran at the reception who has been always composed and caring, and mrs huyen and mrs chi at the kitchen).

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great hotel. Very nice hotel manager and staffs. Breakfast is good. Swimming pool is good

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 룸. 조식. 직원분들 모든 것이 다 좋았어요. 초딩 아이들도 푸라마보다 여기가 더 좋았다고 하네요. 호이안 가면 꼭 다시 또 갈꺼에요. 개미있다고 걱정했는데 룸에서 좁쌀만한 크기로 딱 3마리 봤는데..전 민감형은 아니라서 괜찮았습니다. 다만 걸어다니기에 올드타운 거리가 조금 있어서 아이들 지칩니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The staff s service are good and helpful. Breakfast has many choices. You may walk 15 mins to hui an center.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Second time i ve stayed here. It s just gorgeous.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 가족 여행 적당..

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel with great pool for kids to swim in. The kids loved being able to swim after a day of touring.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: ห องกว างขวางสะอาด การบร การด ส งอำนวยความสะดวกครบคร น

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 올드타운에서 멀지않은 곳에 위치한 기분 좋은 호텔이었습니다. 조식도 정말 맛있었어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 청결도 품질 모두 만족합니다 조식도 괜찮았어요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 방도 깨끗하고 올드타운이랑 가깝고 가성비 짱

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깔끔하고 친절하고 모든 것이 좋았음. 호이안 중심지와 조금 떨어져있지만 주기적으로 셔틀을 운행하고 택시도 쉽게 잡혀 문제없었음.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely place just far enough to escape the noise but close enough to walk to everything you want to see, free shuttle provided to town and beach. Great free breakfast and 2 happy hours. We had room on 7th floor, highly recommend

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깔끔하고 조식 특히 쌀국수가 넘 맛있었어요 셔틀버스도 매일 다녀서 안방비치랑 올드타운 잘다녔고 직원들도 많이 친절하였습니다 재방문 의사있습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깔끔해요 깔끔 그자체

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호이안 구시가지와 가까웠어요 무료자전거렌탈로 십분안에 갈수있어요 이국적인 분위기를 느낄 좋은 숙소였고 싸고 식사도 괜찮았어요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 전체적으로 동양인들이없고 조용해서 좋구요. 그반면 서양인들과의 서비스적차별이쫌 있어요 !! 조식때보면 서양인들에게만 커피를 따라주고 동양인들은 셀프라던가 약간의 차별이있어요 그외엔 좋았어요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Okay, but it s a bit far from old town. I wish there was another shuttle bus time at 6 00 pm.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 서양인이 많았어요 한국사람에 비해서요 그리고 에어컨 청소상태 빼고는 모두 좋았어요 무료셔틀, 무료 타올대여, 친절함, 수영장, 고풍스런 엔틱분위기등등 영어로 소통, 한국말은 잘못함 번역기 돌리면 대화가능 가격도 전 디럭스룸 2박에 조식포함 할인받아 104달러에 숙박했어요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 冷氣不太涼 迎賓飲料很棒 房間的浴缸很大讚 沐浴乳不太有清潔感

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Loved this hotel. Excellent service. Everyone there made us feel very welcome. They even gave us flowers and cake because it was our wedding anniversary!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운 근처에 있어 아침산책과 밤 나들이에 매우 편리하고 좋았다. 직원들은 친절하고 상냥했다. 다만 2박 중 두번째 조식 중 빈 접시를 식사 다 할 때까지 치우지 않은 점이 불편했다. 옆 테이블을 치우고 세팅하고도 그냥 지나쳤다. 뷔페식당에서 이런 일은 처음이었다. 식당 외 다른 곳에서 일하는 직원들은 모두 친절하였다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 전반적으로 괜찮음 야시장과 도보로 10분 15분 왠만한 맛집과 도보로 가능 투본강 바구니배와 안방비치만 차량이용 조식 음식 종류와 갯수도 괜찮음 안방비치 셔틀이 있어서 좋았음 옆에 구멍 가게와 깔끔한 슈퍼가 있어서 음료등 간식거리 사서 먹기 좋음 친절도는 조금 떨어지는듯. 수영장이 pm7시까지만 이용 가능해서 아쉬움 4명 가족(초등2 성인2) 커넥트룸 이용해서 1박에 12만원정도

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Amazing place! breakfast was cold on our second day which was disappointing as everything else was perfect

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 전반적인 시설이 오래되었고, 고급스럽진 않지만 호이안다운 느낌의 호텔이었어요. 수영장도, 조식도 크게 나쁘지 않았고요. 하지만 객실에 들어올 때 어떤 냄새가 나기도 합니다. 올드타운까지 걸어서 10분 거리라 접근성도 좋고요. 가성비 좋고 로컬 그 느낌 그대로인 곳에 머물고 싶다면 추천합니다. 직원분들도 친절했어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: コロナの影響で滞在できず 残念でしたが 収束したらまた改めて計画してホイアンに伺おうと思います また キャンセル不可のプランにしてしまったため 返金不可だったので今後はキャンセルできるプランで予約しよう思います

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 수영장이랑 조식 침구는 깨끗하고 좋은데요 화장실에 주황색 곰팡이가 찝찝했어요 ㅠㅠㅠ 수영장에서 수건이랑 가져다 주시는거랑 올드타운까지 걸어서 다녀올수있는 거리는 좋았아요..

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 가성비 좋다고 추천한 분들 반성해야할 듯. 오래된 호텔이라 방에서 퀴퀴한 냄새가 나고, 샤워기나 욕조 파이프에서 물이 샘. 조식당 음식은 평균이하이고, 직원들은 아침인사나 자리안내도 없었음. 그래도 매번 팁을 두고 나왔는데 지금 생각해 보니 살짝 후회가 됨. 투숙객이 적어서인지 안방비치까지 셔틀버스 운행도 중단하고 있음. 대신 붐비지 않고 올드타운 중심가까지 걸을 수 있는 거리에 위치한 점은 좋았음.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very convenience to local shops. Service is excellent. Joy from reception was extremely helpful giving us recommendations for local foods, tours and a great taylor shop.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 숙소는 매우 훌륭했습니다. 객실을 업그레이드 해 주셨고. 직원들은 너무나 친절했습니다. 다음에 또 호이안에 오게 된다면 반드시 여기에 머물겠습니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: ホイアン旧市街まで徒歩10分弱で便利です

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great stay at this hotel. Amazing staff. Great room. Walking distance to everything. The staff went above and beyond for us.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 맛사지 포함이었고 가격대비 서비스가 좋았어요 ! 올드타운 야시장도 걸어서 구경했구요 ! 만족합니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great location. Clean and fantastic staff especially irene who was so helpful and friendly.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깔끔하고 서비스는 좋았는데 넘방이 어두웠어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 개미가 너무 많아서 방바꿨어요 아기들 데려갔는데 키즈룸은 완전 먼지 구덩이에 전혀 관리가 되지않아서 공만 만져도 금방 옷까지 쌔까맣게 더러워졌어요 프로모션하는 마사지한번받고는 멍이 다 들었고요 전 비추합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 룸분위기가 좋아요 조식 정말 맛있어요 다음에 또 묵을 의향 있습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운 관광을 위해서 숙박했는데 다낭 리조트보다는 못하지만 가격대비 나쁘지않았어요 stayed for the hoian old town touring. Distance was close and the service was good. Great considering the price!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 올드타운 걸어서 10분. 젊은 사람들이라면 추천. 숙소 컨디션도 좋음. 다만 걷기 힘든사람이 있다면 아예 가깝거나 먼 숙소 추천, 올드타운 나가거나 들어올때 택시가 잘 안잡힘.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호텔 전체으로 좋았지만...직원들은 별로...늦은시간 체크인인데 가방을 옮겨주는 사람도 없고 방위치도 프론트에 앉아 말로만 설명해주어서 2번 이상 왔다갔다 되물어보아야만했다. 첫인상이 별로였다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Fantastic hotel. Big comfy bed and spacious room. Beautiful staff who did everything possible to help. Amazing food and cocktails.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Beautiful boutique hotel minutes walk from all the action. Delicious buffet breakfast and super friendly staff. Joy in particular was just a joy . The rooms very comfortable and quiet. Would recommend!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: I cannot fault my stay in any way. This establishment should be very proud of its staff who are among the nicest and friendliest i have come across in the hotel business. Hospitality here is first class. My wife and i stayed for four nights to celebrate her birthday and explore hoi an, which she had wanted to do for some time. It was our first time in vietnam and we did not know what to expect but wow were we blown away by the service, location to the ancient town, free bike rental, old-world charm and decor, smiling staff, heck, we were upgraded upon arrival and were presented with a birthday cake and flowers in our room on my wife s birthday. It was a lovely gesture. The swimming pool was large and great for lounging around for an afternoon too. Special thank you to an, who met us at check in and was super friendly and fun. She even recognised the song i had on my phone hay ve day ben anh by duy manh! to binh, who welcomed us with a big smile at breakfast every morning and to everyone who made our stay a most delightful one. Recommended! ps. Thuy com ga is just steps away down the road for the greatest vietnamese hainan chicken rice of your life.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very nice people, had so much fun!! specially hotel driver who gave us ride to airport was very kind guy and we appreciate his service mind!! we want to stay here again!!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 서양인을 주요 대상이라 그런지 수영장도 깊고 침대도 넓고 욕조도 커서 좋았어요. 직원들도 영어를 잘해서 (베트남 영어는 알아듣기 어려웠는데 여기 직원 분은 영국 영어 쓰셔서 괜찮았어요.) 이해하거나 문의하는데 어려움이 없었습니다. 올드타운하고 거리가 멀진 않지만 정말 더워서 계속 그랩카를 불렀습니다. 조식도 가지수는 적지만 괜찮았고 가성비 최고 인 듯 합니다. 호이안을 또 가게 된다면 재방문 의사가 있어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: ホテルの星の数は わかりませんが 部屋は まあまあ広かったです 浴槽があるのは うれしかったのですが 浴大きすぎて お湯が なかなか 溜められません 旧市街からは 遠いです 1度 戻ろうという気には なれない距離です 室内用が ビーチサンダルでした スリッパを持って行って よかったです 朝食は 数も豊富でおいしかったです

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 나쁘지않았어요 생각보다좋았습디다. 솔직히 별기대안했는디 나름깨끗하고좋았습니닫득히 수영장갑ㅋ

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 網上預約接機到酒店安排清晰 十分暢順方便 酒店有景點預約及約車安排 辦理入住時有專人介紹酒店環境及旅遊咨訊 早餐豐富好食(服務員好禮貌 並兩次問食物質素 以便提升食物水平) 餐廳在泳池旁音樂好好聽 房間清潔 床好舒服 健身室唔大 游泳池唔大 但好游夠深 泳客唔多 早晚更好情調 酒店離古城步行十多分鐘 有免費單車無限次使用 白天古城內人車較少 一定要試下踏單車漫遊 十分寫意 酒店有穿梭車來往古城及沙灘 可惜班次較疏 如每小時一班就更好 沙灘似私人範圍 有多張椅 可在海灘邊叫小食喝啤酒游水曬太陽 休閒唔錯的選擇 總結酒店位置適中 各服務員十分有禮 有穿梭車往古城及海灘 單車漫遊古城更佳 悠閒之選 今次第二次入住 下次也會

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 3박을 훼밀리 벙커룸에서 투숙했습니다. 가성비가 좋은 호텔임은 인정합니다. 하지만 다음과 같은 점은 반드시 유의해서 예약하세요. 닭울움소리가 설마했는데 심한 편입니다. 새벽녁에도 미친듯이 울어댑니다. 다행히 소리가 크진 않습니다. 그러나 소음에 민감한 분이면 잠을 청하기 곤란합니다. 방음에 취약합니다. 특히 새벽에 체크인하시는 뷴이 많아 중국인 관광객이라도 오면 잠에서 깰 확률이 높습니다. 조식은 먹을만합니다. 다른 음식은 별루인데 쌀국수, 미꽝, 반미는 왠만한 5성급보다 낫습니다. 이거 위주로 드세요. 생각보다는 노골적 팁요구는 덜합니다. 마사지, 세탁, 택시 등 유로 서비스를 호텔에서 하라고 유도하는데, 그럴 필요없이 호텔옆에 있는 먀트가 훨싸니 절대 이용하지 마세요. 결론.. 귀마개를 필참하시고, 소음에 민감하지 않으신 분은 가성비 좋으니 이용해 보시길..

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 새벽에 닭이 울고 개가 짖어서 잠을 설쳤어요 침대가 오래되서그런지 스프링소리가 심하게 나네요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Hotel war sehr schön. Schönes, sauberes zimmer, netter service und man war fußläufig schnell in der schönen altstadt. Es gab aber auch einen shuttle der einen hinfuhr oder zum strand. Hotel bot kostenlos ein sehr gutes frühstück an.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 가격대비 아주 훌륭한 호텔입니다. 가족 4명이 2박을 했고, 킹 싱글2층침대가 있는 패밀리 벙커룸이었는데 넓고 편안했습니다. 위치는 올드타운까지 도보 12분정도로 가깝고, 올드타운/안방비치까지 호텔 셔틀을 운영(일3회)합니다. 조식도 괜찮은 편이고, 수영장도 규모에 비해 넓어서 이용하기 좋았습니다. 다만, 수질관리는 좀더 신경쓰면 좋겠습니다. 호텔 자체적으로 공항 픽어/센딩 서비스를 합리적 수준에서 서비스하고 있고, 식당에서 쿠킹클래스도 운영합니다. 스파에서는 투숙객 대상 1 1 프로모션을 자주 진행하는데, 저렴하고, 호텔안에서 받을 수 있어서 편했습니다. 전체적으로 추천할 만한 호텔이고, 재방문의사 있습니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 房間大舒服乾淨,有露台望到泳池同城市景,泳池比照片細好多.工作人員服務周到,check in時有welcome drink,工作人員是美女,笑容甜美,介紹周邊景點.早餐選擇不多但美味.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: モーニングのクロワッサン美味しかったです 以前 口コミで浴槽が溜まるのに時間がかかると書いてあったのですが そこまで時間はかからないです 部屋も綺麗で 景色も良かったです ただ wifiが弱かったですかね

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 가족 여행 2박 동안 너무 잘쉬고 가요. 리셉션 친절하고 좋았어요. 얼리체크인해주셨고, 조식도 먹을만 했어요. 잘쉬다 갑니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: また行くなら 泊まりたいです

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Such a lovely hotel. The breakfast was spectacular, pool very refreshing, and the beach they drop you off was great. Plus it s very close to the old town.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very friendly, very clean, very central - great value too.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들이 너무 친절 했고 룸서비스 음식들이 다 맛잇었어요!!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Staff were very friendly here. Hotel was excellent to. The only problem we encountered was the shower got very hot out of nowhere and also the tv remote wouldn t work from the bed (not much of an issue really). I would stay here again. It s pretty close to everything you would need and has shuttle busses and tour options eg bana hills, marble mountain etc. There wasn t many vegan options for breakfast though. We just had fruit and baked beans on toast every morning

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: There are things i enjoyed and things that could be improved about this hotel. The initial communication with the hotel was great however, while the staff were attentive and kind, i felt that it was difficult to speak with them when i was there. I did believe that the staff did try their best to do what they can. The hotel is about four years old, but it feels older. The walls were leaking during the heavy rain, which probably will mean that mold will grow later if they do not fix it. The room itself felt like it wasn t fully clean with dusty floors and soap stains on the shower glass. The location of the hotel is about 10 minutes from the old town. The hotel does have a private beach with a shuttle however, the shuttle is so inconsistent that even the staff recommends to take a taxi back. The hotel also felt like it was constantly advertising for its excursions, spas and gifts not just in the lobby, but with all the pamphlets in the room - that s fine that they want to show their other products but it felt constant. For a four star hotel, i believe that they could do better.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Pleasant helpful staff. Close to night markets and old town - 15 minutes stroll. Amazing buffet breakfast - pancakes, eggs, cakes, fruit, cereal etc.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호텔내 시설도 깔끔하고 직원들이 친절해서 힐링되는 공간이었다. 공용시설 또한 아기자기하게 예쁘게 꾸며져 있어서 사진 찍기에도 좋았던 것 같다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들 친절하며 올드타운 걸어서 오분거리, 프라이빗비치도 너무 좋네요, 스파 이용은 미리 예약 필수

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Unbelievable property walking distance to all attractions. Maybe wifi could be improved it was barely usable at times

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great location, friendly staff

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Fantastic service, fantastic amenities, really friendly team, great breakfast, excellent spa and massage, we chose to say here again for the second year in a row, really reasonable room rates, we love it at hoi an central boutique hotel thanks so much to all the staff!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great staff and excellent facilities. Very welcoming and clean.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 시설과 조식 등등 모든 면은 괜찮았다. 다만 샤워기에서 나는 건지 물에서 냄새가 나는 건지 모르겠지만 쇠 냄새가 나고 구비되어 있던 샴푸와 바디워시 등에서도 쇠 냄새가 났다. 입구가 스테인이리서 그런것도 있지만 챙겨갔던 샴푸를 다 써서 어쩔 수 없이 썼지만 .. 올드타운과 5-7분 정도여서 오후에 쉬다 저녁에 심심할때 구경가기 좋았다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 모든게 다 맘에 들었다.나쁜건 조식메뉴가 아주조금 부실한점 이정도 가격에 훌륭한 호텔이었다.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들이 정말 친절하고 수영장 등의 편의시설도 좋아요. 호이안 올드타운까지 걸어서 5분 정도여서 좋아요.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: This resort is a gem in the middle of ancient city and just a must visit. They treated my clients so well and i had a few request for them to make my clients trip special. I did all of this and more. A must visit

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들의 친절도가 인상 깊었어요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Location was great. Staff friendly helpful. They organised tours transport for us!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 員工的工作效率真的好 需要的用品可以很快就送到房間 有一天吃完早餐回房間已經整理好床鋪打掃完畢 check in 接待時安排坐下 送上飲料 講解酒店設施及時間 整體感覺滿意

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 有越南特色 酒店裝飾氣氛好 價錢便 又有接駁車去私家沙灘和古鎮 好方便

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 수영장이 예쁘고 좋았다 올드타운 가깝고 셔틀 좋다 룸 상태도 만족 직원들 대부분 친절하다 수압이 약하다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 인포메이션에서 택시 기사 추천해주는게 좀 의심스러움. 저는 그랬서 안탔어요. 룸 컨디션은 괜찮은데, 변기 고리가 빠져서 불편했음....(뚜껑열어서 내림) 참. 모닝닭소리 진짜 나더라구여

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely interconnecting rooms, great prices drinks during happy hour and very helpful staff who couldn t do enough to help us. Only let down was that pastries and bread needed covering at breakfast as always had flies on them

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: ホテルは市街地からは少し離れますが 程よい距離にあるとも言えます プールは子供が気に入って毎日利用していました ビーチサイドに常駐しているスタッフも少し子供の相手をしてくれたり ホイアンの街より良い体験と感じたのはプライベートビーチです シャトルバスで連れていかれるがまま行ったビーチですが 遠浅で波が穏やか 人もまばらだったこともあり非常にゆったり過ごすことができました ただ 帰りのタクシーがなかなかつかまらなかったのでシャトルバスは夜の便もほしいところです チェックアウト後 別のホテルに移った際 忘れ物に気づいたため だめもとでfacebookのメッセンジャーで捜索をお願いしたところ 見つけていただき 滞在のダナンのホテルまで届けてくださいました 相談して翌日には届いたので どなたかが直接運んでくださったのでは 感謝です

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 가성비 최고에여 그냥 여기 가세요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The property was clean. It was great to have a pool and a spa. It was a good walking distance from the centre. There was quite a lot of noise overnight from outside the room

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Good

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 자전거도 빌릴 수 있고 셔틀도 있고 조식고 맛있고 방도 예뻤어요 ㅎㅎ 동남아라 그런지 방에 개미가 많아서 캐리어 바닥에 열어뒀더니 기어다니던 것만 빼면ㅠ 다 만족스러웠습니다. 직원분들도 친절했어요 추천합니다 )

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 룸컨디션이나 서비스는 우수합니다. 소음이 문제네요. 새벽에 닭울음 소리, 개 짖는 소리로 잠을 깰 정도입니다. 한편으로 생각하면 근처 호텔은 다 같은 상황일 것 같습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 카운터 직원분들이 친절했습니다. 숙소도 바닥에 타일이라 냄새가 안나고 좋았습니다. 조식도 입에 맞게 잘 먹었습니다. 단 화장실 타일청소를 조금만 더 신경을 썼으면 해요... 전 곰팡이를 싫어해서...

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Almost everything is great except 2 remote media control system with a number of times loss signal.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: This hotel is 10-minute walk to the old town. It has a nice deco. The staff are friendly and helpful. We liked the swimming pool, the happy hour and the massage very much. The breakfast has good varieties but taste is average.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 이 곳 정말 최고임 친절하고 깔끔하고 풀장도 좋고 또 가고싶은 다낭 시내 호텔보다 좋음

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Clean, safe, convenient walking distance to hội an old town. I am very happy with the service. The receptionists , specifically the lead joy fom , are very knowledgeable, friendly and helpful . Nice swimming pool , great continental breakfast. Last but not least, i love the bicycles that can be check out for free. I used the bicycle to get to the old town around 10 00am if you want to shred some weight via perspiration ) highly recommend the hotel for staying at the hotel.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 사진까지 공유할수있는줄알았으면 찍어올껄 그랬네요 후기야 주관적인거라 안좋은 후기보고도 나만괜찮으면 됐지 싶어 기분좋게 예약하고 갔는데 직원 영어를 잘못하니 천천히 얘기해달라고 했는데 아무런 객실 설명없이 싸인 하라고만하여 설명을 해줘야하는거 아니냐고 했더니 화를내며 싸인이나하라더군요. 새벽에 방에 도마뱀이 보여 치워달랬는데 바로 처리해주지 않아서 새벽 두시까지 못잤습니다, 안무니까 괜찮다며ㅡㅡ 객실 침대가 중간이 꺼지고 움직일때마다 삐걱거려요 여기저기 먼지도 많고 샤워기 헤드도 오래되어 옆으로 물이 줄줄샙니다.변기도 물이 약해서 변기통에 물받아서 처리했습니다 조식 맛없어요, 말하기도 귀찮네요 제발 꼭 더 알아보셔서 저처럼 여행갔다가 숙박 때문에 기분 망치는 일이 없길 진심으로 바랍니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 12 시넘어서도착해서 기다리는데2시까지기다리라고해서기다리는데 다른팀은 다 얼리체크인해줌 우리보다늦게온팀들도 다해줌 따져봐도기다리라고함 그리고 바나힐가는택시비용이 얼마나나오냐고물어봄 그랩으 타면 비싸다고 60만동주면 자기네가택시불러주겠다고함 돈주고기다리는데30분기다리라고함 그랩으로검색해보니 55만동뜸 화면보여주니 당황해하며아이돈노우연발 리셉션엉망

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Excellent breakfast, my kids found breakfast here tastier than some other 5 stars we stayed at. Lovely staff and amenities.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 친절 하고 룸 컨디션도 좋습니다 잘 쉬다 갑니다

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely accommodation within walking distance to old town. Staff are exceptional. Breakfast has a wide range of options

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Excellent location, short walk to old town and all the shopping. Staff is incredibly engaging always checking if anything is needed to make your stay more comfortable. Room was always clean as is the hotel itself. Pool is excellent. They made great recommendations for shopping at check in as well as activities and sights. Only real downside is the gym, it will be fine for most but if you re a gym rat you know this is typical complaint lol. Will definitely be back, thank you!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Hadde 14 flotte dager på hotellet. Vennlige hotell ansatte og en deilig atmosfære.spaet kan absolutt anbefales. Kort avstand til gamlebyen. Kan anbefales!

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Liked the location outside of ancient town, but just a short walk. Staff were all lovely, very nice pool with loungers that have padding. Decent breakfast with seating inside and outside. Enjoyed having a balcony to sit out on.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The hotel staff is friendly and helpful and can communicate in english. However, the hotel is a bit old. We found holes in the bedsheets. The air conditioning in the room is strong, which is good. The buffet breakfast is disappointing. It has limited choices, and most of the food is cold. The hotel is 10 minutes away from the old town centre. Good location.

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호텔이용이나 전반적인 시설에 대해서는 만족합니다 하지만 체크아웃하면서 불쾌한 일이 있어서 작성합니다 숙박중 쓴 물건이나 없어진 물건에 대해서 확인 후 체크아웃이 끝나게 되는데 물건 확인하시더니 갑자기 수건 한개가 없어졌다고 확인해달라고 하더군요 분명 수건은 쓰고 호텔안 한곳에 모아뒀는데 다시 확인하러 갔더니 없더군요 5분정도 방을 다시 뒤져봤는데도 없었습니다 더이상 씨름하기도 싫고 말도 안통하니깐 기분 더이상 나쁘기 싫어서 수건값 계산하고 나왔는데 있던수건이 하늘로 사라질일도 없고 골탕먹일려고 이러는건가 한국돌아오는내내 기분이 불쾌했습니다 이용하실분 있으시면 다시한번 나오시기전에 수건개수랑 가운개수 분명히 세어두시고 사진까지 찍어두시면 증거가 되겠죠 그리고 체크아웃 하세요

hotelName: Hoi An Central Boutique Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 너무만족스러운 호텔가성비 조식최고 다음여행도올꺼같아요
Incredible everything
Very nice hotel tucked away in the midst of paddy fields. Waking up to a different scenic view everyday is something that we don t get often for city people. Recommended!

The hotel was perfect for us. It is in a quiet area on the edge of town and the hotel has routine shuttles into town and to the beach and rents free bicycles. The grounds are a beautiful garden and the rooms and well decorated and clean with cold a/c and modern bathrooms. The staff are very friendly and the breakfast is very good with a range of vietnamese and western food. I would definitely stay here again.
Ein wunderschönes kleines hotel mitten in den reisfeldern, weg vom touristen-trubel. Sehr freundliches personal. Feines frühstücks-buffet. Schönes zimmer.

Equidistant from hoi an town and the beach. Set among padi fields. Quiet yet not remote you are within a short stroll of local restaurants and shops and laundries! great place to chill and enjoy rural life. Great breakfast buffet with fantastic fresh fruit juices. Free jeep and vw camper shuttle service to town and beach.
自然の中で 雄鶏の鳴き声を聞きながら目覚める朝は格別でした ホイアンの目抜き通りまで無料シャトルや無料自転車が利用できるのでとても便利でした スタッフもフレンドリーで併設のレストランもおいしいです また訪れたいと思える素敵なホテルでした
특별한 조식에 감탄. 특히 생과일쥬스가 인상적.
훌륭한 조식과 예쁜 침실
Lovely peaceful haven in the middle of working paddy fields. Great staff nothing too much trouble. Regular shuttle in ex us army jeep into town. Free bikes for exploring the countryside.

3泊利用させていただきましたが スタッフの方も親切で 街からはなれているので静かでとてもゆっくりできました 無料でレンタサイクルを借りれるので 旧市街に出るのにも困りませんでした 朝食が品数は少ないのですが とても美味しくで こちらの朝食でいただいたフォーが一番おいしかったです レストランで夕食もいただきましたが 夕食もおいしかったです 残念だったのがお風呂が野外だったので寒くて入れなかったことです 室内にシャワーはあります また ホイアンへ訪れるときはこちらのホテルに宿泊したいです
Very relax hotel, staff are friendly. They prepare breakfast set for us when we need to get out at 5am

Nous avons passé 2 nuits dans cet hôtel, ce fut l un de nos meilleurs moments. Le personnel est adorable, très attentionné et très professionnel la chambre est excellente, très grande, très confortable, avec une belle salle de bain et la baignoire en extérieur, jolie vue sur la campagne petit-déjeuner complet et de qualité belle piscine. En résumé, c est un hôtel qu on recommande très vivement au vue du meilleur rapport qualité prix qu on a trouvé au vietnam !
Staff very helpful, rooms are spotlessly clean. Would love to stay again!

We travel a lot, but this is one if the best hotels we ever stayed at. The rooms are extremely well-proportioned and nicely decorated. The restaurant cooks excellent food, and the pool-area is lovely with a view to the surrounding rice fields. The best thing about the hotel, however, was the people working there. We came with our 5 year old daughter, even if it is not a classic family-hotel . The staff went out of their way to entertain and take care of our girl. For example, when she fell into the rice-fired, immediately a staff member was there to clean her shoes. We have never felt more welcome than at the chic hotel.

We drove up from danang. Danang looked interesting but china beach is now new luxury hotels and casinos. Hoi an is disappointing unless you like shopping. A trip to the buddhist ruins is only interesting if you have never been to buddhist temple ruins before. If you have seen one elsewhere, give this one a big pass. The hotel is wonderful, quiet and very good meals but not within walking distance of anything. Renting a bike and biking around would be a good option.

Hotel und zimmer wurden mit sehr viel liebe zum detail gestaltet. Es ist eine kleine oase in mitten der reisfelder. Wunderschön grün, tolles restaurant und poolbereich. Die mitarbeiter waren rundum freundlich. Jeder hatte immer ein lächeln auf den lippen und hat freundlich gegrüßt. Sehr herzlich alles. Wohlfühlen vom ersten moment. Unser zimmer war ein traum mit außendusche. Es gibt an diesem hotel nichts zu bemängeln wenn man nicht direkt in hoi an innenstadt wohnen möchte sondern mehr im grünen. Vom hotel ist man aber trotzdem mit dem fahrrad in 20 minuten in der stadt. Auch der strand ist durch die lage nicht weit.

I stayed at this hotel with my wife from oct 6 to oct 10 in 2015, as a token of my birthday and 20 years wedding anniversary. I highly recommend this hotel because of hotel s staff quality. They are so friendly and professional. They care customer very well. In addition, it locates nice quite place between beach and old town. They hotel has transportation service to go there with jeep. The hotel room is well designed and maintained clean. Also, i had breakfast and dinner at the hotel. It was so delicious. They kindly celebrate my birthday. Through staying at this hotel, they made our memorial period very special. I really appriciate it from the bottom of my heart.

I loved the hoi an chic! my husband and i had a great stay. The room was spacious and the staff was fantastic. The interior courtyard and breakfast area were both lovely. It was really hot when we were visiting and the staff did everything they could to make sure our room was cool enough for my husband who suffers from the heat. It was a short cab ride away from town and they easily arranged our transportation into town and to the nearby beach. We actually cancelled a night in hue to stay longer at the hotel and enjoy hoi an because we liked the hotel and area so much. I loved the warm and friendly atmosphere, the delicious breakfast including wonderful fresh juice, and our huge room was so nice. We also had our laundry serviced here since it was the middle of our trip and they did a great job with that at a reasonable price. They also had good restaurant recommendations. The hoi an chic was a real highlight on our trip through vietnam.

近くにある大型のビーチリゾートに比べると 規模は小さく派手さはなくこじんまりとした感じですが 田んぼに囲まれた田舎の風景と自転車やバイクや牛車で走る地元の人たち 早朝のコケコッコー テラスから眺めた美しい朝焼け 満天の星空 夕焼け雲 地元の生活にほどよく溶け込んだ感じのたたずまい すべていおいて 素敵 を連発していた私です 素敵すぎるバスルームに一目惚れして 私たち家族はグランシックルームに3連泊したのですが 大正解 オーナーさんのセンスなのか インテリアやそこかしこにおいてあるオブジェ レストランの食事のレベルの高さにも驚きで 高級ホテルでありがちな量が多くて高いということはなく 丁寧に作られた食事をリーズナブルなお値段でいただきました ホイアンの町からは微妙に遠いものの 自転車でちょっと散歩するには全く問題のない距離だったので レンタサイクルで早朝散歩して 朝食とって プールで遊んで 昼寝して 夜ホテルのジープで送迎してもらって夜のホイアンを満喫 ホテル内でクッキングデモンストレーションや凧作りなども楽しむといった日々でしたが のんびり過ごすにもとてもよいところ まさに 素敵な田舎 です

We loved this place. It was nestled into a quiet neighbourhood with rice paddies as it s surrounds. We would borrow the bicycles everyday and ride to where ever we wanted to go, which was never really any more that 10 - 15 minutes away, and the staff we always so helpful to give us tips on where to go and what to see. The room was beautiful and we loved waking up there each morning. The bed was big and comfortable and the bathroom was well appointed and very well designed. The other hotel guests we felt we very similar to ourselves and showed respect for one another, as noise was kept to a minimum. Everyone was just great here, if we ever find ourselves in vietnam in the future we will certainly book here again.

El hotel es encantador. Habitaciones amplias y muy cómodas, con excelente diseño. Excelente desayuno. Personal atento, muy gentil y profesional. Es un poco lejos de la ciudad vieja, y hay que ir en el jeep del hotel o en un tuc tuc.
Lovely personal service in beautiful surroundings with attention to detail throughout.

Wir haben eine woche hier verbracht und haben den aufenthalt sehr genossen. Das hotel liegt etwas abseits vom zentrum in einer ruhigen seitenstrasse. Das zentrum ist aber mit dem fyhrrad sehr gut zu erreichen. Ebenso der strand. Wunderschöner blick auf reisfelder vom resto. Und den zimmern. Die zimmer sind sher schön eingerichtet und sehr gross. Das personal ist super nett. Wir können dieses hotel nur wärmstens empfehlen!
Kleines, familiäres hotel gute lage super grand suite

This hotel was incredible. The room was beautiful, and the peaceful setting was heavenly. Breakfast buffet (free) had many choices, including at least 8 different fresh juices to choose from (coconut lime watermelon were my personal favorites). I plan on returning making this hotel my destination point. Free bicycles, maximum of an easy 10 minute ride to ancient town. The staff was professional, friendly, helpful - and excelled beyond my expectations in every way. I can not say enough positive things about this hotel highly recommend it. Loved it!!!
Nettes, ruhiges hotel mit guter speisekarte. Unweit der altstadt (in 5 min. Mit shuttle) und unweit zum touri-strand (10 min. Fahrrad oder shuttle).

Perfect hotel. It s a about a 20 minute walk to hoi an old town but you see a lot on the way. The hotel also offers a free shuttle service in some of the coolest jeeps in nam. I find it difficult to identify anything wrong with the place!

Best place we stayed in vietnam. Staff very helpful, free bicycles to get to/from town, incredible breakfast (included) and dinner also if available if you wish to stay, which would not be a bad thing at all.

Stayed at this hotel for 8 nights and enjoyed every moment. The staff were extremely helpful going more than the extra mile to assist. Even when busy they always had time for us with a cheerful smile and friendly, helpful advice.
Only able to stay 1 night. Wish we stayed longer. Very nice and accommodating staff. Nice room surrounded by nature.

Great hotel, amazing room set up. Clean and only a short taxi ride to the main hoi ann area. Staff were so pleasant and went out of the way to help with anything! only negative was the water pressure in the shower. It wasn t very strong and it went from hot to cold at times. But regardless of this i would definitely stay again.

A wonderfully peaceful place to stay, perfectly situated between the old town and the beach (both easily accessible by bicycles provided by hotel). Luxuriant rooms with tranquil views over paddy fields. The breakfasts are a delight on the open verandah.
One of the nicest and most comfortable hotels we have stayed in full-stop, exceeded expectations in all respects.
ビーチと旧市街の間にあるホテルです ホテルからはシャトルジープが定期的に運行しているので移動には困りません 部屋は清潔で過ごしやすいです プールは大きくはありませんが 他に人がいなければのんびりできます 高級ホテル並とはいいませんが とても快適に過ごせるホテルです

Had a great time. Great location. Friendly staff. The pool can use a little cleaning. Rent a scooter and enjoy the area. Go to tuong van dress shop on 106 tran phu st in hoian to get some dresses made. They are fast and excellent tailors.
ネットで見てステキすぎる雰囲気にひと目惚れし ホイアン旅行を計画 外観も内装もセンスよく 期待以上のホテルでした ランチ ディナー 朝食と3食ともホテル内のレストランでとりましたが お値段以上の内容だと思います 今回は子連れということもあり 2歳 大人の空間を乱さぬよう自粛して1泊のみの滞在でしたが 次回は絶対連泊したいと願っています

部屋のインテリアはセンス良くまとめられ アウトドアバスはリゾート気分を高めます 朝食はスムージー ジャム フルーツヨーグルトが美味しかった こじんまりした田園ビューのレストランで地元の人が行き交うのが見えます ホテルというより ホームステイしている感じ 無料の自転車を借りて ビーチや街へのサイクリングが楽しかったです ホテルの裏は見渡す限りの田んぼで朝の散歩もお勧めです 又 ジープで隠れ家ビーチに連れて行ってくれます 素朴なレストランが一軒あるだけなのですが 完璧な夏の海の光景が広がっていました

We had a delightful stay at hoi an chic hotel - the hotel is so relaxing and peaceful, the room was spacious and well kitted out and the staff were so lovely, helpful, attentive, friendly and professional. We loved the location, which is halfway between the beach and the town. We visited both on the free bicycles borrowed from the hotel, which was a great way to get around the very flat countryside! taxis to get in and out of town in the evening were also very cheap and convenient. The breakfast was delicious, a great selection. We particularly enjoyed the fresh fruit juices. The pool was also a great plus - kept very cool and a lovely setting. Overall we thought the hotel was excellent value, and hope to visit again. Thank you for having us!

Couldn t have been better. Cool location...roosters, rice paddies, farmers quietly going about their business...temple gongs and bells...calm, away from the craziness of the crazy street traffic. Staff was very attentive, friendly, accommodating and fun...easy bike borrowing whenever the mood strikes...breakfast is stellar! pool is lovely and beautifully designed. Easy rides arranged to beach, town and airport.
テーマカラーがグリーンとオレンジでセンスの良いホテルです 朝食は毎日少しずつ変わり 美味しかったです

ホテルには深夜着きましたが 笑顔でタクシーの近くまで迎えてくださり 疲れてるでしょうと すぐに部屋で寝れるよう気遣って頂きました 滞在中 スタッフ皆さん フレンドリーで名前を覚えててくださったり ホテルでこのような接客は日本でも 私は経験がありません また 街中はうるさいので 静かに過ごせて良かったです 手配してくださった タクシーの運転手さん 日本語ガイドさんもほんと良い方でガイドさんは 夜12時近くまでチェックインに付き合ってくださいました
二回目の滞在でしたが 大満足でした

We enjoyed our stay so much that we stayed an extra night. Our family included older family members, young adults, and a toddler. We enjoyed the rooftop pool and free bicycles. Right outside the hotel s doorsteps are so many different bicycle friendly paths that lead to picturesque rice fields and pleasant communes. It is easy to get to and from the beach and old town. We weren t in a hurry to take day trips, since we enjoyed the hotel s grounds. Our family took liking to their menu and food quality as well. They use local, fresh ingredients. As for the rooms, they have unique designs and decorations with nice views. The hotel focuses on being clean and keeping it looking new. The staff quickly tended to us when needed and also gave us good company. Pretty sure we will be returning very soon. This hotel is worth the price.

The hotel was absolutely amazing. We enjoyed staying on the outskirts of busy hoi an with a view of paddy fields and nature. The rooms are beautiful designed, clean and very comfortable. The staff is nice and helpful. Couldnt recommended it more

We stayed here for 5 nights and we loved every minute of it. The staff were the clear highlights of our stay. Every single one of them were so kind and just so helpful. We really got to know them after our 5 days and we were sad to leave. The breakfast was great as well. Being outside of the old town and within all the rice fields was just so nice. I can t wait to go back.

The hotel is surrounded by rice paddies, which are peaceful and beautiful to look at over breakfast. The rooms and garden are lovely. The breakfast has a variety of delicious options. The location is a bit out of hoi an, but the hotel has a free shuttle to and from the old town.
Very friendly and kind staff who are happy to take time to explain everything - thankyou for a most enjoyable stay i look forward to returning

Gia đình mình đi với con nhỏ và đã có chuyến nghỉ dưỡng tuyệt vời tại đây. Các anh chị nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, thân thiết và luôn giúp bế bé cho mình ăn hay chơi với bé. 2vc rất cám ơn chị hạnh, chị hồng, em nga, anh chính đã giúp set up tiệc sinh nhật cho bé ý. Khung cảnh đồng lúa êm đềm, thoáng đãng và chỉ mười phút bắt xe là ra tới phố cổ hội an. Lần sau quay lại nhất định phải ở lâu hơn 1 tuần nơi này.
田園風景に囲まれ 静かな時間が過ごせる スタッフはフレンドリーで様々な要求に配慮してもらえる 中心部へもシャトルバスを毎日数便運行しており 便利

Helt fantastiskt hotell med en underbar vibe! poolen är perfekt, jättegod frukost, stor skön säng och väldigt rent! personalen är supergulliga och så hjälpsamma! rekommenderar 10/10!! ett av dom bättre hotellen vi bott på )
Einer meiner schönsten hotelaufenthalte. Hier hat alles gepasst. Hotel, zimmer, design, essen, umgebung, personal, service, strand, stadt...! unbedingt min. Zwei nächte im viel bleiben.
Amazing place in quite neighbourhood

Lovely place with giant, clean, beautiful rooms and a huge bed. Fantastic restaurant for lunch and dinner - everything is so fresh! breakfast is good too but just all the usual suspects. 10 out of 10 and the price is right!
Nice hotel. Good restaurant. Beautiful surroundings.

This is beautiful place surrounded by peaceful green paddy fields. There are local bars and restaurants and a regular shuttle bus to take you into hoi an. All the staff were wonderful. We stayed 5 nights and loved it
Beautiful rice fields around the hotel. Free bikes provided from the hotel to use whole day. Great coffee shops around that area

Went twice with family. The kindest lovely staff. Excellent breakfeast and restaurant. Will definitely recommend to others and hopefully go again. No problem with distance to town. The hotel offers shuttle bus.
Nice and serene surroundings overseeing the padi fields, beautifully designed rooms, friendly staff. Everything was perfect making it such an enjoyable stay! highly recommended!
Fantastiskt hotell och anläggning och supervänlig personal. Bra frukost och vackra omgivningar.

It s been our best hotel experience in vietnam! staff is amazingly warm and helpful. The hôtel is designed with upmost refinement and charm. The atmosphere is casual yet refined. The quality of food is amazing. I would come back with no hesitation!
Nice little hotel with pleasant staff, has its own restaurant with cheap and delicious food.

We stayed in a top floor suite, which was fabulous, air conditioning was a little noisy, but didnt spoil our enjoyment. The staff were all fantastic, so friendly and helpful. We borrowed bikes and rode into town, or you can use the ww2 us jeep shuttle service. Hoi an has some great tailors, we used yaly- highly recommend. Go to the hidden beach, and use vespa adventures for a nightlife tour of the city and food and drink

大通りから住宅街に入った所にある 周りが田んぼに囲まれたホテルです 英語が話せない私にもスタッフの方々は丁寧に対応してくれて助かりました 外の景色を眺めながら 朝食を頂けるのも素敵でした ホイアンの街中は賑やかだったので ホテルに戻ってくると スタッフの方も笑顔で迎えて下さり ホッとできました また ホイアンに行くことがあったら利用したいです というか ホイアン チック ホテル に泊まりにホイアンに行きたいです
とにかくホテルの人たちがみな笑顔で優しく 居心地が良かった 防音はなくても周りが畑なのでとても静か レストランもとてもいおいしかったし プールは小さいけど快適でした 女2人でベッドが1つでしたがキングサイズで気にならずゆっくり眠れました バルコニーの揺り椅子がサイコーでした
매우 친절한 직원과 아담하고 예쁜 호텔 시설이 좋았습니다. 올드타운과 거리가 조금 있어서 도보는 불가능한 점이 좀 아쉽지만 그것만 제외하면 모든게 완벽합니다!

After a couple of nights hoi an chic felt like home. The staff is so friendly, always trying to help and very attentive. And the location is fabulous in the middle of the rice fields about 3km from town. The location turned out to be great because during our stay hoi an flooded (all the streets of the old town, which usually only happens in october/november) and our hotel stayed well away from the flood and above the giant puddles! highly recommend!
Fantastisk personal

Very suitable for healing and enjoy calm morning at country side, overall so impressed. Would like to recommand who want to experience hoian local culture. More impressive that town people say hello with smile when you meet near by hotel. And extraordinary comfortable during staying here...
저희 가족에게는 정말 좋은 호텔이었습니다.

Very nice structure, good service and breakfast.plenty of space in the room. Located between the city and the beach, perfect for who wants to relax. Some furniture are a little bit worn, especially in the pool area. The food at the bar, aside the breakfast, is rather average.

I loved the look of this hotel from pictures on the internet and was not disappointed once we arrived. The staff are so friendly and helpful. We had dinner in the restaurant and the food was amazing as was the breakfasts every morning. For a small hotel everything was just perfect. We would truly go back there for another stay.
Hotel placeret idyllisk midt i rismarkerne.- meget roligt område. Flere daglige gratis shuttle bus ( gl. Amerikaner jeep) til city af hoi an. Gratis cykler til rådighed
第一次到會安 入住hoi an chic hotel, 環境清幽 早餐的飲品可口 唯一考慮是地點遠離古城 雖然酒店提供接送到古城和沙灘的服務 但行程時要依接送時間表來編排 除非坐的士 另酒店提供免費活動 如做風箏 學越南語 需於前一日報名

I liked the semi-rural setting, amidst the paddie fields--even if the local farmer was burning off the rice stubble. Well organised tour to my son--thank you. The room was superb--the ambience in the hotel likewise--superb. I will definitely be back.

We had the perfect stay here! staff were beyond lovely, so welcoming and always happy to help. Free shuttle bus into town, free push bikes too. A short 5-10min from the centre of old town it was the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle without being too far out. Breakfast was absolutely delicious! the rooms were large and house keeping daily. We absolutely loved our stay here and will definitely be back!

ホイヤンに4泊して最終日の1泊のみの利用でした スタッフはみなさんフレンドリーで目が合えば笑顔です 今回１人旅でしたのでホッとしました お湯もたっぷり出ます エアコンも寒いくらいでした 朝食も何を食べても美味しかったです プリンおすすめです 甘くなく何個でも食べれちゃいます マイナス点は ホテル紹介写真の様に田んぼの真ん中ではありませんでした 周辺には廃墟の様な建物が沢山あります それとハエがすごいです ドアを少しの開けているだけで3,4匹入って来ました( - それでもトータル的にかなりリラックス出来るホテルだと思います ただホテルの専属のシャトルバスのドライバーの運転は恐怖です ベトナムの中でも荒い方で緊張しながら乗っていました( _ )

We loved this little hotel . Excellent value, fantastic staff and quiet rooms despite being in the old quarter of hanoi. Loved everything about this place . Highly recommend. Great breakfast- made to order.

2歳になる子供の誕生日旅行として家族3人で利用しました 総じての評価でいくと スタッフの方が非常にフレンドリーで 子供に対しとても親切にしてくださり 家族3人で楽しく過ごせました 子供の誕生日祝いのケーキを用意いただいたのですが これも想像以上の豪華なケーキを用意してくださり 盛り上がる演出もしてもらいました お部屋は写真通りのおしゃれなお部屋です 他の部屋や外の騒音などもなく 静かに過ごすことができました 一つ難点をいうと お風呂のお湯が貯まりきるまえにぬるくなってしまい 湯船を貯めれず入れなかったのは残念でした それ以外は値段以上の満足度を感じれたので またホイアンに来たら ぜひ泊まりたいです ありがとうございました

Every staffs were wearing smiling faces all the time. It was so touched to receive a handwritten xmas card and chocolates from your staff. They also provided a complimentary xmas buffet dinner to all room guests on the xmas eve. Most surprising me was the cleaner not only came to make up the room once per day ,but everytime when we went out .they came up to change the towels , clean the garbage and decorate the room for us for a few times in a day. Their housekeeping service was excellent! their services were straight from heart and definitely the best i have ever experienced . The only thing i found unsatisfactory was just the hot water supply is unstable in the bath tub. To all hoi an chic hotel staffs , we wish you all the best and thank you for your hospitality.

Everything about this hotel is fabulous. The accommodation, the breakfast, the beautiful grounds, but most of all the wonderful staff. Such a peaceful place with views across the rice fields. We will be back.
Nice place, clean rooms with good a/c. The staff don t speak much english

My mom and i did not have a great experience at this homestay. This was mostly due to the fact that we wanted to leave a day early and they would not give us a refund nor allow expedia to refund us for that day. We tried to explain that we should only pay for the nights that we stayed there etc. It is not that central to the heart of everything so a grab or bike will be needed. The breakfast options were quite limited and would recommend getting meals elsewhere. Honestly for the price they are charging, you can find somewhere else that offers more.

Det er et familiedrevet homestay i ei lita sidegate ganske nær gamlebyen. Rommet var større enn på de andre hotellene jeg har bodd på, og det var rent og velholdt. Familien som driver coco viet er veldig hyggelig og hjelpsom. Litt ujevne, men tilstrekkelige ferdigheter i engelsk. Det billigste, men absolutt det beste oppholdet på min reise i vietnam.

5 nuits parfaites ! la propriétaire adorable, sa soeur un peu trop insistante pour vendre ses tours, tailleurs etc ... Mais ce n est qu un détail. Gros plus pour la localisation proche du coeur de hoi an et pourtant au calme, aussi pour les vélos mis a disposition.
Coco homestay is a great place to stay and discover around hoi an. All of staffs are friendly, they will help you all about tours at hoi an.

We loved staying at this beautiful hotel where we swam a lot in the wonderful pool and relaxed for massages in the evening. It is very close to downtown and the old city and all of the things that you would want to do when coming to hoi an. We would love to single out particular staff to mention but every single staff member was wonderful and contributed to our stay. We would love to visit hoi an and will certainly stay here again if we did. Highly recommended!

Fantastiskt hotell! så trevligt bemötande av alla i personalen, härlig stämning och personlig service. Stora fina rum med snyggt badrum. Poolen är trevlig och spat magiskt. Även en trevlig frukost med super god omelett. Rekommenderar varmt!
Remarkable staff, housekeeping, location and breakfasts.

Our stay was incredible! by far my favorite hotel in vietnam! the staff were so friendly and supportive. Rachel and chloe helped us book events and learn more about the area. They were always smiling! the room was very clean, air conditioned, and the bathrooms were nice. Highly recommend!
Nice property. Added the balcony and a larger room, at vietnam prices. All the staff made us feel very nice, especially front desk and at breakfast. The kind of place i would return to.

Fabulous hotel in a great location, and with the most wonderful service! the staff is incredibly friendly and professional. The swimming pool is a delight! the breakfast buffet is comprised by an array of exquisite food deliciously prepared. Definitely an awesome place to stay!!
Hôtel magnifique, service au top petit dej rien à dire, à 10 mnt de tout
ホイアン旧市街散策の為 宿泊しました 無料レンタル自転車があります 旧市街まで歩くと１５分 ２０分はあるので自転車を利用して近くに止めて観光しました 部屋のインテリアやプールが素敵です
Affordable hotel with very clean facilities. Nice pool area and the front desk staff is very helpful. Good quality complimentary breakfast as well. Highly recommended.
The hotel staff was incredibly friendly, helpful and spoke english.

Stayed here for 3 nights december 2024 with my husband and 2 teenagers in adjoining room. Staff were fantastic to work with. Long before we even arrived, front desk was helpful in making us restaurant reservations, arranging massages and transportation. Rooms were clean and well organized, making for a comfortable stay.
Husband is tall and the beds were the most comfortable we had enjoyed in vietnam. Rooms are incredibly clean. Book massage, the staff are incredible and there is often a morning special.

The hotel is beautiful, just a short walk to the market and old town. Staff are so attentive and welcoming. Chloe and eric were so lovely and was always so kind and helpful. Definitely recommend this hotel if ever in hoi an

Wonderful breakfast. It had good vietnamese food as well as bacon. Other items were also very good. Room was comfortable. Washroom was very nice. Staff was very helpful in informing us about where to go around the hotel.
This is a new and beautiful facility in a decent location. It s within walking distance of the old city. The staff were nice and the breakfast was good.
Chloe is professional with her job. She help me with translating the language and make my stay with so much ease.
4月30日から5月3日に利用しました ホイアンの中心地から少し外れますが 中心地まで歩いて異動できる範囲です チェックイン時に英語で説明を受けましたが 通じていないと思われたみたいで 英語の案内を日本語に訳してプリントアウトしてくれました とても優しい対応で嬉しかったです また ホイアンに行く時には利用したいです
Great hospitality, breakfast was excellent, location and ambience was top knotch. Loved the stay.
Great staff and facility that rivals 5 star hotel and service
Pool was underwhelming.
Absolutely wonderful hotel. The staff and service is unmatched.
Staff were amazing lovely friendly family atmosphere.
Hotel was beautiful but it was the amazing staff that really made the trip. Would highly recommend.
Wonderful hotel with fantastic friendly staff
Good amenities great service nice location walking distance to old town decent food

Great little boutique hotel. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Victor was great to help with luggage, chloe and the girls at the front desk always willing to help with organizing a tour or a car to the airport. Was about a 15 minute walk to old town with a lot to look at along the way! room was spacious and clean. Would recommend this hotel.

Susan and her front of house team were fantastic! very friendly and professional. The hotel is just 10 minutes walk to the river and it is very beautifully designed in art s deco style. The breakfast buffet was ok, however the western food dishes were not great prepared and didn t taste good. The spa is fantastic and i enjoyed some treatments. However the massage beds are uncomfortable and for someone like me with a bad back problem, i struggled to lie down for an hour.

Lovely property, very polite, friendly and professional staff. The restaurant was fantastic and opened long hours, the breakfast was plentiful and had a great variety and the rooftop bar was great. We stayed for three nights but wished we stayed longer. The beds were very comfortable, the rooms were beautiful and spacious and it was only a short walk into the old town. Although we didn t swim the pool looked lovely and was a good size. We could not fault delicacy hotel and spa and highly recommend it.
Amazing decorations amazing facilities

This is a superb property. Staff is exceptional, the spa is very well run with highly trained therapists. The bikes are an excellent amenity and the breakfast is nicely prepared. This property is better then many 5 star properties in vietnam and we highly recommend it!!
まず スタッフの皆様の親切な対応に感謝申し上げます タクシーをなん度も予約してくれたり 滞在中数回 困った事はないか 快適に過ごせているかお声かけしてくれました 説明も丁寧でナイトマーケットその他にスムーズに行けました おかげで楽しい滞在になりました

Sehr schönes hotel in der nähe des historischen distrikts von hoi an, nur 10 min fußweg. Geschmackvoll eingerichtete zimmer in top zustand. Außergewöhnliches frühstück mit vielen frisch zubereiteten vietnamesischen leckereien. Sehr freundliches und stets zuvorkommendes personal, herzlichen dank hierfür! kann das hotel nur weiterempfehlen!
Very comfy bed- great service and good breakfast- but need more vegan options.
Hotel had lots of character, rooms a little small but loved the ambiance.

Nice hotel walking distant to old town. Rachael at front desk very attentive and helpful, check in was smooth and fast. Good spread of breakfast. Sky bar is a nice place to chill out with good view of the landscape river. Bar tender alan very helpful with information of local restaurants and places to visit. Good service from the staff
乾淨漂亮很好拍照 飯店內的spa划算又舒服
Excellent staff, very accommodating, will definitely return in the future

Just a totally excellent place to stay. Extended stay 3 times. The staff was professional and super friendly. Can get about anywhere by walking or grab within 5 to 12 minutes. Will return here next time im in the area of noi an.
Excellent in alm areas especially the friendly staff
Excellent place to stay in hoi an.
スタッフもマッサージの腕もとても良いと思いました まだ 新しいホテルだそうで これからも期待したいです スタッフが気を使っているのがとても良く感じました

Beautifully appointed hotel with spacious and clean rooms, good buffet breakfast options, and a lovely seating area around the pool to enjoy. The staff were very welcoming, helpful and warm. We especially appreciated the hospitality of the ladies at the front desk (big thank you to lisa and chloe). They helped us with booking scooters which were brought directly to the hotel for us. Same day laundry service was excellent and inexpensive. Great location, only about a 15 minute walk into old town. Highly recommend booking your stay here, you won t regret it!
Beautiful place, well thought through, lovely staff! suffers with road noise if you re on the front of the building.
Very friendly staff
Personalized and courteous service, wonderful ambience, great location
Lovely new property and amazing staff that are very willing to do whatever it takes to make your stay more enjoyable
The staff were wonderful and its location is perfect for a 10 minute stroll into the old town, but within minutes you can also be in rural countryside. The breakfast was outstanding.

Amazing hotel, clean and well looked after. Staff were so friendly and helpful and were a credit to the hotel. Shower was great, bed amazingly comfy. Happy hour on the roof was awesome. Breakfast had lots of choice. I also had a very good massage too. Can t really say anything bad about the hotel, such a friendly happy clean place. Also, maybe 5 min walk from the old town, great location.
Excellent services.

Amazing hotel, loved everything. About it. The staff were super friendly and provided us with the best customer service. Rooms were gorgeous, very clean, beds super comfortable. About 10 min walk to old town! couldn t recommend this place more. Will definitely come back to hoi an and stay here again.

We loved hoi an and really loved staying at this beautiful, well located hotel. Definitely the best we seen in the town. Extra special service from chloe and sophia who went the extra steps to ensure we left with great memories and will certainly return. This hotel really is the best in hoi an. Do not hesitate to book it. Rooms are a really good size, brand new and spotlessly clean. Pool is amazing and the buffet breakfast is stunning. You are guaranteed a fantastic stay here

Incredible stay and lovely staff. Patrick was always so kind! pool was beautiful and refreshing. A bit outside of the centre but still walkable. Quick grab scooter will get you to old town quickly on the hot and humid days.
Lovely hotel, excellent breakfast options, very nice staff.
This felt like a 5 star hotel. I will stay here again if ever i return to hoi an.
早餐非常丰盛
Customer service is excellent they have free bike for you to use, but you need to be good at riding a bike as lots of motorcycles in hoi an.
Te hacen sentir bienvenido en todo momento, siempre están al pendiente de tus necesidades, se valora mucho esa clase de atención
너무 좋았습니다. 직원 분들의 서비스도 최고였고 조식도 맛있었습니다.

Cosy and comfortable. Quiet and cleanliness was really good. The room service was really yummy and special mention about the spa services. Excellent. Location is further away from the main shops so it s quieter.

We loved our stay at the hoi an delicacy hotel. The staff couldn t have been more helpful and friendly. The hotel was lovely, and the food was great too. Everything was accommodated for, laundry, trips, food! a short walk to the night market and very peaceful trip. Thank you for all your help. Would definitely recommend and return!

Most friendly staff ever! there is a 10 minutes walk to reach the night market which may be difficult depending on the weather. Around the hotel, there are a couple of shops and food booth, and a convenient store.

The deluxe room was small but comfortable. The hotel is on a main road about a ten minute walk from the old quarter. It s quite a busy road without a pavement so would be difficult for families. It was a convenient base for us in hoi an and good value.

The team at delicacy exceeded all of my expectations with their polite professionalism and their willingness to go the extra mile to ensure that we had an enjoyable stay. Excellent value for money and very very comfortable.

신상 호텔이고 혼여라 평가 좋은곳을 선택했어요. 후론트 메니저분들. 도우미분들 모두 너무 잘 챙겨주셨어요. 그런데 생각보다 호텔 규모는 작아서 처음엔 실망 스러웠지만 (사진속으로 보이는 것이 전부댜 보시면 될듯) 3일 지내는동안 불편함은 없었습니다. 머무는 시기가 11월이라 조석으로 올드타운까지 걷는 15분정도 무리 없었고 주위에 카페. 롯데리아. 약국. 로컬음식점. 미니마트. 재래시장 등 있어서 걷는 재미도 있었어요. 외부 돌아다니느라 수영장은 사진만 찍고 사용은 못했네요. 조식은 (본래 많이 먹는 스탈이 아니어서) 평타는 됐구요. 로비가 좁아 후론트에서 모두 관찰이 되어 샤이한 분들은 불편할수도 있어요. 사진은 잘 나오는 인스타감성 원하시면 추천이요

Fantastisk hotel, så smukt og skønt og rent vi skulle egentlig kun have været der 2 dage, men ente med at blive 6 dage.. Vi fik opgraderet vores værelse værelserne er smukke og rene pesonalet er virkelig skønt, hjælpsomme og servicemindet spaafdelingen er lækker og god.. Morgenmaden er lækker vil anbefale delicacy til alle der gerne vil bo lækkert tak for er skønt ophold, vi kommer til at savne er og kommer vi nogen sinde tilbage til hoi an, så ved vi godt hvor vi skal bo
Personnel exceptionnellement attentif et serviable.
Very cosy and nice hotel with excellent service
친절한 직원과 청결한 숙소 그리고 조식 및 호이안 올드타운을 도보로 갈수 있어 좋았습니다.

A beautiful hotel with welcoming, friendly, and helpful staff. I would highly recommend the hoi an delicacy. Rooms are clean and well appointed. The restaurant, pool, and spa are also excellent! did i mention how great the staff is? top notch all around.
Very nice!

Just outside of busy downtown area but short cab ride or moderate walk back to town. Wonderful amenities on site like spa and roof top bar! enjoyed both even though only here one day! highly recommend. Price can t be beat
Could not fault their service, the staff went above and beyond for us and i definitely recommend for anyone looking to stay in hoi an.
Stayed here for 5 days. Loved the location, loved walking about town. Room cleaning everyday. Great hotel. Highly recommend

Arrived early after catching an overnight sleeper from nha trang, the hotel staff helped arranged an upgraded room for a small fee upon my request to enable early check in as my room was not available. The team also worked with me to extend my stay after loving hoi an and wanting an additional day. Walkable (0.5-1km) to all restaurants, tailors, cafes and tour pick up / meeting points if hotel pick is not your thing. It s quiet, clean and staff are very friends. Pool is pretty and great for a quick dip on a humid day.

It was a great stay for all of us. It was the most beautiful hotel for all of us. We were all wishing that we could stay a little longer next time the only one thing that would goes well with this beauty was to replace the trash bin (no so stainless steel) with something else as elegant as everything . Else in the room

방도 좋고, 고풍스러은 느낌에 한국관광객도 별로 없고 좋습니다. 단점은 올드타운까지 약 1키로정도를 매번 걸어야 했고요, 옆에 무슨 절 같은 데서 아침, 점심, 저녁으로 엄청 크게 염불을 외워서 다소 시끄러웠던 점은 아쉽네요. 근처에 좋은 식당은 별로 없어서 올드타운 쪽으로 나가야 하는데, 가까운 곳에 릴리스키친이라는 괜찮은 식당이 있으니 한 번정도는 이용해보시길...

Magnifique hotel ! propreté irréprochable. Personnel d une gentillesse incroyable, au petit soin. La chambre était tres jolie le lit très confortable. Petit dejeuner parfait avec beaucoup de choix. Tout était excellent ! je pense la meilleure expérience de ma vie

1歳10ヶ月の子連れで利用しました 3泊滞在中の2日目に3時間のベビーシッターを頼みました シッター中は客室内とホテル内での対応を依頼しましたが 海外でのベビーシッターに戸惑ってしまったのか終始グズっていたようでした しかしホテル中のスタッフでなんとか笑顔にしようと対応してくれたようで 翌日いろいろなスタッフが息子に声をかけてくれました 旅行後も毎日のようにシッター担当の名前を呼んで また会いたいと言っています 本当に優しくしてもらえたんだなと思います シッター担当の方も他のスタッフの方にも大変感謝しています こんなに全てのスタッフがフレンドリーで温かいホテルは珍しいと思います ホテルは孔雀のデザインがいたるところにあり 白基調の中に黒とピーコックグリーンの差し色がとても素敵でした そしてとても清潔で気持ちよく利用できました ホテルの皆様ありがとうございました! 息子がもう少し大きくなったらまた行きます
物值不錯 唯一係空調差少少
非常棒的飯店 強烈推薦 應該是會安古城最棒的飯店了
ホテルはとても綺麗でインテリアも素敵です スタッフも皆さんとても優しく親切で 居心地良かったです スパも安くてクオリティ高くとても良かった ごはんも美味しいです ナイトマーケットなど観光地までちょっと歩くので 行きは良いですが 帰りがちょっと暗かったり疲れたりでした 歩くのが苦でなければ お値段は安いし この辺りで1番キレイでオススメです

Spotless new hotel in hoi an super super clean, great service from entire staff. The pool was beautiful, and the free bikes transformed our experience. Breakfast was spot on, and the rooftop bar was a great place to hang out and watch the sunset. Would recommend without hesitation.
房間很理想 乾淨 設備齊全 職員主動細心解釋 並提供專業意見 泳池很深水 十分適合游泳 但比較多小朋友 早餐選擇較少 味道正常 但添補較慢 沒有橙汁
This was a lovely hotel. It s pretty, close to everything, the staff are kind and efficient and the food is delicious.
Loved this place! stunning pool and great food
Lovely boutique style hotel in a good location. Very comfortable bed and nice bathroom facilities. Great spa and wonderful, helpful staff.
Excelente

Beautiful hotel , great amenities and lovely staff. Alan and the rest of the staff were lovely and treated us so well. The breakfast buffet was perfect. Close to the night market and river you can take a grab there and a kind of golf cart taxi back. Was a super fun place to visit. This is an upscale hotel that does mot feel touristy. They have a nice roof bar also.
This hotel was gorgeous. The rooms, the restaurant, the pool lovely!

The best hotel i have ever stayed in. The decor is beautiful, so clean and comfortable too. Service was perfect. Im so pleased i booked this hotel. Free bicycles too. Breakfast lovely. Taxi to da nang 300vnd, booked with hotel. Hoi an is pretty....and touristy.

Så skønt et hotel. Smukt og med den mest fantastisk kundeservice. Vi kan kun give de bedste anbefalinger for stedet. Her er rent og smukt og i orden. Vi skulle egentlig kun være der i 2 dage men endte med 5 fordi vi virkelig var vilde med stedet og personalet.
Amazing staff, very helpful. Helped us book cabs at very resonable rates to tourist spots. The staff really went above and beyond for us
施設内はデザインがお洒落で 朝食も充実していて美味しかったです スパや屋上のバーもあり最高でした スタッフの方も親切にしてくださり快適に滞在できました
広くて綺麗でとても良かったのですが 水圧が低過ぎてトイレのタンクに水が全然貯まらないし 湯船にお湯をはるのも諦めました スタッフはフレンドリーで朝食も美味しく頂けました
Khách sạn mới, hiện đại.bữa sáng ngon sạch sẽ. Đáng để trải nghiệm khi đến hội an

Excellent hotel, service, facilities rooms. Conveniently located about 15mins walk to tourist attractions in the hoi an ancient town, restaurants, thu bon river. Gm, sophia vu was very helpful knowledgeable with great recommendations on what to do where to go. Her staff especially chloe, susan hannah as well as the f b team were also very helpful, proactive always happy to assist focused on customer satisfaction. We hope to return one day to enjoy the wonderful hospitality of the hoi a delicacy hotel! highly recommended if you ever plan on spending a few days in hoi an.
All the staff at this hotel are very helpful and friendly.
Fantastic place to stay. Beautiful rooms and pool.
Great location , close to the old town. Lovely pool to relax and cool down. Property was clean and room comfy.
價格便宜 但離古城較遠 可以一住
너무 좋아요.... 감성적이고 분위기 좋고 자연친화적이라 거기잇으면 마음도 너무 편하고 잠도 잘와여 또 가고싶어요
베트남 여행 일정 중 에코로지에서 2박 했습니다. 전반적으로 뷰도 좋고, 수영장도 깔끔하고, 조식도 마음에 들었습니다. 커플이나 부부가 가서 이용하기에는 너무 좋은 시설이었어요. 추천합니다.
커플 여행 갔다왔는데 정말 만족스럽습니다. 음식도 5점 만점에 3점, 룸서비스는 정말싸고 5점 만점에 4점, 수영장도 이쁘고 친절해요. 스파도 받을만하고 좋아요. 가성비 커플 여행으로 짱짱

최고급 리조트와는 별개의 매력이 있습니다. 아담하지만 시설은 매우 양호하며 자연적인 컨셉으로 편안함과 안락함을 주고, 직원들의 서비스가 좋습니다. 음식도 맛있으며, 수영장도 크진 않지만 많은 사람들로 붐비지 않아 조용하고 스파 마사지 또한 투숙객 50프로 할인적용이 되서 저렴한 가격에 고급 서비스를 받을 수 있습니다. 셔틀 버스도 운행하여 다른 관광지에 오고가기 좋습니다. 그러나 셔틀내에 직원에게서 풍기는 흡연냄새가 심해서 아쉬웠습니다. 차에도 담배냄새가 났습니다. 그리고 옆에 공사를 해서 아침부터 공사소리때문에 일찍 깨었습니다. 또한 그랜드 디럭스 룸을 예약했음에도 불구하고 객실내에 테이블과 의자가 없어서 불편했습니다. 룸서비스 음식을 시켰는데 먹을수 있는 테이블과 의자가 없어 곤란했고 다른 사진의 객실에는 책상과 의자가 별도로 있었는데 배정받을 객실엔 없었습니다. 이 외에는 전반적으로 가격대비 매우 훌륭한 숙소였습니다.
외지에 있어서 진짜 조용합니다 호텔 내부도 전체적으로 조용해 매일 일찍 잠들 수 있었어요 조식 갯수도 많고 매일 푸짐하게 먹었네요 조용한 숙소를 찾으시면 추천입니다

직원들이 친절합니다. 조식은 입맛에 안맞아서 별로였지만 과일이나 쥬스는 아주 맛있었습니다. 셔틀버스가 있지만 시간 맞추기가 힘들어서 한번도 이용 못했어요. 에코로지가 시내랑 떨어져 있어서 택시 타고 이동 해야하는게 조금 불편했습니다. 룸청소를 레몬그라스로 한다고 하는데 처음에 방에 들어가면 그 향이 너무 강해서 머리가 좀 아픕니다. 향에 예민하신 분들은 참고하세요. 그래도 대채적으로 만족합니다.
올드타운과 살짝 거리가 있어 셔틀버스가 있었는데 아쉬운 건 버스 시간이 아침 9시반 이후에 오후 2시반에 있어서 시간이 애매했어요 ㅠㅠ 그것만 빼면 너무 좋았어요. 가장 베트남스러운 느낌이었어요.

We loved everything about hoi an ecolodge. We were there for 3 nights to relax after a stressful couple of months, and it didnt disappoint. The location was perfect for us it s a little way out of town, but it s a cheap grab ride and the hotel also has a shuttle bus. Breakfast, which is served in the lagoon-side restaurant, was very good indeed. Great selection of western and asian food options. The noodles were lovely! delicious, different fresh juices every day, which included pennywort one day and beetroot on another. We ate one evening in the restaurant and can recommend the seafood clay pot, tiger prawns in tamarind sauce and morning glory. All delicious and reasonably priced. All fhe staff were polite and friendly, but ngoc in the restaurant was outstanding - super efficient and very friendly. We will definitely stay at the ecolodge again next time we re in hoi an.
조식, 룸, 서비스 다 만족 그러나 위치는 아쉬워요 조용하고 자연자연초록초록 추천
직원분들도 너무 친절하시구 룸도 아늑하고 전반적으로 너무 좋았음. 수영장이 생각보다 조금 작았지만 놀기에 문제는 없었고 수영장에서 판매하는 음식이 너무 맛있었음. 특히 피자! 주위에 일반가정집제외하고 아무것고 없는 점은 꼭 참고하세요 !! (대신 호이안 올드타운 무료 셔틀있음)
Very good ! i like it there. All the staff were nice and had a wonderful smile , especially, i want to thank these two beautiful ms. ,receptionist oanh and gr. Manager bich phuc.
커플로 다녀왔고 숙소가 예쁜곳이네요 올드타운으로 가는 무료셔틀버스도 이용했고 만족해요 조식도 괜찮고 수영장도 좋아요 아쉬운거는 한적한곳이라 근처 머 없어요 ㅎ
풀사이드 바에 당구대가 있어서 재밌게 놀았습니다 ㅎㅎ 룸 컨디션도 물론 좋았구요
Fantastic experience and amazing service
아담하고 편안한 곳 입니다 스텝들도 호감가는 분들 입니다 주위는 농촌이고 자전거 타기에 좋습니다 윈디까페는 친절하지만 건너편에 구멍가게 두개 중 왼쪽 가게는 바가지를 뻔뻔하게 씌웁니다 푼돈에 기분 상하실수 있으니 재미로라도 들르지마세요

We only stayed a night in hoi an but would have been happy for a longer stay at this great little hotel. The hotel is new, in a very attractive setting, and everything works well. Rooms are spacious and well designed and the complimentary breakfast is top notch. The hotel runs a regular shuttle bus that gets you to and from ancient hoi an in minutes.
정말최고 더이상 말이 필요없다
매우 만족스러운 숙소였습니다.
잘 지어놓고 관리가 안된 호텔. 관리가 잘 되었다면 괜찮았을 숙소. 아쉬웠다. 재방문은 안할거같다.
Super hyggeligt hotel med god service i autentisk miljø. Lidt vej ind til selve hoi an an bang strand, men hotellet havde fin shuttelseevice eller gratis cykler
The place is really beautiful and very accommodating. The only issue is a lack of vegetarian options for breakfast but in total the place is great!

It was ok. The service was so so , check in was good but thereafter it was pretty bland - it just didn t have that welcoming nor friendly vibe. Location was not as good as i thought i felt a bit isolated. Even though there was a shuttle to and from hoi an and the beach, times did not always works so we paid for taxis. It wasn t a hotel where you could walk out or down the road to eat or see something yes it s peace and quiet but come 7am all the noise starts - people walking by, doors slamming , housekeeping. I m normally a deep sleeper and being on holiday i would like a lie in and relax but i found i was woken early by this. It was an ok hotel and im glad i only stayed 3ngts. I wouldnt choose this hotel again.

3박을 했다. 우리 가족에게는 완벽했던 리조트 였다. 마사지도 좋았고, 조식도 괜찮았고, 룸서비스 음식들도 완전 맛있었고, 풀바 칵테일도 괜찮았고, 직원들도 거의 모두가 친절하며 잘웃어 주셨으며, 정말 너무너무 안락했던 객실 및 침대 그리고 시원함을 더해준 천정 팬. 수영장 수온도 딱 적당했고, 도마뱀도 보고 좋았어요. 정원 및 수영장 모든 시설이 잘 관리가 되어있고,친환경적인면에서도 높은 점수를 드려요 다음에 다시 찾을께요 !!

Sehr schönes, gepflegtes hotel in ruhiger lage mit tollem pool und schönem spa - perfekt zum entspannen. Unser zimmer war groß, sehr schön eingerichtet und sauber. Das frühstücksbuffet war riesig und ließ keine wünsche offen. Das personal war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Alles in allem eine sehr zu empfehlende unterkunft.

Fantastic staff, the manager was lovely and helpful as were all of the staff. Couldn t have asked for friendlier staff. The pools were fantastic and the rooms to a very high standard. We enjoyed a grand deluxe room and this was outstanding, clean cool and well maintained. Plenty of choice at breakfast.
호캉스로 굳 관광지랑은 멀지만 자전거빌려서 한적하게 힐링 잘했어요 오토바이 빵빵소리 질렷을때 가서 딱 좋았음 마지막날로 추천
굉장 조용하면서 휴식을 즐기기에 정말 좋았고 올드타운 안방비치까지 셔틀도 운행을 해주었기에 다음에 가더라도 꼭 재방문 하고싶은 호텔

정원 조경이 잘 되어 있습니다. 진짜 에코예요 ㅋㅋㅋ 방은 조금 작다고 생각될 수도 있는데 만족했습니다. 다만 조식이 조금 부실하다고 생각되실 수도 있어요. 주변이 깨끗한지 복도 벽면과 천장에 게코도마뱀이 붙어있어서 파충류 싫어하시는 분들은 천장이랑 벽면 보지 마세요. 저희 엄마는 밤에 천장봤다가 기절하실 뻔 하셨어요 ㅋㅋㅋ 그거 빼고는 뭐.. 괜찮습니다. 직원분들도 체크인 할 때 추천 명소랑 셔틀버스 설명도 잘 해주시구요!
상당히만족스런 호텔이였습니다!!시설도 좋고 깨끗하고 친절하고!!다음에도 베트남 갈 기회가 있다면 에코로지 이용 하려고 합니다
전반적으로 굉장히 만족스러웠습니다! 규모는 아담하지만 있을것 다있고 가족끼리 잘 즐기다 왔습니다!

직원분들은 굉장히 친절합니다. 호텔 주변은 암것도 없어요ㅡ 그랩에서도 주소 파악이 안되니 확인후 예약하세요. 호탤스 닷컴의.정보만 믿지 마시고 룸 상태 확인하세요 4명이 자기엔 방이 작습니다ㅡ 엑스트라 베드 쓰고 작은 아이는 침대를 쉐어해야 합니다. 성인 2명이면 좋은 방이고 3명부턴 힘들어요. 엑스트라 베드를 넣으면 방이 꽉찹니다. 좁아요. 호텔스 닷컴은.침대 사진이 있기에 정보 수정은 하지 않는다고 합니다.

We booked the best room 10 months in advance at about 120 aud a night for 5 nights and booked the best option the club suit. I did my research and this looked like a great high lvl place but could be better. Service was good, staff friendly, food good, cocktails great and strong a great way to start the night. Rooms 7/10. Bed 5/10 hard. Service 9/10 free shuttle bus service to ancient toen and beach 9/10 they need more times though. Communication on w /app or sms and oversll 10/10. Room service laundry 9/10 and very fair price per kilo and fast 1 day return was great. . I would recommend the mid or low priced rooms in the main building. Imo dont waist your money on the more xc rooms. For some reason offered to show us they rooms in main building at a lowe rate and we declined as we wanted the size of the club sweet with large balcony and bath lake view. Rooms in the main building would be better choice imo at mid to low lvl price structures they offer. The club suits need tlc and the beds are hard af.. My mrs dint get a good nights sleep in 5 nights on the hard bed. Limited service in club sweet area fyi but very quiet as i like it. That said this eco lodge is a good option for the open minded and mid to low budget priced traveler. Be sure to try a cocktail lol.
늦은시각 공항도착하여, 픽업서비스 이용했습니다. 호텔은 아주 마음에 들었습니다. 초록빛 가득한 호텔이었고, 직원분들도 친절하시고 조식도 마음에 들었습니다. 수영장도 아주 좋았습니다. 호이안 올드타운은 차량 15분정도, 바구니배 타는곳은 7분정도면 도착가능합니다. 가성비 따지지않더라도 아주 멋진호텔입니다
Staff were friendly and helpful. Hotel was really nice and clean and bedrooms were a good size. Great breakfast provided and lovely setting.
정말 나만알고 싶은 리조트에요 마지막1박을 했는데 엄마가 왜이제 왔냐고 하실정도로 아늑하고 힐링했던 고마웠던 장소에요 작지만 작은만큼 번잡하지않고 쉬다가기 딱 좋아요 산책하기엔 조금 아쉽지만 곳곳이 참 예뻤답니다 조식도 맛있었구요 )

깔끔하고 괜찮아요. 수영장 주변에 도마뱀이 자주 나왔지만 이건 뭐 어쩔 수 없는거 같고...수영장 물 상태는 생각보다 괜찮았고 수영장 주변을 이쁘게 잘 꾸며서 보기 좋았어요. 호텔이 좀 구석에 있어서 불편했다는 후기를 봐서 걱정했는데 호텔 셔틀버스가 있고 그랩도 잘 잡혀서 저는 크게 불편하지는 않았어요. 오히려 호텔 주변이 조용해서 쉬기에는 좋았어요. 다만 호텔 주변에 식당이 없어 어쩔 수 없이 호텔 레스토랑에서 점심을 먹었는데 비용에 비해 맛은 별로... 호텔 레스토랑은 점심, 저녁에 이용하지 않는게 좋을 듯하네요. 조식은 괜찮았어요. 저는 3박 했는데 매일매일 메뉴도 조금씩 바뀌도 생각보다 입맛에도 잘 맞았습니다. 숙박하는동안 방안에 있는 유리잔 1개를 실수로 깼는데 비용이 한화로 약 1만원정도 하더라구요... ㄷㄷ 그정돈 아닌거 같은데.. 그대로 전반적으로 숙소 괜찮았습니다.
호텔 자체는 청결하고, 서비스가 양호함. 호이안 구시가지 및 안방비치와 다소 거리가 있음.
Very good
