However, we used grab services during our stay which were super convenient and took 5-10 minutes to get to ancient town and was super cheap ( 22k vnd one way). Also some nice and cheap cafes/restaurants nearby which were handy if we didn t feel like going to ancient town for a meal. Breakfast buffet was good. The rooms had a fridge and they provided beer, soft drinks and water there but we didn t realise that these weren t free. Although they provided free bottled water each day.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed in a joining room as a family of five. The staff are very helpful and friendly and any issue we bought up was discussed and resolved or taken on board. It s very easy to get a grab car or just leave the hotel and walk around. Breakfast was fine. The gym is very small - best for only one or two people. My children enjoyed the pool.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We absolutely loved our stay. The staff and the facilities were fantastic. We will be back

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great smaller boutique hotel. Very nice staff. Fantastic breakfast with delicious coffee.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Fenomenal hotel, nuevo, habitaciones grandes con baños enormes, buena piscina, cerca del centro, buen desayuno, gran aamabilidad del personal.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is located on hai ba trung st. Which leads straight to the ancient hoi an town within 20 mins walking. We went by no. 1 bus from danang to hoi an and the final bus stop was just about 3 mins away from the hotel (by taxi). Our room was clean, comfortable, with very good view. Though we were not welcomed by smiling face at the first, she gave us all the needed information for the stay and other staff members were good so overall i can surely recommend this hotel to my friends!

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Friendly staff clean room great stay for the price.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Love it... Will come back soon

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 화장실 넓고 좋은데 욕조 옆에 창문이 있어서 밤에 무서웠다.(겁쟁이) 자전거 타고 관광하기 좋은 거리였다

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Good comfortable hotel overall but the greatest asset of this hotel is its friendly helpful and dedicated staff. I would have given full rating for this hotel but unfortunately the breakfast, though buffet, is somewhat neglected as though it is not an important part of the hospitality on offer. I am very grateful to the helpful front desk staff for their free upgrade to deluxe room.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A warm and friendly hotel, excellent service, free use of bicycles (hoi an is great for cycling), free shuttles into the old town or to the beach, excellent breakfast, nice pool, and just a great relaxing place to be.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel isn t located in the city centre (near the main bus terminal but in between the old town and an bang beach) but is within walking distance to downtown (about 15-20 minute walk). It has shuttle services (based on request) every 1-2 hours which makes it up for its location. It also shuttle services to the beach twice per day which is great during summer! the modern vietnamese style room is spacious and pretty. It has everything you need and the bed is just comfortable, firm and solid! the bathroom is big and has a deep soaking tub which i enjoyed a lot. The rate also includes buffet breakfast which offers a good selection of fruits, eggs, bread and other items but make sure you go early because during the late morning, the staff wouldn t refill certain items/fruits. Service of staff was good when i stayed there except different front desk staff would often try to sell you tours or arrange airport transfers through them a couple times daily! this could get a bit annoying especially after a long day of sightseeing but you could just turn the staff down nicely and it would be fine ) . Overall i really enjoyed my stay there and think it is totally worth the value!

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The room and hotel are well designed with a most attractive pool, lift, breakfast/dining area. While i was there the hotel seemed to be undergoing some kind of minor refurbishment/major clean-up and housekeeping trolleys and maintenance equipment were forever clogging the hallways. Not a major issue, just messy. The breakfast was excellent but don t expect it to get really underway until 6.30 at the earliest which can be an issue with early departing tours. When i checked out there was only one young woman who seemed to be authorised to tot up the guests bills. With a particularly pernickety tour group this was a lengthy process and of course we were all on deadlines. She did her absolute best, was unfailingly courteous (depsite patronising provocation in some cases) but the system was at fault. There were plenty of available staff, indeed one of them managed to put my bag on the tour coach which i fortunately noticed before they departed, but no-one else seemed to be authorised to prepare the accounts. But overall i enjoyed my stay. The staff were friendly, genuinely helpful and the facilities and service (apart from check-out) was excellent.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: お部屋も広く清潔です バスルームもきれいで浴槽があり気持ち良くて何回も入りました 街から少し離れてるけど近くには何軒もお店があるし二時間おきくらいにシャトルバスが出ています レンタル自転車もあるので便利です 朝食も凄く美味しくて従業員のかたもとても親切です

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호텔은 매우 좋았으나 호텔스로 예약한 저의 방은 시내전망이라기 보다 창문 바로 앞에 오래된 건물이 가로막고 있어 방 전체의 공기가 퀘퀘하고 좋지 않았습니다. 햇빛도 전혀 들어오지 않아 하루 머물렀을 뿐인데도 옷들이 눅눅해져서 나올 때 끕끕했어요. 호텔 수영장이나 조식은 좋았지만 제가 머문 방이 워낙에 별로 였어서 나쁘게 기억되네요. 호텔 직원 한 명은 저희에게 매우 불친절하기도 했구요. 위치도 호이안고도시와 자전거 타고 간다면 멀지는 않지만 걸어서 가기에는 썩 가깝지도 않습니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel with helpful staff.. Breakfast was plentiful and delicious

Nơi chúng tôi ở thực sự là khách sạn rose garden, bên cạnh biệt thự golden holiday. Cả hai nơi đều trông đẹp và nằm trên một con phố yên tĩnh. Vị trí là rất tốt, bạn có thể đi ra ngoài và tìm thấy các quán cà phê tốt. Chúng tôi chỉ ở lại 1 đêm ở đó nên không sử dụng nhiều dịch vụ. Một điều không may đã xảy ra là bạn tôi để quên sản phẩm dưỡng da đắt tiền ở đó nhưng nhân viên không tìm thấy. Bên cạnh đó, chúng tôi cảm thấy hài lòng về những thứ khác.
Khách sạn ở rất ổn và sạch sẽ, vị trí gần khu phố cổ. Nếu được sẽ quay lại!
Nhân viên thân thiện và nhiệt tình
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng rộng sạch sẽ. Lần sau quay lại, tôi vẫn sẽ đặt nơi này.
Dịch vụ chu đáo, nhiên viên nhiệt tình
Một ngày nắng đẹp tại phố cổ hội an. Với trải nghiệm dịch vụ hơn cả tuyệt vời cùng với đội ngũ nhân viên tại golden villa. Must try!!!
Tiện nghi phòng sạch sẽ sắp xếp gọn gàng , nhân viên lễ tân - phục vụ chu đáo tận tình dễ thương , đồ ăn sáng ngon tóm lại mình có kỳ nghỉ vui vẻ khi đặt phòng tại đây sẽ quay lại lần sau nữa

Vị trí hơi xa trung tâm phố cổ 1 chút nhưng có thể đi xe đạp được (ks có sẵn xe đạp cho thuê và khá rẻ), nhân viên bên khách sạn nhiệt tình, bể bơi thì sạch. Phòng tuy hơi nhỏ chút nhưng có ban công nên k bị bí. Có bãi đỗ xe oto

Nhân viên của khách sạn rất nhiệt tình, từ anh tiếp viên chào hỏi hướng dẫn gửi đồ, vị trí đỗ xe, đến các bạn lễ tân hỗ trợ check-in sớm khi có phòng sẵn và chia sẻ một số điểm tham quan trong đó có cafe slow.
Nhân viên xinh xắn dễ thương, phòng đẹp. Dịch vụ rất ổn
Nhân viên rất thân thiện, phòng thoáng, sạch sẽ.
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng ốc sạch sẽ thơm tho.
Nơi ở sạch sẽ. Nhân viên dễ thương, thân thiện. Ăn sáng còn ít món quá , , reception tận tình phục vụ , chia sẻ với du khách khi có yêu cầu
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình, chu đáo
Nhân viên thân thiện, dịch vụ đều tốt, sẽ ghé lại lần sau
Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Lần đầu tiên mình ở hội an và mình đã chọn đặt phòng tại đây. Dịch vụ tốt, phòng ốc tiện nghi, gần khu phố cổ đi lại rất tiện! nếu quay lại hội an mình vẫn sẽ chọn ở tại đây.

Với giá tiền như thế, mình thấy phòng rất ổn. Từ vị trí đến trang trí, vệ sinh. Nhưng đồ ăn sáng thì không đa dạng nếu muốn nói là nghèo . Nhân viên lễ tân dễ thương nhân viên phục vụ nhà hàng toàn đứng nói chuyện, chẳng thấy ra dọn bàn gì. Lại nói rất to. Tới lúc mình ăn xong, đứng lên, thấy các bạn ra bưng, mà mặt mày nó buồn không tả được
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ khách hàng chu đáo, service tốt
Nhân viên dễ thương, phòng đẹp view đẹp. Không gian yên tĩnh
Very easy to walk to the old towne. The staff was excellent!! breakfast was individually made to order. You walk over a koi pond to enter the lobby. Small, personal place. I would highly recommend!
De sødeste ansatte på det dejligste sted! servicen var i top, maden god og værelset dejligt. Kan kun anbefales.
3泊しました ホテルというよりもアットホームな感じで ゆっくりできました アメニティは最低限ですが 用意していたので問題なし 201号室でしたが 部屋も広くきちんと清掃されています 旧市街にも近く自転車を貸して頂けるので ホイアンでの行動範囲が広がります 住宅街にあるので最初は迷いますが すぐに慣れました 何よりも スタッフの方皆さんが笑顔で感じがよく なにかと気にかけてくれます
Wonderful place, quiet, friendly service and great breakfast. It s close to the market and i would stay here again. Absolutely no complaints.

Owner spoke english well, helped us plan cooking class, my son excursion and transport to train station. The small pool was clean and inviting. I think it was recently renovated with beautiful wood beams. The rooms were modern, well appointed with nice big bathrooms. The breakfasts were a la carte and copious with fruits, pancakes, yogurt, eggs and bacon. Really very good. It was a ten minute walk to market, the attractions, the river with the lantern boats. Very good quality for the price.
너무 편하게 지내다 왔어요
ホテルに到着次第 オーバーブッキングということで べつのホテルへ連れて行かれました 部屋がグレードアップされることもなく 逆にグレードダウンのホテル ネットで調べたら 価格の安いホテルに移動させられたようです 立地を含め 熟考して決めたホテルに滞在できず 残念でした

The host was super friendly and helpful, and the room was a nice size, but there was drywall falling from the ceiling in the shower and a neighbor dog that was barking constantly at all hours. I got tired of the walk/bike across the bridge into old hoi an.
スタッフがとても親切でフレンドリーでした 部屋も綺麗で ベランダにかわいい椅子があったり素敵でした ホイアン旧市街から若干歩くのが面倒だったのと想像より若干こぢんまりとしていましたが それでもまた泊まりたいと思えるほど接客がよかったです

Rooms are large (we got two connecting room ). The cleanliness is above and beyond. All the staff are very friendly. I highly recommend this villa. Affordable accommodation but with 4star feel to the room.

Bodde her i 4 netter og det var veldig fint. God frokost med mye man kan velge mellom. Det ligger veldig sentralt og man kan gå i ca 10 minutter for å komme inn til byen som er veldig praktisk. De ansatte var veldig imøtekommende og vennlige. Det var veldig vedlikeholdte rom og rent.
Struttura pulita , a pochi passi dal centro . Personale accogliente e disponibile. Colazione discreta . Lo consiglierei .
房間很整潔但廁所有點塞 服務態度很好 地點有點偏 但可以接受 參加左佢個coconut boat and cooking class 好好玩 tour guide 好nice ,但之後有d 肚痾
이번 11일 여행중 가장 쌌지만 가장 만족스러운 호텔. 청결, 수영장, 조식(정말 맛있음!), 친절도 나무랄 구석이 없음. 올드타운 아줌마 걸음으로 걸어서 10분. 하지만 복잡한 다리 건너야 하고 처음 호텔 찾아갈때 골목에 있어 찾기가 좀 어려움. 익숙해지면 괜찬음.

Our room was very good, new, with air conditioning. Nice pool and breakfast prepared by this lovely people. Excellent quite location very near the walking part of hoi an with cafes and restaurants and a mini market nearby. Overall we were very satisfied. Thanks so much

We had such a wonderful stay at this little hotel. The staff are so friendly and helpful, really made us feel like part of the family. The hotel is located in a beautiful local area only minutes walk to the old town.

hotelName: Hoi An Gravel Pool Villa & Spa
userCmt: Gia đình mình có dịp lưu trú ở đây vào đầu tháng villa hoạt động theo hình thức gia đình điều hành. Cả nhà rất thân thiện, từ lễ tân đến cô buồng phòng. Phòng ốc còn rất mới, sạch sẽ và tiện nghi. Hồ bơi rộng rãi và thoáng mát. Ăn sáng thì tạm được theo kiểu 1 tô và 1 ly. Hiện tại khách còn hạn chế nên villa sẽ nâng cấp lên buffet trong thời gian sắp đến khi mình có đóng góp với gia đình. Tuy nhiên, góp ý tí về hồ bơi cần được cải thiện khu ra vào hồ bơi giao với lễ tân cần được bố trí thảm chống trượt và hồ bơi cần trang bị phao cứu sinh hoặc áo phao. Nhìn chung, hài lòng so với giá tiền và sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè về villa này. Một lần nữa xin cảm ơn cả gia đình và mến chúc villa ngày càng đông khách.

hotelName: Hoi An Gravel Pool Villa & Spa
userCmt: Cách phố cổ hơi xa, nhưng ở đây nhìn chung đẹp, ổn trong tầm giá, tivi có đăng kí nextflix cho khách xem thoải mái. Có hồ bơi view đẹp

hotelName: Hoi An Gravel Pool Villa & Spa
userCmt: Chưa lần nào đi vila gặp cảnh chủ nhà gò bó vs khách.chửi khách. Nói nặng nhẹ vs khách. E tới đây là lần đầu cũng như lần cuối. Mong ai đọc đc bài này. Xin né ngay và gấp

hotelName: Hoi An Gravel Pool Villa & Spa
userCmt: Sạch, thoáng mát yên bình

hotelName: Hoi An Gravel Pool Villa & Spa
userCmt: Chủ thái độ, khó chịu với khách. Hay nhắc nhở trong khi khách chưa làm gì hết, tôi muốn đi chơi với tâm trạng thư giãn , thoải mái mà dịch vụ quá tệ . Khuyên các bạn không nên tới đây lưu trú!
Séjour idéal, bien situé à 20 minutes à pied du centre-ville. Personnel très attentionné. À recommander sans aucun doute.
Estuvo muy bien! grans hospitalidad y servicio

Very nice room - comfortable bed, big bathtub, cozy balcony. The homestay is almost like a small hotel. The building and furnishings felt pretty new and in good condition. The staff were friendly but weren t able to give us any good recommendations for restaurants. We wanted to try local food at a local restaurant, and they only recommended morning glory and banh mi phuong which seem to be the two most touristy places to eat in hoi an. We asked if there was anything else they recommend and they just said there are many restaurants nearby but couldn t name one. The internet also stopped working during our stay and the staff just kind of shrugged and said it was working on their devices and they couldn t do anything to fix it. The breakfast was delicious - fresh eggs and bread. Yum! highly recommend staying here but you might want to do your own research on local things to do/places to eat.

It was the best place we stayed at our 3 months travel in asia. All was perfect, exceptionally staff, good food, really beautiful and clean rooms. The place is also really good placed, and you can borrow bicycles and then only 5 min away from the city and 10 from the beach!!! i would deffently go back to this place and recommend it to everyone i know!!! can only say good thinks about this place!!!
Lovely people, lovely place. You are made really welcome at magnolia. Highly recommended.

We loved the friendly atmosphere surrounding this place. We got to meet and chat with a number of members of the family. (i noted they also picked up cues and left people alone who were, unlike us, not interested in engaging). They provided us with lots of useful local information. The location was a good mix of local and tourist oriented development and accommodation, with interesting walks nearby and a free bike. It was about 2.5k from the bridge at the far end of the old city (although closer to its periphery). It was also about 2.5 from cao dai beach. The more distant an bang (sp?) beach is more popular, especially since a storm took lots of the sand from cao dai away. That said, cao dai is still an attractive and, when we were there, much less crowded beach. I would recommend staying well out of the ancient town, while it is a stunning unesco site, as it is very commercial and locals there appeared on the whole to be much more money oriented. We left feeling that this place - magnolia gardens - was really special and hoping to be able to return one day. (nearby - dingo cafe for great western coffee and a chance to find out what is happening in the local expat scene).
Super gastgeber. Toller pool. Fährrader für umsonst.
Toller aufenthalt. Klasse gastgeber
Preis-/leistungsverhältnis ist super mit vielen guten tipps für ausflüge mit dem fahrrad.

Had high hopes after reading the positive reviews. I feel that people have lowered their expectations because this is a homestay and the hosts are nice and attentive. We found most of what they had to say was apologies about what problems existed, which were numerous. Housekeeping only showed up once to clean our room during a 5 day stay, even after we asked multiple people for them to come by. You can tell that they never clean the high parts of the room or anything involving moving furniture, resulting in thick cobwebs and lots of dust. They frequently threw trash into the communal bike baskets. Laundry is double the rate of most other locations and they couldn t provide this service as they did not have a dryer and it was raining (how do they wash towels/sheets?) balcony doors not have a way to open/close once you are outside. Superior rooms do not have a water heater. Even on the day that we were the only people staying in the building, there was no hot water. Shower had poor water pressure. The 4 pool chairs are squished together, rusted, old, and you wouldn t want to sit on them with your bare skin touching. There is only one dining table inside for guests to have breakfast if it rains. They provide a kettle and teapot, but no tea or coffee (even to purchase) despite there being a fully stocked mini bar and snacks. Other thoughtless touches. The owners clearly have no intention to improve upon.

Property becoming run down. Whole place needs a good cleaning. A pleasant welcome but after that not interested. We had breakfast included but they weren t happy about that. No daily bottles of water supplied despite advertising it. A real shame. Our room was large and quite comfortable but again needed cleaning properly. Nice pool but area around quite dirty.

Rating is defo off. The place is clean, cheap and safe etc. The owner/manager is never, never, there. No-one is there actually, but son kids of the family. It s completely a soul-less place. Given that it s cheap, i normally wouldn t complain, but when the cleaning lady who effectively did everything in the house tried to charge me usd 45 for two bottles of water and 2 kg of laundry i just had enough ...
Die familie ist super freundlich. Der zustand der unterkunft war das beste, was wir in vietnam gesehen haben.

We stayed 5 nights here and it could not have been more amazing (i d happily have stayed another 5!). Ngoc and her family are so warm and welcoming you will feel right at home the moment you walk through the door. We had two home made meals while we were there, which were probably the best vietnamese food we had in over 2 weeks travelling in vietnam. Also, our room was fantastic! it was new, very clean and spacious. The outside area has a new pool and is a great area to relax and have breakfast. The (new) free bikes were also a definite plus! we would come back in a heartbeat. We hope you all have a healthy and happy new year! warm regards, nadia and james (nz).
This is a wonderful homestay with a fantastic family. They are extremely service oriented and just super people. The facilities are good and prices are very good.

주인이 직접 운영하는 곳으로서 진심으로 대해주고 정말 친절했습니다. 조식은 간단했지만 먹을 만 했구요. 호이안 시내나 바닷가 까지는 약간 거리가 있어서 택시나 자전거를 이용해야 합니다. 2박 이상인 손님들에게 주인이 접 만든 음식으로 저녁 식사를 대접해 주었는데 음식도 맛있었고 다른 나라에서 온 여행객들과 함께 식사하면서 얘기 나눈 것도 좋은 추억이 되었습니다.

We stayed here for 16 days and did not regret it for one minute. The customer service was amazing and super friendly. We had our anniversary while staying here and they arranged a surprise personalized cake for us. If we had any queries they were always happy to help. It is a little distance from old town but you are provided with free bikes and it is easy to get around the town on them. We will definitely be back as this hotel suited all of our needs!

A pleasure to stay here. Ruby and her family were so friendly, welcoming and helpful. Some distance away from the old town but that was in some ways an advantage. Was given a room upgrade overlooking the pool. I will use this again on my next visit.

Vi har verkligen uppskattat vår tid här hoi an och på magnolia. Det rummet vi valde hade balkong med utsikt mot polen som var perfekt att ta ett morgon dopp i. Magnolia ligger en bit utanför staden men lånar ut cyklar gratis som man kan ta sig runt med. Läget är mycket bra om man vill utforska då det är raka vägen på en gata (ca 2km) till gammal stan och i princip raka vägen på en gata (ca 2km) till stranden, samt en massa annat av restauranger, marknader och dylikt att utforska i närområdet. Området är lugnare än stadskärnan , men fortfarande inte helt dött och man kan få tag på mat å annat fram till runt 22 tiden. Det ingick ingen frukost på detta homestay, men det ligger ett café som erbjuder olika typer av frukost ca 1 minut undan, samt även andra butiker och restauranger, utagsautomat och välbehövliga grejer.
By far this was the best place we have stayed on our travels ruby and her husband ly and their staff made us feel part of their family and couldn t do enough for us

Ruby and her staff were amazing. Did all they could do to make us feel welcome and comfortable. Room was clean and comfortable. Hotel was off the beaten path which took a little to get used to. Getting around was a challenge the first day but got easier the more familiar we got with the area.
We enjoyed our 3-night stay in this hotel from 3 to 6 march thank you ruby and her family!
Hôtel prope, accueil correct, environnement moyen avec un poulailler à proxmilité et un coq qui chnante dès 4 h 15 du matin. Petit déjeuner très moyen. Situé pas trop loin du centre ville.

Hoi an hideaway villa is like home stay, 8 of us in 4 rooms felt at home during our 3 days stayed. Spacious room just like our own room in hometown. Having breakfast and tea break at the pool side were the happy time of the day! thank you ruby and her family!
表通りから１本裏手に入った場所にあり静かな環境 部屋も大きく荷解きしやすく 朝食も毎回選ぶ事が出来るのも良かった 1つだけ不満を言うと 表通りにある看板には２０メートルと記載されていたが 確実に看板からホテルまで４０メートル位はある 夜 空港からタクシーで近くまで来て かなり迷った
Vere quite spot, very clean room and the pool , the ladies are very nice. The only downside is they only provide breakfast, you have to go out to get lunch and dinner
An oasis in the city. A few minutes to walk to the old town of hoi an. Nice room, nice pool. The bathroom is special, the shower is outside. We liked it, but surely not for everybody.

Unbelievably lovely staff in this family-run hotel who would do anything to help. Shortly after arrival we were a bit freaked out by the ground floor semi-outdoor bathroom, and asked to be moved. We were moved asap the next morning to an upstairs room with better bathroom, and our luggage moved for us. Reception also booked us a driver and some tickets at reduced cost, and breakfast options are requested the night before, and made to order at a time of your choice. The hotel is more rustic than the pictures indicate, but makes up for it in the wonderful friendly service and excellent location. Highly recommend.

It is an amazing hotel at a reasonable price. Could improve with better breakfast selection. Overall a great experience and highly recommended. Will definitely stay here again when i come back to hoi an
Wonderful staff, really clean, cockrals wake you in the morning though and breakfast is basic but made fresh each morning.
Lovely pool, quiet area but close to town centre - only 15 minutes walk

Loved the room, breakfast and pool area. Very clean and comfortable. Walking distance to main shops and attractions, but off the beaten path on cam nam island. Only 10 rooms so small and friendly. Main staff ruby and long were brilliant. Would definately go back there again.
처음 호이안에 도착했을때 생각보다 수영장이 너무 작아 실망하고 놀랐습니다. 지내다보니 적응되고 5세아이와 친구들과 갔는데 아이가 놀기에는 풀사이즈가 적당하고 좋았습니다. 국내 작은 민박집 같은 분위기였지만 저렴한 가격대비 나쁘지 않았습니다.
유럽풍 가정식 빌라에요. 패밀리룸 킹침대2대라 5명가족도 충분합니다. 풀빌라처럼 방앞에 바로 공용수영장있어 좋구요. 외국인들이.더 많아 저희에게는 더욱 한적하니 좋았어요
처음 찾아 들어갈 때는 너무 외진 곳에 있어서 무섭고 당황스러웠으나, 일단 들어가서 보니 호텔을 운영하는 가족들이 매우 친절하고, 훌륭한 로컬 음식에, 깨끗한 시설을 보고 놀랐습니다. 저렴한 비용으로 대가족이 머물기에 가성비 갑입니다.

After spending 8 nights at hoi an hideaway villa i cannot recommend it highly enough. The staff were excellent, catered to our every need and made us feel part of the family. The pool is superb and the position perfect, close to everything and yet tucked away in a quiet area. We will definitely stay there again.

We spent 10 days in hoian and stayed here the entire time. Great, quiet location a short 5 minute walk to the markets of old town. Comfy bed. Beautiful large pool, cool air conditioning and a beautiful breakfast made to order. Tien, ha, an and bao are amazing and cannot do enough to make your stay an enjoyable one. Lots of local restaurants and cafes. Great place with great people. We would not hesitate to stay here again and highly recommend it.
Ontzettend lief en behulpzaam personeel
People were friendly, the beds were super friendly and it was quiet (except the roosters starting at 3am)
Do have a country villa setting. Not enough hot water. Facilities are old and worn out. Staffs are friendly. Not worth the stay for the price

The hosts at this villa are beyond amazing! the breakfast is filling and soooo good everyday! you have several selections to choose from and you can also select the time you want breakfast. The cleaner lady was friendly and efficient and so thoughtful. Everyone is there to serve they regard you as part of the family. They go our of their way to make you feel comfortable and welcome. Also they have wonderful scarves, table runners, chopsticks etc at the front desk (at much better prices than the market) the rooms are very large and twin beds pushed together can make for a huge bed. Comfortable beds and pillows. Great showers and balconies off second floor unit. .downstairs units have open air showers - bery cool. Great pool area.
Αρκετά καλό και φιλικο

Hoi an hideaway villa is a wonderful place to stay for a relaxed, comfortable, accessible, and scenic visit to hoi an. Our room was comfortable and clean, and the hotel is spacious and airy with a nice garden and pool. We thoroughly enjoyed the bicycles and delicious breakfast service highly recommend their cao lầu and my quảng. Additionally, the staff is so warm, welcoming, and helpful with local recommendations. We highly recommend your family to stay at hội an hideaway villa. Hội an hideaway villa là một nơi tuyệt vời để lưu trú cho một chuyến tham quan thư giãn, thoải mái, dễ tiếp cận và ngắm cảnh hội an phòng của chúng tôi rất thoải mái và sạch sẽ, và khách sạn có vườn và hồ bơi rất đẹp. Chúng tôi rất thích xe đạp và dịch vụ ăn sáng. Món cao lầu và mỳ quảng của họ rất là ngon. Ngoài ra, các nhân viên rất ấm áp, chào đón và hữu ích. Chúng tôi nghĩ gia đình bạn nên nghỉ tại khách sạn hội an hideway villa.

Increíble la estancia. Las chicas nos ayudaron en todo, nos ayudaron a gestionar el viaje a islas cham, a reservarnos motos, hasta a conseguirme una costurera. La habitación preciosa con un baño enorme. Teníamos tres noches y alargamos una más. El desayuno casero y delicioso. El hotel está andando del centro a 8min y hace evitar el ruido de vehículos por la mañana, pudiendo tener una estancia tranquila.
Friendly service liked
Familia encantadora

Underbar oas ett stenkast från turistcirkusen i gamla stan. Förlängde vår vistelse och hade verkligen avkopplande dagar i den lilla trädgården med poolen. Servicen från den familjedrivna gästhuset var utomordentligt. Gratis cyklar, moped till en låg kostnad.

The rooms were very big, great view of the pool and not a far walk to old town, pubs and resteraunts. The place is a family run villa and every single person was lovely and you could see them stop what they were doing as soon as you entered to greet you. I even came in quite late most nights and had to ring a bell and not an issue or a moan. The breakfast was also lovely and very personal where they take your order the previous night. Room was cleaned every day and i felt very welcome staying here. The only thing i didn t like about the villa was the location at night, it would be absolutely fine if i wasnt a solo traveller though. Its only a 4 minute walk but it s through more of a residential area and it was a bit eerie. There was also 4 dogs who lived in a house near by who would be out on the path at night which was a little intimidating. I would stay again and would just ensure i got a grab back instead. Would just like to add i had no issues what so ever was just how i felt on my own.
Hi all good

The room was nice, clean, spacious, comfortable beds, and nice balcony to the pool. The nicest thing was to have the bikes when we chose to ride into the old city. The place is very quiet and just 5 minutes walking to the old town. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was wonderful with omelet, fresh fruits, and delicious coffee.
とても親切だった
大きな木がある庭 プールと南国情緒たっぷりで 朝食のビュッフェも種類が多いし日替りで変わるので1週間の滞在でしたが 飽きる事なく快適に過ごすことができました 旧市街に隣接しているので とっても便利でした プライスもとてもリーズナブルと思いました
Beautiful place to stay and very wonderful staff there.

Ihana puutarha ja iltaisin hauskat sammakot. Huoneessa siivous ei ollut ihan 4 tähtien tasoa, mutta huonoilla välineilla sitä on vaikea saada. Kylpyhuoneessa suihkun jälkeen koko lattia on märkä. Sänkyt ovat reilun kokoiset. Huono hiuskuivain. Vähän tila matkalaukuille. Enkä keksinyt mihin ripustan kuivumaan uimapuvun ja kylpytäkin. Uimaaltaan vesi näytti samealle, eikä tuntunut ihan puhtaalle. Henkilökunta on super! kiitos paljon heille, varsinkin quynh ja yksi harjoittelija, valitettavasti en muista nimeä. Heidän ansiosta viihtyin hotellissa. Myös pieni savipaja kokeilu oli super!
올드타운 근처 가성비호텔로 전반적으로 양호합니다. 다만 그랩이용시 호텔게이트까지 나가야 하는것이 조금 번거로운거 같아요.

Hotel is within walking distance and very close to the historic area. All the hotel staff (reception, breakfast area, bellman, housekeeping) were super friendly and accommodating. Attended the free pottery class too. The full body vietnamese massage at the in-house spa was good too. Breakfast spread had everything, including some vietnamese staples. Guest room was very clean and well kept. Great value for the price i paid!

The hotel is located right next to hoi an s old town, making it a very convenient place to stay for sightseeing. I booked a superior room with a garden view, but it did not actually have a garden view, and the view was not very good. While it doesn t have a luxurious feel, it s a good hotel if you re choosing based on its location next to the old town.

Stayed for nine days at this property. Great room, great breakfast, service of high quality, all staff very attentive and responsive to my questions and comments. Great laundry service as well. The property is very family friendly. They have courses like cooking and pottery, plus they can arrange day trips to various sights. It is not brand new and it has a few condition issues regarding lighting in stairs at night and other minor issues which i raised and staff duly took note of. I have stayed at far more expensive places that provided neither the service, nor the overall quality of experience hoi an historic hotel does. It s one of the best values for money i ve ever had in more than two decades of my tourism and business travel worldwide. Keep in mind, if you visit during the summer, weather is very hot and humid so you have to hydrate and electrolyte accordingly.

Nice hotel in a beautiful little city. Easy to walk to everything and plenty pf tour options available at the travel desk. Only two minor complaints, a walk in shower would be much nicer than a shower in the bathtub, and in our room at least (161) there was no electrical power point near the kettle. Small items, but noticeable.
Place was perfect, great location.
A very nice hotel with an old style historic atmosphere. The staff is attentive and professional. If you want a hotel with an old time atmosphere then try this hotel.
The historic hotel was very good. The staff was very kind and helpfull
Very nice hotel with beautiful setting and just 5 minutes walk from the old town. Amazing staff!

The hotel is set in its own beautiful park with mature large trees, fountains, rock sculptures - gorgeous. The breakfast buffett had extensive options, all very flavourful. Compliments to the chef. The lobby had an understated peacefulness from an earlier time. The room, although nice blending old and modern, needed some overall maintenance. The air conditioner chilled too well, some lights were not working and the retrofitted tub had water running on the floor no matter how the glass/shower curtain arrangement was positioned - good thing the water pressure was very low..lol with a bit more maintenance, this place would be a jewel in hoi an.

What a fabulous hotel and staff! the service is the best i have ever seen and i am 73 years old and have travelled extensively. The rooms are big and spacious and are cleaned every day. They have a pool, and a spa where i got the best massage ever from a young woman who was fantastic two days in a row. They have a breakfast that is the best i have seen. Eggs made to order, breads, fruits, hot entrees and it s buffet style all you can eat. The town of hoi an is right there and very walkable with a million shops and restaurants. The food everywhere is phenomenal. I highly recommend this !

Our stay here was great!!! the staff are very friendly and welcoming. The location is great, all walking distance they also have bikes you can rent for the day. The pool was great specially during those hot summer days. Overall we enjoy our experience and would love to come back.

El hotel está en inmejorable ubicación con respecto al centro histórico desde donde todo lo puedes hacer caminando. Habitaciones y camas muy confortables. El desayuno variado. Sin duda espero regresar
Very friendly and helpful staff. At a convenience location navigate around hoi an
朝食会場のロケーション が素敵でした
It can be quite noisy in the rooms and the foot options are average. Staff were great the whole time
Great location.
So close to the old town but still nice and quiet
Fantastic location
朝食がバリエーション豊かで美味しかった
朝ご飯は外と中どちらでも食べる事ができておいしかったです 枕は柔らかくふかふかで自分好みでした プールもあり接客も丁寧で機会が有ればまた使いたいと思います
Best place in hoi an
旧市街に近くて便利でした リピート確定です

This old ol style hotel is modernised, has a lovely old style charm and ambience of a resort. Our room (king suite) overlooked the pool area.p and the interior had lovely floorboards. The breakfast buffet was the best we have had in vietnam and even offered vietnamese coffee where you could make your own iced coffee with condensed milk and ice supplied. A change not to see americano coffee on offer which is substandard. I really enjoyed the banana crepes they made. The grounds are also lovely and the gift shop has a few things to offer. Being only a 5 minute walk to the ancient town made this an ideal location.
This hotel is fabulous better than we expected. Especially the beds

This hotel is a gem. Staff very friendly and helpful. Location is excellent. Bed is very comfortable. Pool is nice enjoyed by many guests, best buffet breakfast i experienced in vietnam. Nice selection of food chef to cook eggs to order. Can enjoy breakfast either inside restaurant, outside under cover or outside tables on grass. Extremely enjoyable.

This hotel combines the charm of the past with modern amenities. Our suite included a living room where we hosted the rest of the family for a glass of wine. Breakfast (you can take in the garden, if you wish) is excellent and the staff is very efficient and helpful. Superb pool. Hoi an is an amazing city. The ride on the river with lanterns is fun. My wife and my son had some handmade dresses andcostume, respectively.

Very well received and taken care of! i broke my ankle on site by accident and they were all very supportive and helpful! provided me with a wheelchair, ice, towels, etc. They made sure i was ok and helped me get in the ambulance. I really am grateful to them!
ホテルの敷地内はとても美しく リゾート気分を満喫出来ました もし当地を訪れる機会が有れば ここを利用したいと思います シャワーだけが残念でした

A beautiful hotel in a highly convenient location within walking distances to the historic quarter. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast area is really pleasant and so is the pool area. Our room was spacious and comfortable but i had issues with the bathroom. I think the hotel could benefit from an update in their bathrooms. The hand towel rail was installed in an awkward place and it had also fallen off within minutes of me using the wash basin. There was no shaving mirror even though i can see holes in the wall for it that has been filled in. One could have existed previously. The height and tilt of the shower cannot be adjusted and so water was spraying over my head to the back of the bath tub which then run down the side and flood the bathroom floor. I had to make several complaints to the reception before something was actually done. The maintenance man came and had the cheek to tell me that i have to hold the shower head to wash! eventually, a gadget was installed on the shower head which enabled the tilt of the shower to be adjusted. Apart from that, we had a lovely stay.
Some water smells
Thanks for providing good service and hospitality.
Nice hotel, you can spend some time at the pool, have dinner, go to the gym, has a small store with decent price for souvenirs, etc. Walking distance to main attractions. Recommend!

Vi hadde et fint opphold på hoi an historic! hotellet ligger fint til med kort ganavstand til gamlebyen. Hotellområdet er stort og fint, og maten er helt ok. Vi merket at prisene i cafeen ved bassenget er mye dyrere enn restauranten ved inngangen til hotellet. Det er greit å væe obs på. Rens av klær var også mye dyrere på dette hotellet enn de andre hotellene vi bodde på i thailand. Betjeningen i resepsjonen er veldig hyggelige, og det samme med renholdere/vaktmestere vi møtte på vår vei. Leire-kurset er også verdt å være med på!(gratis aktivitet arrangert av hotellet). Renholdet på hotellet var også bra. Bassenget var alt for varmt, men hver dag kl 12 kom det en bil med enorme isblokker som ble senket i vannet for å få ned temperaturen. Hotellet ligger et stykke fra stranden. Man kan låne håndkler fra hotellet til å bruke på stranden. Ingen sjuttlebuss fra hotell til strand, men det koster ikke mye med en grab.
Best hotel in hoi an

This was an amazing place to stay! people ans staff were very friendly, helpful and warm. Con electric open taxi tour at fixed price stopped at tourist traps (extra ) and stated we were out of time and needed to pay more to complete tour
Great
Good to have a balcony easy to walk into town- 10 mins in a grab to the beach . Excellent breakfast
Bella struttura e buoni servizi da curare un po di più pulizia e manutenzione delle camere.
Fantastic, great staff.

Our stay was fabulous. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast buffet is amazing with many, many food options. If you have the time, take the cooking class. Ling (head chef) is absolutely amazing. She made our stay at this hotel even that much more memorable.
Had a great stay here for two nights. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom were clean. There was a good amount of space. Even the most basic room had a balcony.
朝食が美味しく落ち着いたホテルでした

Hotellet i hoi an lå like ved inngangen til den gamle bydelen, og det er jo hit turistene vil. Vi var svært fornøyd med hoi an historic hotel. Rommet var stort og luftig. Utearealene med basseng holdt høy klasse. Frokosten var glimrende. Fra hotellet var det bare en kort gåtur til den gamle bydelen i hoi an. Jeg vil gjerne anbefale dette hotellet.

Hotel muito bom, super perto do centro histórico de hoi an, dá para fazer tudo andando. Os quartos reformados,espaçosos e tranquilos. Excelente café da manhã , muita variedade. A equipe que trabalha em todo hotel é excelente, super prestativos e atenciosos. Com certeza me hospedaria novamente nesse hotel. Passamos o ano novo no hotel e foi nota 10.excelente jantar e festa de reveillon ! super recomendo .
Great property for visiting hoi an
朝食が美味しかった 緑が多くて癒された スタッフもとても親切

Great authentic hotel, great customer service and good location. Only one point to note, loud speaker, microphone and music in the morning from the school which will wake you up from about 6am. Was extremely loud

The property has lovely grounds and they are all very well kept. The breakfast had lots of choice but on one morning the were many more people than seats. The room we had was spacious and comfortable but a bit dated. The balcony was a bit of a disappointment,quite narrow with only 2 wooden upright chairs, no cushions or table.

エントランスに足を踏み入れると そこにはリラックス 出来る空間が漂っている フロントの人達は とても思いやりを持って接してくれました 部屋はシックでコンパクトですが 必要な物は揃っています 壁に飾って有った数十年前 のホイアンの風景が とてもエコロジーを感じさせてくれました そしていつも眺めていました 朝食もチョイスが豊富で 美味しく頂きました 観光よりホテルに滞在していた事の方が 私達にとって思い出となりました ホテルの皆様 有難う
Un muy bonito hotel. Situado en una zona muy tranquila y buena de hoi an. Excelente servicio y comodidad. Lo recomiendo ampliamente

Spacious and clean room with easy access to pool. The immaculately maintained gardens provided a relaxing and zen experience. Coupled with friendly staff hoi an historic is a great choice to stay for a holiday.
Well located and clean, within easy walking distance of old town. The facilities (e.g. Pool) looked good, but i didn t really use them.
An amazing hotel with the perfect location... Staff were all so polite and friendly... Beautifully appointed rooms.. Would definitely visit again
室内設備は少し古いですが 豪華できれいなホテルでした

The hotel and staff were very nice. Breakfast is served indoors or on a spacious patio. Plenty to choose from including an egg station, lots of fresh fruits and asian options. There is a lovely pool with lots of sun beds but the weather was too cool during our stay and we didn t make use of it. The only negative for us was that we were given a pool view room right above the pool bar/ restaurant that is open until 11 pm. We had been up since 4 am due to our flight in and desperately wanted an early night but a bus tour group were partying loudly at the bar. We asked for a room change and fortunately they were able to move us. There are plenty of tailors on the street if you would like to get a suit, dress, etc. Made, takes just 2-3 days depending what you order.
Jättebra läge och lugnt trots närhet till centrum också bra service och frukost
전반적으로 아주 마음에 들어서 다음 여행때도 꼭 가야겠어요!!

It is a very noisy hotel, our windows would not close tight leaving a gap we used a towel to stuff it, and you def need earplugs. The bed was comfy though. We did find the restaurant pricing a bit steep but plenty of good options outside the property
繁華街から1街区離れますが広い敷地とプールがあり おすすめホテルです
Next to old quarter. Location is perfect.
Staff were excellent

Very charming beautiful hotel, meticulous landscape and locate in the heart of ancient town. Restaurants, coffee shops, tailored clothing shops are everywhere. Pool is wonderful and clean, breakfast is plenty with a lot of choices. Night time is magical with lights and colorful lanterns, so romantic to sit on the boat and travel along the river at night. Will be back again to this hotel. Thanks for wonderful services
We loved it.
Nice hotel, good location. The staff was friendly but didn t have any suggestions when we asked about things to do in the area. The breakfast was great, beautiful to sit outside in the courtyard.

Great location, pool and services for a trip to the hoi an old town night and day markets. The pool with western bar serves as welcome relief to the heat. Perfect for a mini break or short stop in hoi an.
Great place to stay

We enjoyed our time here! the room was comfortable and clean and the staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet had great options of hot food, typical breakfast items, fruit, pastries, and salads.

Nice oasis of comfort and luxury in the heart of the old quarter. Roof top restaurant/bar was a super location for delicious breakfast each morning. Staff was super helpful - saved the day when one of our visa s got held up in the bureaucracy.

Very central location just outside of the old town. Everywhere we needed to go was accessible by walking but if you needed a bike the hotel would provide for free. It was very quiet and the room was clean and comfortable. Very good price for our stay.
Nice and close to old town where there were a lot of choices for dining and shopping
広々としてゆったりできる 場所も便利 ただ壁が薄いのかもしれない 隣のくしゃみやテレビの音が良く聞こえる 隣の方が基本静かで問題は無かったので恵まれた
Dirty and overrated.
Everything was good ckean room with bathtub, friendly and helpful staffs, nice buffet breakfast. Only thing we weren t happy about was that there was no usb charging outlets.
ホイアンの旧市街へのアクセス抜群 街歩きに疲れたら気軽にホテルに戻り休憩出来る 朝食も上品な味付け美味しい お部屋がガーデンサイドではなかったので 学校があるのうで 元気のいい子供の声が朝から響いていたのが難点

This hotel is a lovely colonial style hotel. Its location is perfect being very close and within walking distance to the old town. The food is fabulous especially the breakfast buffet. We left very early on our last day which was too early for breakfast and we were provided with a takeaway breakfast. The staff are so helpful and the massage i had was one of the best ive had in vietnam. We booked a tour to my son through the hotel which was excellent and included a guide, lunch and a boat trip. Would definitely recommend both the hotel and trip.
Recently renovated room, however shower head should be adjustable. Water sprays directly agwinst the door causing water to run across the bathroom floor. Friendly and helpful staff.
Spacious and convenience

Nice pool area, although we couldn t use it due to the weather. We had a ground floor room which was large but a little tired. The hotel is only a few minutes walk from the historic old town centre and many restaurants. Good choices for breakfast, although no orange juice.
Nice quiet hotel in the middle of all the hoi an action. Staff 10/10, great breakfast and fantastic location to experience hoi an.

立地が良く 旧市街へすぐに出かけられる 疲れて戻っていったん休憩したり バインミーを買ってきて部屋のベランダでのんびり食べたりできた 部屋のインテリアや雰囲気など落ち着ていて清潔で 快適に過ごせた お庭もきれいで眺めたり散歩するだけでも気分が良かった 朝食も豊富でいろいろたくさん食べられた お庭で食べるのを楽しみにしていたが あいにくの雨で残念だった スタッフの方も笑顔で親切に対応してくれた このホテルに宿泊して良かったです
전체적으로 만족합니다
It s amazing that this property is so nearby to the ancient town, room is really spacious although might be a bit old school style, but fully functional. We love our stay here.
旧市街の街歩きにはとても便利な場所です スタッフもとても親切でした お部屋のランク次第かもしれませんが お部屋からの景色はいまいち 壁も薄い気がしましたが 利便性考えるなら 絶対的にオススメです
I had a great stay. I booked a massage and it was very good. Pool are is very nice and breakfast outdoors is great.
Highly recommend this hotel for it central position to the nearby historic centre. Especially the staff for their thoughtfulness and being so helpful. Just try it you won t be disappointed
We stayed for little under a week. Had a very good time, and would like to come back. Good breakfast. Easy to get around from the hotell and nice to stay at the pool. Very good wifi
Very friendly and helpful staff. Good location.
Hoi an historic hotel is an oasis of quiet beauty in the heart of hoi an. The gardens and pool area are stunning. The service exceptional. The buffet breakfast excellent.

We are so happy with our 4 night stay in the ancient hoi an hotel. The rooms were clean and big, the pool was huge, beautiful, relaxing and sparkling clean, the cleanest we ve ever seen in a hotel. The breakfast buffet was also like nothing we ve ever seen before. Absolutely delicious and has every possible option available. We wanted to extend our stay because we loved it so much. The courtyard for kids to run around makes it perfect for families as well. The location is also the best, walk everywhere in ancient town, and then just far enough to be quiet at night. We will definitely be back!!
Close to hoi an old town , walking distance . Very friendly helpful staff . Breakfast good , nothing to dislike
Rummet hade mycket dålig allmänbelysning. Någonstans brände man sopor och denna lukt gick i på rummet.

The hotel has a big lovely garden with huge trees. In there, we could have a nice relaxing walking or breakfast or cafe . Anything! staff was friendly and helpful all the time. Room was comfortable but bathroom sink was bit old.

Great service, location and good breakfast selection! we are grateful that we choice it for our hoi a visiting. It just gives us as much comforts as you can expected! especially thanks to the kind lady le thi kieu, she went above and beyond to help us arrange the airport pick up service and activities. Great asset to the hotel

The property was amazing. And as it was a historic hotel, it was very well preserved with little hints of modern touches. However, there was no elevator so for those that have issues taken stairs and things like that, that could be a concern. But the staff was kind and hospitable, and the grounds of the hotel were well kept and the buffet was probably one of the best and tastiest i ve ever seen.
古いホテルですが綺麗で過ごしやすいです 観光スポットやレストランなどにも近く 観光拠点としても申し分ないです
Kỳ nghỉ tốt nhất tôi đã có ở việt nam chắc chắn.
Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình dễ thương. Phòng ở sạch sẽ thơm tho

Homestay concept địa trung hải hấp dẫn ngay từ cái nhìn đầu tiên. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, tiện nghi đầy đủ, sang trọng. Riêng phần decor, thiết kế ánh sáng thì phải nói là cực kỳ hài hòa và rất là chỉnh chu. Rồi hồ bơi trước sân, tranh vẽ mấy chú gấu cực kute trên tường, dọc hành lang, không gian xanh mát ngay giếng trời. Nếu để kể về cảm nhận chắc phải cả trang a4. Cũng không quên gửi lời cảm ơn đến vợ chồng anh chị chủ home, nụ cười hết sức trìu mến, sự nồng nhiệt những người thân trong gia đình. Sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ home khi có dịp ghé hội an!
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ thoáng mát. Tuy nhiên thời gian nhận phòng hơi lâu
Phòng rộng, đẹp. Chỗ cũng không xa trung tâm mà lại còn được mượn xe free. Nói chung là tuyệt
Khi mình đến phòng ko có tivi, phòng đơn giản, bình thường. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình giúp đỡ. Tuy nhiên mình uống nước vẫn bị tính tiền
Phục vụ rất tốt thân thiện sẽ quay lại
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt trừ điều hoà
Nước hoa khử mùi quá hôi tôi không thở nổi.
Chất lượng khá ổn so với giá phòng. Gần phố cổ nên có thể đi xe đạp (free) để ngắm cảnh và chơi đùa. Phục vụ ok hài lòng khách hàng
Phòng mình ở tầng 1, ngay cạnh bể bơi, phòng rộng sạch, giường êm và thơm tho. Mỗi tội bữa sáng hơi nghèo nàn nói chung là rất ổn trong tầm giá

Mình cảm thấy rất tuyệt vời khi ở homestay này. Từ đây ra hội an gần tầm 10 phút đi bộ. Mình ở phòng tầng 1 thoáng mát sạch sẽ. Ở homestay có bể bơi đẹp nước sạch sẽ. Giá cả phải chăng. Nói chung rất oke...
Hơi xa phố cổ một xíu nhưng phòng ốc sạch sẽ, rộng rãi. Có bể bơi sạch sẽ, trẻ con rất thích. Bạn chủ khách sạn nhiệt tình chiều khách. Nhà mình có 2 đêm rất thoải mái. Sẽ quay lại
Cô chủ dễ thương. Phòng rộng, điều hoà mát. Thích nhất là hồ bơi, sạch sẽ và rộng. Bơi lúc nào cung được. Gần trung tâm hội an.
Mình ưng ý cái hồ bơi ghê, hồ nhỏ nên phù hợp cho các bé nghịch nước, nước sạch, phòng sạch, do với mức giá thì quá ổn. Có điều phòng mình có bồn tắm mà lại bị hỏng mất chỗ chặn nước
Phòng rộng thoáng, chủ nhà nhiệt tình
Phòng ốc rộng rãi và mát mẻ, khu phố yên tĩnh, sạch sẽ, ngay gần bến xe hội an, ra biển hay vào phố cổ đều thuận tiện, anh chị chủ và nhân viên rất nhiệt tình. Mình sẽ quay lại lần sau!

Chưa bao giờ mình cảm thấy 1 villa nào làm ăn thiếu chuyên nghiệp như vậy, từ lễ tân cho đến quản lý. Mình điện thoại tới gặp quản lý để giải quyết vấn đề, nhận lại được 1 câu là chỗ chúng tôi không thích khách người việt nên thái độ như vậy đó . Trước khi nói ra như vậy nên suy nghĩ mình là người nước nào đã chứ. Thề sẽ không bao giờ giới thiệu cho bạn bè chứ đừng nói là quay lại.
Lễ tân vui vẻ, nhiệt tình, thân thiện, chu đáo, đặc biệt có xe đạp đi free. Nằm ngoài khu phố cổ 500m nên rất yên tĩnh, không khí sạch sẽ trong lành.
Quá tệ! không có ăn sáng! kinh doanh chụp giật
Một chuyến đi công việc thật tuyệt vời. Chủ nhà rất tuyệt, phụ thu cũng tuyệt vời luôn.

Phòng ở đây như phòng của nhà nghỉ (thiết kế như nhà trọ sinh viên), không tương xứng với tên gọi villa thua xa vài nơi cùng giá tiền tôi từng ở cũng ở hội an. Tường bị bong, đồ trong phòng khá cũ, thiết bị phòng vệ sinh ố vàng và cũng cũ. Đồ dùng cá nhân trong phòng (bàn chải, kem đánh răng, khăn tắm) là đồ của nhà nghỉ. Khăn tắm ố bẩn, và nặng mùi thuốc tẩy. Dù sau đó được đổi nhưng cũng không khá hơn. Trong phòng không có ấm nấu nước, cũng chẳng có ly uống nước. Trong phòng rất nặng mùi thuốc tẩy, có lẽ bốc lên từ chăn gối và ga giường. Bù lại, chỉ có hồ bơi là vớt vát lại được chút cảm tình. Hồ nhỏ, nhưng sạch, bên cạnh có khu ngồi ăn uống ngắm cảnh. Chủ nhà cũng vui vẻ.
- giá rẻ.- gần trung tâm thành phố cổ.- phòng sạch sẽ.- hồ bơi đẹp.

We didn t sleep well here, as the bed was not too comfortable, and the room was rather small. The location is really near the night market and the city center, and the staff even offered to deliver us from our previous hotel, so they were very helpful. We didn t find the breakfast appetizing enough to try it. Also the door is locked after a certain hour, and one needs to ring the bell to get in. The swimming pool looks like an afterthought, i cannot imagine anyone relaxing there. There is a lot of construction in the area too, that woke us up rather early (as did the rooster, but i don t mind that).
位置好 新酒店非常乾淨 酒店職员熱誠 幫忙搬行李 前台職员英文非常好 下次再来 一定再次入住此酒店

This hotel was a great choice! room, pool, breakfast - all excellent. The wifi was fast, which is important to me. It was a short walk to the night market and ancient town but on a quiet street. The free bikes are on the small side, it was hard to adjust the seat for my height (6 ). Also a pretty good rate exchanging usd at the front desk, i couldn t find a better rate.
Relatively good location. Spacious and clean bathroom

This was a great find. Everything was perfect, well, perhaps they could get some newer, lighter bikes -) that are easier to maneuver around town. Breakfast was awesome and the small pool was more than adequate. We liked the hotel so much we stayed an extra night as there were much to see in hoi an. I recommend the majestic villa to anyone looking for a well-managed boutique hotel that is located in a quieter part of town but still is walking distance to the old quarter and night market.
Hotel pulitissimo, ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo e posizione strategica.

Petit déjeuner horrible, bacon du gras mal cuit, mangue immangeable. La piscine en rez de chaussée sur la rue. La chambre très confortable mais pas de store occultant à la fenêtre de la salle de bains, donc réveil à six heures du matin
후기가 별로 없어 고민했는데 결론적으로 good! 벌레 전혀없이 깔끔하게 이용했고 새벽 체크인 협의 후 방문했는데 캐리어도 옮겨주시고 (엘리베이터가 없음) 조식도 깔끔하고 맛있었습니다. 다만 수영장은 마당 내 미니 사이즈이니 참고해주시고, 뷰를 염두에 두신다면 3층 이상이 나을 듯합니다.

Nice clean, comfortable rooms and good quiet location, just a few minutes walk from the old town. Free bikes are a great way to get around. It s lovely to have a pool but it is quite small! the staff were lovely and accommodating, even got a gluten-free birthday cake for one of us. The breakfast menu is a bit limited but the staff did their best to cater to our needs.

We really appreciated the service we got and the help for arranging trips. The owners and staff treated us so well, always smiling and nothing was a bother. If you are not worried about not having all the luxuries of a resort this is the hotel to go to and very close to the old town

De kamer waar we verbleven was super, de bedden zijn heerlijk en de douche is ruim. Het personeel staat áltijd voor je klaar en de gratis fietsen zijn handig om je snel te kunnen verplaatsen. Het oude centrum is echter 5 -10 minuutjes lopen, dus écht nodig heb je ze niet. Ontbijt is ook super. A la carte en onbeperkt. Op de dag van vertrek werd voor ons zelfs een ontbijt to go gemaakt. Super plek!

This has been our favourite stay in vietnam! the rooms were so fresh and clean. Comfortable bed with fresh bedding. The bathroom was modern and had an excellent shower with plenty of hot water. High ceilings. Felt like luxury at an affordable price. The breakfast was amazing with basically all you can eat, cooked upon request with a wide selection of options. Free bike hire. They also offer airport transfers and laundry at a cost. Owner run, very friendly and helpful locals. I could not recommend highly enough!!

This hotel was good value for money, it s about a 5 minute walk to the main touristy area which means easy to drive to on a scooter and it outside the fray while still being very accessible to wherever you want to go. It seems to be family-run and all of the staff were super nice and friendly. We liked it so much, we stayed an extra night.

The facilities were ammaculate, the staff were fantastic, felt like a homestay we were made so welcome the position to old town was great a 2 min walk to everything you would require restaurants, shopping and activities loved it we will be back
フライトの遅延で深夜 午前１時前 のチェックインになりましたが快く迎えていただきました 親切なスタッフの対応 朝食も豪華ではないもののおいしくいただけました 部屋にゴミ箱があれば便利だったと思います 宿泊はシンプルに と考えている人におすすめです

I chose this property when i was unexpectedly required to extend my trip in vietnam. I chose it because of the reviews of comfortable beds and i was not disappointed! beds were very comfortable (soft, rather than very hard which is common in vietnam.) breakfast options were great, all freshly prepared as they see you come for breakfast. The team are wonderful, kind attentive, and even arranged for me to be dropped at the hospital with all my luggage at no cost on my departure day. The hotel is located just by the river and the old town is walkable within a few minutes to see the lantern boats and all the markets and many restaurants to choose from. Thank you all, you made my stay a pleasant one. If i ever find myself in hoi an again...i will be back.
Comfortable place with nice bathroom and showers.

Great place to stay, only reason for the loss of the star was the first room they gave us was very musty and had a bit of mold. They were able to move us. The other thing and expedia really needs to crack on this as we ve encountered this way to many times now. Is the perspective and way shots are taken to make the hotel and rooms seem wayyyy bigger than they are.

This was our favourite hotel in vietnam we ended up extending our stay. The location was perfect, walking distance to the old town, cafes, restaurants, shopping, sight seeing. The staff were so welcoming and helpful, the beds were super comfy and the bathroom/shower was huge! the breakfast was delish and the pool was beautiful - 100 recommend
Excellent service. Confortable propre accueillant. Très bien situé.

Mình mới tới nhận phòng là thích ngay khuôn viên, chưa kể còn được mời món nước dâu ngon xuất sắc, nếu có thêm khăn lạnh lau mặt thì tuyệt vời. Phòng đẹp rộng, tiện nghi, bé mình cực thích hồ bơi và các cô chú phục vụ quá thân thiện. Sẽ quay trở lại với gia đình sớm bò trải nghiệm quá chim ưng.

Tôi có một trải nghiệm rất thú vị tại hoi an memories resort. Resort có thiết kế như một hội an thu nhỏ trong ốc đảo cách biệt lobby hơi nhỏ. Tuy nhiên không gian chung có rất nhiều mảng xanh. Phòng theo thiết kế lifestyle, thoáng và có view sông. Các phòng ở tầng trệt sẽ có 1 không gian vườn nhỏ xinh. Rất chill cho các couple. Hồ bơi infinity view sông rất đẹp, có thể ngắm sunset tại đây. Ăn sáng hiện đang ít lựa chọn nhưng đến hội an thì không nên ăn sáng trong khách sạn không quên nhắc đến sự chuyên nghiệp của bạn lễ tân check in cho tôi và team hội an memories. Đúng như tên resort là memories.. , chắc chắn tôi sẽ quay lại nhiều lần nữa để trãi nghiệm thêm các dịch vụ khác tại đây.
Đồ ăn sáng ngon. Nhân viên thân thiện. Không gian mới, sạch sẽ.
Dịch vụ tuyệt vời ở lễ tân, nhà hàng và dọn phòng.
Khách sạn đẹp, công viên ký ức hội an kế bên quá tuyệt vời. Trãi nghiệm ở đây rất tốt, chỉ có ăn sáng hơi ít món,nhưng nhìn chung là khách sạn đẹp, yên tĩnh, gần phố cổ.
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, lễ tân nhiệt tình thân thiện

Phòng siêu ok. View sông, đối diện công viên ký ức hội an nên xem show xong về rất tiện. Dịch vụ phòng cực kí thích, có welcome drink, được tặng 2c nón lá. Có xe đạp để ra phố cổ. Bữa sáng cũng tuyệt vời

Nhân viên vô cùng hời hợt. Khách đi mưa về khi tới sảnh để về phòng mưa rất to không thể về phòng. Khách nói chuyện với nhau kêu mưa to quá về sẽ ướt. Nhân viên ngồi nhìn và không đưa ra 1 gợi ý sẽ đưa dù mà chỉ nhìn rồi lơ đi. Mãi khi chờ mưa k ngớt khách lại hỏi mượn dù mới làm phiếu kí tên để cho mượn.
Ks đầy đủ tiện ích cần thiết, gần trung tâm. Show ký ức hội an rất hay.

Đi hoian rất nhiều lần, và đây là lần thứ 2 mình ở lại nơi đây. Quan cảnh thú vị, nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện tạo sự thoả mái. Đặc biệt đồ ăn sáng khá hợp vị và đầy đủ âu đến á. Sẽ ghé dịp gần nhất.
Mình thấy bạn quốc, bạn trang lễ tân vui vẻ nhiệt tình, mọi nv ở resort rất dễ thương luôn, chỗ này rất là must try nếu mọi người có ý định đến ở lại nhaaa
Resort yên tĩnh, dịch vụ tốt. Giường đơn chiều ngang hơi hẹp, nằm cứ bị cảm giác quay người là rơi khổ giường
Rất gần phố cổ, xung quanh thoáng mát sạch sẽ yên tĩnh, hồ bơi đẹp, chụp ảnh đẹp, có được mượn xe đạp, qua công viên ký ức và xem mini show miễn phí tuy nhiên bữa sáng hơi ít món.
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời với tôi. Xin cảm ơn
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng đẹp, cơ sở vật chất đẹp.
Tôi rất thích đi dạo xung quanh khu resort và có một chỗ ngồi thiền rất thú vị
Resort rộng và rất đẹp, có nhiều nơi để chụp hình. Mình dắt bé theo được nhân viên hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Buffet chưa phong phú lắm

Nơi này khá xa thành phố chính, đặc biệt là khi bạn phải đi bộ. Nhưng các nhân viên đã tốt bụng để cung cấp cho chúng tôi một chuyến đi miễn phí từ cây cầu của họ đến sảnh đợi. Phòng khách sạn rộng rãi, phòng tắm với bồn tắm rất thú vị và bữa sáng rất ngon. Hoàn toàn đề xuất chương trình impression, giá trị của nó đến từng xu, và chúng tôi thậm chí còn nhận được nó rẻ từ gói phòng.
Nhận phòng trễ, ăn sáng không đa dạng!

Nhân viên thân thiện, cảnh quan đẹp, công viên ký ức đi tối lên đèn đẹp, mới vào có tinh dầu xông phòng thơm, xà phòng tắm hơi cũ, vón cục, phòng mình kế phòng tập kết đồ giặt nên các bạn dọn phòng cứ để xe đồ bít hết cửa ra vào, mở toang cửa phòng giặt nên bất tiện và hơi kém vệ sinh

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thơm tho, thoáng mát. Cô chú chủ home thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Home ngay trung tâm, đi bộ xíu 200m ra phố cổ hội an, sáng ra biển cũng rất gần, cách khoảng 5km.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Khách sạn nằm ở vị trí thuận lợi, yên tĩnh, đi bộ ngắn tí là đến phố cổ. Anh chị chủ nhà gần gũi và thân thiện, tư vấn nhiệt tình, khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi, ngoài ra, khách sạn có hỗ trợ cả phương tiện đưa đón, tài xế lịch sự và rất đúng giờ. Anh chủ có giới thiệu gần khách sạn có quán cơm niêu trông bài trí rất lịch sự, đồ ăn cũng ngon và giá cả phải chăng. P/s gia đình mình có gửi giặt đồ ở khách sạn và cá nhân mình thấy thơm.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Anh chủ thân thiện nhiệt tình. Gần phố cổ đi bộ tầm 10 đổ lại thôi.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Ngay trung tâm phố cổ, tiện lợi trong việc di chuyển tham quan. Anh chủ vui tính, nhiệt tình. Dịp sau nhất định ghé lại đây.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Chill phòng ốc sạch sẽ, ổn áp. Địa điểm thì trung tâm, đi bộ gần nha. Thích thì đi xe xíu thôi à. Anh chủ vui vẻ, nhiệt tình, nhiệt tình từ lúc tiếp đón đến tận lúc rời đi luôn í. Nên ở nha, mình đi cùng gia đình mà gia đình cũng ưng lắm luôn.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Đến với hội an ngày mưa, cô chú chủ home dễ thương cho mình nhận phòng sớm. Gần ngay phố cổ, đi bộ 5 phút là tới, xung quanh nhiều quán ăn. Phòng nhỏ nhưng ấm cúng và tiện nghi, sạch sẽ, có trà, cafe miễn phí. Tuy nhiên cần chăm sữa tắm và dầu gội vì khi mình đến thì đã hết. Cô chú chủ home thân thiện và nhiệt tình chỉ mình đường đi, quán ăn. Quan tâm khách như người trong gia đình. Có dịp ra hội an sẽ quay lại home.

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ. Khuôn viên mát. Vị trí thì sát phố cổ, rất thuận lợi cho việc tham quan. Mọi thứ rất ok

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Chủ homestay sạch sẽ, nhiệt tình, phòng có ban công hướng đông rất xinh và mát, sáng hơi nắng 1 xíu nhưng a chủ có lắp rèm nên ok

hotelName: Hoi An New Life Homestay & Villa
userCmt: Chủ nhà rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, họ còn nuôi một chú chó cưng, nó cũng rất thân thiện. Họ đã giới thiệu cho chúng tôi một số nhà hàng rất ngon! rất khuyến khích bạn ghé thăm nơi này khi đến hội an.

Mọi thứ đều rất thoải mái, phòng sạch sẽ yên tĩnh, thiết kế đẹp, view phòng ra cảnh rất thanh bình. Vị trí hơi xa trung tâm nhưng nếu thuê xe hay có xe riêng thì không vấn đề. Thích hợp cho nhóm bạn hoặc gia đình, cặp đôi đi nghỉ dưỡng cũng rất ok. Bữa sáng hơi ít lựa chọn, chỉ có mỳ quảng và bánh mì omelette.
Nói chung nó khá tốt. Nhân viên cần chuyên nghiệp hơn. Tốt hơn nhiều nếu phòng là tiếng ồn bằng chứng

Ngày đầu check in phòng nhưng cửa bị hỏng nên được chuyển qua phòng khác, view vườn không có gì đặc sắc. Lần đầu mình ở phòng standard thì tất cả đều ok nhưng không có máy nóng lạnh, nếu đi vào mùa đông thì hơi bất tiện. Lần này mình ở phòng deluxe thì nước nóng chỉ có 1 lúc nên phải chờ để có nước nóng lại. Ăn sáng khá ngon miệng, đặt món trước trong số các món ở menu cho lễ tân chứ không phải buffet.
Nội thất cũ và hư, bữa ăn sáng không chỉ duy nhất 1 món mì quảng
Một kì nghỉ tuyệt vời nhờ vào các staff đáng yêu.
View rất đẹp, phục vụ chuyên nghiệp
Đó là một kinh nghiệm tốt đẹp cho tôi để thăm aquarium villa
Hơi khó tìm một chút nhưng thật sự rất đẹp và thoải mái. Nhân viên rất thân thiện. Cảm ơn rất nhiều.
Dịch vụ tốt, nhưng vẫn có mùi hôi trong nhà vệ sinh.

Tôi đã dành kỳ nghỉ của tôi ở đây vào ngày 1 tháng tất cả mọi thứ đã không nhìn tốt với mong đợi của tôi. Khách sạn đã được vận hành trong một vài tuần nên dịch vụ khá tệ. Rất xa phố cổ hội an, chúng tôi mất 10 phút để di chuyển bằng taxi, chi phí khoảng 60k / chiều. Đường bị thu hẹp, rất bẩn khi đi xe máy hoặc xe đạp bể bơi quá sâu để trẻ em bơi vào. Tôi ở trong căn hộ gia đình 32 mét vuông, phòng thiết kế rất rộng và đẹp. Nhưng điều hòa không đủ để làm mát căn phòng. Quá nóng để ngủ ngon mặc dù tôi bật thêm quạt. 5 bữa sáng rất nghèo. Chúng tôi hy vọng có một bữa tiệc buffet cho bữa sáng là cách rất phổ biến khi bạn ở khách sạn. Nhưng ở đây, họ không có đội ngũ bếp để nấu ăn, họ chỉ gọi đồ ăn bên ngoài (mỗi người một món) và không hâm nóng trước khi phục vụ chúng tôi. Khá thất vọng về điểm này. Do vị trí của chúng ở phía đất nước, có quá nhiều muỗi bay xung quanh. Khiến chúng tôi bực mình. Chỉ có ấn tượng tốt là nhân viên tiếp tân. Cô ấy khá tốt bụng và ủng hộ chúng tôi. Tóm lại, với những cơ sở, dịch vụ, địa điểm và giá cả. Chúng tôi có nhiều lựa chọn hơn để chọn phố cổ hội an gần đó.
Phòng rộng, không gian villa thoáng, hồ bơi rộng, ăn sáng ngon, giá rẻ. Sẽ quay lại đây một ngày gần nhất
Xa xa khu phố cổ nhưng dịch vụ rất tốt, khuyên bạn nên ở lại

Ưu điểm hồ bơi và sân vườn tuyệt vời. Phòng sạch sẽ. Bồn tắm đẹp. Ban công đáng yêu. Nhược điểm khăn trải giường thô và khăn trải giường. Điều này thực sự cần phải được cải thiện. Phòng tắm được thiết kế không thông minh trong phòng chúng tôi ở lại (103b hệ thống đèn quá sáng không thoải mái làm bật cả căn phòng vào ban đêm, 203b vị trí xấu của vòi hoa sen khiến cho phòng tắm ướt mỗi khi sử dụng, bồn tắm thoát nước rò rỉ, - không cửa đóng cửa (?!)) khóa cửa không an toàn và không an toàn. Không thể bật / tắt đèn ban công / sân trong các phòng nhưng hệ thống của tòa nhà sẽ được bật lên (?!) ghế hoặc ghế dài được đề nghị trước các phòng nhìn ra sân vườn / sân vườn ở tầng trệt. Hạn chế sự lựa chọn và thậm chí không ngon ăn sáng. Đặc biệt là chuối chuối bánh. Nhân viên cần được đào tạo bài bản để làm việc chuyên nghiệp và mang lại cảm giác tốt hơn.
Khách sạn đẹp, gần làng gốm thanh hà, có thể đạp xe đạp vào phố cổ tuy nhiên đường đang sửa chửa nên không thuận tiện lắm.

Minh book 2 phong huong ho boi tai aquarium, 1 phong tren tang 2 thi rat tot nhung 1 phong tang 1 thi minh không hieu tai sao buoi tối lại có rất nhiều côn trang mà chủ yếu là kiến canh thì phải (cũng hơi phiền). Khách sạn ngay sông nên hay có mùi hơi khó chịu. Còn lại thì nhân vien nhiệt tình, thân thiện, ăn sáng ngon. Nói chung mình không ở phòng có nhiều côn trùng nên cảm thấy khách sạn rất thoải mái. Nhất định có cơ hội sẽ quay lại
Xa bãi biển, chất lượng bữa sáng không tốt.
Hệ thống cách âm tệ, phòng bên cạnh đóng/mở cửa đều nghe rõ, và tôi cực kỳ không thoải mái về vấn đề này. Mỳ quảng ở đây rất ngon, hồ bơi sạch, không khí yên bình.
Tốt lắm. Không có gì nói thêm.
Tot, than thien, sach se nhung hơi xa trung tam
Trừ hệ thống nước yếu và ổ khoá phải chật vật 1 lúc mới khoá được thì mọi thứ đều rất ổn, sẽ lại ghé thăm nơi đây.
Phục vụ kém, nhận phòng trễ 45 phút so vs quy định. Rất nhiều muỗi.
Vị trí villa hơi xa, phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên khá nhiệt tình dễ thương, khuôn viên rộng đẹp! điểm trừ món ăn sáng không ngon.

Điều duy nhất làm tôi hài lòng ở villa này là phòng tương đối sạch sẽ, còn lại mọi thứ tương đối không hài lòng, nhất là lễ tân, chỉ có thiện cảm với bạn gì đó. Tôi và bạn tôi ở đây 2 đêm chỉ dùng 2 chai nước suối, vậy mà lúc trả phòng xuất hiện đâu ra chai nước ngọt đã uống dỡ trong tủ lạnh, tôi cũng lười tranh cãi nên tính tiền luôn. Chưa kể villa tự ý cho người vào dọn dẹp phòng khi tôi không có ở đó, tuy biết là villa có ý tốt nhưng thật sự không hài lòng.

Mình đặt qua tính năng khách sạn giờ chót cộng với code giảm 30 nên nhận phòng 4 người giá siêu rẻ 550k. Ngoài view rộng mát và nhân viên lễ tân cũng được thì hầu như cái gì cũng tệ, phòng tệ, nhiều kiến, thức ăn sáng thì quá ít món và cực dở, lạnh ngắt luôn

Đây là lần đầu tiên tôi viết đánh giá trong tất cả những nơi tôi đã ở khi đặt phòng qua ứng dụng về phòng ở thì sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, hồ bơi sạch sẽ, mát mẻ. Còn có hồ cá đẹp và 1 chú husky, nhưng có 1 vài điều khiến tôi không đánh giá cao tôi đặt phòng trước ngày tôi đến là 3 ngày nhưng không có cuộc điện thoại xác nhận tôi đặt phòng địa chỉ villa không rõ ràng, đến nơi nhưng tôi vẫn không biết đó là aquarium villa không có người hỗ trợ mang hành lý lên phòng có 1 cô lễ tân không nhiệt tình, không tâm lý gì cả, vừa nhận chìa khòa phòng xong là cô ấy nói đặt món ăn sáng cho ngày mai để chuẩn bị, dù gì cũng phải đợi khách lên phòng nghỉ ngơi điểm tâm thật sự rất tệ, mua ở bên ngoài mang vô, không nói ngon hay dở, điều nói đến là nó mất đi sự sang trọng mang tên villa

Chỉ mất 5p đi xe máy vào trung tâm phố cổ. Hồ bơi đẹp. Nhân viên thân thiện. Trang thiết bị hơi cũ, đèn trong phòng bị cháy nhiều. Nếu phòng ở được bảo trì thường xuyên hơn thì đây sẽ là địa điểm tuyệt vời, và có giá cả hợp lý khi đến hội an.

Thực sự ưng ý với aquarium. Cách phố cổ khoảng 1km nên rất tiện di chuyển. Cung đường dẫn tới phố cổ rộng, thoáng và đặc biệt đẹp. Khuôn viên villa rộng, thoáng và đẹp. Bể bơi sạch, không quá nhỏ. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ và tạo cảm giác thư thái. Nói chung mình vô cùng happy với trải nghiệm tại aquarium (nhà tắm đẹp và sang trọng). Điểm trừ là khuôn viên nhiều ruồi, đặc biệt là lúc ăn sáng. Đồ ăn không đặc sắc, cần bổ sung thêm nhiều món và món súp cần nấu đặc hơn. Nếu quay lại hội an chắc chắn sẽ lưu trú ở đây lần nữa
Nhân viên thân thiện, vị trí thuận lợi, đồ ăn ngon, có đầy đủ tiện nghi
Lễ tân dễ thương, ăn sáng ko được ngon lắm, nhưng vẫn đầy đủ mọi thứ. Rất thoải mái. M sẽ quay lại
Villa nhân viên nhẹ nhàng, đồ ăn sáng không ngon

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We enjoyed our stay as we like the location of the hotel. Check in was quick and friendly. Breakfast had a great choice. Our room was spacious, however it looked as though they had been doing renovations in it which were not finished. There were wires hanging from the walls, were the wardrobe was it had a gap with a hole in the wall and we could hear the family with children quite loudly next door. I d stay again but ask for a different room.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 4/16の深夜に4/29-5/1の予約をしました しかし 4/16-4/17で予約が実行されていました.なぜ日付が過去で予約できるのですか

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The staff at the property are all so friendly and helpful, nothing is a problem for them to assist. English translation at front reception is excellent. They assisted us to confirm and book restaurants and grab vehicles. They have bicycles you can use for free. A free shuttle bus into old town for convenience. Breakfasts are well catered for. Property in good location. Have stayed there on two occasions, very good prices, highly recommend it.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: All the staff are very friendly and helpful. Breakfast choices are excellent, asian and continental. Rooms are spacious and well equipped. Free shuttle bus into town, and bike hire. Easy walk to beach.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Very relaxed quiet location, short cab ride to town. Beautiful hotel, very friendly professional staff

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Beautiful hotel. Big nice room. Excellent service. 2 minutes walk to nice beach. We will be back!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 寝る前にシャワーと浴びようとしたときに備え付けのシャンプーが切れていたので フロントに電話して持ってきてもらうよう頼んだらハウスキーパーが帰ったので明日の朝にしてくれと言われた ホテルの対応としてどうかと思う

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The property is well situated close to the beach and easy access to the old city. Bikes are available for free. We walked into town each day, 4 kms and about 75 minutes (we are 60). An ba beach is an easy ride too. The staff are really helpful, lovely people.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Gorgeous views of river. Spacious rooms. Nice pool. Beautiful lawns and places to relax next to the river.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Loved the river view! staff very pleasant and helpful. Location a bit isolated. Restaurant was very good. Didn t have time to use the shuttle service but great that it was available. All drivers were punctual and accommodating.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Staff were amazing and super helpful. Food was great. Our room was a little run down

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Nice hotel in my opinion, spent the most of the time on the nearby beach, but the room had a nice terrace. You could borrow bikes, something we did.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The bar was never staffed but could just have been because it was the of season. The staff were very helpful but the overall property needs some work, it s getting a little tired.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Beautiful hotel with wonderful staff. The room was huge, the bathroom was clean and the resort is so peaceful. There is a free shuttle bus that takes you into town about 4 times a day, the times aren t super convenient but taxis were easy to find and very cheap. The restaurant food wasn t great but go into to town and there are heaps of beautiful restaurants. We loved our stay here and highly recommend.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The resort is in desperate need of some tlc but i think this is reflected in the price you pay. Breakfast is great as long as you arrive by 7, otherwise the food stays for 3 hours and taking a late breakfast is not an option as everything is covered in flies. I arrived 9 45 one day and they had already packed up for true day. Coffee was available though i took an evening trip to the marble mountains and was very angry to spend the first hour of the tour at a shop where owners were aggressively trying to sell you wares. They tried to fob me off with it s a charity weekend but that was not the case, the charity market came later. I subsequently cancelled the following trip, i love buying the nick jacks on offer but this was truly something ekse and made me feel vulnerable. I took some room service the evening before departure and had to send the vanilla ice cream back because it was green. Next thing i know the resauant manager has been called in from his fathers funeral!!!!! to deal with the drama. The poor man was heart broken and i was livid that for the sake of 80 pence the man had been distressed so much. Finally when i came to check out, there were extra charges on my bill for spa treatments that i had already paid in cash directly to the spa, but honestly couldn t be arsed with the battle given the previous evenings debacle so i paid the extra 8. Just about to leave and the receptionist starts going mad about a cup, said i had stolen it but it had been on rs tray!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Close to the beach. Restaurant staff very and attentive. Front counter staff were helpful. Buffet breakfast had a good variety to choose from. Wi fi had its moments. Older building but comfortable.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Hinta/laatusuhde ok mutta ajanpatina näkyy. Tosin korjaajat oli töissä eli ehkäpä muutaman kk päästä kunnossa. Rantaan muutasatametri joka huonossa kunnossa. Pidemmällä etelään(n 1 km) upea ranta. Lähellä paljon pikkuravintoloita, joissa hyvä ruoka.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: かなり古いため少しカビ臭さが気になりました 東南アジアのホテルで良く蚊にさされていましたがこのホテルでは刺されませんでした ベトナムの方々が大方占めていて日本等東アジアの方々は一組しか見ませんでした ホテル前には沢山お店が並んでいて食べるには困りませんでした ウェルカムフルーツがテーブルに置いてましたが 冷蔵庫に入れるか すぐに食べないと蟻がたかってきます 放置していたらすごいことになっていて破棄しました

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Voilà un hôtel que je recommande chaudement. Volonté d avoir une chambre en rdch avec un jardinet respectée, bon emplacement, peu de bruit, personnel dévoué ... Seul inconvénient , l hôtel se fait vieux et une petite retouche serait la bienvenue. Cependant vu le rapport qualité/prix (y compris pour le restaurant de l hôtel plus que raisonnable), je le conseillerais volontiers. À garder dans les bonnes adresses car séjour magique.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Great pool, breakfast, location, and beach access. Bathrooms and towels could be updated. Service was very good.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Hotellet hadde god standard, god service og lå rett ved stranda. De hadde også tilgang til en egen strand hvor man slapp å betale for å benytte solsenger og man fikk gratis håndkle. Det var også gratis shuttlebuss inn til hoi an flere ca hver time, og gratis lån av sykler. Spaet var derimot dyrt og ikke så bra. Drinker og mat utenfor frokost var helt ok, men hadde 3 ganger så høy pris som andre steder.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: A very relaxing hotel situated beside the river. But i think the rooms are old and were renovated, we noticed the difference on each part of the room, its like two small rooms joined together. Free shuttle servce to hoi an town but you have to be there on schedule. I just wish they have a free ride to the beach, although it s just a 5 minutes walk, but considering the weather (it was 35 degrees celsius when we were there) it would be hard if you have a child with you. The breakfast is great, a lot of choices. Staff are very friendly and always smiling. We would love to come back!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We loved this hotel. The rooms were lovely and looked out over the river - and just across the road was the beach. The restaurant had a great selection of food but we choose to eat at the neat little eateries across the road that sell great cocktails for as little as 1.50. One day we borrowed the hotel bicycles and road into the ancient town. Great place
