hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Hotel was a nice staff, free bicycles were great and the breakfast was nice. The rooms were big, but the furniture was a bit tired. Hotel was not as nice as other places we have stayed in vietnam for the same money, but it was nice and a good location near the beach and nice views on the river.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Alt var perfekt unntatt den ene morgen vi ble vekket kl 8.30 og spurt om å få ryddet rommet.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Hotellet ligger flott til mellom elven og stranden. Det tar 2 minutter å gå til stranden der de har en egen plass med solsenger for hotellgjestene. Hotellet har også et avslappende svømmebasseng der solsengene lå halveis ute i vannet. Det beste av alt var servicen, særlig i restauranten. Personalet var alltid imøtekommende og hyggelige, særlig q. Toan som alltid passet godt på gjestene. Maten i restauranten og baren var meget, meget bra og frokosten hadde stort utvalg med frisk frukt, asiatisk og vestlig mat. Det var veldig enkelt å komme seg inn og ut av byen da hotellet kjørte regelmessige, gratis, busser, eller bestilte drosje dersom det var nødvendig.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 家族4人でコネクティングルームの宿泊しました 部屋はリバービューで ヤシの葉が陽を遮り 心地よい風を感じることができ 子供達も大変気に入ったようです 街まではシャトルバスがあり また無料のレンタサイクルもあるので大変便利です ただし オートバイの交通量が多く 動きに慣れるまでは充分に注意が必要です プールは大きくありませんが チェアに寝そべりのんびりとくつろぐことができました

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Bon hotel pour passer qq jours à la plage. Plage à proximité, navette pour la ville ok, personnel sympathique et à votre écoute

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 끄어다이 해변가에 가성비 훌륭한 호텔. Super deluxe 강조망이 훌륭하고 방도 크다 휴양하기 좋다

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The pool surounding grass needed mowing ,makes it look tidy and fresh the staff were excelant as with the weather the location allows for quite relazing time after a visit to the ancient town

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Rigtig fint hotel, der tilbyder shuttel bus til den gamle bydel i hoi ann. Der er ca. 5km derind. Der er en super god brunch buffet om morgenen. Hotellet bærer præg af det hårde omskiftelige vejr. Alt er ikke så pænt som på billederne, men absolut et besøg værd hvis du vil bo lidt væk fra byen.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: プライベートビーチのレストランバーが他のレストランと比べて抜群にセンスがいいです ホテル前にも何軒かレストラン バーもあり ビーチまでも歩いて5分くらいです ホイアンまでの無料シャトルバスも出ていてとても便利です レストランの朝食メニューもすごく充実しており ホテルのスタッフも愛想が良く サービスも徹底していました オーナーとマネージャーもとてもいい方で ホテルのことをとてもよく考えていました いかに滞在客が快適に過ごせるかを常に考えておられるようでした 川沿いの1階に泊まりましたが 眺めが素晴らしく 部屋のテラスからそのままプールに行けました ビーチ沿い 川沿いのホテルは他にも沢山ありますが もうちょっと高いホテルも含め このお値段でこのクオリティは本当に大満足でした クアダイビーチに行く際は是非また泊まりたいと思います

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Big spacious room although in need of refurbishment. The room looked out onto the river which was nice and peaceful. Hotel within easy walking distance to the local beach but unfortunately a lot of this beach had been washed away with recent storms. Swimming pool small and not very inviting as it looked green most of the time.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Helt ok hotell som är ett av de billigare av de dyrare resortställen som finns i området. Massagen på hotellet kan varmt rekommenderas!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The hotel service was excellent. Our checked out time was 5am in order the make it to the airport. I was supprised to see that the staff prepared for us some packages to go breakfast. I thuoght it was a nice gesture since i have not seen any hotel had done this (and i had stayed at hundred hotels before). Great service.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 朝食バイキングがプールサイドで食べれ 施設は古い感じですがリラックスできました 契約いているビーチクラブまで徒歩圏内 市内までのシャトルバスも便利 帰りは相乗りでタクシーで帰ってきました

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The hotel was filled with noisey kids so early in the morning. They were slamming doors and always making noise in the pool. Also the beds were very sandy too. The bathroom is also outdated. But the free shuttle to hoi an ancient town was useful and they offered few bicycle rentals. They also had a discounted shuttle to the airport which was good.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Resort is lacking in amenities. Areas of resort needed cleaning. Had to request numerous times for rubbish to be removed from pool area. Fitness centre consists of broken equipment. Rooms were ok. Reception staff were lovely and always had a smile.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 일단 해변이 엄청 가까워요. 걸어서 5분 정도.. 바로 앞에 강도 흐르고 내부 편의 시설은 괜찮은 편입니다. 사진에서 보는 것과는 다르게 리조트 내부 수영장이 큰 편입니다. 수영장은 아이들이 놀 수 있는 깊이와 어른들이 놀 만한 깊이로 구분되어져 있구요. 수영을하기에는 좁지만 물놀이하기에는 딱 좋은 크기입니다. 시설은 오래 된 편이지만 가성비는 괜찮아요. 공항까지 픽업서비스가 있는데 usd 44로 가격은 나쁘지 않은 것 같습니다만 저는 처음에 도착했을 때 통화가 안돼는 usim을 구매하는 바람에 운전사랑 연락이 안돼서 30분 정도 기다렸어요.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The river beach is a few minutes walk from the beach but once inside the hotel it s very peaceful. The hotel could do with some renovation to make it a bit more modern and the pool area needs a fix up. Wifi was really poor. Don t expect to come here and stream anything (you can barely get emails)! other than that you want to relax around the pool or go to the beach it s ideal.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: For the amount you pay for this hotel, it s excellent value for money. Don t expect chocolates on the pillow but you will find it tidy and the staff are really nice. There was a horrible rubbish smell wafting up through the hallways to the rooms when we first arrived, whether we just got used to it or it dissipated, i m not sure (it wasn t inside the room). Overall we were pleased.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We booked here for 5 nights to telex after a big adventure trip around china and hanoi! it was brilliant!! so relaxing and the area was lovely meaning that you could have food locally nearby or within the hotel. The breakfast was the best we have ever had!!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Das hotel besteht praktisch aus dem alten und neu gebauten hotel. Im alten teil sind die superior zimmer untergebracht, die für den preis völlig in ordnung sind, jedoch alt und renovierungsbedürftig und haben auch keinen blick in den neuen bereich der anlage (bei der buchung war dies irreführend). Der neue bereich beherbergt die lobby, restaurant (in dem auch das frühstück serviert wird), die schöne poolanlage und viele schöne liegebereiche und die außenbar. Frühstück ist sehr gut und reichhaltig mit lokalen und westlichen speisen. Neben dem hotel sind jede menge lokale restaurants, ein minimarkt, massagesalons, zu den landesüblichen preisen. Wobei zu erwähnen ist, dass das hotelrestaurant, verglichen mit westlichen preisen ebenfalls günstig ist. Nach hoi an bietet das hotel einen kostenfreien shuttle an. Ebenso gibt s fahrräder kostenfrei zu nutzung. Der strand ist fussläufig erreichbar, jedoch auf den ersten 300 m durch einen sturm ende 2015 zerstört worden und man muss ein paar meter weiter laufen. Die aufschüttungsmaßnahmen laufen.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We stayed in the older part of the hotel which wasn t as nice as the newer part, but the location was great we borrowed bicycles from the hotel and travelled further afield.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Olde worlde charm. Main building has french colonial influence, my room was in another building away from the main. Entry hall smelt dank and musty. First room faced the road, at a t junction. Sleep was impossible due to traffic s habit of beeping horn to warn other road users of their approach. Requested move to another room, facing river. Much quieter and bigger. Was a little alarmed to see vanity had huge crack in it, inexpertly repaired with silicone, and tile grout was mouldy. Could not connect to wifi despite sitting under wifi router. Had to call desk to get aircon fixed as i could not reach it to adjust it or turn it off and the hand set was not working. As the air con was fixed high up on the wall, the janitor had to use a long pole to turn it off. I had two choices freeze with the air con on, swelter with it off. Final straw was when i ventured out through french doors to balcony and discovered half the hotel appeared not to have a roof. Hoarding had been put up on poolside of building so that this lack was not obvious to pool users or breakfast eaters. I stayed one night, then moved out. Can i please have my money back?

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: A good hotel with a nice location although you do have to make sure you re in the main block not the annex (no wi-fi and lower standard rooms). The grounds are lovely and the views along the river excellent. They offer a shuttle into hoi an which takes about 10/15 minutes and free bikes. The beach that was once 100 yards away has now been eroded by the wave and so you do need to go about 2 miles north where there are great beaches - that s where the bikes come in.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: What do you expect when you book a superior room and it is written room with view and the name of the hotel is river beach hotel? a room with view on the river, instead interesting enough i got a room with street view. I was not able to sleep at all, the street was very noisy with a lot of traffics and cocks, yes cocks. Wifi was not working in the area of the hotel where i was and i needed to wait the day after and the arrival of the manager to talk and have a new room. I spent more than 30 minutes to explain my concern and they were not properly reacting on my complaints. So future bookers, pay attention to what you are booking.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Bra hotell, trevligt belägen vid floden och nära till det som finns kvar av stranden samt ett flertal restauranter. Mycket trevlig och hjälpsam personal och mycket bra frukost. Liten, men trevlig pool. Undvik rum mot gatan, då det är mycket intensiv trafik utanför. Lagom taxiavstånd från centrala hoi an.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 미니바 이용안했는데 이용했다고 비용청구하였음. 수영장 정말작고 썬베드 숫자 너무 부족함 다음엔 안갈꺼임

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Great location, clean, quiet, satisfying breakfast, helpful staff, free bicycle, free shuttle to town, walk to beach. Nothing to complain about. Hoi an town is awesome.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Unfortunately the hotel was booked out by an innerpeace/healing group so despite my initial request of staying in a river view room, we were shoved in a top floor shabby room (broken tiles/no hot water at night/thin dirty ripped curtains) and were unable to swap rooms for first 2 nights but were finally rewarded with a much nicer room for the rest of our stay. Breakfast was overcrowded, staff were non existent at pool bar etc as continually too busy preparing table settings for b fast/lunch/dinner for other 200 guests. Would have preferred to stay elsewhere

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The room smelt moldy and the wi-fi hardly worked. The free breakfast was plentiful and very tasty, and the staff spoke english and were very helpful. A free shuttle bus was provided to take you into the old quarter throughout the day and was a great service.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Great hotel with great staff, beautiful grounds and amazing breakfasts. An upgrade was given without asking and staff could not have been more friendly and helpful with giving advice. The only downside was the availability of the free shuttle, limited trips to town. The upside was free bicycle use. This was just a little hot during this time of the year.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Highly recommend staying, the staff were gorgeous and room were immaculate.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Vi hade en kanontid på riverbeach. Hotellet är lugnt, personalen vänlig, bra mat i restaurangen och stora bekväma familjerum. Poolen var härlig och bjöd på många svalkande dopp. Enda minuset för hotellet är att det är väldigt lyhört. Detta märkte vi först efter några nätter då vi fått grannar vägg i vägg. Minuset för området är att stranden som ligger intill är helt fördärvad av erosion. Inget bad i havet här alltså. Men söker ni ett lugnt hotell på lagom avstånd till hoi an är detta utmärkt.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Beautiful hotel with free shuttle service into the old town where you can get tailor made clothes, shoes, leather belts, bags and much much more. This place is a much see

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Komme seid jahren immer wieder und bin begeistert von dem familiären service und dem freundlichen personal.schade dass der strand durch die natur vom meer so zerstört wurde. Die anlage ist im preis-leistungsverhältnis immer noch gut zu bewerten - wenn auch etwas in die jahre gekommen - ich fühlte mich wie zu hause.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: A estadia foi positiva de um modo geral. Houve um pequeno problema de comunicação com o transfer requisitado a chegada, que foi um pouco desagradável. Contudo os problemas levantamos na recepção do hotel, foram prontamente sanados pelo sr nguyen sinh, cuja simpatia e habilidade conseguiu reverter uma situação negativa em positiva, contribuindo para a nossa boa disposição na estadia de 5 dias no resort.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: God beliggenhet til strand, men 4 km fra sentrum. Nydelig frokost og deilige store rom. Fin utsikt til elven fra både rom og restaurant. Treningsrom (brukbart) for de som ønsker det med basisk maskiner og treningselementer. Går gratis shutte buss til og fra sentrum som gjør avstanden mye kortere. Sykler kan også lånes gratis fra hotellet så lenge en måtte ønske.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Good value hotel, a little bit rundown but with very helpful staff. We had a nice room with great view of the river from our own balcony. It included a separate sleeping area for the kids. Bathroom sorely in need of a make over. The pool was just right for our kids. Breakfast was also just what we required. Lunch was not particularly attractive compared to what was available in hoi an itself.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 오래된 호텔, 1층 식당에서 요리냄새가 화장실 환풍기를 타고 올라와 불쾌. 서랍, 금고 등은 일부 고장 문 바로 밖이 통로인데 유리로된 문엔 일부 커튼이 없어 사생활 보장에 문제.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Room was almost the size of our house and the bathroom was enormous! free shuttle to town and a gentle 2 minute stroll to the beach. Very good restaurants within 30 secs of front lobby.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Fantastic, i really recommend this place. Great and helpful staff.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 사실큰기대를하지않았었는데 전체적으로깨끗하고친절함 강이보이는데크와 예쁜수영장, 워터스파 조식도매우훌륭 ㅡ 베트남전통음식과 래팡카우치즈 망고도 매일나옴. 단, 비치는없다고보는게나을듯 다낭같은백사장은없고그냥바다 옆에호이안비치리조트에도묵었었는데 만족도는여기가더높았음

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 방 깨끗하고 직원 친절하고 조식 훌륭했음. 다낭 호이안에서 6군데 호텔을 거쳤는데 연속 이틀 망고가 나오는 호텔은 여기 뿐이었고, 랩핑카우치즈도 있었음. 강이 보이는 수영장도 좋았음. 호텔에서 환전을 안 해줌. 호텔 정문에서 왼쪽으로 조금만 가면 bao han 식당 우리 입맛에 잘 맞고 가격도 별로 안 비싸고 볶음밥 등의 밥 메뉴를 시키지 않으면 흰쌀밥을 무료로 줌. 디저트로 직접 키운 바나나도 줌. 세 번 가니까 망고 줌.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Valde hotell efter pris och närhet till strand, fördel med pool på hotellet. Fri shuttle bus in till hoi an innebar valmöjligheter mellan kultur, shopping och bad. Även tillgång till billig taxi.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The 2 rooms we stayed in smelt terribly of mould and i would not recommend this hotel to anyone. We could see the mould on the bathroom roof and the aircon was dusty. The beach was washed away in a storm about a year ago, therefore there is no actual beach to walk on, only the foreshore alongside the road. Rooms overlooking the river do have a nice view and the breakfast is good. I was very happy to leave the mouldy room.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Although you have to way a short way it is a great location for the beach and you don t miss a beach view if you are by the river. Beautiful pool and very relaxing.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The view is good....services is good .....the most important is there so many message next to hotel..you can try whatever you want

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 꾸어다이 해변에서 걸어서 2분 정도 거리에 있고 로컬 숍들이 있어서 위치는 좋아요..로컬숍 런더리서비스 맡기면 1키로에 1달러 정도나와요..마사지는 호이안 시내에 화이트로즈 가세요...호텔 옆은 비추요..숙소는 전체적으로 오래된 느낌이지만 깔끔하게 관리하고 있어요...호텔직원들도 친절하고 무료 셔틀이 있어서 좋아요..시간표 줄건데 시간전 10분전에 나가서 기다리셔야 할 거에요..타는 사람이 많음..귀찮으면 택시 불러달라고 하시면 호이안시내까지 7만동 정도 나옵니다. 하프보드는 없어요...2박하면 디너 한번 무료...이것때문에 호텔스닷컴에서 못먹은 저녁값 환불 받았어요..호텔에 메일 보내면 확인은 안하네요 ㅎ 암튼 괜찮은 호텔이에요

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Det var en bra vistelse, men hotellet kunde lagt lite mer tid på det yttre och fixat poolområdet. Helheten var att det var en bra vistelse!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Nothing like the pictures, very minimal service. Run down, over priced in comparison to the condition of the property. Dont do it.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Super skønt sted, lækker morgenmad og søde personaler. Ligger lige ned til en lækker strand og lækre restauranter omkring hotellet. God service og vejledning ved ture.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Dårlig renlighed på værelset. Fandt flere store hårklumper på begge vores badeværelser. Bruserne virkede ikke. Og maden, puha en skuffelse. Bestilte en pizza på hotellets restaurant, og fik serveret en frysepizza, som oven i købet kun lige var varmet til at den blev tøet op. Ved ikke hvordan de kan kalde sig et 4-stjernet hotel (de reklamerer de tydeligt med ellers). Alt i alt passer 2-2.5 stjerne oplevelsen i forhold til prisen. Book et andet hotel, der er bedre til samme pris i hoi an området

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Older hotel for sure. The staff was very nice and accommodating. We had issues with our bathroom and safe but that was easily and quickly fixed. Staff checked on us every day to make sure we did not need anything and provided us with suggestions for our vacations.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 1층 정원 옆 룸을 예약했으나 벌레가 자주 출나와서 불쾌하였음. 매니저에게 통보 시 즉시 2층으로 룸을 교체해 주었음. 노후된 시설이나 관리상태는 양호. 조식은 보통. 수영장은 좋았고 프라이빗 비치는 모두 해변가 식당과 연계되어있음. 호이안 구시가지로 무료 셔틀 운행되어 좋음

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Booked in dec 2017 for a river facing room, two days before we arrive, room location changed, but noticed a group of french tourists were given our room. Party in the next two rooms closest to ours for two nights with approx 12 young men. Complained second night nothing much changed. Booked out of hotel next morning and stayed the rest of our holiday in hoi an in a beautiful hotel. When you go onto a hotel internet site, please be aware, it would appear that that some images are photo shopped. This hotel definitely in need of a make over.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Great view excellent breakfast. We had a booking problem and mr tmi and the lady gm rectified so we all had a win/win. Paul n lynne australia

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 직원은 친절하고 분위기는 편안하였고 주변투어도 접근이 쉬웠지만 시설이 노후 되었다

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: In room wifi is non existent. Hallway of hotel is very dark at night and some area is damp and slippery. Hotel staffs are not helpful nor friendly at all. Building is aged and not recommended.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Das hotel liegt etwa 4 km außerhalb vom stadtzentrum hoi an. Daher sehr ruhig, angehm zu ewigen straßenlärm, außerdem gibt es im umfeld des hotels zahlreiche möglichkeiten für essen und trinken. Bis hin zum strand, wo man ebenfalls in guter atmospäre dem leiblichen wohl frönen kann. Zum stadtzentrum gelangt man entweder mit dem kostenfreien shuttle des hotels, mit dem leihfahrrad oder eben mit dem taxi ( etwa 80.000 vnd ). Das hotel als anlage sehr schön. Mit einem pool, einer bar mit blick auf den fluss. Viel grün und sitzmöglichkeiten. Man sich zurück ziehen oder auch mit leuten zusammen sitzen. Also es sollte für jeden was dabei sein. Das personal, die angestellten sehr freundlich, nett und hilfsbereit. Wer möchte kann alle mahlzeiten im hotel einnehmen. Wir können das frühstück beurteilen. Für vietnamesische verhältnisse recht gut, wenn auch bei 9 tagen aufenthaltsdauer wenig abwechslungsreich. Aber essen ist ja ansichtssache. Ansonsten zimmer war wirklich in ordnung, auch der service und reinigung ohne beanstandung. Das hotel insgesamt macht einen guten eindruck, wenn auch das alter doch schon zu erkennen ist. Somit vielleicht diese oder jene sache problemlos zu reparieren wäre. Trotzdem und fazit - wir haben uns wohlgefühlt. Es war ein schöner aufenthalt....

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 낡은듯하나 은근숙박편하고 괜찮음

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 하프보드 개념이 없음...2박 머물면 1번 디너포함...하프보드 예약은 안하시는게 좋음...물론 호텔스닷컴에서 하프보드 관련해서는 환불 잘 해줌...위치는 꾸어다이 해변 바로 앞네 있고 주변에 로컬샵들 많고 시장도 하나 있음..투숙객 대부분이 서양인....가끔 중국 단체 오는데 아주 시끄러움..그 외엔 호텔이 오래된 것 빼고 좋았음...단 와이파이가 잘 안터지는건 시급히 개선해야 함..

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We were downgraded to a smaller room, but it had a river view balcony and we were given the difference in usd to spend at the hotel. Unfortunately they didn t put this on our check-in paperwork so there were issues at check-out time. Overall its a great hotel in a great position near the beach and you can use the free bicycles to ride to hoi an town. The staff were very friendly but sometimes easily confused

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We loved our stay at this hotel. Kids loved the view and pool. Organised free taxis into hoian when bus wasn t running which was so good. Hotel was clean, staff were excellent, bathrooms need updating as bath/showers are a bit difficult. Rooms are rustic but nice. We would stay here again. Food was very good.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Det første som møtte oss da vi kom inn på rommet vårt var en salamander som datt ned i hodet vårt. Rommet er meget gammelt, og trenger oppussing. Bassengområdet og hagen er veldig fin, men det var mange barn der, så det passer ikke så godt for voksne som bare vil slappe av. Hotellet ligger rett ved stranden. Servicen var god.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: ダナンより シャトルバスがなく タクシーで行くしかない 寝具が 臭くて 眠れない なにの臭いかは わからないが奇妙なこと スタッフも いまいち

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The hotel staff couldn t have been nicer the location serene.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Great location and staff.we had a riverview room (recommended) and were mostly pleased with our stay. We stayed for 8 days and rate the stay 3/5. We would rate the hotel 5/5 for quality and value but for the fact that for 3 nights we endured awful music and speeches via tannoy in the evening around the pool and lawn areas to accommodate an amway vietnam convention and 2 private parties, all of which deprived other hotel guests (holiday makers and tourists)of amenities they have paid for. The hotel is not large enough to accommodate both!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Fint hotel med god service lige ved stranden og floden. God mad i restauranten

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Hvad indeholder 3 1/2 stjerne hoteller? dette hotel har flere flotte billeder af stedet end stedet tilbyder. Sengene var gode men det var også forventet. Dyr og hammer elendig massage, ingen engelsktalende personale, forvirring i receptionen og i restauranten ved henvendelse, ringe brusebad uden varmt vand, osv. Osv. Kan ikke anbefales i forhold til hvad andre tætliggende hoteller og hostels tilbyder!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The hotel has a superb location on the riverside with very nice garden area. It s looking a bit tired and we were initially allocated a room (junior suite) overlooking the road with a large terraced area containing 2 scruffy sun loungers (one broken). This balcony area had no shelter (a problem since it rained most days) no wifi in the room (as advertised) so informed reception who said they d fix it. After 3 days of chasing the wifi resolution we asked for a room change, which we did - to a much better garden room. Breakfast quality and service was poor.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: お料理が美味しかった 朝からフォーやホワイトローズが食べれるビュッフェは気が利いていました 小ぶりだけどプールは小学生が十分楽しめたし 海も歩いて5分くらいのところに契約のカフェがあって十分なサービスでした

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We have been staying in the hotel for 3 nights. The environment in the hotel is quite nice, quiet and relaxing, though there s not much facilities. However, the bathroom are quite old, and the soundproof is really bad. We can hear clearly the people chatting in the next rooms. The shuttle bus schedule going to ancient town is not too frequent, there s only 1 shuttle schedule in the morning section departed at 9 sharp. It would be better to have one more shuttle in the morning section say at around 11.

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 수영장 좋았어여

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 酒店的服务真真值得五星级的 这个值得大大赞一个 大家对这个酒店的服务很满意 环境很好 位置不错 在酒店可以慢生活 是个度假的好地方 外出吃东西还算是方便的 去会安古城打的也不远 前台帮叫车 很方便 离海边很近 酒店在河边 风景太好 拍了好多在酒店的照片 小孩子和老人都喜欢得不行 值得推荐 要说唯一的不足 就是酒店wifi有十几个 但是没有一个是好用的 信号不强 时有是无

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: Very relaxing time hotel was good a little tired outside but large clean rooms

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: 객실이 안락하고 편안했으나 베개에 화장이 묻어잇는 부분이 아쉬웠음 다만 이점을 제외하고 직원,서비스,리조트,조식당 모두 매우매우 만족스러움

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: We stayed 2 nights at river beach r r. We were all happy and enjoyed our time there. Clean room. Nice view (our bancony is on the 2nd floor and face the river which is very clean with green trees on both sides...). Besides, we love the food here best in comparison with the other reataurants we visited in the city and beach. Also, the price is really reasonable. We often have both lunch and dinner here by the river. Even in welknown restaurants (such as tripadviser-recoomended ones) can not served the fresh and dilicious food like in the cyclo restaurant of this river beach. You should try and will not regret about this! you should come and enjoy!

hotelName: Hoi An River Beach Resort and Residences
userCmt: The staff are all brilliant, very helpful and friendly, nothing is too much trouble for them and they go the extra mile to make your stay a brilliant one. Good size and well equipped rooms, we had a rver view room where you can watch the comings and goings of the boats, plus the birdlife. About one minute to the nearest beach with restaurants and sunbeds, or you can use the beds and pool at the hotel, there is also a bar for cocktails etc. The grounds are very well kept, with lovely flowers and planting. Breakfast is excellent, lots of hot food, fruit, salad, cereals and toast/buns, all are replenished regularly. There is a free shuttle bus to hoi an 5 times a day, or you can use the free bike hire to explore the surrounding areas. Shops and restaurants all very close by, but the nearest atm is about 2km away, (may change soon). We stayed for 1 month and had a fantastic time, definitely return next year.

Vị trí thuận lợi cho dạo phố cổ đêm, di chuyển qua các điểm nổi tiếng, quán ăn nên đi bằng xe đạp. Phòng city view mà mở cửa ra là nguyên bãi rác, bãi phế liệu, có ng nằm võng dưới hướng lên phòng cả ngày k dám kéo rèm ban công. Ban công cũng cũ dơ. Tiện ích phòng k đầy đủ, mượn bàn ủi từ 7h tối mà lễ tân báo 7h30 sáng mới có. Trong khi đáng nhẽ mỗi phòng phải có 1 bàn ủi hoặc ít ra phải có sẵn để khách mượn. Thuê phòng để tiện dạo sáng, mà 6h đã dậy ngồi chờ hơn 7h30 mới mượn đc bàn ủi, chuẩn bị xong thì trưa nắng lên đỉnh đầu mất rồi. Rất là chán. Giá phòng cao so với chất lượng phòng.
Khách sạn ở vị trí rất thuận tiện. Ngay gần phố cổ và các điểm tham quan. Nhân viên chu đáo và nhiệt tình
Đó là một nơi tốt nhưng có công trình xây dựng gần tòa nhà và ở đó họ bắt đầu làm việc từ 7 giờ sáng nên rất ồn ào.

Villa chào đón tôi vào buổi chiều muộn. Bé tiếp tân quá ư dễ thương . Phòng tôi nằm ngay phía bên hông quầy tiếp tân nên rất thuận tiện để di chuyển hành lý vô phòng. Trời vừa tối thì đổ mưa nên tới 20 giờ chúng tôi mới ra khỏi phòng đi loanh quanh khu phố cổ. Vị trí villa rất thuận tiện cho việc đi ăn uống, dạo phố hay đi nhà thờ cũng rất gần. Tôi chỉ ở lại 1 đêm nhưng trải nghiệm khá tốt. Buổi tối có nhờ cô chú lễ tân ở đó đôi chút nhưng họ không nề hà gì (dù trời đang mưa). Thậm chí ngày hôm sau chúng tôi trả phòng nhưng chưa rời đi, gửi lại hành lý thoải mái, thậm chí có phòng vệ sinh riêng ở ngoài để thay đồ và tắm rửa . Dĩ nhiên bạn vẫn phải trả phòng lúc 12 giờ như các nơi lưu trú khác. 1 trải nghiệm lưu trú đẹp. Chắc chắn sẽ trở lại nếu có dịp.
Khách sạn này tốt nhất. Tốt. Nếu tôi đến hội an, tôi sẽ muốn sử dụng khách sạn này một lần nữa. Muốn
Vị trí rất gần phố cổ dịch vụ, nhân viên vui vẽ, nhiệt tình nhìn chung giá cả khá cao hơn so với chất lượng phòng phù hợp cho ai muốn ở gần phố cổ
Các nhân viên thân thiện và nhiệt tình.
Ks rất sạch, nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, gần chợ đêm nên rất thuận tiện.
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ. Ngay trung tâm rất tiện ích
Cô chủ thân thiện và khá nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách hàng. Phòng cũng sạch sẽ đó
Vị trí thuận tiện, dễ di chuyển đến các điểm, cô chú rất thân thiện, cơ sở vật chất hơi cũ nhưng mình chỉ ở tạm 1 đêm nên thấy vẫn ổn
Phòng rất sạch sẽ ạ, cũng có các đồ cần thiết, vị trí cũng gần phố cổ. Nhưng mà nhiều thông tin các điểm bên tiếp tân còn hạn chế
Hotel rất ổn nha. Phòng có mùi tinh dầu sả chanh dễ chịu. Vị trí ngay cạnh phố cổ đi lại thuận tiện, cô chú chủ hotel rất vui tính thân thiện. Giá cả hợp lý. Nên ở ạ.
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, lễ tân dễ thương, gần chùa cầu, nói chung giá cả hợp lí, đi lại dễ dàng
Phòng tạm được, nhưng nằm trong phố cổ nên tiện để đi chơi.

Gần chợ đêm, nhưng khách sạn này khá yên tĩnh. Ngay cả khách sạn nhỏ. Và khách sạn rất đẹp. Chủ nhà thân thiện, giúp đỡ tôi và hướng dẫn những nơi cần khám phá. Gần atm, gần nhà hàng halal. Phía sau. Có thể nhìn thấy sông. Nên chọn ban công.
Khánh sạn đang sửa nên bụi nhiều lễ tân cần quan tâm cải thiện nghiệp vụ khách sạn để chuyên nghiệp hơn. Cô chủ và chú bảo vệ buổi tối nhiệt tình dễ thương.
Vị trí của hotel khá là ổn. Đi bộ tầm 4-5 là ra phố cổ rồi. Bên cạnh còn có quán bánh xèo sông hoài khá ngon. Chị lễ tân nhiệt tình, phòng thì khá là sạch sẽ, tiện nghi cơ bản đầy đủ,
Lần tới khi đến hội an, tôi muốn ở lại đây lần nữa.
Vị trí rất gần phố cổ hội an. Phòng sạch sẽ, chủ nhà rất thân thiện.
Magnifico hotel, personale gentilissimo, colazione strepitosa e camere comode e spaziose.

Friendly and helpful welcoming staff. We also really like that be could rent bicycles for free. Breakfast was not the best. It seemed like both mornings our food was cold. The room was very nice and a great value for the money.

L hôtel est très vieilli pas mal de fuite dans la chambre peut être que nous n avons pas la chance pour notre chambre au tour le la piscine des bouts de bois et clou dépassé dangereux pour les enfants nous sommes partis avant la fin de notre séjours

I stayed here before in march and despite my room being double booked the manager made suitable arrangements for me. I arrived again on 19 dec 2019 and what was apparent was there was a lack of leadership. There was no obvious capable person in charge and english speaking was quite poor. For the first two days, i advised reception 4 times about their being no hot water and no water pressure for my family to shower in comfort. Of course the staff were apologetic and kept telling me 5 minutes , 5 minutes . It was hours until the problem was resolved on the first day and then we had the same problem the next day. When i came to check out there was confusion over my expedia booking and staff were having a problem recognising my booking number. They got there in the end. On the dry days the cushions weren t put out in the sun loungers by the pool attendant. The exteria of the building needs some wood treatment and is looking a bit tired. The breakfast staff were the same as before and the breakfast was adequate. I write this review because i fear that if the owner does not appoint an efficient and capable manager quickly who knows about the complete running of a hotel business, then i cannot see the villa/hotel giving a good return on investment. There won t be the repeat customers and a few bad reviews will be damaging. The young vietnamese woman on the desk some days was very sweet and pleasant. All the male members of staff didn t appear to know what they were doing.

As always in vietnam, staff helpful and courteous. A reasonable walki nto the old city, but free pushbikes available. Great pool comfortable room with view of pool and river. Palm trees outside our window made a perfect setting

칫솔모가 새것 같지 않음.(다시 사용하는듯) 부가세 포함 약11만원 지불한 호텔 아침식사 매일 똑같고 형편 없음 세면대 밑으로 물이셈 .tv는 안나옴.사워기 호수느 덜렁 덜렁 수건에는 냄새나고 욕조와 세면대는 누런 물때 오버부킹으로 프론트는 자주 싸는 장면 연출. 저도 오버 부킹으로 다른 호텔에서 하루 자고 다시 이리옴 저도 이용후기 보고 왔는데 영 아닙니다. 좋은 리뷰 작성 해달라고 구걸함 이호텔하고는 상관 없지만 안방비치에서 페러셀일링 둘이서 10분에 4만원 타는데 2분 한바퀴 타고 내림 한국사람 다 당하고 있음 돈 달라고 하니 못 들은척! 끝까지 따지니 돈 백사장에 집어 던짐 한국사람 합심해서 다 받아냄! 조심하세요! 한바퀴는 작게.크게 기준이 어려우니 시간으로 약속하세요! 결론! 위 호텔은 가지 마세요!

Amazing place, especially room 304 on rhe top corner. Quiet, clean, grest shower and bath in room, nice breakfast but pretty basic. Massage available downstairs for very resonable price. 30 min slow walk to town, 1 hour to the coconut boats, free use of bikes if you fancy riding. Hotel can organise local trips and airport transfers for good price as well. Very happy with our stay and would do this again.

Excellent hotel, the manager and his family are caring, thoughtful and extremely accommodating. Hotel itself is lovely, we really admired the stunning wooden panelling and detail, and plantation-style setting among the rice paddies. It has a gorgeous pool, each room is beautiful with comfortable beds and huge bathtubs (excellent after a rainy day out!) we enjoyed the breakfast every day. The hotel is around 2km from the old town, we walked many times, and a cab ride was only aud 1.50. Would definately stay here again, highly recommend this hotel. 5 stars

The property and rooms are beautiful. We had a family room, which was actually two rooms separated by a door with two very large twin beds in one room and a queen bed in the other. Ithe beds were very comfortable. Everything was immaculate. The staff, especially mr. River, could not have been more helpful. He answered our multitude of questions and was extremely responsive and helpful. All of the staff were friendly, eager to help, and very available. The hotel was a welcome reprieve from the craziness of old town, and we looked forward to returning here at the end of the day. Thank you so much for a fabulous day. So far this is our favorite place we have stayed in vietnam.
酒店外觀美麗 古色古香 房間在canteen旁邊 很嘈 即使拉上窗簾也感覺沒有私隱 廁所比想像中寬敞 可浸浴 但淋浴水力不足 有露台 但被安排在一樓 無法享受風景

We planned to stay a week..... And stayed two! absolutely amazing place. Amazing staff. Beautiful surroundings. Great room service. Clean rooms. However- breakfast was meh! too repetitive apart from that. It s the best place in hioan.

Had a good 3 day stay at the river palms. Staff are a bit shy because their english isnt so good so are probably abit gun shy but if you make the effort they are a great group that tries hard to please. Its a smaller hotel so choice for breakfast is limited but we never had a problem with freshness or ample variety. Easy walking distance to ancient town. Beware of traffic on this main road can be overwhelming starting early in the morning. Also the roosters next door start early at about 4 am and they put their dog out in the middle of the night every night and he barks incessently for over an hour. I actually felt sorry for the poor thing. None of this is the hotels fault but it is worth noting if you are looking for peace and quiet. The hotel and grounds are kept very clean and rooms are ample size. The rooms could use a box of tissues, the tub is not anchored down so you have to be extremely careful you dont tip the whole thing over if you get in. I think someone must have grabbed for their life as the towel rack is hanging pulled out of the wall and so towels are always placed on the bed. Lighting could use a bit more intensity in the bathroom - fairly dark in there.

The hotel was lovely, the staff were friendly and helpful and the food was amazing. Breakfasts were very good. Reception staff assisted with tours, taxi s and my trip from the airport as well as my trip to dalat. The hotel was a little out of town but just a couple of dollars by taxi, so the surrounds of the hotel were quiet and lush.
Great hotel, very accommodating staff. They upgraded my room so i could be on a higher floor. Breakfast was okay.

We had a great stay at this hotel. The staff were so friendly and helpful. We stayed in two rooms as our room wasn t quite ready when we arrive so we were upgraded overnight and happy to move in the morning. Both rooms were both beautiful. Bed very very comfortable. We would certainly stay here again.
Tolles hotel- super pool. Tolles frühstücksbuffet, sehr freundliches, immer hilfsbereites personal! kostenlose fahrräder in gutem zustand!
Room - spacious, clean, comfortable staff - friendly, easy-going, helpful location - convenient

Little oasis. Staff was welcoming, friendly and always ready to help. We were offered a u upgrade. We did upgrade as the extra was worth it for the view. I would book this hotel again and have no hesitation in recommending

The room with the balcony and the decorations is ancient antique .the villa is quiet and peaceful,location is good not far from the town,just 10min of cycling.the staff are friendly,especially the staff name hana with great smilling face and great service.recommended this place to stay.
Great hotel and nice staff. Very clean rooms

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 조용하고 안락함. 식사도 맛있음.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Our stay at the rosemary hoi a was nothing short of amazing. Front of house, phuong was the most accommodating and accessible hotel manager we have ever encountered. And her staff were all outstanding. Nice pool, clean quiet rooms, comprehensive breakfast menu and nice lunch and dinner menu. Highly recommend this hotel if you are staying in hoi an.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Sehr angenehm, gutes frühstück, es wurde sich gut um uns gekümmert

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff is fantastic/ food was really good . Breakfast had much to choose from . Pool area was beautiful.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Wonderful stay here with my partner. The hotel is clean, well kept, great staff. The shuttle to and from hoi an city is just great. The rental bikes are a bonus, my partner i loved biking around the city. The breakfast buffet was insane and just so many option to choose from. Thank you rosemary for taking such great care of us.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Out of our whole vietnam trip, this hotel was definitely our favourite. The beds were extremely comfortable and made us feel like we were in our own bedrooms. The food was splendid, with endless choices for breakfast. The staff were so friendly and helpful, always making conversations with us and making us feel very welcomed. Not a single staff made us feel un-welcomed, they were all equally really kind. Neatness is one of our top priority, and this hotel definitely ticked all the boxes. Honestly wouldn t hesitate to book again!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 일단 처음 리셉션 하던 미아양이 나의 실수로 룸을 잘못 예약했음을 말고 문제 해결을 위해 룸 멉그레이드에 감사했어요! 그리고 다음 날 일정을 묻더니 내가 다음 날 오후에 다낭 공항으로 갈꺼라고 했더니, 전 날 다낭에서 그 곳 호텔까지의 그랩 경비를 물은 후에 비슷하게 맞추이 주어 공항까지 저렴하게 잘 가도록 예약해준 것 감사해요! 조식 식사도 만족스러었고요, 시설도 좋았어요! 단지 욕조 시설에 남자 면도기가 없어서 당황했어요! 그리고 다음날 수지 양이 미소지역과 선셋크루즈 예약과 호텔 맛사지를 예약해주어 편안히 시간을 보낼 수 있었어요! 모두들 김사합니다!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: スタッフの方が親切でした 部屋も清潔で居心地が良かったです お掃除も丁寧にされていましたが トイレットペーパーの補充が必要されていなかったことが残念 日本人がほとんどいなかったので かえって良かった プールに監視係のような方が配置されていたらよかったかなー 他の宿泊者の方のマナーが気になりました また来たいです( - )

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 다양한 써비스에 만족 하고 정말 친절 합니다. 직원분가족이 한국에서 공부 중이라 그런지 한국에 관심도 많고 친절 합니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel is amazing, beautiful decor, clean, great service.. Breakfast is decent considering its hoi an.. My daughter slipped and hurt herself in the pool because of slippery tiles they use have razor sharp edges, becareful. Ordered a cocktail and within 2 sips a fly fell in, they didn t seem to care at all - must be the norm here.. Be vigilant with your food peeps. Was hard to catch a taxi back to hotel from old town cause the trip was too short (2kms), only about 40k vnd.. Overall a good stay.. I won t be back to hoi an though- overpriced, overcrowded, tourist trap with scammers about.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 올드타운에서 거리가 있지만 그랩도 잘 집히고 호텔내 셔틀버스가 있어서 괜찮았습니다. 직원이 매우 친절해서 좋습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 我選了家庭房 有三張床 仔女很开心 有自己的床及浴室 我就覺得主人房小了一点 但房間很靚很乾淨 仔女很滿意個泳池 雖不算大 但勝在有bb池及人不算多 有免費車去古城及沙灘 早餐食物剛好 職員很有善 以这價錢超值

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 酒店整體很整潔 游泳池很好亦會提供毛巾 房間舒適 浴室浴缸很大 不過房間的隔音比較差 晚上走廊比較嘈雜

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Value for money however limited space in room, restaurant, lobby etc crowded hotel good staff, gentle and helpful

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 부모님 결혼기념일이라 요청드렸는데 너무 좋아하셧어요 세세한 부분까지 신경써주셔서 너무 감사합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 직원들도 친절하고 수영장도 이뻐요 호텔 조식이 정말 맛있습니당!!! 방도 쾌적하고 깔끔해요ㅎㅎ emily and sandy and gloria were helpful and friendly. Thank you

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 방이 넓고 수영장이 있어서 좋았어요 룸서비스에 피자가 맛있었구요 에밀리가 친절했어요 화쥐뫈 마쥐뫅에 뤼뷰쓔뉸고술 광요해숴 조쿰구뢧쒀요 뫄솨쥐는 요귀숴봗눈궈줭뫌뷔츄훼요 셔틀이있어서 올드타운 가기도 편해요

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 킹스위트룸 이용했어요. 전반적으로 깨끗하고 좋아요. 올드타운이랑 살짝 거리가 있지만 호텔 무료셔틀도 있고 그랩 이용하면 편도 3만 4만동정도 나와요.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Location ok staffs friendly room clean facilities is good

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great service, good breakfast, would go back there!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 숙박 시설 아주 좋았어요..방청결도도 너무 좋았습니다.. 셔틀버스가 운행되어 안방비치나 올드타운으로 나가기도 쉬웠어요..리셉션 직원포함 모두 친절했지만 특히 글로리아씨 엄지척! 조식먹을때도 세세하게 살펴주고 체크아웃하는 순간까지 섬세하게 살펴주셔서 감사했습니다..가격모든면에서 아주 훌륭합니다 재방문 의사1000

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It s near to the night market, which is very interesting.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호텔 앞쪽이 좁고 뒤가 긴 스타일이라 처음 들어설때는 실망할 수 있다. 하지만 시간이 지날수록 선택을 잘했다는 생각이 들고 다시 오고 싶은 곳이다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: スタッフの皆さんはとてもフレンドリーでした 是非また滞在したいです ホテルの雰囲気は最高です ロケーションも旧市街までシャトルバスで5分程度 非常に便利です 無料で自転車が借りれるので自由に動けて便利でした

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Oppholdet var veldig bra. Hyggelige og hjelpsomme ansatte. Rene rom. Og god, variert frokost. Greit med gratis buss mellom sentrum og badestrand. På grunn av været, ble det ikke badestrand på oss. Livlig sentrum, med gode shoppingmuligheter.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 첫날부터 gloria(글로리아)의 따뜻한 환영과 마지막까지 친절한 서비스 너무 좋았습니다. 아이들과의 호이안 가족여행에서 머문곳. 조식, 수영장, 셔틀버스, 자전거 대여 등 모두 만족 스러웠어요. 구름이 많이 낀 날은 수영장 물이 차갑게 느껴지지만 아이들은 아주 신나게 놀았답니다. 다음에 호이안 갈때는 이곳에 다시 머물고 싶어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ホテル自体はよかったですが 宿泊のタイミングが悪かったせいか 12/31に泊まった時 夜中の12 15までディスコ並の大音量で新年パティを開催されていました パティが終わるまで全く休むことができませんでした 最悪の宿泊体験になりました このホテルを予約する時 イベントあるかを事前に確認することをおすすめします 自分は 2度もこんなひどいホテルを泊まりたいと思いません

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 깨끗하고 직원들이 친절합니다 조식도 맛나고 다시또12 30 오고싶을정도록 맘에들었습니다 매니져 글로리아 정말 친절합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 전반적인 평가는 나쁘지 않았다 가격대비 괜찮았다. 하지만 청소시간이 맘대로였다. 점심쯤 청소를 하러왔으나 우리가 안나가있고 방에있어서 30분뒤에 나갈꺼라고 그때 해달라고 했는데 다놀고 저녁에 들어왔더니 그때 청소를 하고있었다.우리가 들어왔을때 급하게 하고 가느랴 제대로 청소가 이루어 지지 않았다. 다른건 나쁘지 않았다 수영장도 깨끗하고 벌레도 한마리 본적 없었다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 셔틀버스가 있어서 호이안 구시가지 가고 오는데 큰 불편함이 없었어요 호텔이 외관상 지중해에 와 있는 느낌??이였어요 한국인보다 외국인이 많아요...

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 아늑하고 조식도 괜찮았어요 셔틀 사람들많아서 자리없다구 못탔어요 체크인아웃은 편하게 했내요

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I loved this hotel, the hotel is elegant and classy and not trying to be flashy. The staff are lovely and the food is great. The hotel is extremely clean and the attention to detail impeccable. I would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The room is clean in comparison to the price. But..service levels are low. In particular, man at the counter staff.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 방 깨끗하고 가격대비 짱이었습니다. 시티뷰도 멋지고 풀도 대만족! 글로리아, 사라님 부킹도 도와주시고 너무 친절했어요 감사합니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Do not miss this hotel with excellent service

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Super séjour de 3 nuits dans cet hôtel! bien situé et pratique les navettes gratuites pour plage et prêt des vélos! on se sent libres et autonomes ! mention spéciale à la team de l hôtel spécialement tammy et gloria pour leurs compétences, gentillesse et sourires! je recommande cet hôtel!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 조식을 제외하고는 전체적으로 만족스러웠습니다. 특히 gloria 직원을 칭찬합니다. 오며가며 항상 친절히 인사를 건내고 편히 쉬었는지 불편한점은 없는지 체크하고 신경써줬습니다. 올드타운과 약간 떨어져있지만 오히려 한적하고 조용해서 좋으며 안방비치와 행코코넛쪽으로는 오히려 가까워서 장점일 수 있습니다. 여행 시간을 미리 계획할 수 있다면 호텔 셔틀버스를 이용해도 편리합니다. 올드타운, 안방비치 두 코스가 있습니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 직원분들도 굉장히 친절하고 룸도 깔끔하고 좋았어요. 수영장이 크지는 않지만 호텔에둘러쌓여있어서 이쁘기도하고 그냥 놀기에는 좋았습니다. 주변에 막뭐가 많은건아니지만 먹을곳 정도는있고 올드타운은 택시타고가면 5천원 정도나온거같아요! 근데 자전거를 무료로 대여해주고있어서 자전거로 가는것도 나쁘지않았습니다! 올드타운이랑 안방비치가는 셔틀도있기는한데 시건대가 많이는 없어요! 조식도 만족스러웠습니다. 다만. 정말 실망했던 한가지는 호텔스파.. 40프로 할인가격에 받아서 한국에비교하면 엄청 저렴한 가격이긴했으나 그가격마저아까운 정도였어요. 엄마랑 둘이 들어갔는데 마사지사두명이 계속 1시간내내 정말 계속떠들고 마사지는 정말 설렁설렁... 화가날정도였어요. 그거 빼고는 전반적으로 좋은 호텔이습니댜!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 모든게 흠잡을데없이 훌륭했다 특히 아침식사가 좋았다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호이안 자체가 시외지역 느낌이라고 해서 크게 기대하지는 않았지만 호텔의 컨셉부터 사진을 찍으면 이쁘게 나오는 올드함이 있어 그 나름의 느낌이 좋았고, 객실의 디자인도 마찬가지. 수영장은 나름 크다고 생각하고 구명조끼가 비치되어있지만 한개빼고는 정상인게 없었다는 아쉬움. 수영장에서 올려다 보이는 호텔의 분위기가 이쁘고 수영상 한쪽은 90cm 한쪽은 150cm정도의 깊이였는데 처음에 그걸 몰라서 9살 딸이 깊은곳으로 다이빙해버려서 아이때문에 강제 입수해야했지만, 그건 나의 실수였으니까 괜찮다. 수영장 별도로 수심이 낮은 풀이 따로 있고 큰 풀은 중간 부분에 대각선으로 깊어지는 구간으로 깊이가 나뉘어져 있다. 조식도 먹을만 했고 오믈렛이 맛있었다. 와이파이는 잘 되어서 아이들 핸드폰 보는것은 편했고, 올드타운과 안방비치로 셔틀버스를 운행하는데 30분전에 미리 예약하면 무료 이용가능했다. 커뮤티니 카페에서 봤을때 글로리아라는 직원이 친절하다는 평이 많았는데 실제로 친절하다고 생각한다. 하지만 영어를 못하면 대화가 되지 않아서 대화를 할 수없었다... 전반적으로 만족했는데 아주 깔끔한 호텔을 기대한다면 그 기대와 다를 수 있다. 퇴실하던 날 조식을 먹고 룸으로 돌아오는데 복도에 페인드를 덧칠하고있는데 그걸 몰랐던 딸이 벽에 기대서 옷에 페인트가 묻었는데 이건 좀 아쉽다. 표시나 고지가 없었던 상황이라 알 수없었다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 가격이랑 같습니다 그나마 직원들이 친절하고 방에 모기며 벌레정말 많고 청소 안해줍니다 침대시트 안갈아주고 맨윗층에 온수튼다고 기계돌리는데 정신도는줄..싸다고 예약한 내자신을 원망함 진짜 다른호텔 옮기고싶엇는데 ㅜㅜ방없어서 못옮기고 그나마 다른방으로 옮겨줘서 좀나앗지만 다시 간다면 절대 안감 수영장 그늘이라 추워서 수영도 못함

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Pros helpful staff, large bedrooms, nice pool area, decent breakfast. Free bikes available for hire. Cons a long (20 min) walk into the old town. Disappointing gym, with very limited equipment.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Oustanding service, will recommend to other and family

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 미아, 글로리아를 포함해 직원분들 귀찮을 정도로 친절합니다 디파짓 따로 필요 없으며 체크인시 여권 또한 보관하지 않고 정보 기재 후 돌려 줍니다. 위치가 별로인듯 하지만 무료셔틀이 있어 중심지보다 편합니다. 아침 청소 후 오후에 잠시 들어와서 씻고 저녁에 왔는데 또 청소가 되어 있었어요. 하지만 욕조가 좀 지저분해서 청결에서 하나 뺍니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 깨끗하고 좋습니다 다만 방음시설이 잘되어 있지 않아서 밤에 잘때 소음이 들리는 흠이 있지만 그래도 가성비 짱이고 매우 친절합니다 잘 쉬다 갑니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 조용하고 깨끗하고 직원들이 매우 친절하였다. 근처에 시장이 있어서 망고를 1킬로에 4만동에 구입할수있다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I was really happy with the pool, my room, and the great assistance from the staff. Although the hotel is a bit out of the centre, they provide a shuttle and make sure you are well cared for!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ㄷ자형 건물이라 사생활 공개로 커튼을 쳐야함 그외엔 가격대비 적정

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 건물입구가 건물 전체에 비하면 소박하다. 하지만 주변 관광의 편의성과 가격대비 괜찮은 방과 아침조식 직원의 친절도 올드시가지와 안방비치 셔틀운행등이 잘 구비되어 있다. 물론 그랩을 이용해도 어디든 저렴하게 이동이 가능한 호텔이다.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호텔은 정말 좋았습니다. 하지만 숙소 근처에 아무것도없음 그랩잡기가 힘듬

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 너무 괜찮은 호텔입니다. 셔틀 운행으로 접근성도 뛰어나고 방도 청결했습니다. Gloria 씨를 비롯한 많은 프런트 직원분들의 친절함에 필요한 예약 등이 원활하게 진행되어 편했구요 감동이었습니다. 다음에도 이용할게요

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It was a very friendly and very clean hotel.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 아이들 둘을 데리고 4인가족이 묵었어요. 침대가 습기때문에 조금 눅눅하긴 했지만 전반적으로 깨끗하고 친절해서 만족스러웠어요. 특히 아침 조식이 훌륭했어요.. 맛있는 조식 감사해요. 그리고 안방비치와 호이한전통시장으로 셔틀을 운행해 주어서 택시 한번 안타고 호이안을 즐길 수 있었어요.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 무료셔틀 아주 편리 조식이 맛있음. 올드타운까지 걸어서 15분 . 지배인이 유럽계 베트남인이어서 영어 잘하고 유럽투숙객도 많음 . 매우 친절합니다 .

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 투숙객 들이 편안하게 지낼 수있도록 세심한 배려와 친절함이 돋보이는 호텔. 저렴한 가격에 침대 3개(king 1갸, double 2개), 화장실 2개

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 친절하며 조식이 럭셔리 하지는 않았지만, 맛있고 정성이 담겨서 좋았음. 객실도 가성비 짱이고 조망도 환상적임. 수압 장난아니게 쌤. 소음은 그냥 이런류의 호텔들의 평균보다 조금 나은 정도. 주의 호텔 내의 스파! 전문 상주인력이 하는 것이 아니라, 신청하면 20분 뒤 다시오라고 하고 그 사이에 주변에서 누군가를 부르는 듯. 와이프를 맡은 분은 손끝이 엄청 거칠다고 함. 다른 직업이 있으신 듯... 스파는 완전비추. 간단팁 객실내의 미니바에서 생수 작은병은 무료인데, 500미리 정도의 물은 하나당 1250원 하는 고가임. 베트남물가대비 엄청 바가지. 위의 두가지만 조심하면 너무 좋은 시간들이었고, 다음에 또 갈 예정

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Rosemary hotel experience was great. Staffs were very nice and friendly. Hotel was very clean and breakfast was good enough amazing shuttle bus service to go to old town and anbang beach. Because this reasoning i would highly recommend and i would stay here again!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I can t say enough about this hotel. The room and the staff were both wonderful. The pool is great. It s a quick bike ride into old town hoi an but just far enough that it is quiet and calm on the street near the hotel. I had an excellent massage and they helped me book a trip to cham islands. If i return to hoi an i will stay here again, and i recommend that you do stay here as well!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 시설이 깨끗했고 자주 관리해주셨으며 직원분들이 친절했습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호텔자체는 좋으나.. 위치가 시내에서 조금 떨어짐

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: バスサービスの本数が１時間に一回ぐらいあればもっと便利だった 事前の予約ではなくホテルのルームキー提示とかが便利です ホテルのスタッフは皆心配りとサービス精神が豊富でとても快適に過ごせました

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The room is spacious clean decoration is good. Staff is polite and helpful. Also hotel provides shuttle buses to old town and an bang beach. Except the location is not near old town everything is good. My family and i enjoy our stay in this hotel.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Liked the boutique feel. Had bikes available and also a shuttle.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Vi boede 5 nætter på rosmary hotel. Venligt personale, flotte værelser (vi havde udsigt til poolen). Men der er lidt lydt. Hotellet var igang med at istandsætte oppe på loftet og samtidig var nabogrunden igang med at bygge et nyt hotel. Det gav støj. Superb morgenmad. Taxa til/fra old town koster ca 40.000. Hotellet har bus til både strand og old town som du gratis kan benytte dig af. Det fungerede godt. Stranden var god og ren. Vi spiste en enkelt gang på hotellet til aften. Rimelig pris og god kvalitet vi vil gerne anbefale hotellet. Brug receptionen som gerne hjælper. Særlig hilsen til gloria

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 규모는 작지만 아담하고 모든것을 다 갖추고 있는 좋은 곳입니다! 직원들도 엄청 친절했고 조식 맘에 들었고 글로리아 넘 친절하게 잘 대해줬네요

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 숙소 청결상태,위치는 좋았으나 방음이 너무 안되서 잠을 잘수가 없었어요 방문을 열고 자는 기분이랄까.. 다른방 소음도 너무 잘들렸구요 새벽부터 오토바이 소리도 크게 들렸구요 조식은 11시라고 안내 되어 있지만 10시까지만 합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel looks nice and it s clean. The staff is really nice and wonderful but it s near a construction site and its noise from 8 in the morning. The hotel is also renovating the roof top. The biggest complaint comes from pool. There is a lot of children and people using it but it s to close to the rooms so it s not possible to sleep from 6 in 5he morning.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 그냥 그럭저럭 주변이 좀 시끄럽고 중저가 호텔다웠음

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel is one off the best in vietnam so helpfull and shuttle is really great ..great room and so clean

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed at this hotel 2 nights and love it very much. The room is clean and cozy. Staffs are friendly and helpful. The breakfast is good. They have free shuttle bus to old town and if you ride a bicycle just about 15 mins. If we will go to hoi an again, we would like to stay here.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel staff are really helpful with everyday needs also booking taxi s from airport room to a high standard towels for poil and going to beach are great. Best stay in vietnam

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We loved staying here. Great location and staff. The hotel prices for transportation were much higher than what you can get for a taxi, but that s our only complaint. Make sure you take a bicycle ride around town!

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and the staff made me feel so welcomed especially mia from reception she remembered my name and made me feel special. This place is amazing, the room, the pool and the amazing breakfast made the stay so enjoyable. I can t wait to come back again once the sky bar is completed.

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 여직원 한분이 너무친절했습니다 후기에 있던 한국말 조금하시는 분인거같은데 그분덕분에 너무 잘 쉬다왔어요 이번에 또가는데 이번엔 이름을 보고와야겠어요 방도 깨끗합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Rosemary Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 環境 服務 餐飲都非常滿意 性價比高 值得入住

ヴィラに宿泊しました 広さも間取りも素晴らしかったです 問題はシャワーの排水部分が詰まっていて 毎晩水浸しになってしまったこと リビングの天井の扇風機も故障して動きませんでした スタッフについては 清掃スタッフはしっかりと仕事をしてくれていました フロントのスタッフは対応の良い人と塩対応の人 両方がいました 朝食会場はヴィラとホテル棟の宿泊者で分かれていました ヴィラ宿泊者は両レストランを利用可能 レベルは悪くなかったです ヴィラ宿泊者のレストランのみにあったのは生ハムとスムージー各種で少し差をつけているようでした
Beachfront villa with pool was amazing, accommodation is really spacious, breakfast is really good with so much choice and the beach is really clean and beautiful.
Lovely pools and right on the beach. Friendly staff. Quite expensive to eat and drink on site though.

Deres villaer er fremragende - specielt dem i første række til vandet. Morgenmadsrestaurant kun til dem der bor i villa , giver en dejlig rolig morgen frem for hovedrestauranten. Hotellets priser for mad og drikke er pænt høje i forhold til restauranter generelt. Kommer gerne igen ..i en villa.

主人の誕生日で利用しました 事前にやり取りしたところ ベッドにデコレーションを用意してくれたり バースデーのケーキを用意してくれたりでありがとうございました ヴィラに宿泊しましたが 部屋は広々としていて景色がいい プールも水を循環しているようで綺麗でした 2階の湯船のお湯がすぐ水になります ビーチも美しく そこまで混み合ってない時期だったのでそれもよかったです トイレ キッチンの奥に1つだけ個室があったので利用してました

hotelName: Hoi An Sea Sunset Villa & Bar
userCmt: Nice homestay run by very helpful young couple. 5-10 minute walk from fairly quiet beach.

hotelName: Hoi An Sea Sunset Villa & Bar
userCmt: Lugar alejado de ang bang y hoi an pero ideal para desconectar

hotelName: Hoi An Sea Sunset Villa & Bar
userCmt: The owners lived right there. Wi fi was good. There was a good backpacker style cafe/restaurant nearby. Very short walk to a long beach. Lots of services available along the beach.

hotelName: Hoi An Sea Sunset Villa & Bar
userCmt: オーナーがとても親切にしてくれてツアーの手配や送迎などの手配もリーズナブルな値段でしてくれてとても良かった

hotelName: Hoi An Sea Sunset Villa & Bar
userCmt: We loved our stay here. Close to the beach and seafood restaurants. A short scooter or taxi ride from hoi an. Sweet family running the hotel, taking care of all our needs. Highly recommend a stay here

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Perfekte lage zwischen altstadt und strand. Minimarkt gleich in der nähe. Shuttles gratis zum eigenen beach club an den an bang strand (der tolle saubere strand, nicht der, der beim sturm den sand verloren hat). Riesiges und tolles frühstücksbuffet und sehr engagierte, freundliche und hilfsbereite mitarbeiter. Voll zu empfehlen für hoi an! preis-leistung genial!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 아주 좋은 호텔입니다. 방, 수영장, 셔틀버스, 자전거 대여 모두 좋았습니다. 직원분들은 모두 친절했고요. 특히, emily 분이 아주 친절하게 설명을 잘해줬습니다. Emily 분과 페북 또는 인스타 친구하고 싶었는데, 못 물어봤네요.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The room was very comfortable, the staff welcoming and helpful, helping us to organise daily trips. The breakfast allowed for different food choices, and the massages in the spa were wonderful. The shuttle bus to old town made trips easy, and gave access to the many restaurants in the town

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 酒店需小 但服務設備齊全 只欠健身房 但服務員很有水准 英文水平也不錯

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Service was exceptional. Our family of course took advantage of the spa and pool. The gym looked great too! the breakfast here was my kids favorite out of all the hotels we stayed at in vietnam. Lots of western food options.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: スタッフの皆さんがフレンドリーで良かったです

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: We stayed in this hotel for an initial 2 days on a trip to hoi an. This hotel is further towards the expensive side when staying here, but is well worth the additional spend. The service from every member of staff is fantastic, from the moment you step through the door you are welcomed and taken through every detail of your stay, every member of the team makes an effort to interact and make conversation with you. The facilities in the hotel are great, we were upgraded into a suite on arrival, which was extremely spacious and done to a very high standard. The hotel also has a good gym and pool, as well as useful shuttle busses into the tow and beach (although the town is only a 10 minute walk if you need to stretch your legs). We extended our stay for an additional 2 days, which was made easy by the team, who were able to keep us in the same room for our convenience at short notice. I would extend a personal thanks to the kitchen team, who surprised me with a birthday cake during my stay, as well as emily, selena and the rest of the reception team who were extremely friendly and helpful during our stay.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great hotel in hoi an. Close to old town. Room is spacious and the balcony is nice. Shuttle to beach and old town is a plus. Speak good english. Breakfast buffet is good. We stay here everytime we re in town. This is our choice of hotel in hoi an.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: I arrived late in the afternoon. The front desk staff very friendly. I asked for helps in getting tickets for the hoi an memories show which i cannot seem to get online, and lady uyen made a call immediately and got the tickets. The stay was pleasant. The negative was the hotel tried to have a warm atmosphere in the room, so using dark colors and ceiling light. The room was dark, with minimal available lights. Really bad was the bathroom, with spot ceiling lights --- barely any light shine on the face for clean up and make up. I would like the bathroom to be extra bright and practical.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great value for money, rooms were clean and sufficient amenities provided. Breakfast each morning was tasty with a good range of choices.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Overall, a great little hotel.. Only issue that i had was that there weren t any outdoor seating anywhere (besides right at the pool). I prefer my morning coffee outside and couldn t do that, otherwise, a great stay

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Overall, it was good. But i m sad that the bed covers are not clean.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: I had a fantastic time and stay at hoian sincerity. The staff were super helpful if i had any questions. The location is super quiet and a short walk over to the old town.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: We had a great stay. This was our third time at the sincerity and, hopefully, not the last one. Hotel is well located, close to the old town and to the beach. Rooms are very comfortable. Breakfast is excellent. The staff is outstanding in all departments (cleaning, reception, restaurant). The bicycles, complimentary, could be better maintained, but it is really a minor consideration.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Excellent accommodations and breakfast buffet for the price! excellent value!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 오래된 시설임에도 불구하고 깨끗한 편이었습니다. 침대도 쾌적했고, 에어컨도 오래되기는 했지만, 꿉꿉한 냄새를 없애주기에는 충분했습니다. 다만 조식을 먹으러 식당에 갔는데 첫날 샐러드용 채소를 집게로 집는데 날벌레들이 나와서 깜짝 놀라서 다른 것들만 먹었습니다. 그리고 직원들의 위생관념이 문제가 있습니다. 첫날 한 직원이 아래쪽 컵을 집어서 위로 올려놓는데, 음료가 담기는 컵의 안쪽으로 손가락을 넣어서 두 개를 붙여 잡고 올려놓는 것을 보았습니다. 그리고 둘째날은 다른 직원이 행주를 잡고 테이블을 닦던 손으로 곧장 포크, 나이프 등을 세팅하는 모습도 보았습니다. 그 포크와 스푼이 내 입으로 들어갈 걸 생각하니 기분이 안 좋았습니다.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Super serviceminded hotel and good location, near a really nice spa and café.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Wonderful staff, great rooms and a free frequent bus to and from old town. Everyone was so helpful in organising activities and answering our questions. Highly recommend.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Hotelli oli siisti ja rauhallinen. Bussimatkat oli järjestetty keskustaan ja rannalle ilmaiseksi. Pyöräilimme hotellin pyörillä rannalle ja tutustuimme hotellin lähistöön pyörillä ja kävellen. Kuntosalia ja uima-allasta käytimme myös ahkerasti. Ruoka oli todella hyvää hotellissa ja aamiainen oli runsas. Henkilökunta olivat kaikki ystävällisiä ja mieleen jäivät erityisesti tarjoilijat sarah ja jasmine sekä en-ri, phoebe hotellin vastaanotosta. Saimme upean matkaelämyksen ja valitsisimme saman hotellin uudestaan.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Hugh,silvia,winお世話になりました ありがとうございました よかった点 私は中学生にすら劣る英語スキルしかないのですが スタッフの方が皆親切でコミュニケーションはなんとかなりました 英語が苦手な人におすすめです 繁華街から少し離れてるので とても静かです 車のクラクション音が聴こえなくて快適 グラブを捕まえて乗る時も 混雑している立地ではないため スムーズです コンセントはそのまま日本のものが使えました 勿論電圧は要確認 ベッドサイドにもあります あまりよくなかった点 五階の大きな浴槽がある部屋だったので 嬉々としてお湯を溜め始めましたが 半分くらいで湯切れしました 湯船に浸かるのは無理そうです ハンドソープが独特な香りで少し苦手でした 朝食は西洋的な朝食のシンプルな構成です ダナンのシティホテルの方が品数も豊富だったので 特筆して良いとまでは感じませんでした 注意事項 ホイアンの市街地に 夜まで遊ぶ予定の時は必ず帰りのシャトルバスを予約した方がいいです 20 30頃に市街地からグラブを捕まえて帰ろうとしましたが ドライバー皆がダナンに乗せていく客を狙っているため 近すぎるこのホテルに向かってくれる車が全くマッチング出来ませんでした 最終的に静かな夜の道をハラハラしながら20分歩いて帰ったので 何事もなくて良かった 必ず一番最後の21 00の便でも予約して行った方がいいです

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Πολύ βοηθητικοί με συμβουλές για το πού να φάμε, να κινηθούμε. Υπήρχε βανάκι, που σε πήγαινε δωρεάν στο κέντρο και στην παραλία. Παλιό ξενοδοχείο με ανάγκη για ανακαίνιση.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: If i could give more than 5 stars i would! not only is this a beautiful place, but the service is absolutely impeccable! big shoutout the kein who made our stay magical. He always went out to make sure we were looked out for. It was also my birthday, and the staff left a birthday surprise for me in my room! the buffet breakfast is beautiful with a wide range of options. Had a massage at the spa that left me feeling so relaxed and also swam in the beautiful pool everyday! the hotel also has a shuttle to hoi an ancient town and the beach that you can reserve for free which is so convenient. When you go to a bang beach with the shuttle, you are taken to a dolphin beach club where you have a private space with a lounge chair, towels and a shower. We spent our whole day there at the beautiful beach. Thank you sincerity hotel for making our stay so amazing! we will be back very soon!!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 합리적가격에 적당한서비스 재방문 의사있음

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Their bus shuttle service

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호텔 직원분들이 굉장히 친절하고 진짜 잘해주세요!! 그리고 호텔도 깔끔하고 야시장이랑 거리가 좀 있지만 픽업 다 해줍니다! 한적한 곳에 있어 조용하고 가족과 시간보내기 좋고, 식사도 만족합니다 ㅎㅎ

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 올드타운에서 좀 떨어져 있으나, 무료셔틀버스가 매시간 운행되어 불편하지는 않았음. 친절한 직원들 덕분에 편안히 여행하였음.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원분들이 친절하세요. 자전거 무료 대여해주지만 사용해보진 않았어요. 수영장이 너무 추워서 오래 놀지는 못했습니다. 깊어서 수영 못하는 분들은 유아풀이나 낮은 쪽에서 노셔야 하구요. 수영장이 크진 않아요. 조식 평타 치구요. 요구르트가 냉장고 안에 들어있어서 첫날에 못보고 다음날 먹었는데 맛있었어요. 방도 깨끗하고 화장실도 좋은데 방음이 안되요.. 앞뒤위층소리 다들립니다.. 픽업샌딩 모두 무료 아닙니다. 밑에 샌딩무료보고 예약 안했다가 낭패 봤어요. 다행히 클룩에서 공항말고 이동으로 예약성공했습니다. 호텔 셔틀 지도표시로 봤다가 실패했어요. 설명해주시는걸 잘 안들었더니... 뒤에 표시된 bebe 앞으로 가셔야 합니다. 따흑.. 시내 마사지들 좋아요. 호텔 자체건 너무 비싸서 안해봤습니다. 택시들 싸요. 근데 비치앞에서 그랩으로 호객하는 일반차 잘만 잡음 여행기간에 이동시 편히 다니실 겁니다.. 기사 잘 보셔야해요. 마지막날 공항에 입구장 오른쪽에 수화물 보관해주는데 찾아서 일찍 다낭으로 넘어와 짐 맡기고 다낭시내 쭉 돌았습니다. 다낭시내에선 그랩쓰시는게 좋아요. 기사들 다 영어 잘 못합니다. 위치 잘 찍으세요.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 호텔 직원분들 매우 친절했고 시설도 깨끗합니다 수영장도 엄청 넓어서 수영하기 너무 좋아요 안방비치나 올드타운과 거리 가깝고 셔틀버스를 운영해서 편하게 다녀올 수 있었습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was small but clean and there was a nice pool and gym. We booked a tour to the tunnels and mekong delta that was excellent, a private driver and tour guide for just the two of us. The guide spoke english well and was very friendly, he explained

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 새벽 1시 30분 쯤 도착해서 체크인 했습니다 . 늦은 시간에도 친절하게 안내해줍니다 . 프론트 직원들 한국말 잘합니다 . 2틀 머물러 있었는데 청소도 깨끗하게 해주고 룸 상태도 괜찮았습니다 . 다낭으로 이동할 때 저렴하게 차 예약도 해줌. 호이안 또 간다면 신세리티 호텔 또 이용 할거예욥!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: This hotel has got the friendliest staff i ve ever met. The service is great, and the breakfast delicious.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Super trevlig personal som verkligen är mån om en. Otroligt hjälpsamma med allt, hjälpte oss att boka tours och gav tips på ställen att besöka i stan. Bra rum och gratis transfer till både stranden och stan en gång i timmen. Maten på restaurangen var både prisvärd och god!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 아주 친절하고 편안한 분위가 아주좋았습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Pros great staff, but some staff didn t manage customer expectation well. Cosy, big and clean room. Cons they are lack of capacity to maintain many guests. I had to wait for breakfast because their restaurant is too small to ocupyy many guest. Worst part is while i m waiting the staff let some western guest go in without asking any waiting guests before them. Seems they have different rule for westerns. They provide free shuttle to old town, however, there is chance that you cannot get in a bus. It is first come first served according to the staff. Which means even though you waited from old town to the hotel, nobody gurantee your ride. Lastly, they had blackout, and they never informed guest until the day. Thus in the morning we knew that whole town is blackout. Some hotel actually managed to provided electricity using power generator, but this hotel s generator was broken, so they failed to provide it. If i know that there is blackout, i should haven t stay there.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 整潔 食物美咪 價格合理

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 일단 한국 손님이 많아 한국말로 안내도 해주고 직원들이 정말 친절합니다 가성비 갑 수영장 에어컨도 좋았어요 다만 방에서 좀 꿉꿉한 냄새가 나네요 there are so nice crew to meet customer and one

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 큰기대를안하고 늘 검색하고가는데 이번호텔은 좋았어요 한국어 하시는분도 있으셔서 소통도 편했고 안방비치로 이동하려고 호텔 셔틀시간이안되서 호텔에 부탁해 택시부르고 갔는데 택시에 친구가 핸드폰을 두고내렸는데 호텔에 다시 가서 불러줬던 택시에 친구가 핸드폰을 놓고내렸다라고 말하니 기사분에게 바로 전화해서 핸드폰도 찾았네요. 호텔에 빠른 도움에 감사했고 다시 핸드폰을 가져다준 기사분에게 도감사해서 답례를 해드릴려고했는데 쿨하시게 핸드폰만 로비에 주고 갔다고하네요. 좋은기억이 남은 호텔이네요

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very great service and accommodations. I highly recommend this hotel. Free bike rentals to get to hoi an ancient city and the beach easily.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Staff friendly and helpful with good english. Bikes were poorly maintained and need to be renewed. Room could have been cleaned better.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Staff extremely friendly and efficient.comfortable room.good location.even a laptop in your room for use although i didn t use it.would stay again when in hoi an.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: My wife and i booked for 28 days here in march, but were forced to leave early due to flight changes (covid 19). We did stay for 17 days, and wish we were still there! the staff are amazing at sincerity and anio. Breakfast was great, with lots of variety. They have a shuttle to town and the beach, and there are several very good restaurants, grocery, etc. Within walking distance. We were also offered complimentary massages/facials, and a room upgrade! we did not eat at the restaurant, but did eat by the pool and the food was very good...the bbq smelled amazing. Everyone (staff) was wearing masks during our stay, so you couldn t see their smiles, but you could hear it in their voices...always greeting you by name when you arrived or left the hotel. The gym was well equipped also. A couple very minor suggestions... In the gym, perhaps add a cup dispenser, and a garbage can. There is nowhere to put used cups. And in the room, bolt the safe to the cabinet that it s in. The safe is loose, and someone could take the whole thing.... Having said that, vietnam is one of the safest places i ve ever visited, and their crime rate is very low. It is just an observation that may make other guests feel more comfortable.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The property provides complimentary bus shuttle to its guests. The buffet breakfast was simply grand and the rooms were extremely spacious. The staff were super friendly.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Loved this hotel ! great staff , food location and service . We received a complimentary 1 hr massage and 1/2 hr facial which we didn t expect this hotel was very affordable and exceeded our expectations

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들은 친절했고 우리가 원하는 옵션들에 대해서 최선을 다해 안내하고 도와주었다. 중심부에서 다소 떨어져 있어 조용한 휴식을 취하기엔 최고의 조건이었다.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Abbiamo alloggiato in questo hotel per 3 notti e che dire è stato magnifico! pulito, personale davvero tanto gentile e disponibile, posizione vicinissima al mare ed al centro di hoi an e servizio navetta sempre disponibile (sia per andare al centro e sia per il mare.) abbiamo usufruito anche del servizio lavanderia, sono bravissimi, gli abiti erano profumatissima e senza più macchie!!!! hotel super consigliato!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely property, lovely staff. Food excellent. Regular shuttle bus to town and the beach, plenty of recommendations of places to go around the local area

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 우선 직원분들이 너무 친절하셔서 여행 마지막을 좋은 기억으로 마무리짓게 해주셔서 고마웠어요. 부모님을 아버지 어머니라는 한국말로 불러주셔서 부모님이 너무 좋아하셨고 만날때마다 반갑게 인사해주시는 직원분들덕분에 여행지라는 어색함도 잊고 편안했어요. 부모님과 함께하는 여행이라면 높지않은 건물에 편안한 분위기의 이 호텔을 추천해요.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 初老の夫婦２人で 片言の英語でしか話せませんでしたが スタッフさんの笑顔と心遣いで快適に過ごせました ホテルは 旧市街地から1.5kmほど離れていますが 無料のシャトルバスやレンタサイクルがあるので旧市街地に近いホテルにこだわる必要はないと思いました シークレットセールで申し込んだので 価格も大変魅力的でした チェックアウト時のアンケートで 食事をexellentにしなかったために どこかお気に召さなかったと気にされてたのが申し訳なく思ってます exellentで良かったと後悔してます 帰りは ダナン市内のホテルまで送迎をお願いしましたが grabより安かったです ホイアンに行く機会があれば 次も利用したいです

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The shuttle bus into town or the beach was very useful. The hotel is clean, the staff friendly and breakfast was plenty full. The room was spacious and cleaned daily. I loved the swinging lounges by the pool and used the pool on a daily basis. Thank you and we will return.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Meget fint hotel med søde ansatte. Hotellet trænger dog til en kærlig hånd. Det er noget slidt. Huller i gulvet, solsenge der er faldefærdige, håndklæder som er med pletter. Og der er ikke mulighed for en drink eller vin efter kl 21.30. Der er slukket og lukket.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Vary good

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 최고의 호텔입니다 저희딸이 에어팟을 놔두고 다낭에 왔는데 찾아서 다낭호텔까지 보내주셨어요 얼마나 기쁜지 너무 감사했습니다 조식도 맛있고 모든직원들이 친절하게 웃어주셔서 너무 좋았습니다 다음에도 꼭 숙박 할거에요 직원분들 감사합니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원이 영어로 설명하는데 너무 작은 목소리로 빨리 말하셔서 대 충 알아들었어요 조식 식당에서 직원을 부르기 어려웠어요(두 직원이 뮨앞에 서서 얘기하며 쳐다보지않아요)

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 위치는 올드타운에서 도보 15분정도로 덥지만 않으면 걸어다니기 충분한 거리입니다. 다만 더울땐 정말 죽을거같더라구요 ㅎㅎ 스텝분들 다들 너 무 친절하십니다 참섬투어 간다니깐 호텔 수건 챙겨가라고 말씀도 해주시고 다들 너무 친절하게 해주셨어요! 화장실이랑 침대도 쾌적했고 방도 아주 넓고 수영장이 이뻤는데ㅠㅠ 일정이 바빠서 이용을 못했어요... 다음에 꼭 다시 가서 수영장 이용하고 싶네요 조식도 너무 맛있었어요 여기 조식 쌀국수가 사먹는거만큼이나 엄청 맛있었어요! 마지막 조식날 남자 스텝분이 커피 만들어 주셨는데 그것도 너무 맛있어서 또먹고 싶네요

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very good value for money. Very helpful staff. The staff on the front desk were lovely and couldn t have been more helpful, they also spoke very good english. Very quiet location with free bicycle hire to get to the town and beach which doesn t take long. The town is also walkable (25 mins). Lovely breakfast too.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: One of the best hotels i have ever stayed at. Every staff here was very helpful and friendly. All of them spoke good english. Room and bathroom was very clean. Breakfast was great. Wifi, ac, minibar, all great. Good location close to beach and old town/night market. They also provide free shuttles around town and 2 free water. Also one of the few to have a gym facility and nice swimming pool.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원분들이 정말 친절하시네요 숙소도 깔끔하고 만족스럽습니다 추천드립니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very nice hotel, and great service from the personal.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 한국말을 할 수 있는 직원이 있어서 영어를 못해도 수월하다는 장점 그리고 깨끗하고 수영장도 좋았습니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 모두 친절합니다. 다시 방문하고싶은 호텔입니다. 굿 !

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: La tranquilité de l hôtel situé à 20 min de marche de la vieille ville

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 서비스가 엄청좋아요 다낭 공항에서 픽업서비스 로 호텔까지 바로가로 가고 호텔 로비에서 직원들이 엄청 친절하게 방 부터 조식 시간 등 여러가지 정보 를 서툰 한국말이지만 친절하게 가르쳐주고 필요한것이 있으면 바로바로 가져다줘요 호텔도 호이안 중앙에 있다 해도 될정도로 좋아 올드타운과 안방비치 까지 시간이 얼마 안걸리고 또 호텔에서 셔틀버스가 운행해 시간 만 맞으면 택시 안들리고 돌아댕길수 있어요 또 조식 도 엄청좋아 맛도 있고 뷔페식이고 가성비 완전좋은 호텔이에요

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: We had a great stay at the sincerity. Rooms, staff, facilities, breakfast and especially the staff who were excellent through out our stay. Short walk into the town or take the free hotel shuttle bus.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: We had a great stay at hoian sincerity. The staff were very helpful. The location is quiet with a plenty of places eat nearby. A short walk down to the old town or take the free shuttle bus.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 대체적으로만족했으나! 조식은생각보다먹을게없네요 주변에는뭐가없지만 그랩타고조금만나가면 올드타운과 안방비치를볼수있어요

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Staff is very friendly and breakfast is excellent.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Lovely stay with gorgeous welcoming staff and a fabulous pool.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The staff treated us like royalty, they went above and beyond on all services. Highly recommend this hotel. Close to nightlife, food, markets. Room was clean and our customer service rep walked ya through all the amenities breakfast was great as well

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 너무 좋았어요 조식, 수영장 가성비 갑이에요 다음에도 또 올게요

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깨끗한 시설과 친절한 직원이 있는 좋은 숙박지입니다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 깨끗하고 조식도 괜찮음

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The staff are all quite pleasant. But they are pushy and try to get you to spend more money than necessary. The hotel next door called anio is newer and nicer. They offer a shuttle service into the main town which is great but it is often full and you have to wait a while for another one. We ended using the anio shuttle many times. The hotel itself is old and a little dirty in places. The food is not the greatest. Overall it s an ok hotel. The staff are all very pleasant though.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: The staff at this hotel couldn t have done more! the room was beautiful. Beds comfy. Pool devine! had a massage at the spa and it was the best i ve ever had. Oh and do t get me started on the breakfast. Wow!! there s a shuttle from the hotel to downtown and the beach leaving often throughout the day. Highly recommend this hotel

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Staff here was great. We enjoyed the pool to get a break from the heat. Room was spacious and clean.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: 직원들이 매우매우 친절하다 한국어가 대충 가능하다 셔틀버스도 잘 되있다 조식도 별기대는 안했는대 좋았다 가격대비 괜찮다 담에 기회가 되면 다시 들릴거 같다

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Such a serene resort in hoian area. Good place to spend few nights to experience the calm and peaceful vibe of the city. Staffs are very friendly and welcoming.

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Nice hotel

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Very good!

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: スタッフさんの対応が親切でとても良かったです 朝ごはんも美味しかったです 無料のレンタサイクルでサイクリングできて楽しかったー

hotelName: Hoi An Sincerity Hotel and Spa
userCmt: Great hotel and super friendly, english speaking staff. They have free bikes that you can use to bike into the center of hoi an or to the beach. There are also several nice spas w/in a few blocks of the hotel. Very efficient check in. They let us check in early and strived to accommodate.
