They also can easy arrange you a pickup from the da nang airport ( 15 from airport to hotel) and a transfer from hoi an to hue. Highly recommend and good value for the money.
Phòng ốc rộng rãi, chủ khách sạn nhiệt tình....địa điểm hotel đáng ở khi đi hội an nha mọi người
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, được dọn thường xuyên. Chủ nhà thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Có dịch vụ xe đưa đón sân bay. Sẽ ghé lại nếu có dịp quay lại hội an.
Mới đi nghỉ tuần trước. Phòng mới, sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà vui tính nên mình cảm thấy thoải mái. Cũng không xa phố cổ lắm, xung quanh có nhiều quán ăn nên thích ăn gì thì cũng có.
Mình ở thấy thoải mái, phòng sạch, đẹp, nhân viên chu đáo và vui vẻ.
Cô chú chủ nhà rất tốt, tuy nhiên vệ sinh nệm cần chú ý ơn, vẫn còn bụi nhìn bằng mặt thường được. Máy lạnh phòng mình kêu suốt đêm nên hơi khó ngủ. Còn lại rất oke mọi thứ
Đổi phòng trực tiếp khách sạn nói 1 kiểu thu tiền 1 kiểu, trên trang đặt không phụ thu trẻ con đến lúc tính tiền lại phụ thu, phòng không có nước lọc uống tính phí ngoài
Một đêm trải nghiệm tại nơi đây, phòng rộng, view đẹp tuy nhiên nội thất không đảm bảo, muốn xem tivi nhưng không mở đc, không có dép đi trong phòng vs, trời mưa tầm tã nên không vui lắm.
Chủ nhà vui vẻ thân thiện. Sử dụng xe đạp miễn phí
사장님과 직원들이 너무 친절해서 너무 좋았습니다.
We stayed for a week and had a great trip! room was lovely and spacious with a lovely bathroom. Wally was super helpful )

Wally is a fantastic host. This was our 2nd stay, previous was 5 years ago. He welcomed us back like family and thoughtfully upgraded our rooms to best suit our family. Sunny pool is an easy walk into the old town and fantastic value. The pool is lovely and never too busy. Great breakfast. Lovely new coffee shop has opened around the corner. Services like laundry and mini mart are close by.

Very central, nice pool, quiet street. Owner offered after booking inmediatez help for transfer from airport (400.000 vnd). And helped booking 2 tours. Breakfast options. Family run, extremely nice and friendly atmosphere.
So good
オーナーのかたにはとても気を使っていただいた 朝食も美味しく 部屋もすばらしかった またホイアンに行くときに宿泊したい 唯一残念だったのが バスタブのお湯がうまくでず また 栓から水が漏れてしまい お湯を貯めることが出来なかった

Et ganske fint hotel i behagelig gåafstand fra indre by så der er stille og roligt især når man lukker døren. Stort og rummeligt værelse med lækkert badeværelse med grønne planter og åbent ud til. Men det bedste er klart verden willy som er meget hjælpsom og rar at snakke med om alt muligt. Stor anbefaling herfra!
Amazing stay. Would definitely stay again!

Great property in an unbelievable location. The breakfast is freshly cooked to order, a stark contrast to some poor hotel buffets in vietnam. The management are very friendly and the pool is great and peaceful. I am generally a relatively critical reviewer but i struggle to find things wrong with this hotel, especially for the price.
Very clean and maintained property. Highly recommended
Really good for the price.
The owner was really nice and helpful and the rooms were exceptionally clean. The pool is nice as well and the breakfast was great.
조용하고, 나름 신경써준 느낌이 있는 작은 숙소예요 엄청 깨끗하거나 새거는 아니지만 아무 불편함 없이 잘 지내다 갑니다
Reception very nice, tour information,clean and really kind. Near from the old center and free bicycles

Can t recommend this hotel highly enough! lovely spacious rooms, delicious breakfast, large pool and great location (quiet but central). We loved the free bikes and used these each day to get around and see the city. Very friendly staff, keen to make our stay as comfortable as possible and with plenty of recommendations. We stayed in a room with an outdoor bathroom and loved it - something we haven t experienced before and quite cool! the bath in particular was fantastic, a great spot to relax after a day of exploring. We also liked that this is quite a small hotel (more of a villa - as the name suggests) so had a more personal feel. Great spot to stay!
とっっっっても綺麗なところでした 市街へのアクセスも徒歩5分程度で オーナーも英語のわかる優しい方でした

Spent 3 nights at the sunny pool villa, and happy to say that everything met or exceed our expectations. The staff were always friendly and helpful beds were comfortable room was clean pool was refreshing. Breakfast wasn t overly impressive, but still satisfactory. Minors drawbacks include being a little far from the main strip, and the chickens on neighboring properties who like to crow at first light. Overall, a great stay!

1층 제일비싼방 잡았는데 우선 죽어있는 벌레들이 너무 많았고(벽에 누가 쳐서 잡은거, 침대에 죽어있는거)화장실이 욕조랑 야외에 있었습니다. 커튼쳐서가렸고 낮에 샤워나 반신욕하기에는 좋은데 밤엔 모기가 너무 많고 화장실 문이 고장났는지 닫히지않아서 계속 열어지길래 끈으로 묶고썼어요. 따뜻한 물이 나오다 말아서 야외인지라 더 추웠어요ㅜㅜ... 에어컨은 빵빵하구 방도 넓습니다. 아침에 먹은 바나나 팬 케이크가 너무 맛있었구요. 간단히 나오는 과일쥬스와 과일도 좋았습니다. 수영장도 1.2m부터 1.5(?)로 점점 깊어지는곳이라 좋았어요. 용다리앞에서 커피 한 잔하는게 쩌니까 가보라고 추천도해주셨어요 ㅎㅎ 인사도 한국말로 해주시고 따뜻하고 좀 더 청결하면 가격만큼 좋은 곳이 될 것 같아요.

This is a nice homestay close to the ancient town of hoi an. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. Bicycles are free to use for guests but limited in number and some of them could do with a little maintenance (brakes could work better). The breakfast selection is good with a variety of dishes to choose from and is made with fresh ingredients purchased that same morning. The only issue i encountered was the number of flies in the dining area which made it quite uncomfortable to eat. They should perhaps consider purchasing a trap or a zapper. Apart from that though, i enjoyed my stay at sunny pool. The location was good, staff were excellent, and the pool does indeed catch the sun all day! it s also worth noting that the wifi is excellent throughout the property.

Had a good stay at sunny pool. Spacious, clean, comfortable room. Close proximity to old city. Free bicycles available which was an assist. Wally was very friendly helpful. I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Fantastic to stay at this hotel. We would like to comeback there again.

A really nice and cost resort. The rooms are super. Big, clean, comfortable and with very nice bathrooms. The staff is also great. Very personal, helpful and friendly. I would definitely stay here again.

후기가 많이 없어서 사진만 믿고 예약했는데 사진보다 훨씬 좋은 숙소를 보고 놀랐습니다. 저녁 늦게 체크인을 해서 걱정했는데 사장님께서 기다리셨다가 따뜻한 차와 함께 친절하게 설명해주셔서 좋았습니다. 새하얗고 깨끗한 숙소(벌레도 없어요), 친절함, 예쁜 수영장, 맛있는 조식(베트남여행 중 가장 맛있는 빵이었습니다!)들을 믿기지않게 저렴한 가격으로 누릴 수 있어 행복했습니다. 좀 더 머물고 싶었지만 일정이있어 아쉬웠고 다음번에 다시 여행간다면 꼭 이곳에서 머물고싶습니다. 제가 여행을 많이 다녀봤지만 이렇게 사장님이 친절하고 숙박객에 대한 배려나 서비스가 좋은 곳은 처음이었습니다. 최고입니다!!! i only made reservations on pictures because i didn t have many reviews, but i was surprised to see a much better accommodation than the photos. I was concerned about checking in late in the evening, but it was good that the host waited and explained the warm tea to me kindly. It was white and clean (no bugs) accommodation, kindness, a pretty swimming pool, and delicious breakfast (it was the most delicious bread of all time in vietnam!) i was so happy to get an incredible price. I wanted to stay more, but i was sorry that i had a schedule and i would like to stay here if i could travel again next time. I have traveled a lot, but it was the first time that the host was kind and attentive to guests and good service. Best !!!

We stayed here for 6 nights and we really enjoyed it. We booked an ensuite on the ground floor right next to the pool. The room was so much bigger than we expected and exceptionally clean. The bathroom was also bright and spacious. Hotel manager wally is very helpful. We loved everything about it especially the freshly prepared breakfast.

The bedroom, bathroom, dining and pool areas were all top shelf. Wally was an outstanding host. He arranged our inexpensive transfer from the danang airport, with the driver holding a sign with my name on it. He taught us everything about hoi an and vietnam. We stayed 2 nights, then two nights on cham island. He even arranged our transfer from the hoi an harbor to our hotel in danang!
Hotel staff is very kind and has mind of great hospitality.
Excellent location. Owner was very helpful providing information about hoi an. Very good breakfast.

Lovely homestay in a perfect location near hoi an old town. Everything is in walking distance. The homestay is in a quiet road, run by a kind family. Mr lee was very supportive. Would highly recommend to come here when visiting hoi an.
オーナー夫婦が非常に親切 朝ごはんも美味しかった
Lee and his wife and staff were lovely. Very helpful and kind. Clean rooms, lovely breakfast.
What a fantastic place to stay with mr lee and family and staff. The friendliest people you could ever meet who go out of their way to make you feel welcome.
Chủ nhà dịch vụ rất tốt, thân thiện, chỗ ở sạch sẽ, gần phố cổ, cầu nhật bản, đi bộ được, rất thuận tiện.
Vị trí tốt, gần phố cổ.
Nói chung ok, phòng tốt, gần chợ hội an, nhưng đặt 2 phòng đẩy bảo có người ở 1 phòng rồi, phải nâng phòng khác (tôi đã đặt rồi, tại sao vẫn có người ở rồi? tôi bối rối quá.)
ท พ กด มากบรรยาศด ใกล เม องเก าสามรถเด นไปได
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, chủ dễ thương, chăm sóc rất tốt.

- rất là ưng ý nha, gần khu phố đi bộ nếu đi bộ thì tầm 5 phút là tới đầu phố luôn. -khách sạn sạch sẽ, có đầy đủ dịch vụ, xe đẹp cx như mới không lo gặp mấy cái kiểu gỉ đế độ không chỉnh ghế được, hay nghẻo đầu xe như khi mình đi mấy năm trước. Quan trọng là có cái máy sấy tóc đó chài, mừng rớt nước mắt. -tuy là không có cầu thang máy, nhưng chú chủ nàh rất nhiệt tình và luôn trực để đem đồ lên. - nếu bạn đi ô tô và chưa đi hội an bao giờ thì mình rất là khuyến khích đi chỗ này nha. Chỗ chú có thể đậu ô tô được đó. Nếu đông thì bên cạnh cũng có bãi đậu xe. Đi mấy bước à. - hình ảnh đăng lên cũng giống như hiện trạng rồi, nên mình không úp hình nha ))) tại thiệt ra là đi chơi dữ quá nên quên chụp rồi.
Chủ vui vẻ nhiệt tình, thoải mái.
Sạch sẽ, rất thích, sẽ quay lại
Tuyệt vời ông mặt trời khách sạn đẹp và sạch sẽ
Khách sạn sạch, cô chủ đáng yêu tạo điều kiện check in sớm khi có phòng và di ra phố cổ chỉ khoảng 300 mình
Phòng đẹp và rất sạch sẽ. Chỉ có bữa sáng là không ổn.
Các nhân viên chăm sóc rất tốt. Tôi được nâng cấp lên phòng gia đình gần chợ đêm.

Mình đã có một ngày trải nghiệm thú vị tại hội an với villa vi khoa, phòng rất sạch, mới, đẹp. Nhân viên thân thiện, dễ chịu, cảm giác như ở nhà mình. Vị trí kháchsạn cũng gần phố cổ, dễ dàng cho việc thăm quan và ăn uống, mua sắm. Nhất đinh sẽ quay trở lại
Dịch vụ nhân viên rất tốt nhưng chúng tôi có đặt cho 4 người trên một phòng quá nhỏ cho 2 người

Chúng tôi ở 2 đêm tại đây trong phòng có ban công và nhân viên rất thân thiện. Họ cung cấp taxi đến đà nẵng và khớp giá với grabcar. Rất hữu ích. Căn phòng sạch sẽ. Nước nóng cũng hoạt động tốt. Đối diện khách sạn, có một nơi bán cơm và gà ngon. Nó ở một vị trí tuyệt vời, đi bộ từ phố cổ nhưng không quá gần nên không ồn ào. Các bữa ăn sáng không phải là tự chọn. Bạn có thể chọn một bữa ăn và một thức uống.
Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện. Rất gần chợ cũ có thể đi lại thoải mái
Khách sạn rất gần với cây cầu và chợ đêm nhật bản. Các phòng đều sạch sẽ và hợp lý.

- nhân viên nhiệt tình ở đây các bác nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, có thuê xe đạp miễn phí. Lúc mình đến thì mình muốn ở tầng lầu nên đành thêm tiền ở phòng có ban công. - phòng ở nội thất nhiều gỗ, ấm áp và có phong cách tây. Ga giường thơm tho thoải mái. - vị trí quá gần phố cổ quá tiện luôn )

Ấn tượng từ lúc xuống xe luôn ạ, cô chú chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình ra đón với xách vali hộ chúng mình, vì có phòng nên được checkin sớm. Phòng sạch sẽ, ghế sofa êm quá trời, hơi nhỏ chút nma mình ở một đêm thôi với giá siêu rẻ nên kh vấn đề gì, có ban công thoáng. Nois chung là tuyệt ạ, mình thích cô chú chủ nhà lắm, nhiệt tình quá trời luôn, cô chú hỗ trợ mọi nhu cầu của mình luôn ạ
Phòng ở như hình, rất rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. Bố trí đúng phòng đặt. Tiện nghi đầy đủ, thoải mái
Phòng sạch sẽ, gần trung tâm. Nhân viên nhiệt tình.
Phòng sạch sẽ, nhưng đặt 4 phòng, đủ để ở. Có 3 phòng, 1 phòng cần nâng cấp. Và phải trả nhiều tiền hơn có vấn đề này một mình tất cả những thứ khác đều tốt
Phòng thoải mái, nhìn giống như hình ảnh. Rất đẹp và sạch sẽ để ở. Vị trí tuyệt vời, đi bộ rất ngắn đến phố cổ và chợ đêm. Mọi người đã tốt đẹp.

Khách sạn này thực sự tốt. Tôi có thể đi bộ đến phố cổ khoảng 5 phút. Và cũng nơi này thực sự khá, thậm chí gần đường phố. Thích hợp cho gia đình, vì họ có phòng gia đình, đặc biệt có thể kết nối 2 phòng bằng ban công, thật tuyệt. Nhân viên rất tốt và thân thiện. Tôi cũng có một thời gian tốt ở đó. Cảm ơn rất nhiều!

Mình đặt khách sạn từ giữa tháng 1, phòng đôi, có ban công. Lúc đến nhận phòng thi chị lễ tân áo xanh với một thái độ không mấy vui vẻ nói phòng có ban công minh đặt có người nước ngoài muốn ở lại thêm nên hết rồi, giờ chỉ còn một phòng giường cho hai người, em đồng ý đổi phòng thì gửi lại 100k tiền chênh lệch phòng, không thì báo agent huỷ hoàn lại tiền. Đến hội an rồi còn mắc công đi tìm phòng nên mình đồng ý. Phòng mình ở tầng 4, lúc mình đi chơi tầm 3h chiều xuống cầu thang thì thấy 2-3 phòng khác không có khách ở, rộng hơn. Vậy mà hồi trưa chị lễ tân bảo hết phòng. Định đánh giá cho 0 sao nhưng lúc về gặp chị chủ nhà, chị lễ tân khác hồ hởi, vui vẻ cộng với villa rất sạch sẽ nên góp ý để cải thiện.

Phòng cách âm cực kỳ kém nên quá ồn ào, ngoài hành lang ai đi hay nói đều nghe thấy hết, cực kỳ khó chịu. Trong phòng thì luôn có mùi ẩm ướt, chăn gối cũng vậy. Nhà vệ sinh không có hút mùi nên rất hôi và ẩm. Đồ ăn sáng không có lựa chọn gì ngoài cháo và bánh mì trứng, cùng 1 vài món cơm và rau xao. Nói chung là khá thất vọng về khách sạn. Điểm cộng duy nhất của khách sạn là bạn nhân viên bảo vệ siêu nhiệt tình. Bể bơi ok nhưng khá sâu nên trẻ em cần có người trông

Một số phòng có mùi thuốc đuổi muỗi. Đặt phòng cùng một lúc nhưng không có phòng liền kề. Có xe đạp mượn để đi tham quan phố cổ miễn phí. Có một khu chợ không xa chỗ ở. Và có những cửa hàng tiện lợi xung quanh đó

Trải nghiệm cực kỳ tồi tệ!!! nhắc lại là cực kỳ tồi tệ mình và gia đình nhận phòng lúc 5h chiều dự định đi ăn uống linh tinh rồi về tắm rửa mới đi chơi thì phát hiện ra cả 4 phòng đều mất nước( sau đó có thêm 1 vài khách tây khác cũng xuống phản ánh vì không có nước) . Gọi chủ nhà thì ừ à cho có xong bọn mh đi chơi tới muộn về vẫn không xử lý được mà cũng không nói rõ được là khi nào sẽ có. Cuối cùng cả nhóm 8 ng phải sang hàng xóm tắm nhờ vì quá muộn rồi. Chưa hết bất ổn khi phòng người lớn nhà mình đang ngủ thì tự nhiên cửa kính phòng tắm ( ngay cạnh giường ngủ) vỡ tan ra sụp xuống kính bắn vào chảy máu tay và bụng chú mình. Cứ nghĩ vô tình 1 phòng bị thôi nhưng cơ sở vật chất nhà này cực kém vì phòng mình cửa kính tắm cũng nứt, phòng em trai mình nằm thì trần nhà có lỗ nước nhỏ xuống liên tục, gạt nước vòi hoa sen của nhà tắm cũng bung ra!!! mình không định đánh giá xấu vì thấy vụ mất nước cũng là do ngta không mong muốn. Nhưng cách hành xử của chủ nhà không khéo! chai nước khoáng loại 500ml để trong phòng tính tiền 10k 1 chai không đáng là bao. Bọn mình ở mất nước nên lấy tạm nước đó đánh răng hôm sau anh ấy vẫn thu tiền như thường mặc dù bọn mh đã nói rõ tụi em lấy đánh răng, mình cũng móc tiền ra trả luôn khỏi tranh luận mất thời gian )) bình nước lọc miễn phí không phải nước đóng chai mà là loại bình nước tự rót vào rồi đậy nắp nên quá nhiều người dùng chung không an toàn vệ sinh! (bình mình không chụp được ảnh nên minh hoạ lại cho mọi người hiểu) ga giường bẩn, có kiến gió em mình bị kiến bò vào tai lúc nửa đêm.... Phòng mùi lắm mọi người ạ. Bị bí ấy! nói chung trải nghiệm cực kỳ bất ổn và không yêu nổi!!!

Phòng đẹp như ảnh cung cấp. Ngay gần phố cổ hội an tiện đi lại. Anh chủ dễ thương. Giá cả hợp lí. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Phòng sạch sẽ, view nhìn ra ruộng lúa rất đẹp (nên đi đúng mùa lúa). Anh chủ và các bạn, các cô chú nhân viên local rất nhiệt tình, dễ thương.

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Một nơi tuyệt vời dành cho gia đình hoặc các cặp đôi. Đúng như tên gọi chốn bình yên - ở đây thật sự tĩnh lặng khi hoà mình cùng view cánh đồng lúa mênh mông bất tận. Những điểm tuyệt vời khác không thể không nhắc tới đó là kiến trúc hoài phố cổ kết hợp với hiện đại đậm chất hội an. Ngoài ra thái độ niềm nở nhiệt tình của nhân viên khách sạn, đồ ăn cho đến những chi tiết nhỏ đều tuyệt vời. Thật xứng đáng tới từng đồng khi đặt phòng ở nơi đây....

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Phòng rất đẹp, view đồng lúa khá là chill, nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, dễ dàng di chuyển ra phố cổ. Tuy nhiên không có thang máy, khá bất tiện cho người lớn tuổi nếu ở tầng cao. Nhưng tổng thể mọi thứ rất ổn. Highly recommend

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Khu phong cách đẹp, mới, sạch sẽ và gần phố cổ. View đồng lúa yên bình và thoáng mát. Anh chị lễ tân nhiệt tình và dễ thương. Nói chung là giá quá oke so với chất lượng mình đã trải nghiệm

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Một chốn bình yên với kiến trúc, chi tiết xinh xắn. Vị trí phù hợp với những người không ưa ồn ào như mình.

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Khách sạn yên tĩnh, lễ tân nhiệt tình, phòng đẹp và rộng hơn mình nghĩ, có view đồng lúa rộng thoáng. Hài lòng và sẽ quay trở lại

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Highly recommend cho gia đình hoặc cặp đôi nào thích không gian thanh bình riêng tư, kiểu hướng nội, từ lễ tân đến các cô phục vụ phòng đều niềm nở tươi cười, là sạch sẽ thoáng mát tất cả các phòng đều có view đồng lúa rộng mênh mông mà ngồi thiền ở đây hết nấc luôn ạ, khách sạn có xe đạp miễn phí đạp vào tt phố cổ rất gần ! mỗi tội điều hòa hơi kêu tí thôi nói chung mình chấm 9/10

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Ks ko có cầu thang máy, đường vào ks cũng khó đi nếu đi oto, phòng thì mình ko rõ vì sao mở điều hoà mà nó vẫn ko mát đều, mình có dùng thêm 1 chai nước lọc lớn trong mini bar, uống gần hết chai cầm lên xem mới thấy hạn sử dụng đã hết (hsd 8/2021). Ksan có view balcony ra đồng nhìn thích. Cuối cùng 1 chuyến đi trải nghiệm mình ko thấy hài lòng

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Phòng còn đẹp hơn trên hình. Rất sạch sẽ, nhân viên và anh chị chủ vô cùng dễ thương.

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Phòng y hình, có view cánh đồng lúa rất đẹp, nhưng lúc mình đi vào mùa gặt nên hơi buồn vì không chụp được view lúa. Kiến trúc, nội thất tinh tế, có bồn tắm view siêu xịn. Nhân viên và anh chủ cũng nhiệt tình, thân thiện. Nếu có dịp ghé hội an sẽ quay lại

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Mình đã ở nhiều khách sạn ở hội an nhưng đây là khách sạn đẹp, yên tĩnh và có nhân viên dễ thương nhất mình từng ở hội an. Phòng sạch sẽ, chilling view rất ưng, các bạn nên book phòng có private garden view đẹp lắm mọi người ơi mọi thứ ở đây đều làm mình quá hài lòng, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại lần sau

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Khách đẹp, sạch, thoáng mát và bình yên. Thật tuyệt vời !

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Nhìn chung, giá cả rất phải chăng. Vì sử dụng năng lượng mặt trời nên hệ thống nước có thể rất nóng vào mùa hè.

hotelName: Hoian Tranquil Lodge - Chon Binh Yen
userCmt: Mọi thứ quá tuyệt. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, phong cảnh tuyệt đẹp. Hồ bơi cũng rất chill. Mọi thứ quá ok, 10/10
Good
観光再開前でゴルフもホテルもとても空いていました ダナンのリゾートに幾つか泊まりましたが その中でもオススメです 部屋も凄く綺麗で食事の種類も多く良かったです
Every thing in here were very good except the staffs. Very bad attitude from them! never come back again!

Das hotel ist neu und noch nicht 100 fertig. Der service ist gut, entspricht aber meist noch nicht einem 5 -sterne level. Zu viele fehler passieren noch (falscher hinweis bezüglich check-in, essen / getränke kommt nicht / zu spät / falsch). Lage und zukünftiger / vollständiger ausbaustandard werden wohl sehr gut sein. Verbesserungen sind aber notwendig.
침구류 세탁 후 완전히 건조가 안된 듯한 냄새가 났어요. 습한곳에서 수건 말리면 이상한 냄새 나는데 그런 냄새였어요. 정도가 아주 심한건 아닌데 호텔 침구류에서 처음 맡아보는 냄새였어요 ㅠㅠ 다른 서비스들은 매우 친절했고 부대시설도 좋았어요.

This place was probably the best hotel i have had the pleasure of staying in. The staff were super helpful and treated us like part of the family. Would definitely recommend for a stunning relaxing holiday.
완벽한 숙소 및 부대시설 꼭한번 방문해보시길 추천드려요
グッド
Great all around. But the only thing is their vent system is not good

It was the best hotel in my life. Everywhere around the hotel is very clean and all the staffs were extremely kind and polite. Manager tina, kate, and helen helped me prepare my boy s birthday celebration. My boy was so happy about it. Thank you very much! i will definitely stay this hotel again
여태까지 가본 호텔중에서 최고였습니다. 시설도 깨끗하고 특히 직원들이 너무 너무 친절했습니다. 다음에 무조건 다시 갈 예정입니다
모든면에서 , 다 좋고 , 좋았지만 , 냉장고가 너무 약해서 가지고 간 음식들을 오래 먹을수 없었어요.

My husband and i, along with our two children (7 and nearly 2) stayed here for 6 nights. We booked 2 rooms, but one of the rooms was smaller than the other, so the information provided wasn t entirely accurate. We had booked our stay well in advance and had requested a room on a higher floor to avoid mosquitoes. Unfortunately, when we arrived, they only had two rooms left, both on the second floor, which was disappointing. The receptionist assured us there wouldn t be any mosquitoes on the second floor. However, as soon as we entered the room, we could smell mosquito spray, which we recognized from frequent use during our trips in asia. Within the first hour in the room, both my daughter and i were bitten by mosquitoes. Throughout our stay, i killed several mosquitoes in our room every single day. But given that no other rooms were available, we made the best of the situation. A big plus for the hotel is that they have their own healthcare staff, which is very reassuring. Another highlight was the breakfast buffet at aroma restaurant great atmosphere, a wide selection of food and drinks, and an overall fantastic restaurant. I want to especially thank kim chi and nghi for their excellent service at aroma. Both were very thoughtful and took great car
Well i would of given a 5 stars, cause of my room wasn t an ocean views as i ve booked online it said ocean view, they also mistaken my name in a different room. Not happy
The front desk is vert friendly and helpful while check in and check out. Will come again definitely
Very goood
We stayed almost 2 weeks! our room had a balcony and it overlooked the night market! we watched them put up and take down their wares every night! it was so interesting! loved it
空港から有料で送迎してもらえました 朝食もととても良かった

The staff was very friendly and helped us with a small incident upon check-in. Would highly recommend this hotel as long as you re not looking to be swept away in luxury. Very convenient to shopping and sightseeing.

Nice smaller hotel 5-10 min walk to lantern boat bridge and hoian old town. Night market on the street in front of hotel until 10pm, market quickly packed up and street very quiet at night. Room very clean. Hotel wi-fi a bit spotty at night when guests return and all try to login.
Highly recommended this place, the area so convenient to get around ( 6 mins to the central of hoi an). Front desk service pretty helpful too!

This hotel is right in the middle of the night market and an easy walk to the river and old town. They also have bikes so you can head out to the rice fields or spend the day at the beach for a change of scenery. The staff was incredibly welcoming and accommodating. Our superior twin room had really comfortable full sized beds. It s worth noting that the window in the room actually faces the interior of the hotel not the outside. We were able to switch to another room half way through our stay and got a balcony on the street. It was a huge upgrade but worth every penny!
A lovely place to stay in hoi an. Our room was comfortable and staff were friendly and helpful. I would happily return to the hoianan hotel.
Best hospitality kindness best location thank you
Excellent location ! efficient and very helpful staff. Great breakfast overall superb value for money.
Nice place to stay near where you want to be ..enjoyed the indoor pool.
Thank you for good service and very accommodating staff.

This is a great hotel for the money and the decor and vibe is very nice.the distance to great hoi an sites is really convenient, though those arriving after 4 pm should note that the hotel is inaccessible by car due to the night market on its doorstep. The only reason i couldn t give it 5 stars is because the breakfast wasn t great. They should be offering a more mainstream vietnamese soup at breakfast, like pho bo or pho ga, and neither of those were offered the entire length of my stay there.
問い合わせに対する回答がとにかく早く丁寧である トリプルベッドの部屋に泊まったが 二個のスーツケースを広げてもなお十分な生活スペースを確保できる

We had a fantastic three-night stay, booking two rooms for our trip. The customer service was excellent from start to finish. We particularly loved the hotel s prime location, with a lively night market right outside the door it was so convenient to step out and explore! a definite highlight was being able to check out the hotel s bikes my son and i had a great time cycling around the area. To top it all off, the delicious buffet breakfast was a perfect way to start each day. We highly recommend this hotel!
レセプションの姉さんが素敵でしたが やはりナイトマーケットが目の前なので 夜はうるさいです
The staff was excellent and very efficient
立地はナイトマーケットの目の前で街歩きにはとても良い場所です 部屋は必ず窓のある部屋をおすすめします 最上階の窓のない部屋に3泊しましたが 斜めになった天井に頭を何度もぶつけました バスルームも狭くて最終日の朝は蛇口から水が少ししか出なくて困りました タオルはちょっと生乾きの匂いがしました テレビもyoutubeぐらいしか見れなくて残念 それ以外はスタッフの方も親切で朝ごはんもおいしかったです
Hospedagem excelente, quarto muito bom. Próximos dos atrativos turísticos. Café da manhã estilo asiático, poderia ter mais opções para o gosto ocidental. Funcionários simpáticos e atenciosod
何かと便利な場所にありました

Room is pretty run down. Foul smell in the bathroom, room has strong musky smell. Hand wash, bath gel and shampoo smelt really bad. Do not understand how they didn t realise it. Breakfast was basic with lots of variety of fruits. Only went once out of 3 mornings. Positive location is good, right infront of the night market and many good restaurants nearby (5-10 mins walk). Receptionist, anh was helpful is giving us information re hoi an

We absolutely loved our stay. We wish we had more days at the villa. Our room was large. Very clean. We had a choice for breakfast items. The owners took such good care of us. Helped us with transportation. You must stay here if in hoi an.

This hotel is a hidden gem. It s a family run hotel and they are so nice to the guests. It feels more like a bed and breakfast. It s close to the beach and the old town. The best part is they have bikes you can borrow. I highly recommend this place.
Phòng rộng, giá quá rẻ. Vị trí sát bờ biển. Xứng đáng điểm tuy nhiên do không có nhân viên ở lại buổi tối nên cần đến checkin sớm. 7h tối chưa đến là nhân viên gọi điện giục suốt rồi

Quyết định chọn ở đây vì gần biển mà cuối cùng chưa ra biển luôn. Phòng ốc đẹp và sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Khu vực yên tĩnh và an ninh, phù hợp để đi gia đình lớn hoặc nghỉ dưỡng. Tuy nhiên hơi khó bắt xe grab, taxi để vào nội thành.
Thiếu mỗi tủ lạnh riêng trong phòng là hoàn hảo. Mọi thứ đều tốt. Nhân viên là mấy cô chú lớn tuổi và đều nhiệt tình

Overall really bad experience. Real safety questions that go to whether this place should be listed. The snorkel tour equipment was substandard (and there were no fins) and the owner was i believe inebriated in the tiny wood boat. Two other young women tried to get back into the boat but the owner was sleeping and the rope ladder broke. Extremely unsafe. Our room had no door on it and the owner and his wife were constantly coming in. My girlfriend was without clothes and the male owner came in and stared at her grinning until she yelled at him. The home stay was misrepresented in description. Basically, the descriptions are for an amalgamation of various home stays in this village. There is no balcony. The tv is also on loud. The electricity goes off at 10 pm in the village. There is a wonderful little buddhist monastery in the village worth going to and speaking with the young monk. I did not expect even a two star place and was not expecting it. I have traveled in many third world countries - that is not the issue. The issue is safety and security. We booked for two nights but left after one night. Depending on how you get to the islands a number of the boats are unsafe.

Så mycket homestay det kan bli! väldigt enkelt boende och ingen i byn förstod någon engelska. Trots det hade vi en härlig kväll med värdparet som kommunicerade med oss med hjälp av en ordbok. En upplevelse!

Dear fellow travellers, we spent two nights at island smiles homestay and i have to say it was the best decision we have made while travelling viet nam. Everything was incredibly well organised. Kim, the owner, contacted us two days before our arrival and she speaks very good english so it was very easy to communicate. Her mom, bui, came to pick us up at the main ferry arrival in bai lang. Then we took a second boat to bai huong with bui to go to the homestay. We were delighted to be there. The house is very clean and new as well as the sheets, the bathroom is functional, and most important the food bui cooked for us was incredibly delicious! we really enjoyed ourself at this homestay, we felt at home. Bui is such a loving person, she took care of us very very well. I would like to thank you kim and bui (also called mama kim ) for being so helpful during our stay on beautiful cham island. Lastly, i would recommend this homestay to everyone who is willing to learn about the real vietnamese culture and lifestyle. Cheers, zoe and florian

I had been in contact with homestay bai huong prior to our arrival to advise them that we were making our own way to cham island with a diving company. I asked them if they could pick us up from the beach where the diving company was going to leave us. They confirmed all was ok and they would come and get us. Once at the beach, we waited for over an hour but no one turned up. Despite the language barrier, we managed to arrange a lift by boat with a local vietnamese man. When we arrived at the village, a man confirmed he had received our email but he was not the owner of the place i had booked. I believe there was some confusion there and i might have emailed the wrong person. He took us to a place which was very basic and was not the place i had originally booked. I refused to stay there. So he found us another place to stay which belonged to the parents of the lady i had booked with. It still wasn t the place i had booked, as she (kim) had given our rooms to someone else but it was clean, had air conditioning and the couple were doing their outmost to please us. In the end, we were happy with the accommodation. Mama kim took great care of us, cooked us some wonderful food and was genuinely friendly and helpful, despite the language barrier. So i can t recommend the place we originally booked since we didn t stay there but i can highly recommend island smiles homestay, which is where we stayed.

Mama kim hosted us at her place as if we were from the family ! she has such a smiling face and so many nice attention that you forget about the language differences! she cooks as a chef, and her location is just amazing if you want to mingle with local people. We have also been on a fishing excursion organized by her, and it was so authentic. Such a pleasant moment ! i just regret that i couldn t stay longer !!

I have lived on 4 continents in 5 years and so have a sense of homestays . I can t say whether the genuine welcome i feel here is characteristic of all viet nam, or whether i have simply happened upon real people what i see, is that charming homestay is committed to making your time in hoi an, generally, and charming homestay in particular as fine an experience as they are capable - and i believe they are very capable

Nous avons trouvé cet hébergement par hasard et nous avons été loin d être déçues. Nhi est une hôte parfaite, aux petits soins, toujours prête à nous arranger. Le petit déjeuner est délicieux et fait maison, et les chambres sont propres et super confortables. Nous avons tellement aimé que nous avons souhaité revenir pour nos derniers jours au vietnam. Je recommanderai sans hésiter cet établissement qui me donne envie de repartir en vacances ! merci encore nhi et sa maman pour votre gentillesse qui nous touche en plein coeur !

We loved charming homestay in hoi an. The owner and hostess nhi, is a true gift to travelers. Among the many, many helpful things she did for us she arranged for car transfer from the airport to hoi an, which was very reasonably priced. She went out of her way to help us get the most out of our few days there, recommending various activities, restaurants, even a fantastic cirque du soleil inspired show with music, dance and acrobatics which was great! she gave us maps with directions to wonderful out of the way but beautiful locales eg an idyllic, beautiful open air restaurant where we enjoyed the serenity of the rice fields while having delicious drinks like iced coconut coffee. She also directed us to a likely equally great locales at the beach, but we never got to ride bikes (which she provides) out there due to monsoonal weather. If it wasn t for nhi we would have missed the wonderful cirque du soleil inspired show because we got caught in a monsoon rain, but she called a cab and then when he picked us up she gave him instructions to drop us off at the theater door. We got there in the nick of time! regarding the homestay room it was wonderful! large, airy, bright, with a balcony and garden view. Quiet, very private, and very clean, with a large very good shower. The king bed and pillows had nice linens the bed was very comfortable. A/c worked great. We slept very well. Nhi made us a delicious breakfast every day. We highly recommend charming homestay!

We actually booked our room at the charming home stay before we bought our flights. In essence, this whole trip was booked around our 9 day stay in hoi an and tet. Our room absolutely lovely, breakfast delicious, omg! incredibly accommodating. They did it all, arranged private cars, scheduled massages, recommended restaurants, things to do and see. We felt like part of the family! especially after celebrating the lunar new year with ms. Nhi. Our tet experience, complete!! our stay was truly charming! we are so grateful for their kindness and care. Ms. Nhi, ms. Ha, ms. Oanh and of course ms. Nhi s lovely mother. Truly have touched our hearts. Thank you! x1f970 x1f970 pingpongmike
방 깨끗하고 가성비 좋아요. 주인이 영어를 잘하고 친절해서 궁금한거 있으면 다 알려주구요. 투어 프로그램이나 교통편도 어레인지 해줘요. 요리도 잘 해서 쿠킹 프로그램도 있어요, 정말 편하게 쉬다 왔어요.

A totally home away from home away experience. Nhi, ha and others were amazing, went out of their way to make us feel at home. We had lots of fun. We will definitely stay here when ever we are in hoi an. Close enough to everything. Must have nhi s pancakes!!!! yummy!!!

A really great place to stay. 10 mins on the bicycle away from the old town or 20 mins across the paddy fields to the beach. Lots of good restaurants and bars within walking distance. The staff there are really, really friendly and booked all of our ongoing rail travel for us. Cannot recommend charming homestay enough. If you are hoi an and want to stay somewhere peaceful but close enough to everything stay here
Accomodation provides free bicycle that allows us to cycle around, to different parts of hoi an easily. Comfortable room with a backyard.

Toute l équipe (composée exclusivement de femme) est vraiment géniale et ils font tout pour que votre séjour soit le plus agréable possible. La cuisine est parfaite et les chambres sont propres avec tout le confort nécessaire. J ai vraiment adoré cette homestay ainsi que son personnel. Cette étape restera un moment important de mon séjour au vietnam et je vous recommande chaudement des vous arrêter à charming homestay si vous passez par hoi an.
Ein ganz tolles familiäres homestay...sehr freundliche und liebe menschen. Wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Hierher kommen wir auf jeden fall gern immer wieder...!

親切なニーさんのお陰で快適に過ごせました 最初の部屋は少し黴臭かったので メールに返信したところ直ぐに飛んできて部屋を変えてくれました 二日目の朝食はパンケーキをサービスしてくれたり チェックアウト時にはお土産をくださいました うちも何かプレゼントを持って行けばよかったと後悔しました 場所も市街地まで無料のレンタサイクルで15分位 アンバンビーチも15分くらい 少し大きな車の通りが多いですが 夜は静かでぐっすり休めました 雨季の終わり頃なので多少湿っぽいのは仕方ないですね

Very nice guesthouse with a friendly family atmosphere, and the price is great value for a good-sized room and decent breakfast. Nhi and her mother made me feel very welcome, and the hard-working nhi was always happy to help with advice and bookings for day-trips etc. And of course her mother is the star attraction, with her lovely warm smile! hoi an old town is about 20 minutes walk away from the homestay, there are free bicycles available but i found cycling on vietnam s chaotic roads too nerve-wracking to use them much! i don t know if i ll have a chance to return to hoi an, but i d definitely stay at charming homestay again if i do.
We found the property to be delightful! excellent facilities!friendly homestay!
Absolutely charming! comfortable, clean, friendly, great breakfast, fantastic hosts, great location and free bicycles too - excellent all round, thoroughly recommended!
Very clean room and friendly people. Good location to both town and the beach.

It was amazing. The familly that managed the homestay is lovely and very helpful. The house is truely charming and a great oas close to hoi an. Additionally they make delicious pankakes. I would really recommend them.

I had a wonderful time at charming homestay and recommend this place to everyone. Not only because of the beautiful large room, the cleanliness, the facilities you can make use of or the delicious breakfast, but most of all because of the friendly charming family who runs the hotel. From the first until the last minute, i felt at home with nhi and her mother around me. A place recommendable for everyone who likes a charming place that feels like home!

My spouse and i stayed at charming homestay and were hosted by ha, nhi, and her mother. Everyone was super nice and their home was great. The breakfast service was great! the room was clean and very nice.

Nhi is friendly, helpful and opens her home beyond what is required of a good host. Great service charming brekkie. Nhi s recommendations are tailored to westernizers, so feel free to venture out into more localized options.
My stay at charming homestay was exactly that! everything was great, from the helpful staff to the comfort of the room and the pretty garden. Thank you )

Located perfectly between the beach and the township with free bicycles to assist you in exploring, this homestay is perfect. The rooms are modern and nicely appointed with plenty of room. Nhi is a excellent host who i would gladly recommend to anyone.
편안하고 깨끗한 숙소. 시내까지는 거리가 있지맘 자전거로 15분 거리라 크게 불편하지 않습니다.

We had an excellent time at charming homestay. Nhi and ha were so lovely and gave us loads of local tips of where to drink, eat and where the best tailor was. The room was beautiful, big and spacious and a lovely bathroom. We will be going back for sure!!

A true homestay experience. Ms. Ni and her coworkers took great care of us, esp. My wife who was sick- calling the doctor early in the morning, regularly plying her with hot ginger tea etc. Ni s mom was such a sweetheart- genuine warmth and affection. The hotel is conveniently located between the ancient town and the beach, and they provide free cycles to get around. Service overall was better than the 5 star hotel we stayed in saigon. Highly recommended!

Das charming homestay wird von der wundervollen nhi und ihren mitarbeiterinnen geführt, die einem mit hervorragendem englisch jederzeit weiterhelfen können. Die zimmer sind toll eingerichtet, groß und verfügen über alles, was man benötigt. Vom homestay sind es 10 min mit dem fahrrad in die stadt und 15 min zum strand. Die fahrräder stehen kostenlos zur verfügung. Ich kann diese unterkunft ohne einschränkungen weiter empfehlen.

This property was disrepair, the front door was wide open when i arrived to check-in (at midday), this despite the sign in the lobby that said beware of thieves yet there was no staff on hand, the lobby was dusty and garbage on the floor. I waited over an hour and nobody came. When i finally got a hold of the manager (by phone) he rudely told me they had cancelled my reservation and then hung up (he did this in vietnamese, no english). All i can suggest is that you do not stay here, there are loads of great hotels in this neighbourhood, some on the same street.
종일 너무 더운 날씨를 피하다 못해 공항가기전에 잠깐 쉬려고 들렀는데 너무 더럽고.. 준비 안되어있는 스탭들의 모습에 실망했습니다.
Bác chủ nhà nhiệt tình lắm ạ, tuy đường vào hơi bé, ô tô không vào được nhưng mà phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ mà mới lắm, cũng gần phố cổ nữa

Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, cô ấy hỏi chúng tôi nên đi đường nào để chia sẻ những lời khuyên hữu ích và gợi ý đường đi ngắn nhất. Hơn nữa, vị trí khách sạn khá gần phố cổ hội an. Tôi thực sự khuyên bạn nên chọn homestay này, giá cả cũng rất phải chăng, chỉ 360.000 đồng cho 4 người.
Phòng sạch, cô chủ thân thiện, đi đâu cô cũng chỉ đường cho
Chủ nhà rất là nhiệt tình thân thiện rất ok luôn. Có cơ hội thì sẽ ghé lại lần nữa
Tôi ấn tượng và thiện cảm với chủ nhà ở đây, nhiệt tình vui vẻ, giá cả rất kinh tế cho căn gia đình ,có chỗ đỗ xe
Cô chú chủ nhà dễ thương lắm luôn á mọi người
Gần trung tâm phố cổ, yên tĩnh
Homestay cơ sở tốt, thân thiện, nhiệt tình
Cần thêm bàn trải đánh răng, mọi thứ thoải mái
Khách sạn ở thoải mái, chủ nhà nhiệt tình. Đáng chọn làm nơi nghỉ lý tưởng!
Chủ nhà thoải mái vui tính. Yên tĩnh. Cũng gần phố cổ
Phòng rất mát mẻ và sạch sẽ. Tôi đi cùng 2 người cao tuổi, họ rất thích không khí ở đó. Chủ nhà thân thiện và rất nhiệt tình. Nhất định tôi sẽ quay lại đó, cảm ơn
Chủ nhà thân thiện, thoải mái, gần phố cổ
Gia đình bác chủ thân thiện, phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. Nhưng bình nóng lạnh sử dụng bị lỗi, không có nước nóng. Nước buổi tối chảy yếu
Điểm mình cảm thấy ấn tượng nhất với hong cong homestay đó là sự thân thiện của cô chủ nhà, cô đối đãi với mình rất tốt, giúp đỡ và có những gợi ý rất nhiệt tình.

Đây là một lựa chọn tốt ở hội an. Khách sạn và nhà nghỉ ở hội an khá đắt nếu bạn tìm kiếm một địa điểm gần các phố cổ. Nhưng gia đình hồng công cung cấp một mức giá hợp lý với các dịch vụ và địa điểm tốt. Bạn chỉ cần 5 phút để đi bộ đến trung tâm hội an. Các chủ nhà rất thân thiện và trả lời tất cả câu hỏi của bạn về hội an.
Chất lượng ok, chăn hơi mỏng và điều hòa để số hơi khó nhìn
Do overbook nên phải ngủ phòng thờ, sợ ma gần chết, nhưng cũng may gặp người bạn rất ok. Cô chủ rất nhiệt tình mến khách.
Phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi. Mọi thứ như ở nhà
Cái giường ngủ chán quá, không êm ái chút nào. Khay đựng kem đánh răng dầu gội đầy bụi, không có sữa tắm, phòng tắm không có kệ để sữa tắm dầu gội gì hết. Được cái chị chủ nhà thân thiện.

Tối mới đặt chân đến hội an nên book vội buổi trưa. Book ngay được hong cong homestay trong hẻm nhg lại có đường tắt khá gần phố cổ, đi bộ đi xe đạp đều tiện. Phòng sạch, thoáng, đầy đủ mọi thứ điểm trừ là khăn tắm không được mới. Chủ nhà thân thiện và nhiệt tình giúp đỡ mình. Ở có 1 đêm nên cảm thấy khá ok
Phòng có 5 giường lợ, chủ nhiệt tình, nhưng phòng hơi cũ

Chủ rất thân thiện. Họ đã cho chúng tôi một phòng để nghỉ ngơi mặc dù chúng tôi đã đến trước khi kiểm tra giờ trong 5 giờ. Và vì tôi không hiểu làm thế nào đại lý tính phí cho tôi nếu tôi chọn thanh toán khi đăng ký. Anh ta ngồi xuống và nhận ra điều đó với tôi mặc dù tôi đã sử dụng dịch vụ.
Khu vực thiếu tiện nghi, check in gặp nhiều khó khăn. Tuy nhiên, với giá bình dân và đi 1 ngày thì cũng tạm ổn

Homestay trong ngõ nhỏ nên không đi ô tô vào được, xe máy hơi cũ, thuê với giá 100k, xe đạp 30k, đi bộ ra phố cổ tầm 15p, cống trong nhà tắm chảy hơi chậm. Đó là những thứ có thể cần cân nhắc chứ phòng ốc nhỏ nhắn, sạch sẽ, đáp ứng tốt nhu cầu cơ bản, máy sấy tóc và bàn là không có thì nhắn mượn chủ nhà, điều hoà mát rượi, rét run luôn. Cô chú chủ nhà thì nice không tả được huhuuu, bọn mình đêm mới bay nên cô chú cho checkout rất muộn luôn. Đi chơi hay gì cô chú cũng gợi ý và tả đường rất cụ thể. Chắc chắn vào hội an sẽ quay lại homestay vì cô chú tốt bụng và nhiệt tình quớ 333
Giặc sấy tới 150k, còn lại rất ok

Cô chủ nhà rất nice luôn. Cơ mà về dịch vụ thì thiếu thốn quá đi. Giá phòng như này ở đà nẵng được khách sạn khá xịn sò luôn ý. Ở đây giường tủ cũ kĩ, phòng tắm không có bánh xà phòng rửa tay, không có dầu gội sữa tắm. Đêm ngủ thì muỗi. Mà phòng ở khu như khu trọ. Thôi giá này ở đây chắc như thế là đúng
Ông bà chủ nhiệt tình, thoải mái, giường êmmm, mỗi tội vòi hoa sen hơi lỗi
Ở nhà tốt, khiêm tốn, rất tốt bụng, dịch vụ tốt, sạch sẽ, thoải mái, rất tốt, ấn tượng, chủ rất thân thiện và khiêm tốn.
Tạm! tối chó sủa bị giật mình giữa đêm. Phòng lúc đặt lúc trước 1 ngày tạm. Sau khi tour 3h về thuê thêm 2h đổi phòng khác rộng rãi, tốt hơn nhiều.
Phòng cũ kỹ, giá thuê khá cao, từ giường đến nhà vệ sinh mọi thứ đều cũ

Homestay trong ngõ, nhưng rất đẹp và tuyệt vời. Có sân vườn mát rượi, cô chú chủ vui tính và rất chu đáo. Mặc dù chỉ book phòng trước 30p nhưng mọi thứ được cô chú tạo điều kiện rất nhiều. 11 đứa băng băng đến quậy phá homestay. Sẽ qua trở lại hội an một ngày gần nhất và gặp lại cô chú.
Staff was very kind and helpful. Breakfast was very good. You get an idea how the vietnamese live (no shoes in the house, etc.)

Absolutely brilliant. Room was spacious clean and very comfortable great balcony. In a quiet location away from the hustle and bustle but still only a short 30 min stroll to hoi an old town or use one of their free bicycles good choice of breakfast. The staff were fantastic so friendly and helpful special mention to thi she is a star. If i ever go back to hoi an i will be staying there, i ll even rearrange my dates if they re fully booked could not recommend horizon homestay more

4family member (with a 2yrs old kid), they change my room immediately when we check in because the aircon not function well, much appreciate on this. Cook our breakfast when we wake up, so we get to eat hot fresh breakfast. Staff are very friendly and helpfull. Boss and staff are friendly, willing to help on any problem we have. Speak english, easy for communicate. Suitable for family stay.

Room given was bad as not as the pictures posted. Lady staff was very unprofessional as i arrived only told me room was fully booked. I booked my accommodation and she whatsapp me without informing the room was fully book until my arrivals. Bed had stain. Water in the shower was only hot for a very short time and low water pressure. I don t understand how this property can have a good rating from trip advisor. Definitely i will not stay there ever again. I have never had this bad encounter in hoi an after many times of travelling to hoi an.
Great stay!
Great value with exceptional cleanliness
Hotel was ok , very basic but clean enough very close to beach
Personal muy amable. Zona muy tranquila, algo alejada del bullicio de la ciudad, cerca del embarcadero al archipélago cham.
Close to beach
Decent hotel for the price you pay.
Great property for the price and the staff were super friendly. Loved my stay.
The housekeeping team is thorough, and the staff is friendly and attentive. It s a fantastic option for a comfortable, clean stay at a great price.
This hotel provided the quiet escape i was looking for. The rooms were well-maintained, and the atmosphere was cozy and inviting
I had a wonderful experience here. The hotel is conveniently located near popular attractions and public transportation, making it easy to explore.
Despite the affordable rates, the hygiene here was impressive. The staff ensured the rooms were impeccably clean, making this hotel a reliable and budget-friendly option.
The cozy setting of this hotel was complemented by its exceptional cleanliness. Every corner of the room was tidy and fresh, making for a relaxing and pleasant stay.
The value here is amazing, with rooms that are impeccably clean and comfortable. The affordable rates make it ideal for budget travelers seeking a high standard of cleanliness without overspending.
This hotel offers immaculately clean rooms at a very reasonable price. The housekeeping team does an excellent job, and the overall atmosphere is welcoming.

The hotel is a bit dates. The breakfast good. The staff very helpful. We booked an oceanview room but you could onl see the ocean when turning your head 90 degrees while on the balcony. And even then only a bit underneath the palm trees. Our room had a connecting door with a blind window in which means you might have lights illuminated when you want to sleep and your neighbours have their lights still on. Weird and only two large towels but no small one is bad standard.

Trevligt hotell nära flygplatsen så perfekt för transfer. Väldigt rent och fräscht. Vi hann inte äta frukost så vet ej hur den är. Enda att anmäla på är kuddarna som var stenhårda och höga. Annars prisvärt och fint.
Very different from pictures. Only 2 big towels for the room, nothing more. No toilet paper when i got there. Friendly staff and close to the beach but would not recommend
This hotel provided excellent value with spotless accommodations. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the affordable rates made it a fantastic choice for budget-conscious travelers.
Cozy rooms with friendly service at an affordable price. Perfect for those seeking a comfortable stay without overspending.
Phòng rất thoải mái nhưng bữa sáng không tốt hơn khách sạn 4 sao.
Nhân viên tốt bụng. Phòng ngủ rất lạ mắt và phần tốt nhất là phòng tắm. Tôi muốn giới thiệu khách sạn này cho các cặp vợ chồng muốn có một kỳ nghỉ lãng mạn.
Tôi đã có 3 đêm nghỉ rất thoải mái tại đây. Thuận tiện di chuyển nhưng vẫn tránh xa những con phố du lịch của phố cổ hội an. Tiện nghi được bảo trì tốt, bữa sáng buffet cũng rất đa dạng. Sẽ quay lại!
Tốt
I had limited interaction with the hosts, but they were friendly and helpful when needed. Restaurants and small shops are abundant in the area. It was a pleasant stay.
Great rooms, kind people, walking distance to the beach!
De accomodatie is heel basis maar heerlijk dicht bij strand. Personeel vriendelihk en behulozaam. Ontbijt ok. Denk een goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding.
It was really nice and spacious room and close to beach.
割安ということに尽きる 英語を話す家族は少しだけど みんなとても親切 手作り感だらけの朝ごはんもおいしいです
Great comfortable place close to city center. Great breakfast made on demand. Plenty of food and great coffee

Very quiet and clean property, only 5 minutes walk to the old quarter and night market, no elevator but the staff quickly bring my luggage up and downstair, air con works well, room is spacious but best of all is the service, the family is very friendly and attentive, they also help book a car to danang which is cheaper than grab, i would definitely stay here again.
Lovely room, really nice host, on a quiet street but only two blocks from where the action is. Recommended.
Amazing location. Beautiful family. Wish we could have stayed longer.
We have stayed at han huyen homestay at least 3 times and each time we have really enjoyed our stay, the homestay is very clean, and the location is excellent would recommend anyone to stay here

The owners are very friendly and do all they can to make your stay enjoyable. Its not a five star resort, and doesn t pretend to be. You get much more than what you pay. Easy walking distance to everywhere in old town.
Lovely helpful and friendly family. Fantastic location
We had an amazing stay, such comfortable and big rooms, comfy beds and quite nice neighbourhood. The family is friendly and helpful and gives recommendations on where to go.
Right from check in everything was just wonderful! the place is spotless and is in walking distance but also away from any noise just perfect
Great location and nice staff. Room was kinda dirty
Este hotel és la mejor opción para visitar hoi an. Atención personalizada, tranquilidad y perfecta ubicación con instalaciones muy modernas y limpias. Fantàstic place to stay!!!
Really friendly hosts. Great location, not far from everything but still nice quiet location. Modern clean rooms
Great and friendly service in my favourite vietnam city

호스트가 매우 친절하고 잘 도와주십니다. 방상태 전체적으로 깨끗하고 화장실도 깨끗합니다. 올드타운 걸어서 2분정도 거리로 가깝지만 숙소주변은 조용합니다. 아침식사도 기본 스타일지만 세심하게 잘 나오고 메뉴도 다양한 편입니다. 한 가지 아쉽다면 호이안이 워낙 덥고 저희 방이 3층이라 그런지 에어콘이 엄청 빵빵하지는 않습니다. 잠을 자는데는 문제가 없었습니다.

É uma casa familiar, bem próxima das áreas importantes. Staff atencioso e prestativo. Quarto grande, banheiro espaçoso. Condiz com suas descrições e estou satisfeito. Empresta bicicleta e oferece transfer por bom preço. Recomendo
Fantastic guest house in great location. Staff were always friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this place. Included free push bike rental which is a great way to get around town.

A real home from home, super location for seeing all the main sights and in a lovely quiet residential street. Lots of restaurants in the vicinity plus an interesting night market. We loved hoi an, quaint full of character. We enjoyed the use of the free bicycles the owners were helpful with onward travel provided us with an generous breakfast. Great stay thanks.
Great place to stay in hoi an. Close to all the sights. The homestay is run by a nice charming family. The rooms were nice and clean. Breakfast was real good.

Not sure you can beat the location, it was perfect. Just a short walk to old town, in a quiet street. Many restaurants nearby including the night market. The room was spacious clean and comfortable. The breakfast was good.
This place is located midway between the beach abd hoi an, they have free bikes or you can rent a moto for 5 dollars a day. Staff had spoke above average english.
Really liked hoi an and our stay here. They offer airport pick up for a small price, do take it.
Good thanks

도심에서 조금 멀리 떨어져 있지만, 가족들과 조용히 지내고 싶거나 조용한 연인들에게 적당함니다. 시끄럽게 떠드시는 분들이나 늦게까지 노시는 분들에겐 다른 호텔 추천! 호텔문을 일찍 닫아요.. 가족이 운영하시는데 정말 정직하시고 친절하시답니다. 호텔도 4성급 수준으로 시스템도 갖추고 아침도 맛있구요! this hotel is really cozy, it s 2star hotel but the reality is more than 4 star ! if you are quite thinker i recommend this homestay and th

Very friendly and helpful family. Loved having free bicycles to use,especially since thís homestay is a ways out òf town. Only downsides were a búsy, somewhat noisy street and lack of the promised garden view.

This homestay is run by a very lovely, friendly family. The building is new, the room was large and clean, the bathroom had a bathtub and nice hot shower. The room was tidied up every day, bicycles were provided for free and the laundry service was great. The breakfast (50,000 for choice of 1 dish, 1 drink and fruit) imo wasn t good value, the pancakes were to greasy and the coffee average but the pho, fruit juice and fresh fruit were nice. Overall this homestay has good service and good value for money. Recommend red dragon restaurant 5 minutes on foot down the road!
The family home-stay was wonderful they truly made us feel at home enjoyed an excellent breakfast each morning.

Vaerelset var meget standart, madresserne dog meget haarde. Servicen var lidt en blandet oplevelse, der var kun en som kunne engelsk - og hun var for det meste beskaeftiget af hende lille (soede) datter, men det gik altsaa en smule ud over servicen og det overskud man ogsaa forventer, at blive moedt af. God beliggenhed, med 10 min. Paa cykel (gratis) til byen hoi an og stranden - men man er afhaengig af cykel, scooter eller taxa. For os var dette dog intet problem.

Clean and spacious homestay. We originally booked one night and added a second night cause we enjoyed our stay there so much. The location is a 10 minute bike ride from downtown but we didn t mind at all because the homestay had bikes for use for free and motorbike for us 5. The location was also close to several food and coffee shops making it convenient. The owners were helpful and really nice. On the last day our night train wasn t until 10pm, and even tho checkout was 12pm, they let us leave our bags in their living room and take their bikes out until whenever we wanted. She even let us use her showers before leaving so we can be clean and refreshed for our overnight train! that was definitely a lifesaver. Great place overall! would stay again!
Udmærket

We stayed here for two nights originally and then extended our stay because we liked it so much! they really take care of you and it is like a home away from home. We have traveled in vietnam for almost 3 weeks and this was the best place we stayed. You can also get laundry done there - 30k/kg - and the bikes were great. We used them everyday. Location is a bit away from town, but it is a nice, easy 15 min ride into town. There are many shops and eating places within walking distance too.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The rooms were fine, although the beds a little hard but hey it s asia. The homestay also offers free bikes and we enjoyed cycling to the beach, rice paddies and old quarter everyday. We also really enjoyed the included breakfast daily. The omlettes, pineapple pancakes and fresh juice were just awesome! but what really sets the accommodation apart is the friendly genuine family that runs the homestay. They were so nice and we loved their children. We miss you baby ron )

We had a very warm welcome from the family and being a home stay there were only a few rooms, but ours had everything that we wanted for a very reasonable price. Bikes were provided to cycle around with the beach only 5-10min cycle and old town hoi an 10-15mins maximum. We stayed four night and throughly enjoyed it!

We really enjoyed our stay here with this wonderful family. The homestay is perfectly situated within 2k of the old town and 3k of the beach. Our room was spacious, very clean and with a nice balcony. Free bicycles and locks are provided which makes these journeys fun and quick (around 10 mins). Mopeds are also available to rent. The family are very, very welcoming and do everything to make you feel at home. They are also happy to book onward bus journeys, tours etc. The breakfasts are also very tasty with fresh fruit! thank you for such a lovely stay!

Plutôt 1 pension de famille qu un hôtel, cet établissement, situé entre ville et plage, est accueillant et confortable. Le petit plus des vélos à disposition. L hôtel est calme, mais les chambres sur rue sont extrêmement bruyantes, les fenêtres fermant très mal. Le petit-déjeuner, en cas de choix pain-beurre-confiture dans le menu, est vraiment trop succinct, dommage! le service s effectue en permanence avec le bébé de la maison dans les bras, c est très particulier et pas très rapide!

Great stay here, i really recommend it. Very clean, staff very friendly and helpful , breakfast was good, and cheap. The counter part would be that is not very close to the town but by 5-10 minutes by bike that s not a problem, even the beach is very near, like 30 minutes by bike, and not many restaurants nearby to choose, there is one in front of though and do not have dinner service, but nothing to have a bad rating because of that, definitely i will stay again, good to stay solo, with girlfriend, or family

Godt b b med regning god og meget venlig service. Vi havde to værelser og de sidste var klart det bedste, uden det første var dårligt. Enkelt med god morgenmad. Gratis cykler som vi brugte meget. Poolen var fin dog kun den godt tåle lidt mere pleje i forhold til rengøring.

一昨年前同じ時期にこのhanh nhung villa ハンニョン ヴィラに滞在しました とても気に入ったので 今回のホイアン訪問に際しても再度３泊滞在しました 今回予約していた部屋は デラックス トリプルルーム プールビュー だったのですが 足の不自由な方に私たちの部屋を譲ったので デラックス トリプルルーム 1 ベッドルーム シティビュー というもっと広い値段も少し高くなる部屋にしていただけました 滞在中はのんびりと過ごすことができ 美味しい朝食を頂き のんびりとプールで泳ぎくつろぎました プールは他の旅行客と重なることもありますが 私たちのように１時間２時間とのんびり過ごす方はいないので プライベートプールのようでした ハンニョンさんのお子さんも どうぞ と朝食のフルーツを運んで来てくれるなど 家族的な雰囲気の中でとても心地の良い時間を過ごすことができました 旧市街地には少し離れていますが 近所に炭火焼の焼肉店があったり美味しいお店もあり意外とホイアンらしさを感じられる拠点になりました
조식이 무척 신선하고 맛있음. 주인장이 친절하고 예의 바름

豪華さはなくても足りないものはない 居心地のいい宿です ホイアン歴史地区には少し離れている分静かで でもスーパーや美味しいレストラン カフェがたくさんありました あたたかな家族経営で 顔を合わせると気さくに声を掛けてもらい楽しかったです 朝食は前日に希望を聞かれ メインと飲み物を選びます プラス果物をたくさん いい朝が過ごせます プールも良かったです 最高 it s a comfortable inn that doesn t lack luxury, but has everything you need. Hoi an historical district is quiet because it is a little far away, but there are many supermarkets, delicious restaurants and cafes. It s a warm family business, and it was fun to have a friendly voice when we met face to face. Breakfast is asked the day before, and you choose the main and drink. Plus lots of fruit. Have a nice morning. The pool was nice too. Best!
Amazing stay, the family was so welcoming, room was clean, breakfast was delicious, we could use the bikes for free
Lovely hosts always willing to help with a smile.
주인이 아주많이 친절하고 조용합니다 올드타운 거리도 멀지않고 아침식사도 아주 맛있습니다 일단 전체적으로 깨끗해서 밈에들어요

Amazing 7 night stay. The family who owns the hotel are lovely and looked after us so well. The room was spotless clean. The pool area lovely and relaxing. The breakfast was delicious and plentiful. The location is perfect just outside of the crazy downtown core but close enough to cycle or walk easily. Free bikes to use and they rented us motorcycles at an excellent rate. When we come back to hoi an we will stay here! highly recommend.
Hotel bien placé personnel très sympathique et vraiment très pro , petit déjeuner très copieux.

We really enjoyed our time at this homestay. The family was very nice and did those little extras to make our stay more pleasant. Our room was comfortable, clean and quiet. The breakfasts (included) were well above our expectations with many choices and a genuine home cooked feel. Old town was a pleasant 30 min walk along the river and groceries and other services were close by. Highly recommended.

Hanh and nhung are incredibly welcoming and friendly hosts. The hotel facilities and pool area are fantastic, with the room being very clean and spacious. The best part of the stay is the breakfast, freshly cooked to order every morning with a drink of your choice. Recommend to everyone! wonderful! thank you hanh and nhung
가정적인 분위기로 편안함을 줍니다 사장님의 친절함으로 따스함을 느낍니다 정성스럽게 만들어주신 조식이 맛있어요 즐겁게 지내다갑니다 감사합니다
We had the best hosts on our trip so far. Very nice room, bathroom and pool. Also the breakfast was very delicious. They also have very cute dogs -)

I usually don t write reviews but we enjoyed our stay at hanh nhung villa so much. Hanh and nhung and their family were so lovely we felt like a part of the family during our stay. They went above and beyond and you can tell they truly care about everyone who stays with them. The villa was clean and the food was so delicious. The location is great and it is a quick walk to the old town and they have bicycles that are free to use. I would highly recommend this stay to anyone!

We had a very nice stay in the villa. The manager was very friendly and helpful. We rent a scooter directly at the hotel which helped us to get fast to the old town and to the beach. The breakfast (vietnamese western) is delicious (you order the day before). It was my husband s birthday during our stay - and he got a birthday cake from the hotel how friendly is this?! we felt welcome all the time and would love to come back.
Friendly welcome, very helpful family. Excellent breakfast. Room is very big and clean and nice pool free use of bicycles to go to the old town. Enjoyed my stay!

After travelling for 50 days, we thought we had an idea about what good service is. But hanh and her family took it to another level. We cannot recommend this place enough if you want to stay close to the city centre of hoi an. Rooms are super spacious and clean, beds are comfortable, there are free bicycles, a nice pool with sunlight until around noon and the breakfast is lovely (you choose from a menu each morning along with fresh fruit). But the best thing about the place is no doubt how welcoming, friendly and helpful hanh and her family are. She helped with tour tips, train tickets, finding a vegetarian cooking class that had opened after the pandemic etc. Don t miss out. Love from anna and lasse

This place is amazing. I felt at home right away. The staff are so kind and friendly, generous and helpful. The whole place is spotlessly clean. Breakfast is delicious with big portions. Really good bikes free to use makes it really easy to get to the beach or the old quarter. I will really miss this place and the family. I will definitely return.

Beautiful villa, great location and very friendly and considerate hosts! pool was a nice bonus, yet the sunlight reached the sunlounges only for a couple or hours. Breakfast was good - you had to choose your meal from different options which was nice. Would definitely stay here again!

Thankyou to the sisters their whole family, for giving the three of us a wonderful stay. The sisters provide wonderful service at all levels. Thankyou for the amazing dishes, fruit coffee every morning. Thankyou for arranging transport activities, providing bicycles for our convenience. The adjoined room is excellent (especially for the great price) with 3 comfortable beds, 2 clean decent bathrooms, good aircon, a nice balcony. The pool is a good size, cold clean. The villa is approx a kilometre from the old town, so it is peaceful quiet without being too far away (walking or a quick grab/taxi ride.) i would recommend hanh nhung villa for anyone visiting hoi an, be they single, couples, groups or families. I will definitely be staying again in future - there is no need to explore any other accommodation options in hoi an. 10 stars )

We arrived after a period of 2 weeks of continuous raining. Because of this, our room was extremely humid. This meant that even sitting on top of the bed made our clothes a bit wet and out towels could not dry even after a full day. We asked the host to change our bed sheets but it did not make a difference. They offered us to change a room but the other option was extremely humid as well. Sadly the lack of anti humidifyer made the situation unbearable to us so we had to check out and move to a different hotel. Such a pity because the staff was very helpful and understanding, but our comfort and health was more important this time. Maybe during better weather conditions we would have had a great stay but it was not the case this time. We would not reccomend to others to stay here after our experience.

This is my second time staying here, and it was a wonderful hotel as always. They remembered my stay from two years ago and welcomed me with a warm smile. It s a bit of a walk from the old town, but they offer free bicycles, so it s no problem. The room was clean, and drinking a beer on the balcony while overlooking the rice fields was perfect.
Die eigentümer waren sehr herzlich. Ansonsten saubere und gemütliche räume.
ห องพ ก ห องน ำสะอาด เจ าของสามารถส อสารภาษาอ งกฤษได

Really enjoyed my stay. Family run small hotel. I especially liked the location. Convenient location about 1 km easy walk to old city, or about 1.5 km bicycle ride to the beach. Bicycle usage is free.
Nơi rất đẹp và chủ nhà thân thiện...

Phòng rất sạch sẽ, trắng tinh luôn, wc riêng trong phòng rất rộng, khăn tắm, xà phòng,... Chuẩn bị ngoài mong đợi. Có tủ quần áo to, tủ đầu giường, tivi, máy lạnh, bàn trà. Không gian ngoài thoáng mát, có bàn uống nước dùng chung gần giếng trời. Chất lượng quá tuyệt vời với mức giá. Anh chị chủ rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, anh còn giúp mình mua vé show ký ức hội an. Có dịch vụ giặt quần áo.
Chị chủ nhiệt tình, home thoải mái ,ra hội an là ghé như ở nhà ấy, feedback thứ 3 cho home rồi

Đặc biệt thích cái location ở đây theo quan điểm cá nhân á. Hội an là phố còn home giữa làng quê thanh bình, quanh có đồng lúa lớn và nhiều đường để dạo chơi nữa. Home có luôn xe đạp free để mọi người dạo quanh nơi đây nhaaa. Từ đây đến phố cổ chỉ 4km nhưng lái đi lái về rất nhanh và dễ thuộc đường nữa. Phòng rẻ và đầy đủ, chị chủ thì dễ thương. 10 điểm
Rất thích, chủ nhà nhiệt tình phòng đẹp, mới, đầy đủ wifi, điều hoà, nóng lạnh, tủ đồ giá tốt 190k/đêm đặt angoda t6.2023
10 nha, nên đi,anh chị chủ rất dễ thương, giá phòng rẻ cho du lịch , phòng có máy lạnh, có luôn nước nóng lạnh nữa, recommend mọi người nên đặt phòng ở đây hen

This place is a wonderful gem with a beautiful garden and pool area. The 2nd night we were there the owners threw us all a party with local dishes and some beer. Great way to meet the other guests and trade stories. Had a great stay. Staff was very attentive. Only complaint was that the key for our room was a nightmare to manage but the staff was always available to help us. Free bikes were a plus, 10 minute drive to town. We d returned for sure. Great breakfast.
Friendly staff and overall really nice place to stay. Would recommended.
안락한 휴식공간... 올드타운과는 조금 떨어져 있지만 휴양을 위해서는 최고
Very friendly service, great clean room and the pool is awesome
Et utroligt dejligt og roligt lille hotel. Super service. Meget fine værelser og en lille fin swimmingpool.
좋아요
Great spot for a couple nights. Close walk to a lot of sights and good restaurants. Staff was usually quite busy and it was harder to get info some times.
Really great service received from the 2 ladies. We definitely will go back to this hotel if go hoi an again!

It s a small villa style hotel with a nice pool area in the center. The rooms are nice and comfortable in a french colonial style with excellent private bathrooms. The staff is friendly and helpful and will ensure that you have a nice stay, only thing to be aware off, is that the hotel is located on a small side street in a residential area, and is bit away from the center. But the upside is that unlike most places in vn this was really quiet during the night.
Nice little place to stay if you like to spend all day out and about! staff very friendly.. Local constructruction going on ... 10 min bike ride to town..

We spent 3 nights here, although we wish it could have been more. We were immediately upgraded to a villa free of charge. The villa was fantastic and had a very comfortable bed 4 post bed and a big bathroom. The staff were really friendly and helpful. Breakfast was also delicious and is cooked to order for you each morning. The bagguettes are absolutely delicious (i d recommend the bacon) great location as you have free use of bikes and the ride to the market or beach is very easy and takes around 10 mins at a very leisurely pace. Really impressed with the whole team and hotel, would recommend staying here and will hope to come back again
Très beau petit hôtel, chambre confortable, bon petit-déjeuner, employés acceuillants et souriants. La piscine un must !!! très bien situé entre la plage et la vielle ville. Un excellent choix !

The staff are friendly and helpful especially the owner who even gave my mum a scarf. I was so sick yet they are able to assist me and getting me a taxi to hospital. The hotel is quite and relaxing. Love the size of the room but perhaps the cleaner can do a better job cleaning such as dusting some areas in the room as i have dust allergies so it s a bit annoying. Bathroom is huge but the plumbing are clogging as again the cleaners don t clean properly.

Mycket mysigt och trevligt hotell med bra sängar och även bra kuddar. Trevlig personal! man får låna cycklar och det är väldigt fint att cykla runt hoi an. Det kändes först lite långt till centrum men det va ett bra avstånd i ett mycket lugnt området. Mysig innergård med pool.
Brilliant service from the lady working on reception. She went out of her way to arrange a tour and a cooking class for us. Thank you!

Everything about this venue/hotel/villas was amazing, so much so our 1 night turned into a 4 night stay, in which we were upgraded to one of there lovely villas. Staff are amazing so helpful. Highly recommended.
Sehr grosses komfortables zimmer mit großem bad. Super betten. Das frühstück ist etwas wenig, aber man findet immer etwas. Zum gehen 20 minuten zum zentrum. Fahrräder kostenlos.
The room was very basic but also very large. The staff were very helpful and the a la carte breakfast was very good.
Tres bon sejour passé à l hoi an garden villas,tres beau jardin autour de la piscine,hotel calme et reposant,le plus deux salles d eau dans la chambre.
Personale accogliente e disponibile. Ambiente rilassante. Bella struttura
Wonderful place just off the beat path....ie..quiet!
Great location. Very quiet. Good breakfast. Wifi was good. Staff was very helpful.

This is a beautiful, quiet location, about 20 minutes walk from the old town. We were fortunate to be upgraded to a deluxe villa which was absolutely huge. The pool is fantastic. Breakfast was very good and i always saw staff cleaning even the smallest details around the property. There are restaurants and coffee shops nearby as well as tailors. We didn t use the free bikes, but took a taxi to an bang beach for 50k dong. Without a doubt i would stay here again. The photos really represent the property.
Great place to stay. Nothing was too much trouble.
The staff were amazing, the pool was nice,
구도심은 좀 거리 있지만 아늑하게 잘 가꿔진 숙소. 넓직하고 수영풀도 괜찮음. 다만 청소상태는 그닥. 주변 나무풀이 좀 있어 벌레 들어올 수 있지만 전체적으로 가격대비 훌륭하고 친절함

The staff here were very accommodating and very friendly. Room we had was massive but bathroom a little bit dirty. They provide free bikes to use which is great as its to far to walk to and around town. Overall great place to stay for the price
Friendly and welcoming staff, pretty close to hoi an town, with some good places to eat close by. Very good value for price paid

Lovely stay at these villas about 2 km from the old town. The staff were wonderful and attentive, the rooms were spacious, comfortable and clean. Bathroom is particularly nice. We had bikes to cycle into town and it was an easy if not slightly chaotic ride (but that s hoi an). Breakfast was simple and tasty - heaps of delicious fresh fruit!
Wir verbrachten 6 wunderbare tage in dieser schönen anlage wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen nur das frühstück war nicht so reichhaltig, wie wir es sonst in vietnam kennengelernt haben.

Das hotel ist super gelegen und auch das personal sehr nett die villas sind schön nur etwas dunkel das bad ist ein traum nur das frühstück war sehr basic das kenne ich hier in vietnam ganz anders das ist auch der einzige grund warum ich es nicht empfehlen würde
Hôtel très calme bien que très proche du centre. Le confort a répondu à nos attentes. Expérience très satisfaisant

Wir hatten das zimmer 102 im eg direkt am pool, toller blick, auch frühstück direkt am pool war toll, ruhige seitengasse, ca. Halbe stunde zu fuß in die innenstadt und zum strand, kostenlos fahrrad zu leihen, frühstück (pancakes) sehr lecker, freundliches personal, würden hier wieder einchecken.

We are a family with 3 young kids. The connecting rooms are spacious. The pool is excellent my kids spent many hours there after morning activities. A little away from the old town. Taxi costs about 40k dong. Staff friendly and helpful. Will come back again

We booked two interconnecting rooms, both of the rooms are spacious. Staff were very friendly and helpful. I used the hotel to arrange for private car hiring to my son temple, marble mountains, monkey mountain. The price was reasonable. One trip, due to misunderstanding, the driver could not get to our desired location as previously agreed, the hotel provided partial refund for that trip. The pool was great, my kids spent a lot of time there each day. Cooked breakfast each day, yummy and plentiful. We used taxi to old town and an bang beach. The hotel called a taxi or we walked to the main road and hailed one. The taxi ride was small cost. Hotel supply bicycles but we didn t use in our trip. Overall, it is great hotel with great value.
깨끗하고 깔끔했어요 친구랑 몇일 머물기 좋은 호텔이에요
Das sehr hilfsbereite team rundet die schöne anlage ab. Zu fuß lässt sich die altstadt noch gut erreichen.

위치야 구시가지와 거리가 있다는거 알고 갔기에 감안하는 부분이고, 컨넥팅룸인거 같았어요. 106호, 107호를 같이 쓰는!! 그래서 침대가 인원수 보다 하나 더 많았다는거, 변기가 두개였다는거 빼고는 저희 가족에게 너무 안맞는 숙소였어요. 체크인은 빠르게 이루어졌으나 들어가자마자 꿉꿉하고 습하다는 느낌을 받습니다. 다낭 숙소도 그랬기에 에어컨 틀면 괜찮겠지. 했는데, 에어컨을 틀고도 그 느낌은 사라지지 않네요. 곧 모기와 파리가 보이네요. 직원에게 얘기하니 문을 닫으라고만 하네요 ㅎㅎ 꿉꿉해도 더 많은 모기가 들어올까 문도 못열어요. 그래서 에어컨으로만 조절하는데, 밤엔 추워서 에어컨을 끄고 자면 꿉꿉하고, 에어컨 온도를 올리면 곰팡이 냄새?? 같은게 나고 ㅜㅜ 꿉꿉했던 것만 빼면 침구류는 그닥 나쁘지 않았던거 같습니다. 책상? 탁자 위에 짐을 두는데, 머리카락들이 발견됩니다. 심지어 엄마, 아빠가 쓰신 방 탁자 홈에선 프레즐 과자 조각까지 나오네요. 그냥 그러려니 하고 넘어갔는데, 다음 날!!! 구시가지 구경 후 돌아와 씻는데, 어제와는 다르게 물이 안빠지더라구요. 이상하다 싶어 발로 배수구 쪽을 문질러보니 머리카락이 그대로 있었어요. 방과 욕실이 전체적으로 어두워서 발을 사용한 후에야 머리카락을 안치웠다는걸 알 수 있었어요. 게다가 엄마, 아빠가 사용하신 욕실 세면대에는 물이 잘 안빠지기까지 체크아웃 할 때도 나가는데 신경도 안쓰는 ㅎㅎㅎㅎ 식사는 주문해서 먹는데, 볶음밥 부모님도 다 괜찮게 드셨어요. 수영장은 그럭저럭 쓸만한 크기이나 저희는 따로 사용하지 않았습니다! 고택이라는 이유로 서양인들에게 인기가 있는건지 몰라도 점수가 왜 높은지 솔직히 잘 모르겠어요. (실제로 저희가 투숙하는 동안에도 동양인은 저희 뿐, 전부 서양인들이었어요)
Great size family rooms. Breakfast was delicious. Staff very friendly and accommodating. Access to bicycles made it convenient to explore town. Great small town feel!

Pros-nice friendly staff located 15-20mins walking distance from ancient town. We took cab to an bang beach, it only costed us around vnd98.000. Good breakfast. Cons-the shower door was a bit old. Hot water in shower takes time to heat up.
Un hôtel de qualité ! tout y est, propreté, confort, services... Il manque juste le sourire de la personne qui vous accueillera.

Amazing value for what we received - boutique hotel feel, nice pool, breakfasts, free bikes to cycle to the old town (10min). The room was the largest we had in our two week trip and it was beautiful. Wish we could stay longer!
Wonderful place, great setting on quiet side road. Spacious, clean room. Helpful genuinely friendly staff. Free bikes to enjoy exploring lovely hoi an. Good choice quality of breakfast.
직원들이 정말 친절했고 시내랑 떨어져 있었지만 오히려 조용해서 좋았다. 수영장도 깨끗하고 전반적으로 관리가 잘 되어 있어 지내기가 편했다. 싼 가격이라 조금 걱정되었지만 가격대비 완전 만족한다!!!!

両隣が一般住宅のせいか 大変静かです 部屋も広く 一人では少々持て余しました 朝食はプールサイドのテラス的なところでとれ 量は結構多めですがホイアン名物のメニューは無いので普通のご飯を食べたい人向き ホテルで飼っている犬も大変おとなしくて可愛いです ホイアン中心部まで歩くと30分くらいはかかってしまうので 自転車を借りるのがおすすめ 自転車だと周囲の田んぼなども気兼ねなくサイクリングできて楽しいです プールサイドということで蚊が入って来やすいので 窓や扉は開けない方が良さそうです 部屋の天井にまくタイプの虫除けで一発駆除でき ベットには天蓋カーテン 蚊帳代わり も付属しています
조용하고 편안함. 맛있는 조식
Beautiful hotel in a traditional vietnamese style 10 mn bike ride away from the old town. Huge and quiet room. Nice warm pool. Free bike rental. Superfriendly stauff. Breakfast basic but good. A
Very nice and cozy place to stay with fair price. I would definitely live here again and recommend it to everyone.

The owner and staffs are amazing. I am a woman solo traveler and they made me very comfortable and secure while staying at the garden villas. Everyone is very friendly and family oriented. Thank you )
Long hot walk to old town, about 25 min. Bikes available but we did not feel comfortable riding

- väldigt lugnt ställe. Inget som störde en när man sov - bra läge. Tar ej lång tid att promenera till den gamla delen av staden. Finns också tillgång till gratis cykel. Plus lätt att få tag på taxi (grab). Utmärkta restauranger finns i närheten (t.ex. Circle cafe och dingo deli) - personalen är hjälpsam och professionell. Familjär stämning. - poolen var i bra skick när vi var där. - wifi fungerade bra. Fanns flera möjligheter till anslutning. Så om det var problem med en wifi anslutning så kunde man byta.

Super schönes und gut gelegenes hotel in hoi an. Das hotel liegt gut, um den tag am strand und den abend in der altstadt von hoi an zu verbringen. Wir waren hier insgesamt vier nächte und wären gerne länger geblieben. Ich hatte in der ersten nacht leider fiese magenkrämpfe und mir wurde direkt eine große kanne ingwertee gebracht, die in den nächsten 4 tagen immer wieder neu aufgefüllt wurde.
