Das personal war wirklich ausgesprochen freundlich und hilfsbereit. Unser zimmer war toll, riesen groß, mit moskitonetz. Absolute weiterempfehlung!

Loved this hotel! the staff were very friendly and helpful and the rooms were clean and spacious. In a great location and had a free bike rental option. The free breakfast had great options too. Pool was clean. Overall we loved our stay we extended it by 2 days. Would return definitely

깨끗한 느낌이었는데 냉장고에 곰팡이 있음. 욕실 두개인데 샤워부스 배수 잘 안됨. 매우 넓음. 2층건물이라 담배피우기 좋음. 올드시티까지 걸어서 15분 호이안해변까지는 40분정도 걸림. 해변은 택시타야함. 조식이 뷔페가 아니라 주문식임. 쌀국수 두번 먹었는데 맛은 뭐....중간 조금 못하는정도. 세탁맡겼는데 1.5kg에 70,000동(길거리 세탁소 1kg에 10,000동임) 냉장고물은 돈받으니까 탁자에 있는물 냉장고에 넣어서 드세요. 풀장은 나름 깨끗하게 잘 관리되어 있는 느낌. 몇몇 사용하는데 저는 사용 안함. 깊은곳 수심1.5미터로 나름 수영 가능. 저라면 다시 가도 좋을만한 장소였습니다.
Lovely spot, quiet, clean, friendly staff and freshly cooked meals. More than worth the cost.
Mycket hjälpsamm personal och mycket att välja på till frukost
Overall good stay, the breakfast options not so great. The staff ms na is very amazing, she is very helpful and accommodating.
All amazing!! thank you )

This property is a short taxi ride from old town and walking distance to some dining options. The staff went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and provide us with great recommendations for dining, sightseeing and shopping. They provide free bicycles which we used to visit old town and an bang beach, all within a 15 minute ride. Great place for families as the staff is very attentive to children. Wouldn t hesitate to recommend this place if you d like to visit hoi an in a tranquil environment.

Super séjour à hoi an. Les chambres étaient propres et spacieuses. Superbe piscine pour les fins de journée. Le petit déjeuner servi par nos hotes sont très bien. Notre hôtesse na est d une grande gentillesse et nous a conseillé et réservé les différentes activités comme le snorkeling, le chauffeur qui nous a fait le guide pour faire des haltes à des différents lieux touristiques.

Lovely little hotel, had a family atmosphere. The manager na is just lovely, so helpful and attentive. No big buffet breakfast like big chain hotels, small menu but everything made freshly for you and the food was great. The hotel is a bit far away to walk to the ancient town but taxi s and grab s were easy to get and cheap. Nice little restaurant and a mini mart at the end of the street which was helpful. The rooms and bathrooms are big and comfortable. Laundry is very cheap to get done too.

From the moment i arrived, the warmth and hospitality of the staff, mrs na, made my stay in hoi an truly memorable. Her dedication to ensuring guests have a seamless and enjoyable experience was evident in every interaction. She was not only a helpful concierge but also a local culinary guide, providing invaluable tips on the best food spots in town. Her recommendations led me to some of the most delightful dining experiences i ve had in vietnam. Moreover, mrs na provided assistance with arranging transportation, managing taxi bookings, giving info regarding tickets for local attractions greatly enhanced my travel experience. I am grateful for her attention. Really enjoyed my bicycle rides provided by the hotel and the pool was a great plus. Breakfast and room were great too! i will come back!
A basic setting but the manager makes up for that.
The pool is amazing and the room is very comfortable.

My and my gf we stayed here initially 2 days. Could not leave the place and ended up staying 4 nights. Ideal location between old town and beaches. U can easily reach them with the bike u get for free. Receptionist (hoi) super great and helpful

Because the hotel is small and locally owned, one gets a better feel for the country. Staff super friendly and a couple would engage in long conversation about vietnam, but also wanted to know what life is like in one s own country. They also took time to figure out what each individual wanted from their stay and then offered recommendations.
Amazing! i cannot begin to describe how wonderful the staff was highly recommend this villa. They were amazing!!!
Na was a great host, will definitely be staying there again.

Not recommended very disappointing stay this hotel was a huge letdown. The pictures online are completely misleading the place is old, poorly maintained, and far from what was advertised. The pool was dirty, and the pump never seemed to be working. Our room was in terrible condition we found a massive spider (about 20 cm in diameter) inside. The shower was completely blocked, causing the entire bathroom to flood. The room had a terrible, unbearable smell. To make things worse, the reception experience was extremely uncomfortable. The receptionist constantly asked intrusive questions every day where are you going? what did you do yesterday? when are you leaving? it felt more like an interrogation than a warm welcome, making our stay even more unpleasant. Overall, this was the worst experience we had in hoi an. The hotel is outdated, dirty, and has terrible service. I would not recommend staying here.
Helt fantastisk sted, med virkelig venligt og hjælpsomt personale. Hvis jeg skulle til hoi an igen, så var det helt sikkert her

We enjoyed 4 nights at hoi an garden villas. Lovely little family-driven place. Nice pool, good breakfast and with nah the best host we had here in vietnam. She organized cooking classes and bus ride for us. Both with pick up directly at the hotel. The old town is a short bicycle ride away (bicycle free of charge). We would come again

Fantastisk service fra den mega søde receptionist, som brugte 15 minutter på, at give et detaljeret overblik over hoi an og hvad man skulle og ikke skulle. Cykler tilgængelige på stort set alle tidspunkter af døgnet. Kan varmt anbefales man finder ikke et bedre sted i hoi an

Anche se non centrale, è in una posizione comoda e tranquilla. Struttura piccola e familiare, semplice, pulita, stanze ampie, personale disponibile e cordiale. Colazione rustica ma buona. Un rapporto qualità/prezzo a dire poco eccellente.
A return trip as we love the host na who is so friendly and accommodating. Booked for 5 days but extended to will return again.

Bookes two nights here for a quick visit to hoi an. Loved the location, quiet and away from tourist areas of the old town. Free bikes made it easy to get into town and back but taxis were cheap too. Quiet garden oasis with the best pool! breakfast cooked to order was everything you need and the room was private and a great escape from the heat. Staff was friendly and offered trips and transportation. We booked our car back to da nang through them for 16 usd and stayed for a late 8pm checkout for an extra 15usd. Great retreat and service, should have stayed longer.

We looked the room, very spacious and clean. I really loved that our room had a bath tub too. The staff were friendly and helped us with understanding the local area and taxi services. The breakfast was good, pick one drink, one main and one dessert (yogurt or fruit). While it s not a buffet like we generally have when we stay places the food was enough and tasted good. Pool was lovely and clean.
조경이 정말 이쁘고 조식도 정말 맛있었습니다. 수영장 까지 있어서 더운 날씨에 조식 먹고 수영하면 최고 !
Nos gusto la piscina que tiene. Estaria mejor un poquito mas en el centro.
Amazing staff

Alt personalet er ualmindeligt gæstfri, hjælpsomme og behagelige. Især vores receptionist var helt fantastisk og gav os en masse gode råd og forslag til vores ophold. Hun hjalp os også med at booke dagsture og transport til lufthavnen, som var det en selvfølge. Aldrig har vi haft så god en oplevelse med hotel personale, og vi synes ellers, at standarden er høj i vietnam! værelserne er lækre og poolen er lige ude foran ens dør. Nok det bedste sted vi har boet!

The owner is absolutely exceptional and kind, and he has two lovely dogs! the hotel itself is modern and well furnished, and the breakfast is pretty good as well. The location is a bit out of the main roads, but cars can still pass through and bicycles can be used to go to most good locations in hoi an.

I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. The owner is really friendly and accommodating and he has two adrable dogs. I enjoyed spending time with them. The hotel is located between beach and city center. I can easily access both areas.

Wonderful, brand new boutique hotel managed by a lovely owner who is both generous and helpful. Rooms are pristine, appliances are modern and of highest quality, and best of all, in mint condition. Highly recommend this place for short term stays
We stayed 2 nights at the rustic villa and the staff were really accommodating and extremely helpful. Will definitely stay here again. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Liebevoll und sehr gastfreundliche familie. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen. Jeden tag bereitete sun uns ein hervorragendes frühstück und war sehr freundlich. In der unterkunft gab es auch einen tollen und preiswerten wäscheservice. Wir buchten auch eine tour über die unterkunft welche wesentlich preiswerter war als in der stadt. Der flughafenshuttle wurde organisiert. Auch wenn es einige punkte gibt die verbesserungswürdig sind (staub auf den ablagen, kein safe-wahrscheinlich auch nicht nötig, fahrräder vorhanden aber nicht verkehrssicher, dusche heiß kalt einstellung schwierig) empfehlen wir die unterkunft guten gewissens weiter und bedanken uns für einen schönen aufenthalt.

Sensationelles durch eine familie geführtes hotel. Ich war schon auf der welt in vielen hotels aber dieses zählt zu einem der schönsten hotels wo ich bisher war. Aus meiner sicht noch mindestens einen stern mehr verdient. Es liegt zwar etwas außerhalb aber dank der kostenlosen fahrräder ist der strand oder auch die altstadt von hoi an in 15-20 minuten super zu erreichen oder man nimmt ein grab für 2-4 eur. Die zimmer sind riesig, sauber und schön und alles was man braucht ist vorhanden. Hervorzuheben ist die freundlichkeit der familie die dort alles selbst macht und das frühstück man bekommt jeden tag frisches obst und auch selbstgemachte marmelade mit früchten aus dem eigenen garten. Zudem wird das frühstück für jeden gast frisch zubereitet es gab auch immer die leckeren banana pancakes. Zu dem konnte man sich jeden tag etwas typisches vietnamesisches aussuchen wie zum beispiel pho oder banh mi. Wir konnten über die unterkunft auch einen privaten fahrer für ausflüge und die fahrt zum flughafen nach da nang buchen zu dem bieten sie einen lundry service nach kilo an der genau den preisen draußen entspricht auch super praktisch. Fazit wer es ruhig, schön und entspannt haben möchte ist hier genau richtig, klein aber fein.
Highly recommended!

Highly recommend. New, modern, fresh, clean, romantic rooms. Private outdoor shower under stars. Beautiful family, great service, go out of there way for you, very helpful. Located halfway between beaches and town. Fantastic.
Personnel serviable.
とても素敵なご家族がやっている 居心地の良いところでした 無料で自転車を貸してくれて 旧市街に行くにもビーチに行くにもとても便利でした また滞在中に誕生日だったのですが ケーキとお花を下さいました またホイアンに行く機会があれば絶対ここに泊まりたいです
Had a lovely stay at the rustic villa! the staff was so kind and gave us lots of tips for hoi an. We were sad when we left! beautiful property

Simply great staff, facilities, service, room, free bycilces, breakfast included...everything. It is a new place, making an outstanding effort to get on the map. Service is amazing, always making you feel like home. If you are around, they take care of you, offer you tea or coffee, put a hamock to relax... They have some rules to make you live the full vietnamese experience, like to take a cooking class or a walk to the old city with them. Perfect for long stays. Price is unbeatable, cant believe all you get for a such a small tariff. In a few words you should stay here.
ホームステイと聞くと民宿かペンションのようですが 実際はミニホテルと変わらないばかりか ベトナム人家族の暖かいホスピタリティに触れ 予定よりも長く滞在しました
Beautiful place. It s like a little tropical paradise. And the family is super welcoming and warming. We were sad not to stay longer. Thank you for the nice stay

Wir waren absolut begeistert vom rustic homestay. Als wir ankamen, bekamen wir ein upgrade auf ein größeres zimmer und es war wirklich riesig und sehr sauber! die einrichtung war total nach unserem geschmack, vor allem das bad war ein traum! das bett war super gemütlich und es gab mehrere ablagemöglichkeiten. Die besitzer des hotels waren super freundlich, überhaupt nicht aufdringlich und gaben uns viele tipps, was wir uns anschauen sollten. Das frühstück war auch super gut und als buffet serviert, man konnte sich also so viel nehmen wie man möchte. Man konnte sich kostenlos fahrräder im hotel ausleihen und gegen einen aufpreis auch roller mieten. Die lage war ebenfalls super! es liegt zwischen altstadt und strand, wo man super mit fahrrad/roller hinkommt. Für den preis bekommt man dort auf jeden fall viel mehr als man erwartet. Definitiv das beste hotel auf unserer ganzen reise! wir würden auf jeden fall wieder kommen! -)

Lovely homestay with friendly owners. Beautiful room with great spacious bathroom. Nice buffet breakfast (fruit, breads and coffee) with cooked to order eggs, pancakes and more traditional items like pho. Its a 15minute cycle to town, we liked going back to our little sanctuary after the bustle of hoi an.

My wife and i spent four nights at this wonderful homestay. The staff was very helpful and made sure we were comfortable. They offer free bikes which was nice, town is about a 7 min. Bike ride away. Had omelette, banana pancakes, and fresh fruit every morning! had a great stay in hoi an.

A estadia foi exemplar em termos de serviço e de orientação ao cliente - o senhor wu e respectiva familia estavam sempre muito atentos a granjearam-nos com vários pormenores de bem receber durante a estadia . Para além disso deram-nos conselhos preciosos na visitas a na dang e compras em hoi han. Foram sempre fantásticos.

Wir hatten eine tolle zeit im rustic homestay. Die ganze anlage ist superschön und neu. Unser zimmer war super sauber und würde jeden tag gereinigt. Das bett war sehr komfortabel. Unser superior zimmer war etwas kleiner als die zimmer auf den bildern aber trotzdem super schön. Wer es etwas größer möchte, bucht die wirklich riesigen deluxe zimmer. Das frühstück war ein kleines buffet mit wirklich toller auswahl baguette, toast, selbstgemachte marmeladen und säfte, obst, gemüse, verschiedene eierspeisen, pancakes oder vietnamesisches nach wunsch. Highlight des homestays sind die wunderbaren gastegeber. Super nett und zuvorkommend. Ich wurde während des aufenthalts krank und man hat sich rührend um mich gekümmert (inklusive ingwer-tee). Das homestay liegt in der mitte zwischen strand und altstadt. Mit den kostenlosen fahrrädern kann man diese problemlos erreichen. Ein gutes und einfaches lokales restaurant ist fußläufig zu erreichen.

Absolutely loved this place! value for money was incredible. Away from hustle and bustle of hoi an town only few steps away from stunning ricefields but short and simple one road cycle from ancient town. Quality of everything was impecable, flowers on the bed, scent in the air con, amazing jungle shower, towels are better than those we get in hilton. Cleverly designed by use of bamboo that in the heat keeps the room cool even when air con is off! brand new bikes, deliscious made to order/buffet breakfast. Lovely family that will do everything to make your stay pleasant. Make sure you spend some time with them! we were on extended travel trip and this was the best stay we have had for the last 8 months! thank you!
We stayed with kim at her moms place for two nights. Kim took great care of us and helped arrange transport and excursions to and on the cham island.
Séjour très positif dans cette île charmante idyllique la homestay un peu spartiate mais un accueil très chaleureux et une nourriture excellente nous ont comblés

Mama est une femme généreuse, chaleureuse qui fait son maximum pour que nous passions un excellent séjour. C est aussi une très bonne cuisinière et qui vous propose des repas variés y compris le petit déjeuner.

A delightful homestay! mama kim was so welcoming and prepared lovely meals. We enjoyed chatting with her using google translate. She helped arrange boats and motorbike/taxis to local bays where we enjoyed snorkelling. It was a short stroll down the lane to the beachfront and cafes.
Trato inmejorable!!!! la familia nos acogió como de la casa, la isla vale la pena, estas practicamente solo, muy autentica

Phòng có không gian đẹp và tiện nghi. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Tuy nhiên 1 điểm trừ khá lớn là phòng deluxe có toilet nằm bên ngoài phòng (phải băng qua balcony mới tới), toilet rất nóng và khá bất tiện.
Nơi tốt cho chuyến đi gia đình. Vì vậy, bể bơi nhỏ
Giá phòng đắt, phòng bí, dịch vụ không tốt

Mọi thứ đều rất tốt. Phòng rất sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Khoảng cách từ khách sạn đến phố cổ hội an là khoảng 1,8 km, vì vậy đối với tôi hơi xa nhưng bạn có thể thuê xe đạp miễn phí. Nó không phải là một việc lớn. Rat khuyen khich.
Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, khách sạn gần phố cổ cho khách mượn xe đạp.
Tôi đã trải nghiệm 01 đêm tại khách sạn, khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, yên tĩnh tuy hơi xa phố cổ 1 chút

Phòng đẹp và ấm cúng. Nó được chuẩn bị tốt với tinh dầu thơm khi tôi đến. Cửa sổ lớn để có ánh sáng tự nhiên cả ngày. Các nhân viên thân thiện. Điều duy nhất tôi không thích là vị trí, khách sạn khá xa trung tâm, cách phố cổ gần 2 km, và con đường khá tối và yên tĩnh vào ban đêm nên chỉ cần quay lại khách sạn sớm. Có xe đạp miễn phí cho khách.
Nhân viên lễ tân nhất nhiệt tình và đáng yêu
Phòng sạch, thức ăn sáng ngon, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay trở lại lần 2.
Chỉ có điều nhân viên không mấy nhiệt tình
Khách sạn ok, tolet thì rèm kéo phía ngoài phòng (hơi ngược đời) hồ bơi nhỏ. Ăn sáng thì đăng ký trước (bún, phở gối ăn liền, nước ép dạng bột pha) xe đạp sử dụng miễn phí. 7/10
Tôi và những đứa bạn đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây
Ivy rất linh động khi cho khách oder đồ ăn sáng trước để được tươi mới và không bị lãng phí. Có điều cách âm phòng tệ.
Nhân viên rất thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ gọn gàng, các dịch vụ tư vấn rất tốt.
Rất tốt, khách sạn khá đẹp, phòng nhìn sang, hồ bơi thoải mái
Cảm thấy rất là okla tại kỳ nghỉ vừa rồi, nhân viên nhiệt tình và thân thiện
Kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời! mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo và nhân viên rất thân thiện. Chúng tôi yêu thích nó ở đây và muốn giới thiệu khách sạn này. Họ rất có sức chứa từ lúc chúng tôi đến. Cảm ơn!
Phòng sạch sẽ, dịch vụ tốt lắm nè
Mọi thứ đều ổn nhân viên dễ thương có các nhà hàng và quán cà phê gần đó.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên lịch thiệp, bữa sáng ngon

Khách sạn mới, nhân viên thân thiện. View đẹp, yên tĩnh, thích hợp để nghỉ dưỡng, hơi xa phố cổ hội an 1 chút (đi ô tô tầm 25-30p). Đặc biệt ấn tượng với hồ bơi, nước rất sạch, sử dụng công nghệ khử nước mới, làm da mình không bị dị ứng, và mắt mình không cay mặc dù mình rất nhạy cảm. Recommend các bạn ở khách sạn này nhé.
Khá xa khu vực nổi bật như phố cổ, nhưng grab dễ dàng tìm thấy. Phòng sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp. Nhân viên rất hữu ích và lịch sự. Cửa hàng gần đó rẻ và bán nhiều mặt hàng khác nhau.

Gia đình tôi đặt phòng gia đình khá rộng rãi, phòng sạch sẽ, máy lạnh hoạt động tốt. Nhân viên thân thiện. Vị trí ngay mật tiền đường lớn nên dễ tìm. Có thể đi bộ ra biển. Nói chung, chúng tôi đã có một kì nghỉ vui vẻ sau sự cố bị huỷ booking ở một khách sạn khác.

Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ, nhân viên khách sạn rất nhiệt tình , thân thiện ,chu đáo , bữa sáng ngon chất lượng ,đi bộ khoảng 200m anh bãi biển , bãi tắm dài , nước biển trong, vắng người thích hợp cho kỳ nghỉ dưỡng ..

Hồ bơi nhỏ so với tưởng tượng, phòng khá hẹp (phòng 2 giường), nhân viên nhiệt tình, niềm nở, khách sạn ít khách nên nhìn hơi buồn, nội thấy khá mới tuy nhiên nhà wc hơi không ok lắm, buffet sáng hơi ít món (chắc vì ít khách) được cái bánh ngọt khá ok, mêm mới
Phòng rộng rãi với giường thoải mái.

Tôi thực sự thích ở lại đây. Khách sạn sạch sẽ và mới, trang trí và bố trí phòng rất hoàn hảo (đặc biệt là tv thông minh). Các nhân viên thực sự tốt và thân thiện khiến tôi cảm thấy thoải mái trong suốt thời gian ở đây .

Khách sạn gần biển an bàng. Phòng classic hơi nhỏ, bù lại có ban công thoải mái, veiw 1 phần biển khá thích. Nhân viên ai cũng vui vẻ, thân thiện, chu đáo. Ăn sáng theo set menu nhưng rất ngon. Sẽ quay lại vào ngày gần nhất
Không có bữa sáng như đã mô tả. Phòng không sạch sẽ. Ông chủ/lễ tân thân thiện nhưng không thể giữ chân khách với dịch vụ như vậy.

This place is amazing!!! people working there are friendly, polite and very helpful. Room was spacious, comfortable and quiet. Location is great, near the beach and on a street with variety of restaurants, pubs and shops. My partner and i had the aloe vera wrap which was perfect after a long day at the beach, felt really refreshing and she was great. Also had a pedicure which i hadn t booked however in less than half an hour the professional was in doing amazing job. Everyone made us feel very welcome and really enjoyed our stay. Will definitely come back!!! thanks
Great place, friendly helpful staff, great spa services , close to the beach,bars and restaurants. Highly recommended
Comfortable beds and very kind staff who did my laundry for free.

I was here for 24 days during my stay in vietnam , i could not have been treated any better by the staff at this hotel. The breakfast choices were wonderful and all very delicious ! the housekeeping staff were immaculate, and the maintenance man was there for anything that you needed all in all, i would highly recommend this place for anyone wanting to be at na bang beach , i would definitely stay here again
Excellent staff. Very considerate and helpful. Short walk to the beach but not crowded

I have never felt so welcome or at home in a hotel! ka villas is a special place. The staff here are so wonderful and really care about you and your trip. The rooms were large and spotlessly clean. Large bathroom with a huge bathtub and shower. Each room has a balcony area with comfy seats overlooking the koi pond, a nice place to sit and relax. You order breakfast the day before and as soon as you take a seat they bring fresh juice and fruits whilst they cook your breakfast - this was a huge highlight for me! the pool was probably the cleanest pool i ve ever swam in! they light it up so pretty for an evening swim. The staff helped us book local tours, we also had a lovely massage, and they helped us booked taxis. They even waved us off as we left! the local area is so nice - lots of nice restaurants and cafes along the beach - i recommend hit ha and naia (this one is right across the street and they also offer yoga classes overlooking the sea!). I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel if you re staying in hoi an!
This place is wonderful. The manager even went out of his way to help us with reservation changes and everything went smoothly.

So the property is a bit of a walk from the main beach, but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There are a number of cool restaurants nearby and the hotel staff is very nice. They have plenty of areas to curl up and read a book and finally the breakfast option rock!
Personel souriant et avenant
Brilliant people and location. Beach is across the street and there s good food everywhere

Staff were so friendly and helpful. The hotel was clean and very close to the beach. Breakfast was very tasty. There is free laundry service at the hotel and many eating options close by. Would recommend to anyone wanting a beach stay in this area.
Awesome service
Super fint hotel med meget serviceminded personale.
Ka villa was a wonderful experience. My balcony room was above the lovely garden with a pond. The breakfasts were delicious and varied.
Spacious room, tranquil courtyard, friendly courteous staff. Big breakfast. Free laundry. Close to beach. Easy travel to old town.
Lovely place, very tranquil quiet and well looked after. Warm and friendly staff, very helpful, i would definitely return!
Brilliant
Everything about our stay was excellent. From the staff greeting us when we arrived to local recommendations. We loved this place and would highly recommend it to anyone.
이 곳엔 세탁방이 있어서 세탁을 편리하게 할 수 있었는데, 직원들이 우리 빨래가 세탁이 되면 알아서 말린 후에 잘 정리해서 가져다 주어 감짝 놀랬어요. 숙소는 작지만 서비스는 정말 좋고 모두 친절했어요... 다시 방문하고 싶어요.

아쉬운점 레이트 체크아웃 가능여부 문의 이메일을 세번이나 보냈는데 답변 없음, 읽씹이 아니라 아예 확인을 안하는듯 달러환전 서비스 안됨, 주변에 현금지급기도 없음, 결국 근처 다른 호텔에서 환전함, 공항에서 환전해오세요. 주변에 편의점 하나 없음, 물한병 살곳이 없어요. 7시만 되어도 주변이 깜깜하고 무서운 분위기 연출됨, 외출하고 돌아올때 택시 필수 게스트하우스 스러운 조식메뉴... 따뜻한 요리는 볶음밥, 만두, 죽 3개 끝 수영장이 있으나 아주 작고 하루종일 햇빛이 들지 않음, 직원들이 썬베드에서 담소 나누는 분위기 외출할때 전기가 끊기는 시스템, 더운나라인데 냉장고랑 냉방시설도 당연히 아웃됨 좋은점 직원들이 많고 친절하다 호텔 앞바다가 한적하고 좋다 호객꾼들없어서 힐링하기 좋음 신축시설이라 전체적으로 깨끗.. 하지만 손가락만한 바퀴벌레는 한번 나옴..

Genuinely the best hotel i have ever stayed at. The staff was so kind and welcoming and genuinely cared for the guests. Breakfast was so delicious and healthy every morning, cooked to order and so many options. Our room was clean and beautiful and overlooked the villa. Free laundry service everyday helped us so much since we were backpacking for 2 months. There are also free bikes to rent which was so much fun to take them to an bang beach. There was one day i fell off my bike (my fault, i was going too fast) and a staff member helped me with first aid and bandaging myself. I will always remember her kindness! i ll pick ka villa to stay at everytime i m in hoi an!!!
Great place and has friendly staff. Highly recommend to everyone.

Pieni, kiva , tunnelmallinen majoituspaikka. Ranta lähellä oli vähän epäsiisti, roska sit rannassa. Läheisyydessä oli muutama ravintola ja baari ja kauppaki. Ravintola vastapäätä olevassa kahvilassa tosi hyvä kahvia jos sellaista kaipaa. Huonet olit hyväkokoiset, päivittäinen siivous, pienehkö allas ja vähän kosteuden hajua huoneessa. Mutta ei haitanut meidän oleskelu. Henkilökunta oli tosi ystävällinen ja auttoi mielelläläni kaikessa.
We loved our short stay at ka villa and wish we had more time there and hoi an. Short walk to a quiet beach and our hosts at ka villa were very helpful the entire time.

I highly recommend ka villa. The owner nhung is one of the kindest people i ve met. She and her small, dedicated staff were so friendly and helpful, always offering my sons popsicles when we returned from a day of exploring. The room was very clean with comfortable beds and pillows. The shower was powerful. The ac worked great. We had big windows on both sides of the room so lots of light. Every morning we had a breakfast which consisted of a big glass of fresh fruit juice, a plate of beautifully prepared fresh fruit, and an entree we chose the night before. Ka villa offered laundry service at no extra charge. They also have a small, pretty sitting area with a few book shelves with books in various languages. We felt very welcomed and well taken care of.

I think the amazing reviews pretty much sum up everything about this place. Staff are amazing and always ready and prepared to go the extra mile. Nhung was great and on hand to answer any questions and help us with transport, as well as point out places to eat and tips for our stay. Breakfast cooked fresh to order every morning. There was someone watching the front of the property each night. Rooms were big and i loved the big, deep bath with a shower attached. They supplied beach towels and even offered a free laundry service each day. We felt welcomed, relaxed and happy from the moment we arrived. Would definitely return. You get a very personal, warm touch.

We had an absolutely delightful stay at this charming hotel in hoi an. The staff was incredibly pleasant and helpful, making us feel welcome from the moment i arrived. They went above and beyond to provide personalized service, offering valuable recommendations and always being attentive to our needs. The hotel itself was a haven of comfort, with well-appointed rooms and excellent facilities. The location was convenient, and the overall experience was exceptional. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone.
Beautiful and clean hotel. Nice and friendly staff. Delicious cook to order breakfast. Thanks to the owners and staffs treated us all guests like a family.
This hotel is closed to the beach. With clean rooms and helpful friendly staff. We really enjoyed our stay here.
Clean room plus friendly and helpful staff tasty breakfast.
The service was just outstanding. There was not a single negativ point. Pool was very nice. Private sun chairs on the beach close to the hotel.

Just finished a week at ka. Great little boutique hotel only 50m from the beach. Room was lovely as was the pool. Breakfast was thrown in as well. Complimentary bikes, umbrellas, beach towels and sun beds on the beach as well. The best part however are the staff, it became more like staying with friends than a hotel. If you want a chilled out week on the beach, it doesn t get much better. 5 min taxi ride into town if you want to shop and 5 min walk up the beach if you want some beach nightlife.
안방비치에서 가격대비 성능이 좋은곳이라 벌써 두번째 이용을 하고 있습니다 다으먼에도 안방비치 주변을 간다면 또 이용할거 같아요

This hotel and the staff deserve more than excellent rating. The hotel is super clean and beautiful. The staff are super friendly. The breakfast is very good. The hotel is walking distance to the beach, they offer free umbrellas. I highly recommend this hotel.

One of the most welcoming staff we ever met. The hotel is lovely with free laundry and great breakfast. Very warm and hospitality, if this hotel would be closer home we definitely would go there often just to relax and have a great time.
Personal sehr zuvorkommend, eigener pool und eigene hotelstrand mit liegen und sonnenschirmen.

I have stayed with my family (myself, wife and 2 sons) for 3 nights. Hotel provided best services for my family. Specially they gave new year card written by hand to my sons, and gave pocket money to me and my wife as a new year presents. I still keep it and put it in my photo book. I could describe good points of this hotel as below - clean room - clean swimming pool with appropriate size - free sun bed at an bang beach for customers - special room for kids with books and toys - very kind and diligent staffs in addition my 1st son said this hotel is best during family trip!!!
We had a great stay with ka villa. Friendly staff, nice rooms and great service regarding everyhing.

We had the loveliest stay from the warm friendly greeting upon check-in (gave us fresh fruit while we did paperwork), to the beautiful room with pool view, awesome breakfasts, use of bicycles, and location to the beach, everything was perfect. We would stay here forever if we could.
昨年に引き続き2回目の宿泊でしたが 前回より朝ごはんが充実していました スタッフさんも設備も最高です
Best service from owner and staff that i have ever received from any hotel

Very lovely get away near the beaches. Lovely, helpful and attention detailed staff made our stay an unforgettable experience! i would not hesitate recommending k.a. Villas to anyone of my friends and family
Great hotel best hotel staff!!! couldn t recommend this hotel highly enough!!!

Lovely accomodation. Excellent customer service. Comfortable bed. Breakfast is cooked fresh , very generous and delicious. The pool provides a welcome relief from the heat. The accommodation is located at the quiet end of an bang beach with some tasty restaurants near by.

The staff was beyond amazing. We had some issues with booking and they were more than happy to fix the errors. We needed to check in early and they were more than happy to oblige. And when they did not have a room for another night they provided us with transportation to our new hotel. The breakfast was good and the pool and beach amenities were very nice. The bathtub had some strange marks in the tub, but no real issues. I would very much recommend this hotel.
Flawless staff. Super comfortable bed. Beach towels and beach chairs available and the breakfast is absolutely amazing!
Estuvieron atentos a nuestras peticiones, solicitamos el cambio de habitacion por problemas para subir a la segunda planta y no hubo ningun problema. En todo momento nos ayudaron con sus indicaciones

I t was a normal hotel with a couple of really good people led by a unexpectedly nice manager. The bad apples snipe at the old disabled guy as i drop my keys or miss step on the uneven floor. Unfortunately the norm for this otherwise nice country

We stayed at this property for 4 nights and we were very pleased with it s proximity to an bang beach and the reserved lounge chairs provided by the hotel. The staff was excellent, very helpful and friendly. Rooms were ok nothing special, some layouts better than others especially in the bathroom. Distance from toilet to shower and vanity was non existent. Cleanliness was satisfactory, pool was excellent and breakfast exceeded are expectations. But the restaurant options within walking distance were overpriced and lacking, you ll need a motorbike or take a grab to get ti the much better restaurants in the town. Overall l would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a small boutique hotel with exceptional customer service close to an bang beach.

This is my second time staying at this property. The owner and her staff provide such amazing customer service, it feels like staying with good friends. The location is great. It has its own beach area across the street. Its a few minutes and a couple of dollars to old town hoi an. Nearby restaurants are good, and you can borrow bikes for free. Breakfast in the morning is huge, and the menu varied. Cooked fresh and delicious. Rooms are clean and comfortable and surround a small courtyard pool. A lovely building well maintained. Although there are plenty of hotels in hoi an, i cant imagine staying anywhere else

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Great resort, conveniently located close to the beach and hoi an town. Majority of the staff exceptionally helpful. Only not a five star review due to a negative experience booking a day trip, otherwise fantastic.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: プールが最高

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Dejligt hotel med god beliggenhed. To pools hvor den ene kun er for voksne. Fitness rummet er slidt, og uden meget udstyr. Der kan lånes cykler, men de er i ret dårlig stand. Vil anbefale at man tager betaling og så sikre at de er i orden. Personalet var meget dårlig til engelsk og simpel ord forstod de ikke. Privat strand 1 minut fra hotellet og 3 minutter til en lille dejlig by. 15 minutter med taxa til hoi an god restaurant på hotellet vil anbefale stedet og ville vælge det igen

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nice to stay out of town. Quiet location, fabulous spa! great family friendly property but also excellent for couples. Large rooms and great value for money.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nhân viên thân thiện thoải mái.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Awesome time spent with family! great place!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Resort còn mới, quang cảnh đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện. Có xe shuttle bus chở vào phố cổ.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Property is beautiful with very unique room layout. The spa was one of the best and we enjoyed the massages. Breakfast was good ( average). Main drawback is the distance from the town .

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: リゾートホテルとしてはとても立派でした 部屋の中のソファが小さく部屋の中でくつろぐ事が出来にくいのは残念でした

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The only problem we encountered was there were a lot of tse flies in the room. I think they come in through the ventilation and could be eliminated if they put some screens in the vents so they can not get in.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The staff were lovely and friendly and a nice pool. Great breakfast and lovely touches in the room like special tea and fruit. The beach across the street (not the fault of the property though) was awful... It is eroding and sandbags are placed to try to keep erosion from getting worse. Beach was dirty and lots of glass

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: I love how this property is separated from the parking lot and busy roadway so it is wonderfully quiet and serene. I enjoy walking so i enjoyed walking from our room to the motorbike, but you can take the electric cart if you want. We also used the free bicycles sometimes too, loved it. Beautiful grounds all around the hotel, near the beach. The room was beautiful with a great bathroom and tub. Very few windows though, the room was pretty dark. Check-in was relatively easy. Fantastic service. We are two women friends travelling together as a vacation from living in hanoi. We did get creep vibes from one of the bellhops and tried to avoid him, but no bad vibes from anyone else. I wish they had a water dispenser in the lobby. They give you two tiny 500ml bottles of water per day and i just wish i could fill my water bottle and not use so much plastic. I was told at breakfast i couldn t fill my water bottle with the water dispenser there no takeaway . This place feels exclusive without exclusive prices. Loved it.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful resort, staff were friendly and accommodating. Rooms were very nice with good ac. Surrounding shuttle transportation around vacinity was very convenient for us traveling with seniors.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The hotel needs some maintenance. However, the staff were very good and friendly. The rooms/bungalows are spacious and well set out. The bicycles were good and the transfers to hoi an very convenient.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Maravillosa experiencia, hotel muy bonito y muy bien situado. Fácil acceso a hoi an y a la vez enfrente de la playa. Muy buen desayuno y el personal muy amable

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: We liked its view and breakfast.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 주변이 매우 조용하고 가족여행에 최적의 리조트입니다. 직원들이 모두 친절하고 부모님과 아이들 모두 매우 만족했으며 아침식사도 훌륭하여 적극 추천합니다.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Very beautiful resort, quiet location, super nice and helpful staff, short walk to the beach, large pool, the resort is highly recommended. We liked it so much that we extended our stay. Anytime again.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Et slitt anlegg som ligger veldig langt unna noe som helst egentlig. Styr unna, finnes så mye bedre hoteller og velge mellom her i vietnam til nydelige priser. Dette var så dårlig så vi forlot stedet etter 2 døgn.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Ganz tolle anlage mit einem riesenpool zum schwimmen und überall ganz tolle und freundliche mitarbeitern. Die zimmer waren sauber und schön eingerichtet. Wir waren fünf tage hier zum relaxen und es war einfach toll. Das einzige manko war das meer, da die wellen am strand sehr kräftig und hoch waren, was schwimmen eigentlich unmöglich machte- aber dafür hatten wir den tollen pool. Das essen hatte europäischen standard.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Lovely peaceful hotel.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 아주 친절하고 조식도 깔끔하고 모든게 좋았어요

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The koi is lovely! the resort is stunning. It s away from town, but close enough. They have a shuttle service to and from town and a taxi is an easy drive away. The pool is devine and the beach is lovely

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Excellent hotel with really attentive friendly staff. In a quiet location not too far from hoi an old town. Hotel had shuttle bus into town. Taxi costs roughly 3 one way. Great place to relax if you so wish. Would stay again if in the area.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The staff were amazing and the pool, restaurant were first class. Close to the beach and only 10 minutes from town. Best resort!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nice, traditional facilities and kind staffs

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Bungalow room with nice view. The resort is nice, romantic, quiet. Breakfast with various of choice. Shuttle bus here to hoi an town scheduled twice per day. The resort next to beach. Staff are friendly and helpful. It is 25km from da nang international airport. Room rate is cheap.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Horrible staff services to local vietnamese! my wife is from the city of hue. She went back to vietnam to visit her family. She tells me the hotel staff did not give her service when requested. They ignore her and her family. The buffet breakfast was limited and not all dishes were served. The property and the facilities were beautiful and nice. Too bad the hotel staff had to ruin it.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Gorgeous place , staff lovely, spa and pool area great

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Peaceful surroundings amazing staff beautiful property great pools great restaurant and staff

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Väldigt trevlig hotel nära cua dai beach i hoi an. Hotel området är väldigt vacker och andas lugn och ro. Rummet var rent och och personalen var överlag väldigt trevlig. Frukosten var väldigt bra tycker jag och hotel restaurangen är bra men relativt dyrt tycker jag om man jämför priset med andra ställen. Det är lätt att ta sig till cua dai stranden (status 2019, stora delar av cua dai stranden är stängd pga stormskador). Hotellet har en strandremsa som är öppen (2019) och är väldigt trevlig, men litet. Det går att hyra / låna kajak och cykel, men vi gjorde inte det så jag vet into om det kostar något. Men på det stora hela väldigt fint, väldigt lugnt och personalen är väldigt trevlig och väldigt artigt. Det är lätt att ta sig till hoi an old town, taxi funkar bra och vi hade inga problem. Nästan på öret samma belopp hela tiden och det känder riskfritt.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Amazing staff, great facilities. Gym could be better. Pool by the spa was really nice although sonetimes they have corporate (loud) events

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Marvellous gardens and architecture combined by the riverside. Just some spots need to by dusted and de weed. Customer service exceptional. Very pleasant stay. Will go back next time

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: We had a week at koi fabulous resort but with the local beach out of action (sandbags) we would have loved shuttle bus being offered to go to the other beach we did ride bikes there but again very hot to do so everyday! also would ve liked more shuttle bus trips to ancient town otherwise koi really great food, service and location

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Un petit paradis, un staff très attentionné, une literie incroyable, une propreté impeccable, un restaurant excellent, un emplacement superbe, location de biciclette gratuite parfait pour se rendre au centre ville d hanoï! merci à l équipe pour ces jours au top!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Lovely resort, food was very good! it rained and poured so didn t get out much

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 시부모님 모시고 간 여행인데 굉장히 만족스러웠어요 올드타운과 비교적 거리가 있어서 택시를 계속 타야했지만 오히려 그래서 더 조용하고 여유롭게 휴가를 즐길수있었습니다. 해변도 가까웠고 수영장도있어서 좋았구요 사람이 많지않아서 일단 한가로워서 좋았습니다. 조식도 맛있고 어메니티도 풀 세팅 되어있구요 욕실이 객실보다 좋을정도로 훌륭했습니다. 올드타운쪽은 오토바이 빵빵 소리와 매연이 많아서 목이 아픈데 코이리조트는 한적한 곳이라 좋아요 다낭이랑 같이 여행하신다면 호이안만큼은 조용한곳을 택하는것도 추천합니다. (다낭은 워낙 시내라서 더 시끄러우니 이런 조용한 시간도 좋은것같아여)

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Super hotel mit tollem service und kompetenten mitarbeitern. Wir würden jederzeit sehr gerne wieder kommen!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The villas are proper and the staff serves with enthusiasm . A really nice place to chill and relax.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 아무래도 1층이라 벌레가 좀 있어요ㅠㅠ 근데 그거빼곤 한국인도 별로없고 수영장에 다른 무료 서비스들도 많아요! 너무 좋았음

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: It was relaxing and wonderful. The hotel was comfortable, in a great location, good food and great service.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The worst service ever. Never go to this place!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Great hotel and great service. Excellent breakfast! staff was very nice and helpful. Gym was very small with limited facilities. All the rest was great.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Cerca de la playa, hay que caminar para ir a una playa más bonita que la del hotel. Desayuno bien y el servicio y habitaciones excelentes seguro regresaré

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Friendly staff, clean, cozy environment, good food

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful property. The staff is wonderful, polite and very accommodating. They offer free bicycles to get around the city and also offer free drops and pickups to the ancient town. Kayaking in the lagoon was fun. Would have loved to kayak in the river instead of just the lagoon.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Friendly staff, beautiful hotel. Only issue was everything in the hotel was too overpriced for what it was and so the restaurant was always empty at night. Other than that, no complaints.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Rooms are very small.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nice location , tired property . Linen towels etc poor . Need changing . Staff though very polite , appeared hesitant ( breakfast kitchen /serving staff were better ) need training to make guests feel relaxed .

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Staff were very attentive. Beautiful property. Quiet and relaxing.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful hotel and rooms. Very good breakfast selections and staff were very welcoming and friendly.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Det mest magiske sted jeg længe har været. Stedet kan bare ikke beskrives. Vi havde været på 7 andre hoteller på vores rejse og det her var toppen. Morgenmaden var også den bedste på hele turen!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Behageligt og flot sted, de har gjort rigtig meget ud af stedet. Skøn udsigt fra værelserne. Fuglekviddere og masser af fisk i vandet. Strand lige over gaden efter at have passeret resortets bro som dog er i virkelig dårlig forfatning. Security mangler at lære at huske deres gæster så man ikke bliver nægtet adgang til resortets indgang (jeg er nem at genkende da jeg sidder i kørestol med motor foran) de lavede en rampe hurtigt indtil vores værelse af nogle træplader så 20 points for det. Værelserne er små, kunne kun lige akkurat komme forbi sengen med min rullestol. Skimmelsvamp på badeværelset i øverste hjørne over badekarret. Strømudtag elendige og intet i nærheden af sengen. Kunne kun bruge det der var på badeværelset.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Nice place to stay at. The ground is beautiful, near the river and i right across from a beach. The staff is really friendly and helpful. Breakfasts are excellent with a large selection including pho . I like hoi a with friendly local people. I will definitely come back to this resort and town in the future if given an opportunity.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Staff was incredible. Very friendly and also very helpful. The rooms could have been cleaned a bit better.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: During my stay at this hotel, i evaluated various aspects of my experience based on a point system from 1 to 5, with 5 being the highest. Below is my detailed assessment customer service (excellent service) check-in process (smooth and efficient) room quality (spacious and comfortable) bed comfort (very comfortable) bathroom (toilet was blocked) air conditioning (was broken the whole night but fixed later) workstation (small but functional) wi-fi (very slow, not reliable) hotel location (great location, close to the beach, very relaxing) breakfast (many options, but pastries were not fresh) dinner (nice buffet selection) pool (well-maintained and enjoyable) kids area n/a room service (delivered a fruit basket daily) cleaning (shower was dirty) overall rating 3.9 / 5 a great hotel with excellent service, location, and amenities. However, improvements in wi-fi, bathroom maintenance, and cleaning standards would enhance the overall experience.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: I liked everthing

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 직원들이 친절해요 조식은 생각보다 종류가 적었는데 그래도 매일 메뉴가 바뀌어 괜찮았어요 룸상태 늘 신경써주고 깨끗해요

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Loved the hotel. Stayed in a bungalow with a lagoon view for several nights and it was comfortable and spacious. Lots of amenities on site too. Staff were great. Location was great. Lots of good options for breakfast. Hotel has a shuttle bus into the town centre that runs multiple times a day. Also has private beach access.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The staff were super nice, room service and breakfast buffet was excellent

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Great to be away from the hoi an noise but the hotel beach was dirty and there was no access to the sea due to erosion measures

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Cannot fault this hotel - perfect!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful property! close to the beach! friendly staff. Breakfast was great with many options. Pools were nice. Rooms very nice but only have bathtubs with shower wands. It was fine. Only problem was set up a pick up service from the airport to the hotel, we were never picked up.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: 천장에서 이상한 소리 남 와이파이 연결되지만 인터넷은 안됨 조식이 부실함 바다가 그냥 별로.. 동해바다만도 못함

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Molto comodo, piscina, belle camere, buon cibo

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: We loved that there was a shuttle to old town hoi a but wished it would have had more drop off times (for example, every half hour from 9am to 5pm). Our ac broke one day and they fixed it within the hour! it required quite a bit of electrical work to do so but staff was excelllent!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Great pool, the staff were really nice and very attentive to our needs. Shuttle to and from town was a plus

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The property was across the road from the beach which was also great to swim in. We loved the buffet breakfast as there was a wide range to choose from. The staff were very friendly and informative about where to have dinner in the evening or where to go site seeing. We loved the resort also because it was quiet at night and away from old town hoi an but loved that they provided a shuttle service drop off and pick up 4 times a day to and from old town. Thank you to the wonderful staff.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Very nice

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Needing to relax and be refreshed, we stayed at koi resort for 21 nights! the beauty and tranquillity were just what we needed. The breakfasts are great! also appreciated were the good shopping advice and transportation between koi retreat and hoi an old town (5 km one way). Don t bother with the free kayaks - the small space to use these is laughable. We had some problems with housekeeping but these were resolved when we spoke to tracy. Highly recommended!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Private bridge over the river to the resort meant no strangers, salespeople or undesirables can enter the resort. A beautiful clean private beach is directly across the road from the resort. Staff are always friendly and accommodating and go the extra mile. The buffet and cooked breakfast is easily the best we ve experienced anywhere and operates between 6.30 and 10am. The pool is huge and never crowded, with plenty of recliners and shade. We ve stayed at this resort 6 times, mainly because we can t find a better one in the area at a reasonable price...and we ve stayed at a few good ones. Dozens of friends and relatives have stayed there numerous times. Highly recommended.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: All you would expect from a 5 star resort! friendly helpful staff. Great meal options, super buffet breakfast. Free bicycles for easy access to local shops restaurants. Very quiet clean private beach. Highly recommended.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful place, very relaxing!

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: Lovely property and spacious rooms.

hotelName: KOI Resort and Spa Hoi An
userCmt: The resort was an enjoyable experience. The service is very nice and patient, they ll help you with anything. The view is also beautiful and the breakfast service was great. Would definitely come here again.

Super freundliche angestellte,haben jeden wunsch erfüllt, einfach toll. Wir würden jederzeit wieder diese unterkunft wählen. Vielen lieben dank an alle angestellten die uns diese zeit so angenehm gestaltet haben!!!

This place is an extraordinary gem. A must stay. Location - it s on the river east of town, along a minor road that is mostly cycling and walking. Easy beautiful walk/cycle into town, with restaurants on the river along the way. Place - you have to see this place to believe it. Entire site is covered with flowers and lanterns. People stop to take pictures. It also doubles as a cafe, with 5 different pretty outdoor seating areas. Room - delightfully cosy and unique. Ask for the river view 2nd floor with the great view. Staff - yun is a fabulous host. She s always attentive to your needs. The rest of the staff are great too. Breakfast - included, and they make it personally for you. Other - they have free bikes, an airport shuttle service that saves money. City - hoi an is a must visit in southeast asia. So much to see and do. Beautiful town, especially at night along the river. Definitely see the countryside by bicycle or scooter, and there are beautiful beaches in cycling distance or short taxi ride.
おもてなしの心が素晴らしい 早朝のフライトという無茶な要望でも朝食の準備 ドライバーの手配をしていただきました ホイアン旧市街も自転車を借りて行ける距離です 夜は暗くなるので サイクリングは昼間がおススメです また ガーデンの手入れが素晴らしく見所のひとつです ホテルというよりも民泊テイストです

Excellent villa! the property, services, and management were incredible. The owner is extremely attentive, the amenities (bicycle and moto) were great perks, and the breakfast is plentiful and fresh. Would recommend to anyone.
Hotellet er smadder hyggeligt! personalet er de sødeste mennesker og vil strække sig utrolig langt for at hjælpe dig.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 올드타운과 거리가 있어서 위치가 좀 애매하지만 코코넛배타는곳까지 걸어갈만하고 안방비치나 올드타운 무료셔틀이 있어서 좋아요 수영장도 아이가 좋아했어요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: We stayed at this hotel and had a wonderful time. Although it is not a mega-resort like some of those near danang, it has all the needed amenities. Around the hotel there is not a lot available to eat short of the hotel s restaurant. We spent most days at an bang beach or hoi an. The hotel shuttle offer free drop off or pick-up. If you miss the shuttle, it is only a 10 min. Ride to hoi an. The hotel staff were very helpful. Ted and jenna provided suggestions for things to do and places to eat. They also arranged an out-of -this world day tour for us including bamboo boat ride, a private cooking class, my son sanctuary, and an evening ride to hoi an. Ethan, steve, fiona, kevin, and sunny were always helpful, friendly to our children, and they always tried their best to help with our requests. Peter was one of the shuttle driver that took us to hoi an many times day and night. Our kids loved the place and highly recommend it. You cannot stay within coco river resort during your stay but you will have to go out to see vietnam and meet its wonderful and friendly people!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 쉬기에 적합한 곳이에요 직원들도 친절하고 자연친화적인 곳입니다 다만 자연친화적인 곳이다보니 방에서 됴뫄뱀이 나옵니다..전 이것땜에 잠도 못잤어요 그리고 방이랑 샤워실이 커튼 하나로 나뉘어져 있어서 축축한 느낌이 들고 방이 전체적으로 어둡다는 느낌이 많이 듭니다 저는 같은 값이면 다음엔 이 곳엔 얀욜거 같습니다 위생에 민감하신분은 다른곳 추천드립니다

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Super hotel. 3 ud af 4 nætter var opholdet fantastisk, personalet var super søde og faciliteterne i top. Den sidste nat ankom en stor gruppe gæster, hvorefter standarden desværre faldt, da det virkede som om at hotellet ikke kunne klare de mange gæster. Alt i alt dog et rigtig hyggeligt sted!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 정말 다 만족했었는데 호텔와이파이가 조금 불안정했어요.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 생각보다 좋았지만 직원들의 영어수준이 상당히 낮고 음식값이 비쌉니다.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 코코리버에 꼭 오세요. 호텔리어분들이 모두 가족같이 친절하고 객실, 호텔뷰 모든 것이 다 좋습니다. 또 호이안에 오면 코코리버에 갈거예요. 한국인이 많지 않아 더 좋았고 너무 조용하고 아침마다 들리는 새소리와 멋진강은 잊지 못할거에요. 프론트에 계신 분과 사진도 찍었습니다. 그녀는 호텔리어로서 프로답고 친절하고 매우 훌륭합니다. 너무 고맙습니다. 다시 가고싶어요. 직원분들이 너무 멋지고 전문성이 느껴집니다. 생일 기념으로 주신 케이크도 너무 감사합니다.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Sveper trevlig personal och mysigt hitell men det ligger lite ödsligt så man behöver åka moped eller taxi om man ska ta sig någonstans. Personalen är 5 star

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: こちらのホテルに6泊宿泊しました 空港からホテルまでタクシーより ホテルからのお迎え(4人がけ片道usd20)が楽だと思い日本で事前予約をしていきました 到着するとドライバーが氏名のかかれた紙を持って出口に待機しています しかし ホイアンでは似た名前のホテルや数が多くドライバーが把握してない事があるようです 違う所に降ろされてしまい 灼熱の中スーツケースを引きながら歩くはめに 事前に一緒に確認するとこのようなトラブルも回避できるかもしれません 到着すると焦った表情のスタッフから謝罪があり お部屋もスウィートルームに変更されていました お詫びにアップグレードしたのかもしれません 口コミ通り スタッフが気さくで親身になって対応してくれます ホテルからホイアン旧市街 ビーチまで無料シャトルバスの送迎は便利でした ただ フロント側が色々忘れている事が多かったり 変更になった事項の事前説明が何度もなかった為戸惑う事もありましたが 国民性かもしれませんね こちらから聞けばきちんと説明してくれました ホテルは隠れ家的な雰囲気 静かで のんびり過ごす事が出来て満足しています 朝食は通常バイキングですが 人数が少ないとオーダー式朝食に変わり 川を眺めてながら頂くお食事はちょっぴりお得感もあります バイキング時には出ない 出来立てのパッションジュースが絶品です 色々ありましたが 楽しいひと時を過ごす事ができました お世話になったスタッフのみなさん ありがとうございました

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 조식 종류가 많고 맛있음. 도마뱀 가끔 출몰함. 수영장 작으나 괜찮음. 사람이 별로 없어서 좋음.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 가성비 최고! 조식도 잘 나와요! it was worth what i paid it for ! nice resort and i can recommend here for young couple and a big member of family!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 中心から少しありますが ホテルシャトルバスがありますので 不便ではありません 綺麗な部屋で大きなバスタブあり 食事も美味しい 全てのスタッフが感じが良く キビキビしています 綺麗な遠浅の ビーチへも シャトルバスがでています

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 到着がかなり遅くなって疲れ果てたが 受付の人が感じが良くてほっとした 朝ごはんは 川に面したレストランで頂きました 早朝が景色の変化も楽しめてお勧めです 静かで穏やかで 早く起きて良かった と実感しました レストランのスタッフも 食事について丁寧に教えてくれた

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Både hotellets stand og personalets venlige og hjælpsomme væremåde, gjorde vores ophold på coco river til en sand fornøjelse. Især hvis hotellet har få gæster og de derfor tilbyder a al carte til morgenmaden fremfor buffet er det helt i top. Buffeten mangler lidt nogle ting til at dække maden med da den ellers er fyldt med insekter. Juice og mælken holdes heller ikke ordentlig kold. Poolen har en okay størrelse hvis man ikke er så mange mennesker dernede. Hvis der er store familier bliver den hurtigt fyldt. Shuttlebussen fra hotellet fungere godt men den sidst afgang fra hoi an er en smule tidlig.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 수영장이 좀 작지만 가성비 만족합니다 호이안에있어서 공항에서는 좀 걸려요 주변에 상가도 없는게 좀 아쉽구요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Super fint hotel med et dejligt hjælpsomt personale.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 정말 좋았어요.침대 너무 폭신하고 청소도 매일아침 일찍해주셔서 늘 깨끗하게 지냈어요.온수도 잘나오고 수압도 나쁘지않았어요.조식이 많지는 않았지만 한두가지가 늘 바뀌어 있었고 쌀국수는 진짜 꼭먹어보세요 영어가 안되서 손짓발짓했는데 다 알아들으시더라구요 다음에 베트남에 다시온다면 다시 묵을거에요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Nice place with good service, free shuttle bus to the beach and city. Help arrange car to danang city, great

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 역시 친절합니다. 직원들이 친구처럼 대해줘서 좋았어요. 조식당이 강위에 지어져 운치있긴한데 김치주변에만 날파리가 엄청나서 밥맛이 좀.. 수영장물도 먼지가 좀 많네요 그래도 인간적인면이 좋아서 직원들보러 또 오고싶어요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 홈페이지에서 본 객실사진보다 룸이 작아서 처음엔 놀랬지만 만족스러웠던 리조트에요 도심이랑 떨어져있고 주변에 아무것도 없는게 단점이지만 조용하고 깨끗하고 조식이 맛있어요 직원분들이 너무 친절하고 좋으세요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Very nice and friendly staff that also noticed my birthday during the vist. Need for transfer bus to hoi an but worked fine all the time. Neighboring area not of any greater interest. Good rooms although need to change bedding because of insect bites that appeared coming from the bed (but not sure). Restaurant nicely situated by the river but without ac.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 너무친절하고 정리가 잘된 호텔입니다..

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 자연과어우러진호텔은 여유를만끽하기에좋은 위치였으며 셔틀버스를이용한 해변과 올드타운 다녀오기용이했음.무엇보다 직원들의 친절함과 세심함이 여행의 즐거움에 배가되었음. 강가의 조식도 맛이있었음. 수영장바닥까지 깨끗하게 청소하는모습도 직접봤음굿

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: The staff were friendly and helpful in every aspect of our journey.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: スパのスタッフ(専属ではない)の対応が雑だった マッサージは上手でした

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: It was a good place to travel with family. The staff were always kind and the galadiner program, which was carefully prepared was really cool. Breakfast was fine, and the pool was fine. There was a shuttle downtown, so i used it conveniently. It was not expensive and it was good to be offered for other fees. I m going to be revising again next time.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 좀은 어수선한분위기

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: It didn t live up to the advertisement

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: ファミリーコネクティングルームに宿泊しました 1泊目は部屋を間違えて案内されましたが翌日 すぐに変更してくれて 他にも特典を色々とつけてくれました アンバンビーチもタクシーで10分くらいで行けます ホテルのプールもゆっくりできました ホイアン市街地まではシャトルバスが出てますが 9時発と15時発の2便で少ないです 帰りは市街地を15時発と21時発の2便です でもgrabで行き帰りできるので問題ありません

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 部屋も広くきれいで とても良かったです またホイアンにくることがあれば ココに泊まりたいと思います 朝食もホイアンの料理が出てきて おいしかったです 旧市街からは少し遠くて grabを使う必要が有りますが 直ぐに手配できたので不満はなかったです

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Desværre regnede det i vores tid på hotellet, men alt andet fungerede super. Lækre værelser, meget hjælpsomt staff, god morgenmad og dejligt roligt kvarter tæt på hoi an downtown

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 아주 고즈넉하게 조용하고 정원을 바라보며 테라스에 앉아서 쉴수 있어서 너무 좋았어요. 조식도 깔끔하게 나오고 모든 가족이 만족했답니다. 하지만 계단을 이용해서 짐을 올리고 내려야 해서 불편함은 있지만 직원분들이 도와줘서 괜찮았어요. 그리고 호이안 번화가와 멀어서 한번 나갔다가 들어오면 다시 나가기 애매함. 그래도 나는 조용해서 너무 좋았다. 번화가는 너무 시끄럽고 사람이 많았기 때문에 좋았다. 다음날 일정으로 바쁘게 나가서 아쉬움이 남아서 다시 또 가고싶은 호텔이다!!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Nice hotel to relax in, away from the hussle of town. Staff go above ans beyond for guests. Very good english.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Great resort, staff are amazing and extremely helpful

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Such lovely staff, so helpful and informative about the local area. All the staff were very friendly and welcoming. I will definitely stay again

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Veldig hyggelige ansatte, synes bare at bassenget kunne vært merket med ph og klor verdier, så ingen sirkulasjons pumpe som gikk. Prisene i resturanten var overpriset.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Great stay. Helpful staff. Good shuttle into town and to the beach.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Nice accommodations and friendly and attentive staff especially the spa. Great massage and body scrub package. Pool was warm and food was delicious.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Good!! all the staff are very friendly! there was no inconvenience. Thank you so much for the last gift for the kids!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Vi havde fem fantastiske dage på coco, alt var super tilfredsstillende, virkelig lækker morgenmad og skønne omgivelser. Hotellet lå lige ved floden, i et dejligt stille og fredeligt område og i en fin afstand til byen. Man kunne gå eller tage en grab alt efter hvad man havde lyst til. Hotellet var meget rent og pænt og personalet var altid søde og hjælpsomme. Kan klart anbefales og vi vil helt sikkert bo her igen hvis vi kommer tilbage til hoi an.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Quiet, clean and very lovely and supportive staff. Thank you for making our stay very special caroline and family

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: As a honeymoon trip, we had a truly wonderful and happy time. All the staff were very kind and provided us with many conveniences. Although our stay in hoi an was relatively short, thanks to the warm and friendly staff, we were able to fully enjoy the beautiful sights of the city. Choosing to stay here was an excellent decision.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: From the moment we arrived, coco river and their staff was perfect for our family. The staff from reception, security, restaurant and housekeeping were lovely and provided exceptional service which cannot be faulted. They made us feel great and provided an exceptional level of experience. The hotel itself is a great base and has a great swimming pool area, as well as clean and large rooms and we felt so welcomed and at home, we actually cancelled other accomodation and extended our stay twice because of the experience we had. There were comments prior to going that we read about location, but honestly this wasn t an issue. Yea, it s away from the hustle and bustle, but as a family we were happy to take a 5-10 minute grab to the main touristy parts of hoi an. There is also multiple restaurants/food options, pharmacy, convenience store, coffee shops and motorbike rental within 400m of the resort so was nice to get a respite from the madness of hoi an which can be overwhelming. In saying that, we will be back here and will recommend the hotel to anyone considering hoi an, especially those with younger children as it was perfect for what we needed.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 아침 조식 좋았고 가격도 저렴했으며 호이안 빈펄랜드 메인으로 가기전 0.5박하기에 충분했습니다.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 5 nachten verbleven, heerlijk resort met ruime kamers met groot bad en een aparte douche. Werkelijk niets is sunny en haar team te veel, supervriendelijk en attend personeel.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Rat thich!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Facade is uninviting, and it is a good 4.5 k from busy hoi an. Inside the rooms are a little dated, but clean and comfortable. Staff only too willing to please. It s decent value for money, but you won t be wowed. Very good shuttle service necessary given distance from town.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 子連れ お年寄り連れの旅行でのんびりしたくて 川沿いの雰囲気が気に入って選びました ホテルの周りはlocalの田舎風景って感じで 現地の田舎の生活を垣間見れる気がしました 旧市街地 beachには無料シャトルバスで移動 他に2軒のホテルを周って目的地へ 旧市街地からの最終バスは21 45でゆっくり買い物も食事も出来ました ホテル出て右に小さなお店がありました 行けませんでしたが お水とかスナック菓子とかがありそうな感じ 多分クレジットカードは使えないと思います 朝食は宿泊人数が多ければ種類豊富に出ますが 少ない時はフルーツ パン５ 6種類 ヨーグルト オムレツ フォー シリアル コーヒー 紅茶 牛乳 ジュースって感じです a la carteって言ってたので 注文したら他の物も出してくれるかも ですが 時間が掛かりそうでした 従業員はお国柄か のんびりされてます 川沿いのレストランは雰囲気がとても良いです 初朝食の時にお世話係のthiさんが挨拶にきてくれて 彼女からlineを交換しようと その後はlineで質問に答えてもらったり 出先からの帰りのシャトルバスの時間変更をして貰ったりで 大変助かりました (やり取りは英語) 一寸法師的なバスケットボートに乗りたいと相談したら レストラン横から船に乗って 観光客がバスケットボートに乗るspot迄連れて行ってくれて ボート乗って一周するツアーを大人us 20でやってくれました (清算する時は現地のドンだったので 何故us で言われたのかは不明 ) ホテルのspaもディスカウントがあったのでお安くマッサージが受けられました タイミングが悪く現地では食べられなかったバイン ミー フーンのサンドウィッチも thiさんのお助けでgrab food deliveryでホテルで堪能出来ました thiさんが居てくれて 本当に色々楽しませて頂けました 本当に感謝です ホテル自体は豪華では無いですが コテージ風なお部屋作りで自然を基調とした雰囲気です お値段は元値では高いと思いますが ディスカウント後のお値段だったら大満足です 夜通し賑やかに過ごしたい方には不向きですが ゆっくり寛ぎたい旅行にはピッタリでした

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 아주 훌륭한 시설과 서비스로 행복한 경험이었어요.특히 직원들이 친절했어요.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 깨끗하고 사진보다 더 좋아요 직원들도 엄청 친절하고 항상 도움 줄려 하고 제일 좋았어요 조식도 맛잇고 수영장도 크고 깊고 좋아요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Virkelig dejligt hotel. Flot udsigt udover floden. Rene, pæne værelser. God service og fin restaurant. Udemærket morgenmad. Shuttle bus hver time direkte til hoi an. Kan varmt anbefales.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: I stayed here with my family for two nights. All the staff were friendly, and the resort was a little old but clean. Especially, ms.sunny took care of my family. I was satisfied with the coconut boat tour and spa she recommended. I want to thank her. My family would like to visit again if we have a chance soon.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Hotel was nice with all the basic facilities and right next to the river. No complains whatsoever about the accommodation as it was more than what we expected. I did however pay extra to have my room upgraded as there was less privacy in our original room. However what made this whole stay a memorable one was due to the fact that their guest relations manager sunny went an extra mile to ensure our needs were well met by arranging for our tours, cars massage etc. I really want to give her a lot of credit for she is great with all her guests and will do everything she can to make their stay a good one. Coco river resort, sunny is an asset to your hotel and she has done a good job at least enabling us to leave hoi an with a smile on our face. Thank you sunny for all your help during our stay there.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: A very relaxing hotel. Very good! good restaurants nearby. Gym room need to be renovated. Wifi system need to be improved. Overall speaking, if i come to hoi an again, i will chose again.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 整體服務算不錯 房間也很乾淨 飯店在可可河旁邊,喜歡鄉村風味的是很好的選擇.飯店也有到會安古城來回的免費接駁車..也可參加飯店直接從飯店坐船到竹籃船的景點 希望飯店服務人員能穿著飯店制服.這是一個飯店的門面.及客人進入飯店的第一印象

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: The rooms and location are lovely. Simple things that could make the stay more pleasant are better poolside service - beer bottles were left poolside overnight. We often had to request towels at the pool. Despite staff having nothing to do at the restaurant next to the pool no one ever came to see if you wanted any food or drinks. More attentive staff at the restaurant- flys would often be all over the fruit at breakfast and the staff didn t have the initiative to cover the fruit or turn on the fans without prompting. We ate lunch and dinner at the restaurant for a couple of days as we had a sick child. It was disappointing to wait for such a long time for basic food (half an hour for sandwiches). The food was also overpriced and not particularly good. The shuttle is convenient but stops at two other hotels along the way, so allow half an hour to get to the old town this way. Still a comfortable place to stay away from the busy old town and with a few minor improvements it could be an excellent choice.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운과 거리가 있어서 셔틀을 타거나 택시를 이용해야하는 불편함 말고는 만족스러움. 나름 깨끗하게 관리되어져 있고 조식도 훌륭함. 아침에 일어날때 창밖에서 들려오는 새소리는 보너스!!!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Coco river was the most beautiful stay in hoi an! we definitely recommend this stay, if you want to treat yourself. We had a anniversary cake, what a great surprise!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 가족여행으로 1박2일 머물렀는데 편안하게 휴식하기에 너무 좋은 리조트였어요..직원들도 무척 친절했구요 다만 밤늦게 도착해서 호텔내 음식점을 이용했는데 너무 양이 적고 비쌌어요ㅜ...그점 빼고는 만족합니다

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Really nice and cozy place. Honestly, i can recommend you to stay here! their service is also really nice!!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Nette anlage mit sehr schönen flair

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: I had a very special time here. Location was great because it s a few minutes out of town, is quiet and the perfect place to rejuvenate before heading back into the crazy hustle and bustle of hoi an s town centre. Free shuttle to town or locals beach. Staff are amazing, very hospitable. Rooms spotless, food good, views of the lake so peaceful and breathtaking.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 酒店渡假式設計 庭園優美 餐廳面河 景色怡人 有spa及免赏穿梭車到會安古鎮及沙灘 非常貼心

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Great hotel we loved the the location very quiet on the river ....the staff were very helpful and pleasant ....especially jack ..!!! .rooms were large and very comfortable beds ...wifi needs to improve and also breakfast dishes need to be hotter .....overall a really good stay didn t want to leave ...

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Enjoyable stay. Beautiful river view. Used laundry service after a long trek in phong nha - amazed by how fresh our clothes was after cleaning. Would stay again

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 浴缸的水塞壞了 不能浸浴 自助早餐選擇少 而且食物是冷的 火腿變壞了 部份食物有昆蟲在上面 有提供很多的收費服務 例如按摩 spa 住客有30 off的折扣優惠

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 저만 다니고 싶은 그런 곳이예요.. 웃음이 예쁘던 사랑스러운 틴이 그립네요 너무 잘해주셔서 감사했어요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Excellent staff, lovely food. And shuttle to town was great

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 깨끗하고 직원들이 친절했으나 뷰를 도로변쪽으로 주셔서 오토바이소리에 매우 시끄러웠다.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: 베트남 전통 인테리어 호텔로 가족과의 1박이 즐거웠습니다

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: When we arrived at resort, reception welcomed us nicely and the room was so perfect. The price is resonable and restaurant is located right next of river so you can see the beautiful view of coco river.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Their wifi doesn t work well ...

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Meets the expectations. Nice breakfast location

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Love the place and staff. Very clean and quiet and beautiful. My only downside is location. It s a bit far from anything if you just want to wall out and explore. But they do have a shuttle that brings you the the beach or to downtown so it s easy to get there.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Hoi An Coco River
userCmt: Restaurant aankleding en hygiene matig. Gym een puinhoop

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Loved my villa and the resort in general for its close proximity to food, dry cleaning and markets. I can t fault the villa i had in anyway. It was a haven from the touring as a smoker, i had my own private area to smoke away. Mosquitos didn t bother me as i anticipated their presence and travelled with a home made oil - olive oil (1/2 cup) a few drops of tea tree oil) - carried in luggage. Although the bus provided an excellent shuttle service, i only used it once as i opted to walk to the markets explore cafes bars along the way.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: This was a really lovely place to stay. Really great to come back to after a day of exploring. Staff were superb and helpful..would definitely recommend to anyone

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 직원들 친절함. 하지만 호텔 내 레스토랑이나 픽업서비스 등 추가서비스 결제할때 돈 계산 잘하고 영수증 잘 챙겨놔야함. 안그러면 사용 안했는데 돈 내라고하거나 결제했는데 또 돈내라고 하는 경우 있음.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 街からは少し離れてましたが無料バスがありあまり不便は感じなかったです タクシーでも街まで200円程度で行けました 朝食のバイキングも充実してたので良かったです

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: I really enjoyed my stay at the hotel also especially found the booked massage heavenly! best massage in many years!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Nice clean, friendly staff always helpful, not to far out of the old town 1 mile also has a free local shuttle that drives past to old town at certain times! you will need to take the free shuttle to beach though unless you use the free bikes they provide.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 너무나도 친절했던 서비스 깨끗한 룸 컨디션 전반적으로 너무나도 만족했던 숙소입니다. 올드타운가는 셔틀버스도 있어서 편하게 여행하기 너무 좋았습니다

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Breakfast area needs ceiling fans to circulate air. The only fan was for the staff checking room numbers. Tea and coffee was not very good. Staff were generally very helpful. Great that there are bikes to borrow for free! the shuttle bus is good except there needs to be an extra service between the 5.20 7.20 pm one. Pool area was a bit overgrown and dirty...

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful hotel! we were blown away by what we got for the price here! it was an excellent hotel- short distance to the beach and to hoi an ancient town- and the staff was very friendly and accommodating! we definitely recommend this hotel!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 레이트 체크인을 신청하고 새벽세시에 도착했는데도 웰컴푸드가 준비되어있어서 너무 감동이었어요 호텔 셔틀버스가 있는 점도 좋고 수영장도 재밌었어요 룸도 너무 예쁘고 깨끗하고 에어컨 잘되고 조식 종류도 적지 않고 맛 괜찮았습니다 떠나는 날에 택시예약이 꼬여서 짐잠시 맡겨두고 주변을 둘러봤는데 맞은편에 음식점이있고 옆에 슈퍼마켓이 있구 반대쪽엔 예쁜 카페가 하나 있어서 리조트에만 머물면서 짐시 주위 둘러도 괜찮을 것 같았어요 짧게 머물러 아쉬웠습니다 다음에 호이안을 갈 계획이 있다면 꼭 이 리조트에 다시 예약할거예요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The staff were very attentive, especially hahn at the front desk was a very good host ) thank you.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Fantastisk sted, ligger godt, værelserne er super flotte, servicen på hotellet er til 5 stjerner, søde og hjælpsomme. God mad og ok pool. Det eneste der er at sætte i finger på er baren som virkelig trænger til en renovering og den del af poolen som skal kunne lave bobler har ikke fungeret i meget lang tid fik vi af vide. Alt i alt et sted vi gerne kommer igen .

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Poolen var ikke særlig ren og vi havde en forfærdelig lugt på værelserne fra aircondition anlægget. Vi gjorde hotellet opmærksom på dette flere gange. Man skulle selv opsøge hvis man ville have nogen form for service omkring poolen. Der var ikke så stort et udvalg af børnemenuer som gjorde at vi ikke spiste der. Ellers et ok hotel

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Läget var helt ok, man kunde gå in till gamla stan men tog lite tid så vi tog alltid en grab vart vi än skulle då vädret inte tillät cykel eller promenader. Personalen var väldigt trevlig och hjälpsam! hotellet var vi väldigt överraskande nöjda med. Ett av dem bästa hotellen jag bott på, så fint och fräscht. Stort plus var omgivningen, man var omringad av natur som var sååå vacker! rekommenderar verkligen detta hotellet d

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Decevant, la piscine est petite. La photo est trompeuse. Notre chambre commandée devait etre luxury avec vue sur le garden ... On a du reclamer pour avoir une chambre du nuveau commandé

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 高級感は無いが コストパフォーマンスは非常に高い

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Location and very green. Can t find anything i dislike.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Great location between town and beach, free use of bicycles, lovely and helpful staff, well equipped rooms, will definitely come back

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful property built around an actual ancient house. Great location close to a bunch of restaurants and bars and not far from the ancient town.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
