userCmt: Beautiful hotel with lovely garden and great rooms. The bed is huge and very comfortable and the bathroom pristine. Very relaxing atmosphere. Excellent staff. The shuttle to the ancient town and the beach is very efficient. Great location with a few nice restaurants across the street. The restaurant at the beach is fantastic! the only hiccup was the airport transfer that never showed up, but it was easy enough to get a taxi

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Het personeel is heel gastvrij en behulpzaam. Ruime kamers met een grote badkamer voorzien van zowel bad en douche. Het oude centrum is lopend te doen maar het hotel heeft ook een gratis shuttle naar zowel het centrum als het strand. Er is een ruim ontbijtbuffet. Bedden zijn goed maar wel aan de harde kant. Zoals veel bedden in vietnam.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Good facilities generally fruit bats in the top rooms although hey moved us to another room

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The location was excellent, close to hoi an old town but on a quiet back laneway facing the river. The staff were so friendly and attentive and the breakfast buffet was excellent. Pool was nice and the view of thr river from our room and balcony was great. This hotel was excellent value, we would happily stay there again.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 조식부터 서비스 친절함 숙박 청결까지 가성비 대비 너무 좋았어요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Good! it was so clean and all of the staffs there were very hospitable! i strongly recommend you use this hotel!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 셔틀버스가 운행해서 편합니다. 조식은 후기만큼 맛있진 않았습니다. 가성비는 확실히 좋습니다.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: A bit away from the center of town, but good enough bang for your buck. Enjoy my stay.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Staff is friendly, hotel room is clean, the plants are green. The swimming pool is a bit too small and can be cleaner.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Sehr schöner garten, viel grün. Anbindung an die altstadt und strand ist sehr gut dank hoteleigenem shuttleservice

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Rigtig fin service, hjælpsomt perosonale og gode faciliteter. Dejligt kunne låne cykler gratis og at der også er shuttle service til by og strand.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Prachtig resort, doet niet aan als een hotel. Kleinschalig, mooie kamers, voorzien van alle noodzakelijke faciliteren en comfort! goed ontbijt, zeer gastvrije medewerkers

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Gemütliche einrichtungen mit typisch vietnam. Stil aus den 18.jahrhundert, aber auch mit moderner technik. Sehr naturgebunden mit viel grün.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Schöner innenhof, unbedingt gardenview und stock mit balkon nehmen.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Minh and the entire staff were amazing! so kind and helpful. My son was ill and they were happy to assist us in anyway possible.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: It is around 2km away from the old town hoi an, but the property has own transportation to drop you off right in front of walking street in old town. You will enjoy the facilities and walking around resort. It is roomy but serene. Super clean and comfy. Highly recommend.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: よりベトナムらしいインテリアと良質のサービスを求めてこの宿を選びました 朝ごはんはベトナム郷土料理と西洋があり フルーツが豊富でとても美味しく 3日滞在したのですが 少しずつメニューも変更されていて毎日飽きませんでした 部屋が1階だったので 部屋の温度と湿度の管理が少し難しかったかもしれません 部屋のバスルームに小さなヤモリが住んでいたのも私にはとても愛らしく感じました 旧市街とビーチには無料でシャトルバスが出ていて(glabでも大した料金ではないですが)安心感もあり 細かなコストをセーブすることもでき とても便利でした 特筆すべきはスタッフのホスピタリティだと思います 出発前から深夜到着のため 送迎の手配をお願いしていましたが 親切に何度もメールをいただいたり 帰りの手配も心配してくれて 夜便のため 荷物を持ったままどのように過ごそうか迷っていたところ タクシーに積んだまま観光し 空港へのお迎えまで完璧に手配してくれました あと宿の中にホテルの名前の由来にもなっている400年前の民家が残っているのですが(ライスペーパーを作ってレストランに卸しているそうです)昔ながらの製法でのライスペーパー作りのワークショップと民家の案内をしてくれました 作りたてのライスペーパー ベトナムの醤油で食べたらとても美味しかった スタッフのミンさん とても親切でした 市街地からは少し距離がありますが(車で5分とか )スーパーが目の前 歩くと食事処もあり 何不自由ない滞在ができました お勧めします

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The staff was excellent. They new your name when they greeted you. Everyone had a smile and asked if you needed anything. Room was very clean, bathroom water pressure was great. No issues during our stay and convenient to old town and the beach.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Very nice stay with a friendly staff.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: スタッフの皆さんにも親切にして頂き感謝しています ありがとうございました 今度は天気の良い季節に行き ビーチにも行ってみたいと思っています

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Jeg oplevede en del fugt og faktisk en skimmelagtigt fugtighed. Dog var de enormt søde på resortet. Morgenmaden var god og der var et dejligt badeværelse på værelset. Men fugten trak ned og meget af mit tøj tog flere dage om at få tørreret/renset for fugtlugt

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: A mile walk from the old town, very conviently located if you don t mind a quick walk but they also have a trolley service. Great stay, a little bit pricey but good room and bathroom.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The family room we rented was excellent, a lot of space, we loved it. The hotel is well located, not to far from the old town. It was great that they provided a free shuttle. Service was excellent. Breakfast was pretty good too.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Mysigt och trevligt hotell med bra läge. Perfekt att kunna låna cyklar. Väldigt lugnt när vi va här i början av januari. Gratis buss till stranden funkade finfint

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The staff are very friendly, helpful and accommodating, nothing was a problem. The hotel gardens and grounds are beautifully kept. Our room was stunning, with a lovely outlook. We felt very comfortable and happy with our stay. The hotel shuttle into town was great, although we walked most of the time alone the back street along the river, taking only 15mins. The complimentary bicycles were a lot of fun, we rode through rice fields to tra que vegetable village. It was my second stay here, i liked it so much )

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Excellent hotel! perfect service! everything worked well. The personnel were really friendly and helpful. If we come back to hoi an, we will definitely take this hotel again. We highly recommend!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The hotel was lovely, so peaceful and pretty 15 min walk to city centre. You can walk along the river to old hoi an which is peaceful and not so busy. The hotel changed our first room as it didnt have a proper balcony and i just mentioned it in passing and minh got us moved. The reception staff, concierge, housekeeping and minh are very good. Restaurant at breakfast lets the place down. Looks immpressive but feels like it cut corners on quality. Juice isnt freshly squeezed, if the coffee runs put no one notices, the tables aren t relaid if someone leaves so if you.come in a bit later theres no cleaned tables. Choices are limited and same daily, cold meats, salads etc. Doesn t sound much but it just let the hotel down for us. Bikes are a nice touch, worth using.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: I used to be a backpacker and now mid-range traveler with my kid. For the cost, i was expecting mid-range but it was luxury. A very stunning place and staff that treat you like royalty. And the breakfast was amazing. There were two areas that affluent folks may not mind, but i was uncomfortable with. There s no card to put on the door to indicate you don t want your towels and bedding changed. It s a waste. And the volume of food at breakfast is glutenous! it s good, but there s so so so much. There doesn t need to be that many choices and that much waste for the wealthy to enjoy themselves.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Tolles ambiente, sehr guter service, sehr gutes frühstück

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Dejligt hotel med meget fin have og pool

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Sehr schönes hotelresort und sehr nette, hilfsbereite mitarbeiter. Absolut zu empfehlen!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Our stay at ancient house resort was so lovely. The room just as the pictures beautiful and spacious and very clean. The breakfast in the morning was fabulous but the highlight for us were the friendly and attentive staff. We traveled all over vietnam and the staff and resort really stood out to us. I don t plan on staying anywhere else when we visit hoi an again. We loved ancient house resort.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The staff is so helpful. There s many tours you can book. This resort is away from the bustle of da nang. It is also within walking distance of the old town and the market area. The daily morning breakfast was incredible. The hotel has a nice restaurant, and there s also lots of food choices outside to change things up. We ll be back again in two years!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 宿泊施設は古い感じがしたが 清潔でサービスは良かった しかし 街の中心部から離れているので不便さも感じた

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Minh s rice paper cooking class is not to be missed! he is kind and informative about local food. He was so helpful on local suggestions as well. Great hotel!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: We had a truly wonderful stay at this beautiful resort in hoi an! from the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed by the incredibly kind and helpful ladies at the reception. The entire staff made us feel right at home always smiling, attentive, and ready to assist. The resort itself is a peaceful oasis beautifully maintained, with lush greenery and a relaxing atmosphere. Our room was spacious, clean, and tastefully decorated, with all the comforts we could wish for. A special shout-out goes to minh, who went above and beyond to make our stay unforgettable. He helped us organize day trips, gave us great insider tips and took us on a very interesting bike tour through the rice paddies. We are grateful for his support! we would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting hoi an. Thank you for the amazing experience we will definitely come back!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Amazing hotel and staff. Great food. Definitely will return next time in hoi an.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: God morgenmadsbuffet meget venligt og hjælpsomt personale. Mulighed for bad og opbevaring af bagage og pool ved ankomst før indtjekning

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 全体的に良かったが アメニティが不充実

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Det mest fantastiske hotel, en lille oase i byen. Gid beliggenhed og meget hjælpeslmt personale.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Dejligt sted, venligt og hjælpsomt personale. Fedt med gratis lån af cykler samt shuttle bil til både strand og den gamle bydel.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 一言で言うと 素敵 なホテルでした 規模は小さめですが 緑を多く取り込み奥行き感を巧みに演出した建物と庭の設計で ２倍も３倍も広く感じます お部屋やレストランもホイアンらしく歴史を感じさせる空間で 嫌みに感じる高級感は皆無で非常に快適でした スタッフは一見素っ気ないですが 困ったことや質問を投げるととても親切ににこやかに応対してくれました 朝食ビュッフェは品数は決して多くないですが 卵のライブキッチンもあり不満はなかったです いつかまた必ず宿泊したいと感じる数少ない宿の一つになりました

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: So glad we picked this ancient house resort! it was really gorgeous. For the price point it was perfect. A very short walking distance to the hoi an lantern town. Recently completely renovated, the rooms are spacious and modern,the layout is lovely with the central pool and lots of trees and greenery against the white building, a very quiet and quite serene atmosphere. The room is beautiful and spotless and the service is delightful. We even got a free upgrade. It is a really tranquil haven after a long day in town. The hotel itself is only a ten minute walk from town. The room also has free internet access and a laptop - a real luxury for vietnamese hotels! fresh fruit is placed in your room each day and at night we come back to find the curtains have been drawn for us and a little traditional dessert is left, along with a note wishing us a good night. The attention to detail is great. We definitely recommend this place to friends and family!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: We stayed at ancient house resort hoi an reality and it was fantastic. The newly renovated resort and spa is a beautiful property with friendly staff and walking distance to all the attractions in the area. The ancient house offered excellent customer service beautiful rooms. Each day there was fresh fruit in the room and curtains drawn. The restaurant food was excellent and the best breakfast i have had in a long while. Many of the other guests at the hotel commented on what a lovely relaxing place it was with great service. I was recommended this resort and certainly would refer anyone to stay here. Overall a great experience.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: We loved it here. The hotel has a lot of charm (real charm not the made up kind) and the staff is quite lovely. This is not like the resort hotels that are springing up all over hoi an, but rather a really nice and peaceful place to stay that makes you feel like you are in vietnam. The rooms are large and the staff is very attentive. And the hotel is in a great location, close to the beach and to town. Would definitely stay here again!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 일단...위치를 찾기가 조금 힘들었어요 픽업기사분이 주소를 보고도 빙글빙글 돌아 찾았네요 사진에 보여지는 동남아다운 분위기는 확실히 있어요. 나무가 많아서 더 자연친화적이구요. 하지만 좀 전체적으로 낡았어요. 방에들어갈때마다 나무문소리가 삐걱대고 복도가 없다보니 길바닥과 방이 문하나사이로 같이 있는 느낌? 처음 체크인할때 짐을 옮겨다주는 직원분이 아무리 눌러도 방에 불도 안들어와 여기 전기가 나갔나 하는 생각이 들더군요. 다른직원이 바로 와서 고쳐주긴 했지만요. 나무는 많지만 아침마다 새소리는 커녕..청소를 하시는지 쿵쾅대는 소리와 옆방 생활소음도 다 들을 수 있습니다. 조식은...음 큰 기대안하시면 괜찮을거에요. 저흰 오믈렛을 주로 먹었네요 아시아인보다 서양인들이 더 많이 보이던 숙소였어요.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: A lovely oasis in hoi an! amazing friendly staff ready to help with anything.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: とにかくリゾート感満載で素敵でした トイレの締りが悪かったですが 気にならないぐらい素晴らしかったです また行きたいです

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful newly renovated gem in hoi an the hotel was renovated with beautiful design and spacious room. Breakfast buffet was excellent with many varieties, main restaurant with beautiful view of garden. We were spoiled with the friendly service yet professional of the staff. We will come back again for sure

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Very pleasant day at this facility. Staff from the front desk ladies are extremely friendly and helpful. We definitely come back to this hotel again.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Excellente adresse pour un séjour de quelques jours à hoi an, à mi chemin entre plage et centre ville.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Superbe hôtel ! chambres spacieuses et propres. Petit déjeuner de qualité et variés, ce qui est rare au vietnam. C était de loin le meilleur hôtel du vietnam qu on a fait et la ville est géniale.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Lovely gardens pool. Rooms well appointed staff very friendly. Located in quieter part of hoi an but short 15 min walk to old hoi an market. The manager binh is very helpful welcoming- he upgraded our room made sure our stay was beyond satisfying.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Superbe hotel authentique à hoi an, piscine et chambre luxueuse. Personnel très aidant, petit déjeuner très complet. L hotel vous prête des vélos pour vous balader dans la vieille ville, il propose même une navette pour se rendre à la plage avec une plage privée. Je recommande!

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Excellent, friendly staff. Clean, reasonably sized,quiet rooms. Good pool with happy hour. Shuttle bus to old town and the deck house an bang beach. Free bikes you must use. Great value for money.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful property in hoi an. Close to beach and city. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 시설도 예쁘고 직원분들이 정말 친절했습니다.. 또 방문하고 싶은 곳이에요. 올드타운과 안방비치까지 셔틀도 있어서 편리했어요

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Virkelig et godt ophold. Personalet var så søde og hjalp mig med alt. De ringede rundt, og hjalp mig med at booke ting. Et af de bedste steder jeg har boet på min tur. Der var rent og pænt og super lækre værelser. Morgenmaden var super god med mange forskellige muligheder. Gratis shuttlebusser frem og tilbage til old square og stranden. Lækker pool. Alt var helt perfekt. Og specielt al personale var så godt.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Dear.hotel all members! i really appreciate for your kindness service. My family are fully satisfied this vacation with you. If we have one more time to visit hoian city, i will be with you again. I summerize brief reviews below. 1st. Service was very nice. 2nd. Room was very comfotable. 3rd. Breakfast was good. 4th. Price was very reasonable. 5th. Guide for hoian tour was very useful. 6th. Transportation was very convinient. Finally i got more happiness than i paid. Many thanks.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Shuttle bus to and from ancient old town not very frequent especially when guests usually like to spend the evening there.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: This is a very nice boutique style hotel set in landscaped vietnamese style gardens around a swimming pool - which actually would be better if larger. Rooms are spacious and clean and only criticism is that when having a shower the water temperature is not constant - cool to scalding in seconds

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Vi var en familie på 6 personer der boede på ancient house i 2 uger, vi nød hver eneste dag. Personalet var meget hjælpsomme og opmærksomme på vores behov. Rengøringen var helt i top. Fine værelser med frisk frugt og vand hver dag. Hyggelig have hvor man altid kan finde skygge. Fitness rummet er ikke up to date.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Very cozy resort style hotel. Beautiful garden. Friendly staff. Special thanks to on. She booked the train tickets to nhatrang. Free bicycles to use. Great breakfirst. Would book here again if i visit hoi-an again.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Very serene, garden like resort. Good staff attitude, breakfast. Only catch is the distance to night market which needs far walking exercise

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 유러피언 스타일의 리조트로 가족끼리 머물기엔 좋습니다. 다만 시설이 연식이 있어서인지 깔끔한 면은 그렇습니다..

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 今回 3回目の滞在でしたが 毎回スタッフの対応がとても良いです いつも笑顔で 色々気遣って頂き 素敵な時間が過ごせました 街からは少し離れていますが 隠れ家的でのんびり過ごすには最高です また利用したいと思います

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: This was a well situated hotel within walking or short taxi ride into the old town. Staff were great and very helpful with booking trips out.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Lovely hotel excellent staff so helpful. Clean room with all facilities. Breakfast was really good and had a good variety of choice. Free bikes to get around the place can even cycle to the beach or hop on the free shuttle bus. It s hard to get a sunbed round the pool that s in the sun! if you want a chill day or few hours. We were there a week and we never managed it but if not bothered about the sun then no problem. Wouldn t stop us staying here again though as we d just cycle to the beach ..a must experience.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Mooi boetiek hotel. Ruime familiekamers handig om met shuttlebus van hotel naar strand en naar old town te gaan.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Som en del af vores vietnam rejse havde vi fem overnatninger på dette lækre hotel. Familie på 5 fra danmark, vi fik family room, med tre store senge vi fint kunne være i. Selve hotellet er utroligt lækkert, flot indretning, høj kvalitet i rengøring, og god pool. Morgenmad var høj kvalitet, både vestlig og lokal. Service var (som alle steder i vietnam) virkeligt god, personalet var meget behjælpelige med alle forespørgsler, de arrangerede et par ture for os, og der kører desuden en shuttle fra hotellet både ind til hoi an old town (hvis man ikke vil gå de 30 min selv) og ud til stranden.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: 一階だったからかトイレの排水が悪い

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful resort setting with wonderful staff members and excellent service. My daughter and i felt welcomed and relaxed.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Room had a cockroach in it when we came in. The tables were super dusty and had water marks. It also looks like the shower head had quite a bit of black hair dangling from it. The toilet also makes a lot of noise for 10 minutes after you flush so that got really annoying at night. The toilet also isn t separated by a full door so order and any sounds travel throughout the room if you catch my drift. Also didn t have hot water to the room until we called on the 2nd night for some reason. Nothing that s awful but not really worth staying at in my opinion

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Beautiful hotel that is between old town and beach. Shuttle service to both and also swimming pool and generous breakfast. Staff make you feel very welcome.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: A bit old building. Very nice people working. Sheets seemed to be quite old. No shower curtain and no plug for the bath. Quite noisy during the night time. Cheap laundry service. Price was meeting the facilities.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Great staff make this lovely hotel a dream stay.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Lovely grounds, rooms are comfortable and to a good standard. Staff are friendly, helpful and informative.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: The room was very clean. I was also happy that rambutan was served at breakfast. It is far when we walk to old town, but does not have any problem if we inflect because bus leaves from hotel.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Absolutely beautiful place gorgeous staff and the location is excellent

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Atendimento excelente, funcionários muito gentis e prestativos.

hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & spa Hoi An Ancient House
userCmt: Amazing stay. Amazing staff!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We had a great time there and everyone was very friendly and helpful! location was great too, convenient to ancient town. We were able to walk everywhere!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Great boutique hotel! fantastic staff, good location and walkable location to all tourist sites.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 직원분들 매우 친절해 묵는 내내 감동 조식이 서양식이라는거 빼곤 정말 정말 좋았음

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: This hotel is in a great location. It takes only a few minutes stroll to be at the market. A 10 minute easy stroll gets you well into the old town. Our room was spacious with a comfy large bed. We had a small balcony with 2 chairs which was a nice place to sit in the evening. The bathroom was clean. It had a shower over the bath. There was also a fridge and safe in the room. The staff were friendly and always waved and said hello when we went in and out. The pool area is well kept. There were a few beds around the pool and some of them had a cushion. The pool went into the shade in the afternoon so it was very nice to sit out by the pool. The hotel also has a bar and restaurant although we didn t use this facility. Breakfast was a buffet and the options were excellent and also some of the options changed daily. There was an egg station, cereals, juices, bread, happy cow cheese, toast, ham, noodles and pho etc.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Do not stay here until renovations are completed. This was not disclosed before i booked.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Meet with a beautifully iced glass of vietnamese tea tina greeted us to her hotel. How wonderful to be in the hands of a gracious and experienced host. She pointed out the hotel facilities, ensured we were comfortable and knew our names in an instant. Would definitely stay there again

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Very special designed hotel. It has its local taste in its garden and in the hotel room. The hotel staff are very nice and helpful too.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Amazing stay, the staff was beyond amazing/helpful/nice. They really care about their guests. Breakfast was great, room clean and large, definitly a bargain. We were sad to leave but will always remember the friendly faces we met at this hotel!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We got a room right next to the swimming pool. It was so hot so it was good to have the pool as it was so hard to find a restaurant or shop with air con in the old town.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 호이안 구시가시에 가깝고 자전거 무료대여, 작지만 무료로 이용가능한 수영장이 있어 좋았습니다. 직원 친절도나 무료 아침 조식이 기대에 미치지 못했지만 대체로 만족스럽습니다.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Staff are very nice and friendly. Hotel cleanliness is okay. Overall good customer service.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 凄く綺麗なホテルでした 部屋も広くコスパもいいし ゆっくり過ごすにはすごくよかったです everything was good and cleen!! the staff were exellent and helpful.thank you for your hospitality!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Stay at corner of the road, 10 mins walk to the hoi an old street info centre. Room is clean but beds are stiff. Breakfast spread with local noodles was nice and delicious fruits. Friendly staffs.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We stayed for 3 days. The hotel location was good being only 5 min walk from the old town, but the room was cramped with too much furniture and the bathroom was smaller than expected. Room was clean though. Staff were helpful but (like many in hoi an) were trying to sell products they were clearly getting commissions on. When we had some clothing delivered from a tailor (not the one they recommended) they were clearly disappointed and a bit annoyed we didn t go with their recommendation. We borrowed bikes from the hotel to get around town, but unfortunately some had unfixable seats (couldn t adjust seat height), poor brakes and needed tires pumped, but they did pump the tires when asked and swapped bikes were weren t comfortable with. Overall an ok experience.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Hotel is within walking distance to the old town. Room is big, spacious, comfortable and clean. Breakfast is sumptuous.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: ) happy stay, solo travel in this very beautiful ancient town

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The hotel staff were outstanding and it was so nice to be greeted by your first name every morning! the hotel was comfortable and clean, with an old feel to the place. There was not much place to hang out in the room because the one bed was humongous! breakfast was amazing, especially the mango pancakes! the place very convenient to wverything was only a ten minute walk to the ancient town of hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Top staff. Nice breakfast

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Service was great and helpful, a bit outdated, huge rooms, bathroom old and towels small and almost seethrough. Room cleaning staff were the only sector to let down the sevice side. Value for money !

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: It s an ok hotel that is within walking distance to everything.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The hotel was great and staff were amazing. I highly recommend them if you are staying in hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The family room was missing of furniture (table for opening luggage, hooks, hangers)

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The staff were very nice and helpful. The morning of our flight the ha noi we left the hotel at 4 30. The staff had a breakfast ready for us to take to the airport. Really a nice place the only thing is the bed was a little hard but the rest of our stay made up for the bed. We will stay there again.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We thought it was great. It was quiet and had all the amenities

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Gare de bus pour danang à 15min à pied. Proximité de la vieille ville (5 minute à pied). Prêt de vélos gratuit. Petit déjeuner très copieux. Piscine un peu petite et coincée entre les murs mais l eau fraiche en février ne poussait pas à se baigner...

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 美其名是關心你的行程 但實際是推銷很多行程及接送給顧客 價錢不合理且服務態度不佳 這次利用該飯店叫接送到峴港的飯店 不僅收費較昂貴 事後得知 且司機素質低落 甚至到了目的地還另外開口向我們要錢 令人感受極差

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Veldig god velkomst, serviceinnstilt. God lokasjon, nærhet til alt (utenom stranda). Ville bodd her igjen.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 施設内の清掃はなされており特に不快感は無い 旧市街には歩いて10分程度で 町歩きに丁度良い距離 朝食の品数は少ないが卵は焼いてくれる 価格と利便性を考えれば全てが納得できるレベルである

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 전체적으로괸찮았다 관광지와 적당한거리 조용한 지역에 위치해있어서 좋았다 하지만 101호였던가 그숙소는 화장실 물이 안내려가좀 고생했다 또한 신발이 모든 짝이 짝짝이라 바꿔달라고 요구하였으나 없다구함. 그러나 그외의것들은 좋았다.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Lovely hotel with character and wonderful, helpful staff. Excellent location for entering the markets - a very short walk - shopping area and old town. Great breakfast and pool. My second stay at this hotel and will come again.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Nice hotel, clean rooms, friendly staff, good breakfast. The only negative is that on top of the door there is a window allowing the light from the hallway to come into the room, which is very annoying if you like to sleep in a complete dark room

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: エアコンの音がうるさかった

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: พน กงานให ความช วยเหล อด ห องพ กกว าง ม ความสะดวกพอควร สามารถเด นไปท เท ยวได ไม ไกลน ก บร เวณรอบๆโรงแรมม ร านอาหารร มทางให เล อกมากมาย

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Excelente atención del personal. Agradable hotel. Buena relación calidad/precio.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We stayed there 4 nights and we found the staff to be really friendly and helpful. Our room was definitely good size, bed was decent and bathroom too, only thing hot water would run out quickly sometimes. Their breakfast was good and had many options. Our room was on 4th floor and there s no elevator, but we weren t too bothered by that. Decent hotel and great staff near hoi an old town, 10 minute walk more or less.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Good location helpful staff clean good breakfast

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Très content! on nous a changé de chambre parce que la première n avait pas de fenètres. Gens sympas qui nous ont faits des réservations. Recommandable

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: A bit more detail to cleaning and maintenace would be good.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Hotel à proximité du centre ville. Chambre confortable et beau buffet de petits déjeuners

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Very good but the lobby smelled of moth balls. Also, the light from the hallway shone through the window in the door all night. Nice and central. Beautiful room with small balcony

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Excellent hôtel très bien placé pour visiter hoi an. Vélos à disposition gratuitement. Petit-déjeuner superbe sous forme de buffet. Personnel charmant attentionné. Super.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: A lovely warm welcome from anna, who gave me good local advice on shopping facilities in and outside of the hotel. The hotel has a wonderful atmosphere, and is architecturally pleasing. My room had french doors with wooden shutters which kept it cool during the day, without need for air conditioning. My room had a balcony, but those without have windows overlooking the lovely pool, which looks stunning at night. Breakfast was wide and varied, with plenty of fresh fruit and produce. Turning right out of the hotel, then first left brings you directly to the myriad of streets for shopping, eating, massage and to the old town. I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel, for its character and proximity to everything hoi an has to offer. I will definitely stay here again on my next visit to hoi an!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: さすが世界遺産の街だけあってとても素晴らしいです特に夕暮れから夜にかけては超最高

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Had a fab time at this hotel. The room was very nice, spacious and very clean. The staff was one of the best i have ever encountered. The front desk girl julie was one of the best ever, i highly recommended this hotel

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Value for the money paid. Staff were helpful.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 日本語を話せるスタッフの方がいってくれて助かりました

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Vi was here 2 nights and came in after a day of touring. Welcome smiles met me. The staff took me through major town details and organised everything i needed. Manager was amazing...... The room was comfortable - large bed, hotwater, tv, fridge and aircon. Breaky provided. Bakery and coffee shops nearby. Good courtyard to watch the world go by with friends. Early checkout, airport shuttle and early breakfast were all catered for. Great few days. See you all again.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: This hotel has nothing of a boutique hotel! we stayed in several boutique hotels. Very disappointed

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Vi var der kun 1 nat, men værelset var ok standard. Receptionens personale snakkede godt engelsk og var servicemindede.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 酒店質素普通 房間廁所大 但熱水不夠熱 早餐種類不多 正常的 都是麵包 但離古城比較遠

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: A bit stink in shower.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: A great experoence! the crew was amazing!!! always smiling and caring! whatever we needed we got! thanks a lot!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Hôtel très accueillant et très propre dans un quartier calme mais proche de la vieille ville de hoi an

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Had a pleasant stay. Place was located some 10mins walk to old town which is about 20mins walk to japanese covered bridge.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 매우 친절한 직원들, 수영장, 아기자기 맛나는 조식. 여행의 시작을 이곳에서 할 수 있어서 매우 행복했다. 다시 찾을만큼 작지만 알찬 호텔임이 분명하다. 어린아이들에게 한없이 밝은 웃음을 건내주고 다른 숙소로 이동할 때 많은 도움을 준 직원들을 잊지못할 것이다. 역시 여행은 사람이다.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Good location. Breakfast is good. The first floor is very noise.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Good location. The breakfast is good. The first floor is very noisy.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Friendly staff easy walking to get to old town very good breakfast amazing aussie burger on menu good quiet location clean pool

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Frienldly staff easy walk to old town clean pool very good breakfast very good aussie hamburger

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: This is not a 4 star hotel

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The staff were fantastic and the location perfect for getting to experience hoi an. The room was comfortable and the property offers great value for money, the staff really tried to make our break a fantastic holiday, thanks

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 外から見た外見が綺麗だったため期待したが 中の設備が古くトイレのドアは鍵をかけないと勝手に開いたり窓は鍵を掛けても簡単に開いたり 様々な問題を感じた また 部屋の中にはゴミ箱が無くトイレに備え付けのゴミ箱を使うほかなかった 部屋に通された際の説明がお粗末で金庫やクリーニングに関してこちらから聞かないと何も説明が無かった 二階の部屋に滞在したが 部屋の防音は皆無で一階や他の部屋のテレビの音や話し声が丸聞こえだった また 朝部屋に客がいるにも関わらず部屋の外でタイルの清掃 で数時間騒音が続きゆっくりできなかった 不満な点を上げるとキリがないが 最低以下の設備とただ単に寝るだけの場所が欲しいという人には適切ではないかと感じた

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Personnel accueillant et toujours prêt à vous aidez, sur place un service pour acheter des tours touristiques.chambre propre et de bonne dimension. Déjeuner buffet avec une bonne variété. L emplacement, nous nous sommes déplacer à pied durant notre séjour sans problème si vous aimez la marche mais aussi facile de trouver des bicyclettes ou scooters

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 밤비행기로 도착시 하루묵기에는 적당한듯 싼맛에 괜찬음 엘레베이터가없음 짐들어주는사람이 짐옮겨주긴하는데 짐이많으면 본인도 들고올라가야됨 높은층이고 짐도많으면 꽤 힘듬

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: This hotel recently reopened 2 months ago after renovations from what was advised to us from locals. The staff are really nice and friendly. Location is pretty convenient with a slight walk to central market and old town. I would highly recommend this hotel and it is priced really well.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Otroligt litet mysigt hotell strax utanför gamla stan. Extremt trevlig personal och väldigt tillmötesgående, smidigt med kontakt via whatsapp under vistelsen och hjälpte till med resa till flygplatsen och lokala tips. Kommer definitivt bo här igen om vi kommer tillbaka!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 朝食のレパートリーが少なくて 残念でした

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Staff was very friendly and the hotel was very close to restaurants and boutiques

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The host helen who runs the front desk and takes care of things is awesome - super nice, friendly, knowledgeable and always a smile. Nice location pretty close to downtown and easy connection to the beach. Pool is private, decent sized and like every other pool in vietnam at this time it is warm water. Our room faced the street but was still quiet with good windows.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Khách sạn ok, vị trí gần trung tâm, phòng tương đối. Tuy nhiên nhân viên lễ tân rất thô lỗ, khiếm nhã,.. Với khách. Nhất là cô lễ tân hellen, dù biết khách đã có vợ nhưng vẫn cố tình lấy thông tin liên lạc và nhắn tin lẳng lơ, làm phiền khách. Thật chẳng ra làm sao!!!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Excellent séjour avec un personnel compétent et très agreable comme kidd le receptionniste. Le petit dejeuner était tres bon et avec beaucoup de choix. Nous reviendrons dans cet hôtel

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Friendly staff but property need upgrade. Tv channels were poor in quality. Internet speed was good. No lift. Nice location that is close to restaurants and water.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 設備は古いが部屋は綺麗にされている スタッフは皆若く笑顔で接客してくれます 朝食もそこそこ種類があり満足でした 旧市街にも近く便利でした

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: En general todo muy bien. El desayuno muy bueno. El staff muy servicial. Te ayudan con todos los tours o arriendo de bicicleta o moto. Lo único no tan bueno, al menos de la habitación que nos dieron a nosotros (208), es que hay mucho ruido en las mañanas (suenan teléfonos, portazos, gritos de la gente que hace aseo, hasta un gallo nos cantaba en el oído!).

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: This is a colonial mansion turned to hotel, with huge stairways and alleys between rooms the dining room is also huge. We just love the classic look of the building. It is within walking distance to old hoa an and its many attractions (un heritage sites, silk factory, river shore walkway), shops and local markets. Breakfast buffet has a good variety of western and vietnamese food, we were there for 5 days and still enjoyed the menu. Our room booked through expedia is large, comfortable and clean. It has a patio door opened to a small balcony, overlooking the alley along the hotel we could see or hear the heavy rain pattering the glass, a nostalgic memory of rainy season in central vietnam. We already mark this place in our future visit to hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 수영장보고 결정. 알보고니 수영장은 공사중 . 결국 옆건물 수영장이용. 방 컨디션 별로. 욕실 컨디션도 별로. 벨보이가 케리어운반해주는 서비스만 좋았음 .그리도 외관만 이쁨 인스타용

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Something about this hotel connected me to memories of a place where i used to have a youth summer camp in portugal. I guess pretty ok for a 3-star hotel. ) i like the little balconies, the quietude... It s not too far from the main tourist spots...

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 4th floor hotel without elevator, it was ok. As the hotel has spacious room, it relieved my nerve.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: 저렴하게 숙박하기에는 괜찮지만, 개미와 바퀴벌레가 호텔 객실에 돌아다니네요. 방역에 신경을 좀 써야 할거 같네요.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Staff went out of their way to help. Cannot fault them at all. Breakfast omelette cooked especially for you.. Fab for the money

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Great hotel but most buildings in hoi ann affected by rising dampness.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Hôtel et piscine très propres rien à redire. Le petit dejeuner sous forme de buffet est varié fruits frais, viennoiseries, omelettes sur demande. L hôtel est bien situé (nous avons loué des vélos) petits bémols peu de capacité de rangements (nous étions 4 pour un voyage de 4 semaines) et de séchage (maillots de bain, serviettes). Le balcon était ridiculement petit

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Great hospitality!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Le personnel est très aidant. Nous sommes à notre troisième réservation à cet hôtel. Mais je dois dire que cet hôtel a besoin de rafraîchissement. Un peu de peinture. Cet hôtel est très bien situé. Nous l aimons bien

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Meget venligt og kompetent personale. Jeg skal helt sikkert bo der igen!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: ルームクリーニングやその他のスタッフが大声で話しながら じゃれあいながら 仕事をしているので ホテル内がうるさいのが気になりました 設備には問題がなく 自転車も借りられるのは助かりますが 静かな環境を求める人には厳しいです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We had a great stay at the hai au hotel. The service was excellent, the room comfortable with a huge bed and the breakfast tasty and plentiful. Although the hotel isn t in the centre of hoi an, it s still in a good location. It took us about 15 minutes to walk in. We ended up staying an extra night. As our original room wasn t available, we were upgraded into an even better room with a beautifully decorated bathroom! all in all, the hai au was excellent value for money a hotel experience at a hostel price!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Though it was rainy most of our stay, hotel staff were very helpful to the needs of their guests.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: The hotel itself is newly renovated and rooms were clean. Ac in the shut off when leaving room which was not the ideal but understandable. No ac in hotel lobby or breakfast area. No elevators but staff were happy to carry our bags. They did our laundry for 30k per kilo but mixed up the bag labels so my stuff was labeled under a different room so just be cautious. They have free bicycles but i didn t rent so i don t know about the quality. I rented scooters from the lady down the adjacent alley who also hase laundry services. The hotel is about a 15 minute walk to ancient town. My family was very dissatisfied with the breakfast quality and service. On both days i stayed the staff was never ready for the 6 30 breakfast start time. When i came down to the lobby at 6 20 i saw the staff sleeping in the lobby in their pajamas. They had about 30 of breakfast ready by 6 45, bread, stale pastries, hard boiled eggs, fruit, etc. Very frustrating when you try to plan your day around an early start or if you have a shuttle driver waiting which we did. No apology from staff and it seemed normal. To me it seems like a pretty pathetic or lazy attempt for a place that calls themselves a boutique . Good thing there is fantastic banh mi close by at banh mi phuong.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Good value. Room was comfortable and hotel in good location. Walking distance to everything. Staff was very friendly. Definitely not luxury but definitely comfortable and great price.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We stayed here as one of our stops on our honeymoon. We were welcomed by tina on arrival. Unlike other accommodations we stayed at there was no pressure sales tactic to sign us up to tours etc... The team asked us what we wanted to do in hoi an and made suggestions of tours and retailers we might try, but didn t press us to make a decision.... I might add all their recommendations were spot on and authentic - especially the cooking class we signed up for. The hotel itself is well located, just a 10 to 15min walk to old town. The hotel is clean, has good wifi, has yummy breakfast options - local and european food choices. Also, they have free bicycles for guest use - we rode out to the beach one morning (about 6km away). All the staff are so friendly, they had a big christmas celebration when we where there and guests could pose with staff and a local santa. The hotel also gave us a complimentary cake to celebrate our honeymoon... A very nice touch. Thanks to tina and the team for a lovely stay. Looking forward to coming back in the future to stay!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Amazing staff, super friendly, free bikes on standby, great breakfast buffet. In short best place we stayed at on our 5 week trip.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Little room but has everything you need. Clean room and very friendly professional staff. I would recommend this hotel to everyone who wants to stay in hoi an

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Lovely staff, amazing pho and fresh squeezed orange juice in the morning. We enjoyed the pool and how close this hotel was to everything. Our room was a little smelly from the bathroom, so hoping this gets worked out because everything else was wonderful about our stay.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Nicely located and very friendly staff.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: We didn t have a good stay here , rooms very not sound proof so you could hear noise from next buildings and other guests. The only good thing about hotel is it s location and breakfast .

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Overall is good . Not too expensive.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Lovely

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: L hôtel a besoin un peu de rafraîchissement,d amour. Mais le personnel est aidant et sympathique

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Hai Au Boutique
userCmt: Nice small hotel, close to everything.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Hotel location is very close to sightseen place and night market. The most important thing that impressed me is their excellent service. Lobby manager (forgot the name, a mr.) truely put his passion into work, kindly to every guest.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Really enjoyed my stay here. The rooms were very clean and comfortable with hood amenities. The pool area was also very nice. It had comfortable seats, a pool bar with a good happy hour, and an overall very comfortable vibrant atmosphere. Th breakfast each day was also delicious and complimentary. The staff here was also fantastic. They were very helpful with suggestions, your setups, and transportation. They had our flight information so when our flight was delayed 2 hours to land at 2am, their front desk person stayed late to check us in and get us settled. It was also very easy to walk to old town, but far enough away that it was still convenient for car pick ups and quiet at night.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 旧市街地に歩いて移動可能な距離 又はレンタル自転車がホテルにあるので便利です 朝食も美味しかったです 又宿泊します ありがとうございました

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: This hotel is 3 stars at best. Towels were frayed, no hair conditioning provided, the hand soap smell was horrible, the hand held showerhead holder can t even hold it up. The room s noise insulation was basically non-existent. They also provided 1 key only for 2 people room and we had a chased them multiple times for the second key.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Perfect location, far enough from the hustle and bustle of the old town but only 5 minutes walk along the river. Staff were wonderful, friendly, obliging and willing to help whenever needed. I would definitely return to this hotel.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Very good location ! all staffs very friendly and nice ! highly recommended when you travel to hoi an . We definitely come back when ext time we travel to hoi an again

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Very nice hotel

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Very helpful and excellent customer services from staff team. Clean room

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We had an excellent 3 nights here in april/may, during a long humid heatwave. The staff were very attentive, friendly but not pushy. The pool was always welcoming and had space for us, as well as being pretty serene. Service was always with a smile and prompt. We had one gripe about the ac but that was taken on board and dealt with happily, what more can you ask! would stay again for sure

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Good location, service and clean facilities. Very convenient and comfortable

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Gd service

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: リバービューデラックスルームに宿泊しました 部屋は特に広くはありませんが快適でした お風呂のお湯も豊富に出て問題はありません 朝食メニューは多く味も良かったです ホテルのスタッフは親切で丁寧な対応していただきました 旧市街までは徒歩5分程度で川沿いの道を歩いていけるので 父が感じませんでした 高校からはホテルの送迎を依頼しましたが 20ドル3800円と適切な料金でした grabでチャーターすると おそらく2000円台だと思います

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: So friendly and polite and happy from check in to check out nice pool area and location . Couldn t really fault it ! great interconnecting rooms river view and a location suitable for anyone s needs in hoi an

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 川沿いに立つ観光に便利な場所でした 人混みの激しいところから少し離れて 落ち着いた雰囲気がいいです 朝の散歩は気持ちよかったです せっかくなら連泊したかったくらい 1人で利用しましたがスタッフのみなさんがとても親切で 言葉が通じなくても温かい接客をしてくださいました ありがとうございました

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Good place to stay.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Near the night market. Nice location. Super friendly staff . Ann is a perfect manager . Very sincere and patient

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: シャワーの温度水の出よくない 上の階のトイレの水 シャワーの音うるさい 全体的にいいホテルです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The room i checked in wasn t too pleasant, it was next to reception and noisiest traffic, but i must say all the staffs are lovely and helpful, maybe we would feel much happier if my room wasn t too noisy

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Lovely spa and very friendly staff.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We stayed for two nights at the laluna hỏi a river side hotel. The location is perfect near the town center and makes it easy for walking around the night market and old town. The staff are great very helpful and willing to offer service. The breakfast had a great selection of vietnamese specialties and was very enjoyable. I would not hesitate to return to this property when visiting hoi an!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: I really enjoyed my stay at laluna. The room was spacious with balcony, private bathroom/shower, cupboards, coffee/tea and plenty of charging points. The breakfast had excellent range, as a vegetarian it was so good to have several stir fry options/salads, the croissants were good as well as omelette station. The staff were great starting with the porter, reception - very helpful, and kitchen great too. The hotel is 5 min walk to all the action but on a quiet street along the river.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: スタッフが いつも笑顔で親切でした 朝食も美味しくて満足 楽しい旅を ありがとうございます

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Hôtel très bien situé tout est à proximité à pied très bon accueil et très bon petit déjeuner décoration typique

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Very convenient to visit old town.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 旧市街へも徒歩ですぐ 夜も静かで快適に過ごせました ホテルのスタッフも親切でした

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Lovely hotel, small and close to hoi an old town

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: No aircondotioning in our room and was not the room standard that we paid for.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The staff were 10/10 from the moment we arrived. The rooms were great and very clean. Location was perfect with a short walk to everything you need.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The staff were incredibly attentive. The room was clean and lovely. The hotel is perfectly situated. The area is lovely. What a lovely place to stay.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The breakfast and housekeeping are poor. Staff are friendly

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Staff , services, breakfast is very excellent. I am recommend to back next time.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Staff is not kind. But room condition is awsome and winderful

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: リバービューの部屋を予約しました 案内された部屋が 1階のレセプションの隣 ホテルの入口から丸見えの部屋でした 最初に 20で上の階にアップグレードできますと言われたけど 空いてるなら最初からそこにしてくれればいいのに と少し思いました 受付にかかってくる電話が丸聞こえ 耳栓して寝ました せっかくのリバービューなのに ホテルに来る人から丸見えなので カーテンは閉めっぱなしでした ロケーションは少しだけ旧市街から離れてますが まわりは静かで落ち着いていました 朝食は 種類も多くてよかったと思います

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: やや町外れに位置するおかげで静か でも観光地やレストランは徒歩圏内なので問題なし 設備的には問題なし 朝食の内容はもうひと頑張りといったところだが 価格には見合っている フロントでは車の手配など 英語で簡単にこなしてくれた

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Excelente ubicacion, muy buen buffet desayuno. Muy buen personal todo excelente

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Location is closed to the hoi an night market and room is clean with comfortable bed.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The hotel is comfortable, however, the spa needs a little improvement on technique

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Overall good experience with the hotel staff. The room is comfortable n clean. Buffet breadfast spread is just adequate. The only thing we are not happy with the room is toilet door is very difficult to close.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 바로 앞이 야시장이여서 정말 좋았습니다. 올드타운, 야시장 구경 후 5분안에 올 수 있어 정말 좋았어요 조식도 맛있었습니다. 하루에 두번 안방비치가는 셔틀버스가 있어서 이 서비스도 정말 좋았어요! 생각보다 방이 넓지 않아요 사진보다 훨 좁습니다.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Great hotel right walking distance from the old quarter

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: I had an amazing experience in laluna hotel. This hotel was close to everything that hoi an had to offer and was so easy to book local tours to da nang. The luxury room was worth every penny and to be honest we never wanted to leave it. The staff was more then amazing. The house keeping giving us a good night message was the cutest thing ever. If i go back to hoi an there is no doubt i would book this hotel again. Everyone had the biggest smiles on their faces and even though it was raining most of the time the staff made the sunshine in the hotel. I can not thank laluna hotel enough. Top top quality from this beautiful hotel.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Staff were very friendly, especially kim at the service desk who made our stay much more enjoyable.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 深夜着いたのにも関わらず 受け付けの方が丁寧に笑顔で迎えてくれました その後 市街で観光中にその方と偶然出会い パンドミーの有名店をわかりやすく教えて頂きました また行きたいホテルです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 旧市街から少し離れた川沿いのブティックホテルで 静かで落ち着いた雰囲気 エクストラベッドを入れてもらって家族３人で滞在しましたが 部屋は少し狭い物の清潔で 雨の多いこの時期に部屋に傘が置いてあった バスルームも清潔だったし スタッフはとても親切 朝食も特別と言うことは無いがおいしく 価格を考えると非常にお勧めのホテルです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 정말 위치적으로는 최적의 장소 같아요. 야시장이나 올드타운 가기도 좋고, 안방비치까지도 셔틀이 운영되기 떄문에 어디든 가기 편리한 곳이에요. 다만, 가족끼리 묵기엔 불편할 수 있습니다. 부모님 모시고 같이 간 곳이었는데 패밀리 룸으로 따로 있는 곳이 아니라 중간 방 문을 오픈하여 두가지방을 사용하게 되어 있습니다. 또, 강가 앞이다 보니까 물비린내가 방과 복도까지 지배하는 경향이... 리뷰에 나와있던 벌레등은 나오지 않았지만 약간의 아쉬움이 남는 숙소입니다. 그래도 친구들끼리 가서 즐기기엔 테라스도 있고 좋은 곳 같습니다!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Todo perfecto, habitación amplia, cama comodisima, a dos minutos del casco antiguo. Ubicación perfecta que te permite desconectar del bullicio.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 올드타운과 거리도 가깝고 우선 직원분들이 매우 친절했습니다.어려움이 있었는데, 친절함덕에 잘 해결이 되었습니다. 호텔내의 슈퍼 바이저분도 프론트 모든 직원분들이 친절했습니다. 베트남의 느낌이 물씬 나는 호텔입니다

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 立地重視で選びましたが 総合的にとても快適に過ごせました 外観は豪華ではありませんが 内装やサービスはクオリティが高かったです ダナン空港とホテルの送迎(有料)や郊外の契約ビーチでのオプション(無料) 現地ツアーの申し込み ホテルスパの利用など 宿泊以外にも色々お世話になりました 日本語は通じませんが 英語は問題なく通じます 朝食も数は多くはありませんが 十分楽しめました ホイアン滞在にはオススメのホテルです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Great location that was near to night market and lantern boat ride. Many shops nearby and eating options. Booked a room with balcony but disappointed to get the first floor and hence was not much use. Breakfast spread was limited. Staff were friendly and very helpful, which was the highlight of the stay.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We had a good stay in the hotel. The location is perfect as it is less than 2 minute walk from the old city/night market. Breakfast was good but i was disappointed with the filter coffee and tea for a 4 star hotel you would expect better quality especially because vietnam ks famous for their coffee. If you want fresh coffee you had to pay which is crazy. The room was beautiful we had the suite as we had 2 kids so the space was great. The free shuttle to the beach waa great to have and a nice way to spend the day. Kim at reception was very helpful. All the staff was super friendly especially with the kids the pool was great, small but fine for the location. Overall i would stay again. We had a great time

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 房間整潔 員工熱情有禮 位置很近會安古城 他們有機場和峴港市中心接送 如果人多可以考慮一下 價錢很合理

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: ホイアンは徒歩が中心となるので 立地の良さがポイント すべてにおいてコストパフォーマンスは非常に高かった

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 이쁘고 아늑한 호텔이었어요. 수영장은 작지만 너무이쁘고 아늑하고 풀바 직원들도 친절하고 호이안 위치상도 좋았어요

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: まず空港に着いて急に迎えに来てほしいとメールしたらすぐ来てくれて スタッフの方がとーーーーーっても優しいです 部屋も綺麗でした 朝食ビュッフェもついていて満足です 観光するところから近いのでおススメです とにかくスタッフの方が優しい印象です

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Good location, great service. The only very disappointed is we booked with the balcony and we had a great wall with the balcony, a false advertising

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 非常に素晴らしいホテルでした スタッフの対応 施設も最高でした ナイトマーケットからも近いので非常にオススメです

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The bedroom was beautifully decorated and the staff were amazing! they have a good spa, a really nice pool, timely laundry service and a good restaurant. The bathroom could have been slightly cleaner in parts (tiny bits of mould) but that s the only minor fault i could find.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Conveniently located near the old town, within 5 mins walk. Ride from airport (arranged separately with hotel) was nice and the staff waited patiently for us due to flight delay. Helpful reception when we asked for location of money exchange store. Buffett breakfast good enough. Room comfortable and mostly clean (although some ants on the desk). Shower place fairly good (although water a bit easily flow outside). Cool enough air-con. Overall a great hotel, recommended for stay in hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: I spent 2 nights at the laluna hoteli in the first week of september. Location very good, facing the river and just a few minutes away from the gates of the old town service was ok, receptionist very professional and fluent in english. The service at the restaurant was below the level of what i ve experienced in other cities. Ccondition at the hotel was really noisy, absolutely poorly isolated, so you could here anything going on outside in the street or in the hallway of the hotel, even when people don t speak loud. Then on the last day the hotel started renovations of all the empty rooms at 7h00 in the morning extremely loud renovation works started in the next room. After discussing with the hotel manager, they offered to pay the taxi to the airport. And another small thing i didnt like the plan of the room the toilet s room were not closing properly and attached to the bed.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Location was good, walking distance to the ancient town. Love the hotel room and the staff were very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was not too bad and we love the combo lunch set served at the cafe!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We booked 2 rooms with balcony facing the river for 1 night, the location is great, walking distance to the ancient town and night market. Rooms are spacious, everything in good condition. We have body massage and facial in the hotel which also made us satisfied.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Location is great. A short walk to old town area. Room is clean. Public area, including restaurant and swimming pool are very clean. Staff are nice and polite with great service mind. They really have mind to service. Breakfast is very good, delicious and plenty. Spa is also good, clean and reasonable price. Staff is nice and polite.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We stayed 3 nights at laluna riverside. It has been an absolute pleasure. The staff has been very friendly and helpful. The hotel is very well located a few 100 meters from the old town center. It means you get rid of all the noise from the tourists. The hotel has a small but very clean swimming pool. The breakfast has been absolutely excellent and varied. Very delicious. The room was large and clean and had a balcony overlooking the river. The hotel has wifi but it is very slow. The hotel s neighbor has a small market where you can buy most necessities and rent a scooter at an absolutely fair price. The hotel also offers airport transfers at a good price. We can only highly recommend this hotel if you are going to spend the night in hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Really conveniently located and in quiet section of old town

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Gorgeous little hotel, close to the main streets but still slightly away in a quiet spot on the river. Great staff, good breakfast and could not fault the rooms.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: お部屋 朝食 スパとコスパは良いと思います 旧市街まであるいて10分ぐらいなので 一日に何回か荷物を持って帰って来れます スパのスタッフも親切で丁寧にマッサージしていただきました 次回もまた宿泊したいと思います

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Excelente instalaciones, lindas y limpias habitaciones, sobre todo, excelente personal, cordialidad y atención

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Laluna hotel in hoi an is an absolute gem! it s so pretty, literally minutes from the old town and its beautiful streets. Breakfast is delicious and the staff will do anything to make your stay very special! nancy and thao are just amazing! we will definitely be back!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Great place within walking distance to central location, not enough light in the room to apply make up.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: O hotel é incrível. Fica bem perto da old village sem a barulheira das buzinas ! time de staff é espetacular! quartos, camas, chuveiros, cafés são excelente ! ficamos em um quarto muito confortável com vista para o rio e um varanda .

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: We had a wonderful experience at laluna. The staff welcomed us from the moment we arrived and made us feel like family. Nothing was too much trouble for us and our two little ones. Breakfast was delicious and varied and the facilitiea and location were fantastic. One of if not the best hotel we have stayed at.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The room was lovely spacious, great bathroom, good sized balcony overlooking the pool. Very good condition. Location is perfect for hoi an, just a few minutes walk outside of the loud, busy centre. Breakfast was delicious and very varied.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: What i always look for in a stay is the locality of the place - how to tell that i am in this city and not the other. I find that in la luna - from the exterior design, the interior decor and the breakfast choices. The staff werw super gentle and helpful, they gave a lot of good advices around the town and arranged show tickets as well as transportation. This will be my go-to hotel in hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Was amazing! all staff more than i m felt like a home!!! excellent all, just recommend to get new mattress to be perfect!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Everything! from the super convenient location, only few minutes walking to the old town to the exceptional breakfast that offer a lot of options including local dishes. Pool bar is beautiful with good cocktails drink. The bed is super comfortable and the room is spacious. All staff are attentive and helpful. Overall, amazing service and well equipment facilities. Highly recommend!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The hotel is 5 mins walking to the japanese bridge. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Breakfast is diverse and delicious. Rooms are spacious and clean. Highly recommend the pool bar where you can swim and have very nice cocktails!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Very good staff in general. Good english skills. The rooms were good size. The shower heads need to be refurbished as these spray water everywhere. The breakfast was generally good. The beds were comfortable but the bed frame was quite noisy and creaked with every move. Only one building has an elevator, the other two do not. The ac units have an incredibly bright light on them but housekeeping covered it with tape. The location is excellent, just a short walk from the old town. The staff try hard to please. The pool looked nice but it was rainy and a little cool so we didn t use it. Given the price, i would likely stay there again.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Excellent services. The room is nice and clean.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 3階建てのこぢんまりとしたホテルですが 静かで掃除も行き届き シャワー湯量も豊富で使いやすい素敵な部屋でした 朝食も種類がまずまず豊富で どれも美味しかったし 素敵なレストラン静かに食べられます ダナンと違い欧米の方が多かった印象です ナイトマーケットも近くて 次回ホイアンに行く時はリピートします

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Stayed 2 nights in the deluxe double room with pool view pool. Room is smaller than expected but the service rendered by the staff was excellent! staffs are always full of smiles and very polite! after realizing that i ve left my clothing in the wardrobe after i ve checked out and left the hotel, i called the hotel immediately and they arranged my stuff to be delivered to my new hotel in da nang that very same night. It s a 45mins drive from laluna to the downtown hotel in da nang and they did it for free! special thanks to the staff at laluna and ms nancy! you guys are awesome! hoi an night market and ancient town is within walking distance and nearest atm is just located 3 mins walk away from the hotel. Remember to bring along insect repellent! you will need it when you are in da nang. Highly recommend to stay in this hotel!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 직원들이 너 무 친절해요 ㅎㅎ 숙소자체가 오래된 건물이라 낡은건 감안하세요 침구나 화장실 깨끗하게 관리만 되면 상관없는 스타일이라 만족했습니다 인포 직원도, 벨보이 아저씨도 넘 귀엽고 상냥했어요

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: L albergo, molto vicino al centro, facilmente raggiungibile a piedi, è una struttura un po datata, con camere tradizionali, ma con uno staff molto gentile, effettua servizio di noleggio bici gratuito e servizio portineria sempre disponibile. La colazione è prettamente di cucina asiatica e intercontinentale ma non manca anche qualcosa di dolce tipo yogurt, cereali e piccoli croissant. La stanza, pulita, al primo piano con balcone, presentava la vista un po oscurata dagli alberi ma comunque carina. A disposizione prodotti come shampoo, bagnoschiuma, e accessori per la toilette erano in dotazione. Il frigobar non funzionava molto ma non ne abbiamo avuto bisogno. L aria condizionata invece, molto utile per le giornate afose, ci è stata di grande aiuto, soprattutto per rinfrescare durante la notte e togliere l umidità delle giornate calde che abbiamo incontrato. La piscina non l ho utilizzata ma comunque carina, con lettini e telo mare a disposizione degli ospiti. Nel complesso è un buon albergo.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Toilet water was gushing that left the floor wet. Almost fell with my baby in hand. Not recommended for families with young children unless hotel do more to prevent slips

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Nice hotel in a great location, but there were way too many mosquitoes to be comfortable

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Great quality and service.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 가격도 괜찮고 직원들 친절해요! 올드타운에서 5분거리인데 또 중심부에서 조금 떨어져있어서 조용해요! 조식 망고스무디 맛있습니당 ) )

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 조용하고 올드타운이 가까운 점이 좋았어요. 저녁에는 주변에 야시장이 열려요. 수영장이 한적해서 좋았어요.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: スタッフが親切で 色々なことを教えてくれる また朝食会場にもマネージャーらしき人が挨拶に来てくれた

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: El hotel no ofrece nada destacable. Es aceptable en general pero el precio comparado con lo que se recibe es caro. No volveríamos a hospedarnos aquí.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Trevligt hotell nära gamla stan i hoi an. Hotellet hjälper till med utflykter, shoppingtips mm

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Absolutely loved our stay would recommend it just away from the busy street but in perfect walking distance great spa really lovely staff extremely helpful i got us a riverside view we was on the ground floor but it didn t make much difference as it wasn t very noisy at night and there was not much of a river i got us a river side of you we was on the ground floor but it didn t make much difference as it wasn t very noisy at night and there was not much of a river. The pool is extremely small great for kids but not as big for adults breakfast was okay coffee was terrible!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The property was excellent,everthing about it,the staff the food the location.the staff made our stay brilliant so a big shout out to the lovely reception girls lyn and hanah they would go out their way to help you,also to the restaurant girls helen and lily thanks for making our stay the best

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 硬體還行 但服務不像四星旅店 曾致電櫃臺預約spa及餐廳 兩次櫃臺都忘記回電 還要我自己打去確認 櫃臺因防疫都戴口罩 早餐服務生和廚師反而沒戴 這不是本末倒置嗎

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 服務員很親切, 能盡量達成住客的要求

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: River view wasn t really a good view with a tree blocking. Hotel is clean but could do a refresh with the metalware showing wear and tear and dusty furniture. Could do with better sound proofing as well since we could hear the sounds from the room above very clearly. Breakfast was decent but restaurant closed pretty early (maybe since tourism just re-started). Service was great - staff helped with booking of transport and any queries we had, and security guard was always looking out for us.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: I could not recommend the laluna hotel and spa highly enough. The staff were exceptional (special thanks to nam) who looked after all our needs and bookings with a smile every day. The hotel is perfectly situated just a 5 minute walk to the centre of the old historic town and overlooking the riverfront. The rooms are clean and immaculate. This was our 5th stay in hoi an and easily the best value hotel we have stayed at.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: The staff is making everything to help customers

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: Dos melhores hoteis que já me hospedei, em sua categoria. Perfeito em tudo. Do conforto ao atendimento. Do início ao fim. Eles te dão até um souvenir de despedida.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: First i got a ground floor -- noisy after complaining i got better room breakfast average rating not 4 star hotel more to 3 star

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Laluna Hội An Riverside
userCmt: 夫婦2人 子供2人で利用しました ホイアン旧市街まで徒歩で行ける距離なので 灯籠流しや夜ご飯を食べた後も子供達と歩いて移動できたので便利でした 騒音も少なく静かで良かったです ホテル内も綺麗にしてあり スタッフもとてもフレンドリーで おすすめの店を教えてくれたり ツアーの手配もしてくれたので とても良かったです またホイアンに行く時には利用したいと思います

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Excellent

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Convenient location, friendly staff and good food!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: My partner and i stayed for two nights and have both agreed it was the nicest, most accommodating hotel we ve been in so far. It felt safe, relaxed and all round a nice place to be. From the cooking and waiter staff, the reception desk and the spa ladies! we would happily come back again!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Rooms are big, and the staff are very nice and friendly. Walking distance to shops and restaurants.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: What i like the most was the honesty and clear instructions with very helpful and willingness to help right away. The room was extremely clean with daily service . The breakfast was always fresh and plenty of choices available. The staff in general were all there to help us in any situation that they are able .

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: We thoroughly enjoyed our experience at thuy duong 3 boutique hotel spa. The hotel is in excellent condition, clean, well-maintained, and beautifully designed. The service was truly outstanding, and tai was especially amazing. Every time we needed something, he went above and beyond to assist us with a smile. His warmth, professionalism, and attention to detail made a real difference in our stay. From the moment we arrived, everything was seamless. The hotel organised our airport transfer, which was smooth and convenient. Throughout our stay, every ride, meal, and interaction reflected genuine care and high-quality service. The location is also perfect, just a short walk to hoi an s main attractions, with plenty of shops, cafes, and amenities nearby. Despite being so central, the hotel feels peaceful and relaxing. I also had a massage at the spa, and it was fantastic, professional and deeply relaxing, just what i needed after travelling. This hotel offers great value, beautiful surroundings, and a team that truly cares about their guests. I would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting hoi an. Thank you to the wonderful team, and a special thanks to tai, for making our stay so memorable!

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Very nice stay. Good size room and very clean. Very helpful staff. Just a few minutes walk to the old town and the riverfront. On a small very quiet side street so little to no traffic noise. Good breakfast and a nice restaurant and bar. Would recommend.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Amazing service and staff

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Solid place to stay. Cramped and a little stuffy, but otherwise excellent. Service is top-notch. The breakfast is solid. The area is excellent. I would recommend it.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Nice rooms, comfortable beds, good shower. Close to ancient town so easy to walk everywhere, easy 2 grab to an bang beach

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: Everything about this hotel was excellent! location is perfect. You can walk within minutes to shopping little stores, restaurants and main touristic attractions. Breakfast is wonderful, with fruits, cheeses, cold cut, different kind of breads, eggs made to order, salads, and local hot meals with chicken, rice and vegetables. Staff was very kind and helpful. We definitely recomend this hotel.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
userCmt: I really enjoyed my stay here. The exterior and common areas are clean and nicely decorated. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and welcoming. The breakfast was really lovely and included pho, omelets, cold cuts, lots of fruits and breads/pastry s.

hotelName: Khách sạn & Spa Thuy Duong 3 Boutique
