userCmt: Nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện. Phòng hơi tối ban công nhìn ra nhà xây dở dang.

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, giá phòng hợp lý, phòng đẹp và sạch sẽ cố gắng phát huy nhé, nâng cao thêm dịch vụ, gần khu vực phố cổ đi xe đạp tầm 10p xe khách sạn cho mượn luôn. Buffet sáng ngon, món mì quảng khá vừa vị. Lần sau ra hội an tôi sẽ chọn điểm này lần nữa. Cảm ơn vì đã giúp tôi có một ngày du lịch thoải mái ở hội an.

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Khách sạn cách phố cổ gần 10p đạp xe và cách biển an bàng tầm 20p-25p đạp xe. Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, đáp ứng đầy đủ nhu cầu của khách. Phòng trang bị đầy đủ dù và áo choàng. Bữa sáng tại khách sạn hơi ít và món ăn lặp lại. Lúc đầu nhận phòng chắc là do mới dọn dẹp nên còn nghe mùi ẩm.

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ. Có hỗ trợ thuê xe đạp miễn phí.

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Thái độ phục vụ của nhân viên tốt, phòng ốc đẹp. Có dịp sẽ quay lại

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Nhìn chung chỉ tốt cho thực phẩm nếu bạn có thể chú ý để bữa ăn cuối cùng vẫn còn. Phòng sạch sẽ và dịch vụ tốt. Lần sau nếu đi hội an sẽ ở lại đây một lần nữa.

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Khách sạn phòng đẹp, sạch, phong cách nhẹ nhàng, thoải mái. Nhân viên lịch sự, ân cần, dễ thương. Lần sau tôi sẽ ghé lại

hotelName: Khách sạn Hoi An Rose Garden
userCmt: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, đẹp, nhân viên dễ thương. Đi ra phố cổ hơi xa thức ăn ở khách sạn hơi đắt 1 chút
Excelente
Great service. Extremely helpful.
Really worth the money.
Good value and the staff was very helpful and friendly.
위치가 구시가지 도보 10분 근처에 맛나고 저렴한 커피숍과 현지맛집도 많으며 수영장도 있어서 놀기에 편함. 침구나 시설은 약간 낡은면이 있지만 저렴한 가격때문에 문제되지않음 다시 방문한다면 이가격에 다시 이용할 의사가 있음

Clean, welcoming, great pool, quiet. Staff very obliging all round - happy to assist in booking trips/activities and very attentive. Nice selection for breakfast and again staff always ready to oblige. My room was right by the pool so great to just step out and into the water. Hotel is 15 minutes walk to the japanese bridge and i felt safe walking along at night although taxis are available. Used hotel airport transfers both ways and very good value - 30,000 each way in private car direct from hotel. Would definitely recommend this hotel to friends/family for a relaxing vacation.
Overall it was ok for me with the price that i paid.

The staff were helpful.certain things let the hotel down such as the cracked cistern and the fact that the outlet from the bathroom floor smelt bad when we put on the bathroom fan (it seemed to pull the smell out of the drain). Apart from these two things the hotel was fine and i would stay there again. Th swimming pool was nice.
가격대비 괜찮아요

We booked the room with city view but we had wall view. The day after we asked to change our room because there is no natural light in the room (because of the wall), we said we booked city view, but according to the hotel we didn t book it. But there were great and accepted to change our room. The second room was really great with a view and natural light. Pool is great and the hotel is close to the old city. Our stay was pleasant.
위치가 좋았습니다. 올드타운까지 도보 15분 정도. 포슈아도 도보가능.

I dealt very comfortable and welcome. I lucked out with a big treble room for myself. Standard rooms looked quite a bit smaller. Good effort at western breakfast for under four bucks. Not fancy, but a great value base with a nice feel. I would be happy to return.
싼맛에만 ok
사실 숙박을 목적으로 머문곳이 아니라 갑자기 아파서 쉴곳이 필요해서 급하게 머물었는데 편안히 잘 쉬다 가요. 방음은 잘 안되는것같아요. 그리고 건물이 오래돼서 그렇게 깔끔하진 않아요. 화장실 변기가 물이 잘 안내려가요. 샤워기는 안써봐서 모르겠네요. 사람들은 정말 친절합니다
Super satisfied
水壓太小 天冷洗澡有些辛苦 雖有螞蟻 但房間很舒適 服務佳
Het is een prima hotel, het is ongeveer 10 minuten lopen naar het oude centrum.
Great location. Had an issue with wifi but got sorted. Pool is lovely.
Good location. Very friendly staff. Free water available. Great selection at breakfast.
Very neglected hotel! great location!
安いのにやたら豪華な宿 プールは日焼けしたがりのたまり場 ホイアンはバックパッカーの踊り場 受付の人はおてんば レンタサイクルの穴場 海の近場 ランタン祭りビバ サンバ ホテルは総じてグッド ハイ イェン ホテルを見つけた君は運がいい 今すぐ予約しろ
Phòng có mùi thôi thúi

We booked this place for the pool, had been traveling through vietnam for a while and wanted some chill time. In that respect the hotel didn t disappoint, it was an oasis of calm by the pool in bustling hoi an town. Unfortunately we had room 128 which was ground floor pool side. Lovely until both nights people came back at 2 am, shouting, drinking and jumping in the pool. I called reception but there was no answer. Asked the people to chill as they were sat on a table right outside our room and they did move to be fair. Just felt the hotel could deal with this better, perhaps ask people to sit away from the bedroom windows at night. The hotel booked our onward travel including train which was really helpful. Comfy bed and an actual bath with shower over rather than wet room which is popular here. Overall would recommend, but ask for a room at the back, not ground floor.

色々と設備の古さは見受けられますが 総合的に良いホテル 旧市街からやや離れた所にある為 観光するには15分ほど歩かなければならないのですがあんまり気になりませんでした 周辺には食事ができる店やカフェ ミニマートも多いので不便さは感じませんでした 自転車も20000ドンで借りられるので それなりの距離はありますが海にも行こうと思えば行けます 小さいけれどプールあり 部屋のカギが簡素でセーフティボックスが無いのは気になる所 ケトルもありません 朝10時頃にはチェックインさせてくれたので助かりました 数日滞在される方にオススメです

The hotel had really friendly staff. Staff were very helpful. Breakfast was good, especially the freshly made omelettes. The hotel is so close to the old market and lots of eating places. Old property but had character.

Stayed for 2 weeks and loved it. The staff are always great and attentive . Location is great about a nice 10 minute stroll to old town. Pool was great and towels were provided. Our room was cleaned daily the tv was also great. Beds were big nice and comfy. Overall great stay. Only downfall was brekfast was expensive for what it was, but there s lots of nice breakfast places nearby.

5월중순에 하루 숙박했는데 문은 열쇠로이용하는거라 불안했지만 문제없었구요 처음에방에 들어가자마자 냄새가 좀 많이나서 공기가 봏지않았어요 습하고 에어컨?구린내?그런게 심하더라구요 방에잇을때 화장실 환풍기를 켜놧더니 처음보다는 냄새는 많이빠졌구요 지역이그런건지 다낭엔 모기가없엇는데 여기는 모기가 많더라구요 젖은 수건이나 젖은거에 개미?같은벌레가 모여든다는거 참고하시면좋을거같구요 조식은 안먹어서 모르겠지만 시설은 나쁘지않고 적당해요 서양인들이 많이묶는호텔인거같구 직원분이 너무친절하시고 웃으며 잘대해주셔서 좋앗어요

We really enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is only about a ten minute walk from the old town. There are two beaches a few km away and the hotel has bikes for rent. There is a nice, large pool. The staff was very friendly and helpful, for example when it came to booking train tickets. Our room was a standard room, clean with relatively fast wi-fi. The breakfast was ok. We would certainly stay here again.

This hotel is well placed if you want a bit of peace and quiet.....it is just near the edge of the old town, but it is easily accessible (would recommend you hire bikes for your stay - the pace of this town is so much slower. It is also only a 5 min taxi to the beach.
Great stay, very friendly staff, very nice room, big buffet breakfast
バイクを借りて行ったのですが 場所もわかりやすいです ただ看板が地味なんで見逃しやすいかなって思いました ビーチもホイヤン中心街もとても行きやすかった プール 綺麗で気持ちよかった 朝食 美味しかった 値段は安いと思いました
The property is clearly run down and our room smelled strongly of smoke
This place was amazing the manager is very polite and helpful !
일정이 빡빡하신분들에게 추천합니다. 오로지 자기만 하면 되면은ㅎㅎㅎ 기대도 안해서 괜찮습니다. 화장실에 물이 안빠져서...ㅜ 다행히 욕조 안에는 빠져서 거기서 씻구 했습니다. 따뜻한 물나오고요 물주기가 영 시원하게 나오지 않아요...ㅋㅋ 서비스는 이용을 안해봐서 모르겠어요.

Hotel taxi we ordered turned up late and bar was shut so people congregated in recpetion area which my room was directly above with no corridor doors so didnt slepp great. Room was pleasant enough and pool was ok. Wouldnt recommend breakfast.

This place is a little older but kept in great condition. It s clean and comfy, the pool area is great and the rooms are spacious enough. I found the staff to be very friendly and helpful. It s only a 10 minute walk to the riverside and there is plenty of eateries and coffee shops in the street.

Hyggelig hotell, 15 min. Å gå fra gamlebyen i hoi an. Imøtekommende og hyggelig betjening. Deilig bassengområde, som var godt å benytte etter en bytur. Gode senger, god frokost,- vi bestilte lunch siste dag, og den var fantastisk god.

Our room was really smelly and it turned out that the room had bed bugs! when we confronted the hotel about the problem they seemed really confused like theyd never heard of bed bugs before and they simple told us that they would change our sheets and covers, which obviously won t make the bed bugs go away! when we had made that clear for them they transfered us to a different room, which was fine. But in the morning the staff was talking very loudly outsider our door at 7 00 am! very rude! the pool wasn t very clean, there were these wierd plastic fibre sticks floating around everywhere in the pool... The breakfast was fine if you ordered freshmade omelete or scrambled eggs, but there were a lot of flies in the buffet! i would not recommend this hotel!!
Property was very run down. Not like the photos at all.
It is not so good. But it is not bad either.

Front desk staff slightly curt and unfriendly. Not so nice which made the stay a little uncomfortable. Room itself was rather worn. Housekeeping staff very sweet. Breakfast not so good. Didn t go near pool. I d return but would hope to pay a little less than we did. Wasn t overly impressed but it was certainly comfortable enough on a rainy stop over.

침대가 3개 있어서 정말 편했어요. 수압도 괜찮았고 위치는 정말 좋았어요! 숙소에서 걸어서 5분안쪽으로 편의점이 3개나 있었고 올드타운, 시가지 쪽으로 걸어서 20분정도 걸리는데 주변 구경하다보면 시간 금방가요. 수영장은 호텔에서 올린 사진 그대로 입니다. 좋습니다. 한국숙박객에 비해 외국인숙박객이 더 많았어요. 조식도 나쁘지않았습니다. 하루에 두번씩 수영했네요 ㅎ 공항에 픽업서비스 이용해서 호갱이 되지 않을 수 있었어요. 저는 담번에도 이용할려구요 와이파이는 연결이 되긴 하는데 잘 안되요.. 그치만 데이터 무제한 유심을 사가서 괜찮았습니다.
お世辞にも綺麗だとは言えなかった シャワーのお湯が出なかったり 水が美味しくなかったりと日本人には少し厳しい環境であったが 値段が安かったので 相応の宿だったのかと思う
We had a very bad smell in the bathroom, and my complained about it got ignored..and they were fixing all the rooms in our stage with a lot of noise, and we didn t know about it before we came..
Nice hotel very close to the main hustle and bustle of hoi an.

I stayed here for the second time in 2 years. Hai yen has a great location, nice rooms, great swimming pool and a lot of nice facilities such as laundry, scooter rentals, taxi to/ from da nang airport available at the reception. From the instant we entered the hotel premises, we had a staff member coming and picking our bags and carrying it to the room. The room had all the facilities- ac, bathroom with hot shower, bottled water, double bed with toilet amenities. The front-desk was very resourceful in making sure to arrange everything for us, and i didn t have to worry on how to return scooter with flight at 7 am in the morning. They included filling petrol as well, at a slight premium (50 cents in usd) thus saving me a lot of time and hassle in filling petrol. As for our taxi, we changed the time at the last moment and the front-desk was very cooperative in getting it successfully done for us. All this for dirt cheap prices. The only slight complaint i had is this time the room i got was slightly smaller than last time, when i came alone and got 2 double beds which was lavish. The other thing was that we had a cockroach in the bathroom. I was able to kill the roach without much issues, but it wasn t great to have this small inconvenience. Of course if we called the staff, they would have helped us out but we didn t need to. But in an otherwise extremely clean hotel, this was a small annoyance.
Jeg har været her tre gange, det er et lille hyggeligt hotel. Fint til prisen. Meget venligt personale
Service and staff very good. Rooms very neat tidy and comfortable.breakfast excellent. Outside and pool area untidy and neglected
Det var fint at bo på hotellet, billig, god betjening og i fin afstand fra floden.
A bit old but overall still not bad. Pool was great

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were friendly and helpful especially jenny.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: A nice hotel on the edge of the edge of old town. Easy to get around and lot s of food choices close.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The property was very nice. The staff was super friendly and helpful. The location was great, so many options just out the door. It was more of a 3 star property than reported 4 star, but overall, i would recommend the property. The room smelled a little musty, but not so much to bother us. Their free breakfast was very nice and had plenty of options to choose from.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 旧市街地からとても近くて便利が良かったです ホテルの入り口がきちんと整備されてなく 歩行困難なのが残念でした しかし 部屋のダブルのベットの広さがキングサイズくらいあって広々して大変良かったです

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Hotel staff were very lovely, attentive and welcoming. They were able to accommodate us with a late check out with no extra fee for our late departure. We loved our balcony room with the view of the river and life walking by.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The hotel is very conveniently located near hoi an old town. The service was fantastic. The breakfast buffet was a bit small but the food was of higher quality.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 一人旅で利用 旧市街にもアクセスが良く 夜のにぎわいの余韻も残しつつ 少し落ち着ける そんなホテルで 最高でした 周りには利用しやすいリーズナブルな食事処もたくさんありました 暑い時は 休息に立ち寄れる立地で またホイアンに行く際は絶対ここに泊まります スタッフも若い方中心ですが 適度な距離感が良いし サービスは満足です そしてスパが最高です ベトナムトラディショナルコース 1日の疲れを夜に解放して眠りにつける クオリティの高い施術でした 欧米系のお客様家多く 団体とおらず 朝食もゆったりしてます 1ついうなら 空港への送迎の価格がが行きと帰りで違ったことでしょうか

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were excellent, and caring. Food was good. Great location. Staff had great recommendations

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Brilliant location for everything. Staff were amazing and helpful, throughout our stay. Seriously recommend this hotel.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The service was great, but the rooms were very musty there was black mold in the bathroom. We asked to switch rooms because the smell was so bad the 2nd room had more visible mold than the first. The location was great, staff friendly tried to help, but the property needs some maintenance from multiple water leaks. Also, rooms were much smaller than they appear in picturez

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: It is beautiful, rooms are gorgeous, most comfortable pillows in vietnam! great breakfast! friendly staff!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The property was great, located within a short 10 min walk from main area. Staff was super friendly. Kids enjoyed the indoor pool and nice breakfast. Only a minor thing was the floors in the room and bathroom still had soap coated after cleaning, making it sticky and slippery.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Everything was great. Staff were friendly. The only thing that could be improved is starting breakfast earlier as many day trips seem to start very early.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Lantana boutique hotel hoi an is conveniently located near the old quarter of hoi an. It is an easy walk to the historic area and the evening lantern festival. Breakfast was excellent and the staff was very friendly. Our room was well appointed and had a wonderful view of the river. I would recommend then highly and would stay there again.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Just on the outskirts of the old town. The staff were very helpful and supportive, great balcony with nice view of the river, and far enough away from the noise.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Location is excellent, short walk from old town area. Staff is attentive and helpful

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Everyone at the hotel was lovely. It was such an enjoyable stay. We definitely will come back next year!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Trevlig o serviceinriktad personal. Nära till nattmarknaden.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Brilliant location, perfect boutique accommodation.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: All staff members are kind and accommodating. They seem to genuinely care about all guests . The location is ideal for exploring hoi an .

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Beautiful place. Absolutely lovely staff.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Quiet from all the action but walkable to everything. Location is great and the service is excellent.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Room is small, stuffy and lack of circulation. Same with fhe hallways and community area due to lack of ac. Not a lot of varieties for breakfast comparing to other hotels we stayed at. Although the location is perfect.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Very helpful front desk staff!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 旧市街やナイトマーケットに近く いいロケーションです 私は滞在中に部屋の清掃を入れないため ルームメイクの方とあれくださいこれくださいで話をすることが頻繁にある方ですが 皆さん親切でした また 夜は川沿いでカラオケ大会だかをやっていましたが 部屋内では特に聞こえませんでした

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The stay at lantana boutque hotel was memorable. It was a very nice family connecting room spacious for a family of the best part was the location as its cery short walking distance to the lantern boats l, night market and the best restaurants namely morning glory (must try). The staff is very helpful and guided us on dsy trips and places to visit. Transfers arranged were excellent too.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were amazing rooms were comfortable with nice decor. Close to nightlife in hoi an, night markets and old town. Great location.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Parfait hôtel, entièrement rénové,staff efficace, breakfast délicieux très bien situé

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Nice hotel .good breakfast, friendly staff, good area near everything

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: チェックイン時に ココナッツボートツアーの申し込みができありがたかったです ホテル内はとても素敵な雰囲気でした

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: ナイトマーケットから徒歩で数分でありながら 川に面した静かな環境 街歩きにも便利で ホテル前まで常時 車が入れるので 車のチャーターにも便利

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great hotel in a great location with fantastic staff.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: This was the perfect place to stay for 3 days in hoi an. First and foremost, i can t say enough how much the staff made me feel welcome. Every time they saw me, they greeted me by name, like we were old friends. They helped with reservations and taxis and even allowed me to shower after i checked out because i had a late flight after a day of swimming. The room was very comfortable i slept like a baby. Even though we were close to all the music and festivities of old town, i didn t hear any of it. It was a perfect place to venture out from. So close to old town (just cross the bridge at the corner!). And from the front porch restaurant, you can watch all the people going by. It was so perfect! highly recommend!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The hospitality we received from the staffs of lantana boutique hotel was simply amazing. I especially want to mention jenny and sally who both went far and beyond to make our stay a very pleasant one. The hotel is well situated where the night market and old town are very walkable, yet far enough to be away from the crowd and noise. The breakfast buffet are very delicious and has plenty of selections. Would definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great all around

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great location, lovely staff, shaded pool, good value

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Beautiful hotel, clean, well kept, close to everything and lovely buffet breakfasts, safe area helpful and friendly staff.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: とにかくスタッフの方が親切 ホテルも部屋も可愛いし立地が良かったのでとても楽しめました 特典は説明ありましたが利用しなかったのでまたの機会にでも利用しようと思います

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great place and staff

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were very helpful and friendly.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Lantana hotel has a wonderful location on the riverside a quick walk from old town, but still quiet and relaxing. The room was well appointed and comfortable, especially good ac for a vietnamese heatwave. The airport shuttle was also convenient and the free breakfast had nice variety of dishes to start your day. The main highlight was all the hotel staff always attentive and personable- greeting us and offering assistance and tips for our trip. Would absolutely recommend staying here when in hoi ann.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Unique property, comfortable.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great boutique hotel located close to the old town centre, yet far enough to avoid the crowds and noise. Staff are first class and can t do enough. Hotel has loads of charm and could be viewed as slightly dated but we thought it provided character. The only downside is the pool is minimalistic and in the shade but again, that was fine with us but it might not suit everyone.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great hotel in a fun part of hoi an

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: They need to provide pen and notes please

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great hotel, comfortable and well located, with very friendly staff. Breakfast was delicious. All around a very nice stay

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Nice friendly staff, rooms are clean and well kept.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff excellent, breakfast fantastic, room above expectations.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 朝食の種類が豊富で美味しかった スタッフの対応も丁寧でとてもフレンドリーでした 但し 部屋のテレビの反応が悪かった所は残念でした ナイトマーケットに近いので 観光するには最高のホテルです

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: ロケーションは旧市街にアクセスが良く便利なうえ 環境は静かなので落ち着いて滞在できました 周辺には良いレストランもあります 部屋については期待通りで設備も問題ありませんでした 朝食も品揃えが良く 満足です スタッフは大変親身で良い対応でした 総じて満足です ホイアンに行くことがあればまた利用します

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The staff were amazing and friendly

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Nice hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Location was close to the night market near the river. Great room with excellent views from the balcony.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Really charming boutique hotel but needs few improvements. We had a joining rooms. In our room there was a leak behind the toilet and in our son s room the a/c unit on the wall next to the door was leaking. He had to put towel on the floor or have the unit turned off. Not ideal considering heat and humidity. Otherwise really nice hotel. Very close to the shopping and bars and restaurants but quiet. Everyone was super nice and attentive. Each room had two big umbrellas to borrow. Really good idea during raining season. Breakfast not as good as other hotels we stayed in during our trip but still good.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: We did a short trip in hoi an and this place was the most ideal place for us to stay at. Very short walk to and from the busy sections of hoi an. Service was great. The property is a little aged and in my opinion could do with a renovation...but, what can you actually expect in the ancient town.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Superb, ticks all the boxes, will definitely use again if we return to hoi an

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were attentive to our needs especially lily. Thank you!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great location, very helpful and friendly staff. Had planned to stay 4 nights byt extended a further 3 nights.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Wonderful, helpful and friendly staff. Convenient location and nice view.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Convenient location and very friendly staffs.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Staff were excellent couldn t do enough to help.position great on edge of old city

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 服务热情 离古城非常近却很安静

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 法式風情酒店, 早餐區域太細

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Very friendly staff. Very close walk to old town. Would stay here again. Highly recommended

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Very nice and calm place to relax. Also very convenient to have walking distance to the shops, restaurants and boat lighting rides.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Daisy at the front desk was the best, she helped us so many times including saving my jacket i left behind. Bed comfortable, great location, breakfast okay (needs better coffee for sure). Nice sitting area outside, good view on balcony but pads on the chairs would have been nice.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: ルームキーを間違えてわたされ 食事から帰ったら部屋へ入れない キーの部屋は戸が開け放たれ 何もないのにショック ホテルマンを呼び調べさせたら違うキーが 判明 しかし 翌日その女性は私たちのことは 知らないのか知らされていないのか 何のあいさつもない 娘や孫は一時半泣きであったが こくみんせいなのか

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: ツアーの紹介など親切にしてくれた 送迎もあり 良かった ただ客室近くに掃除道具一式が丸見えにあり あれは日本ではあり得ないと思った 建物構造上仕方ないとも思うが

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: A lovely boutique hotel. The manager, sally, her staff are very friendly helpful. Sally remembers the guests names often walks around chatting with people, asking how their day has been. A lovely dining area overlooking the river. Close enough to walk to old town. We would definitely stay here again.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Lantana is the perfect place for your stay in hoi an. A short 5 minute walk from the history of oldtown. Wonderful staff that become your friends will cater to your every need. You will not be disappointed if you stay at lantana.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: とても良い

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The staff are brilliant and friendly, room had a great view of the river, but could do with a bit of a renovation.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: This was our second stay at this hotel, and just like the first time in 2018, it was fabulous. The rooms are large and airy, with the ones facing the river having doors that open on to a small balcony. The staff are just amazing, friendly and helpful, nothing is too much trouble and they say hello every time you come back through the lobby. The ground floor was renovated during covid and looks amazing. The only small issue is that it is quite a loud hotel inside. Not from street noise, they have excellent windows, but from the central atrium space. Tiled floors are great for the climate, but loud voices and slamming doors echo! maybe some rugs would help? if someone could invent a way for hotel doors all over the world to close quietly, they d make a fortune! we loved staying here, and will again next time we are in hoi an.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Loved the location and the staff were amazing and helpful. We stayed 3 nights but wish it was longer. So close to all the main sights of hoi an- 4 from beach but about 10 minutes walk to everything else around. Room was a good size and we had a balcony overlooking the river. Bed was comfortable and bathroom was good. Pool area was great (undercover from sun). Staff gave lots of good information and were always helpful. Would stay again.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Absolutely nothing to fault from this hotel. We had a balcony room overlooking the canal. Great location. Two minute walk over the bridge to the old quarter. Two blocks from the night market. The girls at the front desk (sally and jenny i think) were always extremely helpful. Would definitely stay here again. 5 nights we stayed. Pool was perfect size and great to cool off in the afternoon heat.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Lovely riverfront hotel but at a quieter side so feel more tranquil. Great personal service. We really enjoyed the spa. Helen is very good with facial and massages.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: We had a wonderful stay at hoi an, thanks to sally and all the team of the hotel, who made our stay an incredible one in hoi an !! we can t wait to go back to this beautiful boutique hotel !! best regards, matias, paty and arturo

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 設備は古いが 清潔感はあり

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 旧市街からもナイトマーケットからも徒歩数分 静かで眺めも良いホテルです 部屋も清潔で広く 朝食も選択肢が多くておいしいです 出発が夜になるためレイトチェックアウトで17時まで部屋を使用しましたが 50万ドンとリーズナブルでした チェックアウト後も荷物を預かってくれますし チェックアウト後すぐに部屋を確認してくれて 掛け布団の下にあって気が付かなかった忘れものを見つけてくれました

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Stayed for 8 nights in the superb deluxe room. Enjoyed everything about this hotel - fantastic staff who were always friendly and willing to help. Great location on the river and a couple of minutes walk to the old town. Great rooms - very clean and well appointed. Lovely views from the balcony. Really nice breakfast. Fantastic stay - we ll definitely be back.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Everything look good on me

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Sally and the team were outstanding in service delivery. Rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again. Tu is also an asset to their hotel. He is an incredibly safe driver and a lovely man.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Hotel was beautiful. Quiet location and minutes from anything you need. Staff were exceptional. Very friendly, helpful and always free to assist. Rooms were clean, comfortable and beautiful. Impressive hotel!! highly recommend.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Perfect location just 5 mins walk from the old town. Friendly, professional and attentive staff. A beautiful outdoor terrace where enjoy breakfast in the morning. I highly recommend this hotel.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Absolument parfait .service. Petit déjeuner, chambre .emplacement

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: We stayed five nights at this outstanding hotel resort. Everything was extremely good. The location is excellent close to everything but not noisy. The room was spacious, clean, and had a nice view of the river. We had some rain, and there were nice umbrellas in our room which really came in handy! every morning we had the prepaid breakfast that was also outstanding and fresh. The concierge and staff were also extremely helpful. Especially daisy! thank you lantana boutique hotel for your great hospitality and service. Highly recommended.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: We loved the service, the people, the breakfast and the calming feeling. We had a great massage at the spa but i would probably go somewhere else for the pedicure. The massage still made the experience worthwhile.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great location, nice facilities, good buffet

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: We enjoyed our stay at lantana. It was in a great location. The front desk staff greeted us with cool drinks and area information. The rooms were clean and comfortable!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Let me preface this review by acknowledging that our arrival was shortly after the city had flooded, so understanding the weather may have factored into our review. Our flight was delayed so we arrived quite late and they accommodated late check-in which we appreciated. However, shortly after check-in we realized how outdated the hotel was. The property just seemed a bit dingy and was musty (likely due to the rain) including the bedding. The pillows smelled of mildew and there appeared to be mold on the ceilings. The room itself was clean enough but it didn t appear that they vacuumed or swept well as there was so much hair everywhere including the body soap dispenser. And i m not talking about on the bottle, i m talking about a hair in the spout. Very bizzare...either way, we weren t staying in the room much so brushed it off. Location was good as right near the main strip area, but far enough away from the craziness. Breakfast was included and did the go, nothing too exciting but had different options on a daily basis. Overall, our stay was fine but had some flaws.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: 川沿いですが マーケットからは徒歩5分と少し離れているため 落ち着いた雰囲気です クラブミュージックも聞こえてこないですし ランタンの舟も来ないので それは残念でしたが 21時くらいで全体的に撤収してしまうため ランタン流しの舟は直接見に行けばいいと思いました

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: It is my second time at lantana. The location and hotel service are superb. We got the personal attention of sally, the hotel manager. Highly recommended.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Clean,friendly staff ,good position. Highly recommend

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Good

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: A beating hotel walking distance to everything. The staff were exceptionally friendly and the concierge sally was delightful, funny and helpful. Even surprised us with a birthday cake for one of our party. Lovely breakfast. Would definitely recommend staying here!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Great hotel, very central yet quiet in the evening. All staff are very helpful, efficient and extremely friendly at all times.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Better than most 5 stars! fabulous views from the room, lovely breakfast, excellent service and great location. Value for money! i highly recommend it!!

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: オシャレで可愛い宿泊施設でした スタッフの方の対応はとても良かったです

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: The staff where very helpful and pleasant, the hotel was been modernised when we visited and the hotel had only reopened in the past couple of months. The breakfast was good but could be improved with more western choices. The front desk girls were a joy always smiling and ready to help. Location couldn t of been better just a short 3 minutes into the old town.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: This hotel ticks all the boxes that make it simply fantastic. The location, staff, room, cleanliness, breakfast, etc easily rate 10 out of ten.

hotelName: Khách sạn Lantana Boutique Hội An
userCmt: Our stay at the lantana boutique hotel was everything we wanted with excellent treatment from the very warm and friendly staff who always wanted to go the extra mile to make our stay comfortable.
Muy buen hotel solo que exageran en la atención, no es mala pero en lo personal es demasiada
Nice property, staff are very nice and helpfull, very reasonable price would recommend it for the area.
Nice place to stay
Maison vy was everything i expected of hoi an. Beautiful room, serene relaxing pool, great friendly staff and walking distance to town. You an has been beyond my expectations.
旧市街まで20分ほど歩かないといけないため そこだけが不便でした しかしスタッフの方の愛想もよく ホテルもとてもかわいかったです 立地を抜きにしてもまた泊まりたいと思えるホテルでした 今回は使用していませんが ホテルから海までシャトルバスがありました プールも無料と言われました

This boutique hotel delivered an impeccable service. The rooms and the entire hotel are exquisitely decorated with stylish decor, the staff are working round the clock with friendly service and high english skills, and the location is very close to downtown. The breakfast comes with fruit and pastries, along with a personal order from a wide selection of choices. Though do expect to get watery juice if you order more than 1-2 glasses. The only minus is the amount of hot water as we could not both take hot baths right after each other, but this might have to do with the fact that we visited in february. The complimentary herbal foot bath every night is an extra bonus after hours of downtown walking.

Chic little hotel with a beautiful ambience. Staff very friendly attentive. Great breakfast - good range of options and well presented. Room was spacious, clean comfortable. Nice firm mattress. Plenty of hot water. Good aircon. Enjoyed the daily foot bath - a nice touch. Pool very clean. Great location - 15 minutes walk to old town. Free bicycles. Transport to from airport was well priced. Highly recommended.
Beautiful hotel in hoi an. Very friendly and warmed welcome staffs. We had a wonderful time in the hotel. Super clean and organized. We want to go back to the same hotel with family again.
Beautiful hotel in hoi an. Very friendly and warmed welcome staffs. We had a wonderful time in the hotel. Super clean and organized. We want to go back to the same hotel with family again.
Vänlig och hjälpsam personal. Bra rum, stannade 3 nätter. Okej frukost. Skulle rekomendera det!
The service is really good. The staffs are friendly and help full when we need help

Excellent staff and service, great dining options out of the restaurants and bar owned by the owners of the hotel. Definitely a strong recommendation for the hotel for providing great accommodation and service.
Great hotel, a 20 minute walk into town. Food was great, service was great, staff were great.
Great service, true boutique experience and terrific food. We highly recommend this hotel. A little piece of france in vietnam.
A wonderful hotel with very polite, kind and helpful staff.
Amazing place! buffet in the morning is the highlight.
施設が清潔でとても綺麗だった 3階までの低層で エレベーターはなかった

I love the charm of the hotel. It s modern but unique. Really love the thought put into the decor and creating a beautiful and relaxing ambiance. Service is great. The staff are willing to help you any time.

The only drawback to this hotel is the absence of an elevator. If you re able to walk up one or two flights of stairs (with staff bringing your bags), this is an excellent choice. It s a short walk to the old town area and a free shuttle. On our full moon night there was an amazing lantern festival enjoyed by tourists and lots of vietnamese. Maison vy has 7 stations for the complimentary breakfast (5 in photos), and free afternoon tea was our substitute for lunch. The reading room was a great place to relax after walking around the old town. We found the best shopping here from our entire vietnam trip. The free herbal foot footbath was perfect to end our day.

This hotel was exactly what i was looking for!! the staff is very friendly and takes very good care of you! great location, fantastic food, and extremely comfortable bed! i would highly recommend maison vy!
Beautiful and beautifully maintained property. The staff were very helpful.

Although everything of this hotel are great, especially, i would like to raise 3 things as below. Total coordination from a piece of chair to color of this house wall, i was so impressed the total produce of ms vy. I felt her unwavering philosophy of imagination. People of course, they welcome guests always. But, not only that but also they communicate so well, quickly and efficiently. I told about my allergenic things to 1 staff in the restaurant at the dinner of the first night. From the day, i recognized that every staff in the hotel knew my allergenic food, even though it is the first time to talk to them. That was amazing earnestness for the guests. Food needless to say, the food is awesome. It (including thecomplimentary breakfast) was sophisticated and delicious far beyond of my imagination.

ほとんど全てが素晴らしいですが 特に以下の3つを挙げたい挙げたいと思います トータルコーディネート 椅子の1脚から建物の壁の色に至るまで オーナーであるvsさんのトータルプロデュースにとても感銘を受けました 彼女の揺るぎない透徹したイマジネーションを感じました 従業員の皆さん もちろんスタッフの皆さんは常にゲストを歓迎してくれます しかし それだけでなく 彼らはとてもよく 素早くそして効率的にコミュニケーションを取っています 1泊目の夕食の際 レストランの1人のスタッフに私のアレルギーについて話しました その日から 初めて話す方も含め スタッフ全員が私のアレルギー食品を知っていることに気づきました これはゲストにとって驚くべき真摯さでした 食べ物 言うまでもなく食べ物は最高です 無料の朝食を含め 私の想像をはるかに超えて美味しくて洗練されていました
Very nice hotel. Cozy, very clean, very kind personnel, excellent service, good location.

Very nicely renovated hotel, though one of our 3 rooms are with 2 really tiny single bed (not so in other two rooms). But rooms are comfy and clean. Nice to have foot bath ready at room too. Recommend this hotel )
オシャレで清潔 スタッフの皆さんもみんな親切でフレンドリー 立地も自転車で5 6分で中心地に行けるので便利でした
Accueil parfait , petit déjeuner top , attentions pendant le séjour , chambres bien équipées mais un peu petites pour le pays

Lovely property in a great location. Short walk from the old town area. Very beautiful design. Only problem is no elevator, but bellman is ready for luggage service so not really a big issue. Same owner as the some of the best restaurants in town, as one can imagine the breakfast is excellent.
Great service, staff were fantastic, great food, highly recommend this property
Rien d unique, simplement ce qu on peut attendre de ce genre d établissements. Une excellente proprete

This hotel was great! it was well within walking distance of downtown hoi an and the staff, especially the ladies who helped us enjoy our breakfasts, were so nice and very accomodating.he breakfasts were outstanding, i might add! twe would definitely rebook at the maison vy if we ever get back to hoi an, which is a wonderful town to visit in vietnam.

Excellent hotel!. Beautiful, clean, super friendly staff, all perfect. The breakfast is delicious, with a lot of variety of vietnam and western food, all delicious and fresh. We love it! the only observation is when you book, prefer the rooms with no balcony. We pick up this one, in front of a street , and i found a little bit noisy. We payed an extra value to change the room and all good, the other one was great )
모든 직원분들이 친철하고 영어도 잘하셔서 대화하는데 문제가 없었습니다. 조식도 너무 좋았고요 전체적으로 다 마음에 들었습니다.

Loved this hotel. Staff were so helpful, decor was lovely, room was very comfortable, pool area was great. Lots of small extra details that made it feel very special. About a 10 min walk into the old town but lots of shops just outside makes it convenient. Would definitely recommend.
Et meget lækkert hotel 10 min gang fra centrum. Super hyggeligt og med en fantastisk morgenmad. Servicen var helt i top og personalet var utroligt hjælpsomme.

This was the best place we ve ever stayed! beautifully designed and decorated. Rooms were immaculately clean and totally comfortable. Lots of space! beautiful balcony and lovely interior courtyard and pool. The staff is outstanding!!!! they were genuinely friendly and hospitable. The food was great!! please do not miss breakfast. You re supplied with an herbal foot soak at the end of your day. Wish we could have stayed longer.
Amazing hotel. Very charming and well-kept property. The staff are lovely and very kind.

The absolute best experience i ve ever had in a hotel. Maison vy is beautiful - elegant decor, clean, relaxing. The food at the hotel (both vietnamese and western) was delicious, with lots of variety. The staff were always smiling and saying hello. I would go out of my way to return to hoi an - just to stay at this amazing hotel. Loved it!

We stayed 4 nights so got lots of extras like free laundry, foot spa, also high tea in the afternoon. Breakfast had an excellent selection. The hotel was about 1 km from the main tourist area so fairly quiet as well.
Madame vy owns the three best restaurants in hoi an and this fabulous hotel where the food surpasses the rest! she claims to have made a home and she has. Highly recommend
Staying at this hotel was the highlight of my family s visit to hoi an!

We had a truly lovely stay at maison vy. What a well designed and considered hotel. It truly delivers on the promise of being a boutique and hospitable. The space is elegant and well detailed. The services are good and service excellent. Nothing was too much problem. Totally accommodating. I would stay again if ever in hoi an

호이안 시내 근처에 호텔 중에 제일 깨끗하고 예쁜 호텔이었습니다. 조식도 괜찮았고 다들 너무 친절해서 좋았어요. 수영장은 작았지만 룸컨디션이 너무좋았고 대신 한가지 시티뷰는 도로 쪽이라 너무 시끄러울 수도 있어서 시티뷰는 비추입니다. 사실 시티뷰도 아니구 도로뷰지만요ㅋㅋ 체크인 하실때 미리 말씀하세요. 그래서 중간에 룸체인지 했습니다. 아 룸서비스는 오후 10시까지라는데 시켯더니 다안된다고 ㅋㅋ 아무튼 너무 깔끔하고 이쁘고 아기자기하고 좋아요. 안방비치랑 호이안 셔틀버스도 두번인가 있어요. 이용하진 않았고 비스마켓 바우처도 주는거 같아요. 수영장은 오후 9시까지 조식은 6-10시 입니다. 시내근처 호텔로 굉장히 추천드려요
합리적이기도 하면서 매우 친절했어요. 묵는데 불편함 없었고, 호이안 간다면 또 갈 것 같아요. 조식이나 애프터눈 티도 너무 좋았어요!
Hôtel magique! magnifique et un personnel charmant,souriant et qui aide beaucoup. Pour moi le meilleur hôtel à hoi an !

Maison vy is a beautiful and relaxing hotel. Lots of attention to design details created a beautiful atmosphere. Very helpful staff and great location a little away from the tourists but easy to get to the sights of hoi an.

username: サイゴンからの旅行者
userCmt: 以前 娘の高熱で訪問キャンセルしたとき 病院の診断書をメールしたら無料にしてくれた心優しいホテルに宿泊 おしゃれな内装で心地よくすごしました 朝食はこぢんまりした１fのカフェにて パン フォー ディムサム 卵料理 フルーツといろいろチョイスできました サービススタッフが明るく やさしく 心地よく滞在することができました
Hotellet har ett väldigt bra läge mellan stranden och gamla stan. Hotellpersonalen är väldigt trevliga och hjälpsamma. Fina och stora rum. Fantastiska bonusprogram/förmåner.

호텔 위치도 조용해서 좋았고 직원들도 친절했습니다. 하지만 청소 상태가 완벽하지는 못했습니다. 체크인 했을 때 방에 긴 머리카락이 여기저기 떨어져 있었고(와이프와 전 모두 머리가 짧습니다.) 미니바는 갯수가 맞지 않았으며 냉장고 안에는 전에 묵었던 손님의 것으로 보이는 우유가 들어있었습니다. 좀 더 세심한 주의가 아쉽습니다. 그외에는 모두 완벽하였고 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.
朝食は種類少なめですが 味はおいしく 2歳の子供も食べられるものがいっぱいでした ただ 4階建てなのにエレベーター無いのがマイナスポイント ホイアン市街地も微妙に遠く 疲れて帰ってまた階段は辛かったです
숙소가 너무 좋아서 다시 호이안오면 다시 꼭 숙박을 할것 같습니다
Very classy resort just a little out of hoi an
Every steps are kind especially mr mike
It has several options that i can access to
Very good
아주 친절하고 깨끄하고 잘 쉬다 갑니다. 툭히 직원중에 hyeri,felix,dory 가 너무 친절히 대해 주셨네요. 좋은 기억 안고 갑니다.
가족여행으로 호이아나 호텔2박투숙 했습니다 체크인해주시는분부터 로비 셔틀기사님 가는곳마다 모든직원분들이 너무친절하셨습니다 구석구석 산책할때가 많고요 셔틀예약해놓고 호이안까지 불편함없이 다녔네요 시설또한 너무 깨끗하고 조식도 맛있었습니다 1년에한두번은 베트남와서 쉬다가는데요 다음재방문할려구요 덕분에편안하고 잘쉬다왔습니다
皆さんとても優しくて どこへ行っても笑顔で親切にして下さいました 帰りにカジノで遊ぼうと14時台のバスを予約したら チェックアウトを14時に変更 さらに海側へアップグレード 至れり尽くせりでした シャトルバスが大変便利で 予約は必要ですが とても助かりました ぜひまた泊まりたいホテルです
시설도 깨끗하고 직원분들도 친절하셔서 너무 편안한 여행이 되었어요

Very professional, kind and spacious for staying all kinds of services and facilities are very luxury. We will absolutely choose here for my business trip and for my family. Specially thank you kate, uyen
주변 인프라 부족
장점 깔끔. 친절. 조식 맛있음. 수영당 정오부터 그늘져서 오후에 수영하기좋음. 시설좋음. 호이안 가까움,골프장 및 카지노 3분거리.식당 5개이상있음 단점 공항 1시간거리, 셔틀 몇개없음.비데없음, 전기코드 몇개없음, 휴지통 없음, 유아 어매너티 없음
생긴지 얼마 안 되어서 아직 입소문을 덜 탄건지 생각보다 사람이 없고 가격이 저렴했어요. 근데 시설이나 서비스, 청결 등등 모든 면에서 가격보다 훨씬 좋은 경험을 하고 왔습니다 다음에도 꼭 다시 오고 싶어요!
Hotel was nice, breakfast good, room was comfortable, only the lobby need to have signature scent will be perfect compared will hoiana casino.
직원들의 친절한 서비스는 물론 불편한게 없는지 수시로 체크하고 세심하게 배려해주네요. 조식은 매일 메뉴가 조금씩 달라져서 먹기 좋았고 다낭 시내, 호이안 올드타운 등 셔틀 운행해서 이용하기 퍈리했습니다. 디음 여행 때 꼭 재방문할게요
They re all very friendly and supportive such as van ha at front desk.
Nice facilities, and great staff - not much to around in close proximity to the property.
Very good all service and food
Thankyou
Great place to stay. Lots of facilities for your access.

hotelName: Khách sạn Ngọc Hoa - Nam Hội An
userCmt: Chị chủ rất nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ. Đầy đủ ánh sáng, gần biển và đồ ăn xung quanh cũng rất ngon.

hotelName: Khách sạn Ngọc Hoa - Nam Hội An
userCmt: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình

hotelName: Khách sạn Ngọc Hoa - Nam Hội An
userCmt: Phòng siêu đẹp, sạch sẽ. Mình cực kì thích những phòng có ánh sáng mặt trời chiếu vào và phòng có cửa kính rất to và có ban công rất mát. Anh chị ở quầy lễ tân siêu đáng iu và thân thiện. Rất thoải mái

userCmt: Bản thân mình có lỡ đặt nhầm phòng vì ko nắm rõ vị trí địa lý khu vực hội an. Ngày sau khi biết mình ko thể di chuyển đến ks vì khoảng cách khá xa so với mình. Mình đã chủ động liên hệ ks xin phép hủy phòng và nhận được thông tin là liên hệ traveloka để hủy. Tuy nhiên sau 1 ngày thì ks lại charge full phí với mình. Ks làm việc thiếu chuyên nghiệp và hi vọng mn trước khi đặt những ks như thế này nên cân nhắc ạ.
