Không gian đẹp, dịch vụ buồng phòng ổn. Lễ tân dễ thương
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên niềm nở lịch sự.
Vị trí tiện, ngay phố đi bộ. Phòng view đẹp, thoải mái, có ban công nhìn ra sông siêu đẹp. Dịch vụ tốt

Là một khách sạn và khách du lịch, tôi khuyên bạn nên ở tại la an central boutique villa. Chúng tôi đã rất may mắn khi được nâng cấp từ phòng superior lên phòng deluxe rất mới, lớn và có những đồ trang trí rất đẹp với tầm nhìn ra sông và ban công. Bữa sáng rất tốt và có rất nhiều sự lựa chọn. Chỉ cần vài bước bạn sẽ đến được thị trấn cổ, vị trí siêu lý tưởng! nhân viên và chủ sở hữu đều thân thiện, mỉm cười và rất niềm nở. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ ở lại đây một lần nữa trong kỳ nghỉ tiếp theo tại hội an. Bạn sẽ không thất vọng với lựa chọn này!
Khách sạn view đẹp , sạch sẽ , thoáng mát , đồ ăn khá ổn
Sạch sẽ, thân thiện, ngay trung tâm tiện lợi

Tôi rất muốn giới thiệu nơi này để ở trong kỳ nghỉ của bạn. Chủ nhà và nhân viên thật tuyệt vời trong thời gian chúng tôi ở đó. Vị trí của nó cực kỳ gần khu phố cổ, bạn có thể đi bộ 1-2 phút để đến trung tâm của nó.
Phòng rộng thoải mái, không gian đẹp, dịch vụ tốt
Nằm gần khu phố cổ, phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp, giá cả hợp lý
Căn phòng khá nhỏ, và có mùi khó chịu từ phòng vệ sinh. Các nhân viên chăm sóc (điểm cộng)
Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên cực kì nhiệt tình, view phố cổ
Chị chủ nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Từ villa ra hội an đi bộ mất 2-3p thôi
Khách sạn nằm gần chợ đêm, yên tinh. Phòng ốc dẽcor đẹp mắt. Phòng sạch sẽ, nệm êm lắm. Đáng tiền
Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời, chị chủ nhà thân thiệt, chu đáo
Nhân viên lễ tân / chủ sở hữu siêu thân thiện. Phòng rất đẹp và sạch sẽ. Họ cũng cho phép nhận phòng sớm.
Khách sạn tạm ổn, hôm mình ở thì bị ồn ào khó ngủ , cách chợ đêm tầm 5p đi bộ
Giường siêu to khổng lồ!!! phòng rộng rãi thoải mái, tiện nghi
Đáng để quay lại. Thân thiện , nhiệt tình. Cảm ơn rất nhiều ạ!
Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Giá khá ổn cho khu vực gần phố đi bộ.
Vị trí thuận lợi, phòng rộng rãi tuy nhiên drap giường còn hơi ẩm
Lễ tân nhiệt tình, phòng khách sạn rộng rãi gần trung tâm rất tiện đi lại tham quan
Phòng đẹp, view đẹp gần các điểm du lịch phù hợp với giá cả nhưng bữa sáng ít quá
Phòng hơi cũ, tạo cảm giác hơi ọp ẹp, không an toàn khi ngủ. Tuy nhiên nhân viên thân thiện, chăm sóc khách hàng tốt, đồ ăn hơi ít sự lựa chọn
Đẹp nhưng mong chị chủ lắp thêm đèn chứ phòng tối quá đến tối hơi sợ, phòng tối quá như kiêir ngày xưa í
Rất tuyệt vời. Khách sạn sạch đẹp.chị lễ tân rất nhiệt tình và đáng yêu.nếu có cơ hội quay lại hội an mình vẫn sẽ chọn ở la an

Khách sạn tự ý đổi phòng từ 2 giường thành 1 giường, khi mình không đồng ý thì khách sạn nói đã hết phòng rồi. Mình báo huỷ phòng, khách sạn đã confirm ok cho huỷ phòng nhưng vẫn charge tiền phòng của mình 100
Phòng đẹp và bữa ăn sáng thực sự đề nghị!
Ăn sáng rất ngon. Gần phố cổ. Đáng để ở.

Hôm rồi mình đã đặt phòng và thanh toán qua thẻ visa, sau đấy lỡ chuyến bay và không vào được. Mình có gọi tới là mình chịu phí phòng và để cho khách khác. Khách sạn vẫn không trừ tiền thẻ dù phòng hôm đấy buộc phải để trống. Mình xin gửi lời cảm ơn sâu sắc đến chị chủ có tâm rất vịnh bắc bộ. Nhất định sẽ ghé khách sạn khi có dịp!

Đặt phòng riêng với phiếu giảm giá khác nhau. Tuyệt vời sạch sẽ. Giường đẹp. Bữa sáng ngon lành. Tất cả mọi thứ đạt được mong đợi của tôi. Nếu bạn đọc đánh giá của tôi, xin vui lòng đi trước đặt taxi với khách sạn la an central. Họ cung cấp 350 nghìn vnd mỗi chiều để chuyển bạn thành phố da nang hoặc thậm chí sân bay đến hội an. Nó rẻ hơn so với mét và lấy !!! hạnh phúc ở lại với họ!
Vị trí đẹp, phòng decor đơn giản dễ thương, nhân viên thân thiện
Giường sạch sẽ và thoải mái họ có. Bữa sáng thật tuyệt vời.
Rất đẹp, thoáng, ưng ý ngay từ khi bước chân vào. Nhân viên nhiệt tình thân thiện.
Lễ tân nhiệt tình. Chỗ thoáng. Còn mùi gỗ mới. Sẽ quay lại. Hội an 2020
Phòng mới và sạch sẽ, bữa sáng tươm tất, tầm nhìn tốt từ tầng xe đạp có sẵn cho thuê. Chúng tôi được nâng cấp phòng miễn phí do công suất thấp hehe.
Mình rất thích các bạn nhân viên ở đây, ai cũng dễ thương nhiệt tình và còn hỗ trợ khách rất ok. Cám ơn la an rất nhiều nhé. Mình đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời ở chỗ các bạn.
Rất tốt, sạch sẽ, trung tâm thị trấn nhỏ gần phố đi bộ, sạch sẽ, ăn sáng rất ngon nước dừa cũng có sẵn. Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều vì đã làm cho kỳ nghỉ của tôi hạnh phúc.
Tuyệt vời. Chị quản lí nhiệt tình thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ. Đi bộ ra phố cổ cũng khoẻ

Giờ nhận phòng là đúng 2 giờ chiều! tôi phải nói rằng nhân viên dịch vụ khách hàng tại quầy lễ tân rất khó tính trong việc bán dịch vụ vận chuyển và tour du lịch. Điều đó khiến tôi cảm thấy không thoải mái với cô ấy! tất cả xe đạp bạn cần phải trả tiền thuê, tính theo ngày. Và cũng phải tính phí cho những chai nước uống trong phòng. Các phòng rộng rãi, đẹp và sạch sẽ. Giường, chăn và gối rất thoải mái. Chúng tôi có tầm nhìn ra hồ bơi. Bữa sáng không đa dạng như các đánh giá khác nhưng chấp nhận được. Vị trí cách phố đi bộ và phố cổ hội an một quãng đi bộ ngắn.
Great vibe and nice room. Friendly and knowledgeable staff!
Phòng rất đẹp và sạch, y như hình. Nhân viên lễ tân rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại lần sau nếu đến hội an
Nên trãi nghiệm nhé....phòng sạch sẽ. Nhân viên nhiệt tình dễ thương.
Ô tô vào được nhưng hơi bất tiện vì buổi chiều có chợ đêm nên các tuyến đường bị chặn. Còn lại mọi thứ ok, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình

Vị trí lý tưởng ngay trung tâm phố cổ và các nhà hàng, bar vào ban đêm. Nội thất sạch sẽ phòng rộng rãi và giường ngủ rất êm. Tôi ở phòng 306 có sổ to thoáng tuy nhiên cần phải tạo thêm một vách ngăn với ban công phòng kế bên để có thêm sự riêng tư. Nhà hàng nhỏ nhưng phục vụ chu đáo, cám ơn chị lễ tân đã rất vui vẻ và giúp đỡ chúng tôi. Điểm 9.5 cho một khách sạn thật dễ thương.
Phòng rất tốt, sạch sẽ, nếu có đi hội an lần nữa tôi vẫn chọn nghỉ ở đây.
Chị chủ và nhân viên rất thân thiện và dễ thương. Mình gặp sự cố máy bay delay khá lâu, chị vẫn hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Phòng khách sạn rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, thoải mái. Có dịp mình sẽ quay lại
Tôi có 1 kỳ nghỉ thật tuyệt với. Nhân viên trong kháchsạn rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Sẽ đến khi có dip

Phòng mà tôi nhận được khác xa so với ảnh được đăng tải trên web, phòng tôi đặt là city view nhưng thực chất chỉ là 1 bức tường chắn ngang tầm nhìn. Phòng sạch sẽ, thoải mái, buffet sáng hơi ít món. Mọi thứ có vẻ ổn trừ việc phòng mà tôi nhận được không như những gì tôi thấy khi booking.

Tuyệt vời sạch sẽ. Giường đẹp. Ít loại món ăn sáng tự chọn nhưng nó là đủ tốt và ngon! thankiu đã nâng cấp miễn phí một trong những đặt phòng của tôi. 1 phòng khác là một chút rò rỉ. Nhưng trải nghiệm tổng thể là tuyệt vời và đạt được mong đợi của tôi
Phòng tốt, nhân viên phục vụ tốt bữa sáng là một chút quá ít.

Thật sự là không hài lòng về dịch vụ của khách sạn này. Mình book phòng deluxe double nhưng khi đến nhân viên lại cho mình lên phòng family, phòng không có bồn tắm. Phòng dọn không sạch sẽ, chai nước khách trước uống vẫn còn trong phòng. Thật sự là bực mình. Khi trả phòng nhân viên giải thích là bên em bán phòng như vậy đó. Chẳng có 1 câu xin lỗi hay mong khách thông cảm. Dịch vụ quá tệ!

Mình rất hài lòng với la an, không gian đẹp, tinh tế, rất hội an, và sau 1 hồi nói chuyện với chị quyên, chị chủ của villa này, mình biết chị quyên tự tay decor hết mình lại càng thích. Chị quyên và nhân viên đều rất nhiệt tình. Các thiết bị, đồ đạc trong phòng rất mới và đầy đủ. Từ villa có thể đi bộ ra phố cổ, gần chợ đêm, rất thuận tiện. Bữa sáng được phục vụ đầy đủ và chu đáo. Cảm ơn la an và các chị em, mình có 1 chuyến đi rất vui vẻ )

Mình book 3 phòng trên app có view city, tuy nhiên khi mình đến nhân viên bảo hết phòng và sắp xếp có 1 phòng tầng dưới nhỏ, ko có view ... Phòng cửa toilet bị kẹt, hôi và ẩm ... Mình có nhờ đổi phòng thì được nhân viên trả lời là hết phòng, nếu ở thêm thì mới đổi còn ở 1 ngày thì không đổi, mình có nói là book trên web như vậy thì nhân viên nói là trên web chỉ có 1 hình vậy thôi, chứ phòng giống nhau, giá tiền jong nhau nên không đổi ... Còn 2 phòng kia thì sạch sẽ, ăn sáng ít món, nhân viên có chị buổi sáng không biết phải chị chủ không, chị ấy vui vẻ, hồ bơi nhỏ mình nghĩ chỉ thích hợp cho bé bơi, gần chợ đêm, gần phố cổ, xe đạp cho thuê 40k/1 chiếc

Nhân viên khách sạn và chị chủ rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, buffet sáng ngon đặc biệt có món cao lầu và mì quảng nấu ngon như ở phố hội an luôn. Mình được up phòng lên hạng deluxe miễn phí, giường rất lớn (chắc size cỡ king ). Giá cả dịch vụ khác cực ổn! vị trí khách sạn ở ngay cạnh phố cổ thuận tiện đi bộ. Rất vui khi được đến đây, hẹn sẽ quay lại dịp tới
Dành cho bạn nào đang tham khảo đến đây, gần phố cổ dễ dàng di chuyển
Phòng sạch sẽ đẹp. Nhân viên và chị chủ rất thân thiện nice. Đồ ăn sáng rất ổn. Vị trí tuyệt vời. Không chê điểm gì rất recommend các bạn đến đây

Người quản lý đã không kiểm tra các yêu cầu trong ghi chú để cung cấp các dịch vụ cần thiết. Các hồ bơi nhỏ như một vũng nước. Sự vô trách nhiệm của họ đã làm xáo trộn kế hoạch của chúng tôi rằng cả buổi sáng chúng tôi phải đi bộ quanh khu phố cổ để chọn một khách sạn khác mà chúng tôi có thể có được những gì chúng tôi cần.
Tốt. Vị trí gần khách du lịch. Rất gần với cả chợ đêm và phố cổ.

Phòng sạch sẽ thoáng mát, có quạt trần, phía trước có hồ bơi, đi bộ ra phố cổ 3 phút, thuận tiện lưu trú khi đi hội an, có cơ hội ghé lại lần nữa, các chị nhân viên phục vụ rất nhiệt tình vui vẻ, nói chung mọi thứ ok
Khách sạn rất mới, sạch sẽ, hiện đại, đẹp, ăn sáng cũng ngon, nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình, gần trung tâm phố cổ. Sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè và người thân khi có dịp đến hội an
1 khách sạn 3 sao khá xứng tầm, chất lượng dịch vụ tương đối hoàn hảo. Không quá xa trung tâm nhưng cũng không quá gần cho du khách trải nghiệm hội an
Rất tốt. Thoải mái. Rất tiện đi dạo phố cổ
Khách sạn đẹp, phòng bày trí hợp lý. Nằm trong khu dân cư nên yên tĩnh nhưng nếu đi bộ thì hơi xa phố cổ.

Mình đã ở la an homestay 2 ngày khi đến hội an. Một homestay nhỏ nhắn nhưng decor cực kì đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chị chủ và nhân viên cực kì dễ thương. Bữa sáng gọi món chứ không phải buffet nhưng rất ngon, hợp khẩu vị của mình. Vị trí lý tưởng, đi đâu cũng gần. Highly recommend la an homestay cho những bạn nào có ý định du lịch hội an nha
Ngoài tiện nghi hiện đại, sạch sẽ thì chủ homestay cực kì dễ thương và thân thiện
Kỳ nghỉ rất tuyệt, chỗ ở thoải mái, mát mẻ, sạch sẽ. Chị chủ thân thiện lắm, chỉ hết các chỗ ở hội an luôn. Lấy xe đạp đi thoải mái, bữa sáng chị nấu ngon lắm.
Từ dịch vụ đến chất lượng rất hài lòng, đề xuất khách sạn này, sẽ quay lại chổ này nếu có quay lại hội an
Tốt! có thể vào được mọi nơi, tuy hình ảnh và bản gốc có hơi khác một chút nhưng vẫn thoải mái để sống.
Homestay rất sạch sẽ, chủ siêu nhiệt tình

Chủ dễ thương, phòng xinh lắm. Còn có cái ban công. Rộng rãi, thoáng mái, sạch sẽ. Nhà vệ sinh có đầy đủ (bông tăm, bàn chải đánh răng, sữa tắm, dầu dội, có cả dao cạo râu và trùm tóc luôn nhe mng). Tolet có cái gương xinh xỉu hehe. Có cả cà phê gói, trà xanh gói. Nói chung không thiếu gì cả
Trên phòng thì sạch sẽ, chăn ga mới. Nhưng phía sảnh thì lộn xộn vì đây là nhà ở vừa sinh hoạt vừa cho lưu trú nên cũng không thể đòi hỏi gì hơn.
Phòng sạch sẽ, chị chủ và chị làm phòng nhiệt tình, dễ thương, giá tốt, hỗ trợ khách hết mức

Homestay có cái biển hơi nhỏ và không mắc đèn sáng nên bọn mình đến vào buổi tối hơi khó tìm một chút. Nhưng bọn mình được anh chủ tiếp đón rất nồng hậu, nhiệt tình. Homestay xinh xắn, trang trí rất có gu, mới và sạch sẽ. Bọn mình thấy rất bất ngờ khi anh chủ thông báo bữa sáng sẽ được phục vụ miễn phí ngay tại homestay luôn (thực ra mình đoán đã có trong tiền phòng hết rồi) gồm có bánh mì madam khánh, cà phê/nước cam và 1 đĩa trái cây. Quá tiện lợi. Homestay sẽ có khoảng 4-5 chiếc xe đạp để cho khách mượn free để đi dạo thong dong trong phố cổ. Phòng bọn mình là phòng 3 người trên tầng hôm đó là rằm nên nhìn từ cửa sổ phòng có thể ngắm trăng rằm ở bên ngoài. Bàn ghế trong phòng mang hơi hướng cổ điển cùng với cái gối ôm họa tiết chim công phượng. Bạn sẽ tìm được khá nhiều góc sống ảo ở trong phòng. Phòng tắm rộng rãi sạch sẽ. Bạn nào sống theo kiểu zero waste sẽ rất thích đồ dùng trong phòng tắm, vì sữa tắm và dầu gội thay vì mua dạng gói nhỏ thì sẽ được đựng trong chai bằng gốm, còn bàn chải và kem đánh răng được đựng trong gói bằng giấy xơ dừa. Cá nhân mình rất thích mùi dầu tràm của sữa tắm và dầu gội ở đây. Điểm trừ duy nhất có lẽ là cái vòi tắm hơi hiện đại quá nên bọn mình phải loay hoay một lúc mới biết dùng )) mình nghĩ chủ nhà nên dán thêm cái note hướng dẫn sử dụng cho an toàn rất tiếc là bọn mình chỉ ở hội an 1 đêm. Lần sau quay lại hội an, chắc chắc bọn mình sẽ chọn la an cho la an 10/10 luôn 3
Chúng tôi đã đặt một phòng ban công nhưng họ đã cho chúng tôi một phòng có cửa sổ
Tuy có sự cố không mong muốn nhưng chị chủ đã giải quyết ổn thoã và nhiệt tình, rất thân thiện!
Tuyệt vời, chị chủ và nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ, thiết kế phòng đẹp. Mình sẽ quay lại khi đến hội an!

Mình đến homestay vào buổi chiều, lúc này khá nóng. Homestay lúc đó chị chủ không ở nhà và cũng không có người mang vali lên phòng giúp mình nên phải tự xách vali lên tầng phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, đón ánh nắng trực tiếp, trong nhà tắm có ô thoáng nhỏ hoa giấy có thể lách qua, nhìn khá là thơ. Homestay có xe đạp, mình thuê 2 hôm chị chủ chỉ lấy 50k. Đường đi lại cũng thuận tiện, mình đi 1m nên thấy homestay khá yên tâm
Phòng sạch sẽ, dễ thương, gần trung tâm
Phòng rất sạch đẹp, không gian thoáng mát, anh chị chủ homestay cũng rất nhiệt tình. Lần sau tới hội an mình vẫn sẽ chọn nghỉ ở đây

Có một phòng ở một mức giá rất tốt với ứng dụng. Đã đặt một phòng đôi nhưng thật ngạc nhiên khi nhận được một phòng cho ba người mặc dù danh sách nói rằng nâng cấp miễn phí. Được rồi, không giống như các homestay khác, các phòng ở đây cũng xa xỉ như trong các khách sạn, tương tự về nội thất và thiết kế hiện đại. Nhưng một lần nữa, có một khu vực chung đẹp mắt ở tầng trệt có khu vực ăn uống và phòng khách, nhắc nhở bạn rằng đây là một homestay. Thêm vào cảm giác ấm cúng của nơi này là chủ nhà ấm áp, thân thiện. Họ không nói nhiều tiếng anh, nhưng họ cố gắng giúp đỡ. Bữa sáng miễn phí! họ sẽ cho bạn một đĩa trứng và thịt xông khói hoặc một bát phở, trong số rất nhiều món ăn (nhưng bạn phải gọi món tối hôm trước). Về vị trí, nơi này khá xa so với phố cổ (khoảng 20 phút đi bộ), nhưng với xe đạp và xe hơi của grab bây giờ ở hội an, bạn có thể đến đó với giá rẻ. Nói chung, đây là homestay tốt nhất tôi từng ở việt nam, hoặc châu á cho vấn đề đó. Sẽ ở lại đây một lần nữa trong một nhịp tim! ps không thường xuyên là phòng phù hợp với hình ảnh trên các trang web đặt phòng, nhưng cái này thì có.
Nơi tốt đẹp với những người tốt. Vị trí tốt. Không xa khu phố cổ. Mọi thứ đều sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp.
Cơ sở mới, thân thiện, sạch sẽ
Phòng sạch sẽ thoáng mát. Gần trung tâm có dịch vụ cho thuê xe máy với xe đạp nha moi nguoi
Phòng của homestay sạch sẽ, thoải mái và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chủ cơ sở vui vẻ, thân thiện homestay gần phố cổ hội an tiện lợi trong di chuyển, đi lại!
Rất dễ chịu, chị chủ nhà siêu dễ thương, nhà sạch sẽ mình ở căn gác mái có balcon rất mát, lần sau tiếp tục quay lại
Một homestay tuyệt vời, chị chủ rất dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhận phòng sớm mà không phụ thêm phí. Đồ vệ sinh cá nhân rất đầy đủ.
Trải nghiệm ở la an khá thoải mái. Homestay sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên cũng rất thân thiện. Khoảng cách từ home đến bãi biển và phố cổ cũng rất gần

Homestay giá rất phải chăng, phòng đẹp, decor xinh, chị chủ và con gái hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, có cho thuê xe đạp sẵn và dọn phòng hàng ngày. Em đến sớm trước giờ nhận phòng gần 2 tiếng chị chủ đã hỗ trợ nhận phòng miễn phí trước. Lần tới ghé hội an chắc chắn sẽ tiếp tục ở đây ạ

Bước đến homestay là cảm giác ấm cúng và các anh chị ở đó vô cùng nhiệt tình luôn, phòng đẹp và sạch sẽ lắm, ăn sáng đạm bạc đầm chất việt nam, điểm 10 cho la an homestay vì đi ra phố cổ cũng gần chỉ mất 2-3 . Mình recommend các bạn tới hội an nên ở đây nhé

Đây là khách sạn / homestay yêu thích của chúng tôi ở việt nam cho đến nay là phòng lớn và sạch sẽ có ban công riêng, wifi nhanh, tắm nước nóng, mượn xe đạp miễn phí, vị trí rất tốt chỉ 5-10 phút đạp xe đến phố cổ.

Phòng rất sạch và thoáng, với giá phòng phù hợp cùng với chất lượng tốt như 1 khách sạn thì nơi đây rất phù hợp để có thể nghỉ ngơi và vui chơi. Buổi sáng thì được anh chị chủ chuẩn bị bữa sáng với thực đơn rất dễ lựa chọn tuỳ theo sở thích của khách (1 món chính, tráng miệng và nước uống). Mình sẽ quay lại đây khi đến hội an, 1 nơi tuyệt vời

Home stay rất xinh xắn, anh chị chủ và các bạn nhân viên gần gũi nên cảm giác như ở nhà người quen. Mình bận công việc nên còn được anh chị cho mượn máy tính làm việc suốt vài giờ. Địa điểm cũng yên tĩnh, đi ra biển an bàng 3km và ra phố cổ chưa tới 2km. P/s anh chị nhớ bảo dưỡng xe đạp thường xuyên nhé. Sẽ quay lại nếu trở lại hội an
Homestay rất tuyệt vời, đẹp và sạch sẽ. Đồ dùng đều mới và sạch nên mình rất thích. Anh chị chủ còn rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Nếu quay lại hội an chắc chắn mình sẽ lại ở đây thêm lần nữa.

Phòng rất sạch đẹp. 10/10 khách sạn mới thoáng mát đồ đạc mới tinh. Giá tốt so với các khách sạn trong khu vực. Đồ ăn được chọn đa dạng. Được chị chủ cho mượn xe đạp free dạo quanh phố cổ. Lần sau tới hội an nhất định sẽ quay lại.
Khách sạn rất mới. Chủ thân thiện. Hãy ghé thăm thử nếu bạn thích
Đó là một ngôi nhà mới xây, rất đẹp và sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà là siêu chào đón. Tôi thích nó.
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ thơm tho, nói chung mình rất hài lòng.
Phòng xinh, có ban công, gần phố cổ, chủ dễ thương, mỗi là hong xó thang máy thôi nà
Phòng rất ổn, sạch sẽ thoáng mát, nước mạnh. Từ homestay ra phố cổ cũng tiện. Có 1 điểm nhỏ nếu như homestay thân thiện hơn thì mình đánh giá 10 điểm (ví dụ ra vào chào hỏi khách, hỏi han khách )
Giá rẻ, phòng đẹp, gần phố cổ, có dọn phòng mỗi ngày. Chị chủ quá dễ thương, mình sẽ ghé lại

Giá 450k mà phòng nhỏ hơn mình nghĩ. Không có ai đứng quầy, cần hỏi cũng không biết hỏi ai, đèn trong p không có đèn sáng, đèn kiểu lờ mờ đèn vàng ấy ạ ) tối mà về p là tối mò lun. Dọn phòng thường xuyên, tương đối sạch sẽ. Mình không chụp hình lại. Được cái cũng khá gần phố cổ, tiện đi lại
Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, vị trí đắc địa, không gian ấm cúng và dịch vụ đầy đủ. Nếu chất lượng wi-fi cải thiện hơn thì rõ ràng là không còn gì để có thể băn khoăn nữa.
Khách sạn quá tốt trong tầm giá, phòng ốc mới, vị trí ok, nhân viên thân thiện.

Homestay nằm trên trục đường chính, gần khu phố cổ khá tiện cho việc đi lại. Nhà mới, phòng siêu xinh, trang thiết bị trong phòng mới. Chị nhân viên và chị chủ nhiệt tình chỉ cho mình chỗ ăn chơi các kiểu. Mình rất hài lòng với homestay này. Lần sau đến sẽ book tiếp d
Thích hợp cho kỳ nghỉ trang mật, phòng sạch sẽ
Phòng đẹp, mới, sạch sẽ. Chị chủ thân thiện chu đáo nhiệt tình. Dù mình phải bay sớm hơn giờ ăn sáng, anh chị vẫn đi mua bánh mì cho mang theo.. Nếu quay lại hội an nhất định chọn la an
Great hotel in a quiet street . Hotel owners are super friendly and run a nice clean property.

Unfreundlicher empfang, sollte für (gebuchtes!) kind (7) nochmal extra zahlen. Sie arbeiten angeblich nicht mit hotels.com zusammen. Außerdem wurde versucht, reisen in die umgebung aufzuschwatzen. Positiv ist die zentrale lage. Pool und frühstück waren auch gut. Würde trotz der unannehmlichkeiten zu beginn wieder kommen.

Anna and lily were such gracious hosts! the hotel is a few blocks from the vibrant but loud night markets- this hotel was gratefully quiet for guests. Our room had comfortable beds and toiletries, the breakfast was very nice each day providing some buffet with made to order eggs.

If youre looking for a local experience in hoi a with great staff who will organise travel for you, tours for you and also are overall friendly and warm this is a great place for you to choose. The rooms are small but clean and the beds are comfortable. The location is right in the middle of old town and you are immersed in the locals there as well and a short 100m to the night market and bars. It s quiet there from the hustle and bustle and close to the river. Lily and anna are amazing and you will have a great time with their guidance.

We loved our stay at la an old town hotel. Anna and lily looked after us, making sure we had everything we needed and helping us organise activities. The location was so convenient - just a couple of minutes walk to fabulous restaurants, the old town, and the night markets. Great value for money.
Very nice and good
Was a lovely place to stay. So close to the old town yet very quiet at night. Very friendly staff and a very good breakfast. Would have no hesitation in staying there again!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at la an old town hotel. It is an older building, but very charming.the breakfast was great, with choices for all. It has a very quaint wooden bathtub and sink, nice touches making it be memorable . The staff including anna,lilly and support staff made us feel welcome. They will help you plan any excursions, or you can just explore on your own. The neighbourhood was quiet, just far enough away from the nightlife along the river. Nightmarket and many restaurants, all very walkable.

The staff sit us down and booked a bunch of excursions for us. Everything was on the expensive side and a long distance from the hotel. I found out later that all of the things she booked us for were with in easy walking distance from the hotel. We spent a lot on taxis not happy about that

Lily was an amazing host. So helpful with booking our activities. The hotel is in the perfect location just behind the hustle and bustle but peaceful on its street. We booked the family suite which gave us pretty much the whole top floor. Heaps of space!! will be back again next time.

Pessoal excelente no atendimento cordiais, cuidadosos, atenciosos. O quarto, sempre limpo, também reflete os elogios do hotel. A localização fica no território mais movimentado de hoi an, embora não se escuta o barulho da agitação. O café da manhã também é farto!
Välj inte ett rum med balkong. Går inte ens att sitta på den. Luktar väldigt fuktigt i hotellet.

The room was very good, with a comfortable bed and a small balcony to get some fresh air. We only stayed one night, but the staff took such a good care of us the whole time. It s a place where one feels in good hands. Thank you

Was a nice stay with friendly staff. Be aware once you arrive the staff have to try upsell tours to you. In my case after travelling 12 hours overnight i was ready to go to my room, but was pushed tours even though i wasn t interested. Once checked in this wasn t an issue any more and the staff were friendly and accommodating.

This place was great. Close to the old town by thu bon river, the chaos of the night life, but very easily walk away quiet. The most noise is kids playing in the street during the day, which was pretty cute. Tons of options for food nearby. Rented bicycles that made it so easy to get to the rice fields explore a bit. The place was clean, alot of light. The shower was unique, no shower curtain the drain is behind the toilet. Definitely different, but you dry the floor with a towel turn on the fan. Bed is comfy. Walls a bit thin but nothing ear plugs cant help. Breakfast was delicious, mix of local western varities. So many fruits. They do offer to giv you to go if you have an early transfer out. Staff are lovely so helpful. I did use the pool even though it was much too cold for it - wanted to test it out its also very unique. Definitely recommend this spot!

Fabulous stay at a lovely hotel, perfect location close to everything in the old town. Super comfy bedding and the staff were all so lovely and accommodating- allowing us to extend our stay on 2 separate occasions. Totally recommend this hotel for your stay in hoi an.
Wonderful staff, room was ok but wifi was horrible, could not work at hotel!

The room was beautiful and the location perfect. But what really made the stay most enjoyable was the excellent hospitality of lily and anna who made us feel so welcome and supported throughout our stay in hoi an.
Very nice hotel to stay in hoi an. Lily the receptionist is always willing to help with any questions you might have. I would recommend this place and would definitely be back if i visited again.

Très bien située et offre un bon petit-déjeuner. Le personnel est attentionné et toujours prêt à aider. Toutefois, notre chambre était très humide et il y avait une odeur de moisissures. La peinture du bas de mur étaient écaillée et les oreillers avaient une très mauvaise odeur, ce qui est dommage.

The hotel could use some refurbishing but i understand properties in vietnam (if not major chains) are older and charming. This hotel was definitely charming and located in a very ideal location close to shops and restaurants and the night market. I am giving it 3 stars for the strangeness of the bathroom which is one open space. Also, the outlet has a panel which makes it also impossible to plug if you are using an adapter. I would like to give 10 stars, however, to the wonderful and helpful staff. Overall, good hotel if you plan to stay a couple of night. By the way, daily breakfast is exceptional!!

We stayed two nights, loved that hotel was located in old town. Disliked the loud neighbors we had at night. Lili and ana were very helpful in booking our tours. The hotel could be cleaner especially bed and restroom. It s a very affordable stay so knew it was not going to be top notch. We felt safe and it was ok.
It was excellent for the price and the hotel staff were so kind and helpful. Would stay again.
Wonderful place. Best location quiet but close to everything. Anna was fantastic. Would stay again when back in hoi an

The staff were nice enough however the hotel was awful. Quite possibly the worst place i ve ever stayed. The room, bathroom, towels and bedding were dirty. Lots of things were broken or breaking inside the room with electrical wires exposed. After one night i left the hotel and found accommodation elsewhere as i couldn t stay any longer and the facilities were so poor i couldn t even bring myself to shower in the dirty bathroom or use their towels. The hot items at breakfast were cold and when i opted for cold options the cereals etc were stale and the options of both hot and cold foods were extremely limited. Also be warned the hotel is located on the central island in hoi an and when the river flooded you had to walk through knee deep water to get to the hotel and this is a regular occurrence. Due to the proximity to the street market the roads near the hotel close so you can only access the hotel by foot. The hotel is also not accessibility friendly with steps up from the street and stairs up to all rooms in the property. Avoid at all costs.

Great location, block away from the night market and right across the river from all the shops and restaurants. Nice breakfast and awesome staff. Even though you re so close to all the nightlife i found it nice and quiet for a great nights sleep. The cool pool was a great way to wash away the stickiness from a day about town. I enjoyed my stay. Thank ladies!

We stayed at la ann for the second time during a recent visit to hoi an. The beds are the best - soft, fluffy and clean. Ann and lily at reception are the best. Thank you so much and for organising the docter when one of my kids got sick, ann. We really appreciate it and will be back. Bobby.

The staff is the strongest part of this establishment. From the front house and to the back. Bed is extremely comfortable. My only gripe might be room dependent. The walls had mould and the balcony door wouldn t lock. It has a shared balcony with the neighbor. At its price point, it still hold value depending on your comfort tolerance. To circle back, the staff is absolutely hospitable from the beginning and end.
Underbart läge. Otrolig personal, så vänliga och hjälpsamma. Hjälpte till med allt från tvätt till underbara restaurangtips och bokning av utflykter. Jättesköna sängar.
The staff was nice. The hotel location was convenient close the night market. There was, however, a really bad odor coming from the shower in our room. They should get this fixed.

Anna is a doll, and the support staff was tremendous. They all made sure my stay in the area was full of activities, ease and comfort. I ll be going to the same spot next year. Thank you, and see you, again!
ホテルのサービスは必要十分です 朝食も品数があり 満足いくものでした メインストリートからは離れていますが その分静かに過ごすことができます 隣の部屋の声は多少聞こえます
Very nice staff. Great recommendations from ann and lily.
スタッフがとても親切で笑顔いっぱいで迎え入れてくださいました 建物は古いですが ホイアンの街歩きには最高です

The staff are amazing here. Ana was the best host and took amazing care of us. She gave us fun ideas of things to do and booked the tickets for us. We did the cooking class with coconut boats and the night lantern boat with the memories show and both were definitely worth the money. The location is very convenient to the ancient city and within a very short walk to amazing food options.
The hotel is very nice and clean. The rooms however just need some more facilities such as mirrors, tables and chairs, etc.

Great little hotel on the old town island. Located a street back from the main bar area but no noise on a night. Straight over the bridge to shopping and coffee. Fantastic staff that will attempt to sell you tours and experiences for a reasonable price. Little hotel pool to cool down in. Would / will definitely stay again.

The staff were some of the friendliest people i ve come across. All quite skilled in speaking english and always ready to give advice or book tours etc. Breakfast was always lovely and fresh. These rustic style rooms feel really appropriate for this ancient town. Hoi an.. All round great value for money. Super location.

The design of la a definitely fits in well with the surrounding charm of hoi an. Even better is the location walking distance to old town or stay near by at night for the night markets and bars. Customer service was exceptional too!

Great location within walking distance to the city centre of hoi an yet really peaceful and quiet at night. The room was great, the shower in the wooden bathtub was a little bit odd but good. Breakfast was alright. Overall excellent price/value! bike rental possible, but bikes pretty crappy. Motorbike was good. Why i can only give 4 stars and not 5 stars is the very aggressive approach right on arrival of talking us into booking additional tours or visiting an open air show etc. I found that pretty annoying to be honest. You can say no to all this but it will take some energy away from you ) additional travel advice have dinner at morning glory signature restaurant, 1st floor balcony, make a reservation! you will not regret that )
ホテルはどこに行くにも便利なロケーションにあり それでいて静かでとても落ち着ける環境です そして何よりスタッフがフレンドリーでとても親切 中でもスタッフのanaさんのホスピタリティには感動します またぜひ泊まりに来たいホテルです
Great location, rooms/ beds and staff.. Cleaning needs attention..
We had a great bu the receptionist kept asking us for our interests n booking tours from the day we arrived. We were tired and didn t need a sales speech.

Anna and lilly were excellent. Couldn t do eneough to make our stay better. But there some serious issues with the plumbing and the room cleaning staff did not replenish items used. That being said, i would still stay there again because of the beautiful staff.
Meravellosa, el millor servei que hem tingut fins ara. Qualitat preu més que recomanable. L espai podria estar una mica més cuidat.
The staff was too pushy in trying to get me to book tours.
Staff we re really friendly and helpful every thing was fine except no lift
The staff very friendly, the hotel was nice for the price, rooms had everything you need, wifi not great the staff couldn t fault, breakfast was nice
Very comfortable bed, clean and authentic surroundings, wonderful breakfast, very friendly and helpful staff. Thank you!

Lovely stay at this charming hotel just off the busy streets in old town but so nice and quiet. Wonderful, friendly staff, nice size room and the pool was refreshing after a hot day. Staff were so helpful with booking trips and local suggestions too. Would love to stay again

hotelName: La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn đẹp, phong cách cổ, phục vụ chu đáo.

hotelName: La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Khách sạn rất ok, nhà mình đi hội an chỉ toàn ở khách sạn này. Các bạn nhân viên rất thân thiện. Hôm mình đi vào ngày trong tuần, do khách sạn có phòng suite nên nhà mình được up lên phòng luôn. Và các bạn nói nếu hôm đó khách sạn có phòng cao hơn mình đặt, thì họ sẽ up lên cho khách.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Hotel is just on the edge of hoi an. Although does have a good bus service into town and an bang beach. Hotel beautiful. Rooms accumulated and tidy. Food beautiful. Staff very helpful and friendly. Upgraded due to my birthday

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Amazing stay and i would absolutely return. Great customer service, beautiful pools, rooms were nice and they provided so many services like transportation/laundry/new years celebration. 15 min walk from town which was perfect to get out of the busy areas

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This is a lovely hotel that s only a 10 minute walk to the old town. The pool and spa facilities are great. The staff were lovely and really helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel for a relaxing stay.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Amazing experience and service. We were welcomed by mr. Hoang who took very personal care of us during our entire stay from recommendations to free upgrades - he connected with whatsapp from check-in which made everything (big or small) very smooth! never seen a personal service like this at any other resort before. Room were exceptional quality and above and beyond for a family with small kids. Convenient to hoi a town (taxi or walk) but still far enough to make you feel living in a resort away from hustle and bustle. Property is very well maintained and has great amenities! highly recommend the stay here

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This hotel was amazing! one of the best hotel i have stayed at. The best service is they offer is the person who checks you in gives you their what s app phone number and they are available for you to message with any questions etc remy was allocated to us and he was amazing. He even made recommendations for a tailor, best bahn mi and dinner options. He even made bookings for us at restaurants in old town for us. Hotel is clean and the spa is world class. We will be back

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: すごくコスパが良いと感じました スタッフは日本語を理解してくれていてとても助かりました

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 직원들 친절 그자체에 한국어 영어 잘하고 시설 좋아요. 리조트라 문이 다 나무문이라 좀 불편?바깥소음 방음 안되는건 좀 있지만 별로 안신경쓰임.. 조식도 너무 맛있고 룸 청소도 잘되어있구요. 수영장시설이 너무 좋아서 진짜 다음번에 또 방문할거에요. 티비에 유튜브랑 넷플릭스도 되고 짱 좋았음. 리셉션있는 외곽숙소로 요청해서 받았는데, 배달이나 자주 나가시는 분들은 외곽 추천해요. 동선이 짧아져서 편함 보통 서양분들이 많이오던데 메인풀이랑 붙어있는 안쪽으로 가더라구요? 근데 넓어서 길 잃어버림 주의ㅋㅋㅋ

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Such a beautiful hotel! the service was great, the breakfast was good, the room was stunning. We really enjoyed staying here, and we would definitely stay here again! it doesn t look big from the front, but it s big! it was sort of rainy season so we didn t swim, but they have 3 pools so plenty of space to swim.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Fantastisk hyggeligt hotel i udkanten af byen. Stadig i gåafstand og ellers gratis lån af cykler som vi brugte meget til både stranden og byen om aftenen. Dejlig grøn oase med super lækker morgenmad. Aftensmaden i den vestlige restaurant var ok men heller ikke mere

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Everything was great. My only (minor) criticism is that the room was a little noisy during the day. Workmen were drilling on an upstairs floor. And a heated pool would be good for winter months? staff were wonderful - it s part of the vietnamese character to be kind and thoughtful. Would stay again without hesitation.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Executive suite was just perfect. Staff absolutely 5 star service. Zero complaints we will be back!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 리조트 치고는 규모가 크지않으나 직원들이 친절하고 조경이 잘 되어있고, 관리가 잘 되며 아늑한 분위기의 숙소임 아침조식도 훌륭합니다

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: フロントスタッフがとても親切で 送迎車に忘れ物をしてしまった際 親身に相談に乗ってくれ 無事に手元に戻りました 素敵なホテルでした

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 市街地の喧騒から離れた場所にあり落ち着いた雰囲気で過ごせる場所で 離れているといってもgrabで32,000ドン/5分くらいで中心街に移動できます 施設内にはホテル棟(本館/新館)/スパ棟/ジム棟に加えて3つのプールを備えており広い敷地内に良い感じで設置されており 庭園的な歩道も相まって散歩にも向いています さて 今回はclassicalwingのファミリーツインに5泊しました 部屋は結構広めでアメニティ(バスローブ/タオル/歯ブラシ/シェーバー等)も充実し 部屋の清掃も毎日行き届いて気持ちよく過ごせました 朝食はredbeansでビュッフェスタイルにて 毎日異なる料理(ベトナム料理メイン)が供されてフォースタンド/エッグスタンドが非常に良かったし 生野菜やしぼりたてジュースも嬉しい品ぞろえでした レセプションのスタッフはフレンドリーで確り英語も通じて レストラン/見所もお勧めしてくれるし予約もとってくれるようです ちなみに 旧市街地/アンバンビーチにはシャトルバスが出ていて今回は使いませんでしたが 活用したらより楽しめると思います ただ 飛行機が遅れてc/iが遅い時間になったので確り説明をしてもらえなかったことや 部屋の空調の寒さ(雨季/冬なのに冷房 ) そして朝食会場でスタッフが異様に話しかけてきた点はngですね 総じて良いホテルではありましたが 改善点も散見されました

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 깨끗하고 직원들이 친절해서 아주 만족스러웠음

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: A wonderful place to stay.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent service. Staff is amazing willing to assist with any questions or concerns. Excellent breakfast. We had the opportunity to have dinner at one of their restaurants and it was amazing. As a platinum member, i have been around quite a lot and this was one of the best hotels we have stayed at. Kwuang ( forgive me if didn t spell right) was sooo nice and helpful. His recommendations were right on point . Will stay here again if i decide to visit this great city again.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Absolutely beautiful resort , first class infinity swimming pool , room was amazing spotless clean , food was delicious, all the staff are very friendly helpful, but big thankyou to hoang guest relations officer who goes above beyond to make your stay memorable. I would recommend return to this resort , infact my daughter is returning next week with her partner as she was so impressed , has cancelled her other hotel booking . La siesta resort offer a complimentary shuttle bus service in to town to the beach where they have a beach club , the beach was a tropical paradise we had lovely lunch at their restaurant, we also made use of the complimentary sun beds my my daughter enjoyed the very well priced cocktails during happy hour at the gorgeous infinity pool !

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This was my first time visiting vietnam, and this resort and spa instantly became a place i ll always treasure. Nestled in a lush, tropical rainforest setting, the atmosphere was both serene and enchanting like stepping into a dream. The calming energy, thoughtful design, and magical ambiance created a deeply restorative experience. From the moment i arrived, the customer service was exceptional. Every staff member from the front desk to the spa therapists and dining team was warm, welcoming, and genuinely attentive. Always smiling, always acknowledging, they made me feel seen and valued throughout my stay. The food was another highlight fresh, delicious, and made with locally sourced ingredients. It s something i deeply appreciate and wholeheartedly support. Every bite reflected care and quality. I treated myself to two long massages, and both were among the best i ve ever had expertly delivered in an immaculate, peaceful space. The spa staff had a true gift for healing and relaxation. Leaving this place was bittersweet. It was more than a vacation it was a soul-refreshing experience. I ll carry the memories with me, and without question, i know exactly where i ll return when i need to feel grounded, cared for, and inspired again.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The staff is very friendly.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful relaxing hotel

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful grounds and facilities, excellent food at all of the restaurants, great pools, but above all incredible service. 10 out of 10.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: We have been to some fantastic hotels over the years, la siesta is first class.the breakfast in the morning has everything you could ever want and if you would like something that is not there, they will get it for you. The service is excellent from housekeeping to reception. Built in an oasis of plants, but convenient to get to the ancient town .we can t help but keep returning.this is how hotels should be managed, faultless.andy and tina uk

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: とても綺麗で良かったです また利用したい

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel itself is fine. We didn t get off to a good start when our first meal on arrival was not very good. The fridge in our room was not very cold. All our other meals were fine and we were able to get an ice bucket to remedy the not so cold fridge. The one big problem i had at the resort was the staff. They have obviously been trained to engage with guests and check that everything is ok. The conversation would then progress to what your plans were and the weather. It went on forever. This is lovely until it reaches the point that you are constantly interrupted and hassled incessantly. It was over the top. The resorts training needs to include when to back off and stop annoying the guest and let them have a holiday!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: プールが多くて良い

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: こちらのホテルを予約して本当によかった チェックインから最後までどなたと話しても丁寧でした 従業員の方々はすれ違うときもちゃんと挨拶してくれますし とても気持ちが良かったです 又 お部屋もですが ホテル自体の装飾がとてもかわいくて毎日癒されてました ダナン ホイアンのホテルに何ヶ所か泊まりましたが 一番朝食が美味しかったと思います 欧米の方や韓国の方が多かったイメージですが 日本の方も2組ほどいらっしゃいました 気になったことと言えばトイレ 扉はありますが個室ではないため 毎度主人にバルコニーに出てもらったりして不便でした 日本人あるあるかもしれません 今回お祝いを兼ねての利用だったのですが 事前のやり取りからスムーズでベットの装飾も嬉しかったです 総合的にみたら最高のホテルでした

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The experience was wonderful, with a relaxing atmosphere and a clean, well-maintained environment. The serene and calming ambiance added to the overall enjoyment. The staff delivered exceptional service, ensuring a pleasant and memorable visit. The facilities were clean, contributing to the sense of comfort and luxury. Everything was thoughtfully arranged, making it easy to unwind and fully appreciate the setting. It was a truly delightful experience, leaving a lasting positive impression.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent customer services from every department. Beautiful design of the complex and each room. Swimming pool designs are breathtaking. Beds are clean and comfortable. Breakfast selections are endless and delicious. I left my very expensive reading glasses behind for 3 days and they still had it when i rang back. Now that s impressive. We stayed in this hotel twice already and will not stay anywhere else in hoi an other than this.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: An absolutely amazing stay! everything was simply perfect. The hospitality was outstanding every staff member greeted us with a warm smile, and their friendliness made us feel so welcome throughout our stay. The spa was incredibly relaxing i ended up going every single day because it felt that good! dinners at every restaurant were delicious, and the attentive service made each meal feel extra special. For breakfast, the com hoi was a standout, and honestly, all the food was amazing. There were so many beautiful pools to enjoy we were never bored, and our child had a blast. Even the gentleman at the convenience store next door was so kind, which added a nice touch to the whole experience. I would absolutely love to come back. This trip gave us the most wonderful memories!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Notre séjour a été parfait, beaucoup de services offerts, bon déjeuner, literie très confirtable, super piscines. Rien à dire de négatif !

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic hotel, beautiful grounds and rooms, huge bed! food at breakfast and dinner was delicious, lots of choice.we loved our stay wouldn t hesitate to recommend

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This is a beautiful oasis just outside hoi an old town. Rooms are clean with modern amenities, good ac etc. Restaurants onsite were very good as well and staff are all superb..especially miss lan who we met on our last visit to hoi an 2 years ago. Will definitely come back if we get the chance.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel staff so helpful

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This property was amazing. Great friendly and helpful staff, beautiful grounds including pools, wonderful food at the restaurants, and great spa. Located just outside of old town only 10-15 walk to there which made it nice to not be right inside old town. Even though a room upgrade was not offered or mentioned at checkin, they immediately contacted me with an upgrade after i had reviewed the checkin process. The only minor thing i wish they would add would be shuttle service to old town after 3pm (that s the latest shuttle). Overall this was a great hotel that i would highly recommend and i would definitely stay there again.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent and very friendly personal, cozy and clean rooms, convenient and beautiful facilities. Once we back in hoi an, will stay there again!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Good service

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very well maintained property with great service.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Great property well maintained, good service, location is convenient.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic peaceful hotel on the eastern edge of town. Only a 10 min walk to the edge of the old town area or a 40-50k vnd grab ride. Staff are excellent.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: This property was like living in paradise, every accommodation block had its own swimming pool, the largest pool was salt water, the restaurants were excellent and both were open for breakfast options and the night time dining was excellent one being western style and the other being asian style. Our room was huge, with separate room with a spa bath tub and showers. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. I liked the way one of the restaurant bars gave you 2 happy hour options, one at normal happy hour times and the other at 8pm time. The hotel is about 1km from the action of hoi an and that made it quieter and only a couple of dollars in a cab so we loved this aspect of it

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful hotel. Pools are amazing. Breakfast is great and staff is super amicable

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 美しい中庭で繋がった小規模な棟に分かれており 別荘に滞在しているような気分を味わえる 複数あるレストランも趣があり美味しい アレルギーを持つ同行者がいたが スタッフの気配りも素晴らしかった

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: We stayed at la siesta hoi a resort for two nights with two adults and two children ( 11 and 13 years old ). Our room was two stories and plenty of space for us. Room was very clean and pretty. We had dinner and breakfast at hotel restaurant. Staff are very kind, helpful and friendly. Food was wonderful. Especially we liked breakfast. Breakfast is buffet style and but also we can order food such as french toast, pancake, egg benedict, local vietnam food at the table. There were many fresh juice and nice coffee. I loved iced coconut coffee. I had body massage at la spa at this hotel and that was awesome. My children enjoyed swimming in the pool and adults enjoyed happy hour time ( vietnam beer) at the pool side. All staff at this hotel were very polite, kind, helpful and friendly. When we leave from this hotel, we missed them a lot. Thank you for lovely time and we really want to come back here sometimes.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: A relaxing place to stay ! the staff and hotel facilities are fantastic !

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Oase van rust terwijl er voor het resort mega druk verkeer was. Heerlijke kamer hadden we met goede bedden. Personeel was super vriendelijk en niets was te gek.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The staff here are outstanding! very personalized and walk you through the check in process including to your room. They contacted me through whatsapp to ensure if i had questions they were there too help. The hotel itself is wonderful and would stay again in a heartbeat.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: La siesta is a quiet and relaxing place to stay within walking distance of the busy old town centre of hoi an. The room, garden, restaurant and pools are just beautiful. The staff were excellent and everyone was helpful and friendly, making our stay very special.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 편리한 체크인서비스 친절한 직원의 상세한 정보로 알차게 여행했어요 무료 셔틀, 무료 자전거대여 그리고 식음료 할인까지 너무 만족했습니다ㆍ

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Amazing property with luxurious living! the staff will treat you like royalty and you are a motorcycle ride away from the heart of hoi an. This property has the best spa in hoi an and offers 4 pools to relax at! they also have great relationships with local tailors if you are coming in for custom clothing. Everything about this property is worth a visit and stay here. I m planning to return to hoi an and i will be staying here again. Highly recommend!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Super friendly staff and really well thought hospitality.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Warm greetings from korea. I recently had the pleasure of staying at your beautiful hotel in da nang, and even after returning home, the heartfelt memories from our visit still linger vividly. I felt compelled to write and express my sincere gratitude especially to ms. Quynh (chloe), who made our stay truly exceptional. From the moment we checked in until the time we departed, ms. Quynh s thoughtfulness and attentiveness were consistently remarkable. Thanks to her kindness, our entire trip became filled with joyful and unforgettable moments. Most notably, in celebration of my girlfriend s birthday, she arranged a lovely congratulatory message on our bed, which made the occasion extra meaningful. When we experienced a minor issue with our room, she was the first to come and help, handling the situation swiftly and professionally. What could have been a stressful situation instead became a special memory, all thanks to ms. Quynh s genuine care and warmth. She consistently checked in on us to ensure we were comfortable and went out of her way to recommend delicious vietnamese dishes during breakfast adding a personal and memorable touch to each morning. La siesta hoi an resort spa is truly fortunate to have such a gem in ms. Quynh. Because of her, we are already looking forward to returning on our next trip to da nang. Once again, thank you for such an unforgettable experience. Warm regards,

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Our first time to stay in hoi an, and we pick the la siesta hotel and spa. This is the birthday celebration for my husband, and staff emily from the temple was so helpful by arranging a lava chocolate cake at night. Also, long ngoc from the front office shows their passion to assist us during our stay. We would definitely return to this hotel for our next trip to hoi an

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic, lovely property and room and people

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Unbelievable stay once again ! u won t get better in hoi an !! it s a little oasis in the busy town !! as returning guests we got an upgrade again and chloe who checked us in was fantastic ! make sure u book a suite so u can have breakfast in the less busy temple restaurant food selection was outstanding and all the staff are friendly and attentive nothing to fault again !!!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: I would definitely recommend this property. The resort is beautifully set-up, with all facilities and good rooms (stayed in junior suite). The key downside is that this is a 20 to 25 minute walk from the main area and the hotel shuttle runs at very limited intervals. The 3 separate pools are excellent and staff is very helpful. The breakfast was good and had variety and the team was superb. The only cons for my stay were that there was not separator between the shower area and room in one room (in our second room there was a sheer curtain). The sheets though clean, had a lot of stains.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: An excellent hotel set in beautiful grounds and gardens. It has no fewer than four swimming pools and two great restaurants. The staff are incredibly helpful and did everything to help me enjoy my stay. It is a little way out of the centre requiring a 15 minute walk to the edge of the old town. However, taxis and rides are easily available. I ate twice in the temple restaurant and the food was very good.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Wonderful resort, super clean, amazing garden and there s 3 pools to choose from. The staff are all so friendly, attentive and speak really good english. Rooms are clean, spacious. High recommended, only a short taxi ride to the own town.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 직원들이 정말 친절하고 처리가 아주 빠르고 정확했어요. 고객이 뭘 원하는지 단번에 알아듣고 여러가지 방안을 제시해주셨어요. 모두 웃는 얼굴로 세심하게 기분은 어떤지 필요한 것은 없는지 여쭤봐주셔서 정말 최고였어요. 방 컨디션도 정말 깨끗하고 관리가 잘되어있었어요. 에어컨도 정말 빵빵하고... 수영장이 4곳이라 정말 좋았어요. 룸서비스도 맛있고 좋았어요. 다낭가는 모든 분들께 추천할 예정입니다. 한국말을 잘하는 직원분이 계셨는데 너무 친절해서 성함을 여쭙고싶었는데 연차셔서 리뷰에 감사인사를 전합니다.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 라시에스타 수영장이 깊어서 아이들이 좋아했어요 호이안 올드타운 그랩타면 가까워서 좋았어요

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: スタッフが親切でした

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 到着後 部屋のエアコンから酷い水漏れ すぐに修理に来てくれたが 治らず 結局 部屋を変わる事になったが 提供された部屋はアップグレードで4人部屋となり とても広く快適であった お詫びとして 翌朝の朝食時にゼネラルマネージャーより 滞在中の夕食一回 レットビーンズでのベトナム料理のセットメニュー の無料のサービスと スパを40パーセント引きにしていただけるご案内をいただいた エアコン故障の為 外食する時間がなくなったので ホテル内のテンプルレストランで夕食をとったが 驚くほど美味しくて 滞在中リピートすることとなった 出だしは悪かったものの 最終的には 最高によい思い出となる滞在となった 物腰し柔らかなゼネラルマネージャーの応対は ホテルの品の良さと サービスの高さを感じました 必ずまたリピートしたいホテルです

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: All very good

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Rundum super und perfekt!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Calm and close to old town. Want to visit again soon

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 모든면에서 매우 좋았음

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: とても静かで 朝一番のプールは最高 デッキチェアーに美しく巻かれたタオル プルメリアの花が飾られている 客室はちょっとクラシカル過ぎかな ゆっくり連泊が良いと思いました

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Completely amazing hotel !

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Wow. What an awesome experience that was staying at la siesta! amazing place, great room, the friendliest staff i have ever met and the food was incredible. Highly recommend and we will be back.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 4인가족 멋진 휴식 올드타운에서 걸어서 10분 거리라 지내기에 상당히 쾌적하고 조용합니다 참고로 올드타운은 새벽 까지 노래소리 시끄러워요 자전거 대여, 수영장, 식사, 모든것이 완벽했습니다.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful property on outskirts of hoi an. Stunning pools, elegant comfortable rooms, great staff (thank you to the lovely sunny), good restaurants. Perfect!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very clean friendly staff good food

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Extremely nice place! the staff were always so friendly and greeted us by name. Even upgraded our room for free. Highly recommend

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 조용하고 좋습니다 다만 조식이 가지수가 많지 않아요 전반적으로 직원들도 친절하고 수영장도 낮은 구간이 있어서 아기랑 잘 놀았습니다 유아풀이 따로 있긴한데 바람이 많이 불고 물이 차가워서 이용하진 못했네요 인피니티풀쪽도 바람이 많이 불고 식당 앞 수영장이 온도도 괜찮고 바람도 불지않고 낮은곳도 있어서 거기서만 놀았습니다.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beyond excellent - ambience, staff, breakfast, spacious rooms

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Exceptional service!!!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Good 다음에 또 방문하고 싶습니다 . 정말로 잘 쉬다 갑니다.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: A lovely hotel about 15 mins walk from old town. A great room, comfortable bed and great jacuzzi bath. First hotel of the trip with refillable toiletries and glass bottles for the water. Would love to stay longer!

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: ホイアンのオールドタウンから 少し離れた場所にあるが とてもベトナムらしい雰囲気が感じられ 居心地の良いホテルだった よく手入れされた庭と随所に飾られたランタン そして至るところで南国らしい花が咲いている 4カ所あるプールは どれも雰囲気があって とても気持ちが良い 2階のジュニアスイートルームに宿泊したが 客室は静かで落ち着いており バルコニーからは鬱蒼とした南国の緑が間近に迫る ただ室内の雰囲気を重視するあまり 使い勝手は悪い そしてバスタブには水圧が弱すぎて お湯が溜まらない アメニティーは良いものを使っている テンプルレストランでの朝食は クオリティーの高い料理が用意されているが 品数は少ない スタッフのサービスレベルは高く申し分なく一1部のスタッフはゲストの困り事にも親身になって対応してくれる 全体的には雰囲気の良いとても良いホテルだと思う ただ ホテル奥の自転車レンタルのそばにある洗濯屋には要注意 ベトナムの通貨に不慣れな観光客相手に 1桁多く料金をぼったくる 50,000ドンが妥当な洗濯料金に対し 500,000ドン請求された

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Wow wow wow! what a hotel, a beautiful oasis on the edge of hoi an old town. We arrived to sang s welcome greetings and to be upgraded as they knew a big birthday was coming up.. The room really was something special, french decor and great eye to details, i think the top suite in the hotel and the views to the sunset and paddy fields impress. The highlight was sang nguyen, from recommendation to even spotting my heat rash and giving a local remedy! thanks sang and the team, a real highlight of the trip! c k

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Hotel was amazing, extremely clean, great choice of bars and restaurants. Food was delicious with a fabulous selection at breakfast. Hotel staff were so friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to others.

hotelName: La Siesta Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Excellent service enjoyed our stay
ゆったりのんびりと過ごせました
施設が清潔でした

Nicely located, friendly family run villa. Rooms generally clean and tidy and a decent size. Top floor (3rd) rooms - caution no lift for those that require. Decent breakfast options. Beds very firm. Would certainly recommend. Good value
Great location
Area is close to night market , walking distant to the old town , but no elevator, i will request 2nd floor next time

Had to wake staff up both morning to start breakfast waited for 1 hr for two eggs first day staff mixed up drinks with with different customers then proceeded to give us the juice from the other table that was already tasted our stay was decent however this is unacceptable
Beautiful property with everything i needed. Staff was so kind and helpful. Location was great as it was walkable to all the tourist attractions. Highly recommended!
I think they put in the place next door because lacasa was in under renovation or something. No extra charge though and the place they put us up was super cool.
Always tidy, in a good location where the streets quiet, it s close to the night markets/old town but not loud when trying to sleep. Would stay again )
Beautiful rooms and so very close to the night market and chinese bridge. Perfect place for value and location
Un très bon hôtel à côté du restaurant et le centre d intérêt. Je recommande vivement.
Perfect place to stay
Very very nice place to stay in hoi an . It s like being in a comfy little village with very kind people. I truly recommend that place.
Sehr gute lage, sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites personal, zimmer sehr gut und der wunderschöne pool zum entspannen
Eu aproveitei muito minha estadia. A família é muito receptiva e cuidadosa. Temos muita privacidade, etc.
Wonderfully quiet, rural setting bordering farmland. No traffic.

Le service etait tres bon. Nous sommes arrives en avance et avons pu profiter de la chambre avant midi. L endroit est bien situe et a seulement 25 minutes en velo du centre de hoi an, par contre trop loin pour aller a la plage car il n y a pas d acces direct et le pont est trop loin. Ideal pour se promener en velo et a 2 minutes du village aux cocotiers.

Highly recommended homestay, warm and helpful family for any needs. Beautiful place in the nature, quiet and peaceful. It was always nice to come back from the city/activities and relax in the swimming pool by the river.

Ontzettend lieve, behulpzame mensen. Zeer nette en schone kamers. Schoon zwembad. Nadeel vlak bij drukke weg. Dag tevoren opgeven wat je voor je ontbijt wil. Als je meer dan 1 kop thee of koffie wil moet je bijbetalen. Verder een aangenaam verblijf gehad

Это отель для тех кто ценит в отдыхе прежде всего близость с природой, тишину и спокойствие. Так же это лучшее место чтобы познакомиться с сельской жизнью вьетнама. Номера просторные и чистые, вкусная еда, услужливый персонал. Нам организовали прекрасные поездки в мраморные горы и хюэ, значительно дешевле чем в городских бюро. До города и пляжа легко добраться за 15 минут на велосипеде.

I chose lakeview villa because i don t like the noise of town. The downside of this is that few taxi drivers know where to find the place and it is somewhat inconvenient to keep taking a cab everywhere you need to go. Fares ran from 70,000 vnd to 100,000 vnd even though we always departed from the same point in town. Furthermore, we were out far enough that the tourist agencies wouldn t provide pick up at the homestay and that caused some trouble for our hostess, i m sad to say. That being said, i would still be willing to stay with this family again. Everything was bright and clean. The room was of a good size and the beds comfortable. The bathroom was easy to use and very clean! whatever she s using in the laundry makes the sheets and towels smell fantastic! the food was good. She even had a mini-fridge in the room where we kept snacks that we had bought in town. We had good wi-fi reception. The service was excellent and her prices reasonable. To get us to my son, she had to ride with us to a nearby hotel at 4 in the morning to meet the tour bus. She didn t bat an eyelash at the early hour. She was unbelievably chipper. We were very pleased with the whole experience! my only regret is that i never had time to swim in the infinity pool!

Very nice little hotel, simple but very well set and confortable. The family is lovely, they have a lot of advise to give when you ask and are really helpful. The area is great as it is in the countryside of hoi an so it is great to avoid tourists but still be at bycicle distance from the center of the town.
Le prix car cela ne vaut pas plus. La piscine est petite et la chambre sans charme.

Dieses homestay hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Es liegt idyllisch zwischen palmen mitten im kokosnusswald. Die besitzer und die serviceleute waren sehr nett und sehr zuvorkommend. Es gab zum frühstück und am abend immer einen frischen obstteller, den wir mit appetit vertilgten. Die zimmer wurden jeden tag gereinigt und waren sehr sauber. Auch die ausstattung ist für ein homestay sehr gut. Wir waren 2 wochen dort heimisch und haben uns wie zu hause gefühlt. Die entscheidung für dieses homestay haben wir nicht bereut. Alle bilder, die wir im internet zuvor gesehen haben entsprechen wirklich der realität. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dahin gehen.

This hotel is 5 minutes from an bang beach and the area is like stepping back in time. But the hotel is new and the rooms are amazing. We had a triple room with balcony. We had 2 huge beds and still lots of space. We also had 2 big balconies. Lovely bathroom. Mr dongs niece made us very welcome. Breakfast could be improved and we have made some suggestions. She was very helpful in arranging taxis etc. Only 3.00 into the centre of hoi an. The hotel is also in a very quiet area. 3 minutes from the hotel is mr dongs restaurant en route to the beach. Fantastic restaurant, cheap and a wonderful chef. We also had a cooking class there which was great fun and our efforts, with help, were delicious. Lots of extras, like umbrellas. Laundry, shopping basket, rain macs. We would highly recommend this hotel, and would stay there again. One of our favourites on our trip. And also very cheap

Nous y avons séjourné pour la plage, mais avons eu de la pluie du temps froid et une mer trop dangereuse. Mais la visite des environs en valait la peine. Le resto de l établissement sert d excellent repas, c est un genre de home stay et avons bien apprécié. Tous accueillants, sympatique et souriant.

Friendly family homestay and a very relaxing and laid back beach village. Great value and would highly recommend to anyone looking for an awesome beach vacation. The breakfast included was really good with a few western and vietnamese options. The families restaurant was also quite good.

Хороший отель. Немного далековато до моря. Пару раз отключали свет - на целый день. Кормят не особо хорошо. Зато лежаки и зонтики на пляже - хозяйские! город хойан - не близко. Но стоит того, чтобы его посетить обязательно.
Our home stay was outstanding. The experience staying with a family was very memorial.
좋음
해변에서 가깝고 전용 비치 선베드를 이용할수있어 좋았어요 아늑하고 예쁜방에서 2박하는 동안 즐거웠어요 해변에서 주문해서 먹는 음식이 너무 맛있었어요 레스토랑이 뜻밖에 넘 맛있어서 놀랐어요 감사했습니낭

We had an awesome stay at lang dong. It s located in a safe and friendly neighborhood, just a few minutes walk from the beach. Our host was available whenever needed. I strongly recommend lang dong homestay for any people who want to experience the local life outside the more crowded hoi an.

5 minutes walk away from the incredibly beautiful an bang beach. A short walk from lots of eateries, the location is great. The room was big and beds are comfortable, the mosquito net over the bed was useful. It is a bit worn down and clean enough but it s a lovely space. A great find at a bargain price
房间大 早餐可以 地方清洁 去诲只步行6至8分钟
Świetna obsługa i dodatkowe ręczniki na plaze. Pyszne sniadania. Blisko plazy. Troche trudno znalezc,bo taksówkarze nie wiedzą gdzie to jest. Bardzo polecam.

Belle chambre(comme sur les photos) presence le matin au petit dej , ensuite plus personne car restaurant oblige ! mais toujours joignable par tous moyens (phone,messenger,whatsapp etc...)tres familial et sympathique. En bref comme chez nous mais ailleurs !leur resto est excellent et proche je le conseil vivement.vie de quartier assurée avec le petit marché à 200m et la rue commerçante à 2 pas. Plage à qques minutes à pied avec transat gratuit pour les locataires. Petit dej assez succint mais compris avec la chambre. En bref, sejour tres agreable ,depaysant,simple,mais accueil avec le coeur pour qui sait s ouvrir. Premier contact avec le vietnam et sa population et en un seul mot inoubliable !!!
This place is absolutely lovely. Madame nga is an excellent cook and host with an amazing infectious laugh. We highly recommend staying here
The lady that cares for the place is very, very nice! the hotel is convenient to beach and restaurants. Everything in the room worked as it should and price was fair. I would recommend.
홈스테이라서낮에사라미없고뭔가방도깨끗한거같으먄서도드럽고..설명하기어려움 주인가족이해변가에식당도하고잇어서자리를무료로재공받을수잇으나결국눈치것먹고마시는걸주문하다보면다른식당이나똑같음 식당도맛없음 아침조식반쎄오시켰는데정말한입먹고뱉고싶었음
너무편했고 매일아침 장터가생겨서 구경하기좋았습니다. 안방비치가5 10분정도거리 아주좋아요 감시합니다.
It s a simple family home but the room was spacious and clean, aircondition worked perfectly. And it s close to all the action on the beach

I really enjoyed my stay here, the family are very friendly and welcoming and the room was great quality, very comfortable and relaxing. The restaurant owned by the family serves delicious food and there are a lot of other great options in walking distance. The beach is one minute away, and has some nice beach bars further down. Would definitely recommend for a quiet, relaxing getaway, great for couples or even on your own if you need a break from real life like me!

Unfortunately, the weather didn t cooperate and was rainy for many days before we arrived.this made the entire area wet and walking up to the homestay, there was a distinct smell of feces. This made it unpleasant to exit or enter the property. The rain caused the room to leak and we were offered a different room in a different homestay for the last night but opted not to move. The bathroom used to be open air. It has been closed over with a plastic material that sounds like a drum when it rains (read the whole stay). The host family is lovely and helpful and very much accommodating.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel is ok a little bit far from old town will require 30 mins of walking or a scooter. Breakfast is ok no more.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Out of the crowded center of hoi an but close to some really good restaurants. About a 17 minute walk to the main tourist attractions. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were comfy with a balcony and a nice view of the river. Good massage. You can t go wrong here.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Friendly and attentive service made my 4 days very comfortable. Mile and her lovely staff are so polite and eager to please. I had an excellent massage in the spa area and enjoyed a refreshing swim in the small, but very clean and inviting, pool.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 很乾淨舒適度 接待人員親切

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff were incredibly accommodating. The room was immaculate and beds were comfortable. Breakfast had an excellent variety. The shuttles to town and the beach were so very convenient. We would give this hotel 5 stars.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We liked the amazing staff and service ,view from our room ,fabulous breakfasts and free transfers to town and beach

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Breakfast foods are not fresh. Being a vietnamese hotel but lack of viet dishes. Far from old town and they don t offer shuttle. Staff are nice.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is a 20 min walk, or 10 minute cycle along the river to the ancient quarter of hoi an. We were happy to stay 3 nights. We recommend and will stay again.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운에서 약간 떨어져 있어 조용하고, 투본강변옆에 자리하고 있어서 투본강의 정취를 만끽할 수 있다. 호텔건물은 좀 오래되어서 첫 인상은 다소 실망적일 수 있으나 친절한 직원들과 생각했던거보다 훨씬 풍성하고 맛있는 조식이 첫인상때의 감점요소들을 상쇄하고도 남는다. 만약 호이안에 다시 간다면 다시 찾고 싶은 호텔이다

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: オールドタウンから少し離れています 雨が降るとgrabタクシーは 使えないです 部屋では wi-fi環境がとても悪い シャワーは 少し出していると水になります

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 中心地から離れた川沿いのこじんまりとしたホテルです 設備や食事などは街歩きをメインとするなら全く問題ないです バルコニーからの川の眺めも良いです スタッフの感じは良いですが 勧めてくれた内容と実際の相違 ホテル経由で空港までgrabを呼んだほうが安全で快適とのことでお願いしたが 3人分の大きなスーツケース αがあるものの小さい車で手配されていた 空港に向かうまでにシャワーも貸してあげると言っていただいたのでそれもお願いしたが スタッフ間での引き継ぎが上手くいっていなかったようでバタバタとやや適当な対応をされた があり ホスピタリティという点では正直がっかりしました grabは特別安い訳でもなかったので 自分たちでゆとりのある車種を選んだ方が気持ち良く帰路に着けたと思います 空港までの送迎もシャワーもこちらから提案した訳ではないので 悲しいですが良いように勧めてきただけ という印象を受けました

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 雰囲気が良くスタッフはフレンドリーです 中心部から離れているので観光客も少なく 宿泊者は欧米人老夫婦が多く テト期間でしたがとても静かでした riverviewのお部屋でのんびり川を眺めリフレッシュ出来ました 旧市街までは徒歩20分程 自転車も借りられます 難点はシャワールームのドアパッキンがゆるいのか 外に水が少し漏れてバスマットがビショビショになってしまった点です ポットも壊れていて取り替えてもらいました 設備は古めですが手入れされていますし 対応も早いので問題ありません 次の予定を聞かれダナンに戻ると伝えると有料送迎も出来ると提案されました grobより安そうだったのでお願いしました もっと長く滞在したい良いホテルでした

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 규모는 작았지만.. 베트남 분위기가 좋았고, 다들 친절하셔서 기분좋게 쉬었습니다.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Now we are ate wydham phu quoc not at vinpirl

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff were super helpful at all times and could not do enough for us.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 露台河景非常漂亮宁靜 猶如一張圖畫 房間茶杯殘舊 杯內里杯底已全是裂纹 倒熱水入小咖啡杯有咖啡味 应更换

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 4 nights at the lantana was superb. Lisa, anna and team so helpful. Beautiful view across the river with rooms well appointed and large king bed. Breakfast included was excellent. Lovely pool. Transport shuttle to the ancient town. But can walk in 20 mins. I would say this was a perfect place to stay.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great service and good quality.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: - 좋았던 점 리셉션 직원들과 청소하시는 분들은 친절한 편. 호이안 현지인들이 사는 곳에 숙소가 같이 있어서 내가 정말 베트남에 와 있구나 하고 느낄 수 있음. 수영장이 작지만 그래도 놀기에 나쁘지 않음. - 아쉬웠던 점 order해서 나오는 조식의 맛은 좋은 편이나, 그 외 기본 세팅이 너무 부실함. 첫째날 7시에 딱 맞춰서 갔더니 다른 휴가온 베트남 현지인들이 20명 정도 있었음. 한꺼번에 주문을 했을테니 바쁜것은 이해하나, 30분동안 우리가 온 것을 알고도 전혀 신경쓰지 않아서 불러서 얘기했더니 그제서야 한참뒤에 음식을 가져다 줌. 처음에 도착했을때 사진에서 느꼈던 분위기와는 많이 달라서 좀 당황했음. 시설은 전반적으로 깨끗한 편이나, 뭐랄까.. 현지 느낌이 굉장히 강한 편임. 어메니티도.. 어메니티라고 할 수 없는 수준이라 집에서 가져온 것을 사용. 올드타운과 멀어서 무료 대여 자전거 이용이나 그랩 이용 필수. 걸어서도 갈수는 있으나 편도 30분 걸림(걸어보았음)

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Meget venligt personale. Swimmingpoolen var mælkehvid, tror ikke rense pumpen virkede. Ellers alt ok

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Not a 4 hotel, breakfast was so bad and tasteless the night before you have to choose a dish for next day breakfast

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: お部屋の可愛さで選びました スタッフさんたちがとにかく親切でした 旧市街から離れているので車などを手配してくれました 私の拙い英語を理解しようとしてくれているのが伝わってとても嬉しくなりました スパもとても上手でしたし 朝ご飯も美味しかったです シャワーが使いにくかったのだけが難点でした またいつかホイアンに来る機会があれば シャンプーを持参してまたここに泊まりたいです

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ホイアンの市街まで歩けますが 少し遠目で20分くらいかかります 自転車が一番良いと思いますが バイクが少し怖いかも ホテルから市街のシャトルバス乗り場まで タクシーで50k vnd位で気軽に行けるでそれを使うのもありです 帰りもシャトルバス乗場からタクシーで同じくらいの料金で帰れます

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I had a beautiful view of the river from my room and rosie was so warm and helpful during my stay. She even gave me a ride back when she saw me walking in the rain! i loved my stay here!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt .war schön am fluss gelegen und sehr ruhig.auch das personal war sehr freundlich und herzlich.anna und rosie werden uns lange in erinnerung bleiben.auch hoi an können wir sehr empfehlen.sehr schöne altstadt.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful boutique hotel

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This hotel comes highly recommended. All of the staff were do helpful, always greeted us by name and anything we needed help with they were able to assist. The hotel itself was cute and very cosy. Easy walk from old town or bicycle ride from the beach. We came in the pouring rain and they helped us feel warm and welcomed. We would love to come back to hoi an and if we do we will be staying here. We had some cocktails and breakfasts and lunches here which were served quickly and beautifully presented. Will be telling my family and friends to stay here without a doubt

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It was a beautiful little hotel, my balcony overlook the river, the staff were amazing. Everybody was wonderful. My favourite people, breakfast is fabulous with a large variety to choose from. I didn t go swimming in the pool because the weather conditions were unfavorable, but this hotel, i highly recommend and it it s in a wonderful area with a beautiful view.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Trés bien un petit peu loin du centre mais personnel dévoué et sympathique !

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful and peaceful. The staff is so sweet and attentive. We love staying here!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely boutique hotel within walking distance to restaurants and night markets. Staff are very kind and accommodating. Would stay again!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff here make all the difference. The hospitality factor is over the top personable and genuine. Highly recommend.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Felt like a family member

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic staff, some of the friendliest we ve had in vietnam. Great hotel, walkable to the old town (in about 30 mins) but also the free bikes are fantastic. It was nice staying out of the old town a bit and was a quiet space to retreat to. Rooms and beds were comfy and pool was epic. Would recommend )

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely little hotel a little way out of the busy old town but nice location on river. Quiet pool, breakfast was ok, difficult to cater for all tastes in a smaller hotel but we were happy. The staff here without exception were fantastic, so helpful, so friendly. Well done whoever hired them all thank you for making our stay so enjoyable

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice location, quant, clean nice vibe

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is lovely and conveniently located on the river. Easy walk or cycle to coffee shops, restaurants, bars, night markets etc. Breakfast included is tasty and includes many western and asian options. The staff are wonderful and helpful and very eager to please. Very happy with our stay at lantana riverside.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 1) manager, ms mile nguyen was most helpful attentive. Also knowledge 2) property is quiet peaceful but off the beaten path, thus have to cab it each time. However hotel staff will always call cab, very inexpensive quick. All restaurants are around/inside the night market. Plenty of cabs around back to hotel. Each way is only 5mins cost between vnd30,000-60,000 ( which is really insignificant) 4) massage /spa services could be better

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 강변에 아주 조용한 호텔입니다.호이안 올드타운까지 걸어갈수 있어요. 조금 덥겠지만요. 자전거 무료로 빌릴수 있어요. 직원들 모두 친절 합니다.저절로 매우 가까워져요. 특급호텔의 수준을 원하시면 패스. 재방문 100 입니다. 꼭 가보세요.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Such a friendly place, thank you for making us so feel welcome. Lovely rooms, great pool, lovely spa treatments - all round excellent service.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff were amazing, the position of the hotel is perfect for shops and restaurants. The restaurant offers good local food and drinks. The beach is nearby.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I highly recommend this wonderful hotel! the staff went above expectations and made us feel so very comfortable. The location is excellent and we enjoyed riding bicycles along the river into the market. It is also very close to the memories show, which is a great night out. The rooms are clean and spacious. We enjoyed the pool and the restaurant. This is a wonderful hotel for singles, couples and families! but above all, the staff are what makes this hotel perfect. In particular, we appreciated thuy and mile for such wonderful service. We will be back!!
