hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is in a great quiet location, but also has lots of restaurants and convenience stores within the area. To head into the hustle and bustle of hoi an its only a nice 20min walk (or 5 min bike ride on a hotel bike). The hotel staff are extremly welcoming and caring, providing lots of reccomendations for restaurants, activities and shops (which were all spot on). The staff will also happily pre book you show tickets, tours and taxis/transport. What also really impressed us is that they remember your name and are always genuinly interested in how your your day was, what did you do and is there anything they can help you with.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: All the staff are helpful and kindness.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely boutique hotel at the end of hoi an. Amazing staff who went out of their way to provide the best service and experience possible. They were able to give suggestions for tours and organise the sweetest driver at a reasonable price without fuss.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This hotel was a nice stay for our family. The pool was small but we had fun playing games. The spa was lovely and so convenient. Breakfast was fantastic and we even ate dinner here too. The happy hour was an added bonus. Being able to rent the bikes and tour hoi an was perfect for the kids.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A little bit of a walk into town, and dark on a night but we always felt safe. Staff super kind. Spa was ok but better to try one in town. Would defo stay lanataba again

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great peacefully location. Clean rooms. Great breakfast. Great view on the river.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We initially booked two weeks at lantana, but we were looked after so well we stayed another week. Mile and her team were both professional and friendly we look forward to our next stay at lantana.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I have booked two rooms . One with river view and another with pool view. The pool view is extremely not the same as the photo provided by the hotel. I am very disappointed. However, the river view is good.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff were friendly and helpful. The riverside location is more challenging to get to for cars/taxis but would be great if you want to walk or rent bicycles. Further from the tourist area so its nice and quiet.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: K/ s moi, xinh xan.staff nhiet tinh vui ve. Duong vao ks hoi nho chut xiu.noi chung ve ks la tot.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Loved the location, rooms, breakfasts and staff. Didn t like the quality of the laundry service, the restaurant atmosphere for dinner or the lack of common areas to relax.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Every part was wonderful... The staff, facility and food!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A lovely 3 nights stay at latana. The staff is very attentive and upgraded our room for free after we experienced wifi issues with our room. They also assisted us with booking train tickets from danang to hue, as well as arranging private transfer to the danang train station for a small fee. One thing to be mindful is that the location of this hotel is in fact 15-20 minutes walk along the river to the centre of the old town. It is not 5-10 minutes as advertised originally - i guess is true if they are referring to the very edge of old town. The highlight of this hotel is definitely the pool, it is not massive but nice enough to cool you down and relax.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 조용하고 깨끗해서 좋았어요. 직원분들 한명한명 모두 친절해서 더 기분좋게 잘 머물다 가네요 조식도 깔끔하고 맛있게 잘 나오구요. 조용한 분위기에 너무 잘 쉬다 갑니다. 란타나덕분에 호이안에서 마지막밤 매우 좋았습니다

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff were friendly, helpful and courteous if you are a light sleeper noise echos from the bottom up. I m normally a good sleeper i could sleep through a party, however found it quiet difficult being able to hear our next door neighbours side and above. We had breakfast lunch and dinner at the hotel, decent selection of food bed was comfortable. A shuttle bus is provided free to the beach or to hoian you just need to give them an hours notice

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed for 4 nights at lantana riverside and had a wonderful stay. The property is in a great location, right on the river. It s about a 15-20 minute walk to the old town, which can feel a bit long in the heat, but the hotel provides shuttles at specified times to take guests there and back. It s also easy and inexpensive to take taxis to and from town. We enjoyed the quiet area that the hotel is located in, as the town is very busy. Our rooms were very attractive, well-equipped, spacious, and clean. The rooms also had great air-conditioning. The complimentary breakfast was incredible. There were so many options, including both western and vietnamese dishes, and everything that we tried was of excellent quality. We really appreciated that the hotel has its own private slice of the beach (complete with umbrellas and loungers) at an bang beach, and provides shuttles to take guests there and back at set times. We also appreciated the hotel s very affordable bike rental service. What makes this hotel exceptional, though, is the staff. Everyone was helpful, kind and professional. A special thank you to mile, the excellent manager who went above and beyond to make our stay special, and who was always responsive. A special thank you also to lucky in the hotel restaurant for great service every morning at breakfast. This was one of our favourite hotels during our vietnam trip and i would definitely stay here again.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 뜨거운물도 잘나오고 방이 청결하며 2박을 했는데 방청소랑 수건을 가져다주어 좋았습니다. 직원들이 매우 친절한 편이며 조식이 매우 좋아 맛있게 먹었습니다. 전반적으로 대부분 만족했습니다.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 昨年のランタナブテッィクホテルに続いての宿泊です こちらの方が街から離れているせいか静かでのんびり過ごせました と思ったら チェックアウト後こちらがよく確認しなかったのも悪いのですが レストランでの食事の金額が違うと再度請求メールが来ました 幸い翌日はダナンのホテルに泊まったのでフロントにお金を預ける形で済みました たぶん空港の送迎のついでに立ち寄るのでしょう が これが他の場所に行っていたらと思うと後味の悪い旅行になりました もう一点 町へのシャトルバスがあるのですが 帰りのバスが2度も来ませんでした こちらは数分前に早めに着いて待っていたのですが どうも運転手が見たときにいないと待つこともせず素通りするようです 他のホテルのバスはきちんと停車していましたよ 文句を言ったらタクシー代をくれましたが きっとよくあることなのでしょうね マネージャーのmileさんのお気遣いが素晴らしくてまた伺いたいと思いますが 上のようなことがないように教育してくださいね

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very friendly staff. Nice location by river. Shuttle bus to beach and town. Nice rooms round excellent swimming pool. Be aware the bar shuts promptly at 10.00!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ダナン ホイアン旅行の際に２泊しました ダナンからホテルのチャーターで移動しましたが ランタナホテルが２件あるので 道に迷って少し時間がかかりました 運転手には リバーサイド の方であることと住所を念押ししておくと良いです ホテルはホイアン歴史地区から少し離れていますが その分喧騒から離れてのんびり出来ますし 街までは送迎シャトルが出ているので便利です 徒歩圏内に３軒ほどトリップアドバイザーで評判の良いローカルレストランがあるので夕食も問題ありません 私達は tofu というレストランに行きましたが安くて美味しかったです 客層はほとんどヨーロピアンで 滞在中アジア人はほとんど見ませんでした 施設も新しいですし価格もリーズナブルなので 英語さえ喋れれば快適に滞在出来るホテルです

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very very good hotel. Staff here were truly exceptional and service was impeccable. Great food in the restaurant and there is a large selection of food at beakfast.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The service is absolutely amazing, and i have been to a lot of hotels. It is also in a nice quiet area

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This boutique hotel is ideally located. Situated on the scenic river, it is just far enough away from the old town to avoid the tourist and business areas, yet within easy walking distance to all the important places to visit. My husband particularly enjoyed his early morning runs along the river among the friendly locals. The establishment was extremely clean, the staff very helpful and the pool area inviting. We will certainly make a return visit in the near future!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice staff good views yummy breakfast

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very friendly and helpful staff. It s a good10 minutes out of downtown hoi an. We loved the walk back along the river, but that might not be for everyone - in that case there is a shuttle!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Loved this hotel thought it was great. Staff are absolutely incredible and go above and beyond. Best i ve received worldwide. Just a little bit out from the old town. Roughly a 20min walk.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Thank you for putting us on to this excellent hotel. Located in a quiet area looking over the thu bon river. An easy walk to the old city. Very friendly staff making us feel at home . Great restaurant for dinner, and a lovely breakfast included with the accommodation.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Good hotel, great food and service but difficult to access by taxi (local taxi refused to take us back despite collecting us a few hours earlier!)

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed at this hotel for christmas and the staff went above and beyond to make sure our christmas special. There was a christmas eve gala that includes drinks, a buffet and singing. The spa was great. The restaurant served a variety of foods that were all good. The staff was amazing too!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel a beautiful and peaceful location but it was easy to get into the ancient city either by walking, cycling (the hotel has bikes for hire for only 1 per day) or the regular free shuttle bus. Staff were very helpful and friendly and rooms extremely clean and comfortable. Definitely recommended .

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This charming little hotel is well designed and pleasant. I love the air well in the centre of the building. The swimming pool is lovely, too, although the water is freezing! the staff are very accommodating and eager to please, although i would advise that they all undergo english lessons, especially on pronunciation, if the lantana wants to target an international clientele.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff starting from the manager are very nice, polite and accommodating. The food in the restaurant is excellent

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff was excellent! they knew our names the day we arrived, made registration very pleasant, and promptly met our every request. We asked about tours, they helped and didn t push expensive options. The bed was huge and for us picky pillow and mattress people, the bedding was perfect. We watched the sun come up over the river every morning from our balcony seats. The food and drinks were very good. We took the cooking class with the head chef, learned and made an excellent meal with some hand holding.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 全てにおいてパーフェクト 加えてコストパフォーマンスも最高 スタッフの心使いは申し分なく笑顔でゲストと応対し親切でした 旧市街から少し離れていて場所的にハンデキャップのあるホテルです ただしシャトルが旧市街とビーチまであるので不便は感じない がそれを差し引いても余りあるスタッフの対応は感動ものです 部屋はリクエスト通り最上階のリバービュー 朝に夕べにバルコニーで行き来する船を見ながらビールを飲む極楽 レストランにはハッピーアワーもあり 食事も美味しい 本当にいいホテルでした コンシェルジュのｍｓ ｍｉｎｈ フロントのｍｓ ｊｏｙ そしてレストランのｍｓ ｓｈｉｋａ ドライバー クリーンスタッフ ベルボーイ すべてのスタッフに親切にしていただき感謝です 老夫婦にとって良い旅行でした 又 機会が有れば訪問したいです

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I had an amazing time at this hotel where the place was clean and comfortable. Even though my room was not facing the river, the city view was good as i was staying at a high floor. The hotel itself may be slightly away from the city centre, but it only takes about 20 minutes by walking. Staff were all very polite and welcoming. I have to give a special thanks to joy who works at the front desk. She was extremely helpful and i could not thank her enough for solving a problem that i encountered during my trip. Well done, joy!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The place is gorgeous and tranquil and the staff are exceptionally helpful and welcoming. Felt very safe and well taken care of and the hotel is beautiful.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed here for 4 nights. We really enjoyed our stay. The staff was wonderful! they were very helpful and always kind. The breakfast was excellent with many vietnamese and western choices. The room and building were immaculate. The bikes we borrowed were in good condition. We liked that the hotel was a bit of a walk from the old town, because it felt very peaceful and quiet on the riverside. However, the shuttle to town was also convenient. We also used their beach access one day, which was also very relaxing with good amenities. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Super helpful staff. We forgot money in our room and when they found it they managed to deposit it into the account of the hotel on our next destination so that we could have it back. The hotel is amazing and riverside rooms have great view. Not too close to old quarter, but complimentary shuttle service available.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent property excellent staff very attentive. Call me by my name every time i walk in the front door

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff were very friendly and helpful. All our needs were well looked after. When we booked we had actually booked for the city hotel but when we arrived we found ourselves in the riverside hotel which we found very charming and more suited to our stay.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 진짜 친절이 무엇인지 알수있는 호텔,

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Well serviced hotel, perhaps a bit too far from old quarter (although they do provide a shuttle service) but it did allow for peaceful evenings.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A good hotel although the 4 is not yet worth it. But hotel will do everything in order to satisfy you and correct possible errors.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Highly recommend this hotel. The property is beautiful and everything is spotlessly clean. It s in a wonderful location right on the river and the hotel has convenient shuttles to take you to town or to the beach. The staff were exceptionally nice. The rooms were spacious, clean and the bed was the most comfortable i slept in all of south east asia. I don t think i ve ever given a hotel five stars before so this is a first.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 조용하고 한적한 곳 찾으시는분은 추천드려요 개인 입맛이지만 조식도 먹을만하고 직원분들도 노력하는 모습이 보이네요 세탁 서비스가 유료라는게 아쉽네요 흡연자 분들은 비추천.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We loved lantana riverside hoi an! the staff were fabulous... All of them... All just such lovely people who genuinely care about you and your welfare, and enjoyment of your stay! location about 15 minutes walk away from the old town of hoi an and perfectly in a quiet area. Use the free shuttle to get to and from the ancient city or the hotel s private, or affiliated, beach. The beach is a must do incidentally because the location is amazing and is backed by a family run bar/restaurant which has an amazing selection of food and drinks at great prices, served at your free sunbeds or at the restaurants tables. The restaurant has basic toilet and shower facilities, too. Although further south than the busier an bang, it is leisurely walk along the waterline away if you need your water-sports fix. The hotel services included pretty much everything you wanted, or needed. We used the spa for treatments, massages and the like which were all really good. There s a small gym, and a lovely little pool, too. Food is great - the breakfast, something else in terms of selection, and snacks and meals in terms of prices, not unreasonable but there are plenty of alternatives locally just minutes away on foot. Lantana riverside is faultless in many ways, and at the price, a great place to stay given the breakfast is included, and unlimited! happy hour lasts 3 or 4 hours and cocktails start at about 4 for two. Yup, just a great place to stay. We ll be back, for sure!

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff was so helpful with any requests or help needed. Cooking class was a great experience. Pool was great after a long day of touring. Will recommend to anybody going to hoi an.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel within walking distance to old town. Clean, comfortable, lovely breakfast and very friendly staff. Great shuttle bus service to private beach and town. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 저희는 2일동안 머물면서 어느것 하나 부족하지 않게 있었습니다 도착하는 순간부터 마중나와 캐리어 받아주시고 룸까지 다 옮겨주시고 머물면서 필요한것들 하나하나 꼼꼼하게 설명해주시고 체크해주시는 센스까지 룸 청결하였으며 에어컨도 빵빵했습니다 저녁에는 추워서 이불 꽁꽁 싸매고 잘 정도로 시원했습니다 화장실 수압도 좋았고 따뜻한 물도 잘 나왔습니다 직원들은 항상 웃으며 인사해주시고 문의사항에도 친절하게 응대해주시고 어느것 하나 불편함 없이 있었습니다 직원들 서비스 100점 만점에 1000점 드리고 싶네요 호이안에 다시 오게 된다면 재방문 의사 무조건 있어요 이틀동안 좋은 기억 남기고 오게 해주셔서 감사한 마음으로 돌아갑니다

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 일단 직원분들이 정말정말정말정말정말 친절하셔서 별 5개 입니다ㅜㅜ 시설도 나름 좋고 방도 뷰가 좋아요! 가격에 비해 너무 만족했던 곳입니다. 한국어를 조금 할 줄 아는 분도 계셔서 편했어요. 조식 시간도 길고 호텔이 아기자기하니 예뻤어요! 올드시티까지도 택시타고 10분이면 가서(택시비 42000동 정도 밖에 안했음) 위치도 좋았구요 정말정말 추천합니다.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very pleased with everything. Food, staff the location

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Unique about this property is their staff being kindest and friendliest i have ever experienced. I don t remember all names but laura in the restaurant made our stay beautiful by introducing us to local dishes. At the reception the two managerial staffs mile and sales manager, i forgot her name, are second to none and helpful. Amongst others, tracy was helpful and very courtious.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It was initially a good experience as staff at hotel are friendly. Downside is hotel is faraway from hoi an old ancient town like 20mins to 25mins. But i could still easy get a grab. The worst part came when i took their airport transfer from hotel to airport. They changed driver in the middle of the trips (that s fine) but the driver who took over brought me to a wrong airport more for jetstar and vietnam airlines. Frantically i went around asking for directions..i am glad i made it in time.if i were to miss the flight .would the hotel compensate me for the loss? i won t return again to this hotel.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great stay...15 minute walk along water to beautiful downtown. Spa services were awesome and pool was fantastic. Staff very attentive and helpful. Would stay here everytime in hoi an.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ホテルのシャトルサービスの帰りのバスが来なくて帰れなくなったことだけがマイナスポイントだ それ以外は朝食もおいしく サービスもよく 帰りの日は早朝だったがお弁当の用意までしてくれる良いホテルだった

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Why i love lantana riverside -welcoming and hospitable. I really felt at home because of the kind desk staff. They helped me print out lots of my work, which was a huge help. -the best breakfast in vietnam. Especially the salads, which were many and all delicious. The room. Comfortable, pretty and with a decent view. For the price, the room is wonderful . -gym. Basic, but enough for basic exercises. If you want more, superfit hoi an is a low cost and convenient gym nearby. Next time i m in hoi an, i will be coming back ! 最好酒店 有越南第一早餐 在这里可以休息 感谢

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great location fantastic staff very helpful made it feel like a home away from home. Great shuttle service to nice beach if you wanted to blob out for a day or so. Fantastic breakfast excellent choice great pho. Will definitely stay again.nice room comfortable bed.

hotelName: Lantana Riverside Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 従業員はみんな親切で笑顔が素敵でした 部屋も可愛くて最初に入った時に驚きました
Phòng sạch sẽ, thiết bị đều rất mới. Phòng đơn đẹp hơn phòng đôi.

Lần đầu tiên đặt khách sạn phòng deluxe mà bị phụ thu 2 bé dưới 6 tuổi 200.000 với lý do là khi book phòng mình không ghi chú có trẻ em kèm theo, giá phòng hơn 700k ko bao gồm ăn sáng, wifi đóng cửa phòng lại cực kỳ chậm. Thái độ chủ nhà rất khó chịu. Khi mình sang ở đà nẵng giá 750k / đêm đã bao gồm ăn sáng, khách sạn có hồ bơi, phòng chơi trẻ em, phòng chiếu phim miễn phí. Mình book phòng ở đà nẵng cũng không hề ghi chú có trẻ em nhưng trẻ em dưới 6 tuổi hoàn toàn miễn phí. Nhân viên phục vụ từ tận cửa ra vào. May mà mình chỉ ở hội an 1 đêm chứ không ức chế, nếu ko phải vì đã chuyển khoản tiền phòng trước bọn mình đã đi tìm khách sạn khác ở rồi. Mình khuyên các bạn ko nên nghỉ ở homestay này để khỏi bị sự bực bội phá hỏng kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời của các bạn.
Dịch vụ quá tệ. Chỉ biết thu tiền khách hàng. Không bao giờ đặt ở đây
Sếp không thân thiện! cơ sở có lớn không
Nice clean room, great location, owner organized motorbike hire and transport back to da nang, for a good price. All-round happy with the place.
Tôi đến để ở nhưng phòng tôi đã đặt không còn trống. Mặc dù đã được đặt trước

Chủ nhà trọ rất không thân thiện. Do một số vấn đề, cô ấy đã không nhận được thanh toán cho đặt phòng của chúng tôi (thanh toán đầy đủ bằng thẻ tín dụng). Cô ấy nên làm việc với đại lý về vấn đề này nhưng cô ấy đã rất bực mình và yêu cầu tôi cho cô ấy xem id đặt phòng của mình. Cô ấy không cho phép mang bất kỳ đồ ăn nào trong phòng và yêu cầu chúng tôi trả phòng trước 12 giờ tối, đó là thời gian trả phòng tiêu chuẩn, để cô ấy có thể chuẩn bị phòng cho những vị khách tiếp theo. Không có chai nước miễn phí trong phòng. Vị trí, tuy nhiên, là tuyệt vời! tóm lại, chúng tôi sẽ không chọn lantern riverside vào lần tới, các dịch vụ tồi, rất không thân thiện. Có rất nhiều sự lựa chọn của các khách sạn với vị trí tốt và dịch vụ tuyệt vời. Đặc biệt nếu bạn là người việt nam, tôi khuyên bạn nên chọn một khách sạn khác trong khu vực.
Hotel tres agreable à l ecart du centre sans être trop loin. Personnel tres serviable. Petit dejeuner tres varié. Sejour fort sympathique

This property is beautiful very clean and well looked after. The downfall is the location is a bit of a walk to hoi old square and the hotel does offer a shuttle but it s not frequently enough to either the old square or the beach. Would highly recommend they had some additional daily services.
ホイアン中心部から少し離れていますが ホテル目の前に広がる広大な田園地帯が美しく感動しました 朝食も日本人向けの味でとても美味しかったです
Very nice staff. Full of support to make my trip unforgettable.

ホテルはとても綺麗で建物や内装も美しかったです プールからの田園風景が素晴らしく穏やかな時間が過ごせました スタッフもみんな親切でした チェックアウトの際 leoと言うフロントスタッフにレビューを書いて欲しいと頼まれました 私は後でゆっくり書きたかったのですが今すぐに書いてと言われました レビューに時間がかかっていると彼が私の携帯を使って勝手に操作し レビューを仕上げ投稿しました 星5つと自分の名前を入力していました 素晴らしいホテルだったのに最後が最悪でした
Khách sạn rất tuyệt vời

旧市街から少し離れていますが ホテルで自転車を借りて移動すれば大した距離じゃないです 市街から外れているかわりに田んぼビューのインフィニティプールが素晴らしい プライベートビーチへの送迎もあります レセプションの女性が笑顔が素晴らしくなにかとに気にかけてくださるので快適に滞在できました 滞在中にダイキン製のエアコンが壊れたときなどこちらが気づく前に内線連絡が入り 即座に最上階の広い部屋にアップグレードいただいた上に お詫びのフルーツと手紙まで提供いただき感動しました チェックアウト時 初対面のスタッフの方にtrip.comの口コミに僕の名前を書いてほしいと名刺を渡されたのには少し閉口しましたが そこはベトナム人らしいなと微笑ましくなりました ベトナムはホテルの価格とクオリティが比例していないケースが多いですが このホテルはオススメできます

This is a very nice hotel outside the center of hoi an. You need to take the travel to the city into consideration, we struggled a couple of times getting a taxi at night the hotel offers a shuttle but it s limited
Very nice place and we loved the pool

最高です ホイアンには5回以上訪問しているが 一番気に入っているホテル 中心街からは少し離れているが おかげであまら知られていないホイアンの美しい田園風景が目の前に広がっている こんな値段でこんなに素晴らしいホテルに滞在できる場所は他にはない 旧市街を廻ってショッピングするのも楽しいけど このあたりの田園の中をサイクリングするのも休暇の最高の過ごし方 施設も綺麗で スタッフも皆さん親切 とくに 今回の滞在ではベルマンが素敵だなと思った
Sehr gut hotel!!
Great stay

Lasenta absolutely blew our minds. What a gorgeous place to stay with the most beautiful views over the rice fields! the rooms were immacualte, big and very tidy! small balconies but perfect for us. The staff were always so kind to us and our children, always welcoming us with big smiles. The pool was amazing too and we loved spending time here. Only downfall to the pool was it was very hot to sit there with very little shade available but that certainly didnt ruin our stay. We wished we could have stayed longer and highly recommend this hotel to everyone
Amazing stay. Great and friendly staff. Beautiful view.

ホテルの立地環境が良く静かに過ごすことができます 客層は落ち着いた方が多く 年齢層が高めか家族連れが多い印象です 騒がしい若者はいませんでした 中心街から少し離れていますが 無料自転車もあり不便さは感じません タイヤの空気や座面の高さを毎回気にしてくれます ホテルの食事はとても美味しく 近くには中心街よりも安くて美味しいレストランがあります ホテルスタッフは対応が迅速で丁寧で 英語がしっかり通じます 日本からドンへの両替もしてくれます 日本の空港でするよりもかなりレートが良いです 居室の寝具は快適でしっかり疲れを癒せますし ホテルのｓｐａは技術が高いです ただし 浴室にシャワーカーテンがなくシャワーの浴び方に技術が必要な点がマイナスですが 許容範囲内です ホイアンに行くことがあれば また利用したいですし 本当にお勧めです
A very welcoming stay ! i extended a couple of times. Rooms were excellent and the staff couldn t have been more helpful . Thanks so much ! highly recommend
Beautiful hotel and everyone was so kind and helpful. Gorgeous pool and nice massage and facial at spa.
Good

By far the best hotel we stayed in vietnam within this price range.staff was super nice (ex summer and leo), excellent breakfast with local and continental choices , view on the rice field outstanding, felt so pampered. Room with city view had a balcony, which was nice to relax on. Walking distance to the center of haoin and good restaurants nearby. Very relaxing, almost resort feel.
Khách sạn đẹp, tuy nhiên phục vụ tránh làm phiền vào giờ nghỉ trưa. Bữa sáng đông khách nên một số món hết sớm không có thêm.

We had a lovely stay at lasenta. The room is spacious. Separate bathroom and shower. It s about 1.5km from old town so not much nearby and we enjoyed the peace and quite. They do have shuttle service to drop guests off at old town or the beach
Khách sạn lasenta boutique hội an đẹp dễ thương và yên bình đúng như tên gọi. Phòng nghỉ thiết kế đẹp, hợp lý, đặc biệt vệ sinh rất sạch sẽ. Chúng tôi sẽ quay trở lại khi đến hội an.
Mình thấy ok nha
Great hotel in fantastic location within easy walk of old hoi a town or a bike ride around the rice fields. Great decor, staff and price.
まあ 良い
Great experience
Excellent property. Best property we stay on a two month venture.
Perfect, really nice

About a 30 minute walk into town, busy streets and sidewalks always filled with motorbikes which seems to be the norm, stepping around things and up and down the curbs constantly, not at lot in immediate area, the rice paddies were nice to see right across the street, the staff were all very lovely,room was beautiful, never enough hot water which would have been nice as it rained during most of our visit, about 1 hour walk to the beach, breakfast was good, would recommend if you don t mind walking to town but they do offer a shuttle service if needed
Wow i wish i could have stayed here for longer, it was truly the best and most luxurious experience and the perfect location too!

We were a group of 8, having traveled by bus from nha trang, so we were quite tired. We arrived around 5 30am to find the lights off but the door was open. Mosquitos were everywhere. The security guard was asleep on the floor and the receptionist was also asleep. They both woke up to assist us. The staff member mentioned that he d notify us when a room became available. By noon, a room was ready but we were told there would be an additional charge by another staff member. The previous staff hadn t mention any extra fees. Despite this, our stay was pleasant and the location was within walking distance to the city.

Came here only for one night for a family vacation, was very satisfied with the service and the facility, everything is well maintained. We were able to check into one of our room early which was great, as we had plans as soon as we got there. The breakfast buffet was also delicious. The view from the pool was so amazing. Would highly recommend and stay again.

This was a lovely from beginning to end. Staff for a lovely and respectful. The site sits adjacent to a massive rice field, which is a lovely view. The building looks very strong and the rooms are spacious. The breakfast had everything you needed and the head chef was always present making sure everything was right. It s got a lovely pool to sit around for happy hour. Definitely recommend this place to stay
Close to old town, friendly and helpful staff, the spa services very enjoyable.
Beautiful view and very convenient. The staff doesn t over impose but is there for anything you need . Housekeeping was perfect , room was kept polished daily .
좋습니다 일랑일랑도 옆에있두뇨 ㅎ
Unfortunately we had noisy neighbours above us. Perhaps putting felt pads on the furniture would reduce the noise
Excelente servicio, atención, servicio de bus a la playa y al centro. Limpieza en general. Desayuno excelente.
Beautiful room with gorgeous views, awesome staff and facilities. Walking distance to the old quearter, very good breakfast
Nice afternoon tea
Stayed for 9 days and it was excellent service with breakfast included. The pool has a great view of the rice field.
Clean and nice comfy room. The hotel provide shuttle to the old town and beach.

Fantastisk mindre hotel lidt udenfor hoi an, ud til rismarker. Gratis cykler så 10 min til gamle by. Shutte bus til strand. Bedste service og skøn morgenmad. Dejlig mindre pool område. Så søde og hjælpsom. Super meget til prisen.
Staff was very helpful, shuttles were provided, rooms were spacious, and great location.
I m so good you need to go this hoter now!!!

Lasenta was an unreal stay, luxuries yet affordable. Breakfast was lovely with plenty of variety. The shuttle service and bikes were very convenient and town was seconds away. The staff were friendly and helpful would recommend to friends and family.
Lovely v helpful staff, special thanks to alex shara on front desk for helping us with our travel arrangements
Great staff. The receptionist in the front was very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our room it was big and the view was awesome. Definitely coming back.

Beautiful location not far from the centre of hoi an with free shuttle bus to beach and town. Swimming pool overlooking the rice paddocks was a unique experience and all the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Room was bright and spacious qnd clean, and the bathroom had a large shower area which felt luxurious. Buffet breakfast has a great selection too
We had a great stay at lasenta, the staff were so lovely and attentive, highly recommend )
Great place to stay
Great hotel, clean nice view of the rice fields. It s about 2km from the old town. Free shuttle to old town. Friendly staff.
Nice hotel in a handy location to the old town. Staff are very nice, breakfast was good. Bed was the best bed we have had in vietnam, very soft.
Great place, we loved it.

Love this hotel! this is my second time in hoi an and my second time at lasenta boutique. I would not want to stay anywhere else! the location is perfect! it s quiet and the rooms are beautiful, clean, spacious and the amenities are the best. The decor and style is more western than the typical vietnamese hotels. The staff are very accommodating. The free shuttle to and from old quarter is very convenient! the breakfast buffet is a huge bonus. I love love their french baguettes!!! the different rotation of noodle soups are delicious. They have many options for vegetarians and non-vegetarians, asians and non-asians just pretty much a little for everyone. Book this hotel if you have a chance. You will not regret it!

Best hotel we had so far in vietnam. Nice and spacious room with all the comfort you need, shower and bath were great! pillows could be a little softer, but that is the only thing i can think of for improvement. Amazing staff (especially alex and leo!!) and plenty of choices for breakfast (western and asian)

Worst hotel i ve ever stayed at this might be the first bad hotel review i ve ever written. I have no idea how this hotel has good reviews. The moment we went into both our rooms (two couples with two rooms), we all smelled mold. We were told it s rainy season and humidity is the reason for the musky smell. We were supposed to stay two nights and the price was reasonable so we told ourselves we would get over the smell. We woke up early the next morning to explore the beautiful hoi an, only for my husband to suffer a severe allergic reaction and go to hospital. Doctor said likely due to mold. We didn t know he was allergic. Doctor sent us to the city hospital emergency room in da nang 45 minutes away because his reaction was so bad. We came back to la sesta with all the paper work from the hospital at 2pm on day two and they still made us pay full price for night 2 despite explaining we needed to check out a day early due to a medical emergency due to the poor conditions of the hotel. Even if you don t have a mold allergy, it can cause several health problems that aren t as severe such as signs of a cold, cough, sneezing, and more. I hope this is a warning to all to not stay here under any circumstances. You re better off staying somewhere slightly more expensive for a better nights sleep, or worse a hospital bill, vacation ruined, and no hotel refund despite their own negligence.

The stay was excellent and enjoyable. It was very luxurious with comfty pillows and an amazing bed! thank you to the whole team including leo, summer and tuan! highly recommend. Friendly services and such good service!

We had a wonderful stay at this hotel! the rooms were spacious, with a generously sized bathroom that included a bathtub a nice touch for relaxation. The view of the rice paddies opposite the hotel was stunning and truly added to the serene ambiance. We also appreciated the availability of bikes, which made exploring the town both fun and convenient. While the buffet breakfast didn t offer a huge variety, it was perfect as a light meal before heading out for the day. One area for improvement would be adding more drop-off routes with the shuttle bus for easier access to key locations. Overall, a great experience with just a few small suggestions for enhancement! there was also a cafe next door for those after a vietnamese coffee of various varieties (and off site laundry services too)
편안하고 직원이 편리하며 조용하였습니다 가성비 좋은 호텔입니다
The view from the swimming pool and the general atmosphere in the hotel was very relaxing
Walking through the rice field early in the morning was nice. Breakfast was good also. Childrens were noisy.
Execelent service, and amenities, good breakfast and service

We would have no reservation in recommending this hotel to anyone. It is excellent in every way. The staff without exception were very welcoming, smiley and helpful. Nothing was too much trouble the hotel shuttle was a good feature, and the hotel has an agreement with one of the beach bars to provide it s clients with sunbeds and parasols (free of charge). The hotel loans out beach towels if you haven t got your own. We stayed at the hotel for a week and used the hotel s bikes to go cycling through the paddy fields and countryside . Which we did on two mornings the restaurant and the food were excellent and the breakfast buffet had something for everyone. If we ever return to hoi an (which we think is a must see destination), we shall definitely stay at the lasenta hotel
Very nice and clean boutique hotel. Not walkable but you can easily get an electric tuk tuk or taxi to go to the old quarter.
Extremely helpful staff warm, caring atmosphere
This is a lovely hotel, conveniently located with excellent staff. In particular the spa facility and staff are outstanding.
Excellent hotel. Friendly staff. Good travel desk for trips out. Nice pool. Excellent food. Nicely located.
We got a free upgrade from our room. We had a nice view from our room and the staff was very helpfull. Special thanks too james, leo and alex for the great service
Lovely hotel opposite rice fields. Spacious bedrooms. Fantastic spa treatments. Staff very friendly and helpful especially the girls in the spa. Good breakfast.
Everything perfect

Pas loin du centre-ville et de son agitation, avec une superbe vue sur les rizières. Nous y avons séjourné trois nuits et ce fut une belle surprise pour nous. Nous recommandons vivement. Tout était très bien.

Love, love, love lasenta, we had a wonderful stay here!! breakfast buffet is excellent, rooms huge, beautiful and comfortable, pool and view are stunning, staff are welcoming, friendly and helpful and the service is exceptional. Close enough to ancient town to walk comfortably ( though there is a free shuttle provided) but far enough away to be out of the hustle and bustle. Cannot fault this hotel at all, would very highly recommend and will most definitely return some day

Superbe séjour dans cet hôtel avec une piscine qui offre une magnifique vue sur les rizières. A 2 pas de la vieille ville, shuttle très pratique depuis l hôtel. Chambre très spacieuse et staff très accueillant et serviable.
Lovely hotel. Bar area needs modernising. Great place to stay
객실이 그리 깨끗하진 않다 욕조는 좀 더 깨끗이 해주면 좋겠네요 리셉션 직원중 밤에 도착했는데 설명이 충분하지 않고 대충 마무리하였고 그다음날 여성직원분은 친절하지 않았음 그외는 객실이 조용하고 시원해서 좋았습니다

Great location. Good walk to market area with lots to look at on the way. Pool was fantastic as was the room we stayed in. What a great view over the rice paddies looking towards da nang. Well worth it.

Not to far from town if you don t mind the heat (15 min slow walk). But they do have a free bus to town and back 4times a day. Beautiful hotel. Clean rooms. Helpful staff. Would recommend . Bring bug spray as near rice fields got bitten quite a bit but nothing to do with hotel. We had a great stay.
とても環境が静かで過ごしやすい 部屋やプールから田園が望めてとても落ち着きました スタッフの方も丁寧に接してくれます
Beautiful hotel, great service, staff friendly, helpful. Good breakfast, room spacious, clean, quiet, enjoyed our stay.

We stayed at lasenta boutique hotel 7 years ago during our honeymoon trip to hoi an. We ve enjoyed it so much that this time around, we returned with our 2 children. Greeted us at the lobby was the same receptionist (ann) from our previous trip!!! our room was clean and had great view (half city half rice field), breakfast was included and delicious. Enjoy free shuttle to the ancient town and the beach. I highly recommend booking car rides with the hotel for airport pickup/drop-off in advance, as well as for other destinations you might have such as ba na hills. All of the staffs were kind and professional. Thanks lasenta team for being part of our memorable vacation )

Overall excellent stay at lasenta. It s a nice boutique hotel, excellent service. I booked the grand suite with view on the rice fields. It was a great spacious and clean room with awesome peaceful view. The duvet was too warm for me, wish they had a thinner one for this hot weather. Nice pool with view, but not so refreshing as it s busy and hot. I loved the location, just far enough from the bustle if old town, yet close enough to it and many restaurants around. I really enjoyed the spa. I took a scrub wrap massage and it was exquisite. I would recommend and i would stay there again.
훌륭합니다. 방 청결하고 수영장 경치가 좋습니다.
Beautiful view
Love it!

We really enjoyed the hotel. Rooms were spacious and clean and staff was very helpful. The breakfast buffet had western and asian options. The pool was beautiful. We made use of the shuttle to the beach and to the ancient town area. It was about a 10-15 min walk to ancient town. We visited in the heat of july so the shuttle was appreciated. We used the hotel spa for pedicures, they were very reasonably priced but had quite limited options for nail polish colour. My pedicure was okay, the lady doing my daughter rushed and did not do a great job and the colour was chipped within the hour. We have already recommended the hotel to our friends who plan to visit the area in a few months.

The room and balcony were clean and comfortable. The pool was great, amazing view. The breakfast was lovely, lots of choice. The staff, sarah, summer, john and the rest were brilliant, friendly and helpful, with a hint of humor, fabulous staff. Definitely stay here again when we visit hoi an in the future.

This was our second time staying at lasenta, with our previous visit being back in everything was exactly as we remembered. Great rooms, great facilities, beautiful pool area with plenty of sunshine and of course amazing staff. A big thanks to summer, james and rita for their excellent service around reception too. Very welcoming!
Un hotel lujoso y confortable con todo tipo de servicios, limpio, muy cómodo, con una decoración exquisita y cerca de la ciudad. Vistas desde la piscina maravillosas y desayuno exquisito
Este hotel eat bien ubicado , su gente es muy amable , siempre dispuestos a ayudar . Nos organizaron tours y nos apoyaron en todo. La cama y cuarto súper cómodos
Rita ,summer at the front desk where exelent and alex at the door outstanding

Check-in was very easy, reception staff was really nice and helpful. The services in this hotel are great. We didn t have our room service for 2 nights we stayed here but when we requested for towels, water and soap, they were delivered very quickly. The restaurant served vietnamese cuisine but they are not to our liking. Overall stay can be considered good and comfortable as the room is very spacious.
Close proximity to local food area and walkable to old town.

Super schönes hotel am rande von hoi an um die seele baumeln zu lassen aber man konnte auch die albstadt zu fuß gut erreichen. Mehrmals fährt aber auch ein shuttle in die altstadt/an den strand. Personal war super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Allem voran leo, rita und ann, die uns bei fragen mit rat und tat zur seite standen. Hätten gern noch ein paar weitere tage hier verbringen können.
Everything was amazing!
Beautiful hotel, i love the amenities . Everyone was so kind and friendly.
A very nice and well appointed place to stay just a little way out of old town. Friendly staff and rooms are wonderful.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at lasenta boutique hotel hoi an, and i must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The front desk staff an, leo and paul were incredibly welcoming and accommodating, ensuring that every aspect of our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. From the moment i walked in, i was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality, setting the tone for the rest of my stay. Bellboy alex was also very helpful ensuring fast handling of all our luggages as there were 12 of us in my party. Not only were the front desk staff efficient and professional, but they also went above and beyond to make sure all our needs were met. Whether it was providing recommendations for local attractions or assisting with any inquiries i had, they were always ready to assist with a positive attitude.furthermore, the hotel itself exceeded my expectations in terms of cleanliness, comfort, and amenities. The rooms were spacious and well-appointed, providing a cozy retreat after a day of exploring the stay. The exceptional service provided by the front desk staff truly made my stay memorable, and i look forward to returning in the future. If you re looking for a hotel that combines top-notch accommodations with exceptional customer service, look no further than lasenta hotel.

Lovely 5-day stay. Amazing room with lots of space and rice field view. Very comfortable bed. Amazing pool with rice field view, it is small, but we were lucky that there were not a lot of guests at the same time. Can recommend this hotel.
Amazing hotel with friendly staff, clean an fresh rooms and relaxing views over the rice fields from the pool
Cực kì hài lòng ạ. Chị chủ nhà dễ thương khỏi bàn luôn

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The building and the pool is very pretty. The bell boy quyen is very friendly and helpful, so is the tall guy who serves us at the pool bar.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 부모님이 가장 좋아하신 호텔이었어요. 가격대비 만족도도 높고 조식도 맛있었어요. 친절히 잘 도와줘서 감사합니다.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Such a great place. Little bit away from the old town, but not too far. Very restful and clean.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 깨끗하고 넓고좋아요 셔틀도있어서 다니기넘좋아요 비가와서 구경을많이못했는데 휴양하기에좋은거같아요조용하고 친절해요

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 호이안 구시가지와 떨어져 있으나, 서틀로 구시가지, 안방비치로 이동 용이, 서양식 서비스시스템, 동양식내부조화등 만족, 다음에도 이용하고픈 호텔

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Wonderful property, nice spa, pool etc. Shuttle driver, khoi, was very friendly and helpful. All staff were really great, even with language barrier, they did their best to help with questions, directions, showing us how to eat local foods. The waitresses were especially kind and helpful. Overall a great place.....

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Hotel staff was very friendly room condition was good! unfortunately,there are not many breakfast types. But taste is good. I had a good time there.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Staff could not have been better. All very helpful and chatty didn t feel as though they were just doing their job.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: All staff had pleasant personalities and seemed to truly go out of their ways to make each guest s experience better. From changing the direction of the elevator to meet your floor to keeping the pool open later, the staff seemed to genuinely care. Room cleaning was beyond 5-star, servicing three times daily unless guest notifies otherwise.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: It was a good stay, the location is quiet and not too far from town to borrow one of the bikes and go for a ride. Decent newish building. When we asked about an extra night they gave a price that was 15 more than our original booking so we decided not to stay

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 서비스 및 직원의 친절도는 무척 높게 평가합니다. 요구한 사항들에 대한 대처도 무척 마음에 들었습니다. 다만 호텔 구조의 문제인지, 함께 투숙한 숙박객의 문제인지는 몰라도 투숙 기간 무척 소란스러웠습니다. 처음 2일은 4층에 투숙했는데 5층에 투숙한 대가족이 밤부터 새벽까지 너무 소란하여 결국 방을 7층으로 옮기게 되었습니다. 7층은 상대적으로 조용하기는 하였으나, 쿵 하며 문 닫히는 소리, 가구 끄는 소리 등 층간소음이 여전하였습니다. 상대적으로 오토바이 소리 등의 소음이 적은 것은 마음에 들었으나, 호텔 내에서의 소리로 인하여 잠자리가 편하지는 못 했던거 같습니다. 가성비는 나쁘지 않기에, 층간소음에 예민하지 않으신 분들은 숙박하셔도 괜찮지 않을까 생각합니다. 참고로 제가 층간소음에 예민한 편입니다. 호이안 다운타운에서 택시 타려 할 때 장소를 모르는 기사가 더러 있었습니다. 호텔 명함 가지고 다니실 필요는 있는 거 같습니다.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Large family room. Great view . Washrooms we re large and well done. We we re there for only one night, so had little time to enjoy what the hotel has to offer. However we enjoyed the pool and a fantastic buffet breakfast.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 満足できなかった点はありません

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Great hotel, well situated, very good service, friendly and and efficient. Nothing negative whatsoever. /can warmly recommend.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Superb hotel with fantastic attentive staff . The breakfast which was served in the restaurant consisted of a variety of food to suit all tastes. The rooms were spacious, clean and quiet due to the hotel location and surrounding area. Thanks to all the great staff for making our 5 night stay so very memorable.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Really pleased we selected this hotel. It was close enough to the town to walk and bike provided free of charge so easy to get around. Shuttle buses were excellent as well.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 전반적으로 친절하고 깨끗한 환경이 맘에 들었는데 조식이 좀 다양하지 않고 밤에 시끄러워요 방음이 잘 안되늗듯. 그리고 무슨 향을 계속 피우는거 같은데 굉장히 강해 힘들었어요

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel was clean and modern, and the staff were very friendly, especially han solo who served in the pool bar and sports bar.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very clean and new. The place was beautiful! we have traveled and stayed in many different places in vietnam this month and this was our favorite. We agreed to come back and stay little longer next time.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel just outside the old quarter. The pool was a hit with the kids. Spacious clean rooms. Varied buffet each morning for breakfast. Free bikes to use which came in very handy. The shuttle to the beach was also great, as was the service at the beach. Wouldn t hesitate in staying here again. Nhams kitchen just up the road is really close and fab service would highly recommend

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 서비스 청결 모든게다좋았어요

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The room itself was really nice with a lovely view of hoi an. The breakfast offered was one of the best i ve ever had, although i think i would have enjoyed it more if the staff weren t standing over my shoulder while i was still eating trying to take my plate etc. Overall it s a very nice hotel in a great location in beautiful hoi an. The pool is a real highlight of this hotel.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Great hotel, lovely staff and incredible buffet breakfast. Our only downside was a room which had a shower in the bath which was hard to use for tall people! our friends room had a separate shower, would suggest putting this as a request when you book!

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 朝食ビュッフェ付きの素敵なホテル 無料の自転車貸し出しあり

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: A beautiful property nestled away from the noise and bustle of the town center. Free shuttles to and from old town. Definitely more bang for your buck. Morning breakfast is delicious and upscale. Rooms are incredibly spacious and well-appointed. Ms. Vy (manager) is a delight to work with and will see that your stay is perfect. Highly recommended!

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel has full facilities like a pool, spa, and it s in a convenient location. The city view from the room is beautiful. Staff are friendly and attentive.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: A quiet and elegant stay by the lake. The interior design was tasteful, and the balcony view was simply stunning. Staff service was warm and attentive.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful lakeside location with clean, modern rooms. The balcony added charm to the stay, perfect for relaxing. Friendly staff made us feel very welcome.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Phòng ngủ sạch sẽ, thiết kế mang đậm phong cách hội an cổ. Nhân viên thân thiện, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Bữa sáng ngon, nhiều lựa chọn. Hồ bơi rộng, nước trong và sạch.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Impressed by the large outdoor pool and airy balcony. Great views both day and night. Tasty buffet and good service. Definitely a hotel worth trying when visiting the city.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Elegant furnishings, a relaxing spa, and delicious buffet made the stay wonderful. The room had a balcony overlooking the romantic city night view. I will definitely return.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel features a spacious balcony with a beautiful view, perfect for relaxing. The breakfast buffet is diverse, the spa is professional, and the room interior is tastefully designed. I was very satisfied with my stay.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: I stayed in a corner room with a private balcony full of potted plants and greenery. The wooden furniture added a natural charm. Everything i needed was provided, and the peaceful environment made my stay memorable.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: This hotel felt like a little oasis. The balcony offered a lovely view of tropical plants. Interior design was stylish and everything was spotless. The amenities exceeded expectations. I would definitely return for another relaxing stay.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel offers everything you need for a relaxing vacation spacious rooms with balconies, a sparkling pool, and a luxurious spa. The staff were attentive and welcoming, making my stay even more pleasant.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel offers a true resort vibe with its pool that s cool and soothing. I was also impressed by the spa quiet setting and professional treatments.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very satisfied with our stay. The riverside hotel has airy rooms, a nice pool, and great spa service. Morning bike rides along the river were memorable.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Staffs are very helpful, courteous and friendly. Check in was very fast , location is perfect from old town . Room is very nice and clean . Would definitely come back

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The surrounding crying of the chickens was so noisy that i could not sleep and it was an old, too small hotel. It was far away from hoi an old town, and the bike brakes were damaged. Overall, i felt that the hotel was not carefully arranged

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 생각보다 벌레도 없고 쾌적했던 리조트

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 가족동반 여행이라 이동이 많지 않을 것으로 생각 결정 하였습니다. 전반적으로 좋았습니다

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 조용함.아늑함. 리버뷰 룸 리버는 별로. 오토바이 렌트로 자유롭게 다닐수 있어서 매우 만족함

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: 다운 타운 과의 거리가 쪼금 불편한 점 말고는 모두 좋았습니다.재방문의사 있음.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: The hotel it s self is ok. Portions in the restaurant are incredibly small and not good value for money. Staff inform you everyday 30 mins before hand that breakfast is closing, slightly excessive. The hotel will check your room before allowing you to leave to make sure that you haven t stolen anything.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Le pavillon hoi an luxury resort och spa ett stort tack för en mysig vecka, så imponerad av er fantastiska service inriktade och trevlig personal. Fina, rymliga och väl städade rum god, riklig och omväxlande frukostmat varje dag. Ett hotell som vi gärna kommer tillbaka till.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Pretty amazing. Best buffet breakfast i ve ever had. Loved the poolside bar tooo

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: Very nice higher end property with very accommodating staff. Along with that comes higher end pricing at the restaurant and at the hotel in general for any additional amenities. Food and drink is priced quite a bit higher than the surrounding area, so would suggest going out for lunch or dinner. Breakfast buffet is included and is quite good all around.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: I was truly satisfied with my stay. The room was clean, with modern amenities. The balcony view was impressive, especially at night. Staff were always helpful.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
userCmt: À l intérieur, le hall d entrée est grandiose, toujours décoré dans le style colonial les chambres presque féeriques. Biensûr il ne faut pas regarder dans le détail, car si on s attarde, l hôtel malgré son jeune âge, tombe déjà en décrépitude. Ici comme partout au vietnam les finitions sont rarement bien faites et tout vieillis donc prématurément. Même si elle fonctionne bien la clim parait déjà vétuste par exemple. Bien qu elle ferme tôt (19h00), la piscine à débordement est très agréable, surtout le revêtement en marbre au touché mat ! des transats et des serviettes sont à disposition gratuitement et le tout est bien orienté afin que vous puissiez profiter du soleil toute la journée. En plus, un bar de piscine est là pour vous proposer toutes sortes de boissons fraiches. Avec une profondeur maximale d 1m60 la piscine est séparée en deux, avec une pataugeoire pour les enfants... Et oui le point négatif des couples en quête de tranquilité l hôtel accueille beaucoup de groupes et de familles ! oubliez la sérénité des bananiers environnants et dites bonjour au cris des enfants ! ça vous avait manqué, hein ?! heureusement qu ils se rattrapent sur leur copieux petit déjeuner. Le choix est varié. Malheureusement le gros point négatif de cet hôtel est la literie... Très très ferme ! pour ne pas dire horriblement dure ! c est la raison pour laquelle je ne lui attribue seulement que 3 étoiles. Pour nous la nuit a été... Difficile ! mais, c est à vous de voir.

hotelName: Le Pavillon Hoi An Luxury Resort & Spa
