Chủ nhà rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình, căn nhà cũng khá gần phố cổ vì vậy rất thuận tiện khi đi về muộn. Tuy nhiên cả 4 phòng tôi thuê đều bị mốc ẩm, 1 phòng thì máy lạnh bị hư, 1 phòng thì có gián và ga giường ẩm, dù chúng tôi đã được đổi phòng nhưng cũng khá thất vọng.
Phòng sạch sẽ và chủ homestay thân thiện. Tôi sẽ book lại nếu trở lại hội an.
Mọi thứ đều ok, duy nhất phòng wc nên có quạt thông gió. Sẽ trở lại khách sạn nếu có dịp đi hội an lần sau
Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Sẽ quay trở lại vào dịp khác
Khu yên tĩnh, khách sạn thoáng đãng. Phòng nghỉ và vệ sinh hơi nhỏ
Villa nên có khăn giấy khô , tẩy vết gỉ sét nơi lavabo, một số phòng có ẩm mốc trần nhà chủ nhà dễ thương, nhiệt tình tạo điều kiện đổi phòng phù hợp có cho mượn xe đạp để đi dạo phòng tiện nghi
Phòng và nhân viên đều ok, tuy nhiên khách sạn không có thang máy mà gia đình mình có người lớn tuổi, lại ở tầng cao nên bất tiện điểm này.
Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, nhưng hơi xa phố cổ một chút
Nhà vệ sinh bốc mùi rất rất hôi. Hôi đến nổi cảm nghĩ nằm trên giường mà như nằm trong toilet. Rất tệ
Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình, có xe đạp miễn phí, phòng sạch sẽ
Anh chủ rất dễ thương. Hỗ trợ tụi mình hết mình trong chuyến đi hội an vừa rồi. Nếu có dịp được quay lại, tụi mình sẽ ghé đây thêm lần nữa.

Anh chủ rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình lại còn thân thiện. Phòng rất sạch sẽ , không gian thoáng mát. Villa gần trung tâm phố cổ luôn nha, tại villa còn cho mượn xe đạp free tiện cho việc bạn muốn trải nghiệm phố cổ bằng xe đạp . Rất đáng đồng tiền bát gạo nè
Phòng ở sạch sẽ và anh chủ rất nhiệt tình.
Anh chủ dễ thương, nhiệt tình, có hồ bơi view siêu đẹp, phòng sạch lại còn thơm, view phòng thơ mộng như đà lạt, có ban công, cửa sổ thoáng mát. 5 cho le petit villa

Khách sạn xa phố cổ, không có thang máy nên rất vất vả để khách đưa hành lý lên xuống lúc nhận - trả phòng. Cầu thang thiếu ánh sáng, mọi người lên xuống cẩn thận trượt ngã. Phòng ở khá nhỏ và cách âm rất kém, wc bốc mùi rất hôi, phòng tắm không thoát nước. Tôi khá hối hận khi đặt phòng ở đây (

Mình thấy đa phần người dân và người làm dịch vụ ở hội an nói riêng và miền trung nói chung khá thân thiện, nhiệt tình, trừ villa này. Mình ở đà nẵng 3 ngày, sau đó check out lúc 12h rồi gọi xe tới hội an (m đã book phòng trước, chồng 100 tiền phòng). Đến nơi thì tầm 12h45. Em nhân viên (ít tuổi, còn là học sinh) thấy gia đình mình tới, chưa gì đã nói nhà em 13h30 mới cho khách check in ạ mình có nói vậy để chị để đồ ở đây ngồi đợi. Trong khi nhà mình có trẻ nhỏ, mình cứ nghĩ phòng đó đang có khách chưa check out nên thôi ngồi đợi tí, với cả bé nhân viên là trẻ con nên mình không muốn nói nhiều. Sau đó tầm 13h20 thì bé nhân viên có gọi điện thoại cho ai đó (chắc là chủ villa) hỏi đã cho khách vào phòng được chưa sau đó đưa chìa khóa cho nhà mình. Lên phòng thì mình mới biết là phòng không hề có khách đang ở, tại sao họ phải cứng nhắc như vậy nhỉ? nếu không có khách đang ở thì có thể linh động cho mình nhận phòng sớm cho khách nghỉ ngơi mà, trời thì nắng nóng, nhà 4 ngưòi cả trẻ con ngồi đợi dưới phòng khách mệt vô cùng. Lên nhận phòng thì phòng nóng như cái lò, thùng rác thì không có chả biết vứt rác vào đâu. Hôm sau mình gặp 1 chị dọn phòng thì có hỏi chị đó có phải chủ nhà ko, mình muốn check out muộn vì giờ bay là buổi tối, nếu 12h out thì mình không biết đi đâu cả. Chị ấy kiểu thái độ như đuổi khách ấy, trả lời rất nhanh là không được vì kín phòng rồi thật sự lần đầu tiên sau 2 lần đi du lịch đn-ha mà mình gặp người làm dịch vụ tồi như lần này luôn. Mình gặp bn người ở đây ai cũng dễ thương và nhiệt tình cả. Đúng là ở đâu cũng có người nọ người kia thật còn cả chuyện thuê xe máy nữa nhưng dài quá rồi xin dừng lại review ở đây. Tóm lại là dịch vụ và thái độ rất tệ.
Phòng chưa được vệ sinh sạch sẽ trước khi giao cho khách hàng, các đồ dùng cá nhân cần thay mới .
Mới đi về book phòng 450k mà phòng hơi mùi và nhà vệ sinh hơi dơ nha
Tres propre, tranquille, proprietaire toujours prete à aider! matelas confortable! tout etait parfait! )
It was nice because the accommodation was so clean and spacious. My sister was so kind that i enjoyed my trip so much. I m planning to use it again next time.

The property was on a quiet street and only a short walk to the beach and the main street that had many shops and restaurants. The room was cozy, clean, and well decorated. Everything worked well, ac, the shower had good pressure and hot water, wifi was excellent, and the tv had hd cable channels. I also liked that the balcony was cool and breezy most of the day. Mia and her staff were all great, they were friendly and helpful. I would also recommend getting a massage at mia s sister s spa (mimi spa).
Vị trí siêu gần bãi biển. Riêng tư, yên tĩnh. Phòng sạch, đẹp, đầy đủ nhu cầu. Nhà hàng bãi biển ngay dưới ngon, hai bên cạnh có nhà hàng hải sản. Sẽ quay lại
Lần thứ 2 ở đây, nhưng đi 1 mình không còn người ở bên nữa

We had the best time at this place. The place genuinely cares about you having the best experience. Linh linh made checked us in and explained the resort, times, schedules. Then she inquired about what we wanted to see do. She organized an excursion to bach ma and helped us get some tailor made clothes. Any questions i had she gave me answers and options. We would definitely come back and make sure she would be our coordinator. Thank you linh linh. The rest of the staff was very attentive as well.
Alles top! super service und jedes mal gerne wieder.absolut empfehlenswert!
Quite time
놀라운 가성비! 모기 벌레 걱정할 정도 아닙니다.

We stayed for a wonderful week at legacy hoi an. Our room was very large and clean with a beautiful bathtub, lounge area, fridge, kettle, aircon, his and hers basin areas and a balcony overlooking the amazing gardens full of tropical flowers that surround the resort. Breakfast buffet was huge and delicious. There are two large pools to swim in overlooking the rice paddies, with a bar beside them. My only suggestion would be to make the pool water a bit cooler in summer. The staff were very special with quinnie, na, chau and others whose name i can t recall, being so helpful to us during our stay. I highly recommend this peaceful resort between the old town and an bang beach. We will return!
오랜만에 두번째 방문한곳입니다 맘에들고 조용합니다

Beautiful stay. Plenty of options provided by the hotel regarding inclusive shuttle buses bicycle use to town or beach. Hotel breakfast was great during the stay aswell as the reception team with any requests.

The hotel is far enough from the central tourist area so you can relax away from the but close enough to ride a bike there. Bikes are free to guests or you can ride the hotel shuttle to the beach or the old quarter.

진짜 너무너무 좋았어요 돌아오는게 너무 아쉬웠어요ㅠㅠ 리조트가 그리너리해서 너무 예쁘고 건물들은 연륜이 있어서 분위기도 있고ㅎ 그럼에도 관리가 잘 되어있어요 직원분들도 다들 너무 친절하시고 수영장도 놀기 너무 좋았어요ㅎ 수영장 수질도 좋았구요ㅎ 셔틀버스도 편리했고 자전거대여도 유용했어요!!! 수영장에서 하루종일 놀았는데 수영장 정원 코코넛나무에서 바로딴 코코넛도 서비스로 주셨는데 너무 신선하고 좋았어요 풀서비스로 점심먹었는데 가격도 맛도 좋았구요 남자직원 minh님 특히나 기억에 남는데 남편이랑 이름이 같고ㅋㅋ 저희 딸이랑 동갑인 딸이 있으셔서 그런지 저희 딸아이 이름도 외워 불러주시고 너무 친절하셨어요.. 그냥 떠나기 너무 아쉬웠어요ㅠㅠ 조식도 좋았고 매일 청소해주시면서 과일과 생수도 준비해주시고ㅠ 휴양지 느낌 뿜뿜이고.. 위치는 올드타운까지 걸어서는 30분ㅎ 셔틀버스타면 금방이구요 조용하니 더 좋았어요 호이안에 또 간다면 재방문 의사 있어요ㅎㅎ
環境清幽 有兩個泳池可以選擇 有shuttle bus去市中心

호이안 앤시언트 하우스 빌리지 리조트 스파에서의 여행은 정말 최고였습니다. 모든 직원 분들이 친절하고 세심했고, 테라스가 딸린 객실에서 내려다보는 정원도 무척 아름다웠어요. 수영장도 무척이나 훌륭했습니다. 아침 식사도 무척 만족스러웠는데, 특히 튀긴 스프링롤이 너무 맛나서 정말 많이 먹었던 것 같네요. 올드타운이나 혼잡스러운 마을에서 조금 떨어져있는 위치조차 만족스러웠습니다. 넓게 펼쳐진 논만 봐도 마음이 평화로워지는 느낌. 이 곳에서 5박 6일 동안 더할 나위 없이 좋은 시간을 보내었네요. 누가 호이안에 가겠다고 하면 앤시언트 하우스 빌리지 리조트 스파를 추천하지 않을까 싶습니다. 다들 고맙습니다! )

Great location and facilities. Excellent breakfast, even had poached eggs. Good bar and a wonderful atmosphere about tbe place. We had a villa which was brill. Excellent internet, used a firestick for tv with no problems. Would definetly book again.
Amazing! i couldn t ask for a better stay with better service. Sooo accommodating and helpful! shout-out to lan, who greeted us to the property.

Beautiful location - peaceful oasis outside hanoi. Convenient for beach and town centre with free shuttles for guest. The room was stunning with everything you need. Two lovely pools. Great friendly service
Great amenities, beautiful gardens and exceptional staff especially minh and linh. Highly recommend.
Wonderful stay with the rice fields out your door!
Vi havde booket 7 dage og alt var super godt - det ligger 3 km uden for old town men vi lejede en scooter- ligger i fred og ro
Great property, staff, spa and location.

Très bel hôtel, surtout notre logement avec piscine privé avec a un prix imbattable auquel nous l avons eu. Situé dans les rizières entre la vieille ville et la plage avec un système de navettes gratuite

호텔 분의기자체는 아주 좋음 딱 휴양 온 느낌은 남 방도 깨끗하고 만족하는데 모기가 너무 많았음 모기약 가져가면 좋을듯..그래서 3박4일 문 열어놓고 청소하기에 청소 한번도 하지말라했음. 청소 안했을때 타올은 좀 미리 가져다 놓았으면 함. 연락하면 바로 가져다 주기는 하는데, 미리미리 줬으면 한다. 그리고 조식...날파리같은게 많아서 야채는 먹을수가 없고, 가짓수도 적은데, 맛도 없어서 먹을게 없음..수영장은 나무가 있어서 그늘진곳도 있어 놀기 좋음 만족 전반적으로 만족하긴 했는데, 다시 갈지는 음... 무조건 5성급 호텔 갈거임
Quietness and rural feeling

Beautiful hotel in a quiet location. All the staff were friendly and helpful, especially loan and the reception team who were on hand to provide help and advice. The free shuttle to the old town and beach were handy but a grab taxi is quite cheap if the shuttle times didn t suit. Rooms were spacious and comfortable. The sound of the cicadas, the gekkos and all the greenery added to the peaceful experience. Our kids loved the pool and the wifi was great. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking to stay outside the old town.

It was a great pleasure staying at this beautiful resort. It was tranquil setting in the rice fields with all the coveniences without the crowds and noise. Easy transport to hoi an old town or the beaches. The staff were extremely kind, courteous, and helpful.
Beautiful tropical gardens with pools. Lovely rooms, peaceful, caring staff.
다시 오고 싶을만큼 예쁜 숙소. 편안하고 직원분들 참 친절하셔서 좋았어요. 셔틀버스가 있지만 그냥 그랩타고 다녔어요.
조용하고 넓어요 이름이 바뀌었나봐요 관리가 잘되어서 조경도 훌륭합니다 수영장 너무 이쁘고 나무가 많아서 이뻐요 또 가고 싶은 리조트
Lovely location. Very friendly staff linh so cute and min excellent food very spacious rooms with nice view.

Super hotel med søde mennesker hotellet har en bus service med gratis transport til byen og til stranden med ny bus med wifi dejlig morgenmad. Kaffen kunne dog være bedre x1fae3 bestilte en salat med kylling til værelset. Salaten var fin men kyllingen var sååå tør og sej. Der er et sushi sted i som er fantastisk og billigt ift dk
Very peaceful location with great food and excellent friendly and helpful staff. Fully recommended.

Legacy hoi an is a lush romantic hotel with plenty of green fauna and attentive staff. We had 2x adjoining rooms - whereas our kids had their own separate room next to ours and we could walk in and out which was nice. Rooms were elegantly traditionally styled with a nice marble tub and lovely shower facilities. Other pleasant offerings were 2x pools, buffet breakfast with satisfactory food options with a omlette chef and traditional soup chef. Also had shuttle bus services to the city centre and beach nearby and free bicycle hire to get around if your keen. Gym was modern free and offered free yoga classes. Whole family has massages. Would start again

Great property, overlooking rice fields and water buffalo. Exactly what we were hoping for. Fantastic room, staff and facilities. Reception staff were so helpful. Regular shuttle bus available to take you into hoi an or to the beach. Very cheap to get taxis into hoi an or de nang
I simply loved this place!

It was a nice resort to come back to after a exploring places of interest in a hot amd humid days. The hotel room is very comfortable and people very accommodating. Free shuttle to old town too. Highly recommended.

We stayed here for 2 nights while in hoi an and overall the hotel was really great. It was low season so it was not that busy, but the staff was super nice and attentive. The room is really big and the bed is very comfortable. The shuttlebus going both to the beach and to old town makes it easy to see the highlights around and additionally the hotel has free bicycles! the breakfast was great and changed a bit between the days which was nice. All taken together we recommended staying here while in hoi an!
多少の古さはあるものの 手入れが行き届いており 非常に快適 またスタッフの方の笑顔やどこですれ違っても挨拶して頂けるなど 細やかな気遣いが素敵 またホイアンに行く際にはお世話になりたいと思える良いホテルでした

様々な口コミも読み このホテルを利用させていただきました 一言でいうなら素晴らしいホテルでした 国民性や 根本の考え方の違いは当然あるでしょうし それぞれの国の排水や水圧等のお水事情は違います そんな中 素晴らしいおもてなしを受けたと感じることができました 拙い英語に耳を傾けてくれ 少々古いながらも自転車を貸していただき ホイアンの美味しい朝食や 観光名所巡りができ 夜は街中まで無料シャトルバスがあり 最高の四日間を過ごすことができました レストランもまずまず美味しいと思います 楽しい時間を過ごすことができ 感謝です またいつの日か利用させてもらえたらと思います

受付の対応は拙い英語でも丁寧に対応していただき お客が少なかったせいか部屋のグレードアップやスパサービスは快適でした スタッフはとてもフレンドリーで朝食時など楽しくすごせました 食事は日替わりで サラダが新鮮で美味しく他の料理は4つ星といったところです ホイアン市内へのシャトルバスも便利に使わせていただきました ただ プールの水が温泉のように温かく暑い気温の中 身体のクールダウンができず残念です 部屋にあるオブジェ的なバスタブに湯をはるのには時間がかかりますので要注意です

We had a nice stay at the hoi an ancient house village hotel. It is definitely a green place, with garden all around the village. It s very quiet and clean. The staffs was friendly and helpful. And we thoroughly enjoy the vip perks and the entire stay. Thank you

We loved our 6 night stay here. Our family room was very comfortable, the gardens are stunning and the staff are excellent (especially jenny and na). The buffet breakfast and relaxing pools were both highlights. The resort is a short drive into town. Jenny helped organise a car for us to visit my son. Absolutely loved our time here and would recommend to other families with young children.
이가격에 이런 리조트에 묵을수있다니 너무나 행운입니다!!! 룸컨디션도 좋고 리조트의 전체적인 느낌은 숲속에 있는듯합니다. 모든직원들이 친절합니다. 올드티운까지의 거리도 그랩이용해 다녔는데 10분정도 걸린듯하네요. 다시 꼭 가고싶은 리조트입니다! 조용하고 아늑하고 아름답습니다.
Nice place, very friendly staff, excellent breakfast buffet. A bit outside town but that made it a nice and quiet place. Toen on walking/bike distance
The location and views are phenomenal. The staff and service were excellent. The food deliciously enjoyable. The swimming pools clean and warming.
외관과 헬스장이 아쉽지만 내부 숙소가 너무 깨끗하고 좋음 직원들이 너무 친절하고 따뜻함 무료 셔틀로 시내와 바다로 데려다주고 데리러 옴 (올드타운과 안방비치까지 차로 5분 거리)

밤늦게 체크인 했는데 웰컴드링크와 함께 아주 친절하게 맞이해주었고 방을 업그레이드해줘서 감사했음 침구도 좋고 꽃으로 장식해둔 방이 참 로맨틱함 정원도 예쁘고 조경이 너무 잘돼있음 2박 했는데 조식 메뉴도 매일 달라지고 다 맛있음 3대가 다 맛있게 먹음 식당에서 음식이 괜찮은지 한국말로 물어봐주는 남자직원분 친절하고 스윗함 리셉션 직원들도 친절하고 자전거 대여하는곳 직원도 친절하고 모두가 친절함 방에서 도마뱀 두마리 봤음 기절할듯 놀랐지만 아이는 즐거워함 무엇보다 아침마다 조식먹고 자전거 빌려서 동네를 돌았는데 그게 여행기간 중 가장 행복한 기억임 다만 한가지 아쉬운건 방바닥에 뭘 흘려서 닦았는데 몹시 더러움ㅜㅜ 방에서 꼭 슬리퍼 신고다니세요 물걸레 청소 한번씩 해줌 좋겠음 재방문 의사 많이 있음
Fantastisk resort, nydelige rom og supert personale.
직원들 친절하고 조용해서 좋았어요 수영장 둘다 맘에 들어요
Liked that it was quite and had an indochine vibe

The services provided by the staff. They are polite and helpful. They explained the hotel facilities and services to us very clearly during the check in. They also helped us to arrange the transportation, such as taxi, shuttle bus, airport transfer at a very reasonable price. We are deeply impressed by the attitude and services of their staff.
Relaxing and quiet atmosphere, staff attentive and go out of their way to assist.
Lovely stay, great location, friendly staff
What made our stay great was the receptionist who checked us in. She did her best to make everything comfortable for us. Her name was nguyen thi na.

The legacy hoi an resort is fantastic. From the lovely, efficient, professional reception ladies, to the grounds keeping, the maid service, and the restaurant, the staff is available 24 7 to take care of all your needs. The rooms are immaculately clean and our view of the rice fields was awesome. The legacy provides 5 star service but if i could rate it 100 stars, i would. This is the finest of the finest resorts.

Legacy was a wonderful stay. All the staff were always helpful and had great positive energy. Especially nguyen thi na who was very attentive. Greeted us with a bright smile and made are stay at legacy above and beyond that much better. Thank you nguyen thi na.

Lovely resort with super helpful staff, it was a nice relaxing place to go back to after time in hoi an. Two nice pools to relax around, a free shuttle bus into hoi an, but a grab was only around 1 if you didn t want to wait for the shuttle. It was a bit further out from hoi an, about a 10 minute drive but hoi an was so overwhelming busy at times it was nice to come away and relax. Loved hoi an, the sunset were beautiful overall would recommend this hotel there was a restaurant and a bar with a pool table all very quiet but nice when you return from hoi an.

Quiet out of town option for a visit to hoi an. Lovely option as villa feels it is in the countryside. Quiet, lovely staff and breakfast. Use a bike as a the best option into the centre of town. Easy access to visit bana hills and danang also.

Vi hade några toppenbra dagar på hotellet.hade gärna stannat längre så vi kunde njuta mer av poolerna och omgivningen. Allt fräsch och riktigt bra frukostbuffe. Bra med shuttelbuss och gratiscyklar att låna.
スタッフが親切で感じが良かった 旧市街地までもgrabで5分程までと交通の便も良く カウントダウンパーティーも楽しく過ごせました 翌日はダナンのホテルに泊まりましたが 朝食はこちらのホテルの方が美味しくいただけました また機会があれば泊まりたいです
Stayed 3 nights. Staff are fantastic, resort grounds are kept very tidy. Rooms are nice, a little noisy though. Breakfast is ok, pass if you can get some nicer food in town.
Fantastic place, and very friendly staff
발리 우붓의 숙소와 같이 환경이 좋으며 올드타운. 재래시장이 가까이 있고. 직원들이 뭐던지 도와줄려고 하고 친절합니다. 아주 만족스러운 곳입니다.
I enjoyed my time here! very peaceful and beautiful pool. Loved the room service.
2回目の滞在ですが団体が多いので閉口しました 朝食のレストランはいつもいつも満員で落ち着かなかったです カントリーサイドで落ち着くロケーションなのに残念です
自然に囲まれており 非日常を感じながら宿泊ができました 旧市街へも ホテルからシャトルバスがあるので 特に不便はありません

An oasis of peace and relaxation! staff were amazing and go above and beyond to ensure you have a fabulous stay. Free bus shuttle service to beach and town a real bonus and enjoyed the free use of the bikes. All round amazing experience

비행기 지연으로 급하게 다낭쪽에서 그랍불러 새벽에 호이안까지 새벽1시에 체크인했어요.. 3명 3베드로 업글도 해주시고.. 힘들고 지친 가족에게 너무나 친절하게 안내해주신 수호신같은 분이였습니다 수영장도 꽤 넓고 무엇보다 비싼 호텔 조식 4인10만원 추가조식보다도 맛있고 훌륭했습니다. 주말이라 그랍이 8만동 나오는걸 호텔측에서 4만4천동에 불러주셨습니다.. 숙소 내부가 빌라식으로 운치있고 조용하고 좋았습니다. 내년 지인들과 다낭 재방문시 꼭 레거시 호이안 리조트로 예약하겠습니다

Great hotel, lovely rooms lots of space and very clean and the staff are amazing so friendly and helpful so close minutes to town in shuttle or taxi pools and restaurants are great breakfast buffet had amazing choices fresh egg station will go back a
풀이 많아 예쁘고 직원들도 친절하시고 부지런히 치우셔서 그런지 상당히 깨끗하고 잘 관리된 느낌! 조식도 맛있음 ㅎㅎ

Best hotel resort we stayed in all of vietnam . 5 stars . We booked the villa with the private pool 2 villas and a pool in the middle . Kids loved it , wife loved it , bonus point for dad . Would come back again only complaint was breakfast really.
너무 이뻤어요 가성비도 좋고요 다음에가면 길게 묵어야겠어요 하루라서 너무 아쉬웠어요
Magnifique hôtel, chambre spacieuse, très propre. Piscines splendides avec vue. Personnel au petit soin. Petit dej copieux et varié recommandons vivement

Look no further, this may be the best hotel/resort in hoi an or one that you ve ever stayed in! paradise in the middle of a rice field with local farmers working tirelessly with their buffaloes. As if that s not enough a reason, here s more - 2 amazing pools - gym - restaurants/bar for meals if you don t feel like leaving the resort - convenience store within the resort compound - complimentary breakfast with a wide variety of delicious spread each morning - complimentary water bottles daily - complimentary shuttle to hoi an old town and back. Thanks to its dedicated drivers - complimentary relaxing yoga class twice a week by the lovely anh - complimentary bicycle rentals to explore the neighborhood or the beautiful city - our suite and the entire resort is amazing. Words don t do it justice. Pix attached for your reference. - last but not least to the amazing staff at the resort. The reception team is exceptional always going over and beyond to ensure maximum satisfaction for all its guests. Shout out to anh, loan, lan, thuy, linh, jenny, na, nam, con, huynh all in all, nothing but praises and i hope you ll get to experience the beauty and magic of legacy hoi a one day!
Wonderful property that felt very authentic vietnamese. Loved the design of our apartment, very spacious and well thought of. Staff was also very friendly and helpful.

Legacy hoi an hotel is a fantastic place to stay in hoi an! the rooms are cozy and beautifully decorated, perfect for a good night s sleep. Breakfast is delicious with lots of options, and the shuttle is super reliable, running to both the old town and the beach several times a day. The location is peaceful and close to the river, ideal for relaxing. And if you miss the shuttle, no worries a quick grab ride to town is only around two euros. But the best part? the amazing staff! thuy, linh, na na na na, and van anh are so funny, friendly, and attentive they made our stay unforgettable. Shoutout to the malaysian gm, who takes sundays off but has left a fantastic team. Highly recommend for a great stay in hoi an!

The gardens were beautiful well kept the staff are very friendly and welcoming thanks to lan who was excellent. Room was very nice and air conditioned comfortable king bed. Very good breakfast so much choice!!! good size pool open till 9 pm
Our stay at legacy was fantastic. The staff were friendly and helpful. We would recommend this resort to anyone travelling to vietnam.

The beauty of the room and the property views perfectly match the pictures posted. Additionally, the staff is very cheerful and accommodating. The breakfast is exceptional, but there is room for improvement in the lunch/dinner menu as it lacks variety and can be quite dull. Furthermore, the mixed drinks are quite disappointing.

I was refused entry into vietnam and the hotel took advantage of the situation. I have prepaid 5 nights. I received no response to my requests for a partial refund. The hotel s website does not provide any useful contact information. The facetime link is not working and if you call the number, the person at the other end speaks very limited english. No whatsapp number, no email. Contact property chat also not working.
너무 아름다고 훌륭한 호텔입니다. 다음에도 반드시 숙박하고 싶습니다.
직원들이 모두 친절하고 도움을 주려고 하여 좋았습니다. 룸도 청결하고 주위 자연 환경과 경관도 좋았습니다. 호이안 시장과 올드타운, 야시장, 그리고 안방해변으로 갈 수 있는 무료 셔틀도 편했습니다. 특별히 ms. Anh의 친절에 감사하고, 그녀의 아침 요가 클래스를 가족과 함께 참여해보시기를 추천합니다.
직원분이 친절하고 음식도 맛있었어요 방이 넓고 주변정원이 잘 되어 있어 좋았어요 너무 즐거운 여행이었습니다
꼭 가세요
部屋に風呂が最高 ロケーションも良い チャリが便利

If you are looking for a quiet spot to relax with a beautiful view and amazing breakfasts this is the place! the shuttle service to and from town and the beach was very handy, we really felt like we had the best of both worlds.
It was a beautiful hotel. The villa room was perfect - spacious and excellent standard. The package included spa treatments, which was a lovely bonus. The food and service was excellent.
모든것이 만족스럽습니다

We loved our 5 night stay here. It s our second time at legacy and we were still really impressed. Our room was upgraded and very comfortable. Staff are very friendly (especially jenny) and we appreciated the sweet touch of a slice of cake on my husband s birthday. Convenient location as only a short grab or shuttle bus into town. Pool area is beautiful (although a little cool for swimming in january). The gardens are beautiful, with our toddler loving the fish. Very comfortable stay and we really enjoyed the buffet breakfast each morning.

Hôtel agréable et reposant aux milieux des rizières à 15 min en voiture de la vielle ville de hoi an. Navette gratuite pour hoi an 3 fois par jour ainsi que 2 fois pour la plage de an bang beach. Hôtel propre et très bien entretenu, beaucoup de verdure, jardin luxuriant. Il y a deux piscines avec des transats et serviettes à disposition. Personnel sympathique, souriant et serviable. Petit déjeuner copieux, beaucoup de choix et produits de qualité ainsi comme par exemple les jus de fruits. Seule bémol, j aurais apprécié une machine à café, pour plus de variétés que juste le café noir. Nous avons aussi dîner 3 fois au restaurant, les plats étaient bons et les prix sont corrects. Les portions de pâtes pourraient être un peu plus copieuses. Notre chambre familiale était grande avec une literie confortable ainsi qu une très belle salle de bain. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour de 8 nuits dans cet établissement, que je recommande.

Both the public and private gardens were nice. Location between town and beach was good. Spacious layout of hotel with nice pools. European style coffee though available in the town was a problem for the hotel staff at breakfast.
Beautiful hotel with good service to the beach and town
Schöne anlage, etwas außerhalb, gratis shuttlebus

We had a wonderful stay at the hotel. The room was truly beautiful. We also has dinner at the hotel which was very nice. The staff and especially linh linh was always very attentive and polite. They even brought fresh fruits in the morning and local snacks in the afternoon to our room on a daily basis.

Hoi an ancient house was our favorite stay in a 2 week, multi-city trip to vietnam. Linh and the other manager and their staff were amazing. Sooo helpful. If you needed something it was yours. The room was even better than expected and the grounds were unique and beautiful with multiple pools. Another reviewer said it best, at first you arrive and you are not sure and then once you settle in, interact with the staff and explore the grounds you realize it s a fantastic hotel and an awesome value. I liked that it was not in hoi an central, allowed you to go back to peace and quiet and it was easy to rent a motorbike from the team to get into town which was only a few minutes down the road. Delicious breakfast and food at restaurant. I highly recommend hoi an ancient house.

This was our first chance to have a holiday as true families post covid lockdown. Ancient house village proved to be a great resource for us as the amazing staff were very flexible and allowed the families to change rooms and be very close together. We loved the relaxed nature of the resort and everybody s friendliness especially when it came to bike hire, organizing transport, etc. Ling ling on the front desk in particular was incredibly helpful and her infectious smile put everyone at ease. I would highly recommend this great little resort. They also have a partnership with the deckhouse at an bang beach which is a great place to hang out during the day.
비가오는 날이었어도 아주 훌륭한 숙소였습니다. 1박이라 아쉬었고 다음에 날씨가 좋을때 더 천천히 묵고 싶습니다. 특히 가족여행으로 좋고 셔틀버스가 있어 호이안 시내까지 접근도 매우 좋습니다.

위치 올드타운에세 그랩타고 10분안걸리는듯. 집에올때는 리조트운영셔틀을이용함. 버스정 류장은 대부분의 리조트들이 서는곳과 같아서 찾기아주안어려움. 조식 쌀국수가 가장맛있었음. 빵류에는 날파리가 자꾸앉아서 맛있는데 잘못먹음ㅠㅠ 방 넓고쾌적하고 화장실세면대랑 변기도넉넉함. 티비상태가안 좋은것빼곤 나쁘지않음. 친절 잘웃어주시고 무료요가 강의도좋고 무료업그레이드해주고 좋음. 기타 한국인 거의없고 거의백인들만있어서 너무좋았음. 조용하고 진짜외국에온느낌. 호텔과비교하여 불편함은없으면서 자연컨디션도좋음, 추천.

We had 5 nights at the legacy , excellent friendly and efficient staff .we had a very smooth stay , booking lots of trips from the hotel . The rooms are spacious , clean and in tranquil garden setting . It is an environment where you can really relax , and the hotel is in a nice location tucked away from the busy streets. Our kids loved it . The swimming pools are fantastic , and the breakfast buffet was lovely
Lovely place just out of the old town so very relaxing and peaceful. Staff go out of their way to assist with everything to ensure you are happy.
Quiet environment, good scenery, attentive staff

This place and the staff working their are all out of heaven. When you arrive you might find this not as good as you may have expected but wait and see the area and facilities the next day and the polite hardworking staff and the environment and you will be more than happy
Insbesondere sehr freundlicher service

Đoàn mình có lưu trú tại ks hôm 18/6, vì đêm mới đến và sáng out sớm nên đã sơ xuất bỏ quên tuýp tẩy da chết mặt. Liên hệ lại lễ tân nhưng báo không có trong phòng. Mình thấy vô cùng bức xúc vì đây là ks đầu tiên ở trong chuyến đi nên ko thể nào quên ở nơi khác. Mn nên cân nhắc khi lưu trú tại ks này

Phòng rộng rãi,sạch sẽ,ăn sáng bình thường,có vấn đề là chủ ks đứng nhìn và nhắc nhở ở khu hồ bơi rất ko riêng tư,sợ nước văng ra và ướt cầu thang này nọ,trừ những khách ko có ý thức chứ làm dv mà kĩ tính quá thì khách ko thoải mái

Dịch vụ tốt phòng đẹp, quang cảnh thiên nhiên vô cùng tuyệt vời. Khu vực hơi xa phố cổ chút nhưng không sao. Mọi người muốn dịch vụ giặt sấy, giao nhận tận nơi giá cả hợp lý có thể đặt laundry go go (lên google seach là ra). Giao nhận tận nơi, giá rẻ hơn chỗ khác và ks, đồ sạch sẽ, thơm tho đáng ủng hộ.

Khách sạn quá oke, bạn lễ tân cho mình mượn xe đạp. Ăn sáng phục vụ ngon, view thoáng. Mình đi bộ ra memory show giá rất rẻ, rất đáng tiền nếu được thì mình sẽ vẫn quay lại đây có mỗi cái là giữa các phòng nhìn trực diện vào nhau, không có rèm trắng nên hơi thiếu riêng tư
Khách sạn đẹp sạch sẽ, phòng ốc mới, view ổn áp, có hồ bơi dưới trệt. Giá cả rẻ, có xe đạp free cho mọi người nếu muốn đạp qua phố cổ hội an chơi
超美的飯店 老闆娘很熱心也熱情 所有的工作人員都很和善 飯店怎麼拍都美 有蚊帳 只需要走路一分鐘就可以到海灘

Very good memory i ve had for 3days at this villa. It was so kind the crews we met. Location was good to go to the an bang beach, local restaurants and massage shops. However there was no souvenir shops nearby. Rental service of bicycles and motobikes was so nice that we enjoyed trip to go oldtown in hoian. But the breakfast was not good. There were not various foods to choose.

Wir hatten einen tollen aufenthalt und würden wieder kommen. Das frühstück war sehr lecker und die lage top. In 1 minute am strand und viele restaurants in der umgebung. Jeden tag frische handtücher und moskitonetz ist vorhanden. Wären gerne länger gebliben.

Everything!!!! the staff are incredible and the villa is dreamy. We are so sad to leave. The location is perfect being right on the beach and a short cab ride to the ancient town. Luan, the villa manager is the sweetest most caring host and made our entire stay truly unforgettable.
Average experience overall, pool was too cold and shaded most of the day, breakfast wasnt upto much, hotel is set back about 2 mins from beach, distance to hoi an is 15-20mins by vehicle.

Le problème est majoritairement lié aux odeurs d humidité dans le linge. Cependant, le personnel a été très réactif et changer les draps et serviettes. Beaucoup de petits insectes présents et ce toujours lié au cadre humide mais la responsable a fait le nécessaire pour minimiser cela.

Stayed here with my 5 years old daughter after a couple of work days in hoi an. Great place! 2 min to the beach and good beach restaurants. Big spacious rooms, quiet and good service. I m glad we stayed here instead of choosing a resort.

걸어서 나가면 바로 안방비치여서 위치는 아주 만족이었어요. 저희는 부모님도 계시고 12개월아기도 있었는데 청결문제로 봤으면 사실 후회스럽네요. 수영장물은 소독약냄새 많이 나고 더러웠고, 무엇보다 객실에서 무엇인지 모를 벌레에 두명이 물렸는데 그날밤 고열이 났어요. 아기는 다음날부터 열나더니 수족구에 걸렸습니다. 에어컨은 틀자마자 목이 아프고 결국 몸살이 났습니다

Really loved our 2 nights at beach villa and wish we had more..such a quiet,charming setting surrounded by lovely plants flowers and greenery and yet located only 2 minutes walk from the beach and restaurant strip. One of the few hotels that looks and feels even better than the pictures. The pool area was delightful and we had it to ourselves nearly all our stay. Being a small boutique hotel there are only a handful of other guests sharing the charming breakfast/pool area and complimentary bicycles are a perfect way to explore this lovely area. A very relaxing stay .....highly recommended
The individual and lovingly decorated rooms. The cleanliness and care of the rooms and public areas.

Tolles zimmer, viel platz. Wir hatten zwei zimmer im ersten stock. Bad ist halb offen , sehr schön. Durch den garten geht es direkt zum meer. Leider wird momentan gebaut und es war laut, aber dafür kann ja das tolle hotel und das team nichts. Wir mussten sehr früh aufbrechen und trotzdem hat die managerin uns noch mal angerufen um uns zu verabschieden. Super freundlich.
Good staff, enough breakfast, room very comfortable, very great. They help us prepare taxi to airport which reasonable price. Miss the villa so much!

This place is great..quiet location, great staff, fresh and beautiful breakfast. Free cycles for the easy trek into hoi an. And the rooms are like a beach getaway dream. Spacious, clean and great colours. Probably the best place i have stayed in south east asia.
Love the location...so close to beach. Villa is super cute and cosy. Luann and her staff are just amazing. Very friendly and helpful. Will definitely return .

The outstanding staff, the pool, the ocean at 50m, the breakfasts, the comfortable bed, the private balcony, free bicycles, nice bathroom. Beautiful tropical surroundings nicely maintained. Couldn t ask for more. 16 days of heaven. Luan is the best at the desk.

What a lovely small place. After hanoi this was just a perfect place to relax. Beautiful big room with a huge and super comfy bed. A short walk to the beach and all the restaurants. Lovely staff. Airport transfer arranged both ways. Everything handled smoothly. I would definitely stay there again. Highly recommended.
Excellent value for money, staff couldn t be more friendly. Huge rooms, comfy beds
Excellent value for money

Rom the moment our taxi stopped, we were looked after brilliantly. Everyone here is so friendly and intent on making our stay as enjoyable as possible. The room is very comfortable and serviced every day with thoroughness and efficiency. For a 2 week stay, the storage space is rather limited and the shower reminds you that you are in a very small local villa in rural vietnam, but that is what we were looking for! the location is wonderful, just a stone s throw from the beach, where you can choose between upmarket or lively beachclubs quiet sunbeds with at bed service or just a stroll along the beautiful white sands. There are a few hawkers, but if you take the time to chat, they are nice friendly people. In the evening there is a great selection of amazing local family restaurants within a few minutes walk as well as the more lively beach front bars with food and music. Hoi an is only a short taxi ride away, which is a must see both day and night. The only reason i didn t award 5 stars is because the facilities are a little basic compared to larger (and more expensive) hotels. For service and value, this would take some beating.
Really close to beach, excellent staff and food, large comfortable rooms. We booked a tour via hotel which was very good. Lu anne has good recommendations for everything.

L hôtel est très agréable, chambre spacieuse avec balcon et piscine extérieur . Nous avons apprécié la propreté des lieux, que ce soit les chambres, le linge de maison , serviette de plage.... Il est idéalement situé entre la ville et la plage, le tout facilement réalisable en vélo ( environ 3 km ). Prêt de vélo ( pratiquement neuf ) avec porte enfant disponible à la réception. Le personnel est très accueillant , elles se mettront en 4 pour satisfaire vos besoins . Taxi, location de scooter... A recommander sans hésiter

Empfehlenswertes familiäres hotel - preis/leistungsverhältnis hervorragend - sehr sauberes kleines hotel mit vielen annehmlichkeiten (kühlschrank auf dem zimmer, viele hygieneartikel vorhanden, tee und kaffee auf dem zimmer) - die zimmer mit balkon sind groß und gemütlich - das moderne bad ist mit dusche und wanne ausgestattet - pool ist groß und toll - welan funktionierte immer - die mitarbeiter sind sehr bemüht, hilfsbereit und freundlich - das frühstück ist gut - man kann viele touren buchen, taxi wird gerufen, fahrräder stehen kostenlos zur verfügung - die lage ist ruhig(er) und authentisch. Hier wohnen noch locals.

Excellent service, strong fast stable internet, good showers, comfortable bed, modern design, quiet, strong ac, good breakfasts, and free bikes to make up for the somewhat remote location. Very well run.

Great boutique hotel away from the hustle of ancient town. The staff are second to none, we were made to feel like family and the girls were so genuinely happy to have us stay there. They had a family luncheon and all the quests were invited. We loved this hotel and all the staff. Two thumbs up.

Una estancia perfecta. El hotel está nuevisimo, de diseño con habitaciones amplias y todas las comodidades necesarias. La ubicación está muy bien, cerca de hoi an y de la playa en bici, las cuales son gratuitas! nos ofrecieron la posibilidad de recogida en danang y de llevarnos al aeropuerto por muy buen precio, de hecho el último día nos recogía del conductor a las 3pm y nos dejaron quedarnos en la habitación hasta esa hora. Todo perfecto y el personal muy cercano y amable, siempre preocupándose por ti y tratando de hacerte sentir cómodo. Súper recomendable, el mejor alojamiento en el que nos hemos hospedado en 15 días en viaje en vietnam.

We absolutely adored our stay at lime villa. The rooms were big and spotlessly clean and the pool area was so relaxing. We had had a very busy trip before arriving here so it was so nice to relax in the peace and quiet of the surrounding area. We used the free bikes to reach both hoi an town and the beach area which was a great way to get around. A grab taxi is only 60k dong to the old town if you did want to jump a car though. Ms tram and her team were so friendly and always on hand to help with anything. My boyfriend particularly liked the mango pancake ms tram made him for our last breakfast! we would 100 stay at this property if we were in the area again and wouldn t hesitate to recommend to friends family.

Superfreundliche hilfsbereite leute, tolle atmosphäre, alles liebevoll und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Schöner pool. Sehr angenehm st die ruhe von dem trubel in hoi an. Fahrrad kann man kostenlos ausleihen, nah am strand und mit dem fahrrad ist man schnell im zentrum von hoi an. Sehr empfehlenswert!

Overall, my family and i couldn t ask for more from this stay. All of lime villa s staff were so friendly and polite. The villa is brand new and super clean. It s also well constructed with thick walls. Lovely pool with sun beds. We didn t mind that the location was a little further from old town hoi an, because we wanted to ensure a quiet and peaceful stay. A taxi ride was about 76k dong to old town. Ms tram also referred us to a coconut boat tour company that didn t mandate bundling the tour with a cooking class, saving us time and money. In conclusion, we would like to return to lime villa when we re-visit hoi an.
Tina was lovely and super helpful and accommodating.

The property is very nice and quiet. The staff are super nice and helpful. I visits with elderly family members. The staff offer to take one of the elder who can t bike with us to beach on his motorcycle and take him back after we are done.
Le personnel est très gentil, l établissement est bien entretenu et les chambres ont tout le confort
근처에 뭐가 없지만 외관자체가 너무 훌륭합니다. 직원들께서 영어응대가 가능해서 소통에 전혀 무리가 없었습니다. 자전거 대여 꼭 이용하세요. 직원분의 영업이 조금 있지만 불편하지 않을정도로 하세요. 엘레베이터 없어서 짐 올릴때 힘든데 도와주지 않는다는 후기를 봤었는데 너무 친절하게 도와주셨습니다. 숙소 내부도 너무 깔끔하고 좋습니다.
Tina and assistants are super hosts!!! they really care about your confort!

Our stay at lime villa was outstanding. The staff and hospitality were exceptional. They treated us so well it was difficult to leave. The hotel is clean, comfortable and in an excellent location. If we return to hoi an we will definitely stay again at lime villa.
Nơi ở rất gần phố cổ, thoải mái như ở nhà, phòng sạch, chăn đệm thơm tho. Lần sau sẽ đặt nữa nếu tới hội an
Vị trí rất gần phố cổ, có thể đi bộ. Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình, mình checkin 12h đêm vì chuyến bay bị delay nhưng vẫn đợi. Phòng gọn gàng sạch sẽ, wifi mạnh không có điểm nào để chê

Mình nghỉ 1 đêm, đi bằng xe ô tô cá nhân nên quyết định đặt phòng phía bên này sông để có chỗ để xe. Khách sạn nằm ở đường nhỏ, nên hên xui về chỗ đỗ xe, m phải mang ra đỗ ở bãi xe cách đó ko xa 150k/ đêm ( hơi xót tiền ). Phòng ốc sạch sẽ,bình dân,ko có cách âm nên phải giữ trật tự , đi bộ 1 chút là sang phố cổ. Có xe đạp cho khách mượn.
Khách sạn gọn gàng nhỏ nhắn sạch sẽ ngay phố đi bộ
Sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, tiện nghi đầy đủ

Phòng được nhận sớm sau khi khách trước đó checl out xong, không cứng nhắc thời gian nhận phòng, nhận phòng sớm so với thời gian dự kiến nên tâm trạng, tình thần cũng tốt hơn rất nhiều. Phòng to rộng rãi, có thêm 1 góc sân nhỏ có trồng cây nên không khi thoáng mát và trong lành hơn rất nhiều, giúp thư giãn thoải mái hơn khi về đêm. Rất tiếc là mình quên chụp hình
Phòng khá cũ, lúc mới vào có mùi ẩm mốc. Cách âm rất tệ, trưa mình ngủ mà nghe ở ngoài con nít chạy ầm ầm luôn
Phòng sạch sẽ gần trung tâm
Oke nhé mn!! như ở nhà!! tiện nghi sạch sẽ!!
Ok đi cho ok hơp cho gia dinh ............9
Cô chủ cực kì thân thiện. Cho mình mượn ô, xe đạp, mượn cả bát tô để ăn mì nchung là 1000000d. Lần sau quay lại mình vẫn sẽ tiếp tục ở đây
Gần phố cổ, sạch, sẽ thân thiện
Chủ thân thiện, linh động giờ check in sớm cho mình. Home siêu gần phố cổ hội an, đi xíu là đến. Xung quanh còn có tạp hoá khá là tiện, home cho mượn xe đạp nữa
Phòng sạch sẽ, rất gần phố cổ, chủ nhà thân thiện cho mượn xe đạp thoải mái
Mình bị bóng đè ở phòng này do đi 1 mình nên sẽ cân nhắc cho lần tiếp theo, cần có 2 người thì có thể ok hơn
Rat khuyen khich. Cách thị trấn cổ và chợ đêm không xa, chỉ cần 5 phút đi bộ. Giường sạch sẽ, thoải mái.
Khách sạn giá rẻ với vị trí chiến lược.

Vị trí rất gần trung tâm, đi bộ 5 phút là đến nơi thôi. Phòng nhỏ, tiện nghi tạm ổn. Chị chủ nhà nhiệt tình. Có cho mượn xe đạp để dạo quanh phố cổ. Lưu ý phố cổ chỉ cho đi bộ và đi xe đạp chứ không được đi xe máy nhé
Hài lòng. Phòng rất sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Đối diện tạp hoá. Và cách phố đi bộ tầm 200-300m. Chủ nhà tốt.
Khách sạn mới sạch sẽ vị trí bên chợ đêm hội an
Phòng nghỉ rất sạch sẽ, vị trí trung tâm, gần chùa cầu và khu phố cổ! lần sau có dịp vẫn sẽ quay lại đây!
Rất tốt, dịch vụ tốt, chủ sở hữu đáng yêu

Homestay gần trung tâm hội an (chợ đêm, chùa cầu). Đi bộ dạo chán lại về nằm, nằm xong chán lại ra dạo tiếp. Phòng mới, sạch sẽ, hầu như không bụi. Giày dép của khách lúc nào cũng xếp ngăn nắp luôn. Mình ở phòng có ban công, rộng rãi, thoáng. Homestay giờ giấc dễ chịu, chỗ để xe máy ok. Ai đi ô tô cũng vào ngon lành nha (có đường tránh phố cổ để đi xe vào), chỗ đậu thì nên liên hệ chủ homestay trước. Nước uống máy sấy đầy đủ. À sát homestay có 2 mini mart, bán đầy đủ với giá tạp hoá thông thường. Nước nóng trong nhà với tối thì có, sáng chờ mãi không thấy. Nhà vệ sinh thỉnh thoảng có mùi.
Giá rất hợp lý được phục vụ rất nhiệt tình
Tuyệt vời. Check out muộn nhưng không sao. Nhiệt tình
Sếp thân thiện và dễ mến. Bữa sáng ngon miệng. Xe đạp miễn phí. Gần phố cổ. Phòng gọn gàng và sạch sẽ. Cơ sở hiện đại.
Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát ạ. Cách phố cổ 5p đi bộ chợ đêm 2p thôi nên rất tiện ạ.
Homestay có phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, anh chủ thân thiện. Mình book phòng view ban công nên phòng thoáng và view phố cổ cũng oke la. Được mượn xe đạp miễn phí
Nhân viên ở nhà dân này rất thân thiện, rất sạch sẽ tôi rất thích ở lại đây 3 ngày.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhiệt tình dễ thương, gần phố cổ

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It is great!! nothing to fault. Super nice staff, gorgeous pool, tasty drinks, confortable room. Bikes for free and free transport for da nang airport. Close to great restaurant a little outside the old quarter but a 1,50 grab ride sooooo worth it.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice boutique,outstanding staff,nice breakfast, superb bedding

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Amazing place, amazing staff. Breakfast buffet was great, location in good walking distance to old town. Would recommend and would visit again.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Bra rum, lite tråkig utsikt kanske många tycker men vi tyckte charmigt att ha en privat trädgård utanför där det gick ankor och höns. Tuppen väckte en 5.00 som sig bör. ) bra rum i övrigt, trevlig rooftop pool. Bra frukost. Låg bra till med 20-30 min promenad längs vattnet ner till stan. Restaurangerna nära hotellet vid floden var bra och mycket lugnare att hänga där än inne i gamla stan. (där det var lite hysteriskt) vi var nöjda med läget.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This place is cozy and comfortable. The staff was friendly and respectful. We got messages and it was wonderful. The breakfast buffet is definitely memorable and delicious. Besides not being located in closer to the walking area, this place is perfect.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This is a little gem of a place a little outside the old town (about 1.50 in a grab). Rooms were spacious, clean and comfy. Staff were great and food fabulous.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful hotel . Lovely staff . Great rooftop pool . Highly recommended .

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Clean, classy, friendly, professional place. 20 min walk to old town market area. Great rooftop pool and massge spa in the basement. Excellent value with full breakfast and nice balcony views. 8 beautiful covered pickleball courts a few doors down the street is another bonus for pb players.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Friendly atmosphere, attention detail, present and quiet stay. Food is great - great pool facility.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Sorry in advance for the long review but i wanted to explain our memorable experience. Our stay in hoi an was supposed to be one night but it got extended due to my sister being very sick. It was a scary time for the both of us but i could honestly not think of a better hotel where this could have happened. First, the hotel is modern, clean and eco-friendly as it was recently built in the food was good and the room service was appreciated as my sister was unable to walk down to the restaurant. However, the true shining stars of this hotel are the staff. I can t even begin to tell you all how grateful i am for all their help during those stressful few days. Zoe - i can t thank you enough for all your support during those three days. From your kind check-in messages to helping me contact the local doctor, you truly did everything you could to help us both. Thank you for being our rock during those stressful days. Ni, kim, mei and flower - thank you for the extra touches with the room service and making special meals and drinks for my sister. Shawn- thank you for the lift to the atm so i could pay the doctor. Jamie, selena and mia - thank you for helping me speak with the airline company and cancel all the other bookings. All three of you were always ready to lend a hand and went out of your way to help me in any way you could. All in all, i highly highly recommend this hotel to all travellers and we will definitely stay here again when we return to hoi an.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 飯店很新 開幕才半年 服務人員非常友好 zoe為我們提供當地最優惠的匯率 一家黃金珠寶店mei為我們提供了當地最好的咖啡 河粉 越南麵包 還有他最推薦的當地餐廳 他也是一位咖啡愛好者 房間裡的一切都非常周到 乾淨又環保 你甚至不需要洗水壺 浴缸裡空調很大 很冷 我們的房間還有一個陽台 可以看到前面的小運河

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff of little gem were the best!

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The little gem is a lovely brand new and very clean hotel. The rooms are very spacious and there is a balcony with a nice view of the neighborhood. I was surprised to see a lovely marble bath in the bathroom. There is a nice and clean swimming pool. The breakfast included many options fruits,salads, etc. Staff are very friendly and were always willing to help. Specially mia, zoe and all the staff. It takes 4 min by grab to the old town. Overall i highly recommend the little gem hotel

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Dejligt lille hotel. Der var desværre for varmt da vi var der, til at vi kunne ligge ved poolen men det var en fin pool og morgenmaden var også god. Sødt personale og ordentlig rengøring på værelset

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 會安的天氣很熱 但酒店的空調系統很舒適 還可以獨立調溫 床鋪被褥亦很舒服 窗戶隔音很好 可以睡個好覺 早餐選攞適中 着重越式食物 食材新鮮 味道可口 員工親切有禮 每次碰面都關心你是否舒適

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The little gem was recommended to us by friends for our stay in hoi an and we certaonly found out why! the staff, led by the fantastic mei, were professional, friendly and helpful. The hotel features fabulous decor, complete with a koi fishpond in the centre of the building. The rooms were spacious, spotlessly clean and elegant. The breakfast buffet was generous and the food was delicious. We had such a great stay at little gem - which is a short walk from the busy tourist area of hoi an - and would highly recommend it for families and couples.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This place is amazing, great staff, great amenities, and amazing service overall!

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is so nice and clean. Staff are so very accommodating

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This is the best hotel we ve stayed at in vietnam. Spotless, excellent condition, very friendly, welcoming helpful english speaking staff.

hotelName: Little Gem. An Eco-Friendly Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Sensationelles frühstück. Tolle moderne einrichtung. Freundliches personal. Fahrräder kostenfrei mit denen man alles gut erreichen kann.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 施設の清潔感 ホスピタリティは旧市街エリアでは屈指だと思う また利用したい

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice place and perfect location. Close enough without the noise. Complete breakfast.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very close to everything. The staff is wonderful

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great little property to stay in hoi an. Close enough to all the action. Room was amazing. With nice furnishing and felt authentic. Ac was strong so appreciated that since hoi an is hot

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 親切な受付 チェックインし 部屋に入った時にバルコニーから気持ちの良い風 部屋にはアロマの香りが漂っていた ベトナムの他のホテルに不満でうんざりしていたが ここのおかげで旅のわくわくする気持ちを取り戻した 感謝

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Clean

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff is very friendly, it is clean and the breakfast is varied

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent hotel and staff. Would stay here again. Good breakfast. Quiet hotel in a good location.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We absolutely loved our stay at this hotel, we were here for just 5 days but it was up there with one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at. The staff were all so friendly and welcoming, it s just a short walk to the old town. The spa was amazing and so affordable. Cannot recommend this property enough.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 위치, 뷰, 직원 친절도, 청결 모두 다 만족했습니다. 다만

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 직원들의 친절함이 이 호텔의 장점입니다. 특히 dora에게 정말 감사하다고 전하고싶습니다. 한국어도 잘하며 어느 누구하나 모두 다 친절하고 서비스가 좋습니다. 조식도 다른 베트남 호텔에 비교해서 좋았으며 위치는 올드타운과 가까워 이용하기 편했습니다.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Good location n very close to old town very helpful n nice staff

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff appeared happy, were very friendly and thoughtful. They made you feel at home and assisted with any needs. I absolutely loved the decor and beautiful character of the rooms and foyer. Everything was of high quality and one of the best buffet breakfasts i ve had with a range of asian western and healthy food choices

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: My first trip to vietnam was a great memory! everyone was friendly and warm! thank you very much. I want to go again!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Absolutely loved it! sam and brownie were amazing and so sweet. Its in a good location, adorable clean rooms and the breakfast buffet was out of this world.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff were lovely, especially clara, the young lady who checked us in. Super sweet and helpful. The hotel is in walkable distance to the ancient town and the room is relatively spacious for two.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 직원들이 모두 친절하였고 특히 아침 조식이 기대 이상으로 훌륭했음.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Andrew the manager and his staff were exceptionally helpful. The room was beautiful with amazing views over hoi an. An easy walking distance to the markets. Everything was superb.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great location, walkable to many restaurants and pont of interest. Staff very friendly and attentive. Room was clean and very comfortable bed and pillows

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I stayed at this hotel for three nights and love the location.. Very convenient to the old town and restaurants. The night market also a 5-8 minutes walk.. The room is a good size and cute the breakfast buffet is just ok. The only negative about this hotel is that there is no air conditioning in a common area so it s very hot.. The most important thing is the staffs.. They are super friendly and helpful. They re always ready to help you with a big smile. During my stayed, i dropped my money in front of the hotel. One of the staff found it and returned to me so i give the hotel staffs 5 stars

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Stayed just one night. Everything was perfect. Great room. Very good breakfast. Very well located

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ホテルの外観がとてもかわいいです 到着が遅かったのですが 到着の際には ホテルの外観のランタンもつけてくれて とてもこのホテルでの滞在が楽しみになりました さらに スタッフがいつも笑顔で声をかけてくれました 朝食も種類がほどよくあって 十分楽しめました マイナス点としては 床は絨毯ではなくタイルのような感じです お部屋は5階だったのですが 床は蟻がたくさんいました シャワーは水圧は十分問題なく使用できましたが 水温が低いので注意してください この国の特徴なのかもしれません でも総合的にはとても良いホテルでおすすめです

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 忘れ物をしたかもしれない とチェックアウト後にホテルへ連絡したところ お忙しい中とても丁寧に探してくれました 本当に感謝です また 朝荷物を預けに立ち寄っただけなのに 夜外出先から戻ると 顔を覚えていてくださりあたたかな対応で嬉しかったです

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I booked this place as it was close to the ancient town, and the staff there were so accommodating and kind. They organised a suit tailoring appointment for me at short notice so i was able to pick it up within a few hours. They looked after everything from restaurant recommendations, things to do in hoi an, to airport transfers. Tracy in particular was very kind. The room was spacious, very clean and most of all cool (in that extra hot climate). I would definitely stay here again next time.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: What can i say apart from this has absolutely been the best hotel i stayed at in vietnam. The staff are incredibly, the location is 10/10, the room - bed and shower were incredible. The pool is extremely refreshing. We booked this hotel 5 hours before we arrived. 15 mins after booking i received a message via whatsapp asking what time we were going to arrive. The staff all learnt our names and we truly felt like movie stars. Best hotel. Book as you won t be disappointed.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 地點極佳 服務親切

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great hotel with excellent service in a great location

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent room and excellent locaton. Grear service.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 早餐非常好吃 建議一定要試試牛肉河粉! 服務員的態度也非常親切 會主動詢問今天的行程以及是否有他們需要幫忙的地方 飯店房間的風格很美 院子掛滿了燈籠 晚上看相當美麗 是下次去會安會再選擇住宿的地方

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful hotel, easy to get to old town. Great breakfast with lots of western choice s. Nice staff have us an upgrade. Best part, a shuttle to their private beach area in an bang

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: かわいいホテルと親切なスタッフでとても良かったです ナイトマーケットにも徒歩で行ける距離感で立地的にも良かったです

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 처음 방에서는 담배냄새가 조금 났는데 로비에 말하니 계속 사과하시면서 당장은 비는 방이 없다고 향초를 켜주시고 다음 날 아침 곧바로 방을 바꿔주셨습니다. 처음 방보다 훨씬 넓고 화장실에 욕조도 있어서 아마 방이 업그레이드 된 것 같았습니다. 방은 방음도 잘 되고 침대도 편안합니다. 화장실도 깨끗합니다. 헬스장은 아령정도만 쓸 수 있고 수영장은 사진과 동일했지만 락스가 너무 많이 풀어져있어서 코가 매웠습니다. 수영장 이용은 짧게 하는 것을 추천합니다. 조식은 지금까지 한 여행 중 가장 맛있었고 매일 메뉴도 바뀌어서 더 좋았습니다. 무료 쌀국수 쿠폰과 리뷰를 쓰면 발마사지 쿠폰도 줍니다. 직원들이 너무나 친절해서 헬스장과 수영장이 조금 부족하더라도 다시 호이안에 간다면 이 곳에서 숙박할 생각이 있습니다.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 가족같은 분위기의 친절함이 좋았고 조식도 맛있었고 무엇보다 올드타운과 가까워서 좋았습니다 근데 화장실 낡은거하고 체크아웃할때 리뷰 강요하는게 좀ㅜㅜ

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Just an amazing hotel to stay at! all the staff were friendly, knowledgeable and kind! the amenities were excellent and the location couldn t be more perfect if you like a quiet good nights sleep but very accessible to all that old town offers within a 5-10 minute walk! definitely staying here again when i come back to hoi an

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Friendly and helpful staff.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This was a nice place to spend a few days bumming around hoi an. Just removed enough from the action to have it feel peaceful coming home , but easy to get to everything. Very very clean, with comfy beds. We had an interior room. Felt a little cramped but it was nice to be able to open the balcony doors for fresh air if not for a view (faces a narrow courtyard). Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful! my only critique is the breakfast. It s relatively big, but they don t replenish anything as service goes on. With an hour left of breakfast, only about 1/3 remained of the options and often what was left looked very unappealing - dried out fruit, scrapings of a noodle salad, etc. Thank goodness for the egg station. They house a lot of tour groups it seems, and i understand that a big seating can wipe out a lot at once, but we were there 4 days and this was a problem every day. Would recommend for early risers )

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A charming hotel in a great spot. Easy to get to the shops but far enough away to be quiet.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Checking procedure was fast. The room was clean and well maintaine

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Stayed 3 days with my family. It is a lovely hotel with the hoian style interior. The staffs were very kind. We enjoyed bike rental and shuttle to the beach. The breakfast was also good. Hope to go back soon!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great location in hoi an, close enough to walk to the old town but far enough away from the hustle and bustle. Room was small but comfortable and enough space for two people. Breakfast was plentiful with both vietnamese and western options. Free use of bicycles and shuttle to the beach. Tracy at the front desk is friendly, helpful and a great addition to the property!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Very convenient, friendly staff and very clean. I would go back to this hotel in a heartbeat.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ホイアン旧市街へ徒歩圏内でクチコミ評価が高かったので利用しました ホテルスタッフは全員が常に笑顔で親切に接してくれました レストラン予約や観光地の質問にもとても親身になって対応してもらえて感動しました スタッフは楽しそうに働いていて見ていて気持ちが良かったです 正午にチェックアウトの後 フライトの関係で深夜にホイアンを発つということで時間をつぶせるか不安でしたが 荷物を預かってもらって観光と食事に出て 午後はホテルのスパを利用して心身ともにリラックスして過ごすことができて不安は杞憂に終わりました 深夜にフロントスタッフ複数人に ホテル前まで笑顔で見送ってもらい 素晴らしい思い出とともにホイアンを後にしました

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: スタッフが非常にフレンドリーです ベトナムではほかに4軒泊まってますがここの朝食がいちばん美味しかったです 毎朝美味しいオムレツをいただきました

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Exceptional customer service. Room exactly as advertised terrific location. Very good breakfasts.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 너무 친절해서 감동적일정도임 다만 침대가 조금 노후되서그런지 삐그덕거림 가격대비는 너무훌륭한 친절그자체

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Wir hatten eine grosse, saubere suite mit toller aussicht auf die altstadt (manche normale zimmer blicken auf die wand des nachbarhotels). Schönes frühstück (cappuccino mit kleinem aufpreis - ist sogar dem super freundlichen personal peinlich -). In summe aber eine klare empfehlung.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 일단 위치가 너무 좋고, 직원들 모두 매우 친절합니다. 특히 레스토랑 직원 중 엘라(ella)와 데스크 직원 써니(sunny)는 너무 친절히 대해줘서 지내는 동안 행복했습니다. ) 안방비치가는 차량도 제시간에 잘 오고, 호텔 청소도 깨끗하게 해줍니다. 다시 호이안에 간다면 이 곳에서 숙박할거에요. .

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 中心地まで徒歩圏内 朝食がおいしくスタッフも親切でよかった 価格もリーズナブル

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Amazing staff, always looking for opportunities to support and improve our experience. This feedback is to all of them, reception, kitchen, bar, breakfast room, house keeping, spa, driver. The room was very spacious and good. The only negative is the so called view. We had a room with lantern view . This is no view! we were looking into a black wall, and it was very noisy so the terrasse was of no use. Would definitely stay there again, preferably with a real view.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 호이안 올드 타운하고 가까워서 매일 걸어 다녔어요. 호텔은 작지만 아기자기 합니다. 조식도 음식 종류는 많지 않지만 모두 맛있었어요. 과일만 빼고.. 무엇보다 안방비치 셔틀이 있어서 좋았습니다. 직원들도 모두 친절해요

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We had an amazing 3 nights at la residencia in hoi an. The hotel is in a great location, has fantastic rooms with comfortable beds, large bathroom and a very enjoyable breakfast. The service from staff is impeccable and sunny in particular was so hospitable, friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Shr gave us loads of good information that made our stay so enjoyable. Cannot recommend highly enough, we would definately choose this hotel again.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 2박했습니다. 첫날 아침에는 조금 시끄러웠으나 두번째날 아침에는 크게 시끄러운 것도 없었구요. 방도 깔끔하고, 방도 업그레이드 해줬습니다!! 방청결 최고, 조식 맛있었구요. 시설 좋았고, 걸어서 호이안 야시장 금방 갔습니다. 직원들도 친절했구요. 정말 또 묵고 싶은 숙소였어요!!!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Helpful staffs and nice place, location convenient

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I spent many days searching for that little gem hotel for our stay in hoi an and i was certainly delighted with my choice. La residencia is delightful in every way. The staff are charming, polite and cannot do enough for you. The hotel is spotlessly clean with character and charm. The rooms are large, well appointed beds very comfortable indeed (a big bonus point for that!) breakfast is plentiful with an excellent choice and again the staff very attentive. Location is good and an easy stroll into the main part of town and river. Also a very good tailor opposite. I purposefully wanted a smaller hotel rather than the usual grand dames i frequent in ho chi minh city. I m also in the travel industry which makes me doubly critical of every detail from cleanliness to customer service, food and a good comfy bed. Well done la residencia, you re a perfect little gem of a hotel and we all enjoyed our stay immensely.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I love the small boutique style concept. I love the layout of the hotel. Your staff are wonderful.. Service is wonderful. Pity the pool was too cold to. Swim in.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Don t miss this hotel! we had a 5 star experience throughout. Staff went above and beyond with any request, room was beautiful and spacious, breakfast varied and excellent. Easy shuttle several times a day to and from the beach, short stroll into old town. We had a lantern view room, which means the view from the balcony was of a narrow outside area filled with the traditional beautiful lanterns hung throughout the area. We would absolutely stay again and recommend to all!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 직원들 친절하고, 객실 상태 괜찮고 좋은 호텔입니다. 다만, 침구류 상태가 썩 깔끔하지 않은 것 같아서 그것만 보완하면 매우 좋을 것 같네요. 호이안 구시가지와는 도보로 적당한 거리에 있어서 너무 좋았습니다. 인테리어도 호이안 지역과 어울려서 이뻣구요 다음에 또 방문할 의사가 있네요

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Absolutely perfect stay in hoi an. 5 min walk from the old town. Free bike hire. The staff are so welcoming and careing about how you re stay is. Dora looked after us and was perfect. We had massages at the spa - the best we ve had in vietnam. The hotel is so clean and comfortable. If we come back to hoi an, we will stay here!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hotel was well located. Close to key attractions in hoi an. The staff were lovely. We used the pool to cool down after a hot day, which was very helpful. The staff were extremely helpful.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 旅先に疲れて到着しましたが 笑顔でフレンドリーに対応してくださりとても感激しました しかも 無料でお部屋をアップグレードして スイートにしてくださいました バスタブもついていて お部屋も広く 空調も快適でホスピタリティ抜群でした なによりも 対応してくださったドラさんがとても親切でした ランタン祭りの日に利用したのですが 徒歩5分圏内でお祭りの中心部につき ナイトマーケットにも近くコンビニも近いため 立地はとても便利です ぜひまた利用したいホテルで お部屋をおススメです

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 올드타운 걸어다니기에 충분하고 방도 깨끗하고 직원들도 친절하고 좋았는데 에어컨이 너무 안 시원해요..

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: It is a nice and cozy hotel with good location, just 7-8 minutes walk to the old town. Staff members are helpful and friendly. However, rooms with lantern view is a bit tricky. They have a balcony facing the side wall of the building next door and lanterns are hung in-between the rooms and the wall for decoration. The rooms are dark as they face a giant wall without any view but just some lanterns. Luckily, we voiced out our disappointment once we stepped into the room and finally they arranged us another room with a real balcony view. Anyway the hotel is a good one but rooms said to be with lantern view are not recommended at all.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We had a very pleasant stay at the hotel. The personnel even helped us with some problems regarding our flight tickets. The room was large, in good order and clean. Will strongly recommend.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I m amazed by the customer service provided by staff. They provided my friends and i free bicycles to the beach with map and clear direction. A friend of my burned the iron accidentally and the hotel didn t claim anything on us but helped her to iron her dress. The next day we checked out late and staff was still very happy and helpful . My friend forgot her passport and other important papers in the hotel and we only knew about that when we arrived at the hotel in da nang which was 30km far from hoi an. We made a call to the hotel and they found those papers. The next morning a guy from the hotel brought her papers to our hotel in da nang. We really appreciated their help, kindness and effort. The breakfast was fanty with local food. I will come back for sure.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The private beach and the shuttle to the an bang beach were very convenient. Very authentic furniture and the view from the balcony was peaceful so it was perfect for me to read a book. Staffs were nice and the breakfast included was pretty good.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Charming in all ways and very convenient!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Location was quite alright, a few minutes walk from the old town. Amenities were good, yet cleanliness is an issue. I found a large light brown stain on my bed sheet, dead bugs and hair next to the bathtub, and dried tooth paste on the sink faucet. I was not informed that i had to keep and return my magnetic room key card, therefore, i left them in my room while checking-out. For this, i was charged an extra 100,000vnd since they were assumed as lost. The hotel aesthetic is charming, cozy colonial style. Breakfast provided ample of choices both local, national and western dishes. Ready solid work on what could be a great hotel!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This hotel is fantastic. All of the staff are super friendly helpful always smiling asking how our day was. They also provided great suggestions for where to go what to do in hoi an marked everything out on the map for us. The breakfasts at the hotel were delicious contained a nice mix of vietnamese hoi an specialities as well as western food. The staff went out of their way to make sure the coffee was hot that we knew which sauces went with which dishes to get the most out of our meal. The happy hour in the evening was great with half price cocktails fantastic service. The room was huge with a separate lounge area and big, comfy bed. The bathroom had a great shower big deep bath.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: オールドタウンも近くこじんまりとしたとても過ごし易いホテルです 特に朝食が美味しいのが一番です スタッフもみんなフレンドリーでいいです ホイアンで泊まる時はいつもこのホテルに滞在します 今後も利用させてもらいます スタッフのｓｏｆｉａさんありがとうございます

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice hotel, very helpful staff will come again clean, spacious

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Amazing staff

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 4日間滞在しましたが ホイアンの旧市街地まで 近く 昼間はぶらぶら散歩して お茶したり 夜はナイトマーケット行ったりと 便利な場所でした 朝食ビュッフェも 飽きさせず 毎日とても美味しかったです

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely property with large rooms, staff were what made it though as the rooms themselves were a little dated.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: My long stay was delightful- dear dora took very good care of me also x

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 洒店員工有禮服務態度好 可惜洒店比較殘舊 房內台面還有很多小動物

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 친구들끼리 3명가서 예약했는데 방2개를 연결시켜주셔서 넓고 편안하게 이용했습니다

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ท ต ง ห องพ ก ส งอำนวยความสะดวก อาหารเช า และท ประท บใจมาก ค อ พนง. เราม เหต ไม คาดฝ น เก ยวก บ taxi ท มาร บ พนง. หลายคน ช วยเราแก ป ญหา ให ผ านไปได ด วยด ขอแนะนำผ ท กำล งหาท พ กในฮอยอ น ค ดถ งท น เป นท แรกนะคะ

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: An outstanding hotel experience. My family stayed 3 nights in june, even though the heat index was 100f (ie, 40c) outside, the room had excellent temperature control day and night. We kept the room temperature at 18c (70f), and we were quickly refreshed after time outside in the old part of hoi an. Room was spacious and clean. Modern bathroom. Small refrigerator for cooling down our water bottles. Superb breakfast was included in room rate, including a broad assortment of western and asian foods, plus very good vietnamese white coffee . Very friendly staff. They noticed from passport inspection that my son had a birthday during our stay, and surprised us at breakfast with a large birthday cake for him (plus a bouquet of roses). When we checked out at 6am on our last day, they surprised us again with a couple tart, bagged breakfast. Overall, one of the very best hotel experiences we have experienced in world travel.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We spent an enjoyable 4 nights at the hotel. The room was pleasant and a good size, with a nice outlook. The service was fantastic, and the staff did their most to be helpful.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: すごく丁寧で親切だった チェックイン時にはおしぼり お菓子 ドリンクのサービス こちらから聞かずとも オススメの店 ホイアンの説明をしてくれた 朝食の時も さりげない会話を交わしてくれて 過ごすのが心地よいホテルだった

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: I like this hotel with ancient style and the staff is very nice helpful. The location is very good.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 새벽에 도착해서 피곤한몸으로 방에 들어갔었는데 너무 예쁜방안 풍경이 피로를사라지게해주었습니다. 환한 아침에 호텔을 둘러보니 모든게 너무 예뻤습니다. 조식도 예쁘게 꾸며진곳에서 많은 맛있는음식과 친절한 직원글의 서비스... 호텔 정말 잘골랏다는생각을 하게해준곳이었습니다.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A decent boutique hotel. Compliment to frontdesk sam who helped check-in and provided all necessary tourist information of hoi an. Our room was upgraded to suite upon check in request. The swimming pool is too shallow which is good for children s playing. Loved the hotel shuttle bus service to beach nearby and free bicycle use. Enjoyed the buffet breakfast (western style and vietnam noodles, etc.). Will definitely stay if visit hoi an again.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Since there aren t too many reviews about this hotel in hotels.com website, i checked tripadvisor reviews. There are somany reviews that oddly talking about specific person s names. For example, i liked kevin s room service was excellen! .. Really?? i thought it was really weired and i know how thaf happen after i visited this hotel. When i was having breakfast, someone came to me and pour some water. And i said thank you and she told me her name and asked me to leave a review about her. Same thing happens at the spa as well. It was really tired. Overall the hotel isnt too bad but it is really tiring.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great location and friendly staff. Would stay here again.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed here 4 years ago and enjoyed our stay at the la residencia so much we decided to return for a week in hoi an. A lot has happened in the last 4 years, hoi an itself has become extremely busy, mainly with chinese tourists and the area this hotel is in, unfortunately, has become a giant coach car park in the daytime, when the tours come in from da nang added to this a new hotel has been built completely surrounding the hotel, which has now lost its river view, the rooms they describe as lantern view are rooms that have a balcony but have the wall of the newly built hotel covered in a sort of fence with lanterns hanging on it about 6 feet from your balcony, see photo, making the rooms dark and claustrophobic, we stayed only one night in one of these rooms and asked to be moved to a room at the front, the lantern view rooms are only any good for one or two nights, it really is a shame as the staff are wonderful and the rooms are nice and comfortable and the ambiance of the hotel is good. The only other thing is there are no decent restaurants in the surrounding area, these have all gone since our last visit and now become spas and massage places, it s such a shame as hoi an itself is still a lovely place to visit.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Hôtel bien situé avec beaucoup de charme. Très bon petit déjeuner. Le personnel est très accueillant .

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Vi bodde på la residencia fra 29.12.18 til 1.1.19. Et meget hyggelig og komfortabelt hotell 5-6 minutters gange fra den fantastisk sjarmerende gamlebyen i hoi an. Vi var tre voksne og fikk et stort rom meg eget soverom med dobbeltseng, separat enkeltseng i oppholdsrommet og et stort bad med både dusj og badekar. Fint trimrom og nydelig spa avdeling. Eneste ulempe ved rom 308 var en litt bråkete trafostasjon på utsiden.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 酒店離古城和夜市不遠 只需約8分鐘步程便可到達古城觀光或到古城附近的餐廳用膳 非常方便 而因為酒店在古城外 所以環境亦較為寧靜

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Excellent location. Great rooms. Nice view. Excellent customer service.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is beautiful, the breakfast is a feast and the rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated the pool is great after walking around hoi om. And the staff is so accommodating. A great place to stay!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ห องพ กเหม อนในร ว .. ตกแต งสวยงามมาก แตาราคาไม แพง

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We stayed there for one night and got a free upgraded room, that s very good! the room is well furnished, clean and cozy! i love the balcony! it s very relaxing to sit there. The location of the hotel is great, as it is close to the old town the reception staff, sam, was very nice and cheerful! she proactively introduced us the hotel facilities and recommended us places to go in hoi an. The breakfast there is also great, i love the omelette and noodle soup! i hope can spend a few more days there so that i can enjoy the spa and join the cooking class. The prices seem reasonable. Highly recommend this hotel!

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Good location and nice breakfast ! pool and gym are in the basement so not really inviting. Clean and comfortable and shuttles and bikes are convenient.

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: All staff is nice and friendly, helpful, they are patient to treat customer, a very good experience to stay in

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 街のほぼ西端 ホイアンのメインの観光地 旧市街に徒歩圏内 ホテル内も清潔かつ雰囲気も良い 使用はしなかったがレンタサイクルのサービスや地下に室内プールもあるようだ 自分は無茶なスケジュールで早朝に出発したり 日付変わるごろにもどってきたが問題なく出入りできた 恐らく24時間チェックインができるのだろう またすぐ付近にatmと飲料や酒程度を買える万屋あり 若干難があるとするならスタッフの英語能力の低さか ただ 用を足すには十分だったし そもそも他のホテルも恐らく同レベルではないか

hotelName: Little Residence. A Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ห องพ กสะอาด บร การด อาหารเช าหลากหลาย ใกล เม องเก าฮอยอ น ม จ กรยานให ป นฟร

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Best staff and ideal location. They go out of their way to ensure guests are comfortable. Special thanks to aimee for making sure i get vegan breakfast each day. Highly recommended

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: ベトナムの風情のあるホテルで 快適に過ごせました

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The property features distinctive asian furniture and decorating. The atmosphere is sophisticated. The breakfast was a 1st class buffet. The staff is well trained and extremely attentive. This is a really classy boutique hotel.

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Little riverside is on the river so the views from the rooms, restaurant and pool are incredible. We loved that it was easy walking to the tourist center, but 7 min or so away so definitely a quieter and gentler vibe. Excellent staff, firm mattresses, decent spa and food.

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Ms. May took great care of us! staffs were really attentive and they cared about making our stay as pleasent as possible!

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: スタッフさんの対応が親切でした 旧市街にも歩いて行けて立地も良かったです

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely property and amazing staff

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We liked everything. Not any complaints. You must stay here when visiting hoi an.

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Lovely hotel in a great location for exploring hoi an. Wonderful helpful staff. Min helped us plan activities and offered great local suggestions. Massages in the spa were amazing. Highly recommended leanne and vin! comfortable beds and good breakfast selection. Relaxing pool environment. Ended up extending our stay we loved it so much.

hotelName: Little Riverside . A Luxury Hotel & Spa
