hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 가족단위로 가기 좋은거같아요 커플은 잘 안보여요 아무리도 외곽쪽 지역이다보니.. 조용한곳을 좋아하시는분들에게 추천!

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 수영장에 감탄했습니다

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Mooi hotel, prachtige villa s aan zee. Hoi an is een superleuke plaats!

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 리셉션이 크고 넓어 체크인/아웃 및 문의를 하기에 편했습니다. 풀장도 깨끗하고 이용하기 편했습니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: プライベートプールのプールサイドに パラソルがあると良いです

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The 3br villa we stayed at was beautiful, and the private pool is a lot bigger than i imagined. However, the cleanliness could be improved - we found a live cockroach in the bedroom upstairs on the 2nd day and another dead one in the living room on the 3rd day. The fixtures in the rooms should be properly maintained as well - we ve got a leaking ceiling in both the rooms on level 1 on separate occasions, and spoilt plugs and etc. The wall separating our villa and the next one was too low so we often hear partying noises from our neighbours at night after 10pm as they were partying in the pool. Nevertheless the staffs working at vinpearl were very friendly and helpful, they definitely made the stay more enjoyable.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운이랑 멀고 앞에 아무것도 없어서 뭐 사러 나갈 곳도 없고 마사지 받을 곳도 없고, 전부 리조트내에서 해결해야해요. 허나, 룸서비스도 안 비싸고 호텔내 슈퍼같은 곳도 있고 좋습니다. 휴양하러 아무것도 안하고 리조트에서 쉴 거면 추천 어디 많이 돌아다닐 거면 비추합니다. 광주리배 타러 가는 곳은 가까웠습니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 가격대비 우수한 시설. 멋진 풀빌라와 수영장. 단점은 너무 외진곳에 있어서 그랩잡기가 어려웠고 직원은 친절하나 체크인 체크아웃이 느리고 버기카나 룸서비스 제공이 신속하지 않았고 느렸음. 조용히 쉬기에는 아주 좋은 곳입니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 올드타운과 거리가 멀어서 외출하려면 시간이 오래 걸립니다 푹 쉬기엔 좋아요 근데 룸서비스가 썩 맛있진 않습니다. 조식은 괜찮았어요. 수영장은 넓어서 여유롭지만 낮에는 그늘이 없어서 수영하기 힘들어요 밤수영 안됩니다 저녁 7시까지에요

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 방도크구요. 바다보이는 풀빌라인데 가격도 싸고 만족해요. 근데 주변에 너무 아무것도없고 호이안올드타운 차로 20분걸리고, 룸서비스 넘 맛없고. .나가서 밥사먹는게 좀 귀찮았어요

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 예약 과정에서 약간의 문제가 있었는데(예약자 실수) 호텔측에서 원만한 규정 적용을 해주어 덕분에 넘 뜻깊은 여행이 되었습니다. 위치, 조식,직원들 서비스, 수영장 관리 등 모든 부분에서 애들과 저희 부부 모두 만족했습니다. 첫날부터 자정 가까운 늦은 체크인을 하는 일정이었는데 방을 열고 들어가니 엑스트라 베드까지 놓여져 있어서 더 감동이었습니다. 이번이 호이안 여행 두번째였는데 기대한 것 이상의 호텔 서비스로 인해 즐겁게 휴가를 보냈습니다. 다시 한번 감사드립니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: Great resort! its facilities were very variety,

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The stay here was perfect from beginning to end!! we loved every second and hated to leave. We will definitely return when we get the opportunity!

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 전부다 마음에.들었어요 good

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: It was nice for my family. Full villa was wonderful and clean. Staffs were very kind. I hope to visit again here.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 빌라도 좋구, 위치도 좋구,,,다 좋은데... 식사가 좀 그랬어요. 식구가 많아서 점심,저녁 뷔페로 포함된 금액으로 결재했는데.... 저희밖에 없어서 그런지.. 뷔페가 없고, 메뉴에서 골라서 먹었어야 했어요. 메뉴에 먹을만한게 그리 다양하지않아서 나가서 먹기도했어요. 음료수도 뷔페일경우 무료로 나오는데 저희는 따로 돈을 내고 마셔야했어요. ..왠만하면.. 조식빼고는 점심 저녁 포함된걸로 하지 않은게 좋을것같구요. 담에 또 갈거냐 물으면.. 담엔 다른 호텔을 선택할래요. 우리끼리만 있어서 조용하고 좋긴했으나. 내부에서 할게 없어요.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 직원들 모두 영어 잘 하며 매우 친절함! 문의사항에 대해 어떻게든 해결 해 주려고 하며, 이후에 진행 사항도 물어 보는 등 고객들을 매우 신경 써줌

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 주변에 아무것도 없음 욕조옆 소금용기 사용주의할것. 잘 깨짐. 깨지면 돈내라고 함 풀바에서 이것저것 시켜 먹음, 먹을만함 2박 했는데. 2일차 생수달라고 하니 2개 줬다고 돈내라고 함. 그래서 무쟈게 비인정 상함 주변 마일린 택시 택시비가 좀 비싼듯. 비나썬 택시는 안보임. 호이안 구시가지 분위기는 좋으나 전체적으로 불친절함. 가격 비싸고 왜 거기 갓나 싶음 차라리 호텔에서. 수영이나 하고 쉬는게 답인드읏

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 방음이 부족한것 같습니다. 수영장은 최고였어요.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 진짜 좋았아요. 너무 넓어서 구석구석 먼지가 좀 있었지만 전반적으로 너무 만족합니다. 일부러 조식도 좋다는데 찾아간거라 역시 만족해요. 다음에도 가고 싶은 숙소에요.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 룸상태 최상, 시설 최상 뭐하나 트집잡을 것이 없음

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 시설 내에 클리닉이 있습니다. 작은 편의점도 있고 키즈카페도 있어요. 아이와 함께하기 좋은 곳입니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 메인 안방 욕실을 빼고 2곳 욕실의 욕조 온수가 잘 나오지 않았다. 스파, 사우나 시설의 월풀 물도 미리 부탁을 해야 따뜻하게 데워 주었다. 개인수영장에서 수영을 하면 떫고 시큼한 맛이 났다. 호텔 주변은 조용하고, 한적해 휴양하기에는 적당했으며 직원들은 전반적으로 친절했다. 요청하면 바로바로 해결됐다. 6명 가족이 이용하기에는 좀 넓은 편인 듯하다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 정말좋아요 !

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 3베드룸 시설이 너무 좋았습니다!! 가족들과 여행갔는데 대 만족했습니다. 방들도 넓고 오션뷰로 너무 좋았습니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: The staff are friendly, unfortunately we had no rest as we were put next to very noisy neighbors . We have a 3y old child and needed a break away. We had to phone reception at midnight to deal with the situation, but it only got sorted out later. The manager apologized, but it didn t fix the problem of us wasting money and time there. Sad but true...

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: We spent 5 days at the vinpearl hotel on honeymoon. We can t rate this hotel high enough. Service was fantastic. Great facilities, fantastic pool area and great shuttle service into nearby hoi an. Highly recommend the vinpearl.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 조경이 잘되어있고 방파제가 있는 바닷가 쪽 풍경이 너무 좋아 산책하기가 정말정말 좋습니다. 식사의 퀄리티가 매우 좋습니다. 풀빌라를 이용하는 경우에는 원하는 날 하루전에 예약하면 바베큐도 가능하다고 하는데 예약을 안해놔서 이용은 못해봤습니다. 골프장에서 쓰는것처럼 생긴 버기카를 이용해 24시간 언제라도 본건물과 풀빌라등을 왔다갔다 할수있어 정말 편리합니다.

hotelName: Renaissance Danang Hoi An Resort & Spa
userCmt: 장점 방마다 화장실이 있어 좋고 개인풀장은 더 없이 좋았고 키즈룸과 놀이터가 있어 넘 좋았음 조식이 종류가 많이 없어 아쉬움 유심데이터가 인식이 안됨 ㅠ 와이파이가 있지만 빌라 밖에서는 아무것도 안터진다는
Ăn sáng buffet đa dạng, nhân viên nhẹ nhàng, có welcome food, chỉ cách phố cổ hội an 2km thôi. Không gian ấn tượng
Nhân viên thân thiện

Phòng xinh, view siêu mê, các bạn nhân viên dễ thương. Điểm trừ là đi mùa hè, các bác nông dân đốt rơm sẽ bị khói, mất cả buổi chiều sẽ hơi bị ngột ngạt, không được mở cửa ban công. Mọi người cân nhắc thời gian ghé khách sạn ạ.
Nhân viên lễ tân chuyên nghiệp , vui vẻ , thiên thiện
Mọi người nhất định phải thử ở đây, mọi thứ rất tuyệt vời, sạch sẽ, view đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Điểm trừ duy nhất, gần đồng nên nhiều kiến
Nhân viên rất chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện! một trải nghiệm nghỉ ngơi thư giãn hoàn hảo! rất khuyến khích

Khách sạn tuyệt vời nhất mà tôi từng ở trong đời! mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời đến kinh ngạc! đồ ăn ngon tuyệt vời, nhân viên khách sạn, hồ bơi và phòng nghỉ sang trọng. Chúng tôi thực sự thích mọi thứ. Bạn nên thuê xe máy và tận hưởng khu vực này, như chúng tôi đã làm.
Chỗ ở có thiết kế độc lạ, view cánh đồng lúa rất tuyệt, nhân viên ở đây rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình hỗ trợ chúng tôi, cảm ơn các bạn đã cho chúng tôi một kì nghỉ honeymoon tuyệt vời.

Đây là khách sạn tuyệt vời nhất mà chúng tôi từng đến ở việt nam. Kiến trúc tuyệt vời, và đội ngũ nhân viên rất coi trọng khách hàng. Xin gửi lời cảm ơn đặc biệt đến người quản lý tại chỗ tên là tí (hay trí?) đã làm mọi thứ có thể để khiến kỳ nghỉ của chúng tôi trở nên tuyệt vời. Cuối cùng, chúng tôi đã đặt thêm 2 đêm nữa vì chúng tôi rất thích nơi này. Rất đáng để giới thiệu!

Mọi thứ đều kỳ quặc và lập dị, cảm giác như tôi đang ở trong một ngôi nhà nấm của tiên vậy. Phòng tắm rất tuyệt. Bữa sáng khá ổn so với mức giá chúng tôi phải trả. Những chiếc xe đạp ở trong tình trạng rất tốt và trông cực kỳ dễ thương. Khách sạn trông hơi lạc lõng giữa những cánh đồng lúa. Thêm vào đó, không nhiều tài xế quen thuộc với khách sạn này, vì vậy chúng tôi phải đi bộ một chút trong mưa lạnh để tìm thấy nó. Nhưng đó là một vấn đề rất nhỏ. Chỉ có một phản hồi đồ dùng trên bàn ăn trong phòng hơi rẻ và trà thảo mộc được cung cấp có vị rất tệ đối với cả hai chúng tôi. Một tách trà đen và/hoặc trà xanh thông thường sẽ đủ.
Đẹp, phòng ốc sạch sẽ và đủ tiện nghi

Honeymoon của vợ chồng mình khá vui ở đây, địa điểm đi vào mùa lúa chín đẹp cực kỳ. Nhân viên cực dễ thương, đồ ăn good, thoáng mát. Phòng ở theo style tối giản nhưng có guu không giống các nơi nào từng tới, mang lại trải nghiệm rất tốt, độc lạ. Duy nhất đường vô hơi khó cho xe hơi nhé, đi xe gia đình nên lưu ý.
Thích hồ bơi ở đây. View thoáng đẹp
Tốt, gần trung tâm thành phố và khách sạn rất sạch sẽ.

Ksan dễ thương phong cách nhà đất sét nằm ngày mặt ruộng nên mát lắmm luôn í gió cứ gọi là lồng lộng, ngang 5,6h chiều ksan khuyên nên đóng cửa sổ lại tránh côn trùng nên mnguoi cứ sinh hoạt bthuong k sợ công trùng hay gì đâu nè, nhà mình đi có em bé vẫn thấy ôke á. Các bạn nhân viên ở đây dễ thương nhiệt tình lắm

Ô tô to sẽ hơi khó vào nè. Còn lại không có gì để chê hết. View cực kì chill và healing nhà mình đi xe đạp xuống trung tâm hội an cũng gần thôi. Đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên nice lắm ạ. Sẽ quay lại vào lần sau
Ks giữa đồng ruộng rất đẹp , đồ ăn ít lựa chọn cần cải thiện
Quá tuyệt vời, dịch vụ tốt đồ ăn ngon
Nhân viên rất thân thiện, rất support, đồ ăn ngon, không khí dễ chịu, sẽ quay lại
Gia đình tôi đã có những khoảnh khắc tuyệt vời ở đây. Cảnh đồng lúa thật tuyệt vời. Tôi thực sự khuyên bạn nên ghé thăm nơi này nếu bạn đến hội an.
Staff were very attentive, helpful and welcoming. The coffee at breakfast was very good. Towels were changed everyday. Very clean and professional.
Lovely place to stay and such great family/staff. Would absolutely stay again.
Lovely people, great value, free bikes, good location ( half way between beaches and old town

My partner and i spent 2 nights here and absolutely loved it! ly and auntie are such lovely, kind people and made us feel so comfortable, allowing us to check in an hour early and check out an hour late (to hide from rain). Instead of a touristic vibe, ly and auntie have created a place that feels more like a home, which is such a welcome treat. Situated inbetween the rice fields and the old town, it really is an ideal location. 5 minute moped ride and you re in the centre! great clean double room with lots of space, a balcony, very comfortable bed and 4 pillows, air con, tv, a pool - what more can you ask for! the breakfast included was also lovely, banh mi, fruits and vietnamese coffee. Would definitely recommend and would stay again if i go back ) thank you ly auntie!
It is a beautiful and modern hotel. The facility is super clean and the guest is very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was excellent - especially their fresh french bread.
En mysig oas att komma till. En charmig trädgård med många vackra bonsaiträd och orkidéer. En liten men charmig pool, inte uppvärmd men svalkande på varma dagar. Okej frukost. Ägarna var trevliga.
Gutes und sauberes hotel sehr ruhig da direkt angrenzend an ein feld nahe zur altstadt (10 min zu fuss und 3 min mit dem fahrrad) frühstück könnte besser sein.

Very relaxing stay here. Hotel is situated on an island about 10 minutes walk from the market and 20 from the japanese bridge. Great to walk in and get a taxi back for about 1. The small garden at the hotel is full of the most beautiful bonsai trees and slopes down to the river where you can watch the locals fishing and getting on with their daily lives. The only downside was the breakfast. This takes patience but as you sit on a covered terrace in the garden looking out at the river it isn t too much of a hardship. You do have to pay for all the extras here - no complimentary bottles of water and although there was a kettle in the room there was no tea or coffee provided. On check in we were given so much information to help us during our stay and safety advice too - you felt they really cared about you. There are only 6 rooms here so you really get the personal touch.

We arrived from da nang after a long day at the marble mountains followed by an awful taxi journey (avoid the taxi issue by booking a transfer with the hotel direct - just over half the price of a taxi from da nang). So we were a little worn out and agitated by the time we were greeted by some very friendly members of staff / owner. Within 2 minutes of being in this property, we had smiles on our faces and felt completely relaxed!! having settled into our large, clean room, (we d paid the little extra to have a river view and it s so worth it! (the views and sounds on a morning and during the day made it the best stay on our travels... Oh we had lightening one evening too!)) we were summoned downstairs and given a briefing on what to do and what not to do whilst in hoi an. We thought this was going to turn out to be a sales pitch but it wasn t! a brilliant touch. Hoi an, was a little overhyped and touristy if i m being honest... The famous saying same same but different must have been invented here. It was still a nice enough place to visit for a couple of days, there s the river and town with the markets nearby. A million chances to have dresses and suits made to measure. There s also a couple of beaches within 20 minutes cycling distance. The roads aren t as bad as some places in vietnam, so it s safe even for a novice. Bikes are available at the property. If you have 4 spare days and a couple of good books, the garden here is all you d need. So beautiful and peaceful.

The view from our room on the top floor was excellent and gave us a bird s eye view of the surrounding paddy fields. The owner personally welcomed us and made us feel welcome to his beautiful house. Staff were helpful. The house and garden with many bonsai were so beautiful and unforgettable. The breakfast had both local and western options including vietnamese coffee (yum!)
Bra läge på hotellet, nära sevärdheter men i en lugn del av staden.

We loved our stay at riverside impression. The hosts were extremely kind and accommodating and took time welcoming us to the area and mapping out the sights. It is in a safe, quiet area away from the chaos of the night markets and the pool is a lovely way to unwind at the end of the night. We will be back!

Highly recommend this accommodation staff is very friendly nd happy to assist with any of your needs and wants the grounds are beautiful and peaceful breakfast was good and enough for us beds are really comfortable the location is a short walk to all hoi an has to offer would have loved to stay longer don t hesitate to book this accommodation you will not be disappointed
Personnel à l écoute, très aimable, piscine et environnement très agréable hôtel reposant
Beautiful place to stay. Peaceful and quiet. Excellent location, walkable to everything. The entire staff was excellent!

We had the most wonderfull stay at this lovely little hotel. The host, hos wife and the staff where very helpfull and kind. We got a large familyroom with two beds, which was really nice. God breakfast every morning - a little selektion of food to choose from, but really nice simpel food. We will defenently return some day.
Relaxing stay with lovely owners.

This small inn, billed as a homestay, is less than a ten-minute cycle ride from the centre of the lovely old town hoi an. Quite good breakfasts are provided on a covered patio overlooking small rice fields and the river. The rooms are comfortable and the family and staff very helpful.
We absolutely adored this property.

Lovely location next to the water with nice pool, and only a short walk to the old city in hoi an. Staff were really friendly and helpful. Highly recommended - our favourite accommodation across all the places we stayed in over our three week trip.

단점 커피포트에 물때가 심각해서 바꿔달라니 대충 씻어서 주려고함. 물때 그대로 있음. 매니저급이 그 얘기 듣고 진짜 깨끗한걸로 교체해줌(만족) 생각보다 노후화가 있음. 침대 삐걱거림 주변에 딱히 관광지가 없고 10여분 걸어가야함. 난 운동겸 알고 잡은거라 괜춘했으나 걷는거 싫어하면 힘들듯. 패스트고 필수. 빨래가 잘안되는지 수건이 살짝 지저분함 에어컨 소음이 심함 (못참을 정도는 아님) 콘센트 몇개가 잘 안됨 장점 가성비 매우 좋음 (객실 사이즈 준수하고 가격은 저렴) 미리 얘기하면 반가격에 6시까지 하프데이 숙박 가능 식사 맛있는 편 (뷔페는 아니나 계속 주문 가능) 인포 세명 중 두명 영어 잘하고 친절함 수영장이 작고 춥지만 물이 깨끗함 리버뷰가 끝내줌 물이 콸콸 잘나옴 올드타운 가는길 첫번째 마사지가 매우 저렴하고 좋았음. 호텔 마사지 없어도 충분함. 맞은편 식당들도 로컬이지만 맛은 수준급. 올드타운 대비 공기가 매우 맑음 (벳남 아는 사람은 느낄듯) 생각보다 방음이 잘되어 있음(새벽 닭소리가 살짝...)
숙박시설과 조식은 괜찮았으나 주변관광 패키지 요구? 등 안내가 다소 지나치다는 느낌이 들어 불편했고, 새벽에 닭울음 소리도 숙면을 방해하여 꽤나 스트레스였습니다
- simple wooden interiors - beautiful gardens - clean and cozy swimming pool - quite place - very kind and diligent staffs

Hôtel doté d un magnifique jardin avec de multiples bonsaï, endroit calme et reposant avec un petit déjeuner formidable,pas de restaurant mais une carte pour commander et être livré sur place , piscine originale qui passe sous l hôtel ! très bon accueil et service
Perfect service. Great breakfast at a great place.

Place is ok, a little far from the old town, it would take 15-20 minutes walk. We took the grab/taxi going there because it was too hot to walk. You need to take off your shoes before going in to the lobby which i find a little uncomfortable. The staff were all friendly and helpful. Overall it was fine but i would prefer staying in a place nearer the old town next time.

This was our second stay at riverside impression, and once again the staff were incredible. The rooms at the hotel are nice and clean, and though a bit farther from the center of town than some places, it s a lot quieter at riverside and still a very quick walk to the old town. The staff are friendly, kind and incredibly helpful.

올드타운과 수산시장을 걸어서 갈 수 있고(20분 가량 걸림 )친절하고 편한 숙소였음 호텔을 통해 코코넛보트와 택시도 저렴하게 이용함 조식이 특히 맛있음 다만 엘레베이터가 없어서 연세 많은 분은 이용이 좀 어려움 friendly and comfortable accommodation walking distance to the old town and fish market coconut boats and taxis are available at the hotel. Delicious breakfast
Very good
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at riverside. Great staff who helped us out, clean rooms and the free bicycles were awesome. The pool was a life saver after a day out!
Wonderful stay. Friendly super staff, they try to remember all your requests and follow up with you nicely. Excellent service.
Very pleasant staff and quiet room.
Small, friendly hotel with great rooms, great breakfast, and helpfully owners.

Staff was very nice but unfortunately we were pretty let down by the state of the property. Photos are definitely outdated/misleading -- the outdoor area was pretty nice but the room left a lot to be desired. Definitely needs a deep clean particularly the bathroom and ac units. Lots of mold in the shower (curtain was gross tbh) and in the vents - smelled like mildew and we eventually had to turn off the ac in the main bedroom bc it was giving us breathing issues. Beds/linens were fine, and we were out and about most of the day so it was tolerable but we definitely wouldn t stay here again. It was very cheap so i guess in a sense you get what you pay for? it could ve been worse, but also could ve been a lot better especially based on the photos.

Comfortable stay outside of old town hoi an. My family and i enjoyed the breakfast and the facility. It is a little bit further out from the main areas but they offer free bikes for guests. Great service and friendly staff. It s a great place for families with kids because it s small. Rooms are decent sized with everything you need.

We had a great experience here. Hein made it even better with her wonderful assistance and advice. It was in a prime location, very clean and a good breakfast. The best was each day waking up and looking at the river. Room 101 looked directly over the river, it was definitely a good choice staying here. Staff were exceptional. Highly recommend. Plus, also a mini mart next door (good for kids).
The room was comfortable and clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was tasty and accommodating our vegetarian diet.

The room was very basic and the beds were very hard. The bathroom was poorly designed and flooded after every use. The staff were friendly but this was a very basic hotel and overpriced. I did not want to stay longer than one night but was refused a refund. Not sure if this was because of the hotel refusing or wotif just wanting to keep my money. On the whole it was a disappointing experience.

A short walk from the hustle and bustle of the old town, this hotel is a hidden gem. The staff instantly makes you feel welcome. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Hein especially , was excellent. She took the time to show us where to shop, where to eat, etc. It was extremely helpful ) she always took the time to greet as us as we were coming or going. It made us feel special ) the rooms are large, clean and have a great view of the river. Our expectations were totally exceeded. We whole-heartedly recommend the riverside white house hotel. 1000 stars!!!
Hotel has free bikes to use. Very friendly staff. Location is great.
A great small hotel with river view. Quiet and close to the old town. We had a great choice
Fantastic hotel and location. Great service too. Only downside is no elevator when you sre on the top/3rd floor
Very nice hotel very friendly staff nothing to much trouble good location handy for restaurants bars enjoyable stay.
베트남의 다른 3성급 호텔 대비 금액은 조금 나갈 수 있지만 룸 컨디션도, 뷰도, 구비 물품도 너무 좋았습니다 ! 특히 직원 분들의 친절함과 라운지 바의 로맨틱한 분위기는 재방문율 100 ! 런드리 서비스도 너무 잘 이용했습니다 조식은 아내만 이용했는데 상당히 만족스럽다고 합니다!

The staff was excellent, but the property could use some updates and deep cleaning. The wi-fi is very unreliable, both in the lobby and in the room. The breakfast is tasty, but would like more non-western options (a pho!).
Amazing stay wish we could give them 10 it s the perfect place to be close to the action but also removed enough for a good nights sleep and feel like you re really part of the neighborhood!

The hotel is a bit far from the main attractions, but it is walkable. The reception is excellent and it was the only hotel in vietnam that provided information about the attraction, map, rest recommendations. The room is great and big and has a beautiful view.
The service and attention from staff was amazing! all my needs were met and some before i knew i needed them! i will happily recommend!
The hotel location is perfect and the views are amazing.

The property does not refill bottles of water, and only offers to sell you more plastic bottled water. No eco-friendliness. However, the property itself is beautiful and close to the old town. I d say here again and buy more bottled water with significant irritation.
This is a gem, the location is perfect for everything in town, the staff were sooooo amazing and so friendly, i truely loved this place and would recommend to family and friends

Small boutique hotel, very friendly and helpful staff. Great breakfast, well located, walking distance to most places, great view over river. Only downside was bed which was a little too hard. They triedto assist whiich made it a little better
A bit far, but easy walking distance from hoi an old town. Many local stores and restaurant. I will visit and stay this hotel surely again.
Lovely riverside location, nice clean room. Good breakfast. Very friendly staff.
Family run hotel, conveniently located to all amenities.
Beautiful river view, spacious room wonderful staff super clean pool

Very nice hotel with room overlooking the river. The staff was exceptional, great service. Lot s of restaurants nearby. Breakfast included was very good. 20 minute walk to hoi an old town. Enjoyed my stay, will stay here next time

Unique was the boutique beauty and style, fantastic river front room with balcony, great rates and even better is the thoughtful, considerate and organizational skills of day staff hieu who went above and beyond with directions, itinerary suggestions, and reputable small business recommendations

Excellent staff and service, breakfast was very nice, overall a great stay and walkable to old town. Bed is very hard, something s to consider, it was quite uncomfortable for us since we are not used to it.
The staffs were awesome! beautiful room, modern and nice wonderful river view fresh cooked breakfast
Canh sông đẹp. Nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng tắm hôi quá mùi cống. Ăn sáng kém có lẽ do đầu bếp kém
Beautiful hotel in the perfect loc
Dejlig beliggenhed, fine værelser, pool ud til floden - og lækker morgenmad. Kan kun anbefale dette sted

I had a great experience staying here, almost perfect. The beautiful river view, the comfort, nice breakfast everything was amazing. The staff were always helpful with a beautiful smile, many thanks to them. I would absolutely stay here again

We absolutely loved this hotel. It was charming with a beautiful view on the river where we could watch the boats on our balcony. It was just enough distance to avoid the mayhem of the tourist hustle and bustle but close enough to stroll to it along the river with plenty of shops and food along the way. The staff were amazing and the size of our room spacious and clean. We took advantage of the free bikes to ride across the river to look at the farms and villages and ride to the beach. We would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Close to the action, but not in the middle of it. Very friendly staff and very clean wounds. Get the riverview
Clean and tidy property with friendly staff. Good value.
Hotel très bien placé. Personnel adorable... Serviable très attentionné merci
Lovely staff and a great location
Very friendly hotel in an excellent location.
マネージャーのloiさんはテキパキしていて頼むとなんでもすぐやってくれます 滞在中も空港への送迎 デイツアーの手配 メモリーズオブホイアンのチケット等をお願いしましたがとてもスムーズで安心して楽しめました 部屋は清潔であり すぐ前に川が流れておりテラスで船を眺めながらリラックスできます ナイトマーケットまでは少し歩きますが徒歩圏であり ホテルの近くにも良い店がたくさんあり楽しめます
Great place. Superb host. Lovely location just 10 minutes walk in to town.
Great hotel, very well situated in hoi an with the old town within walking distance. They take good care of their guests, the rooms are spacious and clean. I will come back here when i m in hoi an
A fantastic hotel location was perfect staff really really friendly breakfast was good with a good choice

Attentive staff, very clean property, wonderful made to order breakfast. The location was great-walkable to ancient town (but located on the quieter side of the hustle and bustle). Beautiful riverfront balcony.

I have stayed at this hotel several times and every time i find the same high standard across all areas of my stay. The staff are fantastic, helpful and friendly. Breakfast is made to order every day, fresh fruits and cooked options, local advice from staff very helpful.

A small hotel (15 rooms) at the riverside. Quiet place and rather close by the old city. Very kind and dedicated staff. Simple but good breakfast. Clean rooms. It has all the advantages of a small hotel, unlike the more expensive bigger hotels.
Will come and stay again
We loved the great large rooms and very friendly service. Will definitely stay again
Great location, clean spacious room. Best thing are the amazing caring satff. A must stay for families.

We only had one night in hoi an, and would have loved to stay longer! the best people run this hotel and it s beautifully placed right next to the river. The room had a great view, the pool was nice, and they also made good cocktails. It s a bit of a walk to down town but it s easy with good views along the way. Our group of three booked 2 rooms and will definitely stay on our next trip to vietnam.

We have a fantastic stay here. Location in walking distance to many things. Big clean room with balcony view to river. Breakfast small but everything you need.. Try the pancakes..!!! all staff are very friendly and helpfull and especially hién are an amazing host. So positive and helpfull.. This is the place to stay in hoi an.

After a few days in ho chi minh city this hotel was a wonderful break from the noise and constant motion. The room had a wonderful balcony on the river and was located on a smaller street in the old town. A quick walk along the river and you were in the middle of the action. The staff is wonderful and so helpful in answering our questions. Next time we visit we will definitely stay here again.

Hotel was great, service was amazing, breakfast was delicious and location was perfect. Bikes were available for use during the day which made getting around very easy. Found our room to be too warm for us, but otherwise the room was very comfortable.

We had the chance to meet hien, who did everything she could to make our stay as pleasant as possible. This is not a big hotel with 200 rooms and you can clearly see the difference. I would really recommend this place if you are looking for a conveninent and amazing location. I would come back without a doubt if i m in the area again.
Fantastic place with great people. Area was very nice as well, would love to come back soon.
Séjour très agréable vue sur le fleuve et à quelques minutes de la vieille ville avec une piscine très propre! hein nous a donné pleins de conseils très appréciés !
Good location on the river.great friendly staff,always greet me by my name.the only problem i had was the air-conditioning, set for 18c the lowest but took at least 3-4 hours to cool the room.

Stayed for 2 nights. Room was spacious with great air conditioning. Shower was decent with no issues with hot water. No issues with noise. Found the bed to be a little hard for our taste. We had a room on the second floor. Breakfast was small but very good. Staff are great. So friendly and helpful. Within walking distance to many sites and restaurants.

Second time at this hotel will definitely stay again in future. Great location with swimming pool overlooking the river. Easy walking distance to centre of old town. Good breakfast with plenty of choice. Family run hotel, all family staff are very friendly helpful.
Awesome location, within walking distance of old town, right on the river. Amazing staff, great breakast and will definitely return!

A modern hotel in a quiet convenient location with very friendly and helpful staff. It is a easy walk to the main hoi an areas and if you bought too many things to carry, a golf cart ride back is only 2 us. The balcony view of the river with lantern boats at night is very nice. And loi is very helpful with information and arranging tours, cars, ...

Hotel is by the river with good views. It located 7 minutes walking to the ancient town. Lot of restaurants and cafe nearby. Loi was helpful and friendly, he assisted me to purchase tickets for hoi an memories show and bus to ðông hới. I truly recommend his place.
Great location for walking or relaxing and to watch the brightly lit up boats parading up and down the river. The location is very good as are the staff.
２度目の宿泊 プールサイドでノンビリ過ごせます ランタンボートが煩いのは仕方ないですね 旧市街へも徒歩圏内 スタッフも親切でフレンドリーです
The staffs at the hotel are so good, helpful, polite and friendly.
Great location, walking distance to old town! friendly and helpful staff!! if you need anything, just ask!!! they will go out of their way to get you what you need! delicious breakfast, too

Fantastic small hotel with super attentive staff. Beautiful big rooms and great breakfast. Annie was so helpful with any tour and had great tips. 10 minute easy walk to old town along the river so the area was nice and peaceful. Would definitely stay again
Posizione fantastica sul lungo fiume in prossimità città vecchia dalla parte opposta al ponte giapponese (a piedi in 20min). Cordiali e disponibili, camera pulita e confortevole

Good size room. Good view near the river. Good walking distance to ancient town and night markets. Pool is very clean. Breakfast is decent. The best thing about this hotel is the front desk receptionist hien. She was very nice and remembered our names. She is very knowledgeable and gave our team great recommendations. She made our stay memorable!

Lovely small hotel just far enough away from the busy old town but easily walkable with many dining options close by. Great friendly staff and nice pool overlooking river. Most rooms have river view so you can see the boats and lanterns all lit up at night.

Hien was an absolute gem to meet. She is so positive and upbeat and shared a bunch of recommendations that my children would probably enjoy and how to save some money doing them. We shared stories about her son and my boys and really just enjoyed her company. The hotel itself was in a great location facing the river. It is a small hotel and maybe better suited for couples and solo travelers because the hotel itself was very quiet and any kid sounds my boys made required quick attention. The pool was well taken care of and so refreshing in the hot afternoons too! would i come back here? absolutely! i would just leave my kids at home! hien has 10/10 customer service!

My recent stay at the riverside white house hotel was exceptional and truly memorable. From the moment i arrived, i was greeted with warmth and professionalism by the receptionist, hien, she stood out with her friendly demeanor and eagerness to assist. Her attention to detail and genuine hospitality made me feel incredibly welcome and well taken care of throughout my stay. The hotel itself is beautifully situated by the river, providing stunning views and a serene atmosphere. The rooms were clean, spacious, and tastefully decorated, offering a perfect blend of comfort and elegance. Everyone i encountered was courteous and helpful, ensuring that all my needs were met promptly. Hien, in particular, went above and beyond to make sure my stay was enjoyable, offering great recommendations for local attractions and dining. Overall, my experience at the riverside white house hotel was outstanding. I highly recommend it.

The best hotel we have stayed in while visiting vietnam. Nothing was a hassle for the staff, the hotel is clean and well maintained. Close distance to walk to markets, restaurants and pubs. Pool was clean with area well maintained. Breakfast is cooked to order. Thanks for the awesome time, we will sure to be back.

This was our third time here and we went with a group of friends. The service was very special and the pool was an oasis in between walks and trips around hoian. They looked after all of us very well.

The staff, the position, the access to the old city, and everything about the hotel was such good value for money and such a pleasant experience. We anticipate informing all our friends that the hotel is a must when visiting hoi an
What a surprise....the location was great , but the staff were outstanding. I would vome back to hoi an just to enjoy the hotel .

Location is a little bit inconvenience because of a little bit far from hoi an old town. But the staff service is very good and kind. There are many bars and restaurants around the hotel, so it is good you to prefer quiet place. Plus i can be available yugoc service in this hotel. It is also plus point for me.
Good view, over looking to the river from the balcony

Hien felt like family! we absolutely loved our stay and this was a great first stop in vietnam for us that made us feel at home. We got acquainted quickly to the area based on their directions and recommendations, and loved the walkability to everything.

Property was in a great area on the river just outside ancient town are (5-10min walk). Breakfast was wonderful with made to order eggs. The staff is super friendly. Hein helped organize 2 wonderful tours. And free bikes to use to get around. Would stay again.
아이들데리고는 절대로 비추천입니다. 따뜻한물도 잘 안나오고, 방도 너무 좁고 샤워실 에 물도 잘 안내려가고 에어컨으로 조정해두 습하고 고장난 락커.. 정말 비추 입니다.

I stayed at this property with my family and the staff were so genuine, friendly and accommodating. The property is perfectly located in hoi an, next to the peaceful river and walkable distance from hoi an markets and main tourist attractions.

What a fantastic hotel for both location and service. Breakfast was good with plenty of options. Wonderful hotel staff! so pleasant and made our stay so inviting. Location was awesome. Beautiful patio with the river right next to us. Bed was a little hard which, for my husband wasn t ideal, but we would stay again if in the area!! great value!!

The hotel was right on the river, very convenient to ancient town. Rooms were large, modern and comfortable. Bed very comfortable. Breakfast was great with lots of delicious fresh fruit. The staff were extremely helpful and nice. We would definitely stay there again.

Fabulous boutique hotel with the best staff!! they are so friendly and helpful with whatever you need! breakfast is fresh made with lots of choices. The location is perfect with it being walkable to many restaurants, old town and both the memories show snd the bamboo circus. Next time you re in hoi an, book this hotel. We will be back! thank you for a lovely stay!
Hien and staff were great! i read the reviews and decided to give this place a try. It s true, the excellent customer service and care is what makes this place so special
Vi skulle egentlig bare bo 1 natt, men vi forelsket oss i hotellet og plasseringen så vi booket om hele reisen vår for å bo her 3 ekstra dager. Veldig fint hotell, utmerket service og beste frokost
Beautiful property and excellent staff

Riverside whitehouse was a great place to stay just outside the hussle and bussle of the ancient town. It is an easy walk into town. The accommodations were clean and comfortable. The ac worked great and the bed was comfortable. The breakfast included breads, fruit, and cook to order eggs, pancakes and other food. The staff was very helpful in recommending specific tours, restaurants and coffee shops. I highly recommend staying here! my attic room was perfect (although i didnt have a balcony view) for me. Note there is no elevator, so access to all rooms are via stairs.

A delightful stay and perfectly located. It was away from the overly busy part of town but within easy walking distance. Every single person that worked there was extremely kind and helpful. I can t recommend it enough. Wonderful!

We had a wonderful stay and will definitely stay here on our next visit to hoi an. The location is beautiful and just a couple of blocks from the old town, which is perfect because it s just outside of the chaos and a short walk away. The river is so beautiful and the pool is lovely. The staff were very friendly and helpful in any way needed. I loved my banana pancakes every morning too.

Very lovely hotel within walking distance to the old town. You can either walk along the river or through the town. Room is large and clean. As per the photos, the shower / toilet are separated from the bedroom by a frosted glass which might be off putting for some. Breakfast option and dining room are great. It includes a small buffet as well as made to order eggs, pancakes. The lady at the reception is very savvy about everything in hoi an. Lovely to relax by the pool. Definitely recommend this boutique hotel versus cheaper options available in the new part of hoi an town.

Fantastic nice place and good location. The staff are super nice and do everything to please the guests and helps to plan sightseeing tours. We will definitely come again. You can rent bicycles and the location is nearby rice fields and basket boats.

This was a great experience for me. The hotel is small...i think 11 rooms...and it sits right on the river with a walking path (paved) along the river that leads to the old market in hoi an. The staff...well, i would marry them if i could. They were such a delight and were so helpful to me in finding restaraunts, optometrist, and motorcycle rental at a moments notice. Free breakfast every morning, which was always followed by me sitting in the outdoor eating area and watching the boats going by. And the most touching part...when it was time for me to go to the airport, my ride showed up and the staff followed me out to the car and said goodbye.

Just under a month in vietnam this was our favorite hotel in nine ncities for several reasons. The location is direct riverfront and at night all the tourist boats cruise up and down the river all lit up with multicolored lights. The patio is a great place for sipping drinks day or night. Every employee we interacted with was so friendly and helpful. Breakfast team will custom cook you just about anything you want and do it well. Front desk hein is a joy to be around will help you book all your needs. Hotel owner loi is a hands on multifaceted individual who is repairing a light fixture one minute and making you an amazing frozen drink the next and always with a smile. Our room was a large attic unit facing the river with a great high walled walk out balcony. Great a/c, hot water. I have nothing negative to say about my stay. Every day was fantastic. Highly recommend.

L accueil de hien est formidable. Elle est adorable et aux petits soins. L hôtel en bord de rivière est très calme et accessible à pieds. Des vélos sont à disposition et gratuits pour explorer les environs séjour au top
Great experience for the price. Super recommended.
I have never stayed in a hotel with such friendly and charming staff. From check-in onwards i felt like i was staying with old friends. Lovely hotel in a lovely town.

Beautiful setting for this hotel, right on the riverside, and within walking distance of the old town. Hien made us feel so welcome and gave us tips on shops to visit and activities to do while in hoi an. She even hand wrote a list of information for us to keep and looked after us like a mother for the whole of our stay.

Quaint, quiet, clean and charming river front hotel only a short walk away from old town. Staff is super friendly and treats you like family during your stay. Bonus, their made-to-order omelets for breakfast are delish!
People were friendly and helpful. Great lication. Good condition

Loved the view from our room. Very roomy and comfortable, love that it s along the river walk making the trek into town more peaceful and less chaotic versus the busy street! hien was a wonderful concierge. I d describe this hotel as comfortable, simple, relaxing. Perhaps not so friendly to those who aren t ok with a flight or two of stairs (we did not mind). A nice option for anyone visiting hoi an.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, gần phố đi bộ.rất tiện nghi , tiếp tân vui vẻ, nhiệt tình . Mình rất thích nơi này
Personnel très sympathique qui propose excursions et arrangements. Déjeuners très bons. Tout a été super dans une chambre confo avec balcon vu sur le fleuve!
Phòng sạch sẽ, thích cách trang trí của khách sạn và đặc biệt là rất ấn tượng với bạn nhân viên vì quá thân thiện vẫn muốn quay lại khách sạn và hội an

Vị trí hoàn hảo, bạn có thể đến phố cổ và chợ đêm trong vòng 7 phút đi bộ. Phòng được trang trí đẹp, rất sạch sẽ. Tv là tv internet nên bạn thường có thể thưởng thức youtube và netflix vào mỗi buổi tối. Nhân viên siêu thân thiện, luôn nở nụ cười và hỗ trợ bạn bất cứ lúc nào bạn muốn. Có dịch vụ cho thuê xe đạp. Giá 40.000 đồng không quá đắt. Rất đáng để giới thiệu và chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây vào lần tới!

Khách sạn vị trí yên tĩnh phòng có ban công nên tối hóng mát nhâm nhi chút khô mực hội an là đúng bài. Khách sạn phòng tuy bé nhưng vừa đủ, xinh và sạch. Nhớ thử thêm quán mỳ quảng gần khách sạn mọi người nhé
Hài lòng từ lễ tân cho đến phòng ốc, mọi thứ đều oki trong tầm giá tiền đáng để lưu trú

Khách sạn nằm ngay bên cạnh phố cổ nên rất dễ di chuyển, anh lễ tân rất nice và thân thiện, phòng còn mới nên rất sạch. Sẽ quay lại khi đến hội an lần tiếp theo. The hotel location is near the acien town, the new and cleaning room has impression me. And the staff is nice and friendly.
Sạch sẽ lễ tân thân thiện nhiệt tình
Underbart litet nyrenoverat hotell alldeles vid flodkanten. Utmärkt. Fantastisk personal. Bra frukost. Lånecyklar, vi är helnöjda

We loved everything about this hotel the rooms, the bath, the wonderful staff and the breakfasts. It was also grear value for the money. We were on the first floor because we were too lazy to walk up to the second floor but the view of the river would be even better from here. We walked along the river path every day to old town but we didnt mind. We were away from the noise of the town. If you ride a bike this would be an easy 5 minute ride.
Clean friendly wonderful view great breakfast! i ll be back!
スタッフさんがとても親切です すこし市街地から離れてはいますが 近すぎると毎晩お祭りのようなホイアンではうるさく感じることもあると思うのでちょうど良かったと思いました

Amazing new boutique hotel in hoian. Quiet riverside location with many good restaurant around. We had junior suite which is very spacious and clean. Good breakfast, attentive staff. Easy walk to old town or bike ride which is free for rent. Enjoyed 4 nights stay, highly recommended.
The villa was beautiful, new and a amazing view. Very comfortable and clean room. The staff was so nice and helpful, delicious breakfast. Highly recommended!.

Great hotel, in a beautiful quiet location down the river from old town. The view from our room was stunning and breakfast was delicious. Very friendly staff who were accomodating and kind. The free bicycle rentals made getting back and forth very easy.
The staff were lovely, the room and location were beautiful, and breakfast was great! loved my stay there
Hotel has a great location right next to the river with a great view of passing boats.
部屋の設備 空調 給排水)が整っている 朝の食事はスタッフの温もりが感じられる フロントのおもてなしも素晴らしい 時空を超えた安らぎの宿 三度訪問を叶えたい宿 ありがとう
The staff was very friendly and i would like to stay here again.

Wow! this is a great hotel, right by the river, so beautifully decorated, very clean, great staff, beautiful breakfast with great coffee ( in a air conditioned dining room!) and super comfortable bed and pillows! we were surprised by the high quality or the (free) bicycles. We ended up there because of a mistake in a reservation in another hotel, but we should definitely have booked at roxanna first! we look forward to be back there for a longer stay!
静かな地域でゆっくりと養生できました 入口扉の建付けが悪い 浴室内で雨漏れがしていた 浴槽の排水栓を閉めても水が漏れていたなどの不具合はありましたが それも楽しんで宿泊できました 近くにスーパーや飲み屋さんがあると良かった

Our stay was really so lovely. Excellent staff who were friendly, professional, helpful and generous willing to have a chat. Spotlessly clean everywhere. Beautiful pool. Bicycles available daily. Delicious breakfast, inclusive of offering a variety of options for my friend who is vegan. Eggs, pancakes, fresh fruit juice, fresh fruit salad were all perfect. Spacious rooms, many which have either a full or partial river view. An easy 20 minute walk into hoi an old town was nice on cool days, and only 30.000 in a taxi when not. We wouldn t hesitate to stay again.
Quiet place and friendly staff, i have enjoyed stay.

The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The property is relatively well kept and a bonus is that it s by the river - i would suggest paying the extra money for the view. We came across issues with the ac for 2 of the 3 rooms i booked. I ended up swapping my room 3 times during our 3 night stay. A few things to note, there are no elevators so you have to be comfortable climbing stairs, and the breakfast buffet is a la carte. I selected roxana because my preference is to stay somewhere quieter and away from the busy streets but you will have to walk about 3km to get to the old town. They do offer bikes and the reception can help with ordering an electric car which is perfect for families/larger groups. However, it s difficult to order a cab at night (after 8pm) cause they re typically all booked up. Overall my family and i had a great stay at roxana river villas.

We stayed at the roxana river villa in hoi an, vietnam in early march, our large room had a balcony overlooking the riverfront giving us views of the occasional boat traffic. The entire hotel is very clean and well maintained. The pool area is mostly shaded, a plus in the tropical heat, and large enough to swim laps. Yet, the best part of our stay was the interacting with the very friendly and kind staff. They were a pleasure to speak with and always looking out for our needs. For breakfast there was a variety of food and always very good. The roxana also provides bicycles for guest use, which came in very handy to ride into the old quarter, which was approximately one kilometer away. This was far enough for a little peace and quiet from the tourist noise, but within walking, or biking distance. We highly recommend the roxana river villa for any stay in the hoi an area.

This is a charming place to stay. A new hotel overlooking the river it is situated just a short walk from the main town. This is a bonus as it is so peaceful but not isolated. There is a good swimming pool and they provide bicycles for those who don t want to walk into town. The hotel is sparkling clean and the staff wonderfully kind and helpful. It is overall wonderful value for money.
시설이 아주 잘 되어 있고, 조식 서비스도 아주 좋아요 리버 뷰 전망도 멀리 볼 수 있어서 호이안 에서는 최고 수준의 호텔 이라고 해도 손색이 없을 것 같습니다

The property has a great view, facing to a beautiful river. Staff is friendly, sincere but lack of hospitality skills. Dining is very limited, breakfast only. Staffs are very inflexible, they don t know how to support customers, specially when there are special situations such as stomach flu. The hotel is only good with the view. Not worth the price.
Phòng rộng rãi và thoải mái, sạch sẽ.
Cô chủ nhiệt tình, cho nhận phòng sớm nếu có phòng trống. Nếu có duyên còn được cô chủ đãi món ăn ngon đậm chất hội an.
Cô chủ nhà tốt bụng, đáng yêu. Phòng ở sạch sẽ thoáng mát
Ông chủ nhiệt tình vui vẻ phòng rất sạch sẽ phù hợp cho đi gia đình hoặc cặp đôi
Tôi là khách duy nhất ở đó, và họ cho tôi một phòng ký túc xá trống rỗng. Ồ tất cả mọi thứ ok và tuyệt vời!
Mình ở 1 ngày đêm thôi nhưng mình không thích vì nhà có mùi rất lạ, không có dầu gội đầu, nhà hơi xa phố cổ
Ok. Tam duoc, sach se, yen tinh.
Chủ nhà thân thiện. Mix phòng là ok.
Tuyệt, thoải mái, cô chú rất vui vẻ, giống như một giá đình

Tôi chỉ thích nó! gia đình người điều hành kinh doanh thực sự chào đón và họ có một trái tim lớn! họ làm tất cả mọi thứ để làm cho bạn cảm thấy nhà, và không khí chỉ là tuyệt vời! nóng và phòng đã được thực sự sạch sẽ! chắc chắn đề nghị! có cửa hàng nhỏ và thực phẩm đường phố tốt gần đó và không xa đi bộ đến trung tâm thành phố. Khu vực đẹp và yên tĩnh! tôi sẽ ở lại nếu tôi trở lại hoi an!
Khách sạn nhỏ xinh, lễ nên cbi phòng hơi lâu, đồ ăn sáng tạm ổn
Parfait le meilleur hôtel que j ai fait au vietnam
위치가 조금 애매하지만, 스태프들도 매우 친절하고, 룸 컨디션이 매우 훌륭했다. 픽업도 해주기때문에 이동에 불만을 갖을 수 없다.
Nice quiet getaway from bustle of old town. Amazing staff.

This hotel is very fine except poor breakfast. The room is spacious, modern and bed is big and comfort but...you can order only one food and one drink from list and that s not enough... Pool is tiny and in the shade while sun is shining.

Ce petit hôtel familial situé sur l ile cam nam nous a enchanté. Le calme, la disposition des propriétaires, la propreté. Le centre de hoï àn étant à 2 km, on vous prête des vélos ou pour les moins courageux une voiture électrique assure une navette. Nous avons vraiment passé un très bon séjour dans cet endroit. Le chant du coq n est pas déplaisant le matin au réveil.

매우 아늑하고 편안한 분위기의 숙소입니다. 청소에 신경을 많이 쓰는 것 같고, 기본적으로 손님을 대하는 태도가 가식적이지 않고 진심이 느껴져 좋았습니다. 조식은 다른 숙소처럼 뷔페식이 아니라 10개 이내의 메뉴에서 하나씩 선택할 수 있게끔 했는데, 오히려 깔끔하고 맛도 좋았습니다. 특히 조식에 곁들여 나왔던 커피는 아내가 극찬과 감동을 쏟아낼 정도였습니다. 그래서 떠나기 전에 커피 브랜드를 물어본다는 것이 깜빡했네요. 혹시 숙소의 매니저께서 이 글을 보신다면 커피에 대한 정보도 알려주시면 고맙겠습니다. 어쨌든 숙소의 여러분들 덕분에 우리 일곱 가족이 이틀동안 잘 지내다 왔습니다. 고맙습니다. 기회가 되어 다시 호이안에 갈 일이 있다면 또 숙박할 의향이 있습니다.

This place is super clean and nice, but just so far from hoi an town. The reception is very accommodating and gave me a ride into town when i was checking out. There are free bicycles, but it takes 15 minutes to ride into town, it became a big hassle. Otherwise the place is lovely.

Great place, very modern room and bathroom. The swimming pool while not huge was perfect. The staff are friendly, with sol at reception a standout. She is such a genuine, warm person who is very helpful. The only drawback is the distance from town and eating places but they have a buggy shuttle each night and taxis very cheap. It s very quiet except the local rooster (part if life in asia). The ac worked well and the wifi was exceptional. There are a number of choices fir breakfast- both western and asian. The minibar has soft drinks, water and beer etc.
Très bon hôtel ! très bien accueilli ! une chambre très propre, ménage fait tous les jours

We had an excellent stay at a rural scene villa. Sol and her sister were very nice and provided excellent device. Housekeeping was great and the room was kept in very clean condition daily! we will be back to stay at rsv if we are in hoi an again.
Great place! love it

One not to miss easy access to old town by bicycle which are free from the homestay classed as 2star should be 3star staff friendly and helpful sol the receptionist can t do enough for you fresh towels every day breakfast can be purchased on site reasonable price and great variety and value all round excellent highly recommend
Very good
Nice,small villa,run by family. Place is quite close to the old town or beach by the push bike. You will be able to find food on the each corner. I will go again to visit vietnam.

Bedste hotel vi har boet på! det var de sødeste personale og det var virkeligt et lille paradis. Skøn pool og god morgenmad. Virkeligt meget for pengene også det hele bare fuldt ud igennem perfekt! et plus at man kunne låne gratis cykler. Helt klart ikke sidste gang vi har boet der!

Loved everything about this place. Location was great - a bit out of town but loved to see local life. The room was big and very clean. The breakfast was amazing - freshly cooked to order (try the banana pancakes) bikes are provided which we used daily to cycle into town and to the beach. The service from the staff was brilliant - nothing was too much trouble. The only slight thing to be aware of is the pool loses the sun at lunchtime.

This place is so beautifully decorated and brand new. It s even nicer than the pictures show. I booked 4 nights and ended up staying for 2 weeks. Everything was amazing from the comfortable bed to the rainfall shower in the bathroom. The staff were truly amazing. So friendly and genuine. The food that they cook is delicious and they are so kind and helpful. It is a little far from the old city so i would recommend renting a scooter but it is not absolutely necessary as they have free bikes and a golf cart that they will drive you into town for free. I highly recommend staying here as you will feel like home and it will be hard to leave this wonderful place. Thank you for a great stay!!! 10 stars )

Anybody who comes to hoi an should stay here. I booked for 4 nights and ended up staying for the location of the homestay is very tranquil - it was a haven after leaving the busy streets of hanoi. I had amazing views of the pool, palm trees and river from my room. The room itself is amazing. It s spacious, comfortable and clean with a fantastic bathroom and very tastefully decorated. The family is extremely friendly and helpful. They are genuinely kind and are passionate about the service that they deliver. Most of my interactions were with sol who is an absolute star. She arranged tours for me, made sure i was comfortable at all times, arranged transportation for me to and from the ancient town and basically went out of her way to ensure that i had a memorable time. When i moved to spend a few days at the beach they even took me to the new location at no cost. In addition to this sol took me on a tour around hoi an and when the family heard that i wanted to go on a basket boat ride it was quickly arranged for me. My stay at rural scene villa was by far my best stay anywhere in south east asia. After a very delightful week here i felt like i was leaving old friends. The beautiful location, fantastic rooms, genuinely warm family and excellent value for money makes it a perfect choice for your visit to hoi an. Stay here when you are in hoi an, you will not regret it!

If you want to go beyond the normal tourist path this hotel is for you. We enjoyed staying here and relaxing on our balcony to view of the mountains or cooling off the in the pool. If you wish to go to the center of hoi an the hotel has an electric car that will drive you there in a few quick minutes. We choose to walk to central hoi an a few times or road the bikes which we rented from the hotel. It was nice walking/riding through cam nam because it was a local neighborhood with no tourists, which was a nice contrast to when we crossed the bridge into old town hoi an which is beautiful but full of tourists. The hotel staff were extremely welcoming and friendly. The room was clean, comfortable and nicely decorated.
Great quality rooms, very welcoming staff lovely pool. Would love to stay here again!
Really hospital family run hotel. Aqesome value, right next to the new bridge being built.
Our family is happy to stay for 2 nights. The place is comfortable. Free bikecycles are available for guests. Distance to the center is about 1.5 km. It is very easy to get anywhere.

Khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi, phong cách kiến trúc vintage, cách bày trí đẹp và ấn tượng. Nhân viên khách sạn thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Phòng rộng rãi, thoải mái, không gian xung quanh yên bình và thi vị với vườn cau đậm chất việt nam ở phía mặt tiền khách sạn. Khách sạn mới khai trương nhưng được rất nhiều khách quốc tế lựa chọn cho kỳ nghĩ.
Totally enjoyed this place, the hosts and the service

Amazing stay here. The villa is super clean and comfortable. The staff are very helpful and informative. The villa itself is a little bit out of the town but we easily rented bikes from the villa everyday. It was a nice 10-15 min ride into town. It was definitely worth it to stay out of the busy town and relax in this peaceful villa!

Ei oikeastaan mitään negatiivistä, kaikki toimi moitteetta. Kaikissa huoneissa ei ole parveketta, ainoastaan meren puoleisissa, joten otettiin korotus siihen. Tässä huonessa olikin iso jääkaappi ja ym ruoanteko vehkeet, liesi jne..jos niitä tarvitsisi. Allas on pienehkö, mutta riittävä. Aamupala perus ok. Itse alue on loistava, hiljainen(ainakin low season aikaan), kuppiloita löytyy, meri ihan rannassa. Aallot oli turhan kovat tähän aikaan vuodesta(marraskuu). Taxi vanhaan kaupunkiin alle 100.000 dong 4 . Pari kertaa päivässä, aamu ja iltapäivä hotskun ilmainen kuljetus vanhaan kaupunkiin. Menisinkö uudelleen, no mikä ettei, jos siellä päin liikun.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. In the previous 6 weeks we stayed at the full range of units, from bad to good. Our stay here made us forget about all of the others. I wanted to change the room location to an ocean view--no problem. The breakfasts were adequate, with a choice between any style eggs and traditional pho bo which was very good. Fresh fruits were picked from their own plants. Beach facilities were available. The staff was always extremely helpful with any request, and always very friendly with a pleasant smile. Would recommend it to anyone, anytime. We will be coming back.

The staff was absolutely amazing. Free beach towels for loan, reliable car service, free refill of water bottles on a daily basis, eggs your way at breakfast, and altogether friendly and helpful. Cozy location at a peaceful end of the beach. There s a couple of decent bars and restaurants right across the street.

Stayed here for several nights. It was great stay, comfortable room and friendly staff. In terms of the food, cao lau (hoi an noodle) is their specialty. Also, there s a several restaurants and spas along the street and beach. No convenience store though, one grocery store is there.
しずかな環境がすばらしい 朝食がおいしかった 目の前がビーチで良いと思います 街のはずれにあっつたが 不便さはない

Great little family run boutique hotel. Very clean, new spacious rooms. Across the street from clean beach. Restuarants bars nearby. Healthy breakfast items both local western food, coffee fresh very tasty. Owner family very friendly, he took the time to talk and staff helpful in getting around area, even use bicycles for free. Would not hesitate to stay here again

Fint lite hotel på stranden i hoi an. Flott service og kort avtstand til hoi an old city (100.000 vdn en vei). Old city må besøkes. Bodde 2 netter og alt var helt ok. Ps !! sjekk skyvedør (glass) i dusj - ikke norsk std - vår eksploderte bokstavelig talt i 1000 biter på vei ute av dusjen uten videre - flere små kutt og masse blod. Ble plastret etter alle kunstens regler, men utover det ingen spesiell beklagelse eller annen oppmerksomhet - kunne gått mye verre

Great hotel with very helpful and wonderful staff. Breakfast was great. Rooms were large and clean. Only 5km from the city center. A little quiet around the hotel but only a 15 min walk to the beach bars/restaurants.

Lovely new hotel. Clean, comfortable beds, excellent breakfast. Beach across road with free sun beds. Hotel pool small but we enjoyed it. The housekeeping ladies, reception girl and the breakfast waitress are the best! so friendly, always helpful. We stayed three weeks and better aircon would have made for a more comfortable stay. It was not adequate to cool room and given it doesn t run if you re not in the room (as it requires your electronic key to turn on power in room) it would take a while to cool the room and struggled to keep it cool enough. Given the price the aircon should be on as required. Even our us 20 a night homestay kept our aircon running to provide a cool room. The only other minor issue was the guy at reception kept losing our key (which they want handed in when you leave the hotel). But he was distracted most of the day by his phone. I d definately return and highly recommend if you want a relaxing hotel by the beach.
Loved it - clean, nice, quiet and what we all needed. Beats the crowded hotels of da nang. The beach is also nice and clean. Will recommend 100
Second time staying here. Love this place )
Friendly staff. Good breakfast. Clean throughout. Big room.

Petit hôtel très agréable à quelques mètres de la plage propre et bon état général, cela change des hôtels de ce type en asie du sud-est personnel accueillant et serviable pour les réservation (taxis, bus,...) prévoir un taxi pour aller dans la vieille ville. Il faut choisir, mer ou centre-ville!
Really friendly hosts huge room my only issue was the flights of stairs choose a lower floor great pool

Santa villa is a silent hotel - reasonably new - the room we had was a super deluxe(?) with its own balcony with a view of the beach. Very comfortable room and bed - everything was spotlessly clean and the staff were very helpful. Breakfast was acceptable with eggs anyway you like, toast and pastries , juice. I d didn t like the coffee (very strong) they served and also didn t try cereals as the milk was in a jug with no cooling (so hot it would quickly spoil in my view) but very minor negatives. We used the hotel car service to get us to the airport - everything was efficient and we were well looked after. At the moment there is construction work on a building opposite so a little noisy from 7 30am and if you re sensitive to that i would recommend asking to be on the other side of the hotel hotel has its own beach sun loungers and umbrellas - we happened to use the ones from the pine bar - which are the ones closest to be sea - all you need to do is buy drinks from them and they are ok for you to use them.

We were extremely impressed with santa villa. The room was modern, clean and very spacious. It was nice to have a powerful shower especially after days at the beach! the room was cleaned daily and little niceties replaced. The staff were always friendly and helpful, and always greeted us with a smile. The beach is across the road from the beach and has a few restaurants and a pub nearby. We were able to get bikes for free and beach towels! breakfast was tasty with a good amount of options available. We loved our stay at santa villa and vietnam!
Nice clean hotel with great quiet location right on the beach. Good breakfast with omelet station. Will come again.

Great stay at the santa villa. Beach just over the road with local bars and restaurants. Spacious and clean rooms. Breakfast was basic but perfectly fine. Located on the quieter part of am bang beach with free loungers and a local beach bar selling reasonably priced food and drinks. Efficient and friendly service by the staff who also arranged transport to da nang.
위치 정말좋아요 해변 바로 앞이고 조식도 맛있어요. 직원 친절하고 바로 앞에 해변에 산타빌라전용 썬베드가 있어서 주변식당 이용안해도 썬베드에 누워있을수 있고요 새로 지어서 깨끗합니다 다만 제가 이용한 룸에 개미 통로가 있는지 수천마리의 개미가 하루종일 룸에서 이동하고 다니네요 그것빼고는 괜찮아요
Close to beach, 4 km from hoi an and plenty of food and drink venues nearby. Staff were friendly and helpful.
Stayed here 3 weeks previously. Such a great place. Super comfortable, close to the beach, and great staff )
Great location across from beach. Great room with beach view.

Lovely hotel. Friendly,helpful staff and yummy breakfasts! locality is great for the beach and just a short taxi ride to the old quarter. They lend you bicycles free of charge but the weather was too bad during our stay...maybe next time. Pool is very small but quirky and spotless. Great hotel for the price.
Very friendly and clean place. Very happy. We enjoyed our time.

Sehr ruhig gelegenes hotel nur 30 schritte vom strand entfernt. Strandliegen sind kostenlos wie auch fahrräder. Das morgenessen ist gut. Anlässlich eines ausflugs am frühen morgen würden uns statt frühstück reichhaltige lunchpakete mitgegeben. Die zimmer sind in einem sehr guten zustand und auch gross und hell. Der hotelier gibt sich grosse mühe die kunden gut und kompetent zu beraten und die angestellten sind sehr umsichtig und fragen oft nach ob alles in ordnung sei.
The location was excellent and the staff very helpful. Loved the little refreshing pool.
A very nice small hotel on a quiet section of the beach. The room was large and clean/comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast wasn t large but good. A good choice.
Great place by beach would stay again

비록 엘레베이터가 없고 에어컨 성능이 선풍기만도 못하지만, 1,2,3번으로 끝나는 객실은 전용발코니와 안방비치가 한눈에 보이는 뷰로 인해 감성적으로 훌륭합니다. 안방비치의 전체적인 숙소 수준에 비하면 이 가격에 이정도 감성적인 숙소는 손에 꼽을것입니다. 단, 객실이 매우 습하며 냄새가 나고 에어컨성능이 좋지 않으며 각종 벌레들을 체험할 수 있습니다. 숙소 전용 선배드는 몇개 되지않아 안방비치 업자들의 선배드를 유료로 이용하는게 낫습니다. 주인은 매우 친절합니다.
Die unterkunft im maritimen stil liegt sehr nah am schönen strand, die betreiber sind hilfsbereit und haben uns einen fahrer nach hue organisiert.
This was in a fabulous position with beach views nice swimming. We were well attended to it was very quiet. Easy to get into busy hoi an by grab.
Fantasyic location and very good personal service

Bildene stemmer ikke helt med virkeligheten, men når vi fikk sjekket inn og gjort oss kjent ble vi veldig fornøyde. Sentralt, nære strand og mange koselige restauranter. Hyggelig betjening og en enkel men god frokost. Stort rom og stort bad. 10 min med drosje til hoi an.

This place suited us really well. One of the friendliest budget hotels we have stayed in. The room was big and comfortable, fresh cooked scrambled eggs, fruit and breads for breakfast. Situated just across from the beach. The village has a variety of bars and restaurants, xin chao , serena s and blue sea were fine. They have basic bicycles you can borrow if you want to go into hoi an or to the pottery and vegetable villages.
The room is a bit dated and the building needs some maintenance. But location ,view and staff our outstanding

This place was great - it s in a more quiet area of an bang beach. The hotel is across the street from the beach with ample access to a really nice area on the beach. There are a variety of restaurants in the area. Taxi/grab fares to hoi an ranged from vnd 50,000-90,000. We based ourselves and explored the hoi an area from here. The staff are super friendly and polite. Breakfast was awesome each morning. They had free bicycles to explore the area and scooters for rent if needed. I recommend getting an ocean side apartment with balcony - great unobstructed view of the ocean!

Absolutely delightful highly recommend a stay here the owner is so helpful excellent english wonderful view of the indian ocean from my balcony peaceful and quiet have extended my stay by an extra two weeks ten mins in a taxi from hoi an.
Friendly staff. The room was spacious and clean. It was close to the beach, bars, and plenty of places to eat. I wish i had a bit longer to relax and enjoy the hotel and the area.
A wonderful property supported by incredible staff. So friendly and welcoming and made our stay in hoi an one we will never forget and will most certainly return to.
Nice modern hotel staff brilliant very good location for bar s restaurants enjoyable stay.

Nice stay had pretty views at night. Was a bit far from the town center but that is the trade off for being close to the beach. Property and room was very nice clean and tidy overall, and the staff were friendly. Would definitely return here! however, the beach was not pretty.
Will come back most definitely. Please try their pho, it s the best i ve had.

This is an excellent place to stay with the clean and spacious rooms. Very convenient location right next to the beach with lots of eating options around. Very friendly staff, and the management will do everything to make your stay pleasant and comfortable. Nice swimming pool.

An bang beach is filthy! i wouldn t even swim. There even was a dead rotting pig on the beach! trash everywhere to include i.v. Bags and broken glass. Hotel steps slippery and i fell and hurt myself on the slippery granite steps. Their resident pet dog is prone to violence. View from front balcony is nice.
Just 100 yards from the beach. Beautiful view from our balcony! free bicycles.
Room was huge, staff were lovely, super close to beach. Definitely will return

Very pleasant stay! the staff was attentive to all of our needs and the room was comfortable. Right near the beach and we basically had the whole beach to ourselves. Easy and cheap scooter rental into the main town. The only thing we were a little bummed about was the pool being drained right before we got there. There was a big storm so they closed it for the season. Not a big deal and everything else was great.
Great stay..good breakfast, will come back and stay longer.
The ocean view wasnt great. But, yes you do have the view of the waters. Breakfast was good.
Très bien merci a tout le staff. Le propriétaire, son fils et tuyi sont serviables et gentils les chambres sont grandes avec balcons. Elles sont propres.

This was probably the best stay we had in vietnam. The staff were so friendly and helpful, providing suggestions and recommendations throughout our stay. Truly the best service we ve experienced here. The room itself was perfect for what we needed, walkable to everything but still in a quiet area away from the busyness of the city. Would highly recommend!
Clean small hotel with great staff.

Đặt một phòng gia đình cho vợ tôi và 12 tuổi. Phòng thực sự rộng rãi với 2 giường poster. Có một tv thông minh với netflix cho những lúc thiếu niên bồn chồn. Đó là 7 phút đi bộ đến bãi biển an bạc rực rỡ, với nhiều nhà hàng, spa, và quán ăn nhỏ. Các phòng rất đẹp và phòng tắm rộng rãi như nhau. Chủ sở hữu rất thân thiện và hữu ích. Nơi này vẫn còn mới, vì vậy đó là một lợi thế. Thực đơn cho bữa sáng cũng rất ngon và họ thực sự thích nó khi bạn yêu cầu các món ăn địa phương không có trong thực đơn. Họ sẽ mua hoặc chuẩn bị nó cho bạn - chúng tôi thực sự đã thử giá vé của gia đình họ vào một buổi sáng và điều đó thực sự tốt. Sinh tố trái cây nếm thực sự tốt. Món phở bò ngon nhất tôi từng nếm cũng xuống đường. Khu vườn homestay cũng khá yên bình. Đó là 4km (15-20 phút) từ phố cổ hội an, nhưng chúng tôi đã ở đó cho bãi biển, vì vậy lý tưởng của nó. Grab-bike rất nhiều cho những lần chúng tôi đi vào thị trấn. Chỉ có một phụ nữ (hoa) nói tiếng anh. Không phải là một vấn đề vì cô ấy hầu như luôn ở bên. Tôi sẽ và đã giới thiệu (ed) cơ sở này cho bất kỳ ai (1) đến thăm bãi biển an bàng, (2) không muốn ở trong một homestay du lịch quá mức (có rất nhiều người xung quanh, đặc biệt là những người có chữ hàn quốc, v.v.) và (3) mong muốn giúp các doanh nghiệp nhỏ địa phương xứng đáng. Tôi rất thích ở lại đó và sự quan tâm của gia đình họ dành cho gia đình tôi. Tôi chúc họ nhiều thành công.

Phòng rộng rãi có ban công, phòng tắm sạch sẽ. Bạn nhân viên lúc đầu hơi thiết nhiệt tình 1 chút nhưng về sau cũng hỗ trợ gối cho khách đầy đủ. Tôi đặt phòng cho 4 người nhưng lúc đầu nhân viên báo phòng tôi đặt chỉ dành cho 2 người (1 giường đôi), bạn ấy chỉ có thể hỗ trợ tôi lấy phòng 2 giường đơn nên nằm 2 người hơi chật.
Khách sạn đang sửa chữa. Nhưng view đẹp. Tạm được

Mình đặt phòng là đặt 1 phòng giường đôi, nhưng khi nhận phòng thì là phòng 2 giường đơn, tuy sau đó các chị buồng phòng đã kê 2 giường đơn thành 1 giường đôi nhưng vẫn thấy không được hài lòng cho lắm. Vào phòng thì thấy không có tivi, vào sau đó cũng mới được lắp tivi thêm vào. Điểm trừ lớn nhất ở đây là wifi không kết nối được, còn ăn sáng thì ok. Đánh giá chung cho khách sạn là tạm được
Khách sạn tương đối ok. Nhân viên chu đáo nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Nói chung hài lòng về dịch vụ ở đây
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ, cao lầu ngon
작은 호텔이지만 나름대로 쾌적하고 풀장과 바다와의 접근성이 좋아 추천하고 싶습니다. 단 수건과 침대시트에서 곰팡이 냄새가 나고 아침 조식장이 너무 작어서 많이 붐비는것은 이 리조트의 단점입니다.
街もホテルもこじんまりとしてるけど サービスと環境も最高です ゆっくりしたい方にはいいとこです

Lovely hotel on the beach. Staff friendly and helpful especially at front desk. Room was deluxe so had sea view. V comfortable. They provide free bikes as city 4km away. They organised cars for ba na hills and danang airport. Restaurant basic but not bad. Spa a tad amateurish.
Lovely hotel in hidden beach - helpful staff and great breakfast.
Lovely location and staff and happy to help. Would have liked a room not near the air conditioner that cools the office. The hotel was far from full so could have put us in better position.
Loved our week at sea lavie.

This property is beautiful. The grounds are perfectly manicured and the rooms are so nice. The pool is great. The beach is awesome and only a few steps away. The staff is so helpful and accommodating. I wish we had more time here. I hope to come back.
Loved it being on the beach an nice small pool area. Lovely garden with lots of sun beds

주변에 정말 아무것도 없는 리조트, 하지만 직원분들이 정말 친절하고 좋았어요! 호이안은 딱 하루만 머물렀는데 정말 딱 하루정도 머물기 좋은 숙소였어요. 20대 초반 여자 다섯명이 사용하기에 불편함도 딱히 없었습니다. 지나다니는 차도 많이 없긴한데 어차피 베트남은 그랩만 있으면 어디든 갈 수 있기 때문에 별 상관은 없었어요. 다만 밤에는 나가기 무섭긴합니다. 저녁에 올드타운 둘러보고 들어와서 잠만 잤어요..! 체크인 하면서 공항 드랍 서비스 신청했는데 직원분들 응대가 친절하고 좋았습니닷 다만 우기에 여행을 가서 그런지 밤에 잘 때 약간 추웠어요.. 이불이 다른 호텔에 비해 많이 얇으니 따뜻하게 입고 자세용 가격에 딱 맞는 숙소입니다.
한국분들은 기겁하실수도 . 청결이 그냥 바닥 이며 싱크대 물때 에어컨 뭐든 청결은 0 이에요 정말 이국적과 바로앞 해변가 그런 분위기만 보면 좋지만 위생과 조식은 포기하고가세요 조식에 파리 다들어가요..ㅎㅎ 어매니티도 없습니다 참고하세요
Beautiful hotel, on the beach and close to bars and restaurants. Staff were friendly and helpful. Thank you hanh. This was an idyllic break in the middle of our trip in se asia.
Fantastic set up and beautiful views

Nydelig resort med umiddelbar tilgang til stranden, en flott hage og basseng. Rommet var romslig og rent. Likte veldig godt at rommene hadde romslige kjøleskap og vannstasjon til påfyll av vann på glassflasker. Og på den måten reduserte både kostnader og miljøet, og tilgang til rent drikkevann hele tiden. Servicen var upåklagelig, det samme var maten. Det eneste jeg savnet var at rommet kunne lukte litt fukt når ac ikke stod på. Kan trygt anbefale denne nydelige resorten!
Nice
There is a building site next door to the hotel and many more building sites along the small road.
No gym

Really was an amazing property. Caught us by surprise as nice quiet area on a beautiful stretch of beach. Amazing helpful staff that was super flexible when the next phase of our vacation was disrupted by weather. Great breakfasts. Very trendy. Only issue was our room lost power in the night (so no ac), but night watchman quickly changed rooms. Certainly not staff s fault and very apologetic the next day.
A lovely place to stay with our toddler. Comfy beds, good food, right on the beach and a short grab to old town.
Nous avons passé un séjour incroyable ! endroit magnifique, tout confort, petit déjeuné super. Allez y les yeux fermés !!

hotelName: Seagull Nest Hội An Beach Village
userCmt: I had a short but fantastic stay. It is located near the popular beaches, easily reachable by bike. The location itself was quiet. They have a nice pool, clean rooms and very kind staff.

hotelName: Seagull Nest Hội An Beach Village
userCmt: Nice spot on the river, beautiful people

hotelName: Seagull Nest Hội An Beach Village
userCmt: ホストの女性たちの笑顔が本当に素晴らしいです
Sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, sẽ quy lại vào lần sau
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, gần biển.
Phòng trang trí rất ấm cúng, khu vực an ninh tốt. Homestay rất nhiệt tình. Nhưng nên bố trí thêm đèn để khi khách cần thêm ánh sáng vẫn đáp ứng được.
Lễ tân thân thiện nhiệt tình, ăn sáng đơn giản nhưng rất ngon hợp khẩu vị. Vị trí gần biển đi bộ 50m là tới biển. Nói chung là ok.

Mình vừa mới check out là viết review liền. Khách sạn cưng dễ sợ. Nhân viên cực kỳ chuyên nghiệp dễ thương và nhiệt tình. Mình có tới sớm 2 tiếng so với thời gian check in. Lúc đó phòng chưa dọn xong. Chị nhân viên thấy mình tới với bộ dạng tơi tả do mắc mưa nên chị đã huy động tất cả lực lượng kể cả chị nhào dô dọn phòng cấp tốc cho mình liền. Và tầm 20p sau mình được check in sớm. Rồi hôm sau mình có mượn con dao để gọt xoài ăn thì đem ra cho mình đĩa đựng và khăn giấy. Phòng óc thoải mái, sạch sẽ và ấm cúng. Phong cách phòng kiểu tường gạch cổ cổ lạ lạ. Đồ ăn sáng ngon và vừa khẩu vị người miền nam như mình (do trước đó có ăn ngoài và thấy đồ ăn bị mặn so với vị mình ăn). Trước khi check out về mình còn được tặng chai nước suối bự để đi dọc đường. Chắc chắn mình sẽ quay lại lần nữa.
Chủ nhà rất dễ thương, phòng sạch sẽ và đặc biệt bữa sáng cực kì ngon

Homestay mang phong cách kiểu xưa cũ, rất mộc mạc và đậm chất quen thuộc, view ở đây rất đẹp, cây xanh mọi ngóc ngách. Tạo cho mình cảm giác thân quen như ở nhà và còn rất thư thái hòa mình vào thiên nhiên khi sáng thức dậy nghe tiếng chim hót. Mình rất thích nơi này. Có dịp nhất định sẽ ghé nơi này lần nữa cùng gia đình.
Chỗ ở rất tuyệt. Em lễ tân rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Phòng lúc nào cũng thơm mùi tinh dầu xả rất dễ chịu. Tuy nhiên đồ ăn sáng thì ko được đa dạng và chưa được ngon lắm

Điểm cộng phòng sạch sẽ, thoải mái, đầy đủ đồ dùng. Bữa sáng hợp khẩu vị. Bạn phục vụ rất thân thiện và dễ thương. Điểm trừ ánh sáng trong phòng vào buổi tối không đủ để làm việc trên laptop dù đã bật hết đèn trong phòng. Phòng làm chủ yếu bằng gỗ nên cách âm không tốt. Tôi ở tầng trệt, phòng ở trên buổi tối đi chơi về muộn làm cọt kẹt cả đêm không ngủ được.
Nhân vên thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, phòng đẹp
Homestay xa trung tâm, ăn sáng dở
Homestay quá xa trung tâm, bữa sáng chọn món, không ngon, nhà tắm tầng 1 bị rỉ nước từ tầng 2 xuống
Bạn lễ tân cực kỳ dễ thương, phòng đẹp và khá yên bình. Sẽ ghé dịp sau

Lần đầu tiên book khách sạn mà phải mong chờ gửi mail đánh giá để đánh giá )) đây chắc hẳn không phải là cái khách sạn/homestay tốt nhất tại hội an nhưng cách phục vụ thì tuyệt nhất mình đến sớm nhưng vẫn được check in và bạn lễ tân đã pha cho 2 đứa 2 ly nước chanh. Do mải chơi mà mình đi lại quên mang laptop nhưng cô chủ đã support cho mình mượn laptop để làm việc. Bữa ăn sáng cũng rất vừa miệng. Bạn nhân viên rất vui vẻ và dễ thương. Nếu có quay lại mình nhất định sẽ lại book homestay này
Khách sạn gần biển, các dịch vụ chưa nhiều nên rất yên tĩnh, thích hợp cho nghỉ dưỡng cần không gian riêng tư và không xô bồ. Tất cả đều rất tuyệt!
Phòng đẹp, cô chủ nhiệt tình, có ghế nằm ở bãi biển siêu thích, có chòi cạnh bãi biển ngồi rất mát. Giá cả rẻ so với khu an bàng. Có ăn sáng ngon. Nếu quay lại an bàng mình sẽ ở đây tiếp.
Bạn lễ tân rất nhiệt tình. Tuy nhiên phòng mình nhỏ, nhà vệ sinh hơi tối, nhiều muỗi và ăn sáng đơn điệu. Có lẽ tại mình đi mùa thấp điểm
Phòng sạch sẽ, rộng rãi thoáng mát. Cô chú siêu nhiệt tình giúp đỡ. Gần biển
Phòng sạch sẽ các cô chú quản lý rất nhiệt tình, rất gần biển an bàng
