Đối với tôi buffet sáng rất ngon, nhất là bánh mì, bơ, nước ép, với một số người lớn như bố tôi thì cơm chiên hơi khô, cứng. Nhà hàng rộng rãi, thoáng mát, sạch sẽ điểm trừ khách sạn nên thay đổi giờ mở cửa hồ bơi sớm hơn để phù hợp với thời gian buffet sáng thay vì từ 8h sáng có thể đẩy lên 6 hoặc 7h.
Nhân viên hữu ích và tốt bụng, dịch vụ tốt, đồ ăn ngon (thân thiện với người ăn chay), phòng sạch sẽ .

Đi ngày lễ nhưng khách sạn vắng nhân viên, lúc check in không có ai hướng dẫn đỗ xe hay hỗ trợ chuyển đồ vào sảnh. Ekip khách sạn như 1 công ty gia đình nên tôi không thoải mái lắm khi nghỉ ngơi tại đây. Quản lý tự ý đổi phòng của khách mà không thông báo khi check-in, giải thích không chuyên nghiệp và thoả đáng. Nhìn chung là giá thành khá cao nhưng trải nghiệm dịch vụ chưa chuyên nghiệp.

Cực kì thất vọng với khách sạn này phòng siêu nhỏ với máy lạnh siêu lâu mát và yếu bf sáng nhạt nhoà ít món và fill siêu lâu nhân viên ngồi máy tính ngay nhà hàng mặt sưng sỉa khó chịu không biết có mua điểm không mà sao chấm cao khủng khiếp trừ hồ bơi và cho mượn xe đạp thì không còn gì để khen sẽ không trở lại

Phòng giống như hình, rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. Cách trung tâm phố cổ hội an 1km, đi xe điện hợp lý nè. Khách sạn cũng có cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí. Tuy nhiên, đồ ăn cần phải cải thiện cho tươi ngon hơn một chút và nhân viên cũng cần thân thiện hơn một chút nữa.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình , phòng sạch sẽ
Vị trí gần phố cổ, có thể đặt xe xanh rất tiện và nhanh bể bơi to, rộng phòng đẹp, thiết kế phòng k có bàn làm việc lễ tân nên niềm nở hơn chút sẽ thiện cảm hơn

The staff at silkotel are very friendly and helpful. The location was excellent, close to the old town. Breakfast is good but fairly limited. The rooms were noisy with sounds from neighbouring rooms beside and above heard clearly
Clean spacious room and toilet. Walking distance to japanese bridge, ancient house and night market. Will be good if the walkway from villa to the main hall is covered with roof top.

Excellent location near to all the sites, shopping and restaurants. Hotel is big, clean with attentive staff. They provide free bicycles where you can just use to explore the town. We celebrated our daughter s bday. The hotel staff made special effort to give us a fruit basket.
Property had a great location to old town in hoi an and all the restaurants and shopping. My room was quite and i enjoyed the patio.
The staff and service quality were of the highest caliber.
The staff were amazing.
Great location 2 blocks from old district, nice breakfast, accommodating staff.
여직원들 모두 친절했어요 로비에서 담배를 피울수있어요 조용하고 편안합니다 방음은 잘 안돼요 하지만 호텔 직원에게 성추행을 당해 다시는 안갈거에요 여자 혼자 돌아다니니 만만했나보네요
Dejligt hotel i gå afstand til det gamle kvarter. God pool. God morgenmad og gode drinks. Meget imødekommende og serviceminded personale. Der er gratis shuttle til stranden og privat beach club

Not recommended if you want to enjoy a quiet and relaxed stay. We asked for a quiet room and got the room next to the elevators. The staff obviously didnt care. Once you arrive they try to sell you slightly overpriced tours. Breakfast was in regards to the price good. The hotel was very loud, there a lot of groups that keep you up at night. One minimum requirement is to have a nightstand, power and light switch next to the bed one both sides that wasnt given. Unfortunately we couldnt enjoy our stay.
地點方便 行去會安古城非常近 整體ok 但早餐選擇太少

Great hotel close to old town. Lovely, friendly staff. Good buffet breakfast. Pool was ok but not much room for sun loungers lost the sun early. Bathroom could do with upgrade as has shower over bath, who takes a bath on holiday! overall would recommend as great place to stay in hoi an

The silkotel was a fantastic place to stay. Close enough to everything but quiet and peaceful. There are bikes onsite to take out riding and 2 beautiful pool areas. The breakfast were sumptuous and a great variety for the many travellers. We had 2 interconnecting rooms, which was great. Overall i highly recommend staying at the silkotel. The staff also are very friendly and helpful.

The staff were very helpful and the hotel was beautiful. It is very close to the hoi an ancient town and a great place to stay if you like to walk and explore the area. Breakfast buffet has limited options but the quality of the asian dishes were great. Definitely recommend eating the vietnamese dishes. The only thing we didn t like was that the tours booked through the hotel were a lot more expensive than if you just book them through klook. We made the mistake of booking several of our day tours through the hotel for convenience sake. However, do check with the staff, on the last day, they offer to price match whatever we found online but you need to pull up the quotes on the phone for confirmation.
Great stay and lovely room, close to old town and all the attractions. We had a lovely stay and will stay again.
Excellent location! walking distance to old town and all the attractions in town. Quiet, clean and decent breakfast most days. Would recommend and stay next time we are in hoi an!
Staff very friendly and helpful location excellent!!!
The hotel it self was very nice.. Service from the staff was impeccable... Location was perfect 1 min walk from the entrance of the ancient city!
Thank you all. You are the best. Cheers
올드타운과 근접해있어 도보이동이 용이하며 전반적인 시설관리상태가 좋았습니다, 다만 헬스장은 말만 헬스장이지 사용이 불가능해 보였습니다.
I like my stay here. It is very near to the ancient town, the clothes market, busy area. The staff here is polite, full of smiles. I would recommend this hotel for stay in hoi an.
Very accommodating - changed our room to two beds when orbits booked it incorrectly. Assisted in day travel arrangements. Staff was very welcoming.
Excellent hotel, super pool, perfect location.
Excellent hotel, great location, fun pool.

This place is a good location which are near the old town and variety local area that you could walk around and see. Breakfast is good with very nice and gentle staff. Next time will be my first choice again for sure!
원활한 체크인과 한국어를 잘하는 직원이 있어서 편했습니다 숙소의 상태와 야경또한 매우 만족스러웠습니다. 호텔에서사용할수있는 여러 무료이용권을 제공받아 이용할수 있었으며, 25층 수영장의 뷰가 매우좋았습니다
We had stayed at this hotel a few years ago when it was just opened. It was great then and still is!
Great customer service! nice room and very accommodating. Small little bugs, smaller than ants were on the wall but they didn t bite. Just noticed them. But overall great hotel!
일단 분위기랑 직원분들이 너무 좋았는데 화장대가 어두워서 아쉬웠어요!! 수영장도 절고 다좋아요!
We arrived at 12 noon and the rooms were ready but they didn t allow us to check in unless we pay 10 usd per room. Very unpleasant staff.

11月には予約し 代金も支払っていたのにチェックイン時に部屋がないと言われ系列のホテルに宿泊することに 夜だったこともあり夕食や観光のスケジュールが全てキャンセル状態に 満室だから他のホテルへという話になるまでも待たされた 夕食を済ませてから系列のホテルへ送迎はしてくださったが チェックインの際にまた部屋が人数分は用意されていなくてしばらく待たされた 失敗はやむを得ないとしても その後の連携もお粗末だった
Everything was kept very clean and the furniture in the lobby was very much veitnamese, i liked it.
Excellent hotel. Breakfast is brilliant

良いホテルでした 家族連れにもお勧め 立地 日本橋まで徒歩7分程度 無料レンタル自転車があり 旧市街は勿論ちょっとした遠出にも便利 ルーム 新しくは無いですが 手入れされており部屋も清潔感あり 高級感があります 食事 レストランは広く本格的でこちらも高級感あります 朝食はブュッフェ方式で品数多く 満足できると思います 3泊したのですが 何かのキャンペーンか夕食1食のプレゼントがありました プール プールが2つありますので水着を持参することをお勧めします その他 ホテルとは関係無いですが ダナンからの移動は hoi an express のシャトルバスをお勧めします 事前予約要ですが ホテルまで送ってくれて 6です ホームページで予約 メールに到着便名 ホテル名を記入し返信 空港到着ロビー出口付近で名前を書いた担当者が待ってくれてます 空港行きもweb予約か旧市街の同社オフィスで予約できます 空港発は 空席有れば到着時に到着ロビーの同社カウンターでチケット買えるかも知れません
코로나 바이러스로 힘든 기간이었지만 친절하게 잘대해줌
朝食がいまいちだった

I loved my stay at silkotel in hoi an. The area was close to all tourist areas, and staff provided exceptional service. I would give my stay 5/5 and would highly recommend. Only issue was wifi signal is not good and i had to do work.
Would recommend staying somewhere else.
Convenient location to the old town and markets. Staff always friendly and willing to help in anyway. We stayed in villa in back corner so nice and quiet
Reasonable price. Private beach club is nice.
旧市街に近く 観光に便利 自転車を無料で借りれ 散策出来るのも良かった 部屋も十分な広さがあり満足です
The staff were very helpful
地點絕佳的飯店 可以租借腳踏車逛會安古城 房間的浴缸洗澡很容易漏水 整個浴室都會濕濕的 希望可以改進 有點蚊蟲 來這邊一定要備好防蚊
We loved this hotel- staff were exceptional and our room was spotless - the breakfast was fabulous
Good for the value. Breakfast could be better. Good ac and good wifi. Big rooms.

The team at silkotel are very nice and friendly. Thank you to lyn and alice who were super helpful with our room. The hotel itself is in a great location right near hoi an old town, close to great tailors, restaurants and some of the main attractions in hoi an.
Amazing staff. Awesome location.

We had a great stay at this hotel. The location was amazing with walking distance to the markets and the ancient city. All staff were super friendly and gave us great tips to what to do and visit. Would highly recommend.
Wonderful staff. Especially violet, alice, candy and barman mr rum. Large comfortable beds and two fantastic pools.

Joli hôtel avec un personnel très gentil, cependant l hôtel est assez bruyant et les chambres pas très bien insonorisées(réveil à la perceuse dès 8h du matin, presque tous les jours ! et les enfants qu on laissent hurler dans la piscine!) ce qui as motivé mon envie de changer d hôtel !
Excellent location to old town. Good room and breakfast. Gym is very very basic and needs maintenance. Good internet. Staff were very helpful and friendly.
From the moment of check-in at reception to the efforts of housekeeping and the f b team, everyone was incredibly welcoming, accommodating, and friendly. The location is fantastic.
離老城區近 但是早餐不好吃 房間裡不能吃任何食物 退房時還強迫在google評論給五星好評
バスタブが無かった
Khách sạn mới, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, vị trí rất tốt, trang thiết bị mới, view đẹp, tiện nghi và dich vụ đầy đủ
Khách sạn sạch sẽ rất mới dịch vụ tốt vị trí rất tiện
Phòng sạch sẽ gọn gàng. Lễ tân đón tiếp chu đáo.
Thank trinh at the buffet restaurant for helping me carry my food to the table. My disability make it difficult for me to carry the food. Thank you
Good location, free bike to go around! highly recommend!
A fantastic place to stay to experience all of old town hoi an. Walk to everything but quiet
Very helpful staff. Good breakfast, facilities, rooms, a/c.
Loved that it is near the old town hoi an. Hotel is nice and clean. Huge rooms
I have nothing to complain about. The room was very nice and clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. Common areas were clean. Breakfast was great. First class!

Pros a staff, very clean and sanitary, excellent air conditioning, close to everything, superior tv channels offered from around the globe, decent breakfast options, but catered slightly towards other asian tastes (let s get some eggs added), and did i mention the staff? cons a little less sound insulation from the hallway. This is pretty common for all hotels in southeast asia under a hundred bucks a night. This place cost me around 40 per night, so it s something i expected. I recently got back from an eight week vacation/holiday, and i stayed at roughly ten different locations. This was by far the best hotel involved. I had a checkout for noon, and my flight was at midnight. The front desk took great care of my luggage, securing it so that i could enjoy hoi an for my last day. They even offered to let me shower in an open room, and mind you this was after i checked out. Needless to say the staff went above and beyond from my perspective as an ardent traveler. Will be coming back.
The hotel was beautiful, great location near hoi an old town, staff were friendly and helpful.

It s very close to the old town, staff are very nice. No first aid service, you have to buy it at the front desk or buy the medicine at the market yourself which i found very weird. We just needed some alcohol and bandit for small scratch. Breakfast is not so good but hoi an is amazing! must visit )

This is an absolutely gorgeous hotel in the heart of hoi an. It is so pretty and a short walk from the centre. We got a free upgrade to a villa when we arrived and it was beautiful, immaculate and spacious. There is a shuttle bus to the beach, free bike hire and a convenient tour booking desk. There are 2 large pools at the hotel with sun beds. The staff can t do enough for you and go above and beyond. I accidentally left a bag and my airpods in the room after leaving for hcm and the hotel posted them to me for free which was a lifesaver! i would recommend this hotel and stay here again if i visited hoi an again. Stay at this hotel!

Nhân viên lễ tân rất chuyên nghiệp và luôn sốt sắng giúp đỡ khi có cần. Ăn sáng buffet rất phong phú và ngon miệng. Khách sạn có xe miễn phí chở ra bãi biển an bàng. Chúng tôi phải đến phi trường vào sáng sớm, khách sạn đã chuẩn bị cho mỗi người 2 hộp ăn sáng rất đầy đủ và ngon miệng.

The property is situated in a fantastic location. The rooms were very nice for the price. They did feel very humid and muggy and smelt like mildew at times. But no fault of hotel as hoi ann is rainy season now and it did not stop raining the entire 4 days we were there. The buffet breakfast provided daily as part of the room rate was fantastic. It has basically everything, even pho soup. Coffee was good too. The staff were amazing and always ready to assist. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
La ubicación es muy buena, está pegado al centro histórico

This hotel is in a very good area. Because of chinese new year it was so busy. The staff were excellent and nothing was to much trouble. . We only had dinner once in hotel and we were disappointed. The breakfast was okay

Perfectly located hotel close to town centre but very quiet.the room we stayed in was spacious and airy with excellent shower area. Staff very helpful and the hotel very clean. Would highly recommend it
スタッフの方がすごく丁寧でした ヴィラタイプに宿泊しましたが道が狭くキャリーを移動させるのが大変です 観光しやすい街中の立地でお部屋もすごく綺麗でした 土曜日限定でフロント前でバーベキューをしておりサービスはとても良かったです

I really did like this property! they were constantly on top of the cleaning, the rooms were very cozy and spacious, noise was minimal, location was fantastic. Breakfast was also top notch. The one bit of feedback i would provide (and did) to the property was that the odor of mildew/mold in the 2 rooms we had and the presence of black mold around the bathroom fan were problematic. I know vietnam is so very humid and the buildings aren t great for circulation but breathing in mold and mildew can be harmful, and the odor is really unpleasant. We tried to air it out but we couldn t get a handle on it.
I will be back soon

Really lovely hotel located conveniently close to ancient town. Buffet breakfast was a feast! as it was our anniversary, they really went above and beyond and surprised us with a little anniversary cake and flower petals on our bed. Rooms were spacious and well maintained.
This is the best hotel i ve stayed in! it s so beautiful and the staff are amazing and friendly. Food is great, rooms are comfortable and the pool area is brilliant
Great
It s a decent location. Nice to get out and walk. Friendly staff.
1박을 하였는데 밤에 경보음이 어디선가 연속해서 울려서 잠을 설쳤어요..ㅠㅠ 그리고 발코니 밖은 다른집 마당과 뒷뜰이 풍경이라 나가보지도 못했고 오래된 건물이 시야를 가려서 햇빛도 보기힘든 풍경이었네요ㅎㅎ 그 외에는 청결하고 좋았습니다 조식도 괜찮았어요
Excellent location for walking and getting a taxi. Lots of great restaurants and shopping close by. The property was quite. Good tv selection.
침대 커버에 신발자국, 주변에 벌레가 많음, 변기 및 세면대 물 안내려가는 현상, 룸서비스 피자가 그닥 맛 없었음, 프라이빗 비치에 자체 수영장은 만족, 조식도 만족, 서비스는 만족, 방은 마음에 들지 않았음..위치는 만족, 다시 방문할 의사는 그닥 없습니다
親切でとても良かったです
It was a pleasant stay in the hotel with warm welcome from the staff.
Excellent hotel with very clean facilities and helpful staff. Absolute bargain.
旧市街からも近く便利な場所で レンタルサイクルも無料で便利 10人で行ったので ホテルのマイクロバスで ミーソン遺跡 マーブルマウンテン(五業山)にも観光出来ダナンのホテルに送ってもらえた バス料金は 全部で95ドル 一人当たり10ドル未満
조식 비교적 괜찮고 수영장도 야외랑 실내있어서 좋음 야시장이랑 가까운것도 좋지만 에어컨이 시원치못함
Location just outside the old town is great. The staff were so welcoming and accommodating. We had a fabulous 6 night stay here and would definitely stay again next time in wonderful hoi an.
호이안 구시가지에 위치하고 있어서 매우 편했으며 호텔 조식 또한 매우 좋았음
Our second stay at this hotel. Convenient to shopping and restaurants. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Would recommend this to all staying in hoi an
フロントの女性スタッフがフレンドリーで とても親切だったのが最高 彼女のおかげで旅全体がいい思い出になりました

Lo mejor del hotel es el personal, son muy atentos y siempre intentan ayudarte. El hotel dispone de bicicletas gratuitas, paraguas y toallas de playa para usar de forma gratuita y también un servicio de autobús gratuito que conecta con 2 establecimientos de playa de la propiedad varias veces al día. La ubicación del hotel también es excelente, a 5 minutos a pie de la ciudad antigua. El hotel cuenta con 2 piscinas muy bonitas y muy limpias. El desayuno buffet también es bastante completo, incluso tienes cocina en vivo donde preparan tortillas, huevos fritos o pancakes entre otras cosas. Por otra parte tanto las habitaciones como algunas zonas comunes tienen un aspecto un poco antiguo, aunque están bastante bien conservadas

Very nice hotel. Very helpful staff with good english. Our room faced north and about 7am the speakers and the neighbouring temple started. Manager quickly offered me a room change to which i declined mainly because i couldn t be bothered packing up my stuff. As such i can t deem this to be a negative about the hotel. It is just one of those things. The next morning the speakers didn t make any noise. The room was of a large size with a very comfy bed. Curtains needed to be a bit darker but i didn t mind getting up with the sun. Air con in our room struggled a bit but in a friend s room it was like a fridge so not sure what to make of that. Breakfast was of high quality.
ホイアン旧市街まで歩いて約5分 とても近いです ホテルのすぐ前の道は交通量が多く騒々しいですが ロビーを抜けるととても静かです アンバンビーチの付近に美しいプライベートビーチがあり 毎日数便のシャトルバスが運行されています
Staffs are very helpful and polite. Air conditioning in room should be improved.
Staffs are very helpful and polite. Air conditioning in room should be improved.
새벽에 도착했는데도 직원분들이 친절하게 맞이해주시고 좋았어요 조식도 괜찮았고 수영장도 2개가 있어 몰기도 편하고 혼잡하지도 않고 좋았어요 주변에 올드타운도 있어 굿 그리고 호텔전용프라이빗비치도 있어 완전 좋았답니다 추천드려요
깨끗한데 너무 룸이 덥습니다. 에어콘 시설도 약하고, 카드키도 1개 만 줘서 미리 에어컨을 돌려놓을수 도 없어요
깨끗한데 너무 룸이 덥습니다. 에어콘 시설도 약하고, 카드키도 1개 만 줘서 미리 에어컨을 돌려놓을수 도 없어요
Room condition, staffs, amenities, facilities were so good!!
Chủ khách sạn dể thương, phòng đẹp, gần phố cổ. Lần sau tới hội an sẽ tiếp tục ở tại đây.
Khách sạn ngay trong phố cổ, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu đến hội an.
Chất lượng phòng tuyệt vời phòng rộng rãi, có nhiều cửa sáng sủa thoáng mát, chủ dễ thương sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khách du lịch.
Vợ chồng anh chị chủ rất nhiệt tình và dễ thương, phòng ở rất ok và sạch sẽ, đầy đủ
Tuyệt vời và rẻ nhất! đề nghị cho mọi người!
Chổ sạch sẻ, không gian rộng , thoải mái yên tĩnh

Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, rộng tãi. Có view lãng mạng

Homestay rất đẹp và sạch. Đầy đủ tiện nghi. Giường êm đến mức nằm xuống là ngủ hồi nào không hay. Mình để quên áo thun trong tủ, ac chủ nhiệt tình giúp mình gữi xe bus zô đà nẵng, còn điện thoại liên tục để xác nhạn áo đã tới tay chưa. Rất đáng yêu và siêu nhiệt tình

Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ, sáng sủa, hai anh chị chủ khách sạn vô cùng nhiệt tình. Với giá tiền như lúc mình đặt là 300, mình không ngờ chất lượng phòng của smart garden còn có thể ngang khách sạn cao cấp. Chưa kể vị trí rất gần phố cổ, chỉ cách tầm 1km.
Không gian yên tĩnh, khá đẹp và sạch sẽ, cách phố cổ 500m

Đầu tiên là anh chị rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện , thứ 2 là phòng ốc rất sạch sẽ , tiện nghi và rộng , thứ 3 là yên tĩnh và giá phù hợp chúng tôi đã có kỳ nghĩ rất thoải mái ở đây !

Phòng ốc ở đây rất rộng rãi và sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thì rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình, vì đây là lần đầu mình đến hội an nên còn bỡ ngỡ nhiều thứ, nên anh chủ nhà đưa tụi mình bản đồ được ghi chú đầy đủ, đặc biệt là có list các quán ăn ngon nên thử ở hội an. Nếu có dịp đi lần nữa, mình sẽ quay lại đây.
Không gian đẹp, cách bài trí các vật dụng tinh tế. Đúng như cái tên gọi là khu vườn thông minh. Chủ homestay rất thân thiện tạo sự gần gũi và tạo cảm giác như được ở nhà.
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ gọn gàng đặc biệt là giường rất êm. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp

Đây là một khách sạn rất đẹp. Chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Bạn có thể nói chuyện với anh ta. Nhưng tôi nghĩ rằng chi phí cho xe đạp phải được miễn phí.
Vị trí tốt, nhân viên rất đẹp và thân thiện. Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều vì dịch vụ ấm áp của bạn.

Anh chủ homestay rất nhiệt tình. Phòng ốc rộng rãi, sạch sẽ , có ban công hướng ra ngoài rất đẹp, giá các dịch vụ cũng hợp lý. Chỉ mỗi cái không có sân rộng rãi để đậu ô tô, còn lại thì rất ok. Homestay thiết kế đẹp

Đây là một khách sạn rất mới và đẹp, gần phố cổ hội an. Các phòng đều rất sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Đặc biệt là chủ sở hữu, họ đã rất tốt đẹp. Giá rất rẻ. Chúng tôi sẽ quay trở lại. Cảm ơn nhiều!

Chị chủ siêu siêu dễ thương, nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Mình đặt phòng nhỏ nhưng chị chủ động đổi cho mình phòng to và không bù thêm tiền. Chị còn đưa bản đồ cho mình để biết chỗ ăn ngon và các đường đi. Phòng ở rất sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Chắc chắn sẽ quay trở lại vào lần sau.
Nơi này ít chiến lược hơn, nhưng nếu bạn cần sự yên tĩnh ở đây. Dịch vụ nhanh chóng, phòng sạch sẽ và rộng rãi.
Khách sạn rất ấm cúng. Các nhân viên tốt đẹp và rất thân thiện. Tôi muốn giới thiệu điều này.

Phòng sạch sẽ, trang trí rất ưng mắt. Homestay ngay gần phố cổ, rất tiện cho việc đi dạo cũng như ăn uống. Chú chủ homestay rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, vẽ sẵn bản đồ cho khách du lịch nữa cơ. Homestay mình highly recommend cho những bạn lưu trú tại hội an nhé!
Nhân viên rất thân thiện khách sạn sạch sẽ

Cô chú cực kì thân thiện. Phòng rất sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi, lại cách phố cổ tầm 1km nên có thể đi bộ vào buổi tối, thuê xe đạp vòng quanh phố cổ vào ban ngày là hợp lý nhất. Không có gì phàn nàn cả. Mình rất thích nơi này. Nếu có dịp đến hội an, mình nhất định sẽ ghé smart garden 1 lần nữa

Anh chị chủ rất dễ thương. Cách phố cổ tầm 500m, có xe đạp để đi lại. Phòng và toilet rất sạch, thiết kế lại thông minh. Mình rất hài lòng khi ở đây. Sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu bạn bè thêm nữa. Hooney moon tuyệt vời.
Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Chủ nhà vui vẻ, nhiệt tình.

Phong sach dep, anh chi chu nhiet tinh. Phong gan pho co rat thuan tien.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, rộng rãi va yên tĩnh
Đặt cho tất cả gia đình tôi, đó là một homestay thực sự tốt. Nó thực sự đẹp và gần trung tâm của thành phố. Các chủ sở hữu đã thực sự hữu ích và tốt đẹp.

Chủ nhà thường không có mặt khi khach cần. Dịch vụ không chu đáo. Mượn xe đạp đi 30ph cũng tính tiền, nhưng việc tính tiền xe đạp không được chủ nhà thông báo trước. 7pm mới check in nhưng trước đó chủ nhà chưa chuẩn bị phòng sẵn sàng.

Vị trí gần phố cổ, chị chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Phòng rộng rãi sạch sẽ, mình đã book 4 năm trước, lần này quay lại vẫn không có điểm gì chê. Tuy là homestay nhưng không khác gì khách sạn 2 sao-2,5 sao
Tốt phòng có nhiều muỗi vì gần vườn cây, homestay nên đuổi sạch muỗi trước khi cho khách nhận phòng

Phòng tương đối sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, bày trí đơn giản. Nhà vệ sinh đầy đủ, chỉ có điều các bạn nên chuẩn bị sẵn mấy gói sữa tắm dầu gội (mặc dù trong phòng có nhưng không biết sao lượng dầu bên trong gói rất ít, không đủ để tắm gội đâu). Có cho thuê xe máy (đổ xăng cũng chỉ cách có 200-300m) từ điểm này đi ra phố cổ hội an cũng tương đối gần, không quá 2km. Nếu có đặt xe ô tô đi từ đây về sân bay đà nẵng thì bạn có thể liên hệ cô chủ nhé. Cô hỗ trợ đặt và giá cả cũng hợp lý.

Lúc vào ở đi ra đi vào báo gì phụ thu. Sáng dậy báo phụ thu. Mình không bảo là không trả. Chỉ hỏi sao lúc vào không báo trước. Bên đó bảo là tại chị không ở nhà. Con chị không biết. Không biết sao ngồi làm lễ tân check-in cho khách vậy. Rồi bảo đây là lỗi bên chị. Nhưng vẫn đòi tiền phụ thu. Mình im lặng chờ e trai mình lên lấy hành lý thì bên đó nói giọng rất khó nghe. Sau đó con trai chạy ra bảo là tưởng mình là lái xe nên không báo trong khi mình là người đưa cccd để check-in. Rồi to tiếng nói ở thì phải trả tiền đó là quy định. Mình bảo mình là khách chứ phải kinh doanh nghành này đâu mà biết quy định, mình cũng không bảo không trả tiền phụ thu. Chỉ nhắc bên home là đáng ra phải báo trước để khách biết. Xong đứa con trai nổi khùng bảo chú đặt chú phải biết rồi to tiếng đòi nhảy ra đánh mình rồi tranh cãi qua lại . Nói chung là tệ ))) trong khi không ai bảo là không trả tiền phụ thu. Xe đạp cho thuê thì đi hỏng giữa đường
Điều hoà quá yếu bật cả đêm và sáng dậy không mát nổi với giá 350k ra đà nẵng thuê còn oke hơn
Chị chủ thân thiện, phòng sạch sẽ
Chị chủ ở đây dễ thương lắm, phòng rộng sạch, gần phố cổ hội an

Phòng cực thích, mọi thứ hiện đại và sạch sẽ, giường khá to niệm cũng rất êm. Ngoài ra trong phòng còn có tivi, tủ lạnh được bỏ sẵn nhiều loại nước uống và đồ ăn (đương nhiên hiên khi bạn dùng có tính phí nhé) có cả bình đun nước nóng, nếu bạn mang theo đò bị nhăn cũng có thể mượn bạn ủi từ cô chủ. Là homestay nhưng mình đánh giá chất lượng phòng ở đây tương đương resort 3 sao nhé. Mỗi phòng đều có ban công phía trước được đặt sẵn bàn và ghế. Homstay có cả phục vụ đồ ăn sáng theo yêu cầu cho khách, đồ ăn khá ngon, giá cả cũng khá ok, chủ nhà cũng rất thân thiện và dễ thương. Vị trid homestay cũng khá gần phố cổ, bạn có thể thuê xe đạp tai đây và đi dạo tham quan nhé.
Rất tuyệt, mọi thứ hoàn hảo, gần phố cổ, giá hợp lý

Phòng đẹp, mát mẻ, sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Mình rất hài lòng. Đi bộ ra phố cổ không xa lắm. Anh chị chủ rất vui vẻ, dễ thương. Có dịp ra hội an mình sẽ ở đây!!

Phòng thoáng mát, sáng, có cửa vào lớn, ban công chung và riêng được thiết kế thông minh, cảm giác có nhiều không gian thoáng. Anh chị chủ nhà rất thân thiện, niềm nở và nhiệt tình. Có bếp nếu bạn muốn nấu (chúng mình mua ghẹ ở biển mang về mượn nồi với bếp của anh chị để hấp ). Vị trí thuận tiện, đi bộ thẳng về phía trần hưng đạo là tới phố cổ.

Chỗ ở tốt, chú jaidee chỗ ở chỉ cách 5-6 phút đi vào ngõ. Không đáng sợ, an toàn có xe bán tải 250k từ hội an đến đà nẵng gần thành phố cổ. Chợ đêm chỉ cách 10 phút đi bộ. Không nên thuê xe đạp vì có rất nhiều xe để lái. Đáng sợ để đi bộ an toàn hơn. Nếu đi vào buổi sáng, xe đạp là 25k. Nhưng đi bộ, nó không xa.

Homestay rất tuyệt vời từ chị chủ nhà dễ thương đến phòng ốc. Tuy đã đi vào hoạt động 3 năm (mình có nch với chị chủ nhà) nhưng thật sự không thể tin được là phòng ốc đồ đạc còn rất mới và đầy đủ, mỗi phòng đều có ghế ngòii ngoài cửa cực thích. Phòng mình thì có ban công riêng và bàn ghế ngồi ngoài ngắm cây cối nhà cửa chill lắm . Ngày nào phòng cũng được dọn dẹp, mở cửa ra cho thoáng dù không có khách tới ở nên rất sạch sẽ. Homestay cũng gần phố cổ nhưng mình chọn thuê xe đạp của nhà chị luôn chỉ 25k/ngày. Chắc chắn mình sẽ book lại

Phòng sạch sẽ, mới mẻ, yên tĩnh, tuy nhiên không an toàn. Tụi mình ra khỏi phòng từ 7.30pm đến 11.10pm về lại thì thấy đồ đạc trong phòng bị xáo trộn, lục lọi (vali balo), 1 cửa phụ bị khép hờ (dù trước khi đi mình đã cài chốt). Sau đó phát hiện mất 1 cục sạc iphone, 1 tai nghe nhạc. May là giấy tờ quan trọng và tiền bạc tụi mình đều mang đi theo hết.
Khách sạ cách phố cổ khá gần nên có thể đi bộ được. Phòng sạch sẽ, chị chủ nhà nhiệt tình, vui tính

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa

Ngoài ra resort có nước ép cực ngon. Đồ ăn sáng cũng đa dạng. Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại trong thời gian sớm nhất có thể 3

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa
userCmt: Gia đình tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại đây. Khách sạn có bãi biển riêng, có rừng thông phía sau nên không khí rất mát mẻ, thoáng đãng, cảm giác yên bình, thư thái. Bữa sáng không phải là buffet mà là các món ăn do khách sạn tự nấu rất ngon, các con tôi đều yêu thích. Điểm trừ là phòng hơi tối tuy nhiên không ảnh hưởng lắm.

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa
userCmt: The description in my booking stating that it is a king bed size and the receptionist also said the same thing when we first checked in. But actual it has been combined from 2 separeated mattress and it made me uncomfortable. I did not ask for the room changing cause it was only one night. But hopefully the hotel will improvise for better future experience of the client. The location of the hotel is a bit far from the ancient town, if you drive by motorbike it will take about less than 15 mins. The staff is nice and the room is clean in overall.

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa
userCmt: Mình đặt phòng 2 giường đơn nhưng khi nhận phòng lại là extra bed nằm rất khó chịu. Nhân viên lễ tân hẹn sẽ check lại booking và phản hồi nhưng trong 2 ngày mình lưu trú đều không thấy trả lời. Khoá phòng cũ, hay bị kẹt khoá. Vòi tắm khó sử dụng nếu có trẻ em thì rất dễ bị bỏng.

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa
userCmt: Phòng sạch sẽ, đẹp, rộng rãi. Đồ ăn sáng ngon. Hồ bơi nhỏ nhưng an toàn cho trẻ con. Sát biển nên rất tiện để tận hưởng không gian thoáng mát. 1 lưu ý nhỏ cho khách là các chai dầu gội sữa tắm bằng gốm, nắp đậy hoặc không chặt hoặc trơn, nếu không chú ý trẻ con sẽ làm bể. Bé nhà mình tưởng chai nhựa nên lúc cầm sơ ý tuột tay làm bể, đền hết 400k. Mọi người lưu ý tránh nguy hiểm và mất tiền không đáng có nhen. Có thể do trời mưa lớn nên ban công không kịp thoát nước. Nước bì bõm nên mình không tận hưởng được cái sự chill buổi sáng ở ban công.

hotelName: Sol An Bang Beach Resort & Spa
userCmt: Hôm mình đến gặp ngày mưa, phòng bị bốc mùi cống, khách sạn đã chuyển đến phòng khác hạng cao hơn. Tuy nhiên đêm ngủ vẫn bị tiếng ồn từ phòng trên. Biển an bàng đã được cải tạo đóng cọc chống xâm lấn nên bãi biển không dài và đẹp như xưa. Lúc check out kiểm phòng bảo nhà mình có dùng bia trong tủ lạnh và mất một đôi dép. Không đáng bao nhiêu nhưng vì nhà mình không có dùng, nên không đồng ý thanh toán. Nhưng vì điều này khiến mình luôn check khi vào khách sạn khác là quầy bar của họ có thiếu gì không khi giao phòng. Tóm lại thì mình cảm nhận như kiểu homestay bình thường thôi không có gì xuất sắc

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: The staff are all so welcoming and friendly. They make a point of asking if everything is to your satisfaction and anything they can do to make better, is also a genuine concern for them to make sure your stay is perfect.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: 아기자기한 인테리어가 좋았어요 직원들도 친절하고요 총매니져도 넘 잘해주셨어요

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: 직원들이아주 친절해요 총지배인도 세심하게 살펴주셨어요

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Genuinely lovely staff who made staying here a pleasure.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: 가족들이 왔는데 넘 좋았읍니다 강추 합니다

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Our one week stay at this hotel was great due to the amazing staff. They really went out of their way for us to feel like home, arranged a car and train tickets for us to go to hué, and even provided us with a small gift upon check-out. Thank you so much for making our stay so wonderful!

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Will return

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: I had a lovely stay at this hotel. The room was spotless and cozy, making it a perfect little retreat. I really appreciated the warm and friendly service that made everything feel effortless. If you re looking for a charming and hassle-free place to relax, i d definitely recommend it.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: The breakfast was decent and changed everyday. The ac was very loud and vent so strong even on the lowest setting you had to sleep without it. The bathroom shower was dirty and moldy and looked like the grout had never been cleaned. The room was small and tight.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Service was impeccable and very attentive. Good breakfast buffet. Room was spacious and comfortable. Walking distance to food and nearby riverside walk. They offer free bicycle usage. I would definitely stay here sgain

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Hoi an babylon luxury hotel spa (newly built) and hoi an babylon riverside spa (quite old) are sited side by side. We have booked 2 rooms and 2 nights for former hotel. The two hotels share one reception counter. We checked in at night and we were provided a room from the older hotel. We found out the mistake next morning and asked for relocation to the newer hotel that we booked and paid for. Hotel reception agreed to relocate us to babyon luxury (new one) on 2nd day, but the experience from first night was very bad. Equipments from the old hotel are pretty shabby, very strong wind from air conditioner was blowing right towards the bed. Even hotel staff couldn t adjust the wind power or direction. This made us very difficult to fall asleep on the 1st night. The experience on 2nd night is much better at the newer hotel.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Incredible service, the hotel is in excellent condition, and the staff is very friendly. The vietnamese massage is one of the best. Very good food and centrally located.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Clean, very well located (outside of the crowd), 15 minutes walk to old town, great service!

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel due to the well-trained staff and the property s immaculate cleanliness. The breakfast options were fantastic, offering a variety of delicious choices. The rooms were spacious, comfortable, and well-appointed, making it a truly relaxing experience. The overall ambiance of the hotel was warm and welcoming. We couldn t have asked for a better experience and would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: 트리풀 룸 숙박했는데 창문이 작아 아쉽고 객실이 작아요 ㅜㅜ

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: A very clean and good hotel with tasty breakfast.

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: Excellent hospitality and such friendly service!

hotelName: Soluna D'Annam - The Art of Hoi An Relaxation
userCmt: 가격 대비 시설이 안좋음

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 올드타운과 거리가 조금 떨어져 있었지만 조용해서 좋았음. 올드타운은 걸어서 10분 거리고 주변에 큰 호텔과 마사지 샵이 많이 있음. 조식은 맛있었고 직원들이 아주 친절했음

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The staff was so kind and welcoming. My boyfriend got sick during our stay and they responded to our requests very quickly. Building and amenities are more outdated than they appear in the pictures so overall comfort was okay.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This beautiful boutique hotel was in a good location and the staff were very welcoming and friendly.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: とても快適で雰囲気のあるホテルでした 次もぜひ泊まりたいと思います ドライヤーが壁付きというのが唯一の残念点です

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 로비 및 통로 룸에 여러 미술 작품이 전시되어 있으며 조명과 조경이 훌륭해서 고급스러움이 돋보였습니다. 수영장도 너무 예뻐요. 조식은 종류가 많지만 무난합니다. 가장 큰 문제는 세면대가 높이 설치되어 있어 아시아계 평균 여성 신장으로는 불편하며 어린이는 혼자 이용할 수 없을 정도에요. 발받침대라도 있어야 할것 같아요. 세면대 위 조명도 약간 위로 올렸으면 좋겠어요. 강가 지역이라 습하고 방음이 잘 안되는 점은 아쉽네요. 그랩이 호텔 바로 앞까지는 가지 않아 이 점은 불편합니다 .호텔직원이 캐리어를 운반해주기는 합니다. 직원분들이 너무 친절하게 대해 주셔서 즐겁게 머물다 갑니다.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 旧市街地からすぐで街歩きをしたかった私には立地が最高でした ホテル スパのスタッフはとても親切で最後までサポートしてくださいました 朝食もルーフトップバーも良かったです オススメしますし また泊まりたいです ありがとうございました

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Walkable to the ancient town and very clean hotel. Service was good and all around a positive experience. Hotel is located in an alleyway which is slightly dirty, but still safe.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Beautiful property within walking distance (easy 10-15 minute leisurely stroll) to hoi an old town. Hotel offers a shuttle but the shuttle can t get in the old town (for obvious reasons) so you still need to walk a little to get to town. Staff were very attentive and polite. Hotel has lots of beautiful colours and is furnished impressively. Breakfast was good too! the hotel has a common area used for ironing where you can find 2 weak irons and 2 ironing boards but maybe they can start allowing irons in the rooms in the future. Nonetheless i had an amazing stay at the hotel.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Väldigt trivsamt, rent och med en snygg design. Stora rum och stor, bra dusch. Frukosten var bra men hade önskat fler variationer av bröd och pålägg men annars fanns allt som önskades. Mycket trevlig personal som var mycket hjälpsam. Hotellet låg ca 5 min från gamla stan. Tvärs över hotellet köpte vi en dagsutflykt och beställde taxi till flygplatsen, allt gick väldigt smidigt. Här sydde de även upp tre väskor enl bild vi hade med oss, vi blev jättenöjda och billigare än i stan. Vi rekommenderar verkligen detta fina hotell till andra gäster!

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Situated 7-8 minutes walk from the centre of hoi an is perfect . The hotel is cosy and the rooms are large and well equiped. Like other boutique hotels comfort and design are at the fore front. I would stay here again.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We had a wonderful stay at son hoi an boutique hotel. There was a minor issue with our booking at check (occurring from an issue at expedia s end). Staff were able to resolve this for us and ensured it did not negatively impact our stay. The hotel itself is beautiful, and we loved the attention to style and detail. The staff were friendly and helpful and the free shuttle bus to the beach was a great bonus. Would highly recommend and would stay again!

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Near hotel was a lot of rats, in the room was imposible sleep you can hear your neigbours speaking, watching tv, the breakfast was very bad you only have one kind of coffe and if you want otjer you must pay for it, the sweets things was very bad

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: We enjoyed to stay with staff hospitality.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff was wonderful and the room was very nice! i loved the decor throughout the hotel.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The employees were so nice and helpful! they offer a shuttle to go to old quarter which is nice.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Vi var utroligt glade for stemningen og atmosfæren på dette lille hotel, som virkelig fangede essensen af hoi an. Her er ro, charme og en helt særlig varme, som gør, at man føler sig hjemme med det samme. Det hyggelige, intime hotel skabte en cozy stemning fra første øjeblik, og det hele blev løftet af personalet som var exceptionelt venlige og hjælpsomme. Lige fra receptionen og dørmanden til poolpasseren og personalet i køkkenet mødte vi smil, overskud og ægte imødekommenhed. En særlig stor ros skal lyde til morgenmadsbuffeten. Vi havde ikke forventet noget særligt fra et så lille sted, men vi blev virkelig positivt overraskede både udvalg og kvalitet var i top. Vi vil helt klart anbefale dette hotel til alle, der ønsker at opleve hoi an med nærvær, charme og afslappet luksus.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice boutique hotel. Very pretty. Give it a 4/5. Walkable area to ancient town. Hoi an us very charming. Must visit

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice hotel. Clean and friendly service. Good location

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: とにかくインテリアが可愛い 新しいのかお風呂もバスタブも綺麗かった ホイアンまで自転車で10分もないので自転車を借りれるのは良かったが 子供用140cm用などがあればなお良かった スパも気持ち良かった プールもなかなか 朝ごはんは普通だった

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: オシャレなホテルでした 廊下がエアコンないのと トリートメントが設置されてない以外は快適でした ありがとうございました

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Le service, le petit déjeuner la chambre, la piscine, tout est parfait, je recommande vivement.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: プールが良かった

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This property was amazing. The room size were big and very clean. Breakfast buffet spread was awesome. So close to ancient town. Would ve a great base for day trips to da nang and neighboring sites. Staff service was amazing. I will go back to this property for sure. I highly recommend this property.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: とにかくオシャレで可愛いホテルでした 賑やかなエリアから少し離れているので夜も静かで過ごしやすかったです 自転車を貸してくれるので買い物や食事に行くのも便利でした 空港への送迎はタクシーを手配してくれるので安心でした 朝食の種類も多く大変満足でした スタッフのみなさんはフレンドリーでとても親切でした ホイアンに行く事があればまた泊まりたいホテルです

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 早餐是當地的食物 好吃 咖啡也好喝 房間非常的乾淨 床也舒服 可以在陽台上泡澡非常棒 有位會說中文的櫃檯小姐非常友善 當然我們許多忙 飯店有提供洗衣服的服務1公斤5萬 spa 也舒服 推薦喔

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: From the moment we entered we felt very much at home, welcomed by the genuinely attentive staff. We were upgraded to a room with an amazing view which was spotless and very comfortable. The breakfast was amazing and the kind receptionist went by every guest to make sure they were well taken care of. Short walk to the old town, but also a shuttle available if needed. Would wholeheartedly recommend to stay here.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Boutique hôtel avec beaucoup de charme. Chambre confortable. Décoration soignée. Chambre cosy. Le staff est très professionnel. A 15mn à pied du vieux quartier.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Staff is so kind and warm-hearted. I was very comfortable, because the surroundings are quiet. My child could sleep soundly. L d like to use this hotel again, if i will come back to hoi an some day.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great staff and service, can walk into town, shuttle bus available

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Loved this hotel. Everyone was super friendly and helpful.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Fantastic hotel. Super cute rooms and close to everything you need to hoi an! friendly staff that were able to help us book train tickets and transit around the city. Loved this spot.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: とっても可愛いホテルで最高でした スタッフのミーさんにとても親切にしていただきありがとうございました

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Everything you could want in a hotel. The breakfast was fantastic. The rooms were clean and felt like you were walking into a wes anderson film. The staff was phenomenal. If you are able, stay here! easiest decision you will ever make.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: メールでの問い合わせ等 とても早い対応して頂き ホテル自体もとても清潔でインテリアも想像通りでした 立地もすごく良くてマイナス点が見当たりませんでした

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Enjoyed our stay at the son. Staff was excellent and the breakfast and the egg coffee were superb. My favorite was the outside tub on the balcony and the unique artwork. Great boutique hotel. We plan to come back

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: The hotel is 15 min walk from hoi an ancient town center which was the main reason we choose to stay here. There is a humidity and mold issue at the hotel. Our room was smelling mold but we didnt bother informing the reception since we were staying only 1 night. It is not as seen as is photos a bit more tackier but in the end its a small cute locally managed place. Having free bikes was useful. Breakfast was average. Staff was kind and helpful.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This is our 2nd time at the son. Guests and staff very friendly and helpful. Love the tub on the balcony. Ended up having the same room we loved the first stay again.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: This is a very pretty hotel. The decor and the all of the art was very nice. Our bed was a little hard for me and the shower took ages to heat up. The pool area is nice and shady but some of the tiles were coming loose on the floor of it. The breakfast was average. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Great little massage place next to it called miaa beauty that i would go back to again.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: お部屋が素敵でテンションが上がりました スタッフの方も親切 ホテルにプールもついていて楽しかった 自転車を借りられるので 少し離れたお店やご飯屋さんにもすぐに行けたので 移動のストレスが少なかった

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 冷房が効かず一回は直してもらいに来ましたが また効かなくなったので フロントの方が部屋を変えてくれました 朝ごはんのパンにありが大量に居たのに スタッフの方は気づかず放置していました

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Un lugar hermoso para descansar

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Nice comfortable place

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Super friendly staff who couldn t have been more helpful, location second to none, away from the hustle and bustle but only a leisurely 5 minutes from the old town, wonderful.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Pros beautiful hotel. Nice rooms and friendly staff. Cons at the pool there was a lot of noise as there were many children. Breakfast buffet was not so inviting and there was a lack of space in the dining room. Air conditioning in the room often failed and it took several minutes to restart which was annoying in the middle of the night

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: 大通りから1本入ったところにあるので静かです その分夜間は人通りが少なく ホテルに着くまでは少し不安になります ホテル内はどこを切り取ってもデザイン性があって写真映えします 部屋は綺麗で広く シャワー室も独立していてとても使いやすかったです 朝ごはんのビュッフェは種類が多いわけではないですが 現地のメニューが多く味も美味しかったです スタッフさんの対応も丁寧で居心地のいいホテルでした

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: A true oasis, refreshing artsy scene brings joy to me everyday! staffs are friendly and helpful! thank you )

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: インテリアがとても好きでした

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Great stay, well worth it

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very pleasant 4 days stay at son boutique. Super friendly staff, always there to help. Nice and quiet location, only a short walk from old town.

hotelName: Son Hoi An Boutique Hotel & Spa
userCmt: Very nice and quiet place. Conveniently located.

Street flooded during our stay, nothing from the front desk to remedy the situation. Also . The flooding was only 5-10inches deeper where the hotel was most of the road was wet but not as flooded. So many tourist had booked this boutique hotel and we were all trapped having to order a cab whenever we wanted to leave. My original booking was incorrect (2 twins instead of a king?) you can hear everything, the water didn t stay warm longer than 5 mins. Just really really unfortunate and i hope they fix this issue. Oh yea no elevator and no one helps you bring your luggage up. I would have gladly paid for that.

An amazing hotel we stayed in the apartment style room for 4 nights overlooking the river. Massive room with great wifi rooms were very clean and cleaned daily. Staff were extremely helpful! location was great close to old city but far enough away to be quiet

On our first night here i was sick and the staff were fantastic. They went out and brought dinner back for us. That is service above and beyond. The hotel is located in a residential area which was great. It was quiet and away from the main hustle of town but still only a short easy walk to restaurants and markets as well as the old town.
Excellent séjour, tout était parfaitement

Our stay at hoi an silk river villa has been excellent. From the very beginning every single bit was close to perfection. The check-in was easy and the whole staff made us feel as we were home. They recommended restaurants, close-by beaches, beautiful bars and relaxing places to rest during hot afternoons. Every morning we were greeted by warm smiles and great hospitality. For breakfast you have a great choice of meals which you can order from a menu. There is unlimited coffee (as one of the reviews before had queried) and fresh fruits and juice is served complimentary as well. The management is well organized, very friendly and warm-hearted. She spoke english very well and was able to answer every question about hoi an, its history and its surroundings. Our room (double queen, balcony, city view) was very modern, perfectly clean and even had a rain shower. The hotel offers bikes and motorbikes (scooters) upon request and the staff can also recommend great tours to explore hoi an and its beautiful surroundings. The ancient town is easily reachable within 10 minutes by foot. Overall, our stay at hoi an silk river villa has been outstanding and we highly recommend this hotel to everyone!

Stay was great. A little disappointed with the ground floor booking and basically no view of the river. Facilities and staff were great though when we arrived around 4.00 am, the staff was sleeping and we had to walk around with our bags for an hour before he responded to our calls.

強くお勧めできる とは思いません 空港送迎が時間通りにいきませんでした 予約していたにも関わらず 空港にドライバーが到着しておらず20分以上空港で待ちました 帰りの空港送りも フロントにタクシーが到着せずこれまた20分以上の遅刻 チェックインに遅れるのではないかとハラハラしました 連泊者に対するタオル交換はありません 歴史地区まで徒歩圏内で悪くないのですが ホテルの場所そのものは水はけのわるい路面に面したローカルの生活圏内にあり ちょっと独特の雰囲気です 目の前にローカルカフェがあり早朝から深夜まで男性がたまってにぎやかにおしゃべりなどをしています スタッフはとても親切でホスピタリティーは高いと思います

We had a great 4 nights in hoi an. The staff at the hotel made it feel like home. So helpful. We arranged a motorbike and bicycles through them. All well organised. Helped us with ideas for days out. Room was beautiful with a huge double balcony. Breakfast every morning and a 5 minute walk to the old quarter, but super quiet. Can t ask for much more! they even disposed of my old suitcase for me. Really nice new hotel.
Un petit hôtel très agréable avec une patronne très dévouée pour le confort du client. Vraiment à recommandé

We stayed 5 nights in one of the appartment rooms. The rooms are spacious, clean and modern being a new hotel everything is super fresh. The videos on facebook are an accurate representation of the room. Being a family we appreciated the space of the appartment. Silk river is in a great position right on the river and the gardens around the hotel are lush. The hotel is nice retreat from the noise of hoi an. The pool is great for cooling down after a day out. The hotel owners/staff all went out of their way to be helpful and were really friendly warm people. We would definitely stay here again

The staff is super friendly and helpful they speak fluently in english as well. They even contacted us 24 hours prior to our arrival, making sure we didn t have any questions and scheduling a pickup for us from the airport. You have a home-cooked local breakfast when you stay here. Nice river view quiet and peaceful when you re a little bit away from old town hoi an. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality we re totally happy and impressed. I will definitely recommend it to people, and it s definitely on my list if we re visiting vietnam again!

Terrible experience!!! the road was flooded by the rain and taxi couldn t enter to the hotel area. I had to make several phone calls to find the direction and had to walk 10 minutes wet by dirty water all the way upto my thigh. Hotel did not informed the situation at all until i arrived. I was so mad and disappointed. I left the hotel without staying and needed to pay extra cost to get a room again in danang. Very bad operation.

Giá cả hợp lý, rẻ so với chất lượng phục vụ và so với mặt bằng chung ở hội an. Cách phố cổ 5-10p đi xe máy, yên tĩnh, thích hợp để nghỉ ngơi, healing cuối tuần. Phục vụ giặt ủi, nước giá cả hợp lý. Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát và có hoàng hôn đẹp, bữa sáng miễn phí. Khu vệ sinh rộng rãi, sạch sẽ. Chủ homestay nhiệt tình. 10/10 và sẽ quay trở lại.
Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Nếu ghé hà chắc sẽ ở đây tiếp
Phòng đẹp, tiện nghi, sạch sẽ, vị trí thuận tiện đặc biệt chủ nhà rất thân thiện, mến khách, tử tế

Tôi đã đặt phòng deluxe và nó rất tuyệt! bản thân căn phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi, thậm chí còn có cả tv đang hoạt động. Chủ nhà rất tốt bụng. Cô ấy cho chúng tôi nhận phòng sớm mà không tính phí và cho chúng tôi mượn ô khi trời mưa. Rất đáng để giới thiệu!
Quá tuyệt vời cho 1 đêm nghỉ ngơi tại đây, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, không gian thoáng mát, anh chị chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình

Homestay đúng nghĩa, anh/chị chủ nhiệt tình, hiếu khách, đem lại cảm giác thân thiện vô cùng. Món ăn ngon, phục vụ đầy hài lòng, có xe đạp trải nghiệm rất thú vị. Lần sau quay lại hội an sẽ tiếp tục lựa chọn nơi đây để cư trú.
Anh chị chủ nhà rất thân thiện. Phòng ở rất sạch sẽ, điều hoà bật mát lạnh, rất yên tĩnh. Bữa sáng ăn rất ngon, còn được mượn xe đạp free sau về hội an sẽ lại ở lại nhà anh chị

Đây là homestay thật sự chứ không phải kiểu kinh doanh xây chia phòng nho nhỏ rồi cho thuê tự nhận là homestay đâu nha. Căn villa rất đẹp có phòng cũng rất tuyệt vời. Nội thất phòng có thể gọi là đẳng cấp khách sạn 4 sao luôn đó mn ơi. Chị chủ thân thiện nấu ăn sáng rất ngon. Từ home đến phố cổ hội an hơn 2km có thể hỏi thuê xe gắn máy.
Chị chủ nhiệt tình phòng xinh giống ảnh
Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng, gần phố cổ, anh chị chủ rất nhiệt tình
Phòng sạch sẽ, siêu rộng, view sông rất đẹp, yên tĩnh gần phố cổ. Gia đình chủ nhiệt tình vui vẻ 5

Ngẫu nhiên đặt vì homestay vừa tiện ra phố cổ vừa gần biển mà giá cả rất phải chăng, không ngờ phòng ốc lại đẹp như vậy, mình rất thích cách decor nhà của anh chị. Anh chị chủ nhà cũng dễ thương nữa. Mong là mọi người có cơ hội thử mỳ quảng và cao lầu của chị chủ vì nó ngonnn

Rất tuyệt vời phòng đẹp sạch sẽ anh chị chủ nhà rất đáng yêu, đồ ăn rất ngon vì trước chị chủ nhà làm nhà hàng. Một nơi đáng để dừng chân khi tới hội an, nếu có cơ hội quay lại hội an sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ anh chị

Nội thất phòng khá tuyệt, phòng tắm rất sạch sẽ , nhưng vẫn có điều luyến tiếc là phòng không có gương trang điểm ngoài phòng ngủ nên khá bất tiện cho các bạn nữ makeup. Anh chị chủ rất rất nhiệt tình. Sẽ note lại cho chuyến đi lần tiếp theo .
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Vợ chồng chị chủ nhiệt tình dễ thương...
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, anh chị chủ nhà thân thiện.

Đặt random trên app thôi nhưng mình rất bất ngờ luôn, anh chị chủ rất là thân thiện, 10 điểm chu đáo, 10 điểm nhiệt tình, 10 điểm sạch sẽ luôn á. Nếu có cơ hội vào hội an lần nữa nhất định sẽ quay lại song river. Có duy nhất 1 điểm không ưng đó là bữa sáng chị nấu hơi mặn ))) nên uống tốn hơi nhiều nước. Còn phòng, không gian đều rất đẹp và sắp xếp hợp lý, cả bạn mình và mình đều nhất trí cho 10 điểm
Anh chị chủ rất dễ thương, thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Highly recommend!

Homestay đẹp như 1 căn villa, phòng ngủ view vườn, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Có 1 máy lạnh, 1 quạt trần và 1 quạt treo bao mát. Trong nhà vệ sunh cũng có quạt nữa. Tv có kết nối internet. Mình rất thích cách trang trí phòng của anh chị chủ. Anh chị rất nhiệt tình và giúp đỡ mình, giới thiệu những địa điểm check in đẹp ở hội an. Mì quảng và nước mơ chị ngâm rất ngon. Nếu có dịp nhất định mình vẫn sẽ chọn ở lại đây nhiều ngày hơn. Phòng ngủ cách âm rất tốt ngủ rất ngon recommend cho ai thích yên bình vì homestay nằm ở cuối đường cây giá hạ.
10 out of 10 without but . Đồ ăn anh chủ nấu còn ngon hơn ngoài quán nữa. View 3 cửa sổ to rất thoáng và mát

We were provided with fruit on arrival which was lovely. Our rooms and bathrooms we re extremely clean. The triple room with balcony was so spacious although it was too hot to be on the balcony. Room had aircon, fridge, tv and hairdryer. Kettle if requested. Iron and iron board for use downstairs. Guests are requested to take their shoes off at the main entrance. Slippers are provided to walk to and from your room. Friendly helpful staff who advised me the hotel is only one year old. Breakfast is available at a cost. Daily housekeeping. Hotel is near night market. We rented bicycles from the hotel for 30k each a day. However they were not so new. You can ride all the way to an bang beach. Other parts of hoi an is walkable and i believe grab is available. Hotel offers tours. Hotel arranged for 7 seater car to danang airport for 350k. Hotel laundry service is 30k per kg. We used and recommend mr b tattoo across the alley if you re looking for one. Boat ride on the river is 200k for 4 people. About 20 minutes which takes you up and down the river. The lanterns are extra and sold by the ladies along the river and i believe also available for purchase on the boat. Our boat driver took some excellent photos for us. We did it at night when everything is lit up. For local food i recommend and see my reviews - thịt nướng cô lợi hội an - ốp la đông - cafe muối cô anh - also try bánh mì sum and madam khanh suggestion for hotel provide room hand towels

Very friendly, welcoming family, got a plate of watermelon as i was waiting for check in. Comfy beds, nice clean room/bathroom. Great location, quiet road and only few minute walk to old town. Would definitely stay here again

Our stay was very nice and the staff is very kind. Our homestay was 5min away from the old town, the river and the night market.there are so many mini marts nearby. You can rent a bike to get to the coconut boats (like 20min ride) and discover hoi an.
Fint lille honestly med god beliggenhed ift. Old town. Der er roligt. Værelset var ikke stort, men ok.
보통 !

Muy bien ubicado, a un paso del night market, del puente japones y de todo lo que hay por visitar. La habitacion linda, limpia y espaciosa y con buen baño. El desayuno muy bueno. El personal fantastico, nos explicaron todo sobre la zona, nos ayudaron en todo y siempre nos preguntaban si todo estaba bien y si necesitabamos algo. 100 recomendable.

Receptionists were friendly and helpful, providing local tips. There s a lift catered for luggages so you don t have to worry about carrying them up the stairs yourself. Room is sparkling clean, bed is big and comfortable. Free bottled water and toiletries provided. Totally a 10/10 place. Highly recommended!

The hotel was great, the room is in good condition and extremely clean and the service was superb, tea, coffee and tv in the room, a great breakfast variety with western options. The only downfall was the wifi which was a tad slow at times, other than that the hotel and location was perfect.

Spotlessly clean and well maintained. This is a new hotel run by a charming and helpful family - nothing is too much trouble for them. We arrived at 08 00 with check-in scheduled for 14 00 - no problem whatsoever. Given a room immediately. Definitely highly recommended and fantastic value.
Nice hostel. Swimming pool looked smaller than i photos. Big room. Water was sometimes cold or hot. Staff was kind
Great location and staff, they were helpful at all times
Très belle chambre, propre, grande et confortable. Acceuil très sympa qui nous emmène à la station de bus par moto pourqu on puisse attraper le dernier bus qui va à da nang. Merci.

I had a very nice room, overlooking the pool. The staff is wonderful, helping me find my way around the various concerns i had. Indeed, yesterday i lost my camera - i was in shock with only minimal info to go on. However, the staff put that info together, and soon i got a note saying that my camera had been found!
地點於會安古鎮旁邊安靜的巷內 服務態度親切 會主動詢問需要的地方並提供實用的建議 但硬體設備普通 房價便宜 適合不在意浴室設備與寢具的人

We had a lovely time at starfruit villa. The family who run it are lovely,friendly and happy to help organise trips etc. You can borrow bicycles at no charge and the old town is only 15mins walk. The room we had was spacious with a balcony and pool view. The pool was lovely to relax by after exploring hoi an. The bed was comfortable and ac very quiet..so we slept well. Room also had a fridge and kettle. Would highly recommend if ur staying in hoi an.
We loved every minute of our stay here . It was quiet and clean. We ended up extending 2x as we enjoyed it so much
Little bit far from the ancient town, but you can get a bicycle free of charge. Room clean, staff very friendly and pool is nice. Like 3 star hotel, bat you pay less.

When inquiring about free breakfast as advertised on hotels.com, i was told that it is not included in my option (even though it said it was when i made the reservation) and that i m not the first person to mention this and it is a mistake on the website. Rather than claiming responsibility for the error, the homestay owner told me to call hotels.com to change it. Area is quite a walk away from ancient city and gets very noisy starting at 4am.

Ich hab mich so richtig wohl gefühlt in meinem deluxe doppelzimmer mit riesiger badewanne und balkon. Alles sauber und modern eingerichtet. Das frühstück war lecker und die auswahl recht groß. Toller poolbereich und gutes internet. Die matratze war auch super bequem. In die altstadt läuft man ca. 15 minuten. Alternativ kann man auch das fahrrad nehmen welches einem zur verfügung gestellt wird. Ich kann die unterkunft zu 100 weiterempfehlen und komme gerne wieder!

The hotel is fine the owners are sweet. The breakfast is good and have options. They lend bikes for free which helps if you wanna go tontura beach 20 m ride. Old town is close to go walking. Silent and calm. In the next month will inaugurate a pool really nice. We enjoyed staying here.

Todella hyvä majoitus. Todella mukava ja avulias majapaikan pitäjä. Hän halusi vilpittömästi kertoa ja neuvoa vietnamilaisen ja hoianin tarjontaan. Käytiin esim. Yhdessä syömässä katukeittiöissä hänen kanssaan. Huone oli siisti ja tilava. Sänky vietnamilaiseen tapaan kova. Vaikka niin sanotusti hiljaisemmalla kadulla niin korvatulpat nukkuessa. Homestayn sijainti oli hyvä. Kävelymatka vanhaan kaupunkiin ja rannalle pääsi heidän ilmaisilla fillareilla kymmenessä minuutissa.

Wonderful stay. Excellent rooms clean and spacious, great pool for the kids, we used a little the kitchen which was great. Good location near the market and 15 min walk to the old city. Very nice family we highly recommend.
It s a homestay with nice host and cute baby, clean room and free to rent bicycle! i will stay here when i visit hoi an next time

We loved staying at starfruit. The girls at the front desk were ultra helpful they would greet us each morning and make us a wonderful breakfast, sharing their in depth local knowledge of where to go for the best service, prices and products. Nothing was too much trouble. Our stay was delightful and i highly recommend starfruit to anyone looking for genuine hoi an hospitality.
객실은 넓고 깔끔합니다.가격대비 나쁘지 않은 선택이라고 봄. 구시가랑 거리가 있지만 자전거 무료 대여가 있어서 편리합니다. 호이안은 스쿠터보다 자전거로 다 커버가 가능합니다 ㅎㅎ

Room is very clean, big, complete with all the things we need, and beautiful. I feel i did not pay for the real value of the room since i feel it s very cheap. And the staffs were very helpful and accommodating. Without a doubt this is the hotel i enjoyed the most in my whole stay in vietnam. Definitely reccommeding this great hotel to fellow travellers.

The hospitality is top notch! good wifi on 3rd floor. I had the big balcony room, and it was great to relax in. I took takeaway food to the room watched some movies and it was great. 15 min walking to the river center. And with their free bikes it s about 5 min. Great stay overall!!

Nous sommes arrivés en pleine nuit à l hôtel et nous n étions pas préparé à cela, notre check-in était à 14h. Aucune lumière dans l hôtel. Après quelques minutes, nous avons eu notre hôte qui nous a donné accès à la. Chambre immédiatement. Alors que nous pensions dormir à la belle étoile. Le petit-déneuner simple et succulent, nous était proposé la veille. Une petite attention. Nos hôtes étaient toujours prêts à nous renseigner et à répondre à nos besoins. Grands adeptes de la randonnée pédestre, l oa situation géographique de l hôtel nous a permis de découvrir plusieurs sites touristiques de la ville à pied. Nous recommandons sans hésiter cet hôtel.
Famille très agréable, petit déjeuné succulent. Chambre propre et bien décoré. Vélo gratuit mis à disposition. À ne pas rater )

I recommand to all whom going to spend a several days in hoi-an. Within walking distance, or less than 10 mins free-rental bike you can easily acces to hoi-an old town, as well outlet side of hoi-an. Location is alright. Everything is hold within your local map. Maybe the bed mattress is not the best as to they use a sponge foams. You can feel the thickness and stead. But money cheap wise, you can have a free break-fast meal, hostel staffs are very hospitables, they would jump out to help to finds or book a transporations for you.

Slight misunderstanding at the start but resolved. It s more of a hotel than a homestay, but with some of the benefits of a homestay such as the kitchen. The new boutique hotel type block out the back is really clean and overlooks the pool. Breakfast is freshly prepared as you want it. Passion fruit juice is lovely. Very friendly owner who really goes out of her way to help. We also stayed at the venus hotel but preferred starfruit because it s a lot smaller, the room we have is bigger and the service is more personal.
Rẻ, xinh tươi, gần nhà hàng quán ăn, một km tới khu phố cổ, ok

Ở đây khá gần khu phố cổ, khoảng 2km, có sẵn xe đạp cho khách mượn miễn phí luôn nên khá tiện. Phòng ở đây rất ấm cúng, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, có sẵn máy sấy tóc, bình đun nước, trên lầu thượng có sẵn máy giặt, xà bông giặt và khu phơi đồ cho khách tự giặt luôn. Anh chủ và cô em gái rất nhiệt tình và vui vẻ, bên cạnh villa có quán cao lầu và mì quảng nhà anh chủ bán luôn ăn cũng rất ngon. Nói chung dịch vụ ở đây rất tốt!
Chỗ rộng rãi thoáng mát giá phải chăng có điều phòng ăn cần trang bị thêm máy lạnh và quạt nấu ăn rất nóng vì không có điều hoà. Các phòng nên trang bị thêm quạt vẫn ko có
Gần phố cổ hội an. Ra biển an bàng khoảng 3km. Hợp lý!
Khách sạn rất đẹp, yên tĩnh, chị lễ tân siêu thân thiện, có dịp sẽ quay lại lần nữa

Tôi rất hài lòng về mọi dịch vụ của villa . Buffet hay các tiện ích giải trí, hồ bơi đều rất tốt. Nhưng tôi ở 2 ngày, tôi muốn góp ý, villa nên dọn phòng vào mỗi buổi trưa, phòng tôi ở nguyên 2 ngày không được dọn phòng, tôi thấy khá khó chịu.
Chúng tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ rất dễ chịu và sẽ giới thiệu những người khác đến. Nơi này rất yên bình và người quản lý, tâm, thực sự hữu ích và chu đáo.
Villa ở rất đẹp và tiện nghi. Nhà chủ và nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Vợ chồng mình rất ưng ý và chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây trong thời gian tới.
Fabulous time of stay at this hotel. Thank you all to the staffs.

Hoi an really is a beautiful place to stay. The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk from the town centre. There is also construction happening right next door and the noise starts about 6.00am (even on a sunday). Recommend you try white rose massage.
A little loud with the construction next door but still excellent

Lovely hotel and fantastic service. A 25 minute walk to the main shopping area but a bicycle offered by hotel if you d like. Cheap and efficient laundry with pressing just around the corner and good restaurants close by. Excellent family run blue gift spa hoi an just a street away was excellent both in terms of service and massage quality special thanks to jessi at reception for making the stay so pleasant! the other staff like nancy and hoi at the restaurant really wonderful too.. Thank you!
The most positive hotel.in vietnam with suoer ataff ans very helpfull
The staff here really looked after us, from a really detailed welcome, to lending us bikes and making sure they were right for us. It s a great location and brilliant value for money.

We spent a couple of days in this hotel - it is really new and clean, especially compared to other hotels in vietnam - our room was huge with a noce balcony - there s a nice pool and fitness/massage area - good breakfast with plenty of vietnamese and international selection - the service is great, the people there are continuously trying to improve the service and they are very attentive and sensitive to the feedback you provide - we had the possibility of showering when leaving, which was really an added value for us - perfect wifi everywhere in the hotel - perfect introduction to the city and services, there are bycicles available for free and it s easy and convenient to rent a motorbike or a taxi from them - you never feel pushed to buy tours or services as it happens in other vietnamese hotels

Enchanté par cet hôtel petit déjeuner super cadre très agréable personnel très attentif à recommander fortement même si le restaurant est moyen,et l hotel un peu éloigné du centre-ville (mais au calme)
가성비굿.호텔에서 연결해주는 마사지도최고였음. 수영장깨끗. 조식굿

The hotel is nice, the staff is friendly, and the breakfast is magnificent. We did however get a room with a fake window (facing and interior wall) which we did not fancy, but besides this, the room was perfectly fine. The hotel is situated quite a distance from hoi an old town and though it can be reached on foot it is an inconvenience. It can be a bit hard to find a restaurent for lunch/dinner in the area cause the choises are rather limited.

Would gladly recommend this hotel to anyone that comes to hoi an, it has been, by far, our favourite place in vietnam! and staying here was the cherry on top! we received the same hospitality all through our stay from the fantastic team at the front desk, lobby/bell boys, the team at breakfast housekeeping. We had a couple of issues which were attended to so promptly. When we checked in, we had a few mosquitoes in the room. We mentioned it to front desk and within a minute, a lady was equipped with insect repellant our toilet block twice, mostly my 5year old s fault though. This isn t his first (nor last) toilet he ll block unfortunately ( not only did housekeeping unblocked it for us ever so quickly, they even cleaned disinfected it before leaving. Pool was marvellous, so clean blue! breakfast was just what we needed to start the day. Variety made to order noodle omelette station available. There is construction currently in progress next door it was the view we had from one of our windows. We had already known about this from previous reviews was holding our breathe when there were sets of earplugs provided on the bedside lol! but wasn t even an issue. Didn t hear anything loud enough to even get a mention, think they re past that loud stage. Staff arranged a birthday day cake for my son, we were so surprised and touched. All the staff knew it was his birthday and greeted him as they went past, felt like we were with family )

Great hotel with wonderful staff and a lovely breakfast every morning, a nice change from the big chain hotels. A 15 minute walk to old hoi an or a short cycle trip on the free bikes provided by the hotel. Plenty of local restaurants and coffee shops as well as spa and massage places all within a few minutes walk.

Our reservation had been cancelled due to a credit card glitch we arrived on motorbikes in the rain and they were sold out of the quality room we booked. They upgraded up for an additional fee 50 us to their vip suite which had a fabulous view 180 degree view of the ocean, sitting room, two washrooms and bedroom. We were provided ginger tea on arrival and obtained a complimentary fruit tray. Breakfast had many offerings for local and western cuisine. All staff were friendly, the bellman was particularly friendly. We would recommend this hotel.

We are amazed by the staff, super friendly, help and professional! the travel advice and recommendation they gave us are very useful!! will definitely recommend for people who are going to stay in hoi an!
호이안이 시골이다보니 건물자체가 새것은 아닌것같은 느낌이 드네요 그래도 깨끗하고 아침뷔페커피도 맛나요 직원도 무척 친절합니다
- staff were really helpful and friendly - good breakfast included - would definetley stay again and highly recommend this hotel!

Stayed there for several days. Room was comfortable clean and modern. They served a wonderful breakfast with viet dishes. Nice clean modest sized pool. Good internet connection. Front desk had someone who could speak english if i needed help.
We had a great time at the hotel. It was perfect in terms of comfort, cleanliness and location. Very close to the market and restaurants. Great for families. Will definitely come back again.
가성비가 좋고 조식도 괜찮고 다만 샤워실 배수가 잘되는 방이 있고 안되는 방이 있어요....
Lovely staff, very helpful. Room larger than some apartments.
Service, rooms and restaurant very good. Loved the buffet breakfast. Very spacious rooms for families.

We stayed 6 nights in the hotel in february. The location is excellent, staff is top but we were disappointed that our room did not have an outside window. The humidity in the room was high and bedding and our clothes were damp. Breakfast was very good but the location of the restaurant is 4 steps below ground. For the price this was definitely a good hotel.
호이안 중심가에 위치해서 교통이 편리하고, 올드타운에 걸어갈 수 있는 거리임. 중심가에서도 복잡한 곳이 아니라 주변이 조용하고, 호텔 직원들이 친절하고 서비스가 훌륭함. 조식은 거의 매일 비슷하지만 음식 및 테이블이 깔끔함. 이불은 좀 눅눅한 느낌이 있었지만 욕실이나 룸 등의 전반적인 청결도는 좋은 편.

Enjoyable stay and good location. Breakfast was a definite highlight with great selection. Bruce the manager was friendly and courteous but felt he was a bit forward with his recommendations for tourist trips in the area (but think all hotels try and sell to their guests ). We did end up using the hotel for private driver for scenic tour and was good.
Excellent room very large and fits the whole family comfortably. Staff very friendly and very helpful. Pool wonderful and refreshing after a hot day out.
낮에 주변 공사장 소음이 있긴하지만 시설 서비스 조식 전반적으로 아주 만족스러웠습니다. 수영장은 이용하진 못했지만 썬배드 타월 모두 있어서 맘에 들었습니다.
Photos plus belles que la réalité - les chambres sont très ordinaires, évidemment bruyantes dû à la construction juste à côté (mais ça, c est la réalité vietnamienne!

Underbart hotell med varm och serviceinriktad personal. Hjälper en med allt man behöver och vi uppgraderades utan problem eller extra kostnader till ett dyrare rum då vi ville byta till ett rum med fönster och balkong. Poolområdet var härligt, fanns alltid platser och det var lugnt och skönt. Älskade vistelsen här!
Just need place to stay while we are in hoy an while exploring hoi an

皆さんの口コミ通り 朝食ブッフェが本当に美味しいです 色とりどりの新鮮なトロピカルフルーツや バナナの花のサラダ 青パパイヤのサラダ 生野菜春巻きなど 珍しいベトナム風のサラダ もちろん手の込んだベトナム料理や焼き立てパン コンチネンタルブレックファーストも沢山あります オムレツやフォーは オープンキッチンで 注文の度に作ってくれます 7泊しましたが 毎日メニューが少しづつ変わるので 全然飽きませんでした 客室も広くて 清潔で ミネラルウォーターのボトルやインスタントコーヒーも毎日補充してくれ バスローブまであって快適なのですが 評価が一つ低いのは 窓から見えるのが隣のビルの壁だったから です
Habitación familiar muy amplia, gran limpieza, camas muy cómodas, desayuno excelente algo apartado del centro
Hotel has a bike - rental for free. Old town is in walkable distance. Beach can be reached by bike. Motorcycles are cheap too-
We had a great stay. The constructions are loud but we got used to it. Very nice place with amazing and helpful staff. We love the breakfasts! -)
Great small hotel in transitioning area. We loved the friendly service and the ultra cool furnishing. Jessie at reception is a joy!!
Great service!
바로 옆건물 리모델링중이라 공사 소음이 있어 신경이 쓰였으며 구시가지까지 도보로 20분을 걸어야 하는 위치임. 아침이 맛있다는 후기가 자주 보이던데 음식종류나 맛이 좋다는 생각은 안듬.
Staff were very friendly and helpful, especially annie and daisy who went out there way to make sure we were happy

Pretty good hotel with excellent staff. The location is decent, being a mile away from the old town. They have free bikes to use too. The included breakfast was decent, but there were a few small cockroaches that scurried across my table. I guess it s normal in this part of the world though. The room was nice, clean.

The hotel looks modern and clean. The swimming pool is decent and not too crowded. The breakfast is pretty good as well. That being said, we found cockroaches there in our room -- in the bathroom to be specific. The staff used pesticide in our room but after that, we found another one. We did not change the room because other rooms seem to have cockroaches as well. Also, the bathroom floor was very slippery when it was wet -- the manager gave us flip flops, which was okay. The constructions in both sides of the hotel were noisy, but it wasn t too bad we used the pool at around noon, and the noise was bothersome a bit, but tolerable. Overall we enjoyed our stay there, even though we were concerned about the cockroaches. But it seems like other hotels have similar problems, except for (maybe) top tier hotels like hyatt.

It s a noisy hotel because the pool is in the centre so when kids are in the pool or anyone loud, you can hear throughout the property. The have bikes for guests but they aren t maintained properly. Breakfast is good and the staff do their best being friendly and opening the door of the lobby. They do get credit for trying!

Excellent hotel,great room, shower,bed and pool area.breakfast good and daisy and kai very helpful. It s about 1km from centre,two good restaurants around the corner, left out of the hotel then first left (two minutes) the tin tin and silent garden.

L hôtel est très beau et le personnel a été adorable. Petit déjeuner varié et bon. Piscine très agréable (serviettes , peignoir et chaussons fournis) le bémol du séjour les 2 immeubles entourant l hôtel étaient en travaux donc pas top au bord de la piscine...

Great staff and amazing property. You can t tell from the outside, but the inside is the tropical oasis. The only complaint i have with the hotel is the cleanliness of the tub in our king deluxe suite. There was a rubber mat on the bottom of the tub. I notice it a little further away from the showerhead than i normally like it, so i picked it up and tried to move it. Well, it seems like no one has done that in a while, because underneath the mat had what looked like months of grime and gunk built up. The rest of the hotel seemed very clean, but there was just this one spot which really grossed me out.

We had arranged to be collected from the airport however the car never turned up. No apology was made we were simply told the computer system was down so the car had not been sent. The hotel itself was clean and tidy. The family room suited our needs well.

Nice king-size bed and patio tables outside all upper level rooms that overlooked the pool below. Friendly and attentive staff. Good breakfast with freshly made crepes and eggs made to order. The hotel apologized for the construction activity on both sides of the property construction noise was restricted to daytime hours.

Tolles hotel in stadt nähe. Taxi kostet ca 2 eur. Die zimmer sind schön, der pool ebenfalls - man sollte vielleicht wissen, dass der frühstücksraum nicht klimatisiert ist. Bei 38 grad draußen wünscht man sich eine klimaanlage. Wir waren 4 nächte hier und absolut zufrieden ich wünschte wir hätten noch mehr zeit gehabt um auch die umgebung weiter zu erkunden. Die mitte von vietnam ist am schönsten. Definitv den schneider mr. Xe aufsuchen und sich kleidung nähen lassen. Zudem restaurant morning glory besuchen sowie brothers cafe
4성 호텔이지만 좀 오래된 건물입니다. 직원들은 대체로 친절했습니다. 주변 건물이 공사중이지만 그다지 시끄럽지 않게 잘 지냈으며 3일동안 수영장을 잘 이용했습니다 욕실은 깨끗하며 물도 잘 나오고 배수도 잘 되었습니다 제가 묵은방은 조용하지만 뷰는 전혀 없는 방이었습이다 구. 시가지까지 걸어가기는 멀어 택시타고가면 3만동 정도니 편하게 이용하세요
ホテルは両側から建設中のホテルに囲まれ日当たりも良くなくてベランダからの眺めも狭い空間に緑がある程度の小さなものでした コネクティングルームに家族三人で宿泊しましたがシャワーの水圧が弱い プールは小さい 立地は旧市街から近いが星4つは無理がある

รร ราคาหล กพ นต นๆ ถ อว าค มมากๆ ท สำค ญ เรานอนก น 3 คน ทาง รร ไม ค ดค าอาหาาเช าเพ มด วย ถ าเท ยบก บ รร อ น ถ ากดจอง 3 คน ราคา จะเพ มข น เยอะมากๆ ห องสำหร บ 3 คน เต ยงใหญ มาก นอนสบาย พน กงาน ต อนร บด ย มแย ม ม จ กรยานให ฟร ข ไปเม องเก าด วย สะดวกสบายมากๆ เรานอนท น ก น 3 ค น ม ความส ขมากๆ อาหารเช าอร อย
The kindness and cleanliness of the staff were very good. I really want to stay again the next time i visit hoi an.
Their staff are friendly nice. Nothing to complaint with this price.
Staff were friendly and helpful. Food was good with a variety. We were a family of 6 and enjoyed our stay here.

The customer service at this hotel is excellent. I accidentally booked and paid for the wrong month. After realizing the mistake (past the incorrect dates), i contact their sale department. Ms. Trang and her management team allowed us to change our stay to the right time.
