hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Todo increíble! espectacular! el hotel muy bonito, cómodo, ubicación es ideal para todo! el servicio de todo el staff estuvo perfecto! volveremos!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Walking into moire hoi an instantly feels like stepping into one of those stunning luxury resorts you only ever see in james bond movies stylish, cinematic, and exclusive. It s not just a five-star experience it s a true 10/10 destination from the moment you arrive. From the reception to the rooms, from the views to the exceptional service, and from the delicious daily breakfast to dinner under the stars every detail is curated to perfection. The staff consistently go above and beyond to ensure you feel genuinely valued and taken care of. As someone who has traveled across north america and europe, i can honestly say that the level of hospitality here is rare. In many places, you often feel like just another guest. At moire hoi an, you feel like royalty. You re not just getting great service, you re experiencing what hospitality should be. Both my wife and i were genuinely thrilled with our stay (april 2025). The resort s atmosphere, warmth, and attention to detail made it one of the most memorable experiences we ve ever had. We re absolutely coming back. Staying here is more than just a getaway, it s a pleasure.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This was our second time staying at moire, the first time was as bay resort. This is an incredible resort. It is close to old town (you walk across a bridge) but it s in a really quiet spot. The staff are wonderful and so attentive. The rooms are lovely and the pool area is great. I would highly recommend staying here and i can t wait to come back again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: I was truly impressed with the quality of service at this hotel. The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff were incredibly friendly and professional. Especially, the breakfast was excellent made my stay even more enjoyable. I will definitely come back and recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Very nice. I will be back and stay again next month.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Loved everything about this property

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Exceptional service and location

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Confortevole, pulito, buoni servizi

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: I reviewed tons of hotels before choosing this one and it was so far the best choice. My room looed over the canal to the night market. The hotel is just over a bride which is less than ten minutes away from the night market. The location was outstanding. I travelled solo and wen out every evening and felt extremely safe. I booked a lot of trips, all of the meeting points were close to the hotel. If i went back to hoi an, i would have to stay in this hotel and i would want the same room (301). The breakfast was great, which i woke up for every morning o)

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Bay resort is in a great location , a short walk to the old town and great views of the boats and lanterns from its quiet riverside location. Check in and front office were very professional , ordering taxis and advising on best places to visit . Rooms are really clean , well serviced and spacious with comfortable beds. Breakfast was very good and the pool area was very nice .

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: A fantastic resort! great room, friendly and helpful staff, convenient location. I would definitely come back to this fantastic resort.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This property cross from old town hoi an from hoai river. Short walking to the old town.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Absolutely superb. Great location- 5 min walk to old town and fabulous room. Staff super attentive and friendly- nothing was too much trouble. Really recommend this hotel for future visits to hoi an.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Staff were amazing property a short walk to old town hoi an old town is a great experience by day and by night it just comes alive and is beautiful.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 친절한 직원들의 미소, 깨끗한 방, 정성스러운 조식, 멋진 강가 전경이 생각나는 리조트입니다. 재방문 의사 있어요.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Bay resort met our expectations and more. Beautiful location and the staff are amazing, great buffet breakfast and nice pool too. The property is on the river so you can watch the boat show from the pool bar and avoid the crowds. Rooms are really nice and great bathrooms/shower. Highly recommend.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Very nice good location and great staff

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: We loved this hotel for its view of the ancient town river. Super beautiful design, friendly staff and great breakfast! but not all rooms have a river view which is why we booked it to begin with. And the bed isn t up to 5 star standards in my opinion - very hard pillows weren t nice. There was also a very narrow busy bridge to navigate on your way over to the main town centre which we found inconvenient with 2 little kids and just a narrow footpath otherwise, we love this hotel and would absolutely stay again but would upgrade to a river view room

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 베트남에서 처음 숙박을했는데 정말 좋았습니다 직원들도 친절하고 만든지 얼마되지않아서 깨끗하고 올드타운과도 가까워서 다니기 정말편했어요

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Hotel was right on the riverfront overlooking the main old quarter. Super luxurious with great shower and bathtub. Minibar was free (basic) and replenished daily which was a thoughtful touch. Only drawback was the walk into town across the bridge with a very narrow footpath.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Great experience!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 朝食ブュッフェが充実しててフレッシュで美味しかったです お部屋の掃除も1日2回入ってくれてホテル設備も充実していて大満足です スパも最高でした 次回も是非 宿泊したいと思います

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Great location! walkable to old town or the hotel provides shuttle service. Attentive staff that helped us with tours and transportation. On site dining provides great breakfast and dinner options. We were traveling as couples but the resort accommodates families as well. Rooms are extremely quiet and comfortable. Definitely wouldn t hesitate to stay again the next time we re in hoi an.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 昨年オープンしたこともあり施設は新しくきれいで スタッフの対応等ホスピタリティも良かった ただし補遺円のメインのエリアへ行くためのホテル前の橋は歩行者にはとても危険で歩きにくかった

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Property location is great very convenient. The only issue is the crossing of the bridge with kids, other than that property amenities were great. Breakfast was amazing and the location of the restaurant and vibe was great. Would stay again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Good location, walking distance ( less than 10 minutes) to the market and city center. Staffs are friendly and efficient, room is clean, bed is comfortable, nice breakfast is a plus as well.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Excellent property. Rooms are clean, large, and new. Have everything you need and then some. Outstanding staff and exemplary service.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 旧市街からは少し離れているけど 静かでいいホテルでした ただ上の階の排水の音がうるさくて自分の部屋で水漏れしているのかと思いました 泊まられるなら最上階がいいと思います

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: En av de beste hotellene jeg har bod på. Alle som jobbet var kjempe servise innstilte, ren og fin hotell med en svømmebasseng. Hotellet lånte bort sykler til gjestene. God frokost og resepsjonen hjalp med alt du lurte på

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Great stay. Coming again. Rin at the pool bar was fantastic and the rest of the staff made our stay great. Also thank you to mandy for the warm welcome.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The rooms look new! the pillows are fantastic and the rooms were very clean. The pool is beautiful and the gym is large and well ventilated.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This hotel is perfect, amazing super helpful and friendly staff, the best location and beautiful rooms, pool and restaurants. Highly recommend

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Absolutely loved our stay! the staff were incredibly warm and welcoming, the rooms were spotless and beautifully decorated, and the location was perfect just a short walk to the old town. The breakfast was delicious every morning. Can t wait to come back!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Amazing pool villa, the staff wouldn t have done more! attentive and even delivered a cake for my birthday and decorations got the bed! breakfast spread was good and high quality.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Amazing location, great selection for breakfast

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This was the perfect place to celebrate our anniversary. Located just outside the old town, it offers beautiful views of boats passing by close enough to enjoy the charm without the crowds. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay special, even decorating our room upon arrival. Everyone was incredibly friendly and helpful throughout our visit. The breakfast buffet was outstanding, with a variety that changed daily. Truly worth every penny i would recommend this place a hundred times over!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The bridge that accesses the hotel is very narrow and very unsafe to walk accross with the traffic drive past fast. It s a very busy bridge with currently no other way to access the hotel

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 호텔때문이라도 가고 싶은 곳 호이안에 빠져서 7-8박으로 두번 간 호이안 도보로 올드타운을 맘대로 가고 싶을 때 걸어갔던 기억이 좋아 해변쪽 큰 리조트와 고민하다 모이레 방문 인터컨티넨탈 호텔인줄 모르고 예약한건데 글로벌 브랜드 그 자체의 직원들과 시설 조식도 맛있었고 모두 프로페셔널하며 친절함 무엇보다 가장 좋았던게 베트남 수질이 나빠 샤워 필터가 실시간으로 누래지는데 호텔에 정수시스템이 있는지 반응없고 다른 호텔에서 나쁜 수질로 안좋아지던 피부도 오히려 회복해서 감 주변에 다 추천했음 너무 더워서 선선했던 2월달에 다시 방문 예정 방도 넓고 무엇보다 방청소를 바닥 빛나도록 닦아주셔서 좋았음, 매일 창틀까지 다 닦고 계셔서 특별히 더 청결했던 호텔로 기억 다리 건너면 올드타운이라 시끄러울 거 같았지만 다리 하나 놔두고 다른 세상 매우 고요하니 휴양하기 딱 좋음

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Absolutely loved our time here. We will certainly be booking again. Location was directly within old town, staff were consistently excellent in the resort, free mini bar was a nice touch and the pool was a great place to sit. The stay felt very personalized even though it s a big resort. For anyone wondering, breakfast buffet was decent too

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 베이리조트 완전 강추해요 직원분들도 너무 친절하시고 미니바 무료에 하루 두번 청소해주시니 외출후에 깔끔해져있어 놀랐고 청결했어요 수영장이 살짝 작아서 아쉽긴했지만 이용객이 많지않아서 붐비거나하진 않았어요 올드타운 접근성도 너무 좋고 재방하면 또 가고싶은곳입니다

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The hotel was very nice, clean, the staff was helpful and the food was good.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Incredible hotel. Staff were all amazing. The location is perfect. Breakfast is the best. We will definitely be back again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Absolutely excellent hotel

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Great location

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: It s all good esp the location. Poolside is great. Gym is good. Mini-mart within hotel compound. Walking distance to old town. Starr friendly helpful. Did not take breakfast however, the first room has a strong formaldehyde smell(from carpentry work) that makes me feel unwell. Got a room change after 1 night. Everything else is ok.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The hotel rooms were modern and clean. Hotel breakfast buffet was delicious. Just cross the bridge and you re in the heart of town. Banh mi phuong is a 5-7 minute walk from hotel. Easy grab to night market and lantern festival.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Love this location! anytime i travel to hoi an, i stay here. Would like for them to bring back the local snacks (free) at with reservations but that doesn t take away the awesome customer service. The staff are wonderful and the hotel is very clean.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 観光するところに近いのでとて便利です コンビニがあれば最高ですがホテルのビールはとても高いです

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The location is good, walkable to town. However we felt house keeping didn t do good job. Our room had cigarette box and lighter at outdoor area and our friend next door room, toilet wasn t sanitary.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: On a adoré cet hôtel. Endroit très relaxant avec vue sur la rivière. Parfait pour visiter les le vieux quartier à pied. Tout l hôtel est extrêmement propre et bien décoré. La piscine est magnifique et la chambre était zen et silencieuse. Excellent petit déjeuner buffet avec très très bon café. Tout le staff est vraiment gentil et souriant. L hôtel nous a trouvé un guide français rapidement pour visiter my son dans la journée. Super séjour!!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Excellent hotel, rooms spacious and well appointed. Staff super friendly and helpful. Front reception staff exceptional and very attentive food excellent for breakfast and light meal at pool bar .. Could not fault this hotel on any level and would highly recommend

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Very helpful and friendly staff. Very convenient for hoi an ancient town.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Everything was perfect. I would definitely go back again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The moire is a lovely hotel and conveniently located near old town hoi an. Our room had been recently renovated and was very spacious. The breakfast buffet was extensive. Staff were extremely helpful. This is the best place to stay in hoi an.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: If you wanna have a real hanoi experience, this is the place. It is so central to everything. The staff are excellent. Had a great massage in the hotel. Clark who helped me check in was amazing. He walked down a couple blocks to my taxi because the street was closed as a pedestrian mall for the night. Gave me tons of recommendations - hanoi is just a super interesting place - don t miss the roof bar. The hotel is not for marriott rewards club members like me, but if you want to experience what hanley itself is like for the few days you were here this is a great option

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The room was lovely, the staff in the restaurants and housekeeping were fabulous! the hotel is centrally located. Loved that they had bikes that you could ride all around. It would ve helped though if the front desk had maps to give out.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Fantastic staff, the spa experience was great really clean and professional service. Great views of the old town, i would highly recommended staying here again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This is an amazing property in hoi an! the staff are incredible - they could not have been more accommodating and helpful. And they were always smiling! the river view king suite was undoubtedly the best location with a fantastic view of old town. We enjoyed our patio everyday. It is an easy walk over the bridge into old town for shopping or dining. Definitely would stay here again.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 最高のホテルでした 毎年予約しようと思います ありがとうございました

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Excellent hotel. Enjoyed the pool area very much. Great location.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Clean,walkable

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: A quiet oasis in the bustling city of hoi an yet a quick walk over a bridge to the markets and restaurants. Superior breakfast buffet which is included and such helpful and friendly staff. I highly recommend.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Could not have imagined a more conveniently located property. It is right across the bridge from the hustle and bustle of the old town s core, less than a 2 min walk, but once inside it feels like you re in a different world. We had been staying at more boutique properties throughout our vietnam trip and the service was a tad more impersonal than other places we experienced (though still kind and efficient and very friendly) but i think that is something you can expect from a property that is now managed by an international company.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: We enjoyed our stay! great location by the river, ancient town is just across the bridge, we could walk all day! we also stayed in and enjoyed the hotel, beautiful sunset by the pool. Clean and very comfortable room too!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Excellent hotel , great staff and lovely rooms and grounds .. Strongly recommend

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Excellent location and fantastic service. Staff very helpful with restaurant and shopping suggestions. Also arranged transport to the beach and hotel side pick-up/drop off for river cruise.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Nice and clean hotel. Spa super cool.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Good location. Quiet around hotel area. Borrow a bike and ride it before sunrise all over hoi an. Unforgettable experience. When go through market area, better walk with bike.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Fantastic service

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: An excellent location makes this resort an influenced selection for any body who wants to spend time in the old part of hoi an. Having said that one wonders whether staying in this area is the best as against staying in da nang that has lots more action. We were well received despite the fact that we arrived late at night!

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Staff at this property were extremely polite and attentive to my needs. The accommodation is immaculate and cleaning staff did a teriffic job in maintaining the very high standard. I would recommend this accommodation.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: All good

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Amazing location, great spa, good food

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 完璧です

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: We will stay in a total of 7 hotels by the end of our trip. It was hard for me to give this hotel 5 stars given the experiences at the others thus far. However, if we are ever again in hoi an and want to stay in the city, we would stay here. The staff are very wonderful and accommodating. The restaurant had great food albeit a little too bright at night where you couldn t see the beautiful scenery across the river. The location was perfect. The room was comfortable but not quite 5 stars. (found long strands of hair in the bathroom.).

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: This is an excellent hotel with wonderful staff, but with a laid back vibe as one would expect from a resort hotel. It overlooks the river. It was my husbands birthday, and they surprised him with some birthday breakfast pancakes! we hadn t told them they must have worked it out when we handed our passports over. The attention to detail throughout our stay was excellent. The hotel was in a great location and walkable to everything.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: So friendly staff, 10/10 experience. Would highly recommend.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Clean and luxury place close to hoi an city center.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 호이안 올드타운건너편이라 걸어갈순 있어요 다낭내 리조트에서 숙박후 기대를 하고 갔었으나 솔직히 올드타운을 걸어간다는 점때문에 지불한 금액치고는 다소 비싸네요 리버뷰인데 1층 발코니는 불켜면 밖에서 안이 다 보여요.2층추천 룸사이즈나 시설기준볼때 호이안에서 굳이 숙박이 꼭 필요하지않다면 추천은 어려울것같아요

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: 部屋は設備が最新で文句無し 一階のリバービューなので 外にでてベランダの椅子でゆっくり眺められる (但し雨季で濁流) スタッフもすごくフレンドリー ちょっとした洪水になってたので 雨季ではない時期に改めて行きたい

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: Recommended to stay here.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: A perfect stay. We wish we could stay longer.

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel
userCmt: The service was impeccable. The rooms so pretty and pristine. The view across hoi an ancient town was wonderful...you get to enjoy the buzz in the beauty of your own room. And the restaurant served yummy french and vietnamese food! i d recommended it 100 !

hotelName: Vignette Collection MOIRE HOI AN by IHG, an IHG Hotel

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Đây là lần thứ 2 mình ở đây, nó vẫn như lần đầu mình ở nhân viên ở đây thân thiện, nhiệt tình và tư vấn mình cho mình tận tình. Phòng nghỉ ở đây thì rộng rãi và siêu to. Đồ ăn sáng ở đây thì ngon. Lúc check out mình được chị lễ tân gửi cho mình 1 cái ví bằng vải nữa chớ

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Tôi đã lo lắng nếu căn phòng trông giống như hình ảnh hay không, nhưng khi tôi đến, tất cả mọi thứ đã thực sự tuyệt vời, nhân viên lễ tân rất hữu ích và tốt bụng, phòng ấm cúng và mọi góc làm tôi quot wow quot . Sáng hôm sau tôi đã ăn sáng nhiều như tôi có thể )) bởi vì những người phụ nữ ở đó muốn chúng tôi thử mọi thứ cho đến khi chúng tôi trở nên đầy đủ! nhìn chung, chỉ 1 từ quot hoàn hảo quot

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Gia đình mình đến hội an ngay đợt mưa dầm chị chủ và nhân viên rất thân thiện, đồ ăn buffet hơi chán (quá nhiều món có trứng) nhưng bù lại các chị bếp nhiệt tình dễ mến phòng ốc rộng, thoáng đãng bài trí đẹp mắt villa có hồ bơi và hồ cá rất đẹp nhưng trời mưa nên không bơi được quanh khu villa cũng khá nhiều dịch vụ, gần biển cửa đại nhất vào phố cổ mất tầm 7p đi xe máy gia đình mình sẽ quay lại vào một ngày nắng đẹp hơn

userCmt: Tuyệt vời, nhân viên thân thiện, view đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ và rất chất lượng

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Lần đầu mình tới ở đây, rất ấn tượng bạn lễ tân và chị chủ ở đây nhiệt tình, và hỗ trợ mình cho mình nhận phòng sớm. Phòng ở đây rộng rãi và sạch sẽ, thơm mùi tinh dầu sả, trước phòng mình ở có một khoảng sân nhỏ có bạn ghế ngồi đây tâm sự nhâm nhi cf hay trà với người yêu thì tuyệt. Villa ở đây cũng có hồ bơi. Đồ ăn sáng thì ngon. Lần sau mình sẽ quay lại tiếp.

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Tuyệt vời. Nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình, khách sạn thân thiện nhất mình từng ở. Có dịp nhất định sẽ lại ở

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Phòng xinh xắn, rộng rãi và thoáng mát. Đồ ăn ngon, cô chủ rất nhiệt tình. Có cho mượn xe đạp miễn phí.

hotelName: Villa De Campagne Hoi An – Boutique Homestay with Pool & Family Soul
userCmt: Phòng sạch sẽ rộng rãi. Style bài trì mở, lạ mắt và hấp dẫn, tạo cảm giác gần gũi thiên nhiên và thân thiện với môi trường. Nhân viên dễ thương, phục vụ nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Recommend dành cho các cặp đôi hoặc gia đình nếu lựa chọn du lịch tại hội an
Villa rất dễ thương, phòng rộng rãi sạch sẽ ,lại gần hội an rất thuận tiện cho việc vui chơi. Cả nhà mình rất thích chuyến đi này.
Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình, lúc nào cũng cười tươi, phòng và hành lang sạch sẽ, không có gì phàn nàn.
Chủ nhà có xe đạp miễn phí, nên chỉ đạp 5 là tới phố cổ nên rất tiện. Phòng rộng rãi, thoải mái. Có bể bơi ngồi chill chill, cafe trong phòng. Đáng yêu nhất là em bé nhà chị chủ nhà, dễ thương lắm )

Dịch vụ chăm sóc khách hàng kém, thể hiện sự thiếu quan tâm đến khách hàng. Căn phòng bẩn thỉu, khăn tắm dính máu. Máy điều hòa hoạt động không hiệu quả, nhiệt độ bên trong ấm hơn bên ngoài. Các dịch vụ bổ sung có tính phí thêm. Thái độ của chủ khách sạn không thuận lợi. Nhìn chung, đó là một trải nghiệm cực kỳ khó chịu.
Tiện đi phố cổ cũng tiện đi rừng dừa, villa ở trong ngõ khá yên tĩnh nhưng xe to đều vào được bình thường. Phòng thì rộng rãi thoáng đãng

Staff went out of their way to make my stay incredible. Room was clean and well appointed. Hotel is just outside of downtown, and they offer free bicycle rental to ride into town. The pool was clean and sparkling, and pool towels were always ready. The food was incredible. I was offered and banana pancake upon arrival while they finalized my room details and checked me in. The included breakfast was wonderful and had a lot of choices.they had great advise on what stores to check out depending on what items i was looking for. Plus i had torn a strap on my bag and was going to go into town to find a tailor. They said they could have their housekeeper sew it for me. She did a wonderful job and my bag looked like the tear had never happened. I would highly recommend this location and i will be returning.

The friendliest staff ever. Right from the beginning we were greeted with a big smile and were given a perfect guide to the best food, and attractions. They tailored our stay toe exactly what we wanted to do with our time in hoi an. Loved every minute of it. Thank you! our hoi an experience has been our favorite so far.

Hidden gem of hoi an. Beautiful space right on the river with garden, pool courtyard, and lovely rooms. Clean and comfortable. A bit off the beaten track and away from the crowds- 15 min walk/5 min taxi to old town. We would definitely stay here again. The staff are wonderful and give lots of tips, information, and more.

My stay at villa orchid garden riverside in hoi an was nothing short of wonderful. The friendliness and warmness of the staff really shone through. The property s riverside location provides a peaceful atmosphere and picturesque view and yet it is still very accessible and walkable to nearby attractions. Shoutout to tran, lee and the entire team for making my stay in hoi an so memorable.

It s a good property to stay with proximity to all near by tourist places. Nguyen was top class with her service right from the welcome drink at the checkin to arranging transport at check out she was very attentive and prompt with her service s
Big thanks to the fantastic team at the orchid for making our stay perfect . Special mention to lee, win and john for the local knowledge and fantastic breakfasts ...
Lovely place, lovely staff.

Mon séjour à l hôtel villa orchid garden riverside à hoi an a été merveilleux ! l endroit est charmant, avec une ambiance paisible. La chambre était confortable et propre, et le personnel était très accueillant. L emplacement près du centre historique de hoi an était très pratique pour explorer la ville à pied ou les alentours à vélo (mis à disposition) je recommande vivement cet hôtel pour un séjour agréable à hoi an.

Simply an amazing gem of a place that is hard to summarise in words or photos. We had a fantastic stay at this amazingly floral location by the river it really does live up to its name! the garden of orchids surrounds the private and secluded pool area. From the top floor, 2-room mini apartment we had 360 views (and a river view to boot), 2 (!) bathrooms that feel semi indoor/outdoor and fabulous air-con. Breakfast was leisurely and with a great selection of fruits, juices, coffee, eggs you name it. A special mention to lee and gwen who take pride in knowing all the great places to eat, drink, get massages, taxis and have a friendly team supporting the exceptional service we were shown. Handy bike loans meant when we felt like it, the busy town centre was a short ride, and even the beach didn t seem too far a cycle. Would recommend this to all and everyone in a heartbeat. Thank you team orchid garden!

Loved our stay! the villas, the pool, the staff, the location, everything was fabulous. Breakfast was super yummy. We rode the free bikes everyday, which was so easy to get around. The location is perfect and really safe with kids who can just walk out along the riverfront where there are heaps of cafes and restaurants. Old town is just a 5 min ride away. We d stay again definitely if we get the chance to return.
The perfect location in hoi an! wonderful staff.
Green oasis overlooking the river. Massive rooms with two bathrooms, marble lined that wouldn t be out of place in a 5star hotel! lovely staff. Great pool.
The staff was excellent ! if i return would most likely stay.
The costumer service was amazing. Lee is the best!
This place was amazing! their hospitality was second to none. Clean rooms, quiet area, just a short walk from the old town. The staff went out of their way to be helpful. Would stay there again!
Super place in hoi an right on the rivers edge idylic
飯店裡的泳池非常的棒 可惜房間裡的設施老舊 冷氣不能調溫度聲音也有點大 插頭不好使用 水量也略小 地點很不錯 非常的悠閒 騎腳踏車到古城約10分鐘
Wonderful people working the reception helping us out with bookings, dinner tips etc!
Lækkert hotel og pool. Fantastisk morgenmad.
This hotel seems obviously intent on making a good impression on their guests and they succeeded with us. From helpful staff to beautiful grounds to comfortable rooms and beds, we were pleased.
Staff were great lin got me tickets for a show at local price nothing was too much trouble

The staff at the villa orchid garden riverside were exceptional. For example, when i told them the door lock on our room was a little stiff, they had a locksmith there within fifteen minutes! and when we said we would like to visit the my son sanctuary, the arrangements were made within minutes. And the breakfasts, whether vietnamese or western, we re excellent. Also, the room was very comfortable (including air conditioning that worked well!) and the pool was welcome at the end of hot days of site-seeing. We stayed for five nights and would recommend it.

Great for family vacation. Family room has separate bedrooms and bathrooms. Friendly staffs, welcome freshly made snacks and hot drinks upon arrival which includes a short briefing on navigating around the city. Free use of bicycles is an extra surprise. 20 mins ride on bicycle or 40 mins walk to the market area and laid with plenty of eateries, small shops and convenient stores along the way. The food / cafe area at the entrance with a breath taking view of the river and garden surroundings hides the great villas inside that includes a pool for those hot summers. Other then the small little problems with the water heaters in the bathrooms that seems to be inconsistent in keeping the temperature, the rooms are comfy and big for both the single and family rooms. The other is that the 2nd floors are only accessible via a single staircase but the porters are always helpful with the luggages and shoppings.

Upon check in, we were served tea / coffee and hotel s version of banana pancake (much better than those on the street stores). Then the porters carried all our luggages into our room and showed us all the necessary switches, remotes, etc. Also free use of the hotel bicycles, which was handy as it saves some time of walking to the market and shopping area (45 mins walk away) greeted us on leaving and returning to the hotel. Very friendly and helpful.
Great staff, so friendly. Average breakfast. Awesome outdoor shower and pool
The whole place was lovely! i hope to stay again some time.

Fantastic place, lovely room, great pool and the staff are amazing, kind and very helpful. Plenty of places to eat within 5 minute walking distance and about 10 minute walk into old town! my first choice to stay when i come back to visit again!

The staff were fantastic and really made our stay! pool lovely and not as warm as some of the others across sout east asia that we have swam in. The beds were a bit hard but the staff added some extra padding underneath to make it more comfortable. The water pressure was a little funny- had to turn shower on and then fiddle with the sink tap to get the pressure to come through and the hot water. Overall it was a really great stay!

The staff at this hotel are wonderful. We originally booked our stay at the beginning of our trip, but due to visa issues we weren t able to make it. The hotel agreed to move our stay to later in our trip for a minimal change fee. The after some scheduling mistakes (on our part) we were set to arrive a day early. They hotel accomodated us and even had someone there late into the evening to welcome us. He even cooked a banana pancake for my wife and i after noticing how hungry we were. He didn t ask, didn t need to be cajoled. He just noticed and helped out. It was pretty much that way through our stay. What we needed was taken care of and even things we hadn t thought of were brought up to enhance or stay. When we return to hoi an we know the place we want to stay.

Chúng tôi chỉ nghỉ 1 đêm tại khách sạn nhưng khá hài lòng. Khách sạn có tầm nhìn ra sông đẹp, thích nhất là phòng tắm có khoảng không nhìn ra bên ngoài, nhỏ nhưng tiện lợi. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, anh bảo vệ tư vấn quán ăn khá ngon và giá cả hợp lý ven sông gần khách sạn. Tóm tại rất hài lòng với chất lượng dịch vụ và giá cả.
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, nhân viên dễ thương, nhiệt tình, vị trí khá gần phố cổ, đi bộ khoảng 2 phút.
Chỗ ở gọn gàng sạch sẽ đẹp đẽ.đồ ăn ngon.vị trí ra phố cổ gần cách 450m
Phòng sạch sẽ, vị trí quá ổn khi chỉ cách phố cổ hơn 100m. Và đặc biệt là nhân viên cực kỳ lịch sự niềm nở
Phòng đẹp, rộng rãi máy lạnh hơi yếu nhưng có quạt trần, rất mát phù hợp thời tiết oi bức ở hội an

Ấn tượng chung về khách sạn này nói chung là ổn - vị trí cách phố cổ chỉ khoảng 500m, rất gần so với các khách sạn khác cùng tầm giá - bể bơi sạch - phòng trang bị vừa đủ dùng - có 1 điểm trừ là mình tiếp xúc với 3 nhân viên lễ tân khác nhau thì có 1 nhân viên trẻ nhất nhưng thái độ khá thờ ơ, không chào hỏi khách, hiếm khi cười, giống như bạn này bị ép phải làm công việc lễ tân?

Khách sạn nhỏ gọn, 5p đi bộ là đến khu phố cổ. Ăn sáng gọi món nhưng rất thoải mái và ngon. Các bạn nhân viên lịch sự và nhiệt tình. Xung quanh khách sạn có nhiều cửa tiệm mua sắm, ăn uống, dịch vụ massage...rất đa dạng phong phú.
Nhân viên thân thiện, chỗ ở thuận tiện, một chỗ ở sẽ ghé lần sau
Khách sạn gần phố cổ rất tiện đi lại, được thuê xe đạp free, các b nhân viên nhiệt tình. Nói chung khá ok nhưng chưa phải hoàn hảo đối với cá nhân mình
Vị trí và đội ngũ nhân viên đều làm tôi hài lòng 100 nhưng vấn đề vệ sinh cần được nâng cấp và phòng cũng cần được cải tạo.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, phòng đẹp sạch sẽ
Khách sạn đẹp, ngay gần phố cổ có thể đi bộ được. Nhân viên khách sạn cực kỳ nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ check in sớm cho mình. Tuy nhiên phòng mình ở đèn hơi tối và có vài con muỗi.
Tôi đặc biệt ấn tượng với lễ tân na, rất nhiệt tình và tốt bụng. Ăn sáng tại villa khiến tôi có cảm giác như ở nhà, sạch sẽ và gọn gàng. Mì quảng rất rất ngonnn

Vị trí chỉ cách phố cổ một đoạn đi bộ ngắn, phòng thoải mái và sạch sẽ, chỉ có điều gối hơi mềm so với sở thích của tôi. Không có vấn đề gì về tiếng ồn. Không có nhiều cảnh đẹp từ ban công phòng tôi khi chúng tôi đi về phía sau. Bữa sáng ngon. Nhiều lựa chọn món ăn địa phương và phương tây.
Điều khiển quạt hỏng, phòng nóng bí

Mình đến hội an từ sáng nhưng villa vẫn hỗ trợ trông đồ giúp mình. Hai bạn lễ tân mình gặp đều thân thiện và support hết mình. Bạn có thể đặt taxi hoặc thuê xe máy tại đây luôn. Đồ ăn thì nhà mình có ăn mì quảng khá thanh so với ăn ngoài quán địa phương, bạn nào người bắc ăn nhạt sẽ thích, bánh mì và bánh chuối điều ngon. Các cô bếp cũng rất nice. Nếu có cơ hội quay lại vẫn sẽ qua lần nữa.
Phòng nhiều muỗi, điều hoà bật lâu mới mát
Ăn sáng ở đây ngon lắm, nhân viên thân thiện
Mọi thứ đều tốt, đi lại phố cổ thuận tiện, nhân viên dễ thương, vui vẻ
Phòng siêu tiện di chuyển điểm trừ nên để khử mùi trong pvs
Vị trí khá gần phố cổ, phù hợp mức giá. Không gian đẹp kiểu phố cổ. Các tiện nghi ổn. Chỉ có cách âm không được tốt và có muỗi.

Highly recommended this hotel to stay while you are visiting hoi an, very clean, quiet great service. Good location close to old town. During the stay, vincent help us for all the tour tickets and transportation from airport and to the next destination.

We were a small family and had a room by the pool. This was a beautiful spot.. Quiet and secluded away from the tourists in hoi an but so centrally located you can walk anywhere at ease. Rooms were immaculate and the staff lovely and helpful. I would dimwit stay again. A antidote to being in a bustling tourist city.

We have been several times in hoi an and stayed at different hotels but this hotel was the best we ve been at. It was a llttle beautiful villa hotel with a lovely pool for our daughter. Our room was spacious and clean and we loved the minibar with reasonable prices. The hotel staff were so nice and helpful. We will definitely come back again )
호이안 올드타운과 가까워서 관광하기에 편리했으며, 자전거를 무료로 빌려주기 때문에 여행에 큰도움이 됩니다. 매우 친절합니다. 무료 아침식사도 좋습니다.

This place is in a fantastic location, but it shines because of the people that run it. Vinny and his family are so accommodating and helpful all along the way. The rooms are clean, the showers have great water pressure, and the breakfasts are the best we have had from a boutique hotel in the entire world. Vinny s mom makes wonderful food and most notably a fantastic banana pancake! the coffee is delicious and the serving sizes are appropriate. I would stay here so many more times. Thank you to the family for making our stay perfect!
편안한 호텔이었어요. 조식도 정말 맛있었구요. 방도 깨끗합니다. 올드타운과 가깝고 좋은데 동네에 개들이 그냥 목줄없이 다니고있어요.
이 빌라는 위치가 얼기설기 골목길에 있어서 맨처음 찾기에는 어려움이 있어보인다.하지만 빌라의 내부와 수영장,꾸며놓은 정원등이 리조트에 버금가게 이쁘게 만들어놓은거 같다.. 이 빌라근처에 호로콴이나 피반미가 있으니..조용한 곳 좋아하는 분이라면 딱 일거 같다

Value for money at this hotel is amazing. This family run hotel aims to make you feel like a part of their family and they certainly succeeded with us two couples. The rooms are lovely and light and the furnishings delightful. Very comfortable bed with good thick sheets. Very close to hoi an old town, don t be put off by your first impression. It s in a small alleyway that taxi s can t get to, but it s less than a stones throw to a road and vincent and his family are there to take your cases through. When we became familiar with the alleys, they became great shortcuts. Lovely clean swimming pool such a bonus in a budget hotel. Only downside was no lift, so if you re in any way incapacitated, choose the ground or second floor. Intend to stay again.

The property was clean and nice. Good location tucked away a little but easy walk to the old town, markets etc and a nice short bike ride to the beach (with free bikes to borrow) the breakfast was good. There wasn t a safe in the room which was a shame. Staff were friendly and organised taxis for us.
Nice place. Clean and confortable kind staff at your disposal hotel location is perfect to discover the old city and all the places of interest

Taxi lite svårt att hitta eftersom det inte ligger direkt ute vid en väg. Detta gör att det är tyst och stilla. Familjehotell med jätte vänlig personal. Relativt ny renoverat och fint med pool. Gång avstånd till gamla stan med dess fantastiska gator, sevärdheter och inte minst affärer, pruta! stranden är på cykel eller som för oss taxi avstånd. Enkel men bra frukost som är fullt tillräckli. Rekommenderas.

We enjoyed our stay very much i would gladly stay here again. We were also fortunate enough to see a mid autumn dragon display at the hotel which was amazing very clean hotel and so very friendly and helpful people
Vinci villa is family run. The place was newly renovated and kept clean. The breakfast was home cooked and absolutely amazing. Very friendly family. Great stay and highly recommend.

What a blast! the best host ever. Vincent what a gem! he and his family took every traveller in like their friends and families. Even before you arrived to hoi an, they already took care of you until you left the place. I be back to hoi an, only because of vincent have shown what hoi an hospitality is all about
Very good
평점을 보고 예약했는데 아주 만족합니다 특히 숙소 청결도 최상입니다. 직원분들도 정말 친절합니다. 올드타운 안에 있어서 대부분 걸어다니기 좋습니다. 다시 호이안에 온다면 이 숙소에 머물것입니다.
No tiene ascensor yo subí 3 pisos y además está lejos centro

Easy walk to old town. Very nice local cafes and restaurants with reasonable prices. I specifically liked the banh mi eateries. The hotel is very clean. Nice egg, toast breakfast with coffee/ tea. Bicycles available for loan. Room was spacious with balcony. Super clean with hot water shower. The staff is friendly, polite and respectful. Looking forward to my next visit to vinci villa.
Ein schönes familiengef

Vinci villa truly went above and beyond to make our short stay unforgettable. From coordinating transportation to providing us with excellent nearby recommendations, the team was always available to help in any way possible. The level of service and attention to detail truly exceeded our expectations. The villa itself was stunning and the perfect romantic getaway for my fiancée and me. We can t thank vinci villa enough for their hospitality and would highly recommend staying here to anyone looking for a luxurious and personalized experience.
호이안 여행 중 1박 했습니다 하루 묵기에 청결하고 불편함 없었습니다 다만 골목 안쪽에 있어서 차량으로 직접 숙소 앞까지 접근은 안됩니다

This hotel is a hidden gem . The staff are wonderful they are always smiling and they can t do enough for you. It s a family run hotel and you really feel like part of there family. Any problem and vinci will go out of his way to fix it asap.cant recommend this hotel enough we had an amazing stay and will be back

Couldn t be happier with this property! a great location within easy walking distance to the town center, loads of good restaurants in the neighborhood, atm s, convenience store, etc. All nearby. We stayed in a standard double room to start and it was fine - modern, clean and comfortable. After extending our stay, we moved to a superior room - quite a bit larger with additional windows (brighter) and a terrace overlooking the pool. Worth the small extra price. Breakfast (included) was exceptional - made-to-order eggs or vietnamese dishes, fruit shakes, fresh fruit or pancakes, and, according to my wife the best vietnamese coffee . The pool was great for cooling off after a day walking around town. Free bikes available which we used a number of times to ride out to an bang beach or along the river. The family couldn t be friendlier or more helpful. We also used their taxi service from the airport and were happy with it (a driver waiting at arrivals with a sign). This place is a gem!
Lovely family business. The room was clean and spacious. Easy walk to town.

This was a nice enough hotel, but not as good as the pictures suggested. Our superior room was not special in any way but it was cleaned each day and breakfast was offered at a cost. The pool was not as clean as i would have liked and the sunbeds had stained cushions. We were disappointed.

I had the most wonderful experience in this hotel. The staff was incredibly helpful and so welcoming. The rooms were clean and comfy and the location was 10/10, very close to the old town. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone that comes to hoi an!

We are on a family trip! the da nang airport pick up service is considerate! vincent also gave us an introduction on great spots to explore in hoi an. Prompt service. Vinci villa is a great accommodation run by a friendly family!

This place was exceptional. As an ex flight attendant and a pretty keen traveller i have stayed at many hotels and this has to be hands down the best one i have stayed at. Vincent and his family made us feel so welcome. They even organised a cake for me for my birthday. The rooms are well appointed, spacious and clean. The pool area is private and relaxing. There are plenty of nearby restaurants and cafes and the villas are within walking distance from the old town. If you are looking for somewhere to stay in hoi an then look no further than vinci villas. You will not be disappointed. Vincent and family, thank you for a wonderful stay, we will be back in future. Chris, lyn and mark.
청결하고, 시설 양호합니다. 주택가 안쪽 골목에 위치하여 조용합니다. 마당에 작은 수영장이 있어 간단한 수영을 할 수 있어요. 조식은 가격 대비 조금 미흡. 전반적으로 좋습니다.

Vinci villa was an amazing place to stay! our host, vincent, his mom and the rest of the staff were incredibly kind and accommodating. We loved our spacious and clean room, as well as easy access to the pool. One of our favourite parts was the breakfast - you have to get the vietnamese iced coffee and banana pancake!!! i d definitely recommend staying here, and would come back again. Thank you vincent!

Everything was good, the hotel is clean, and has everything you need. The hotel is in the central of hoi an which makes everything accessible by foot. The host was very nice and helpful throughout our stay, she would always be reachable for any question or petition we had.

Super helpful and amazing location
Where is exactly what they said it would be. It was good

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: The property was great. I m disappointed and dissatisfied with expedia service. The agent claimed they weren t allowed to make more than 2 attempts to contact the property and left me stranded at the airport. They claim to made no contact with the property and claim a refund would not be granted since they failed to contact the property. I had to sort it out myself and the property agreed to a refund.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Truly a remarkable resort in every way. The service is impeccable. Very friendly and made us feel special. The 3 br villa with pool was perfect for us. We enjoyed being at the hotel pool and beach then relaxing at our own pool. Only slight negative was the food choices for dinner. We stayed 8 nights and a few of those days one of the restaurants was closed and the only option was buffet. Special thanks to quang and luu who took good care of us and made sure we had everything we needed. I highly recommend and will stay here again!

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Our check-in experience at vinpearl was a bit underwhelming. After a long trip, we expected a smoother arrival, but unfortunately ran into some delays and confusion. It wasn t the best first impression. However, once we raised the issue with the manager, tuyet, she stepped in quickly and handled the situation professionally, which we genuinely appreciated. The staff overall were polite and welcoming, and their attentiveness did help to ease the frustration. It s also worth noting that the hotel is quite far from the old town, so be prepared for a bit of travel if that s where you plan to spend most of your time. All in all, the check-in wasn t ideal, but it was reassuring to see that concerns were taken seriously and addressed promptly.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Our family stay at vinpearl was okay. Not terrible, but not great, either. Our room was clean and the resort was in good condition. However, we give low marks for the service. Our first impression was how chaotic the reception lobby was. It just didn t feel organized. E.g. It took forever for them to get our luggage to the room and we actually overheard them saying they had (temporarily) lost it. Similar at the restaurant, while the staff was friendly per se, it took an eternity to come to the table and we had to wait for a long time for our drinks, eg. Other than that, the food at the restaurant was okay, but nothing special.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: This beach resort was beautiful and secluded and of excellent value. The resort could improve their eco score by removing garbage on the beach beyond their property.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Verry good

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: The facility wows you with a deceiving outlook of what s to come for property big pool, multiple restaurants, etc however here are three area for improvement disorganized system leaves staff on pressure for low customer service. Taipei based with vietnamese workers miscommunication as result, no organized lines, waiting for long time everywhere on site staff is more busy cleaning than servicing rooms are dated house keeping is interesting cleaning your room 2x a day (even if do not disturb sign is present) yet the room itself is industrial with nothing modern greeters of restaurant do not know enough english as a result, communication getting lost in translation between staff, patrons management causes an invisible friction of things not being done or things unable to be complete- thus, my rating is 3 stars out of 5 ( that is being generous as 2 workers carried the weight to make me smile).

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Everything must be done at the resort only due to isolated location. Not much selection on restaurents. However, vin wonders was good enough to choose this resort despite unsatosfactory food

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An

Also, commuting to jr station takes some time -- not at all located in a convenient place.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: The best resort! lots of things to do at vin wonders. The staff is super friendly and professional! we definitely come back!

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: 남호이안 빈원더스 방문 목적으로 빈펄 리조트 투숙을 결정하였습니다. 숙박시설과 가까운 거리이면서 내부 버기 서비스를 이용할 수 있고, 비교적 넓은 수영장과 해변을 끼고 있어 해수욕도 즐길 수 있습니다. 제 경험중 아쉬운 점은 투숙객에게 제공되는 무료 사우나, 자쿠지 이용과 관련하여 사용 연령 제한(12세 미만)이 있다는 점 입니다.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: 저희는 3베드풀빌라 3박했는데 중간에 룸을 바꾸어 주었어요. 룸 상태가 복불복인 것 같더라구요. 처음 룸은 풀장에 물이 더러워서 교체해달라고 5번 이야기 했는데 결국 다른 룸으로 바꿔준다고 해서 바꾸었고, 첫번째 룸은 개미랑 벌레가 너무 많았고 뜨거운물도 잘 안나왔어요. 풀장에 조명도 안들어 왔고, 첫날 투숙 후 청소시 시트 갈아달라고 했는데 갈지도 않았더라구요. 첫날 얼룩진 곳일 그대로 있었어요. 결국 바뀐 룸은 커텐은 더러웠지만, 다른 곳은 깨끗하고 풀장 물도 깨끗했어요. 짐을 옮겨준다고 하더니 30분이 지나도 안와서 저희가 그냥 옮겼어요. 한국인의 성격 급함은 어쩔수 없는 거니.. 버기는 꼭 움직이기 20분 전에는 부르세요 엄청 오래 기다려야 해요. 조식은 생각보다 좋았어요. 쌀국수랑 반미가 특히 맛있었습니다.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Beautiful resort with amazing villas! this was definitely the highlight. The villas are amazing. Very modern, clean, well appointed and felt very private. Opportunities to improve customer service. The resort is huge and unfortunately there isn t much personalisation of service. Front desk always seemed to be angry or annoyed. This area definitely stood out to have the lowest level of customer service in the resort especially when compared to other resorts in vietnam. Concierge and belldesk were ok and did their best to greet everyone. F b staff were much better and the wait staff and supervisors in the breakfast buffet were really good.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Superb throughout, highly recommend the villas. Only slight recommendation would be to have some sort of basic entertainment in the lobby in the evenings. Staff are first class. Cleanliness outstanding. Buffet restaurant one of the best. I will book another vinpearl resort in the future.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: 가족들과 조용히 지낼 수 있게 되어있어서 아주 좋았습니다. 빈원더스가 있어 아이들과도 즐거운 시간을 보냈습니다. 하지만 빌라의 시설 부분이 노후로 인해 파손도 있었습니다. 리조트 안에 편의점이 없어서 아쉬웠습니다. 그리고 공항에서 리조트까지 셔틀버스 전산 전달 오류로 인해 직원과의 문제가 있었습니다. 모두 만족할 수는 없지만 리조트에서 개선이 되었으면 합니다.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: 너무 좋은 리조트

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: The property itself was very good however as we had an executive room that overlooked the beach, the windows outside our living area was always misted up and foggy (it didnt appear to be cleaned or wiped regularly) and as such we could not enjoy the view unless we went outside. Whilst the resort was secluded it also made it hard and costly to go into town with only 2 shuttle buses headed into old town, one at 8 30am and the other late i recall. Also, one of your staff members made my wife feel really uncomfortable by asking her to change her clothes or to cover up on what was really modest clothing at breakfast. She wore long trousers and a top that covered her chest. There were other guests who wore even more revelaing clothes such as bikinis or see through tops and short skirts. We also enjoyed a round of golf at vinpearl golf (having never played before or understanding how it worked) but the staff were very accommodating however at the end, it was very awkward as we tried to tip the caddys more than what we would normally tip at vnd200,000 each but they refused to accept it and we were told it had to be at least double that. I was under the impression in vietnam that tipping is voluntary and not obligatory. Lets a sour taste in our mouths.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Room is huge. Well maintained. Very isolated area. Good for young family with the attraction ( ). Breakfast was really good with a lot of variety. Dinner was decent but very expensive. Got charged like almost 10 just for water(2 litter). Probably won t come back if we ever visit hoi an.

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: This hotel is very nice and clean. Secluded from rest of the world ,30 mins from nearest town hoi an and you need to book a taxi or use hotel transport for a fee to go hoi an. No shops nearby , all you can get is what is provided by the hotel . No shops nearby guest services are pretty awesome rooms are gorgeously clean breakfast options are many but most of the dishes are with pork . Hopefully we can see balanced meat as well as vegetarian menu in future. Vietnamese white coffee is must try free shuttle between danang airport and hotel , fixed timings though. Overall we had a perfect stay thank you vinepearl

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: Beach was great as was the pool and the theme park next door

hotelName: Vinpearl Resort & Golf Nam Hoi An
userCmt: This property was nice, but transportation was limited and difficult, so it made staying here hard when we wanted to go out and explore parts of vietnam / hoi an. Wonderful rooms, but definitely catered to families and those wanting to utilize the golf course and amusement park.
Phòng giá cả hợp lý , sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi quản lý thân thiện, nhưng kiệm lời giúp người hướng nội đi du lịch như mình rất thoải mái gất cảm ơn

Mọi thứ đều ổn, khách sạn sạch sẽ...tuy nhiên phòng cách âm không tốt, phòng cạnh bên làm gì nghe thấy hết. Ngoài ra khách sạn không có free 2 chai nước suối và không có dép đi lại trong phòng... Nhưng nhìn chung thì cũng ok, sẽ quay lại nếu đi hội an lần sau

Phòng ổn. Chưa sạch lắm. Cách âm rất kém kiểu tường có như không ) không có nước uống, cafe gói hay trà free. Bàn chải free trong nhà tắm dùng loại kém tới mức dùng tạm cũng không dùng được. Ưu điểm gần trung tâm, phòng thoáng, yên tĩnh. Giá ổn so với chất lượng.
Phòng rộng rãi và thoáng mát.
Tôi có 1 kì nghĩ tuyệt vời tại đây. Khách sạn đẹp thoáng mát
Khách sạn mới, sạch sẽ. Anh chủ nhiệt tình
10đ không có nhưng dịch vụ tuyệt vời có hỗ trợ đưa đón xe về tận nơi, phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Gần phố cổ hội an nữa chạy xe máy chưa đầy 5p. Anh chủ thân thiện quá nà tuyệt zời. Sẽ ủng hộ tiếp nha
Sạch sẽ , thoáng , phòng thiết kế hiện đại ,thuận tiện đi lại trong phố và mọi người rất thân thiện .
Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ, ấm áp và nhân viên thân thiện. Giá cả chấp nhận được và ổn định. Phòng với trang trí đẹp. Không khí quá mạnh, phòng tắm sạch sẽ và rộng. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại lần sau.

Đặt 1 kiểu nhận phòng 1 kiểu, phản hồi với khách sạn thì khách sạn nói lỗi tại mình đặt qua app, app gửi phòng như nào thì xấp phòng như đó . Mong mng né chỗ này, treo đầu dê bán thịt chó . Làm mất vui chuyến di chơi của mình

Das personal war total aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Sie haben uns gute tipps für restaurants gegeben. Der beheizte pool ist natürlich sehr angenehm, da das meer während des aufenthaltes noch recht frisch war und hohe wellen hatte. Das frühstück war sehr lecker. Die anlage ist nah an der altstadt und doch ruhig gelegen.
Mooi en net hotel op goede locatie. Op loopafstand van groot aantal restaurants, winkels en old town hoi an.
Great hotel. Perfect for families and people who want to explore old town but also want some quiet. Breakfast is amazing kids club is staffed with lovely ladies
Best hotel in hoi an. Great for families quiet and comfortable beds for a great sleep love the private movie theatre

This hotel is amazing. I m surprised it s not double the price. Staff are so friendly. Buffer breakfast is top notch little extras like movie area / kids club is really valued super convenient location so many food options close by. Rooms are sound proof and block out blinds make for a great sleep. Swim city rooms are the biggest but no window or balcony. Only possible downside is the floors outside room are shiny marble would be very slippery when it s wet/ raining

A fresh new property, the staff went above and beyond with customer service and were very friendly. The late checkout was convenient, allowing us to do a little more before leaving. The only negative is the hotel style set-up, generally quiet but sone guests above us were thumping around, moving furniture and banging doors between 2-3 rooms until 1am. A complaint to the front desk quickly resolved the situation. Also the mattress was extremely hard, although this is common in se asia it was extremely hard!

Wafaifo is a new resort hotel in hoi an and as such its cleanliness was expeceted and delivered. Staff were very friendly even though they struggled with their english at times. Pool, breakfast and spa were all good. A better rotation of b/f items would be helpful to long stay customers and a wider dining menu would also be nice. These were said without any discredit to the staff. Duc the manager was very helpful with assisting my family s room and transport needs. He was always at hand to provide support and recommendations. Will recommend.

Planned on staying for 3 nights and ended up adding on 2 more nights because we loved this place so much! the most amazing attentive staff, attention to detail in everything they do from decor, spa, service, and a pillow menu, great location, relaxing pool i can t say enough about how wonderful this place is. It really blew us away! have stayed in numerous relais chateaux properties and the service and care was on par or perhaps better!

This property is quite new, having opened in october but everything from the staff to the property was impeccable. We were greeted with a smile by all employees and were well taken care of during our stay. When we were hoping for some guidance on where to go / what to do in hoi an, there were plenty of recommendations from the hotel and they even provided private service. The rooms were cleaned daily and had great soundproofing.
Perfetto, in tutto e per tutto! assolutamente, lo consiglio!!!
Nice, very clean, new modern, excellent staff, very kind. Thank you.
A really nice stay with super kind and attentive staff

This is a resort, very new, and barely a 10-min walk from all the main attractions in town. My family and i enjoyed the temperature controlled pool. Breakfast was great and a pretty big selection. Eating by the pool and at the cafe by the reception area was also great. The design throughout this resort is very nice and blends modern convenient features such as automated shades with vietnamese cultural flavors. All the staff we interacted with were very nice and eager to help and get feedback on our stay. We highly recommend this resort and hope it stays clean and well maintained until we return in few years to hoi an.
Bästa hotellet i hoi an! fantastisk personal och otroligt rent och fint boende! 10/10

The hotel is gorgeous! we love the design of the hotel, simple and classic. We felt very comfortable with the bed and the side sofa. It was late march during our stay so the weather was cooling hence we turned off the ac. The hotel is situated 10min walk from hoi an old town so it is very convenient and quiet at night. Each room comes with coffee machine with 4 different types of capsules for each liking, and different flavours of tea. It will be great if they could add decaffeinated coffee and caffeine free tea. A good variety of breakfast spread from bread to pho soup, fried rice, noodles, waffles and dessert, juices and the well loved black vietnamese coffee. Of course, local seasonal fruits and fruit juices. Our gratefulness to van, the manager and her team, they were very attentive and received our feedbacks with enthusiasm to improve and serve their future customers. We will definitely stay again for our anniversary!!

This hotel looks new and is beautifully decorated. The room is very nice. It takes may be 10 to 15 minute walk to get to the main attraction which is the ancient town. The breakfast is very good. The staff is nice and helpful.

This was my first time coming to hoi an with my child. The weather was a little chilly, but the hot spring pool was so nice, and the staff were all super friendly. I rented a bike and rode my child on the back and toured the old town. I definitely plan on coming back next time.

This hotel was a gem. From the moment we arrived with a short complementary head and shoulder massage and welcome drink, whilst we checked in, made this place stand out. It s about 10-15 minutes walk to the river side in old town which was lovely but always frantically busy. So this hotel provided an oasis of calm. Plenty of bars and restaurants easy walking distance. It s only been opened about 6 months so everything is new. The pool was absolutely lovely and a relaxing way to take a day off sightseeing. Duc the general manager was often around and van the food and beverage manager spoke to guests every day. All the staff were very friendly and helpful and obviously well trained by their managers, well done to you all. We have no hesitation in highly recommending this hotel.

We had the most amazing stay at wafaifo resort hoi an! traveling as a 4-generation family, we booked four rooms last minute, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate us with warmth and efficiency. The resort is stunning, with spacious, beautifully designed rooms and a perfect location just minutes from hoi an s ancient town. The food was a highlight delicious options that suited everyone, from our kids to our grandparents. The staff s kindness and attention to detail made the experience even more special. Wafaifo is the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and vietnamese charm. We can t wait to come back! duc, the manager made the stay be, probably the best we ever had (and we stayed in many 5 stars hotels).
I came there, they told me, that i they are full and didnt asked even my name
Khách sạn yên tĩnh, phòng rộng rãi (r406) nhưng bồn tắm cần lớn hơn. Một số vật dụng cần được mua mới để khách sử dụng.
Nhân viên ở đây rất tuyệt vời thân thiện, nhiệt tình giúp khách. Bữa ăn sáng mì quảng rat ngon
베트남 여행에서 가장 좋았던 숙소입니다. 깨끗하고 조용하고 수영장도 풀빌라처럼 이용할수 있었어요. 조식도 매우 맛있었습니다. 사장님이 직접 운영하여서 너무 친철하고 요구사항을 잘 들어줍니다. 자전거도 빌려주니 꼭 이용해보세요.
전부 다 좋았습니다. 자전거 빌려서 안방비치도 가고 올드타운도 걸어서 금방 갔어요.
Highly recommend!
숙박 만족합니다 가격대비 너무좋아요 방도크고 여행지도 가깝고 자전거도 빌려주고 너무좋네요

I had 4 night 5 days stay with 1 kind bed and 1 signle bed room. It is great pleasure to stay, cozy and comfortable. Small hotel but always serving with internaltion breakfast wuth direct cooking, fruit also nice. Room cleaning also good enough. The hotel manager and owner alwasy smiling and kind. When i come hoian defenitly i will stay again.
Very nice
The staff are very friendly and helpful. Very clean rooms.

Location is great. Easy to walk from here everywhere. There are great dining options on both sides. Great location for pick up if you booked day trips. Room is clean and cleaned every day. Breakfast is amazing and had options of eggs, fruits, bread with jam or nuttela. Coffee and freshly squeezed juice. Not far from a great bakery and grocery stores. Ac in the room.
Good central place to stay in hoi an next to the old downtown.

베트남 여행 카페에서 가성비 좋다고 소문난 곳이라서 따로 더 평을 할 필요는 없다고 생각되지만, 정말 칭찬하고 싶음. 위치도 좋음. 아침식사는 주로 오믈렛에 열대 과일임. 차도 옆이라 낮에는 차 지나다니는 소리가 들리지만 한밤에는 사람이 통 안다녀서 적막함. 어떻게 하는지는 모르겠지만 하얀 건물 내부가 무지하게 깨끗함. 사장인지 직원인지 모르지만 참 착실하게 근무함. 근처에 metta spa 도 좋음. .
Clean, nice and quiet
The room is big and clean, breakfast very good, at the reception they were friendly and helpful. Recomended
Rooms are pristine and appear to be brand new. Kind, professional and attentive staff. Excellent breakfast and location. Exceptional in every way.
雖是小型飯店 但房間內裝非常精緻一點都不馬虎 該有的設備一併俱全 而且非常新也非常乾淨 飯店人員非常親切 最後一天退房時誤以為東西遺失也非常願意協助幫忙尋找 服務態度值得大推 如有再訪會安絕對會再訪
The property is very clean and well maintained. Staff are extremely helpful. There are many nearby places to visit and get food. Also very close to street market.
Best place to stay in hoi an! the staff is super friendly, breakfast is delicious (banana pancakes are the best!), rooms are clean and comfortable, and the pool is great!
New and very conveniently located small hotel, minutes walk only from the historic centre of hoi an. Immaculate room and hotel with friendly and helpful staff.
It s a great new hotel beautiful room and spacious, very good location, just 5 minutes to the old town and market we enjoyed our stay here, highly recommend!
No place better than this cozy house. Don t try to find cleaner hotel.
Nytt fint rent hotell med bra frukost och fin service
Dejligt hotel, super venligt personale . Ca. 20 minutter i gåafstand fra den gamle bydel.
여기 두번째예요 직원들 친절하고 계속 신경써주셔서 좋아요 요새 시국이 시국인지라 한국인 숙박 취소되는 경우도 있다고하는데 그런걱정하나없었구요 늘 친절하게 웃어주셨어요 방도 깔끔했구요 아이들 쓸 수있게 보조침대도 신청전에 넣어주셨네요 호이안에서는 여기만 묶으려구용
호텔은 시골마을에 있는느낌으로 좋았습니다. 안방비치와 올드타운을 오가는 무료셔틀도 좋았습니다. 수영장물에서 약간의 냄새가 있어 찜찜한 기분이 들기도했습니다. 직원분들은 친절하고 요청하는 모든것을 수용해주었습니다. 조식은 매일 새로운 쌀국수가 나와서 따뜻하게먹을수있었고 현지과일을 많이주셔서 좋았습니다. 다만 그밖에 음식들은 없었
시내하고 좀떨어진곳이며 택시타고 다닐수있으며 직원들이 친절하게 자세히 설명해주니 편안하게 2박하고 온호텰입니다 가성비에 괜찮은 호텔입니다

A lovely hotel, 15 minutes from the old town and night market. It is in a quiet part of town, but everywhere is easily walkable. The room was very clean, well maintained and we had a view onto the start and the town beyond. Could even e the tower of the buddhist temple which was lit up at night. The hotels breakfast was tasty and a wide variety of western and eaten dishes. The pool was small but clean with plenty of sunbeds available. They had happy hour on cocteau every afternoon, and also a great light lunch deal for 3 of a beer and snack type food. The staff were amazing willing to help with every little question or concern. They offered a laundry service which was cheap. They also booked us a local tour, and sorted payments etc. Just added it to the bill, which was brilliant! when i come back, this is my first choice for hotel!
Really nice hotel and the staff were amazing
거리가 조금 있긴 했지만 친절하고 편한 셔틀 덕에 편하게 다녔어요 비치도너무 좋았는데 호텔이랑 연결된 장소? 경치도 최고고 베트남 와서 먹은 음식과 망고주스 중 베스트를 맛볼 수 있었어요 조식도 정말 맛있고 특히 커피의 깊고 진한 맛 아주 칭찬합니다 수영장도 분위기있고 방도 편하고 깨끗했어요 직원분들도 아주 친절합니다 단연코 최고
Das hotel liegt direkt an der straße und ist sehr laut.
Et rigtig fint hotel men god service og god beliggenhed. Det meget imødekommende personale fuldendte oplevelsen. Morgenmad til topkarakter. Et hotel jeg gerne besøger igen
It was a great stay with all the chaos from ho chi minh and hanoi. We got to relax at white lotus hotel in hoian. The staff was great and friendly.

Short break here, staff very friendly on arrival providing lots of good information. Was a bit let down on second night when asking for more sachets of coffee for our room we were not allowed any as we had been given 2 when room cleaned in morning so had to buy drinks which we didn t like so left
Nice clean hotel, good location. The staff is very friendly and accomodating. Unforttunetely the roaster s woke us up too early. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you.
Newly opened hotel and a great place to stay. Staff is excellent. Rooms are spacious. Buffet breakfast has a great selection. They provide free transportation to the beach and ancient town.
베트남에 새벽 도착 후 0.5박을 위해 선택한 호이안 숙소였지만, 연박을 해도 괜찮을 정도로 가성비가 뛰어난 호텔이었던 것 같습니다. 아이둘 어른둘 해서 가족 예약으로 싱글 침대 2개씩은 좁았으나 잠을 잘만 했으며, 싱글침대 2개를 붙여 주었거나, 여유

The customer service was amazing. Jade and sinaphire were fantastic and they even sourced some gluten-free breakfast options for me. Very family friendly and helpful tips and advice given all the way. We had a family suite with adjoining rooms which was perfect and very spacious.
수영장은 아이들에 맞는 설비이며 시내나 해변으로 걸어서 가기엔 애매한 위치입니다 조식은 평균적인 내용과 질입니다

A bit out of the way but no worries - grab taxi is maybe 1.75 cad. Didn t expect the construction noise at 7 15am though. Or the fact i booked a room in a hotel with an elevator but had to climb to the 4th floor up stairs - resolved with a call to the booking company.

Kändes välkomna till golden pearl hotel. Personalen tog hand om oss och väldig snabb för incheckning. Personalen var väldig tydlig att ge information till oss tex. Visade kartan hur man hitta till pho cô? hoi an. Rummet var mycket rent positiv saker många galjer, bra skåp, det fanns gott om krokar i badrummet där vi kan hänga upp våra bad handdukar. Free transfer till och från hotel till pho cô? cua hoi an. Mindre bra gärna ha tofflor som använder bara en gång per vistelse. Inte gemensamma tofflor som fanns på rummet. Kändes inte rent. Sakna stryk järn

Very pleasant stay in golden pearl. Special thanks to sapphire for her wonderful and welcoming check-in (we had the great surprise to be upgraded). Hotel is very clean and they provide very nice bikes we could use to go to the beach or the ancient town. Thanks also to jade and beryl from reception. The bartender is also great! we will be back !
The hotel is clean, comfortable room. Service is a bit indifferent- they won t do anything above the basics. Area is across from beach, very busy. Hotel caters to russian tourists mostly.
깨끗하고 직원들 모두 친절합니다. 마사지는 그다지 추천하지 않습니다. 위치는 조용합니다.
직원들 친절했써요 조식도잘나오고요 수영장도 깨끗하고 호이안올드타운 가깝고요 호텔마사지받았는데 너무 만족합니다 다음에 다시 갈 의향있습니다
수영장과 조식이 좋았습니다! 무엇보다 침구류가 아주 좋았어요! 거의 역대급 이었습니다 -)

An excellent choice of you want unprecedented friendliness from the whole staff. A shoutout to shaphire, ruby. Pearl, jade and all the rest of the front office girls, breakfast staff and even the cleaning staff. All so friendly and can t do enough for you to make your stay superb! these ladies should train other hotels what customer relations are all about and how to represent their properties. If you want a guaranteed super great place at a reasonable cost - this is it ! we are world travellers and this has to be in the top 3 of all are stays including 5 star accomodations ! thanks for your help again ruby !
Bed is very hard and hotel is far away from main area. The hotel offers shuttle services but only twice a day.
스위트 사용 5층이었습니다 전반적으로 깨끗했고 8만원돈으로 가성비 정말 좋았습니다

The room was quite spacious and comfortable, and the staff was helpful. The only downside is the location, as it is quite far from the center of hoi an. However, they do provide bicycles for free, and it s nearer the tru que fishing villages than most hotels, and the anang beach as well. There is a shuttle to the city center we didn t use, taxis are rather cheap to go to the city. Breakfast could be improved with more cheese (only la vache qui rit available, and that on demand).
밤에 이동하는 것은 비추천. 관광지랑 가까워서 숙소 위치 자체는 좋은듯함. 깔끔하고 직원들도 매우 친절함.

The golden pearl is a lovely hotel just outside the city center of hoi an. A new hotel, it is very well managed with a staff that goes out of their way to make you comfortable and secure. A pleasant and fresh breakfast is offered each day, with a variety of choices, including an omelet station. The quality of food is good and the service is outstanding. The hotel has a spa, swimming pool and very nice courtyard where you can relax after a busy day in ancient town or the markets. The rooms are very well tended and large by vietnamese standards. Bathrooms include the usual amenities, though i wish they offered bar soap. Shuttles to and from ancient town are offered a couple of times each day, however, i wish they were a little more frequent. Even so, cabs are frequent and very reasonably priced. In general, we would not hesitate to return the golden pearl and would highly recommend it while in hoi an.

룸 상태 - 넓고 깔끔한 편입니다. 조식 - 무난합니다. 쌀국수 맛있었습니다. 매일 약간씩 메뉴가 바뀝니다. 어메니티 - 상태 별로고 몇 개 없습니다. 샴푸랑 바디워시가 다 입니다. 그러니 빗, 컨디셔너, 세안용품 다 챙겨오시고 샴푸랑 바디워시도 향 예민하신 분들은 쓰시던거 챙겨오세요. 칫솔도 있긴 있는데 챙겨오시는걸 추천합니다. 청소상태 - 4박 묵었는데 매번 팁을 드려도 청소 상태는 별로입니다. 매번 뭘 빠트리거나 청소가 덜 되어 있거나 합니다. 방음 - 방음 전혀 절대 안됩니다. 아침마다 하우스키퍼분들 단체로 시끌벅적 청소하시는데 아침에 늦게 나가시는 분들은 좀 힘들 수도 있습니다. 수영장 - 좁습니다. 그냥 아이들 놀기에는 좋을 것 같습니다. 튜브 따로 없습니다. 그 외 - 직원분들 친절하시고, 자전거 무료로 빌려줘서 진짜 잘 타고 다녔습니다. 처음에는 좀 무섭지만 천천히 잘 타고 다니면 여기저기 구석구석 구경할 수 있어서 좋습니다. 생각보다 자전거 타고 다니는 여행객 분들도 많습니다.

Veldig fint og nytt hotell. Store rom med stort fint bad. Veldig rolig rundt bassengområdet så fint sted å slappe av. Bra utvalg på frokosten. Negative var distansen til sentrum, og shuttleriden som gikk kun to ganger og måtte bookes.
보정 이런것 없이 안내 사진과 같았습니다 깨끗하고 친절했습니다 저전거 ,셔틀차량 좋았습니다 약간 위치가 멉니다

Nice little hotel about 15mins walk to the old town. Rooms are comfortable and spacious and the staff are so friendly. The concierges jade and ruby helped plan everything for us and even went out of the way to arrange packed breakfasts for our early departure. Will definitely stay again.
Staff and service excellent.lovely room.location 29 min walk to old town.
근처에 맛집들이 많고 호이안 올드타운과도 거리가 가까워 좋았습니다. 즐거운 여행이었습니다.

Very friendly staff, especially amber and ruby in reception. Nice little hotel, far enough away from the hustle and bustle of the hoi an old town, but within walking distance of it. The only unpleasant part of our stay was that the bathroom had a persistent bad smell. If they fixed the plumbing then our stay would have been perfect.
Super hôtel dans une rue calme. Une mention particulière pour le personnel qui était parfait
Highly recommended, great staff good location. Excellent breakfast.
There is loud music that plays during the day somewhere next door to the hotel. Also the beds are very hard. I woke up with sore shoulders.

We loved our stay here. Special note for jade who made sure we had everything we needed. Pity about the power outages and the backup generator not starting. Too hot for that. Local karaoke bar at 11am blasting out spoils the peace and quiet. Amazing suite. Thanks all kevin and jane
The staff are brilliant and work very hard to help make your stay brilliant. The cleanliness of rooms and grounds also top class. No negatives at all. Loved it. Highly recommend.
正面 地點ok 和會安古城相距大約步行20分鐘 職員很有禮貌 負面 早餐食物選擇比較少 熱食賣相也不大吸引

2日間滞在しました 口コミが高く予約したものの ホイアン旧市街までは徒歩で15分以上と遠く 交通の便は良くなかった 自転車の貸し出しはあったが バイク量の多さなどからなかなか怖くて運転しにくい また 部屋は音漏れが酷く 夜中まで他の部屋から大きな話し声が聞こえていた 口コミ評価が高く 期待し過ぎてしまった それでも 部屋は広く朝食も美味しい 最後のチェックアウト時にレビューを書くよう執拗に言われたのが残念 書きたいときに書くものでは 強制して書くものではない

The hotel is quite a new hotel and was reasonable for my 5 nights stay there. The room was nice and spacious and the bed was comfortable. Basic amenities are provided. Breakfast spread was quite alright, some pastries and cake, bread, cereals, fruits and vietnamese food. The service however, was subpar. Not many of the staff could speak english, and could not understand me through the phone, so i had to come down to reception each time to explain if i needed something. The cleaning was not great, sometimes they didn t even clean the bed unless i was there and asked them directly. The pool was quite nice but as it was outdoor and uncovered it was really hot unless you go in the afternoon. Also, it s very noisy as there s some kind of construction nearby so i wasn t really able to relax. T the massage was not great. It felt like i was beaten up. The location is a bit far from old town, and even further to the beach. They do have free shuttle buses which only goes a couple of times and free bike rental, but taxi is quite cheap (32k dong). I couldn t get any grab car though from the hotel. Overal it s okay but service and standards could be improved.
Close enough to the old place of hoi an, but just far enough away to be quiet calm.
Easy walk to old city but not right in it. Staff was very nice and helpful in arranging day trips.
Super godt hele vejen igennem ) god service, fine værelser, lækker pool, rent og pænt osv.
Staff were lovely.. Gym is very small but room was good

We found golden pearl perfect for us. It is less than 12 months old so everything is new and functional. Staff cannot do enough to help you. All the reception girls have jewel names to make it easy for us. Ruby, crystal, jade etc. Breakfast was very good with a wide selection. Restaurant available if you want to eat in however there are so many options in hoi an the in-house dining is very quiet but still offers a wide variety. Free bicycles for guest use and reception can arrange and recommend tours and sites to visit.
Tres bel accueil a l arrive, personnel tres sympatique, velo disponible pour tous

It s very clean hotel. I really enjoyed. Actually i was supposed to stay in another hotel which was very dirty and had so many bugs. So i changed it to this hotel. I saw some lizards but it s small compared to the one i saw in another hotel in hoian. I think it s normal in vietnam. Also the receptionist is so kind. I love this hotel. If i go to hoian next time, i ll stay here again.
