Away from the hustle and bustle, but walkable to the market and ancient town. Bike to the rice field and beach. Room was better than expected, clean and looks newly renovated.
Lovely hotel and really good service.
Great stay from start to finish! lovely staff that provided top service and gave best recommendations for activities and sights. Started with 3 nights and extended 1 1!
Relaxing atmosphere and very friendly staff.
위치가 조금 외지지만 가성비 너무 좋은 곳입니다. 구시가지까지 걸어가긴 조금 멀지만 택시불러서 다님 됩니다. 룸이 정말 좋아요

Проживали с мужем на этой замечательной вилле 5 суток.отель находится на островной части города,в 10 минутах ходьбы от старого города.до пляжей надо ехать либо на велосипеде,либо на байке.и то и другое отель даёт в аренду за небольшие деньги (30.000 донгов и 100 тыс донгов). Расстояние до одного пляжа 4 км,до другого -2 км.мы съездили только на дальний,вода была прохладной и остальные дни мы купались в бассейне.наш номер- манго(так было заявлено на сайте при бронировании)находился на первом этаже двухэтажного корпуса,имел два выхода на противоположные стороны,большую веранду,просторную ванную комнату,отделанную натуральным камнем.очень понравилось наличие больших зеркал как в ванной,так и в самой комнате.все необходимое в номере имелось банные принадлежности,чайник,вода,кофе,чай,сахар,сливки,фен,сейф,тапочки.уборка была ежедневной.территория отеля очень уютная,зеленая и тихая.бассейн всегда был чистым,вода в нём теплая.на завтрак предлагалось пять видов свежих соков,четыре вида фруктов,чай,кофе и два блюда из меню,которые готовили в вашем присутствии.для малышей питание не предусмотрено.как недостатки,отмечу староватая сантехника,тусклое освещение( читать невозможно).но по сравнению с плюсами,это отходит на второй план.и я с удовольствием вернусь туда ещё раз.

아담하고 아늑하며 편안한 분위기. 베트남을 느낄 수 있는 운치있는 환경의 호텔이었음. 1,2층이 각각 원룸 2개씩으로 이루어 지고 따로 출구를 이용 할 수 있음. 원룸의 가운데 문을 오픈 하여 투룸으로도 사용 가능. 1층은 약간 습하나 2층은 쾌적함. 화장실은 넓고 좋음.구시가지 까지 자전거로 이용하기 좋음. 도보로도 15분 정도.직원들 서비스도 훌륭함.단지 온수가 부족하고 수압이 약함
Close to the all action, 10 mins walk but bikes and scooters available, or just sit by the pool! very quiet (rare in vietnam) and fantastic staff.
Relaxing with wonderful rooms, pool, breakfasts and helpful service. A real winner out of the main town but easy walking distance.

Wir - ein pärchen mitte zwanzig - haben in die windbell villa während unseres zwischenstops in hoi an als unterkunft ausgewahlt. Das hotel ist sauber und ansprechend gestaltet, das servicepersonal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Der garten mit pool und leselaube lädt zum verweilen und seele baumeln lassen ein, nachdem man sich hoi an angeschaut hat. Aufgrund des kurzen fußweges in die altstadt von hoi an( ca. 10-15 minuten) kann man problemlos für eine siesta ins hotel zurück kehren, um danach weiter die stadt zu erkunden, fitting beim schneider vorzunehmen, essen zu gehen etc.
A bit out of the main stream or the old town but a 15 minute walk gets you most places , a new build in an older part of town , you can hire bikes here . Hire your motor bikes at mr duc at the bridge

Lovely extra large(45sq), clean room, on the ground floor with an outside sitting area(not private but ok). All rooms are close to the central pool which was clean well maintained. A little too far from the centre of town for us(approx 20min walk to the japanese bridge). Quite neighbourhood which was nice for a break but there is not enough restaurants within a 10min walk. The hotel has bikes for hire. Would be a great place for families wanting to relax for a few days. Would stay again use the push bikes to ride into the old town.

We stayed in plum room, furnished to a very nice standard and beautifully clean. Small pool in lovely private gardens. The owners are very friendly and helpful and will arrange trips and airport pickups etc. It is also possible to hire bikes/mopeds. The hotel is in a quiet residential area on the island of cam nam and is an easy ten minute walk across a bridge to hoi an old town which is a unesco heritage centre. Excellent value for money.
예상 보다는 다소 실망스러웠으나, 적응이 되니 여기 보다 나은 곳은(가격 대비)없다고 생각합니다. 위치도 무난하고 (도보로 호이안 구시가지까지 8 9분 거리...) 아침 식사도 동ᆞ서양이 조화로운 식사였습니다. 식사를 마치고 룸에 돌아와보면 청소도 깨끗하게 되어 있어서 만족스러웠습니다.
We stayed for 6 days and loved it
한적한곳에 있어서 조용하고 여유롭게 즐길 수 있었습니다. 조식도 맛있었고, 방 내 인테리어도 좋았었습니다.

My wife and i stayed here for 3 nights with our 3 kids (10,7,5). We had adjoining rooms that opened up directly to the pool which they loved. We hired the hotels bikes for 30000 dong each a day which was less than 2. We rode to the beach and all around town - crazy hot, but stunning. Our breakfast was included - not buffet, but whatever you want and as much as you want off the menu. We also enjoyed a very nice (and reasonable priced) dinner there one night when we were to tired to eat out. We had a lovely time there and wouldn t hesitate to recommend it to all. Rooms are spacious, comfortable and very clean.
相当的不错呀

Staff are nice and kind. Breakfast was decent, various (banmi, omlete, fresh fruit, coffee,tea, pineapple pancake was absolutely dilicious, i had vietname noodle for 2days) and satisfied. Pool was cozy , amazing point was water was warm enough to swim at night and level was lower to 2 meter it was cool. Old town is not far from and they lend bicycle so it was best choice.
개인적인 실수로 숙박일이 변경되었음에도 불구하고 좋은 룸 선택과 서비스가 있었습니다. 조용하고 가족적인 분위기에 감사합니다.

You ll have about a ten minute walk into hoi an proper from windbell, but it s nice to stay away from the hustle and bustle. Great pool with lovely grounds and environment. Service is a bit indifferent. Plum room was good, but needs minor maintenance (removal of mould from bathroom, fixtures secured properly etc). Pool is a lovely place to relax during the heat of the day. Easy transfers organised by windbell to hue/airport etc.

Love the room here and the bathroom was a work of art. Beautiful space. I have rated the facilities a little lower because there seemed to be some kind of construction going on. Service was a little muddled. I wasn t told a motorcycle would take me to the bus, that the bus cannot go on the city s side streets so then had to call and pay for a cab.

The staff were helpful, the beds were comfortable, but the hotel itself was incredibly average - i was expecting more - and considering the amazing food in vietnam and the breakfast was decidedly poor.
Dejligt og hyggeligt lille familie drevet hotel, pæne store værelser, skøn have med pool, ren afslapning. Der er kun max 10 minutters gang til centrum.
다운타운까지 20분 정도 소요됩니다. 더운날씨에 걷기는 좀 힘들었지만 조용하게 쉴수 있어서 좋았습니다. 풀장이 있어서 아이들과 꼭 한번 다시 방문할 계획입니다.
Super schöne anlage mit tollem ambiente und sehr schönem pool! trotz der ruhigen lage sind es nur 5 minuten mit dem fahrrad ins herz von hoi an

Our family had a wonderful 5 night stay in one of windbell s villas. The staff made us feel so welcome, and the wood-furnished room and the lush pool/garden area made windbell a relaxing home base for exploring the hoi an region. Windbell villas is a 10 minute walk from the historic hoi an old town.
The family that manages the property is very welcoming, helpful and sociable. Thank you!

Mr. Trang and his family did a great job making our stay so comfortable, good breakfast available with the windbell villas only a 10 minute walk from old town. Very big rooms with everything you need, nice swimming pool and seating area.

I adored windbell villa, so much so that i am going back next year. The staff were so helpful and friendly, nothing was too much trouble, they arranged trips and taxis for me. Really well located about 10 mins walk to the market. Wonderful to go back to after the slightly hectic life in hoi an. Lovely pool area with papaya trees and other tropical trees. Amaaazing!! the rooms were beautiful with natural wood floors and furniture, can t wait to go back. Thankyou for everything

Freundliche familie, man fühlt sich sehr gut aufgehoben. Aussenanlage wird sehr gepflegt. Es liegt kein müll herum, wie im gegensatz zu ganz vietnam. Die zimmer sind riesig, jedoch auch schon bisschen in due jahre gekommen.

部屋は広くてキレイですがティッシュが一切置いてないです 電気ケトルがあったのでお湯を沸かしてコーヒーを飲もうとしましたが 開けたらケトルの中がサビだらけで洗っても落ちなかったのでやめました 朝食はサービスでついていて沢山のメニューから選べます 美味しかったです ホテルのすぐ隣に小さなコンビニがあったので便利です プールは寒くて入りませんでしたがキレイでした ホテルの人にタクシーの手配などお願いすれば呼んでくれますが 英語が伝わりにくいです スタッフにより英語で会話できる人とそうでない人がいます ホイアンの旧市街地まで10分は歩きます ナイトマーケットまでは徒歩15分とありましたがもっとかかりました 周辺の飲食店はだいたい22時には閉店し ホテルまでの道も真っ暗になります のんびり過ごしたい人にはいいと思いますがナイトマーケットなどで遅くまで遊びたい人にはやや遠いと感じました

A nice family run villa. Beautiful pool area and wonderful service. It was a little walk to get into town which wasn t great on the hot days but the cheap cocktails at the villa helped. Also there was a little bit of noise durning the day with construction next door and a neighbour who liked to play music but it was always quiet in the evenings.
Excellent family hotel 12 minute walk outside hoian old town great staff really helpful and pool balmy warm super breakfasts
Great stay, great help from host!

We stayed here for 5 days recently. We loved the location. The rooms were spacious clean and comfortable. Breakfast was simple and good quality. The hotel is itself is well laid out with fruit trees dotted around the grounds. The pool is well maintained and a welcome respite from the summer heat. Very obviously run by one family with up to 4 generations involved now, according to their website. The family is the heart of this wonderful little hotel. They are so friendly and helpful. Would be happy to stay again when we return to hoi an.
It is not needed many word to describe thè excellent stay we have had here! all really great that matched all our expetaction! suggested!!!
Fantastiskt bekvämt hotell. Utmärkt läge. Toppenfrukost. Bra scervice.

Das günstigste zimmer mango ist riesig, hell hat einen schönen holzfußboden. Balkon mit bequemen stühlen kleiderbügel sind vorhanden. Das frühstück ist wunderbar, man konnte zw. Ca. 8 gerichten 2 auswählen, die pancakes waren köstlich. Die musikbeschallung von einem nachbarhaus hat manchmal die ruhe gestört, da sie discolautstärke erreichte. Komischerweise aber nur tagsüber, abends war es immer leise.

När vi bokat en vecka via hotels.com tog det 10 minuter innan ägaren till stället mailade och tackade för bokningen och föreslog att vi kunde ha kontakt tex via whatsapp. Detta är väldigt skönt när man inte vet vart stället ligger , behöver transfer mm mm . Supergullig familj ägde stället och de gjorde allt för att man skulle trivas . Städning varje dag, cyklar och moppe att hyra , väldigt bra frukost och gångavstånd till stan. Liten nackdel var att det va 5 km till stranden , men bor man en längre tid spelar detta ingen roll då det villigt kör dig dit för en billig peng. Ok pool utanför dörren. Skall du till hoi an välj detta stället!

Ligging prima, 15 min lopen van oude centrum/markt. Echt vriendelijk familie resortje gesitueerd om gezellig zwembad. De familie/personeel is zeer behulpzaam en maakt het leven van hun gasten zeer aangenaam. Jongere generatie spreekt goed engels
The bathtub was broken, cannot serve customer, or have to inform customer in advance, may get injuring!
Excellent stay ...huge rooms..lovely staff nice pool all good will return

Big and spacious room with a small balcony. Always friendly and we rented bikes two days. The breakfast very simple but sort of the same we have had all over vietnam. Please have breakfast next to windbell, turn right when you exit and then just a few meters past ngomart. Her food was soooooo lovely. Very friendly couple even if little or no english was spoken. Somehow they managed to show us how to eat banh xao anyway. So lovely! the booked us a car for airport for 300 00 song. Driver sweet and drove us safely to airport.

I really like the friendly, helpful staff. This seems to be a family operation and they work well together and keep their guests happy for example i wanted a cup of tea in the late afternoon when the kitchen was closed but that did not stop them from making one for me. I liked they had motos for hire because the property is a bit of a walk to the ancient city and the neighborhood is dead here at night.
A little out of the crowd but within walking distance to the old town. Resulting in a quite place to sleep with anice pool to relax at the end of the day.
Very pleasant surroundings and staff were very friendly and easy going

Lovely little villa, walkable to the old town. Staff were amazing and food cooked here was among the best we had in vietnam. Feels like a second home staying here and we would definitely recommend a stay here. A few small things. The aircon kept cutting out and shower drain needs a bit of attention, small things in the scheme of things.
Everything was great except for the food. No variety at breakfast and they served instant noodle!

Overall, this was a great hotel. Really nice rooms, friendly staff and good location. Our only criticism is a rather strange one living close to our bedroom window was a rooster. It crowed at various times of the day and night (including from 5am to 7am each morning). Additionally, as others have mentioned, there was some construction work going on in/around the hotel. The rooster-construction combo made it difficult to sleep at times. Other than that, a great find and very good value for money.
除了酒店的位置有一點點偏僻, 離古鎮中心有點遠之前, 我對這家酒店十分滿意. 房間很大而且很舒適, 酒店的環境很好, 早餐很好吃, 前臺的服務很好很周到. 如果我下次去一定會再去那邊住的.

The beds and pillows were too hard. Couldn t sleep the first 2 nights. Homestay is a different but cosy experience. Nice concept. Very laid back and relaxing. We enjoyed the pool very much. Not crowded at all. The host is very helpful. Breakfast is good. I would recommend windbell to travelers who desire a private, uncommercialised, quiet relaxed surrounding.

We spent 2 nights in this hotel , it s a very good adresse ! the familly who has the hotel is very nice ! it s the mother who make the cook and it s the best food we have eaten in vietnam ! if we côme back to hoi an , we will return to this hotel !
Great family run business, quiet part of town within easy walk to the ancient town. We loved the breakfast and the pool, staff were friendly and helpful.

We stayed in a standard room and it was quite large, clean and well equipped. The bathroom was also very nice. The wi-fi sometimes doesn t work that well from the bed room but is always ok in the reception/restaurant. The staff is very friendly and they don t try to sell you loads of visits/packages, but if you want to book anything they can do, so that s great. The swimming pool is very nice, especially after a hot day! the breakfast is very nice, you can order as much as you want. The hotel is located on an island south of hoi an, you can walk to old town in 10-15 min. The hotel proposes taxi service to old town for 30,000 vnd (1.5 usd) and to the beach for 80,000 vnd. You can hire a bike for 30,000 vnd per day. The one i had was quite poor though... The hotel can drop you off to the airport for 20 usd a bit more expensive than what you can get from the old town by negotiating but at least they re on time, their car is nice, they know you have paid at reception, they understand where you want to go! we thought it was good value for money as we had a nice deal on hotels.com

Eigentlich ist das hotel wirklich sehr schön angelegt, eigentlich. Doch auf dem hotelgelände wird gebaut und ein ende ist meines erachtens noch nicht absehbar.der maschinenlärm zwingt einen tagsüber die ferne zu suchen. Am unerfreulichsten fand ich aber die mangelnde bereitschaft des hotelmanagments nach einer angemessenen lösung zu suchen.

We arrived just to be informed (with a sign and without appolgies) that there is construction work. Cant understand why we have not been informed before arrival as we were in contact with this hotel until 1 day before our arrival. This was clearly on purpose, we ve been tired and due to the cancellation policies we had no option. Work is from 07h00-17h00, so forget about a nap, or sleeping a bit longer. Our passports have been borrowed but only returned at checkout. With no explanation, the room was payed and we had no extras...anyway, what gives anybody the right to hold back your passports? anywhere in vietnam the accomodations only took copies and gave the passports back. You dont get much assistance (and to be honest, we where not interested after all this surprises) for your time in hoi an, except to go to the tailor that is somehow connected with this accomodation. Room is really nice and clean. Staff is not that friendly or motivated, except one young lady during breakfast service. On then last day we had a dead mouse on our corridor

전체적으로는 만족했던 숙박이었습니다... 방 사이즈도 크고 특히 욕실이 만족스러웠습니다... 다만 아쉬운점은 방의 tv가 너무 작아서 침대에서는 잘 보이질 않아 저녁시간에는 좀 무료한 시간을 보냈던것 같습니다... Tv가 좀 컷으면 좋겠습니다.. 또 옷장속 바닥에 먼지가 소복히 쌓여 있어서 청소에 좀 신경을 썻으면 합니다.. 방안에 개미도 있었구요... 조금만 청결에 신경을 쓰면 훌륭한 쉼터가 될것 같습니다... 다음에 또 호이안에 갈경우 다시 찾을수 있는 숙소입니다...

This is a great home stay option. Cam nam island is quiet but there are some good options for food and some nice places for a beer. At windbell you are away from the noise on the roads and bustle from the tourist area, but in less than 10 mins walk you are at the central old town. The hotel is small with only a few rooms around a nice pool and beautiful gardens. It has a personal feel and is very comfortable if you want to lounge by the pool. Rooms are spacious. Some additional notes - the area is safe. You can walk back to the hotel easily at night without worry. - there is an 11pm lockup - you can still get in after 11 by buzzing and they come and let you in. In practice most of the town except the tourist strip on the next island is all shut down by 10 so you are unlikely to find this much of an issue. - miss hong is a great stop for a beer on the way into town before the bridge. She rents bikes, does laundry, serves beer, offers very cheap taxi services to airport and tourist places, and is an all round star! well worth visiting. - renting bikes and going on your own to cam kim island is my favorite recommendation. The ferry is pretty mad and leaves from just past the market on the tourist bit. No need for a tour guide. Just go and explore cam kim on bikes.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: It was amazing for the price i paid it was superb. Its bit far from centre, but i would not change my stay for that. Hotel has shuttle service and you can always get a cab. The staff is very friendly and will everything they can do to make your stay comfortable. If you are not happy with anything you can always ask for yummy, she is part of team but very helpful and friendly i may go back just to say hello. If you are single, couple or family you will enjoy your stay .

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Das hotel ist sauber und verfügt über einige coole extras. Das personal war sehr zuvorkommend. Leider sind auch in diesem hotel die preise für speisen und getränke massiv übertrieben (z.b. Gemüse-nudeln 170k). Wären die preise tiefer, könnte man öfter dort essen oder am pool einmal mehr ein drink bestellen. Ansonsten alles gut.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Beautiful hotel. Tasty breakfast. Very close to beach.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Great stay

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Fantastisch hotel met topservice.! prima schone ruime kamer en ook grote badkamer. Ontbijtbuffet ook erg goed.je kunt als gast gebruik maken van de beachclub aan de overkant, echt geweldige locatie.ook shuttlebus naar hoi an en an bang beach en het vliegveld.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Hotellet er helt greit. Bassengområdet er mindre enn det fremstår på bildene, frokosten og rommene er helt ok. Hotellet er dårlig isolert, så anbefaler å ha med ørepropper. Beliggenheten er det kjedeligste. Det eneste som er i nærheten er stranden, ellers er det langt til alt hoi an byr på. Det finnes mange andre hoteller i samme prisklasse som gir mye mer for pengene.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: I had an amazing stay. This resort has a great gym (with great ac), breakfast is excellent. I had a very good massage at the spa, equiped with showers, sauna steam rooms. The staff is excellent and friendly, they took great care of me. I will definitely come back. Thank you again )

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Staff were the highlight and what can make/break your stay at any destination. The wyndham garden/little boutique staff were above and beyond with the hospitality and generosity. A short walk from the beach in a quite part of hoi an along the sand, i could definitely recommend for a trip with friends, family, or partner. Staff treated every guest with kindness and respect, did not have any issues with staff or amenities available. From the front desk, sanitation crew, lobby staff, dining room staff, pool staff, and even to the manager, we were accomodated with any need. Although i would only come back to hoi an for another visit to the beach, i would definitely consider staying here again due to my positive experience. Cảm ơn for helping me enjoy my first time in hoi an!

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Loved complimentary airport transfers, breakfasts ( if you could get it) transport to hoi an old town. But hotel did not mention when we booked that they were doing scheduled renovations on roof. Was very loud started at 7am. Had to move rooms but it was still bad. We stayed in for 2 days so noticed were looking for a quiet beach break. Unfortunately, whole area construction zone (was not hotels fault), but would have booked somewhere else if had of known about renos. Staff were lovely, but room cleaning was basic. Floors not swept so sand/ fine dirt would get was getting into beds. Otherwise good.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: This place is a bit older than the photos made it out to be. With a bit of an old smell to it too. The staff were great and friendly. Good english speaking staff. The breakfast buffet was excellent! our room was comfortable and convenient. Overall experience was good

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We stayed at the wyndham garden in august for 10 nights.the hotel is in a good position in cua dai and there is a beach club across the road that you can get vouchers for from the hotel. The food was excellent, breakfast being typical of the area with local and western options, as well as an egg station. We only ate in the restaurant once but it was a lovely meal. The hotel tries very hard to give its guests things to do in the evenings, we didn t stay in the hotel at night, instead choosing local eateries and going into old town to eat. The hotel is a little more expensive than the local area but not extortionate. However, they always added tax to your bill so just be aware of this. The staff are lovely and try their best to speak to you in english, their understanding of our language can be an issue but google translate is easy to use to get your questions to be understood. They have laundry service but it is charged per item whereas the local area all do laundry service charged by the kg and is much cheaper than the hotel. The rooms are big enough and we asked for more hangers, not much in the way of drawers for storage. The area around the hotel is mainly homes and restaurants. The hotel provides free use of bicycles should you wish to explore a little bit. Overall a lovely hotel in a lovely area.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Nydelig hotel med koselig personell. Har vært på dette hotellet en gang tidligere og det anbefales på det varmeste.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Smaller hotel with excellent friendly staff. Great breakfasts! easy shuttle to old city for shopping and viewing. Easy to organize tours from desk in foyer. Stones throw to beach. Great selection of small restaurants nearby if required. A really great place to stay.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: The beds were so comfortable we had 2 queens sized bed in one room small ocean view. The food in the restaurant was amazing, and the breakfast was incredible. Its in a quite part of hoi an , walk to the beach in 2 minutes.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Hotel with a real wow factor. Greeted by very attentive staff who couldnt do enough for you. This hotel was a 100m from the beach. Being located outside hoian the hotel provides free shuttle bus service into the centre. Also free transfer from / to the airport. Rooms were lovely. Comfy beds, good facilities. Lovely balcony overlooking the beach. The hotel had a lovely pool and pool bar and food was superb.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We chose this hotel somewhat at random, but were very pleased with our stay. The staff were super friendly and helpful, breakfast was good, and the room and bathroom were spacious and very nice. Wifi was good and room safe was big enough for a computer. Food and drink prices were reasonable by hotel standards (e.g. About 4 for an aperol poolside). Only limitation was -- the footprint of the hotel is limited so the pool deck is a bit small and has only 14 lounge chairs for 100 rooms. Late morning they might fill up. But the hotel has an arrangement with a beach club across the road, so guests can use beach chairs over there. About a dozen local beachfront seafood restaurants are nearby. A taxi or app car to the hoi an old town is 3-5 each way depending on time of day.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Alle super nett und hilfsbereit! essen war sehr gut aber nach 4 wochen war es auch genug köche alle sehr aufmerksam und füllten das frühstücksbuffet immer auf , wenn etwas fehlte! vielen dank für alles was wir dort erleben durften! bitte weiter so !

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We had a good stay here, the staff were very friendly. The buffet breakfast was great, the rooms were spacious and clean and the hotel wasn t worn or hired at all. The doors do bang very loudly which was a bit annoying and the staff do try to sell you on packages quite a lot. The pool was a nice way to get out of the heat. Aircon was good in the rooms. We had two adjoining rooms as we are a family of tvs were in the rooms but don t have netflix or any casting options, so limited to 2 english movie channels and news, music, sports channels. My daughter and i had a massage and facial which were affordable and enjoyable.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Sauber und sehr freundliches personal, leckeres frühstück, es gibt shuttle nach hoi an und einen anderen strand kostenfrei. Ein weiteres plus ist der kostenlose flughafen - shuttle. Tolle massage.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Really happy about everything. Very helpful and friendly staff. Especially thank you for all the help to the receptionist sunny! rooms are big and clean. Very near the beach and a nice infinity pool with a bar! hotel also offered very cheap motorbike rentals. Pretty good breakfast too.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Great hotel, located next to the beach, amazing staff, great spa massage, has a good gym with ac, great breakfast. Internet speed is okay, but is not 250 or 500 mbps as advertised. It varies based where you are (floor corner in the room), ranges from 30 to 60 mbps.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: A bit noisy due to new construction

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Très bien! bon emplacement, petit déjeuné copieux, équipe de la réception au restaurant au top bon rapport qualité prix

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: This resort had a lot of cozy space we enjoyed hanging out around the pool and in the lounge area. The staff were all very helpful, and the breakfast buffet provided an excellent variety of foods. Our room was advertised as partial ocean view, which was a bit of an exaggeration as our room directly overlooked the garage (and the rooster!) of the house next door, and we could see the ocean only if we stood on tiptoe on our balcony and craned our necks. Another hotel is being built across the street, which will soon block any direct view of the ocean. However, the room itself was very nice, the property was well maintained, and we enjoyed our stay outside the busy old town area. This property was a great value and i would definitely stay here again.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Manager sunny and her staff really took good care of us during our stay with excellent service and attitude. Breakfast was also very nice with good selection patrik with family

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: It was an ok faciliity, breakfast ok .about a 5/10. It made worse by constant rain for most of the time, so too cold to swim. There was constant mix ups with getting our room cleaned but the staff were generally pretty nice. Its a bit far from the old town and the hub of hoi an ..5/10.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: This property is so nice. The staff was extremely helpful. I don t usually mention names, but it is very hard to forget yummy, lily, and linda. They checked on us throughout our stay and they were very helpful in every aspect. The breakfast was good. The omelettes were cooked to order. I would like to mention the their spa provided the best foot massage that i have ever had in se asia. The room was always cleaned thoroughly. We were not able to experience the pool because it was rainy and cold, but it was really beautiful. This team or staff made our holiday season very relaxing.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Clean, quiet hotel close to beaches. Good breakfast, wonderful spa. Hotel offers a shuttle to hoi an old town twice a day but it s easy to get a grab car to go wherever you want.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Chambre très confortable avec vue sur mer. Service efficace. 2 piscines dont une très sympa en bord de plage. Prêt de vélo pour se rendre dans la vieille ville en 15 minutes..

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Overall i would say this is a good hotel (1) the staff are excellent and super friends (2) the buffet breakfast is very good (3) the free shuttle into the old town was also used. (4) the hotel is near the beach, maybe 200 meter walk and i could see from my balcony. Linda on the front desk and all the team were great. Seems to be a lot of building working going on around the hotel, like the development of a big new hotel virtaully right in front. Wouldnt say there is much happening at the hotel, so if you are after a chilled time then great. Gym was okish - would have hopped for a better gym given the rest of the hotel. (gym maybe 4/10), rest of hotel and experience 8.5/10.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Great spot, close to old town.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: The staff are wonderful at the hotel, so friendly and helpful. Amazing breakfast each day, lovely swimming pool.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Nice

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Great property

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Personalen var mycket hjälpsamma och trevliga. Bra frukost och spa.beachklubben som ligger 2 min promenad från hotellet är trevlig och ligger på en jättefin sandstrand som är perfekt att bada vid, badskor behövs ej. Perfekt att kunna låna cyklar för att kunna testa andra stränder och restauranger i området. Bra restaurang på hotellet också. Behövs lite nya uppdateringar i infon om hotellet.,men vi trivdes superbra under våra 2 veckor. Lätt att ta sig in till gamla staden i hoi an, använd hotellets shuttleservice eller ladda ner appen grab. Karolina/patrik

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We had the privilege of staying at the hotel for 12 nights. It is a very nice hotel with a good location, close to many beaches and very nice area. The best part was the staff in all categories. Very helpful, approachable, happy and super nice! pool area-good, breakfast- perfect, gym- good, spa -very good. We will be back!

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We had a wonderful stay at wyndham garden .. Everything was perfect. The staff were all so attentive, kind, smiley and helpful and really made us feel valued .. They even addressed us by name at check in without us introducing ourselves! hana and lisa-no deserve special mentions for their hospitality. Nothing negative to say, rooms were large and clean with a colonial feel, the pool wonderful and breakfast was a great spread. Would definitely return.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: I really enjoyed my stay, great resort, great full spa experience, good gym, great staff. Thank you.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Our first stay at this hotel was wonderful thanks to ms. Sunny, ms. Linda and all the wonderful staff including the drivers! i visited with my 3 children, and ms. Sunny prepared a room for us as we arrived early in the morning, so we were able to relax after the trip. The beach is right in front of hotel,so if you stay at this hotel you can enjoy the rice fields, the beach and the ancient city. We plan to visit here again soon! see you again!

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Hotellet var virkelig dejligt, men der var ikke meget at se omkring det, meget få lokale restauranter man havde lyst til at gå ind på, man føler man er kommet på landet. Der var shuttlebus til hoi an, hvilket var en god service. Morgenmaden var virkelig dejlig

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Excelente servicio staff muy atento y servicial.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Really nice room. Lovely bathroom. Breakfast was incredible.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Hotel is located in a relaxing area. The beach is right across the street. We stayed there for 2 nights. Everything was great. The staffs were friendly and accommodating, breakfast was fantastic, room was clean, roomy, and in good condition. Biggest plus was free transportation to hoi a night market and to dad airport.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: International breakfast was great, so many options. Close to beach, and we like it better than an ban, wider and less busy. Free bikes are old so drive care (steering). Old man restaurant down the street very good. Friendly, helpful staff. 2 free shuttles per day to old town. We were there for 4 days and they offered a free airport shuttle to da nang airport one way. Plenty of walkable places to eat. We had pool/riverview room was scenic. New hotel going up on ocean side so may not have oceanview rooms by good value, safe area.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: So close to the beach and the beach clubs. Lilly was wonderful and helped me with planning my day and advice on what was around the hotel. Free transportation to old town and a free shuttle to my next hotel. This was a last minute stop but five stars all the way around. Stayed 2 nights here

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Lovely hotel friendly staff. Breakfast was varied tasty room was spacious pool area was smaller than the pictures suggested but was still a lovely space

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Brilliant staff who treat you like family and do all they can to assist. Pretty basic hotel in general with lap pool and restaurant, not like a resort and probably more for older patrons or people just wanting to unwind. But staff are fantastic and location was quiet and very close to the beach. Also gave free passes to the beach club which was a 1 min walk if you did want to go to a larger pool with swim up bar etc all in all very happy

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: Its by the beach but its just a little bit far away from the main area. If you want to be isolated and relax by the beach then this is the best hotel for you. They also have a free shuttle to take you to the main area. But there will be a charge if you need it after 4pm so just go by grab. Staffs are very good and helpful too and we were looked after by locu . Its only the breakfast that i wasnt fond of. We stayed 3 nights and the breakfast are pretty much the same everyday not a lot of options. Food are a bit bland too. Thank you to the porters too they made me felt very welcomed when i arrived!

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: We really enjoyed our stay at wyndham. They were especially accommodating when we had a last minute change in our stays from 3 nights to 2 nights. They were so nice to not even charge us for the last minute change in our stays at wyndham. We are so grateful to the staff for their help. We would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends and family.

hotelName: Wyndham Garden Hoi An Cua Dai Beach
userCmt: As with all of vietnam the staff couldn t do enough for you. Welcoming reception area, easy check in and our luggage taken to our room. Room was ideal, lovely view from the balcony. Only negative for us was a very hard bed. We ate once in the restaurant on our late arrival and then kept the kitchen open for us which was a nice touch. Breakfast had a wide choice but don t expect too much for the english pallet. Eggs cooked to order how you want them, which we did and then had selection from the continental buffet. Hotel arranged taxi for the trips to the main attraction, but otherwise we used the grab taxi app. All in a very nice hotel only 10 mins from the old town.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Nice and clean property and friendly staff. I would give the resort 5 stars if the stairwell was enclosed and secures. It will be easy to do security checks on the kids who were staying at the separated rooms.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Nice rooms and a reasonable standard service for the price, however, in the hotel towers, the noise from the street was a problem, in addition to the unnecessary piano music playing in the hotel hallways, which could be clearly heard in my room from 7am until 10 30pm. The villas are very nice, however. In the busy pool areas, there were not enough sunbeds for all the guests, since some people would reserve a sun lounger with a towel and then disappear for hours. A better system should be implemented.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: This property is geared towards small children. It s like a disney property. I was disappointed in the villa. All the bedrooms were separate rooms with outdoor entrances separate from the living room. It was just a weird set up. The spa was a huge disappointment. It was next to the kids pool and loud . Not relaxing at all. The beach is the best thing about the resort.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Amazing service, impeccable facilities, comfortable and enjoyable for 5 nights

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Our experience at the hotel was quite disappointing. The staff at the reception were not helpful at all. They didn t understand english, which we completely understand, but they also showed no willingness to assist us even with tools like google translate. When we asked for directions to a nearby location, they gave us incorrect information and didn t make any effort to clarify or help further. Unfortunately, their attitude came across as quite rude and indifferent. The food was average at best, with very limited options for vegetarians. Overall, the service and hospitality did not meet our expectations.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Perfect for families, wonderful food quality. Daily foam parties for the kids.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: ホテル プール ビーチ全て満点 近くにお店が少ないのが少し残念

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Nous avons résidé dans cet hôtel 3 nuits. Il ne vaut pas un 5 étoiles pour les raisons suivante - les personnes au service parlent pas anglais, un peu une honte pour ce standing - on entend la rue dans la chambre et ne parlons pas des gens qui parlent dans le call qui résonnent - les prix pratiqués au restaurant c est du n importe quoi. Même dans un vrai 5 étoiles à ho chi minh ou hanoi, nous avions mieux mangé pour mon cher. 2 cocktails, 2 entrées et 2 plats 2 300 000 dongs, un peu abusé et au restaurant de la plage, le soir, il y avait un problème avec chaque table. Service à revoir et notamment les serveurs

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Great stay. Well kept hotel.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Fantastisk resort med er perfekt beliggenhed lige ned til stranden og tæt skønne hoi an old town. Vi havde et dejligt og stort værelse ca. 50 kvm med en flot udsigt til det ene poolområde og ud over havet. Enormt venligt personale.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Very nice hotel with a beautiful beach. Prices of restaurant drinks food are pretty high on european levels. But very nice rooms and friendly staff. It s a shame that some guests treat the areas badly, such as clogging toilets in the pool area or not showering before swimming in the pool so that sun cream leaves a film in the pool.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: After all the raving reviews we had read, we were very much looking forward to our stay and have been very disappointed. First of all we booked in february for a stay in april and asked for rooms next to one another which couldn t be accomodated according to the staff at reception when checking in. Secondly there was a fire downstairs from our building during our first night. No fire alarm. We were lucky my husband heard the noise and woke us up to go downstairs from the 8th floor where we were staying. Stairs were uneven and quite frankly last steps were almost all too high which meant we almost fell each time. In the event of a hotel evacuation, there would most definitely be some injuries due to the stairs. There was around a dozen people only there including the general manager but most guests were still in their rooms oblivious of the fact their lives were potentially at risk. Fire department didn t arrive until about 50 minutes from them being notified. So overall health and safety - absolutely horrid, can t really be worse. Once all settled we refused to go back to the 8th floor and they kindly accomodated us with one of the villas for the rest of our stay. Then there was the staff we took the all inclusive option when we arrived which we had to justify throughout our stay and argue almost every time we ordered. Overall poor experience facilities are otherwise as described but didn t make up for the rest and our experience overall was nothing short of terrible.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Fine rom, litt klønete med bygg 1 og 2 og gjennomgang gjennom spisesal.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Gut gepflegte neue anlage mit schönem strand sowie poolbereich mit blick aufs meer. Freundliches und engagiertes personal, insbesondere beim frühstücksbüffet (danke an frau vy hue für den freundlichen service). Gutes frühstücksbuffet mit großer auswahl. Lage ist gut, mit grab/taxi ca 15min in die altstadt. Zu bemängeln ist, dass das standard studio für eine familie zu klein ist - selbst zu zweit ist es recht eng. Deluxe room war deutlich besser. Zimmer insgesamt schön und neu, allerdings war das badezimmer bei uns kein separater raum - man tritt von der dusche bzw vom wc direkt ins zimmer.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: People at reception do not respect clients privacy

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Everything was perfect! staff was amazing. Especially phú who helps with transportation.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Rooms were lovely and staff were very helpful beach was great

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: 最高に満足でした ただ壁が少し薄いから外の音が聞こえます 朝食は美味しいしスタッフも優しいです また来ます

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Hotel location is 1km an bang village/beach and 4km from hoi an town. Easy to reach both via hotel shuttle and grab taxi app. Beach is huge and empty. Rooms new and clean. 2 pools with sun or shade options. Liked this hotel and the staff are friendly and engaged.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Lovely property which is very well kept. Staff enthusiast and keen to help. Some small niggles. The service was slow in the evening, there was a lack of options in the restaurant menu, there was a lack of kitchen facilities for villa options, there was no hand towel in some bathrooms, and there was no full length mirror, there was an excellent amount of choice for breakfast both western and asian, it was very clean, the gardens were beautiful, and the pools were immaculate

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: 숙소 컨디션은 올드한 느낌이 많이 들지만 해변 백사장 야외 수영장은 정말 환상 그 자체 입니다.가족과 행복한 시간을 보내기 너무좋은 장소 입니다.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Beautiful and comfortable!

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: A little bit far from the center of hoian. This is good part of the hotel. Almost every thing is perfect

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: The property was nice it appeared to be a little outdated. Yet it had everything we wanted which was a relaxed location with access to the beach, which was approximately a 2-4 minute walk away from the reception area.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Flott hotel med vakte uteområder. Vennlig og hjelpsomme ansatte. Litt dårlig internett.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: It can not be denied this is my favourite place to vacation. The property is gorgeous and spotless. The staffs are amazing and beyond thoughtful. I would definitely come back for my next trip

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: The property is beautiful. We stayed in the new wing which is basic but clean. The staff are courteous and alik and vang were very helpful. I would recommend the coffee making class and the spa treatments. The beach is amazing. The thing to improve would be cleanliness in the restaurants.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Was not very happy during check-in which hotel staff said no our booking, indeed i already showed the confirmation email from hotels.com and staff still need to check verify which took 45mins. Finally we got permission to have our room in main lobby, however, the staff were not communicated, counter staff again asked us to show passport booking confirmation, very annoying. We told the staff we were asked to wait 45mins in another front desk to check our booking, don t waste our time. Finally the bell boy told the front desk staff to give us room keys, then we can go to our room. Very unprofessional service, not acceptable a 5 star hotel provided this kind of service.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Did not look like the pictures at all. Lobby old and dated this was not luxury we watched as kids took over pull and shoved bloody tissues into side of pool.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Excellent stay here. Room was fantastic and very clean. Hotel amenities were great. Only issue is that the hotel is not near anything but they put on a courtesy bus to the old town each day/night.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: This property is very nice, but has a whole building still needing to be completed. This does not affect your stay regarding building work but it does affect how many places there are to eat as there s only one place to have dinner which has the same menu as the the pool bar. The beach bar area is amazing, pool and grassed area is stunning. The rooms are big and very nicely decorated, views are amazing, could do with places to hang your towels and a full length mirror. We had an amazing stay, very quiet, friendly staff.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: ほとんど最高でした こんな値段で泊まれるのは信じられないです

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Omg this place is 10/10!!!! my only complaint was they had all these amazing activities but no one coordinating. Buffet breakfast 10/10, pools 10/10, cleanliness 10/10! get a villa, ours was stunning.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Beautiful swimming pool and beach.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Der direkte strandzugang ist der hammer. Mit schirmen und bedienung. Der strand ist quasi privat, es kommt nie jemand anderes vorbei und er ist tagsüber unter aufsicht. Das restaurant war auch toll. Für knapp unter 1 mio vnd gibts buffet für zwei personen, mittags und abends. Das buffet ist sehr reichhaltig. Das gym ist auch gut, man kann gut trainieren. Ein kabelturm, beinbeuger/beinstrecker, ein latzug und eine bankdrückmaschine. Man ist nach kurzer fahrt in hoi an, ca. 100.000 vnd mit dem grab. Wir mochten das hotel sehr. Zimmer war auch immer sauber und top.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: We loved our villas. It felt like royalty. All of the breakfast buffets were superb. We will definitely stay here again and will tell friends about it.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Wyndham hoi an royal beachfront resort and villas offers excellent accommodation and dining facilities located a very short stroll to the beach along with a greatpool and gym facilities

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Upon arrival we were upgraded to a villa with a private pool which looked amazing (vietnamese standard) but we asked to be moved to our originally booked suite due to a strong smell (musky smell in hotel rooms is common in vietnam). The suite smelled much fresher. Breakfast was great. But skip the beach restaurant, it wasn t great. Service was definitely 5 . Shuttle to hoi an is very practical.tom was great and helped us with everything.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Selve hotellet er frygteligt- værelse uden charme. Støj fra hovedvejen, da værelsesgangen er åben til hovedvejen. Der er intet inden for 2 km afstand. Urimeligt dyrt at spise på hotellet. Hotellets have, pool er vidunderligt- god plads. Vær obs på at der renoveres på tårn 2 og det vil foregå lang tid endnu. Hotellet lever ikke op til 5 stjerner - men kan sammenlignes med days inn.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Our stay was fantastic. From the moment we arrive i was taken excellent care of by my personal hostess ms ánh hoa. She checked me in then took me to the room to show me all the features. She was the best hostess i have experienced in many years. Every day she made sure all our expectations were taken care, the room was cleaned and the turn down services was performed. She checked on me regularly to see if i needed any arrangements, reservations or help with anything. The resort pools and onsen were great. The breakfast buffet was fantastic and every meal we had at the resort was great. Roof top pool and bar were always refreshing and the water park was enjoyable. One of the best holidays i have had in a while. I will return again to mikazuki resort and will ask for ms hoa to be our hostess again. She really made our time there most enjoyable.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Very nice stay and friendly staff . Great mattress. Clean and decent value . Transportation to the town .

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: We stayed for two nights and it was amazing. Service, staff, pool, room, cleanliness- everything was amazing. The massage is pricier but it was worth it! def staying there again!

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Great servers

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Everything was excellent. The complimentary shuttle bus to the old town was a very thoughtful option. Except the hot water supply was a little short. Ok, as it was only me in the room so it didn t matter, but if two people were staying together, who didn t shower together, then the hot water would be a little cold for the second person. Secondly, there was no coffee making machine in the room. For an establishment that calls itself five star, two star instant coffee isn t an option. However i have to say a big thank you to the management for supplying a coffee-pod machine and coffee pods for the duration of my stay.thanks again management!

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Great experience. Highlights are the very kind staff who does their job very well, the delicious breakfast and the beautiful swimming pool.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Good resort, super nice and helpful staff and very good breakfast

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: This hotel is practically brand new. One tower is still under construction. Food was excellent. Pools were amazing. Grounds and facilities were spotless. Staff was very helpful - especially phu and trang. Would definitely recommend.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Om man ska bo på detta hotellet så är det en villa man ska ha. Maten i resturangvagnen var inte god men väldigt dyr så rekommenderar inte den. Vi åt där nån gång för vi va tvungna, vi hade små barn med oss. Det finns ingen supermarket eller restaurang i närheten. Frukosten var dock väldigt god.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: The hotel staff is very kind, the room is very comfortable and clean. The breakfast is really amazing for western and eastern people. The location is very convenient because despite not being at ha noi downtown, you have the beach in front of the hotel and it is offered a car to take you to downtown.

hotelName: Wyndham Hoi An Royal Beachfront Resort & Villas
userCmt: Vi hade en mycket bra vistelse på hotellet. Personalen var mycket trevlig, bra service. Vi fick byta till en villa med 3 sovrum och vardagsrum. Mycket nöjda och kan verkligen rekommendera hotellet.

Nhân viên phục vụ rất dễ thương và chu đáo, luôn tư vấn các quán ăn ngon và điểm tham quan. Mình hài lòng với kỳ nghỉ vừa rồi và sẽ quay lại khi có dịp.
